MSS aṃśavastava niśākara nūnaṃ kalpitāstaruṇaketakakhaṇḍaiḥ 
MSS yena pāṇḍurataradyutayo naḥ kaṇṭakairiva tudanti śarīram 
MSS aṃśukaṃ hṛtavatā tanubāhu svastikāpihitamugdhakucāgrā 
MSS bhinnaśaṅkhavalayaṃ pariṇetrā paryarambhi rabhasādaciroḍhā 
MSS aṃśukamiva śītabhayāt saṃstyānatvacchalena himadhavalam 
MSS ambhobhirapi gṛhītaṃ paśyata śiśirasya māhātmyam 
MSS aṃśukena jaghanaṃ tirodadhe ka cukena ca kucau mṛgīdṛśām 
MSS pīyamānamaniśaṃ priyekṣaṇaiḥ kṣāmatāmiva jagāma madhyamam 
MSS aṃśupāṇibhiratīva pipāsuḥ padmajaṃ madhu bhṛśaṃ rasayitvā 
MSS kṣībatāmiva gataḥ kṣitimeṣyaṃl lohitaṃ vapuruvāha pataṅgaḥ 
MSS aṃśumānapi vipākapiśaṅgaṃ rūpamāpa parito divasānte 
MSS kaḥ paro'tra na vikāramupeyād dhvāntabhīmaparivellitamūrtiḥ 
MSS aṃśo daṇḍasamaḥ pūrvaḥ prayāsasama uttamaḥ 
MSS vilopo vā yathālābhaṃ prakṣepasama eva vā 
MSS aṃśo'pi duṣṭadiṣṭānāṃ pareṣāṃ syād vināśakṛt 
MSS bālaleśo'pi vyāghrāṇāṃ yat syāj jīvitahānaye 
MSS aṃsāvavaṣṭabdhanatā samādhiḥ śirodharāyā rahitaprayāsaḥ 
MSS dhṛtā vikārāṃstyajatā mukhena prasādalakṣmīḥ śaśalāñchanasya 
MSS aṃsālambitavāmakuṇḍaladharaṃ mandonnatabhrūlataṃ kiṃcit kuñcitakomalādharapuṭaṃ sāciprasārīkṣaṇam 
MSS alolāṅgulipallavairmuralikāmāpūrayantaṃ mudā mūle kalpatarostribhaṅgalalitaṃ dhyāye jaganmohanam 
MSS aṃsāsaktakapolavaṃśavadanavyāsaktabimbādharadvandvodīritamandamandapavanprārabdhamugdhadhvaniḥ 
MSS īṣadvakrimalolahāranikaraḥ pratyekarokānananyañcaccañcadudañcadaṅgulicayastvāṃ pātu rādhādhavaḥ 
MSS aṃsena karṇaṃ cibukena vakṣaḥ karadvayenākṣi tirodadhānām 
MSS saṃtāḍayāmāsa hariḥ sametya cakoranetrāṃ calukodakena 
MSS aṃhaḥ saṃharadakhilaṃ sakṛdudayādeva sakalalokasya 
MSS taraṇiriva timirajaladhiṃ jayati jaganmaṅgalaṃ harernāma 
MSS akaṇṭakā puṣpamahī veśayoṣidamātṛkā 
MSS mantrihīnā ca rājyaśrīr bhujyate viṭaceṭakaiḥ 
MSS akaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe kathaṃ puṣpamālā vinā nāsikāyāḥ kathaṃ dhūpagandhaḥ 
MSS akarṇasya karṇe kathaṃ gītanṛtyam apādasya pāde kathaṃ me praṇāmaḥ 
MSS akaparddakasya viphalaṃ januriti jānīmahe maheśo'pi 
MSS śirasi kṛtena kaparddī bhavati jaṭājūṭakenāpi 
MSS akaravamadhimauli pādapadmāv apanaya mānini mānitāmakāṇḍe 
MSS yadi pararamaṇīṃ gatastadātha stanayugaliṅgayugaṃ sprśāmi tanvi 
MSS akaruṇa kātaramanasā darśitanīrā nirantarāleyam 
MSS tvāmanudhāvati vimukhaṃ gaṅgeva bhagīrathaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ 
MSS akaruṇatvamakāraṇavigrahaḥ paradhanāpahṛtiḥ parayoṣitaḥ 
MSS svajanabandhujaneṣvasahiṣṇutā prakṛtisidhamidaṃ hi durātmanām 
MSS akaruṇa mṛṣābhāśāsindho vimuñca mamāñcalaṃ tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅmayetyabhidhāyinīm 
MSS aviralagaladvāṣpāṃ tanvīṃ nirastavibhūṣaṇāṃ ka iha bhavatīṃ bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet 
MSS akaroḥ kimu netraśoṇimānaṃ kimakārṣīḥ karapallavāvarodham 
MSS kalahaṃ kimadhāḥ krudhā rasajñe hitamarthaṃ na vidanti daivadaṣṭāḥ 
MSS akarṇamakaroccheṣaṃ vidhirbrahmāṇḍabhaṅgadhīḥ 
MSS śrutvā rāmakathāṃ ramyāṃ śiraḥ kasya na kampate 
MSS akarṇadhārāśugasaṃbhṛtāṅgatāṃ gatairaritreṇa vināsya vairibhiḥ 
MSS vidhāya yāvattaraṇerbhidāmaho nimajjya tīrṇaḥ samare bhavārṇavaḥ 
MSS akartavyaṃ na kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi 
MSS kartavyameva kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi 
MSS akartavyeṣvasādhvīva tṛṣṇā prerayate janam 
MSS tameva sarvapāpebhyo lajjā māteva rakṣati 
MSS akarmaṇāṃ vai bhūtānāṃ vṛttiḥ syān na hi kācana 
MSS tadevābhriprapadyeta na vihanyāt kathaṃcana 
MSS akarmaśīlaṃ ca mahāśanaṃ ca lokadviṣṭaṃ bahumāyaṃ nṛśaṃsam 
MSS adeśakālajñamaniṣṭaveṣam etān gṛhe na prativāsayīta 
MSS akalaṅkacandrakalayā kalitā sā bhāti vāruṇī taruṇī 
MSS bhālasthalīva śambhoḥ saṃdhyādhyānopaviṣṭasya 
MSS akalaṅkāntike kāntiḥ keti kālaṅkalaṅkinaḥ 
MSS aruṇe taruṇe masyā dhāvaṃ kāmayate śaśī 
MSS akalaṅkā pulakavatī sasnehā muktakañcukī śyāmā 
MSS patatu tavorasi dayitā khaṅgalatā vairiṇaḥ śirasi 
MSS akalaṅko dṛḍhaḥ śuddhaḥ parivārī guṇānvitaḥ 
MSS sadvaṃśo hṛdayagrāhī khaṅgaḥ susadṛśastava 
MSS akalitanijapararūpaḥ svakamapi doṣaṃ parasthitaṃ vetti 
MSS nāvāsthitastaṭasthān acalānapi vicalitān manute 
MSS akaliyugamakharvamatra hṛdyaṃ vyacaradapāpaghano yataḥ kuṭumbī 
MSS mama ruciriha lakṣmaṇāgrajena prabhavati śarmadaśāsyamardena 
MSS akalilatapastejovīryaprathimni yaśonidhā vavitathamadadhmāte roṣānmunāvabhidhāvati 
MSS abhinavadhanurvidyādarpakṣamāya ca karmaṇe sphurati rabhasāt pāṇiḥ pādopasaṃgrahaṇāya ca 
MSS akalpaḥ svāṅgaceṣṭāyāṃ śakunta iva pañjare 
MSS anucchvasansmaran pūrvaṃ garbhe kiṃ nāma vindate 
MSS akasmāt prakriyā nṝṇāṃ akasmāccāpakarṣaṇam 
MSS śubhāśubhe mahattvaṃ ca prakartuṃ buddhilāghavāt 
MSS akasmādapi yaḥ kaścid arthaṃ prāpnoti pūruṣaḥ 
MSS taṃ haṭheneti manyante sa hi yatno na kasyacit 
MSS akasmādunmatta praharasi kimadhvakṣitiruhaṃ hradaṃ hastāghātairvidalasi kimutphullanalinam 
MSS tadā jānīmaste karivara balodgāramasamaṃ saṭāṃ suptasyāpi spṛśasi yadi pañcānanaśiśoḥ 
MSS akasmādekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmunataṭaṃ vrajantyā dṛṣṭo'yaṃ navajaladharaśyāmalatanuḥ 
MSS sa dṛgbhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛhakṛtye na lagate 
MSS akasmādeva kupyanti prasīdantyanimittataḥ 
MSS śīlametadasādhūnām abhraṃ pāriplavaṃ yathā 
MSS akasmādeva tanvaṅgī jahāsa yadiyaṃ punaḥ 
MSS nūnaṃ prasūnabāṇo'syāṃ svārājyamadhitiṣṭhati 
MSS akasmādeva te caṇḍi sphuritādharapallavam 
MSS mukhaṃ muktāruco dhatte gharmāmbhaḥkaṇamañjarīḥ 
MSS akasmādeva yaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ bahu bhāṣate 
MSS tasmādudvijate lokaḥ sasphuliṅgādivānalāt 
MSS akasmāddveṣṭi yo bhaktam ājanmaparisevitam 
MSS na vyañjane ruciryasya tyājyo nṛpa ivāturaḥ 
MSS akāṇḍakopino bhartur anyāsakteśca yoṣitaḥ 
MSS praśāntiścetasaḥ kartuṃ brahmaṇāpi na śakyate 
MSS akāṇḍadhrtamānasavyavasitotsavaiḥ sārasair akāṇdapaṭutāṇḍavairapi śikhaṇḍināṃ maṇḍalaiḥ 
MSS diśaḥ samavalokitāḥ sarasanirbharaprollasad bhavatpṛthuvarūthinīrajanibhūrajaḥśyāmalāḥ 
MSS akāṇḍapātajātānām astrāṇāṃ marmabhedinām 
MSS gāḍhaśokaprahārāṇām acintaiva mahauṣadham 
MSS akāṇḍe vakṣojaskhalitavasanavyāpṛtakaraṃ mṛṣā jṛmbhārambhonnamitabhujabandhonnatakucam

MSS akāmasya kriyā kācid dṛśyate neha kaṛhicit 
MSS yadyaddhi kurute kiṃcit tattat kāmasya ceṣṭitam 
MSS akāmāṃ kāmayānasya śarīramupatapyate 
MSS icchantīṃ kāmayānasya prītirbhavati śobhanā 
MSS akāmān kāmayati yaḥ kāmayānān paridviṣan 
MSS balavantaṃ ca yo dveṣṭi tamāhurmūḍhacetasam 
MSS akāraṇaṃ rūpamakāraṇaṃ kulaṃ mahatsu nīceṣu ca karma śobhate 
MSS idaṃ hi rūpaṃ paribhutapūrvakaṃ tadeva bhūyo bahumānamāgataṃ 
MSS akāraṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tantrīśabdo'pyakāraṇam 
MSS akāraṇaṃ trayo vedās taṇḍulāstatra kāraṇam 
MSS akāraṇāviṣkṛtakopadāruṇāt khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate

MSS akāraṇena viprebhyo yaḥ kupyati narādhipaḥ 
MSS krṣṇasarpaṃ sa gṛhṇāti śirasā baladaṛpitaḥ 
MSS akāryakaraṇādbhītaḥ kāryāṇāṃ ca vivarjanāt 
MSS akāle mantrabhedācca yena mādyenna tat pibet 
MSS akāryapratiṣedhaśca kāryāṇāṃ ca pravartanam 
MSS pradānaṃ ca pradeyānām adeyānāmasaṃgrahaḥ 
MSS akāryamasakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hyadhanā narāḥ 
MSS dhanayuktāstvadharmasthā dṛśyante cāpare janāḥ 
MSS akāryāṇyapi paryāpya kṛtvāpiṃ vṛjinārjanaṃ

MSS akālacaryā viṣamā ca goṣṭhī kumitrasevā na kadāpi kāryā

MSS akiṃcanatvaṃ rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayat

MSS akulīnaḥ kulīnaśca maryādāṃ yo na laṅghayet

MSS na ca kṛtyaṃ parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 
MSS akṛtayaṃ manyate kṛtayaṃ agamyaṃ manyate sugam

MSS akṛtrimapremarasā vilāsālasagāminī

MSS avibhāgāṅgasubhagaṃ babhūva surataṃ tayoḥ 
MSS akṛtvā karma yo loke phalaṃ vindati viṣṭitaḥ 
MSS sa tu vaktavyatāṃ yāti dveṣyo bhavati prāyaśaḥ 
MSS akṛtvā nijadeśasya rakṣāṃ yo vijigīṣate 
MSS sa nṛpaḥ paridhānena vṛtamauliḥ pumāniva 
MSS akṛtvā parasaṃtāpam agatvā khalanamratām 
MSS anutsṛjya satāṃ vartma yat svalpamapi tad bahu 
MSS akṛtvā pauruṣaṃ yā śrīḥ kiṃ tayālasabhāgyayā 
MSS kuraṅgo'pi samaśnāti daivādupanataṃ tṛṇam 
MSS akṛtvā mānuṣaṃ karma yo daivamanuvartate 
MSS vṛthā śrāmyati saṃprāpya patiṃ klībamivāṅganā 
MSS akṛtvā helayā pādam uccairmūrdhasu vidviṣām 
MSS kathaṃkāramanālambā kīrtirdyāmadhirohati 
MSS akṛpaṇamaśaṭhamacapalaṃ yoginamaviṣādinaṃ budhaṃ śūram 
MSS yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā bhavati 
MSS akṛśaṃ kucayoḥ kṛśaṃ valagne vitataṃ cakṣuṣi vistṛtaṃ nitambe 
MSS aruṇādharamāvirastu citte karuṇāśāli kapālibhāgadheyam 
MSS akṛśaṃ nitambabhāge kṣāmaṃ madhye samunnataṃ kucayoḥ 
MSS atyāyataṃ nayanayor mama jīvitametadāyāti 
MSS akṛṣṭaphalamūlena vanavāsarataḥ sadā 
MSS kurute'harahaḥ śrāddham ṛṣirvipraḥ sa ucyate 
MSS akekī kiṃ kekī vacasi caturaḥ kinna kuraraḥ śukaḥ kiṃvā mūkaḥ sa ca kalaravaḥ kiṃ kṣataravaḥ 
MSS tvayāgaṇyaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pikamadhurimā dhīragarimā yato labdhaḥ stabdhaḥ kimasi ruciraṃ neha suciram 
MSS akausumī manmathacāpayaśṭi ranaṃśukā vibhramavaijayantī 
MSS lalāṭaraṅgāṅgaṇanartakīyam anañjanā bhrūranuyāti dṛṣṭam 
MSS akratvaṅgamatastakraṃ na śatakratunā hutam 
MSS nādattamiti vākyārthāt takraṃ śakrasya durlabham 
MSS akratvarthamiti jñātvā śakre na hutavān purā 
MSS nādattamiti śāstrārthāt takraṃ śakrasya durlabham 
MSS akrameṇānupāyena karmārambho na sidhyati 
MSS dadhisarpiḥpayāṃsīva śabarasya yathā hi goḥ 
MSS akrodhaṃ śikṣayantyanyaiḥ krodhanā ye tapodhanāḥ 
MSS nirdhanāste dhanāyaiva dhātuvādopadeśinaḥ 
MSS akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas tathā titikṣuratitikṣorviśiṣṭaḥ 
MSS amānuṣebhyomānuṣāśca pradhānā vidvāṃstathaivāviduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ 
MSS akrodhanaḥ satyavādī bhūtānāmavihiṃsakaḥ 
MSS anasūyaḥ sadācāro dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt 
MSS akrodhanaśca rājendra satyaśīlo dṛḍhavrataḥ 
MSS ātmopamaśca bhūteṣu sa tīrthaphalamaśnute 
MSS akrodhavairāgyajitendriyatvaṃ kṣamādayāśāntijanapriyatvam 
MSS nirlobhadātā bhayaśokahārī jñānasya cihnaṃ bhayalakṣaṇāni 
MSS akrodhasya yadā krodhaḥ sarvanāśāya kalpate 
MSS rāghavasya prakopena baddho nadanadīpatiḥ 
MSS akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṃ sādhunā jayet 
MSS jayet kadaryaṃ dānena jayet satyena cānṛtam 
MSS aklāntadyutibhirvasantakusumairuttaṃsayan kuntalān antaḥ khelati khañjarīṭanayane kuñjeṣu kañjekṣaṇaḥ 
MSS asmanmandirakarmatastava karau nādyāpi viśrāmyataḥ kiṃ brūmo rasikāgraṇīrasi ghaṭī neyaṃ vilambakṣamā 
MSS akliṣṭabālatarupallavalobhanīyaṃ pītaṃ mayā sadayameva ratotsaveṣu 
MSS bimbādharaṃ daśasi ced bhramara priyāyās tvāṃ kārayāmi kamalodarabandhanastham 
MSS akleśādiva cintitam upatiṣṭhati siddhameva puṇyavatām 
MSS uḍḍīyāpuṇyavatāṃ gacchanti kapotakāḥ paśya 
MSS akṣatrārikṛtābhimanyunidhanaprodbhūtatīvrabhruvaḥ pārthasyākṛta śātravapratikṛterantaḥ śucā muhyataḥ 
MSS kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayo hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti vaktrādbahiḥ 
MSS akṣadevanapaṇīkṛtedhare kāntayorjayaparājaye sati 
MSS atra vaktu yadi vetti manmathaḥ kastayorjayati jīyate'pi vā 
MSS akṣadyūtajitādharagrahavidhāvīśo'si tatkhaṇḍanā dādhikye vada ko bhavāniti mṛṣā kopāñcitabhrū latam 
MSS svidyatkhinnakarā 
grakuḍma
laparāyattīkṛtāsyasya me mugdhākṣīpratikṛtya tat kṛtavatī dyūte'pi yannārjitam 
MSS akṣamaḥ kṣamatāmāno kriyāyāṃ yaḥ pravartate 
MSS sa hi hāsyāspadatvaṃ ca labhate prāṇasaṃśayam 
MSS akṣamālāpavṛttijñā kuśāsanaparigrahā 
MSS brāhmīva daurjanī saṃsad vandanīyā samekhalā 
MSS akṣamā hrīparityāgaḥ śrīnāśo dharmasaṃkṣayaḥ 
MSS abhidhyāprājñatā caiva sarvaṃ lobhāt pravartate 
MSS akṣamo'satyasaṃdhaśca paradārī nṛśaṃsakṛt 
MSS pacyate narakeṣveva dahyamānaḥ svakarmaṇā 
MSS akṣaradvayamabhyastaṃ nāsti nāstīti yat purā 
MSS tadidaṃ dehi dehīti viparītamupasthitam 
MSS akṣaramaitrībhājaḥ sālaṃkārasya cāruvṛttasya 
MSS kiṃ brūmo sakhi yūno na hi na hi sakhi padyabandhasya 
MSS akṣarāṇāmakāro'ham iti viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ bruvan 
MSS bhavatā so'pi yat satyam ākāreṇa laghūkṛtaḥ 
MSS akṣarāṇi parīkṣyantām ambarāḍambareṇa kim 
MSS śaṃbhurambarahīno'pi sarvajñaḥ kiṃ na jāyate 
MSS akṣarāṇi vicitrāṇi yena jānanti mānavāḥ 
MSS balīvardasamāste tu khuraśṛṅgavivarjitāḥ 
MSS akṣarāṇi samānāni vartulāni ghanāni ca 
MSS parasparavilagnāni taruṇīkucakumbhavat 
MSS akṣipakṣma kadā luptaṃ chidyante hi śiroruhāḥ 
MSS vardhamānātmanāmeva bhavanti hi vipattayaḥ 
MSS akṣibhyāṃ kṛṣṇaśārābhyām asyāḥ karṇau na bādhitau 
MSS śaṅke kanakatāḍaṅkapāśatrāsavaśādiva 
MSS akṣīṇakarmabandhastu jñātvā mṛtyumupasthitam 
MSS uktvāntikāle saṃsmṛtya punaryogitvamṛcchati 
MSS akṣīṇabhogādviṣamād iṣṭāniṣṭabhayojjhitāt 
MSS durjanādvata devā apy aśaktā iva bibhyati 
MSS akṣetre bījamutsṛṣṭam antareva vinaśyati 
MSS abījakamapi kṣetraṃ kevalaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ bhavet 
MSS akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca strīṣu pāne vṛthāṭane 
MSS nidrāyāṃ ca nibandhena kṣipraṃ naśyati bhūpatiḥ 
MSS akṣeṣviyaṃ vyasanitā hṛdaye yadete rāgo ghano madhumadotkaṭamānanaṃ ca 
MSS padmastathāpi paramāspadameva lakṣmyās taddainyameva kila durbhagatā yadebhiḥ 
MSS akṣoṭhaśuṇṭhimaricārdrakadāḍimatvak kustumburūlavaṇatailasusaṃskṛtān yaḥ 
MSS matsyān suśītasitabhaktatale dadhāti sa brahmalokamadhigacchati puṇyakarmā 
MSS akṣaure'pi ca nakṣatre kurvīta budhasomayoḥ 
MSS yukte'pi tithinakṣatre na kuryācchanibhaumayoḥ 
MSS akṣauhiṇī ripuṃ hanyāt svayaṃ vā tena hanyate 
MSS brāhmaṇo mantraviddhanyāt sarvāneva ripūn kṣaṇāt 
MSS akṣṇornikṣipadañjanaṃ śravaṇayostāpiñchagucchāvalīṃ mūrdhni śyāmasarojadāma kucayoḥ kastūrikāpatrakam 
MSS dhūrtānāmabhisārasaṃbhramajuṣāṃ viṣvaṅnikuñje sakhi dhvāntaṃ nīlanicolacāru sudṛśāṃ pratyaṅgamāliṅgati 
MSS akṣṇormañjulamañjanaṃ caraṇayornīlāśmajau nūpurā vaṅge nīlapaṭaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛgamadanyāsaḥ kapolasthale 
MSS yatprītyā pariśīlitaṃ paradṛśāṃ rodhāya tatsāṃprataṃ nepathyasya vidhāvapīdamasatījātasya jātaṃ tamaḥ 
MSS akṣṇoryugmaṃ vilokānmṛdutanuguṇatastarpayantī śarīraṃ divyāmodena vaktrādapagatamarutā nāsikāṃ cāruvācā 
MSS śrotradvaṃdvaṃ manojñādrasanamapi rasādarpayantī mukhābjaṃ yadvatpañcākṣasaukhyaṃ vitarati yuvatiḥ kāmināṃ nānyadevaṃ 
MSS akṣṇorvipakṣa iti sānuśayaṃ lulāva nīlotpalaṃ yadabalā kalamasya goptrī 
MSS bhūyastadeva śirasāvahadunnatānāṃ vairaṃ virodhiṣu dṛḍhaṃ na parājiteṣu 
MSS akhaṇḍamaṇḍalaḥ śrīmān paśyaiṣa pṛthivīpatiḥ 
MSS na niśākaravajjātu kalāvaikalyamāgataḥ 
MSS akhaṇḍitaṃ ca kramukaṃ cūrṇam tu rasavarjitam 
MSS bhūmau nipatitaṃ patraṃ śakrasyāpi śriayaṃ haret 
MSS akhaṇḍitā śaktirathopamānaṃ na svīkṛtaṃ na cchalarītirasti 
MSS aspṛṣṭasaṃdehaviparyayasya ko'yaṃ tava nyāyanaye niveśaḥ 
MSS akharvaparvagarteṣu vicchinno yasya vāridhiḥ 
MSS sa eva hi muneḥ pāṇir adhastādvindhyabhūbhṛtaḥ 
MSS akhilaṃ viduṣāmanāvilaṃ suhṛdā ca svahṛdā ca paśyatām 
MSS savidhe'pi nasūkṣmasākṣiṇī vadanālaṃkṛtimātramakṣiṇī 
MSS akhileṣu vihaṃgeṣu hanta svacchandacāriṣu 
MSS śuka pañjarabandhaste madhurāṇāṃ girāṃ phalam 
MSS agajānanapadmārkaṃ gajānanamaharniśam 
MSS anekadaṃ taṃ bhaktānām ekadantamupāsmahe 
MSS agaṇitaguṇena sundara kṛtvā cāritramapyudāsīnam 
MSS bhavatānanyagatiḥ sā vihitāvartena taraṇiriva 
MSS agaṇitagururyācñālolaṃ padāntasadātithiḥ samayamavidan mugdhaḥ kālāsaho ratilampaṭaḥ 
MSS kṛtakakupitaṃ hastāghātaṃ trapāruditaṃ haṭhā daparigaṇayan lajjāyāṃ māṃ nimajjayati priyaḥ 
MSS agaṇitanijaśramāṇāṃ parakṛtye'bhyetya vartamānānām 
MSS sujanaghanadinamaṇīnāṃ paropakārārthamajani janiḥ 
MSS agaṇitayaśasā tyakta sthitinā kriyate'tha yākṛtajñena 
MSS snigdhe suhṛdi sarāge mitre tava vañcanā na yuktā sā 
MSS agatitvamatiśraddhā jñānābhāsena tṛptatā 
MSS trayaḥ śiṣyaguṇā hyete mūrkhācāryasya bhāgyajāḥ 
MSS agatīnāṃ khalīkārād duḥkhaṃ naivopajāyate 
MSS bhavantyaśokāḥ prāyeṇa sāṃkurāḥ pādatāḍitāḥ 
MSS agadaiḥ sarvasāmānyair vyantarāṇāṃ viṣaṃ haret 
MSS dhūpo devīsahāpicchakhaṇḍanaistadviṣāpahaḥ 
MSS agamyagamanāt prāyaḥ prāyaścittīyate janaḥ 
MSS agamyaṃ tvadyaśo yāti sarvatraiva ca pāvanam 
MSS agamyāni pumān yāti yo'sevyāṃśca niṣevate 
MSS sa mṛtyumupagṛhṇāti garbhamaśvatarī yathā 
MSS agamyārthaṃ tṛṇaprāṇāḥ pṛṣṭhasthīkṛtabhīhriyaḥ 
MSS śambhalībhuktasarvasvā janā yatpāripārśvikāḥ 
MSS agamyo mantrāṇāṃ prakṛtibhiṣajāmapyaviṣayaḥ sudhāsārāsādhyo visadṛśatarārambhagahanaḥ 
MSS jagadbhrāmīkartuṃ pariṇatadhiyānena vidhinā sphuṭaṃ sṛṣṭo vyādhiḥ prakṛtiviṣamo durjanajanaḥ 
MSS agastitulyāśca ghṛtābdhiśoṣaṇe dambholitulyā vaṭakādribhedane 
MSS śākāvalīkānanavahnirūpās ta eva bhaṭṭā itare bhaṭāśca 
MSS agastihastaculukamite'bdhau vāhanākṛtau 
MSS magnaḥ samudro velāyām iti devāstadā jaguḥ 
MSS agastya iva yasyāsir nyañcitakṣitibhṛdbabhau 
MSS citraṃ so'pyakaronnṛtyat kabandhaṃ samarārṇavam 
MSS agastyasya muneḥ śāpād brahmasyandanamāsthitaḥ 
MSS mahāsukhāt paribhraṣṭo nahuṣaḥ sarpatāṃ gataḥ 
MSS agastyena payorāśeḥ kiyat kiṃ pītamujjhitam 
MSS tvayā vairikulaṃ vīra samare kīdṛśaṃ kṛtam 
MSS agā gāṅgāṅgakākākagāhakāghakakākahā 
MSS ahāhāṅka khagāṅkāgakaṅkāgakhagakākaka 
MSS agādhajalasaṃcārī vikārī na ca rohitaḥ 
MSS gaṇḍūṣajalamātre tu śapharī pharpharāyate 
MSS agādhahṛdayā bhūpāḥ kūpā iva durāsadāḥ 
MSS ghaṭakā guṇino no cet kathaṃ labhyeta jīvanam 
MSS agādhenāpi kiṃ tena toyena lavaṇāmbudheḥ 
MSS janumātraṃ varaṃ vāri tṛṣṇācchedakaraṃ nṛṇām 
MSS agāre'smin kānte giriśamaniśānāthaśakalaṃ bhujaṃgānuttuṅgān sakalamapi vātāyanapathe 
MSS nikuñjeṣu śyenānadhigṛhaśiro rāhuvalayaṃ likhantyā nīyante śiva śiva tayā hanta divasāḥ 
MSS aguṇakaṇo guṇarāśir dvayamapi daivena khalamukhe patitam 
MSS prasarati tailamivaikaḥ salile ghṛtavajjaḍatvametyanyaḥ 
MSS agururiti vadatu loko gauravamatraiva punarahaṃ manye 
MSS darśitaguṇaikavṛttir yasya jane janitadāhe'pi 
MSS agurusurabhidhūpāśobhitaṃ keśapāśaṃ galitakusumamālaṃ dhunvatī kuñcitāgram 
MSS tyajati gurunitambā nimnanābhiḥ sumadhyāpy uṣasi śayanavāsaḥ kāminī kāmaśobhā 
MSS agurorapi sata uccaiḥ praśaṃsanaṃ tadguṇā vitanvanti 
MSS agururjvalane'pyastaḥ saurabhamiṣato guṇān vamati 
MSS agūḍhavibhavā yasya paurā rāṣṭravāsinaḥ 
MSS nayāpanayavettāyaḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥ 
MSS agūḍhahāsasphuṭadantakesaraṃ mukhaṃ svidetadvikasannu paṅkajam 
MSS iti pralīnāṃ nalinīvane sakhīṃ vidāmbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ 
MSS agniṃ prāpya yathā sadyas tūlarāśirvinaśyati 
MSS tathā gaṅgājalenaiva sarvapāpaṃ vinaśyati 
MSS agniṃ stokamivātmānaṃ saṃdhukṣayati yo naraḥ 
MSS sa vardhamāno grasate mahāntamapi saṃcayam 
MSS agniḥ stoko vardhate cājyasikto bījaṃ caikaṃ bahusāhasrameti 
MSS kṣayodayau vipulau saṃniyamya tasmādalpaṃ nāvamanyeta vittam 
MSS agnikuṇḍasamā nārī ghṛtakumbhasamo naraḥ 
MSS saṃgamena parastrīṇāṃ kasya no calate manaḥ 
MSS agnikumbhasamā nārī ghṛtakumbhasamo naraḥ 
MSS ubhayorapi saṃyogaḥ kasya viśvāsakārakaḥ 
MSS agnidāhe na me duḥkhaṃ chede na nikaṣe na vā 
MSS yattadeva mahadduḥkhaṃ guñjayā saha tolanam 
MSS agnido garadaścaiva śastrapāṇirdhanāpahaḥ 
MSS kṣetradārāpahārī ca ṣaḍete hyātatāyinaḥ 
MSS agninā bhasmanā caiva stambhena ca janena ca 
MSS advāreṇaiva mārgeṇa paṅktitadoṣo na vidyate 
MSS agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca 
MSS nityaṃ yatnena sevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ 
MSS agnirgururdvijātīnāṃ varṇānāṃ pārthivo guruḥ 
MSS kulastrīṇāṃ gururbhartā sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ 
MSS agnirdahati tāpena sūryo dahati raśmibhiḥ 
MSS rājā dahati daṇḍena tapasā brāhmaṇo dahet 
MSS agnirdevo dvijātīnāṃ munīnāṃ hṛdi daivatam 
MSS pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ sarvatra samadarśinaḥ 
MSS agnirhi devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvaṇaṃ ca tadātmakam 
MSS tasmāt suvarṇaṃ dadatā dattāḥ sarvāḥ sma devatāḥ 
MSS agniṣṭomādibhiryajñair vividhairāptadakṣiṇaiḥ 
MSS na tat phalamavāpnoti tīrthārthe gamanena yat 
MSS agniśtejo mahalloke gūḍhastiṣṭhati dāruṣu 
MSS na copayuṅkte taddāru yāvanno dīpyate paraiḥ 
MSS sa eva khalu dārubhyo yadā nirmathya dīpyate 
MSS tadā tacca vanaṃ cānyan nirdahatyāśu tejasā 
MSS evameva kule jātāḥ pāvakopamatejasaḥ 
MSS kṣamāvanto nirākārāḥ kāṣṭhe'gniriva śerate 
MSS agnihotraṃ gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ garbhirṇīṃ vṛddhabālakau 
MSS riktahastena nopeyād rājānaṃ devatāṃ gurum 
MSS agnihotraṃ trayo vedās tridaṇḍaṃ bhasmaguṇṭhanam 
MSS buddhipauruṣahīnānāṃ jīviketi bṛhaspatiḥ 
MSS agnihotraphalā vedāḥ śīlavṛttaphalaṃ śrutam 
MSS ratiputraphalā dārā dattabhuktaphalaṃ dhanam 
MSS agnihotramadhītaṃ vā dānādyāścākhilāḥ kriyāḥ 
MSS bhajante tasya vaiphalyaṃ yasya vākyamakāraṇam 
MSS agnihotreṣu viprāṇāṃ hṛdi devo manīṣiṇām 
MSS pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ sarvatra viditātmanām 
MSS agneryathā dāruviyogayogayor adṛṣṭato'nyatra nimittamasti 
MSS evaṃ hi jantorapi durvibhāvyaḥ śarīrasaṃyogaviyogahetuḥ 
MSS agnau kriyāvatāṃ devo divi devo manīṣiṇām 
MSS pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ yogināṃ hṛdaye hariḥ 
MSS agnau dagdhaṃ jale magnaṃ hṛtaṃ taskarapārthivaiḥ 
MSS tatsarvaṃ dānamityāhur yadi klaibyaṃ na bhāṣate 
MSS agnau prāptaṃ pradhūyeta yathā tūlaṃ dvijottama 
MSS tathā gaṅgāvagāḍhasya sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pradhūyate 
MSS agnau prāstaṃ tu puruṣaṃ karmānveti svayaṃkṛtam 
MSS tasmāttu puruṣo yatnād dharmaṃ saṃcinuyācchanaiḥ 
MSS agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityamupatiṣṭhate 
MSS ādityājjāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣrerannaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ 
MSS agnyākāraṃ kalayasi puraścakravākīva candraṃ baddhotkampaṃ śiśiramarutā dahyate padminīva 
MSS prāṇān dhatse kathamapi balādgacchataḥ śalyatulyāṃs tat kenāsau sutanu janito māmmathaste vikāraḥ 
MSS agnyādhānena yajñena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ 
MSS lokān viśvāsayitvaiva tato lumpedyathā vṛkaḥ 
MSS agracchāyā tṛṇāgniśca nīcasevā paṭe jalam 
MSS veśyārāgaḥ khalaprema sarvaṃ budbudasannibham 
MSS agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato madhye pārśvato'tha samantataḥ 
MSS vidyuccakitavadbhāti sūryakoṭisamaprabhaḥ 
MSS agrataścaturo vedān pṛṣṭhataḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ 
MSS ubhābhyāṃ ca samartho'haṃ śāpādapi śarādapi 
MSS agrato vāmapādaṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ jātu kuñcitam 
MSS ālīḍhaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ hastadvayasavistaram 
MSS agrasānuṣu nitāntapiśaṅgair bhūruhānmṛdukarairavalambya 
MSS astaśailagahanaṃ nu vivasvān āviveśa jaladhiṃ nu mahīṃ nu 
MSS agrāhyaṃ śravaṇasya bhūṣaṇamalaṃkāro na bhāvocitaḥ kaṇṭhasyāñjanamujjvalaṃ nayanayoḥ sūkṣmatvamāvekṣitum 
MSS vaktrasya kṣaṇiko'dhivāsanavidhiḥ kānte priye nābhavas saubhāgyapratikarmanirmitamahāvidyaiva yenātmanaḥ 
MSS agrāhyā mūrdhajeṣvetāḥ striyo guṇasamanvitāḥ 
MSS na latāḥ pallavacchedam arhantyupavanodbhavāḥ 
MSS agre kasyacidasti kaṃcidabhitaḥ kenāpi pṛṣṭe kṛtaḥ saṃsāraḥ śiśubhāvayauvanajarābhārāvatārādayam 
MSS bālastaṃ bahu manyatāmasulabhaṃ prāptaṃ yuvā sevatāṃ vṛddhastadviṣyādbahiṣkṛta iva vyāvṛtya kiṃ paśyati 
MSS agre kugrāmavargaḥ piśitarasalasaccaṇḍacaṇḍāyamānaḥ paścādvyādho vadhārtho niśitaśarakaraḥ pādamudrānapāyī 
MSS viṣvagdīpto vanāgnirvanamatigahanaṃ dhūmavātyā ca dṛṣṭeḥ saroddhī kāndiśīko hari hari hariṇaḥkaṃ śaraṇyaṃ prayātu 
MSS agre gacchata dhenudugdhakalaśānādāya gopyo gṛhaṃ dugdhe vaskayaṇīkule punariyaṃ rādhā śanairyāsyati 
MSS ityanyavyapadeśaguptahṛdayaḥ kurvan viviktaṃ vrajaṃ devaḥ kāraṇanandasūnuraśivaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa muṣṇātu vaḥ

MSS aṅguṣṭhatarjanībhyāṃ gā ghrāṇe saṃgṛhya nāmayet 
MSS mantreṇānena vaśyāḥ syuḥ paśavo'śvādayastathā 
MSS aṅguṣṭhanakhadambhena pādayoḥ patitaḥ kimu 
MSS vibhāti vaktravijitaḥ śaśī vigatakalmaṣaḥ 
MSS aṅguṣṭhanakhamūle tu tarjanyagraṃ susaṃsthitaṃ 
MSS matsarī sā ca vijñeyā citralakṣyasya vedhane 
MSS aṅguṣṭhākramavakritāṅguliradhaḥ pādārdhanīruddhabhūḥ pārśvādvegakṛto nihatya kaphaṇidvandvena daṃśānmuhuḥ 
MSS nyagjānudvayayantrayantritaghaṭīvaktrāntarālaskhalad dhārādhvānamanoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi gopālakaḥ 
MSS aṅguṣṭhāgre tu tarjanyā mukhaṃ yatra niveśitaṃ 
MSS kākatuṇḍī ca vijñeyā sūkṣmalakṣyeṣu yojitā 
MSS aṅguṣṭhe padagulphajānujaghane nābhau ca vakṣaḥstane kakṣākaṇṭhakapoladantavasane netrālike mūrdhani

MSS aṅguṣṭhodaramātraṃ viśeṣavitprāpya padmarāgamaṇim 
MSS sukhasaṃvāhyamanuttaraṃ arthaṃ kiṃ tena nāpnoti 
MSS aṅgena kenāpi vijetumasyā gaveṣyate kiṃ calapatrapatraṃ 
MSS na cedviśeṣāditaracchadebhyas tasyāstu kampastu kuto bhayena 
MSS aṅgena gātraṃ nayanena vaktraṃ nyāyena rājyaṃ lavaṇena bhojyaṃ 
MSS dharmeṇa hīnaṃ khalu jīvitaṃ ca na rājate candramasā vinā niśā

MSS aṃse vīṇā kucaparisare candanaṃ vāci maunaṃ tasyāḥ sarvaṃ sthitamiti na tu tvāṃ vinā kvāpi cetaḥ 
MSS aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsrepyāsradrutamaviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena 
MSS aṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpaiste viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ 
MSS aṅgenāṅgamanupraviśya milato hastāvalepādibhiḥ kā vārtā yudhi gandhasindhurapatergandho'pi cetke dvipāḥ 
MSS jetavyo'sti hareḥ sa lāñchanamato vandāmahe tāmabhūd yadgabha śarabhaḥ svayaṃjaya iti śrutvāpi yo nāṅkitaḥ 
MSS aṅgeṣu caturaśratvaṃ samapādau latākarau 
MSS prārambhe sarvanṛtyānām etatsāmānyamucyate 
MSS aṅgeṣu mukhyā dvijamadhyasaṃsthā vāṇānusaṃdhāna parāsi nityaṃ 
MSS adhaṃ sthirapremarasā rasajñe narastutiṃ saṃtyaja karṇavat tvaṃ 
MSS aṅgeṣvābharaṇaṃ karoti bahuśaḥ patre'pi saṃcāriṇi prāptaṃ tvāṃ pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyati

MSS atadiva tadapi śarīraṃ saṃprati vāmabhruvo jayati 
MSS acalā kamalā kasya kasya mitraṃ mahīpatiḥ 
MSS śarīraṃ ca sthiraṃ kasya kasya vaśyā varāṅganā 
MSS acalā kamalā hi kasya kasya kṣitipālaḥ kila mitramasti loke 
MSS iha vaśyatamā ca kasya veśyā sthiramapyasti ca kasya dehamatra

MSS ajñātāgamamīlitākṣiyugalaṃ kiṃ tvaṃ mudhā tiṣṭhasi jñātosi prakaṭaprakampapulakairaṅgai sphuṭaṃ mugdhayā 
MSS muñcaināṃ jaḍa kiṃ na paśyasi galadbāṣpāmbudhau tānanāṃ sakhyaivaṃ gadite vimucya rabhasāt kaṇṭhevalagno yuvā

MSS ajñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syād viyogo yadi kāraṇam 
MSS śoko dineṣu gacchatsu vardhatāmapayāti kim 
MSS ajñānaṃ khalu kaṣṭaṃ krodhādibhyo'pi sarvapāpebhyaḥ 
MSS arthaṃ hitamahitaṃ vā na vetti yenāvṛto lokaḥ 
MSS ajñānaṃ yatphalaṃ tasya raso'dharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

MSS kaḥ samarthaḥ prabīddhuṃ taṃ jñānabherīśatairapi 
MSS ajñānavalito bālye madamūḍhaśca yauvane 
MSS vārddhake vihvalāṅgaśca kadā kuśalabhāgjanaḥ

MSS ajñānājjñānato vāpi yadduruktamudāhṛtam 
MSS tat kṣantavyaṃ yuvābhyāṃ me kṛtvā prītiparaṃ manaḥ 
MSS ajñānādyadi vā jñānāt kṛtvā karma vigarhitam 
MSS tasmād vimuktimanvicchan dvitīyaṃ na samācaret

MSS atiśaṭhamatha maitrī 
vaśyatā sarvajanto ripubhayatanurogau cāṣṭaduḥkhaṃ narāṇām 
MSS aticārucandrarociḥ kurvan kusumeṣukeliketanatām 
MSS surabhiḥ kadānuyāsyati samukularucirastanīhāraḥ 
MSS aticirādanuṣaṅgavataḥ kaṇā navanijān yadi hema jihāsasi 
MSS paṭupuṭajvalanajvaravedanā tava bhavatyapayāti ca gauravam 
MSS atijīrṇamapakvaṃ ca jñātidhṛṣṭaṃ tathaiva ca 
MSS dagdhaṃ chidraṃ na kartavyaṃ bāhyābhyantarahastakam 
MSS atijīvati vittena sukhaṃ jīvati vidyayā 
MSS kiṃcijjīvati śilpena ṛte karma na jīvati 
MSS atitāmaso'jagandhiḥ kākaravo hrasvakūrcakaḥ pāpaḥ 
MSS bhīruḥ kudhīḥ piśāco rāsabhaliṅgastu vijñeyaḥ 
MSS atitṛṣṇā na kartavyā tṛṣṇāṃ naiva parityajet 
MSS atitṛṣṇābhibhūtasya śikhā bhavati mastake 
MSS atitejasvyapi rājā pānāsakto na sādhayatyarthān 
MSS tṛṇamapi dagdhuṃ śakto na vāḍavāgniḥ pibannaniśam 
MSS atithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putraṃ prāpa kumudvatī 
MSS paścimādyāminīyāmāt prasādamiva cetanā 
MSS atithiḥ kila pūjārhaḥ prākṛto'pi vijānatā 
MSS atithiḥ dvāri tiṣṭheta āpo gṛhṇāti yo naraḥ 
MSS āpośanaṃ surāpānam annaṃ gomāṃsabhakṣaṇam 
MSS atithiḥ pūjito yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchati 
MSS nānyastasmāt paro dharma iti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ 
MSS atithiḥ pūjito yasya dhyāyate manasā śabham 
MSS na tat kratuśatenāpi tulyamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ 
MSS atithitvena varṇānāṃ deyaṃ śakyānupūrvaśaḥ 
MSS apraṇodyo'tithiḥ sāyam api vāgbhūtṛṇodakaiḥ 
MSS atithirbālakaḥ patnī jananī janakastathā 
MSS pañcaite gṛhiṇaḥ poṣyā itare ca svaśaktitaḥ 
MSS atithirbālakaścaiva rājā bhāryā tathaiva ca 
MSS asti nāsti na jānanti dehi dehi punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS atithirbālakaścaīva strījano nṛpatistathā 
MSS ete vittaṃ na jānanti jāmātā caiva pañcamaḥ 
MSS atithiryasya bhagnāśo gṛhātpratinivartate 
MSS sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati 
MSS atithiścāpavādī ca dvāvetau mama bāndhavau 
MSS apavādī haret pāpam atithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ 
MSS atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca 
MSS sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ sadbhir gṛhasthasya praśasyate 
MSS atithīnāṃ na satkāro na ca sajjanasaṃgamaḥ 
MSS na yatra svātmavarṇāsthā sā gṛhāśramavañcanā 
MSS atidarpe hatā laṅkā atimāne ca kauravāḥ 
MSS atidāne balirbaddhaḥ sarvamatyantagarhitam 
MSS atidākṣiṇyayuktānāṃ śaṅkitānāṃ pade pade 
MSS parāpavādibhīrūṇāṃ na bhavanti vibhūtayaḥ 
MSS atidānāddhataḥ karṇastv atilobhāt suyodhanaḥ 
MSS atikāmāddaśagrīvastv ati sarvatra varjayet 
MSS atidānādbalirbaddho naṣṭo mānāt suyodhanaḥ 
MSS vinaṣṭo rāvaṇo lau lyād ati sarvatra varjayet 
MSS atidānādbalirbaddho hyatimānāt suyodhanaḥ 
MSS atikāmāddaśagrīvo hyati sarvatra garhitaḥ 
MSS atidāne balirbaddho atimāne ca kauravāḥ 
MSS atirūpe hṛtā sītā sarvamatyantagarhitam 
MSS atidīrghajīvidoṣād vyāsena yaśo'pahāritaṃ hanta 
MSS kairnocyeta guṇāḍhyaḥ sa eva janmāntarāpannaḥ 
MSS atidūrapathaśrāntāś chāyāṃ yānti ca śītalām 
MSS śitalāśca punaryānti kā kasya paridevanā 
MSS ati dharmād balaṃ manye balād dharmaḥ pravartate 
MSS bale pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharṇyāmiva jaṅgamam 
MSS atinīcāni vākyāni dṛṣṭimātrātinindakaḥ 
MSS kṣudrasaṃvādabhāṣī yo hyevaṃ duṣṭaḥ śaṭho janaḥ 
MSS atipakvakapitthena liptapātre suyāmitam 
MSS dugdhamastuvihīnaṃ syāc candrabimbopamaṃ dadhi 
MSS atipaṭalairanuyātāṃ sahṛdayahṛdayajvaraṃ vilumpantīm 
MSS mṛgamadaparimalalaharīṃ samīra pāmarapure kirasi 
MSS atiparamādbhutaveṣā kāpyeṣā jayati sṛṣṭirātmabhuvaḥ 
MSS tat kiṃ na vāñchitaṃ syād asyā yadi vidhuravīkṣaṇaḥ pātā 
MSS atiparigṛhītamaunā varjitamālyānulepanasnānā 
MSS dūrotsāritalajjā nirgranthagrantharacaneva 
MSS atiparicayādavajñā bhavati viśiṣṭe'pi vastuni prāyaḥ 
MSS lokaḥ prayāgavāsī kūpe snānaṃ samācarati 
MSS atiparicayādavajñā saṃtatagamanādanādaro bhavati 
MSS malaye bhillapurandhrī candanatarumindhanaṃ kurute 
MSS atiparicayādavajñety etad vākyaṃ mṛṣaiva tadbhāti 
MSS atiparicite'pyanādau saṃsāre'smin na jāyate'vajñā 
MSS atipātitakālasādhanā svaśarīrendriyavargatāpanī 
MSS janavanna bhavantamakṣamā nayasiddherapanetumarhati 
MSS atipītāṃ tamorājīṃ tanīyān soḍhumakṣamaḥ 
MSS vamatīva śanaireṣa pradīpaḥ kajjalacchalāt 
MSS atipūjitatāreyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ śrutilaṅghanakṣamā sutanu 
MSS jinasiddhāntasthitiriva savāsanā kaṃ na mohayati 
MSS atipelavamatiparimita varṇaṃ laghutaramudāharati śaṭhaḥ 
MSS paramārthataḥ sa hṛdayaṃ vahati punaḥ kālakūṭaghaṭitamiva 
MSS atipracaṇḍāṃ bahupākapākinīṃ vivādaśīlāṃ svayameva taskarīm 
MSS akrośabījāṃ paraveśmagāminīṃ tyajeta bhāryāṃ daśaputrasūrapi 
MSS atipracaṇḍā bahuduḥkhabhāginī vivādaśīlā paragehagāminī 
MSS bhartuḥ svayaṃ nindati yā ca taskarī tyajet svabhāryāṃ daśaputraputriṇīm 
MSS atiprauḍhā rātrirbahalaśikhadīpaḥ prabhavati priyaḥ premārabdhasmaravidhirasajñaḥ paramasau 
MSS sakhi svairaṃ svairaṃ suratamakarodvrīḍitavapur yataḥ paryaṅko'yaṃ ripuriva kaḍatkāramukharaḥ 
MSS atibalināmapi malinā śayena balikarṇaputrāṇām 
MSS viśvāsopanatānāṃ vāsoputreṇa jīvitaṃ jahre 
MSS atibahutaralajjāśṛṅkhalābaddhapādo madananṛpativāho yauvanonmattahastī 
MSS prakaṭitakucakumbho lomarājīkareṇa pibati sarasi nābhīmaṇḍalākhye payāṃsi 
MSS atibhīrumatiklībaṃ dīrghasūtraṃ pramādinam 
MSS vyasanād viṣayākrāntaṃ na bhajanti nṛpaṃ prajāḥ 
MSS atimandacandanamahīdharavātaṃ stabakābhirāmalatikātarujātam 
MSS api tāpasānupavanaṃ madanārtān madamañjuguñjadalipuñjamakārṣīt 
MSS atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānāmatīva nipuṇā dhīḥ 
MSS timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ 
MSS atimātrabhāsuratvaṃ puṣyati bhānuḥ parigrahādahnaḥ 
MSS adhigacchati mahimānaṃ candro'pi niśāparigṛhītaḥ 
MSS atimānaḥ śriyaṃ hanti puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ 
MSS garbheṇa duṣyate kanyā gṛhavāsena ca dvijaḥ 
MSS atimāninamagrāhyam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ naram 
MSS krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano'pi narādhipam 
MSS atimṛdu navanītāccandrakāccātiramyaṃ bahulalitasudhāyāḥ svādataḥ sadrasāḍhyam 
MSS sakalalalitabhogāgārabhāgyaikayogyaṃ parilasati haviṣyaṃ kasya gallacchalena 
MSS atiyatnagṛhīto'pi khalaḥ khalakhalāyate 
MSS śirasā dhāryamāṇo'pi toyasyārdhaghaṭo yathā 
MSS atiramaṇīye kāvye piśuno'nveṣayati dūśaṇānyeva 
MSS atiramaṇīye vapuṣi vraṇameva hi makṣikānikaraḥ 
MSS atirāgād daśagrīvo hyatilobhāt suyodhanaḥ 
MSS atidānād dhataḥ karṇo hyatiḥ sarvatra garhitaḥ 
MSS atiricyate sujanmā kaścijjanakānnijena caritena 
MSS kumbhaḥ parimitamambhaḥ pibati papau kumbhasaṃbhavo'mbhodhim 
MSS atiruciraṅgajakṛttyā kṣobhitadakṣaṃ bhavantameva bhaje 
MSS yasmin prasādasumukhe sadyo vāmāpi bhavati mama tuṣṭyai 
MSS atirupavatī sītā atigarvī ca rāvaṇaḥ 
MSS atīva balavān rāmo laṅkāyena kṣayaṃ gatā 
MSS atirūpād dhṛtā sītā atigarveṇa rāvaṇaḥ 
MSS atidānād balirbaddho hyati sarvatra garhitam 
MSS atirūpeṇa vai sītā atigarveṇa rāvanaḥ 
MSS atidānaṃ balirdattvā ati sarvatra varjayet 
MSS atilobho na kartavyaḥ kartavyastu pramāṇataḥ 
MSS atilobhajadoṣeṇa jambuko nidhanaṃ gataḥ 
MSS atilobho na kartavyo lobhaṃ naiva parityajet 
MSS atilobhābhibhūtasya cakraṃ bhramati mastake 
MSS atilohitakaracaraṇaṃ mañjulagorocanātilakam 
MSS haṭhaparivartitaśakaṭaṃ muraripumuttānaśāyinaṃ vande 
MSS atilaulyaprasaktānāṃ vipattinairva dūrataḥ 
MSS jīvaṃ naśyati lobhena mīnasyāmiṣadarśane 
MSS ativādāṃstitikṣeta nābhimanyetkathaṃcana 
MSS krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet 
MSS ativādāṃstitikṣeta nāvamanyeta kaṃcana 
MSS na cemaṃ dehamāśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kenacit 
MSS ativādo'timānaśca tathātyāgo narādhipa 
MSS krodhaścātivivitsā ca mitradrohaśca tānī ṣaṭ 
MSS eta evāsayastīkṣṇāḥ kṛntantyāyūṃṣi dehinām 
MSS etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyurbhadramastu te 
MSS ativāhitamatigahanaṃ vināpavādena yauvanaṃ yena 
MSS doṣanidhāne janmani kiṃ na prāptaṃ phalaṃ tena 
MSS ativitatagaganasaraṇi prasaraṇaparimuktaviśramānandaḥ 
MSS marudullāsitasaurabha kamalākarahāsakṛdravirjayati 
MSS ativipulaṃ kucayugalaṃ rahasi karairāmṛśan muhurlakṣmyāḥ 
MSS tadapahṛtaṃ nijahṛdayaṃ jayati hararmṛgayamāṇa iva 
MSS ativiśadānantapada pravṛttadṛṣṭirna madhuravīkṣaṇataḥ 
MSS tṛpyatyañcitakāmaḥ prātastanakamalamukulavīkṣaṇataḥ 
MSS ativṛṣṭiranāvṛṣṭiḥ śalabhāḥ mūṣaKāḥ śukāḥ 
MSS asatkaraśca daṇḍaśca paracakrāṇi taskarāḥ 
MSS rājānīkapriyotsargo marakavyādhipīḍanam 
MSS paśūnāṃ maraṇaṃ rogo rāṣṭravyasanamucyate 
MSS ativyayo'napekṣā ca tathārjanamadharmataḥ 
MSS moṣaṇaṃ dūrasaṃsthānāṃ koṣavyasanamucyate 
MSS atiśayitakadambo'yaṃ modakadambānilo vahati 
MSS viyadambudameduritaṃ me duritaṃ paśya nāgato dayitaḥ 
MSS atiśaravyayatā madanena tāṃ nikhilapuṣpamayasvaśaravyayāt 
MSS sphuṭamakāri phalānyapi muñcatā tadurasi stanatālayugārpaṇam 
MSS atiśaucamaśaucaṃ vā atinindā atistutiḥ 
MSS atyācāramanācāraṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ mūrkhalakṣaṇam 
MSS atiślathālambipayodhareyaṃ śubhrībhavatkāśavikāsikeśā 
MSS atītalāvaṇyajalapravāhā prāvṛṭ jarāṃ prāpa śaracchalena 
MSS atisaṃcayalubdhānāṃ vittamanyasya kāraṇam 
MSS anyaiḥ saṃcīyate yatnād anyaiśca madhu pīyate 
MSS atisaṃpadamāpannair bhetavyaṃ patanādbhūyaḥ 
MSS atyuccaśikharā meroḥ śakravajreṇa pātitāḥ 
MSS atisajjanadurgatiḥ khalapaṅktisamunnatiḥ 
MSS yuvatistanavicyutiriti kiṃ vidhinirmitiḥ 
MSS atisatkṛtā api śaṭhāḥ sahabhuvamujjhanti jātu na prakṛtim 
MSS śirasā maheśvareṇā 'pi nanu dhṛto vakra eva śaśī 
MSS atisāhasamatiduṣkaram atyāścaryaṃ ca dānamarthānām 
MSS yo'pi dadāti śarīraṃ na dadāti sa vittaleśamapi 
MSS atisāhasikaṃ śūrā mantriṇastaṃ nirūpakam 
MSS vinītaṃ guravo jajñur dhūrtamantaḥpurāṅganāḥ 
MSS atiharitapatraparikara saṃpannaspandanaikaviṭapasya 
MSS ghanavāsanairmayūkhaiḥ kusumbhakusumāyate taraṇiḥ 
MSS atītalābhasya surakṣaṇārthaṃ bhaviṣyalābhasya ca saṃgamārtham 
MSS āpatprapannasya ca mokṣaṇārthaṃ yanmantryate'sau paramo hi mantraḥ 
MSS atītānāgatānarthān viprakṛṣṭatirohitān 
MSS vijānāti yadā yogī tadā saṃviditi smṛtā 
MSS atītānāgatā bhāvā ye ca vartanti sāṃpratam 
MSS tān kālanirmitān buddhvā na saṃjñāṃ hātumarhasi 
MSS atītā śītārtiḥ prasarati śanairuṣmakaṇikā dināni sphāyante ravirapi rathaṃ mantharayati 
MSS himānīnirmuktaḥ sphurati nitarāṃ śītakiraṇaḥ śarāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kusumadhanuṣo na vyavahitaḥ 
MSS atītya bandhūnavalaṅghya mitrāṇy ācāryamāgacchati śiṣyadoṣaḥ 
MSS bālaṃ hyapatyaṃ gurave pradātur naivāparādho'sti piturna mātuḥ 
MSS atīndriyāyāṃ paralokavṛttāv ihaiva tīvrāśubhapākaśaṃsī 
MSS dṛṣyeta nāśo yadi nāma nāśu na kaḥ kukṛtyena yateta bhūtyai 
MSS atīva karkaśāḥ stabdhā hiṃsrajantubhirāvṛtāḥ 
MSS durāsadāśca viṣamā īśvarāḥ parvatā iva 
MSS atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa 
MSS gatāsurapi yāṃ gātrair māṃ vihāya niṣevase 
MSS atīva balahīnaṃ hi laṅghanaṃ naiva kārayet 
MSS ye guṇā laṅghane proktās te guṇā laghubhojane 
MSS atīva saukhyaśubhadā yāmyā niśi bhavecchivā 
MSS pūrvasyāṃ tatpurādhyakṣam anyaṃ kuryādaharmukhe 
MSS atulitabaladhāmaṃ svarṇaśailābhadehaṃ danujavanakṛśānuṃ jñānināmagragaṇyam 
MSS sakalaguṇanidhānaṃ vānarāṇāmadhīśaṃ raghupativaradūtaṃ vātajātaṃ namāmi 
MSS atuṣṭaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu capalaṃ capalendriyam 
MSS nayanti nikṛtiprajñaṃ paradārāḥ parābhavam 
MSS atuṣṭidānaṃ kṛtapūrvanāśanam amānanaṃ duścaritānukīrtanam 
MSS kathāprasaṅgena ca nāmavismṛtir viraktabhāvasya janasya lakṣaṇam 
MSS atuhinarucināsau kevalaṃ nodayādriḥ kṣaṇamuparigatena kṣmābhṛtaḥ sarva eva 
MSS navakaranikareṇa spaṣṭabandhūkasūna stabakaracitamete śekharaṃ bibhratīva 
MSS atṛṇe patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyati 
MSS akṣamāvān paraṃ doṣair ātmānaṃ caiva yojayet 
MSS atṛṇe satṛṇā yasmin satṛṇe tṛṇavarjitā mahī yatra 
MSS tasmiñśirā pradiṣṭā vaktavyaṃ vā dhanaṃ tatra 
MSS atogarīyaḥ kiṃ nusyād aśarma narakeṣvapi 
MSS yat priyasya priyaṃ kartum adhamena na śakyate 
MSS ato nijabalonmānaṃ cāpaṃ syācchubhakārakam 
MSS devānāmuttamaṃ cāpaṃ tato nyūnaṃ ca mānavam 
MSS ato'rthaṃ paṭhyate śāstraṃ kīrtirlokeṣu jāyate 
MSS kīrtimān pūjyate loke paratreha ca mānavaḥ 
MSS ato hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyanna vidyate 
MSS yatra durjana ityāha durjanaḥ sajjanaṃ svayam 
MSS attuṃ vāñchati śāṃbhavo gaṇapaterākhuṃ kṣudhārttaḥ phaṇī taṃ ca krauñcaripoḥ śikhī girisutāsiṃho'pi nāgānanam 
MSS itthaṃ yatra parigrahasya ghaṭanā śaṃbhorapi syādgṛhe tatrānyasya kathaṃ na bhāvi jagatastasmāt svarūpaṃ hi tat 
MSS atyacchaṃ sitamaṃśukaṃ śuci madhu svāmodamacchaṃ rajaḥ kārpuraṃ vidhṛtārdracandanakucadvandvāḥ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ 
MSS dhārāveśma sapāṭalaṃ vicakilasragdāma candratviṣo dhātaḥ sṛṣṭiriyaṃ vṛthaiva tava na grīṣmo'bhaviṣyadyadi 
MSS atyadbhutamimaṃ manye svabhāvamamanasvinaḥ 
MSS yadupakriyamāṇo'pi prīyate na vilīyate 
MSS atyantaṃ kurutāṃ rasāyanavidhiṃ vākyaṃ priyaṃ jalpatu vārdheḥ pāramiyartu gacchatu nabho devādrimārohatu 
MSS pātālaṃ viśatu prasarpatu diśaṃ deśāntaraṃ bhrāmyatu na prāṇī tadapi prahartumanasā saṃtyajyate mṛtyunā 
MSS atyantakaṇḍūtiparo narāṇām virodhakārī śunakaḥ sadaiva 
MSS syādūrdhvapādaḥ śunakaḥ śayānaḥ siddhipradaḥ kāryavidhau viduṣṭe 
MSS atyantakṛṣṇaḥ sa vinirmalastvaṃ sa vāmanaḥ sarvata unnato'si 
MSS janārdano yat sa dayāparastvaṃ viṣṇuḥ kathaṃ vīra tavopamānam 
MSS atyantakopaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī daridratā ca svajaneṣu vairam 
MSS nīcaprasaṅgaḥ kulahīnasevā cihnāni dehe narakasthitānām 
MSS atyantacañcalasyeha pāradasya nibandhane 
MSS kāmaṃ vijñāyate yuktir na strīcittasya kācana 
MSS atyantanirgate caiva subaddhe naiva cāvile 
MSS praśaste vājināṃ netre madhvābhe kālatārake 
MSS atyantapariṇāhitvād atīva ślakṣṇatāvaśāt 
MSS na kāṃcidupamāṃ roḍhum ūrū śaknoti subhruvaḥ 
MSS atyantabhīmavanajīvagaṇena pūrṇaṃ durgaṃ vanaṃ bhavabhṛtāṃ manasāpyagamyam 
MSS caurākulaṃ viśati lobhavaśena martyo no dharmakarma vidadhāti kadācidajñaḥ 
MSS atyantamatimedhāvī trayāṇāmekamaśnute 
MSS alpāyuṣo daridro vā hyanapatyo na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS atyantamanthanakadarthanamutsahante maryādayā niyamitāḥ kimu sādhavo'pi 
MSS lakṣmīsudhākarasudhādyupanīya śeṣe ratnākaro'pi garalaṃ kimu nojjagāra 
MSS atyantamasadāryāṇām anālocitaceṣṭitam 
MSS atasteṣāṃ vivardhante satataṃ sarvasaṃpadaḥ 
MSS atyantavimukhe daive vyarthayatne ca pauruṣe 
MSS manasvino daridrasya vanādanyat kutaḥ sukham 
MSS atyantavyavadhānalabdhajanuṣo jātyāpi bhinnakramāḥ sāṃnidhyaṃ vidhinā kutūhalavatā kutrāpi saṃprāpitāḥ

atha kena prayukto'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ

MSS atha rājñā daraḥ kāryo na tu kasyāṃ cidāpadi 
MSS api cetasi dīrṇaḥ syān naiva varteta dīrṇavat 
MSS arthatupakvāt kalato'vaśoṣitād vikṛṣya bījaṃ payasā niṣicya 
MSS viśoṣitaṃ pañcadināni sarpiṣā viḍaṅgamiśreṇa ca dhūpayet tataḥ 
MSS atharvavidhitattvajñair brāhmaṇairvijitendriyaiḥ 
MSS mantratantravidhānajñair dūrādunmūlayed ripūn 
MSS atharvāmnāyatattvajñas tantrajñaḥ kratukarmaṭhaḥ dhanurvedasya vettā ca purodhā rājasaṃmataḥ 
MSS atha lakṣmaṇānugatakāntavapur jaladhiṃ vilaṅghya śaśidāśarathiḥ 
MSS parivāritaḥ parita ṛkṣaganais timiraugharākṣasakulaṃ bibhide 
MSS athavā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi narasya hi 
MSS pratikūle gate daive vināśe samupasthite 
MSS athavā procyate dhyānam anyadevātra yoginām 
MSS rahasyaṃ paramaṃ mukteḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ ca yat 
MSS athavā bhavataḥ pravartanā na kathaṃ piṣṭamiyaṃ pinaṣṭi naḥ 
MSS svata eva satāṃ parārthatā grahaṇānāṃ hi yathā yathārthatā 
MSS athavābhiniviṣṭabuddhiṣu vrajati vyarthakatāṃ subhāṣitam 
MSS ravirāgiṣu śītarociṣaḥ karajālaṃ kamalākaroṣviva 
MSS athavā mama bhāgyaviplavād aśaniḥ kalpita eṣa vedhasā 
MSS yadanena tarurna pātitaḥ kṣipatā tadviḍapāśrayā latā 
MSS athavā mūlasaṃsthānām udghātaistu prabodhayet 
MSS suptāṃ kuṇḍalinīṃ śaktiṃ bisatantunibhākṛtim 
MSS athavā mṛdu vastu hiṃsituṃ mṛdunaivārabhate prajāntakaḥ 
MSS himasekavipattiratra me nalīnī pūrvanidarśanaṃ matā 
MSS atha vāsavasya vacanena ruciravadanastrilocanam 
MSS klāntirahitamabhirādhayituṃ vidhivat tapāṃsi vidadhe dhanaṃjayaḥ 
MSS atha saṃsārasaṃhāravāmanābandhavāsitaḥ 
MSS ajāyata vṛṣārūḍho bhairavo mahasāṃ nidhiḥ 
MSS atha sa lalitayoṣidbhrūlatācāruśṛṅgaṃ rativalayapadāṅke cāpamāsajya kaṇṭhe 
MSS sahacaramadhuhastanyastucūtāṅkurāstraś śatamakhamupatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā 
MSS atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam 
MSS munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam 
MSS atha sāndrasāṃdhyakiraṇāruṇitaṃ harihetihūti mithunaṃ patatoḥ 
MSS pṛthagutpapāta virahārtidalad dhṛdayasrutāsṛganuliptamiva 
MSS atha sāmānyaśṛṅgāre yuvatīnāṃ praśaṃsanam 
MSS strīpuṃsajātikathanaṃ tayoḥ saṃyogavarṇanam 
MSS atha sphuranmīnavidhūtapaṅkajā vikaṅkatīraskhalitormisaṃhatiḥ 
MSS payo'vagāḍhuṃ kalahaṃsanādinī samājuhāveva vadhūḥ surāpagā 
MSS atha svamādāya bhayena manthanāc ciratnaratnādhikamuccitaṃ cirāt 
MSS nilīya tasmin nivasannapāṃnidhir vane taḍāko dadṛśo'vanībhujā 
MSS atha svasthāya devāya nityāya hatapāpmane 
MSS tyaktakramavibhāgāya caitanyajyotiṣe namaḥ 
MSS athāgatya bhuvaṃ rājñāṃ gatā vāhanatāṃ hayāḥ 
MSS teṣāṃ dharmārthakāmāṃśca sādhayantyupakāriṇaḥ 
MSS athāṅgarājādavatārya cakṣur yāhīti janyāmavadat kumārī 
MSS nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag dṛṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucirhi lokaḥ 
MSS athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni hi vājinām 
MSS śubhāni varṇairāvartais tāni vidyādvicārataḥ 
MSS athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi hayārohaṇamuttamam 
MSS yena vijñātamātreṇa revantaḥ priyatāṃ vrajet 
MSS athātmanaḥ śabdaguṇaṃ guṇajñaḥ padaṃ vimānena vigāhamānaḥ 
MSS ratnākaraṃ vīkṣya mithaḥ sa jāyāṃ rāmābhidhāno harirityuvāca 
MSS athānandakaraṃ vakṣye ṣaḍartūnāṃ ca varṇanam 
MSS yadrasāsvādamuditā vibhānti vibudhālayaḥ 
MSS athānukramadvārāṇi viracyante'tra vāṅmaye 
MSS anyoktisūktamuktālīṃ samuddhṛtya śrutāmbudheḥ 
MSS athāpi nāpasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu cārthavit 
MSS viṣayendriyasaṃyogān manaḥ kṣubhyati nānyathā 
MSS athāpraśastāḥ kharatulyanādāḥ pradīptapucchāḥ kūnakhā vivarṇāḥ 
MSS nikṛttakarṇā dvipamastakāśca bhavanti ye vā sitatālujihvāḥ 
MSS athāyatanasaṃnidhau bhagavato bhavānīpater manoharamacīkhanad bhuvanabhūṣaṇaṃ bhūpatiḥ 
MSS vigāhanakutūhalottaralapaurasīmantinī payodharabharatruṭadvikaṭavīcimudraṃ saraḥ 
MSS athāśuddhodbhavo grāmyanartaksyeva yo bhavet 
MSS kaitavasnehamāpanno bhavaḥ saṃkīrṇa ucyate 
MSS athāśvānāṃ janmadeśān pravakṣyāmyanupūrvaśaḥ 
MSS uttamānāṃ ca madhyānāṃ hīnānāṃ yatra saṃbhavaḥ 
MSS athāsasādāstamanindyatejā janasya dūrojjhitamṛtyubhīteḥ 
MSS utpattimadvastu vināśyavaśyaṃ yathāhamityevamivopadeṣṭum 
MSS athetare sapta raghupravīrā jyeṣṭhaṃ purojanmatayā guṇaiśca cakruḥ kuśaṃ ratnaviśoṣabhājaṃ saubhrātrameṣāṃ hi kulānusāri 
MSS athedaṃ rakṣobhiḥ kanakahariṇacchadmavidhinā tathā vṛttaṃ pāpairvyathayati yathā kṣālitamapi 
MSS janasthāne śūnye vikalakaraṇairāryacaritair api grāvā rodityapi dalati vajrasya hṛdayam 
MSS atheha kathyatesmābhiḥ karmanā yena bandhanam 
MSS chidyate sadupāyena śrutvā tatra pravartyatām 
MSS athaitat pūrṇamabhyātmaṃ yac ca netyanṛtaṃ vacaḥ 
MSS sarvaṃ netyanṛtaṃ brūyāt sa duṣkīrtiḥ svasan mṛtaḥ 
MSS atho gaṇapatiṃ vande mahāmodavidhāyinam 
MSS vidyādharagaṇairyasya pūjyate kaṇṭhagarjitam 
MSS athoccakairjaraṭhakapotakaṃdharā tanūruhaprakaravipāṇḍuradyuti 
MSS balaiścalaccaraṇavidhūtamuccarad dhanāvalīrudacarata kṣamārajaḥ 
MSS athocyate śvānarutasya sāraṃ sāraṃ samasteṣvapi śākuneṣu 
MSS vispaṣṭaceṣṭaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ ca śubhāśubhaṃ prāktanakarmapākam 
MSS athottarasyāṃ diśi khañjarīṭam ālokya ko'pi smitamādadhānaḥ 
MSS kasyāścidāsye smitacārubhāsi sabhāvayāmāsa vilocanāni 
MSS athodyayau bālasuhṛt smarasya śayāmādhavaḥ śyāmalalakṣmabhaṅgyā 
MSS tārāvadhūlocanacumbanena līlāvilīnāñjanabindurinduḥ 
MSS athopagūḍhe śaradā śaśāṅke prāvṛḍ yayau śāntataḍitkaṭākṣā 
MSS kāsāṃ na saubhāgyaguṇo'ṅganānāṃ naṣṭaḥ paribhraṣṭpayodharāṇām 
MSS adaḥ samitsaṃmukhavīrayauvata traṭadbhujākambumṛṇālahāriṇī 
MSS dviṣadgaṇastraiṇadṛgambunirjhare yaśomarālāvalirasya khelati 
MSS adaṇḍanamadaṇḍyānāṃ daṇḍyānāṃ cāpi daṇḍanam 
MSS agrāhyāgrahaṇaṃ caiva grāhyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tathā 
MSS adaṇḍyān daṇḍayan rājā daṇḍyāṃścaivāpyadaṇḍayan 
MSS ayaśo mahadāpnoti narakaṃ caiva gacchati 
MSS adattaṃ nādatte kṛtasukṛtakāmaḥ kimapi yaḥ śubhaśreṇistasmin vasati kalahaṃsīva kamale 
MSS vipat tasmād dūraṃ vrajati rajanīvāmbaramaṇer vinītaṃ vidyeva tridivaśivalakṣmīrbhajati tam 
MSS adattadoṣeṇa bhaved daridro daridradoṣeṇa karoti pāpam 
MSS pāpādavaśyaṃ narakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī 
MSS adattabhuktamutsṛjya dhanaṃ sucirarakṣitam 
MSS mūṣakā iva gacchanti kadaryāḥ svakṣaye kṣayam 
MSS adattānāmupādānaṃ hiṃsā caivāvidhānataḥ 
MSS paradāropasevā ca śārīraṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam 
MSS adattetyāgatā lajjā datteti vyathitaṃ manaḥ 
MSS dharmasnehāntare nyastā duḥkhitāḥ khalu mātaraḥ 
MSS adanaspṛhayā durīśvarāṇāṃ sadandvāri vitardimāśrayantām 
MSS apunarbhavasādhanaṃ śarīraṃ jarayāmo vayamoṃ namaḥ śivāya 
MSS adabhramabhropalapaṭṭakeṣu ye śitīkriyante madanena patriṇaḥ 
MSS taḍillatā tannikaṣotthapāvaka sphuliṅgabhaṅgīṃ lalitāṅgi sevate 
MSS adambhā hi rambhā vilakṣā ca lakṣmīr ghṛtācī hriyā cīrasaṃcchāditāsyā 
MSS aho jāyate mandavarṇāpyaparṇā samākarṇya tasyā guṇasyaikadeśam 
MSS adayaṃ gharṣa śilāyāṃ daha vā dāhena bhindhi lauhena 
MSS he hemakāra kanakaṃ ma māṃ guñjāphalaistulaya 
MSS adaya daśasi kiṃ tvaṃ bimbabuddhyādharaṃ me bhava capala nirāśaḥ pakvajambūphalānām 
MSS iti dayitamavetya dvāradeśāptamanyā nigadati śukamuccaiḥ kāntadantakṣatauṣṭhī 
MSS adarśanādāpatitaḥ punaścādarśanaṃ gataḥ 
MSS na tvāsau veda na tvaṃ taṃ kaḥ san kamanuśocasi 
MSS adarśanādāpatitāḥ punaścādarśanaṃ gatāḥ 
MSS na te tava na teṣāṃ tvaṃ tatra kā paridevanā 
MSS adarśane darśanamātrakāmā dṛṣṭau pariṣvaṅgarasaikalolā 
MSS āliṅgitāyāṃ punarāyatākṣyām āśāsmahe vigrahayorabhedam 
MSS adākṣiṇyādatīvogrāḥ pavanā iva durjanāḥ 
MSS gurūnapi pratikṣeptuṃ prayatante kṣamābhṛtaḥ 
MSS adātā puruṣastyāgī dātā tyāgī ca nityaśaḥ 
MSS iti jñātvā svayaṃ buddhayā dhanaṃ dadyāt punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS adātā puruṣas dhanaṃ saṃtyajya gacchati 
MSS dātāraṃ kṛpaṇaṃ manye mṛto'pyarthaṃ na muñcati 
MSS adātāraṃ dātṛpravaramanayaṃ viśvavinayaṃ virūpaṃ rūpāḍhyaṃ vigatajayinaṃ viśvajayinam 
MSS akulyaṃ kulyaṃ tvāmahamavadamāśāparavaśāt mṛṣāvādetyuktistvayi khalu mṛṣāvādini mayi 
MSS adātā vaṃśadoṣeṇa karmadoṣād daridratā

MSS adātṛmānasaṃ kvāpi na spṛśanti kavergiraḥ 
MSS duḥkhāyaivātivṛddhasya vilāsāstaruṇīkṛtāḥ 
MSS adānamīṣad dānaṃ ca kiṃcit kopāya dardhiyām

MSS adāntasyāvinītasya vṛthāpaṇḍitamāninaḥ 
MSS na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasyevājitātmanaḥ 
MSS adāhi yastena daśārdhabāṇaḥ purā purārernayanālayena

MSS adurgaviṣayaḥ kasya nāreḥ paribhavāspadam 
MSS adurgo'nāśrayo rājā potacyutamanuṣyavat 
MSS adṛṣṭāpatitāṃ bhāryāṃ mūḍho yastu parityajet

MSS aduṣṭāpatitāṃ bhāryāṃ yauvane yaḥ parityajet 
MSS sa jīvanānte strītvaṃ ca vandhyatvaṃ ca samāpnuyāt 
MSS adūragamanaṃ tīrtham adehadamanaṃ tapaḥ

MSS adṛṣṭaguṇadoṣāṇām adhṛtānāṃ ca karmaṇām

MSS adṛṣṭapūrvānādāya bhāvānapariśaṅkitān

MSS adṛṣṭe darśanotkaṇṭhā dṛṣṭe vicchedabhīrutā

MSS adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpyadaivatam

MSS adya dhārā sadādhārā sadālambā sarasvatī 
MSS paṇḍitā maṇḍitāḥ sarve bhojarāje bhuvaṃ gate 
MSS adya prabhṛtyavanatāṅgi tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau 
MSS ahnāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte 
MSS adya bhomidinaṃ satyaṃ satyamaprastutaṃ tava 
MSS tathāpi dūti gantavyaṃ nārtaḥ kālamapekṣate 
MSS adya me saphalamāyatanetre jīvitaṃ madanasaṃśrayabhāvam 
MSS āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmāt svāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda 
MSS adya yāvadapi yena nibaddhau na prabhū vicalituṃ balivindhyau 
MSS āsthitāvitathatāguṇapāśas tvādṛśā sa viduṣā durapāsaḥ 
MSS adya śītaṃ varivarti sarīsarti samīraṇaḥ 
MSS apatnīko marīmarti narīnarti kucoṣṇavān 
MSS adya sa pravasatīti subhruvaḥ śrotrasīmani vijṛmbhite dhvanau 
MSS sadya eva nijapāṇigumphite puṣpadāmani mahoragabhramaḥ 
MSS adya sundari kalindanandinī tīrakuñjabhuvi kelilampaṭaḥ

MSS ākṛṣṭahemarucirāmbarmutthitāyā lajjāvaśāt karadhṛtaṃ ca tato vrajantyāḥ

MSS adyāpi tāmahamalajjitapūrvaghṛṣṭe śayyātale suśayitāṃ madanotsavāya 
MSS vīrṇāvatīṃ vikacacampakapuṣpanāsāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi sadā nadatīṃ śubhāṅgīm 
MSS adyāpi tāmita itaśca puraśca paścād antarbahiḥ parita eva paribhramantīm 
MSS paśyāmi phullakanakāmbujasaṃnibhen vaktreṇa tiryagapavartitalocanena 
MSS adyāpi tāmupavane paricārayuktāṃ saṃcintayāmyupagatāṃ madanotsavāya 
MSS māṃ pārśvasaṃnihitalokabhayāt saśaṅkaṃ vyāvartitekṣaṇamanukṣaṇamīkṣamāṇām 
MSS adyāpi tāmubhayapārśvagahāraramyāṃ vāsantikākusumabhāsittakañcukāṃ ca 
MSS rākābhirāmavidhumaṇḍalavalguvavatrāṃ lāvaṇyanirjjitarayāṃ satataṃ smarāmi 
MSS adyāpi tāmurasijadvayamunnamayya madhye valitritayalakṣitaromarājim 
MSS dhyāyāmi vellitabhujāṃ vihitāṅgabhaṅgaṃ vyājena nābhikuharaṃ mama darśayantīm 
MSS adyāpi tiṣṭhati dṛśoridamuttarīyaṃ dhartuṃ punaḥ stanataṭe galitaṃ pravṛttā 
MSS vācaṃ niśamya nayanaṃ nayanaṃ mameti kiṃcittadā yadkarot smitamāyatākṣī 
MSS adyāpi durnivāraṃ stutikanyā bhajati kaumāram 
MSS madbhyo na rocate sā 'santo'pyasyai na rocante 
MSS adyāpi dhāvati manaḥ kimahaṃ karomi sārdhaṃ sakhībhirapi vāsagṛhe sukānte 
MSS kāntāṅgasaṃgaparihāsavicitranṛtye krīḍābhirāma iti yātu madīyakālaḥ 
MSS adyāpi na sphurati kesarabhāralakṣmīr na preṅkhati dhvanitamadraguhāntareṣu 
MSS mattāstathāpi kariṇo hariṇādhipasya paśyanti bhītamanasaḥ padavīṃ vaneṣu 
MSS adyāpi nirmalaśaracchaśigaurakānti ceto munerapi haret kimutāsmadīyam 
MSS vaktraṃ sudhāmayamahaṃ yadi tat prapadye cumban pibāmyavirataṃ vyathate mano me 
MSS adyāpi nānaṃ harakopavahnis tvayi jvalatyaurva ivāmburāśau 
MSS tvamanyathā manmatha madvidhānāṃ bhasmāvaśeṣaḥ kathamevamuṣṇaḥ 
MSS adyāpi rojjhati haraḥ kila kālakūṭaṃ kūrmo bibharti dharaṇīṃ puṣṭhabhāge 
MSS ambhonidhirvahati duḥsahavāḍavāgniṃ aṅgīkṛtaṃ sukṛtinaḥ paripālayanti 
MSS adyāpi mārutavidhūtalatāvitānāṃ vīṇāvinodaracanāṃ mama jīviteśām 
MSS pañceṣurāṣṭrakamalāṃ śubhavedimadhyāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi sartīṃ madanābhirāmām 
MSS adyāpi me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti pūrṇendusundarasukhaṃ mama vallabhāyāḥ 
MSS lāvaṇyanirjitaratikṣatakāmadarpaṃ bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat 
MSS adyāpi me varatanormadhurāṇi tasyā yānyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni 
MSS nidrānimīlitadṛśo madamantharāyās tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi dhvananti 
MSS adyāpi ye na vihitā vipulāḥ prabandhā vidyotamānavibhavāḥ sukhayanti viśvam 
MSS so'yaṃ dviśuddhaguruvaṃśabhavaḥ prasiddho gopāladatta upameyapadaṃ kathaṃ syāt 
MSS adyāpi vāsagṛhato mayi nīyamāne durvārabhīṣaṇakarairyamadūtakalpaiḥ 
MSS kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ madarthe vaktuṃ na pāryata iti vyathate mano me 
MSS adyāpi vismayakarī tridaśān vihāya buddhirbalāccalati me kimahaṃ karomi 
MSS jānannapi pratimuhūrtamihāntakāle kānteti vallabhatareti mameti dhīrā 
MSS adyāpi śītadyutirātmabimbaṃ nirmāya nirmāya punarbhunakti 
MSS tasyā mukhenāyatalocanāyāḥ kartuṃ na śaktiḥ sadṛśaṃ priyāyāḥ 
MSS adyāpi śravasī na kuṇḍalacale kelikvaṇatkaṅkaṇau bāhū nāpi na hārihāravalayāluṇṭhā ca kaṇṭhāvaniḥ 
MSS asyāḥ paśya tathāpi paṅkajadṛśo viśvaṃ priyaṃ bhāvukaṃ paśyāmaḥ sphuṭatāvibhūṣaṇakarābhogaṃ vapurvaibhavam 
MSS adyāpi sā mama manastaṭinī sadāste romāñcavīcivilasadvipulasvabhāvā 
MSS kādambakeśararuciḥ kṣatavīkṣaṇaṃ māṃ gātraklamaṃ kathayatī priyarājahaṃsī 
MSS adyāpi sundari tavānanacandrabimbaṃ bandīkṛtāmbujayugaṃ paricumbya cetaḥ 
MSS tvatsaṃgamodbhavasukhaṃ tanute tathāpi vairaṃ karoti karuṇāvikalo vivekaḥ 
MSS adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigiti krodhādivālohitaḥ 
MSS udyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇāt phullatkairavakośaniḥsaradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇaṃ śaśī 
MSS adyāpi hariharādibhir amarairapi tattvato na vijñātāḥ 
MSS bhramavibhramabahumohā veśyāḥ saṃsāramāyāśca 
MSS adyāpi hi nṛśaṃsasya pituste divaso gataḥ 
MSS tamasā pihitaḥ panthā ehi putraka śevahe 
MSS adyāpyaśokanavapallavaraktahastāṃ muktāphalapracayacumbitacūcukāgrām 
MSS antaḥsmitocchvasitapāṇḍuragaṇḍabhittiṃ tāṃ vallabhāmalasahaṃsagatiṃ smarāmi 
MSS adyāpyahaṃ calitacārunimīlitākṣam āsyaṃ smarāmi satataṃ suratāvasāne 
MSS tatkālaniśvasitaniḥsṛtakāntikāntaṃ svedodabinduparidanturitaṃ priyāyāḥ 
MSS adyāpyahaṃ varavadhūsuratopabhogaṃ jīvāmi nānyavidhinā kṣaṇamantareṇa 
MSS tadbhrātaro maraṇameva hi duḥkhaśāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavatastvaritaṃ lunīdhvam 
MSS adyāpyahaṃ vikacakundasamānadantaṃ tiryagvivartitaviśālavilocanāntam 
MSS tasyā mukhaṃ suvijitendu na vismarāmi codyaṃ kṛtajña iva sādhukṛtopakāram 
MSS adyāpyahaṃ sarasamañjulabhṛṅganādam īṣatsmarollasitarāgasupāṇḍugaṇḍam 
MSS paśyāmi pūrṇaśaradindusamānakānti tasyā mukhaṃ vikacapaṅkajapātranetram 
MSS adyāpyaho jagati sundaralakṣapūrṇe anyānyamuttamaguṇādhikasaṃprapanne 
MSS anyābhirapyupamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ rūpaṃ tadīyamiti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ 
MSS adyāpyunmadayātudhānataruṇīcañ catkarāsphālana vyāvalgannṛkapālatālaraṇitairnṛtyatpiśācāṅganāḥ 
MSS udgāyanti yaśāṃsi yasya vitatairnādaiḥ pracaṇḍānila prakṣubhyatkarikumbhakūṭakuharavyaktai raṇakṣoṇayaḥ 
MSS adyābhogini gāḍhamarmanivahe harmyāgravedījuṣāṃ sadyaścandanaśoṣiṇi stanataṭe saṅge kuraṅgīdṛśām 
MSS prāyaḥ praślathayanti puṣpadhanuṣaḥ puṣpākare niṣṭhite nirvedaṃ navamallikāsurabhayaḥ sāyaṃtanā vāyavaḥ 
MSS adyāmbhaḥ paritaḥ patiṣyati bhuvastāpo'dya nirvāsyati kṣetreṣvadya yatiṣyate janapadaḥ sasyeṣu paryutsukaḥ 
MSS nartiṣyanti tavodaye'dya jalada vyālolapucchacchada cchatracchāditamaulayo diśi diśi krīḍālasāḥ kekinaḥ 
MSS adyārabhya kaṭhorakārmukalatāvinyastahastāmbujas tāvanna prakaṭīkaromi nayane śoṇe nimeṣodayān 
MSS yāvat sāyakakotipāṭitaripukṣmāpālamauliskhalan mallīmālyapatatparāgapaṭalairāmodinī medinī 
MSS adyārabhya na hi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā bhājanaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ viṣarūpiṇaḥ śaṭhamaternāmāpi saṃkṣepataḥ 
MSS kiṃ tenaiva vinā śaśāṅkakiraṇaspaṣṭāṭṭahāsā niśā naiko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyān mama prāvṛṣi 
MSS adyāśanaṃ śiśujanasya balena jātaṃ śvo vā kathaṃ nu bhaviteti vicintayantī 
MSS ityaśrupātamalinīkṛtagaṇḍadeśā neccheddaridragṛhiṇī rajanīvirāmam 
MSS adyedaṃ śva idaṃ tathā parudidaṃ kṛtyaṃ parāri tvadaś cetaścintayasītthameva satataṃ nirvyākulaṃ re kutaḥ 
MSS tatkālaṃ vilasanmanorathalatākāntāradāvānalo yasmin daṇḍadharaṃ smariṣyasi sakhe so'pyasti kaścit kṣaṇaḥ 
MSS adyeśvarāścāraṇagāyanānāṃ sadaiva kalpadrumavat phalanti 
MSS sadbhyastu kiṃcid vacasaiva sāyaṃ dīpāya karpūramivārpayanti 
MSS adyaike prātarapare vitate'hni tathā pare 
MSS yānti niḥsīmni saṃsāre kaḥ sthātā nanu śocati 
MSS adyaiva kuru yacchreyo mā tvā kālo'tyagādayam 
MSS akṛteṣveva kāryeṣu mṛtyurvai saṃprakarṣati 
MSS adyaiva kuru yacchreyo vṛddhaḥsan kiṃ kariṣyasi 
MSS svagātrāṇyapi bhārāya bhavanti hi viparyaye 
MSS adyaiva yat pratipadudgatacandralekhā sakhyaṃ tvayā tanuriyaṃ gamitā varākyāḥ 
MSS kānte gate kusumasāyaka tat prabhāte bāṇāvalīṃ kathaya kutra vimokṣyasi tvam 
MSS adyaiva śvaḥ paraśvastricaturadivasānantaraṃ sāyamahni prātaḥ prāhṇe parāhṇe kṣaṇamiha nivasa prasthito'bhyehi bhūyaḥ

MSS adyaiva hasitaṃ gītaṃ krīḍitaṃ yaiḥ śarīribhiḥ 
MSS adyaiva te na dṛśyante paśya kālasya ceṣṭitam

MSS tāvat kiṃ kathayāmi kelipaṭunā nirgatya kuñjodarād ajñātopanatena tena sahasā mūrdhnaiva saṃbhāvitaḥ

MSS paiśunyamapriyāṇāṃ vṛtticchedo nṛśaṃsacaritānām 
MSS adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā 
MSS anugrahaśca dānaṃ ca satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 
MSS adrohasamayaṃ kṛtvā munīnāmagrato hariḥ 
MSS jaghāna namuciṃ paścād apāṃ phenena pārthiva 
MSS adrohe samayaṃ kṛtvā ciccheda namuceḥ śiraḥ 
MSS śakraḥ sā hi matā tasya ripau vṛttiḥ sanātanī 
MSS adrau jīrṇadarīṣu saṃkaṭasarittīreṣu nimnonnate ūḍhā yena vṛṣeṇa dhūrbalavatā yūnā dvitīyena yā

MSS advitīyaṃ nijaṃ loke vilokya vahato mudam 
MSS pramadāvadanasyāyaṃ darpodreko na tu smitam 
MSS advisaṃvīkṣaṇaṃ cakṣur advisaṃmīlanaṃ manaḥ 
MSS advisaṃsparśanaḥ pāṇir adya me kiṃ kariṣyati 
MSS adveṣapeśalaṃ kuryān manaḥ kusumakomalam 
MSS babhūva dveṣadoṣeṇa devadānavasaṃkṣayaḥ

MSS muktāśritāmātmaruciṃ vadantī vedāntasiddhāntakatheva bhāsi

MSS advaidhamānasaṃyuktaṃ śūraṃ dhīraṃ vipaścitam 
MSS na śrīḥ saṃtyajate nityam ādityamiva raśmayaḥ 
MSS adhaḥ karoti yadratnaṃ mūrdhnā dhārayate tṛṇam 
MSS doṣastasyaiva jaladhe ratnaṃ ratnaṃ tṛṇaṃ tṛṇam 
MSS adhaḥ kurvanprajāḥ sarvā bahudhā mahimolbaṇaḥ 
MSS rājā parvaṇi kasmiṃścid bhavedahibhayākulaḥ 
MSS adhaḥ kṣipanti kṛpaṇā vittaṃ tatra yiyāsavaḥ

MSS adhaḥ paśyan pārśvadvayavalitasācīkṛtaśirāḥ śanaiḥ pakṣasthairyāddivi masṛṇacakrākṛtigatiḥ 
MSS cirāccillastiryaktvaritataramāhāranipuṇo nipatyaivākasmāccalacaraṇamūrdhaṃ prapatati 
MSS adhaḥ paśyasi kiṃ bāle patitaṃ tava kiṃ bhuvi 
MSS re re mūrkha na jānāsi gataṃ tāruṇyamauktikam 
MSS adhaḥpuṣpī śaṅkhapuṣpī lajjālurgirikarṇikā 
MSS nīlinī sahadevā ca putramārjārikā tathā 
MSS viṣṇukrāntā ca sarvāsāṃ jaṭā grāhyā raverdine 
MSS baddhā bhuje vilepādvā kāye śastraughavārikā 
MSS adhaḥ śete śambhustava caraṇamādhāya hṛdaye bahirdvāre dauvārikapadamupetaḥ kamalajaḥ 
MSS viḍaujā vaiphalyaṃ bhajati nijavijñāpanakṛte tāvahaṃ dāsaḥ syāmiti manasi lajjā bhayamapi 
MSS adhaḥsthā ramate nārī uparisthaśca kāmukaḥ 
MSS prasiddhaṃ tadrataṃ jñeyaṃ grāmabālajanapriyam

MSS atidhanametat sundari vidyā ca tapaśca kīrtiśca 
MSS adhanā api te dhanyāḥ sādhavo gṛhamedhinaḥ 
MSS yadgṛhā hyarhavaryāmbutṛṇabhūmīśvarāvarāḥ 
MSS adhanā dhanamicchanti vācaṃ caiva catuṣpadāḥ 
MSS mānavāḥ svargamicchanti mokṣamicchanti devatāḥ 
MSS adhanenārthakāmena nārthaḥ śakyo vivitsatā 
MSS arthairarthā nibadhyante gajairiva mahāgajāḥ 
MSS adhano dātukāmo'pi saṃprāpto dhanināṃ gṛham 
MSS manyate yācako'yaṃ dhig dāridryaṃ khalu dehinām 
MSS adhano'yaṃ dhanaṃ prāpya mādyannuccairna māṃ smaret 
MSS iti kāruṇiko nūnaṃ dhanaṃ me bhūri nādadat 
MSS adhamaṃ bādhate bhūyo duḥkhavego na tattamam 
MSS pādadvayaṃ vrajatyāśu śītasparśo na cakṣuṣī

MSS adhamarṇaśavājīviśrāddhabhugduṣṭabhūbhujām 
MSS abhiprāyā na siddhyanti tenedaṃ dhriyate jagat 
MSS adhamāḥ kalimicchanti saṃdhimicchanti madhyamāḥ 
MSS uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam 
MSS adhamā dhanamicchanti dhanamānau ca madhyamāḥ 
MSS uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam 
MSS adhame saṃgatā lakṣmīr nopabhogāya kasyacit 
MSS kardame patitā chāyā sahakārataroriva 
MSS adhamo mātukāraśca dhātukāraśca madhyamaḥ 
MSS dhātumātukriyākāra uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ 
MSS adhamo lakṣaṇajñaḥ syān madhyamo lakṣyamācaret 
MSS lakṣyalakṣaṇasaṃyukta uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ 
MSS adharaṃ kila bimbanāmakaṃ phalamasmāditi bhavyamanvayam 
MSS labhate'dharabimbamityadaḥ padamasyā radanacchadaṃ vadat 
MSS adharaḥ kisalayarāgaḥ komalaviṭapānukāriṇau bāhū 
MSS kusumamiva lobhanīyaṃ yauvanamaṅgeṣu saṃnaddham 
MSS adharaḥ padmarāgo'yam anarghaḥ savraṇo'pi te 
MSS mugdhe hastaḥ kimartho'yam apārtha iha dīyate 
MSS adharadyutirastapallavā mukhaśobhā śaśikāntilaṅghinī 
MSS tanurapratimā ca subhruvo na vidherasya kṛtiṃ vivakṣati 
MSS adharamadhare kaṇṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe nidhāya bhujaṃ bhuje hṛdi ca hṛdayaṃ madhye madhyaṃ sarojadṛśo dṛḍham 
MSS sarabhasamaho corāvūruṃ padaṃ ca pade balād gamayati jano dhanyaḥ kaścit samāṃ śiśire niśām 
MSS adharamadhare kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhaṃ sacāṭu dṛśordṛśāv alikamalike kṛtvā gopījanena sasaṃbhramam 
MSS śiśuriti rudan kṛṣṇo vakṣaḥsthale nihito'cirān nibhṛtapulakaḥ smeraḥ pāyāt smarālasavigrahaḥ 
MSS adharamamṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhunyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ drākṣāyāśca prasannarasaṃ phalam 
MSS sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyat svādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt 
MSS adharasya madhurimāṇaṃ kucakāṭhinyaṃ dṛśostathā taikṣṇyam 
MSS kavitāyāḥ paripākān anubhavarasiko vijānāti 
MSS adharāmṛtapānena mamāsyamaparādhyatu 
MSS mūrdhno kimaparāddhaṃ yaḥ pādau nāpnoti cumbitum 
MSS adharāmṛtamādhurīdhurīṇo harilīlāmuralīnināda eṣaḥ 
MSS pratatāna manaḥpramodamuccair hariṇīnāṃ hariṇīdṛśaṃ munīnām 
MSS adharāmṛtena pittaṃ naśyati vāyuḥ payodharayugena 
MSS anavarataratena kaphaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ vapurnāryāḥ 
MSS adhareṇa samāgamād radānām aruṇimnā pihito'pi śuklabhāvaḥ 
MSS hasitena sitena pakṣmalākṣyāḥ punarullāsamavāpa jātapakṣaḥ 
MSS adhareṇonnatibhājā bhujaṃgaparipīḍitena te dūti 
MSS saṃkṣobhitaṃ mano me jalanidhiriva mandarāgeṇa 
MSS adhare navavīṭikānurāgo nayane kajjalamujjvalaṃ dukūlam 
MSS idamābharaṇaṃ nitambanīnām itaradbhūṣaṇamaṅgadūṣaṇāya 
MSS adhare binduḥ kaṇṭhe maṇimālā stanayuge śaśaplutakam 
MSS tava sūcayanti ketaki kusumāyudhaśāstrapaṇḍitaṃ ramaṇam 
MSS adhare madhurā sarasvatīyaṃ nanu karṇe maṇikarṇikāpravāhaḥ 
MSS śirasi pratibhāti cāruveṇī kathameṇīnayanā na tīrtharājaḥ 
MSS adhare vinihitavaṃśaṃ campakakusumena kalpitottaṃsam 
MSS vinataṃ dadhānamaṃsaṃ vāmaṃ satataṃ namāmi jitakaṃsam 
MSS adharo'yamadhīrākṣyā bandhujīvaprabhāharaḥ 
MSS anyajīvaprabhāṃ hanta haratīti kimadbhutam 
MSS adharoṣṭhe ca ghoṇāyāṃ gaṇḍayościbuke tathā 
MSS muṣke nābhau trike kukṣāv āvartāstvatininditāḥ 
MSS adharo'sau kuraṅgākṣyāḥ śobhate nāsikātale 
MSS suvarṇanalikāmadhyān māṇikyamiva vicyutam 
MSS adharmaṃ dharmamiti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā 
MSS sarvārthān viparītāṃśca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī 
MSS adharmaṃ dharmaveṣeṇa yadimaṃ lokasaṃkaram 
MSS abhipatsye śubhaṃ hitvā kriyāvidhivivarjitam 
MSS adharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaitad yad vyādhimaraṇaṃ gṛhe 
MSS yuddhe tu maraṇaṃ yat syāt so'sya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 
MSS adharmaḥ surasastasya cotkaṭairmadhurāyate 
MSS yādṛśaiśca phalaiścaiva suphalo lobhapādapaḥ 
MSS adharmadaṇḍanaṃ loke yaśoghnaṃ kīrtināśanam 
MSS asvargyaṃ ca paratrāpi tasmāttat parivarjayet 
MSS adharmadaṇḍanaṃsvargakīrtilokavināśanam 
MSS samyaktu daṇḍanaṃ rājñaḥ svargakīrtijayāvaham 
MSS adharmadrohasaṃyukte mitrajāte'pyupekṣaṇam 
MSS ātmavanmitravarge tu prāṇānapi parityajet 
MSS adharmapratiṣedhaśca nyāyamārgeṇa vartanam 
MSS upakāryopakāritvam iti vṛttaṃ mahīpateḥ 
MSS adharmamanyatra mahītale'smin saṃkṣobhahetuṃ malinaṃ vicārya 
MSS niṣkāsanāyāsya ruṣeva deva sitaṃ yaśaḥ sarvadiśaḥ prayāti 
MSS adharmarucayo mūḍhās tiryaggatiparāyaṇāḥ 
MSS kṛcchrāṃ yonimanuprāpya na sukhaṃ vindate janāḥ 
MSS adharmasādhanaṃ budhā mudhā na jantuhiṃsanaṃ sṛjantu vedanindayā bhajantu kevalaṃ dayām 
MSS iti prabodhayan vidhiṃ vidhāya vaidikaṃ vidhiṃ viśuddhabodhabandhurantaredhi buddhadeva naḥ 
MSS adharmastu mahāṃstāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ 
MSS yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat 
MSS adharmādarjitaṃ dravyam alpakālaṃ tu tiṣṭhati 
MSS tataḥ sapatnamayate samūlaṃ tena naśyati 
MSS adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaścādharmeṇa pṛcchati 
MSS tayoranyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati 
MSS adharmeṇaidhate tāvat tato bhadrāṇi paśyati 
MSS tataḥ sapatnāñ jayati samūlastu vinaśyati 
MSS adharmeṣu rasastasya utkledairmadhurāyate 
MSS tādṛśaiśca phalaiścaiva saphalo lobhapādapaḥ 
MSS adharmopacitaṃ vittaṃ harantyanye'lpamedhasaḥ 
MSS saṃbhojanīyāpadeśair jalānīva jalaukasaḥ 
MSS adharmopārjitairarthairyaḥ karotyaurdhvadehikam 
MSS na sa tasya phalaṃ pretya bhuṅkte'rthasya durāgamāt 
MSS adharṣitānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ samareṣvanivartinām 
MSS dharṣaṇāmarṣaṇaṃ bhīru maraṇādatiricyate 
MSS adhaśca dūrapātitvaṃ same lakṣyaṃ suniścitam 
MSS dṛḍhasphoṭaṃ prakurvīta ūrdhvasaṃsthānayogataḥ 
MSS adhastanaśvabhrabhuvo na yāti ṣaṇ na sarvanārīṣu na sañjito'nyataḥ 
MSS na jāyate vyantaradevajātiṣu na bhāvanajyotiṣikeṣu sadruciḥ 
MSS adhastācchidritaṃ carma durgandhiparipūritam 
MSS mūtraklinnaṃ ca tasyārthe mā rājan brāhmaṇān vadhīḥ 
MSS adhākṣīnno laṅkāmayamayamudanvantamatarad viśalyāṃ saumitrairayamupanināyauṣadhivarām 
MSS iti smāraṃ smāraṃ tvadarinagarībhittilikhitaṃ hanūmantaṃ dantairdaśati kupito rākṣasagaṇaḥ 
MSS adhāri padmeṣu tadaṅghriṇā ghṛṇā kva tacchayacchāyalavo'pi pallave 
MSS tadāsyadāsye'pi gato'dhikāritāṃ na śāradaḥ pārvikaśarvarīśvaraḥ 
MSS adhārmikāṃśca krūrāṃśca dṛṣṭadoṣān nirākṛtān 
MSS parebhyo'bhyāgatāṃścaiva dūrādetān vivarjayet 
MSS adhārmiko naro yo hi yasya cāpyanṛtaṃ dhanam 
MSS hiṃsāratiśca yo nityaṃ nehāsau sukhamedhate 
MSS adhikaḥ syāt pituḥ putro rūpavidyāparākramaiḥ 
MSS tiṣṭhan pitrārjitapade subrahmaṇyastu tādṛśaḥ 
MSS adhikaratalatalpaṃ kalpitasvāpalīlā parimilananimīlatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍapālī 
MSS sutanu kathaya kasya vyañjayatyañjasaiva smaranarapatilīlāyauvarājyābhiṣekam 
MSS adhikāra ṛṇaṃ garbhaś caturthaṃ śvānamaithunam 
MSS āgame paramaṃ saukhyaṃ nirgame duḥkhakāraṇam 
MSS adhikārābhiṣekeṣu mṛdaṅgavacanaṃ śṛṇu 
MSS baddhā daṇḍahatā riktā bhaviṣyasi yathā vayam 
MSS adhikāreṇa yo yuktaḥ kathaṃ tasyāsti khaṇḍanam 
MSS nīceṣūpakṛtaṃ rājan bālukāsviva mudritam 
MSS adhikonnatairapi sudāruṇānvitair asakṛdbhramatpaśugaṇāṅghripīḍitaiḥ 
MSS vidhisiddhanaikaguṇasasyasampadāṃ virasasvabhāvakaṭhinairalaṃ khalaiḥ 
MSS adhigaganamanekāstārakā rājyabhājaḥ pratigṛhamiha dīpā darśayanti prabhutvam 
MSS diśi diśi vilasantaḥ santi khadyotapotāḥ savitari paribhūte kiṃ na lokairvyaloki 
MSS adhigataparamārthān paṇḍitān māvamaṃsthās tṛṇamiva laghu lakṣmīrnaiva tān saṃruṇaddhi 
MSS abhinavamadalekhāśyāmagaṇḍasthalānāṃ na bhavati bisatanturvāraṇaṃ vāraṇānām 
MSS adhigatamahimā manuṣyaloke bata sutarāmavasīdati pramādī 
MSS gajapatiruruśailaśṛṅgavaṛṣmā gururavamajjati paṅkabhāṅna dāru 
MSS adhigatyedṛgetasyā hṛdayaṃ mṛdutāmucoḥ 
MSS pratīma eva vaimukhyaṃ kucayoryuktavṛttayoḥ 
MSS adhigamanamanekāstārakā rājamānāḥ pratigṛhamapi dīpāḥ prāpnuvanti pratiṣṭhām 
MSS diśi diśi vikasantaḥ santi khadyotapotāḥ savitari udite'smin kiṃ nu lokairaloki 
MSS adhigamyāśu golakṣyam ekaḥ śāmyati mārgaṇaḥ 
MSS anurodhasthiratayā na ca śakyapratāraṇaḥ 
MSS adhidehali hanta hemavallī śaradinduḥ sarasīruhe śayānaḥ 
MSS adhikhañjanacañcu mauktikālī phalitaṃ kasya sujanmanastapobhiḥ 
MSS adhipañcavaṭīkuṭīravarti sphuṭitendīvarasundarorumūrti 
MSS api lakṣmaṇalocanaikalakṣyaṃ bhajata brahma saroruhāyatākṣam 
MSS adhibhillapalligallaṃ syādballavapallavo'pi vācālaḥ 
MSS nāgaranaravarapariṣadi kasya mukhādakṣaraṃ kṣarati 
MSS adhiyāmini gajagāmini kāmini saudāminīva yaṃ vrajasi 
MSS jaladeneva na jāne kati kati sukṛtāni tena vihitāni 
MSS adhirajani jagāma dhāma tasyāḥ priyatamayeti ruṣā srajāvanaddhaḥ 
MSS padamapi calituṃ yuvā na sehe kimiva na śaktiharaṃ sasādhvasānām 
MSS adhirajani priayasavidhe kathmapi saṃveśitā balād gurubhiḥ 
MSS kiṃ bhaviteti saśaṅkaṃ paṅkajanayanā parāmṛśati 
MSS adhirajanimukhe yaḥ sāndralākṣānurāgair vyatikarita ivoccaiḥ pāṭalatvaṃ dadhānaḥ 
MSS uṣasi sa khalu dīpaḥ pānanirdhūtarāgaḥ sphuradadhara ivāyaṃ dhasaratvaṃ bibharti 
MSS adhirajani vyādhagṛhe sukhamananabhūtamanubhūya 
MSS apaśokakokamithunaṃ jīvanadānesamullasati 
MSS adhirohārya pādābhyāṃ pāduke hemabhūṣite 
MSS ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ 
MSS adhilavaṅgamamī rajasādhikaṃ malinitāḥ sumanodalatālinaḥ 
MSS sphuṭamiti prasavena puro'hasat sapadi kundalatā dalatālinaḥ 
MSS adhiśrīrudyāne tvamasi bhavataḥ pallavacayo dhurīṇaḥ kalyāṇe tava jagati śākhā śramaharā 
MSS mude puṣpollekhaḥ phalamapi ca tuṣṭyai tanabhṛtāṃ rasāla tvāṃ tasmāc chrayati śataśaḥ kokilakulam 
MSS adhiṣṭhānaṃ samicchanti hyacalaṃ nirbale sati 
MSS saṃsāre sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛṇabinduvadasthire 
MSS adhītapañcāśugabāṇavañcane sthitā madantarbahireṣi ceduraḥ 
MSS smarāśugebhyo hṛdaya bibhetu na praviśya tattvanmayasapuṭe mama 
MSS adhītavidyairvigate śiśutve dhanorjite hāriṇi yauvane ca 
MSS sevyā nitambāstu vilāsinīnāṃ tatastadarthaṃ dharaṇīdharāṇām 
MSS adhītasya ca taptasya karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasya ca 
MSS ṣaṣṭhaṃ bhajati bhāgaṃ tu prajā dharmeṇa pālayan 
MSS ṣaḍbhāgasya na bhoktāsau rakṣate na prajāḥ katham 
MSS adhītibodhācaraṇapracāraṇair daśāścatasraḥ praṇayannupādhibhiḥ 
MSS caturdaśatvaṃ kṛtavān kutaḥ svayaṃ na vedmi vidyāsu caturdaśasvayam 
MSS adhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī 
MSS nādhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī 
MSS adhītya caturo vedān dharmaśāstrāṇyanekaśaḥ 
MSS paraṃ tattvaṃ na jānāti darvī pākarasāniva 
MSS adhītya caturo vedān vyākṛtyāṣṭādaśa smṛtīḥ 
MSS aho śramasya vaiphalyam ātmāpi kalito na cet 
MSS adhītya nītiṃ yasmācca nītiyukto na dṛśyate 
MSS anabhijñaśca sācivyaṃ gamitaḥ kena hetunā 
MSS adhītya vedān parisaṃstīrya cāgnīn iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ pālayitvā prajāśca 
MSS gobrāhmaṇārthe śastrapūtāntarātmā hataḥ saṃgrame kṣatriyaḥ svargameti 
MSS adhītya sakalaṃ śrutaṃ ceramupāsya ghoraṃ tapo yadicchasi phalaṃ tayoraha hi lābhapūjādikam 
MSS chinatsi tarupallavaprasarameva śūnyāśayaḥ kathaṃ samupalipsate surasamasya pakvaṃ phalam 
MSS adhītyedaṃ yathāśāstraṃ naro jānāti sattamaḥ 
MSS dharmopadeśavikhyātaṃ kāryākāryaṃ śubhāśubham 
MSS adhīyate vijānanti virajyanti muhurmuhuḥ 
MSS nātyantāya nivartante narā vaṣamyato vidheḥ 
MSS adhīyīta brāhmaṇo'tho yajeta dadyādiyāt tīrthamukhyāni caiva 
MSS adhyāpayedyājayeccāpi yājyān pratigrahān vā viditān pratīcchet 
MSS tathā rājanyo rakṣaṇaṃ vai prajānāṃ kṛtvā dharmeṇāprayatto'tha dattvā 
MSS yajñairiṣṭvā sarvavedānadhītya dārān kṛtvā puṇyakṛdāvased gṛhān 
MSS vaiśyo'dhītya kṛṣigorakṣapaṇyair vittaṃ cinvan pālayannapramattaḥ 
MSS priyaṃ kurvan brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ dharmaśīlaḥ puṇyakṛdāvased gṛhān 
MSS paricaryāṃ vandanaṃ brāhmāṇānāṃ nādhīyīta pratiṣiddho'sya yajñaḥ 
MSS nityotthito bhūtaye'tandritahaḥ syād eṣa smṛtaḥ śūdradharmaḥ purāṇaḥ 
MSS adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ kucelaḥ svayamāgataḥ 
MSS ete pañca na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā yadi 
MSS adhīrākṣyāḥ pīnastanakalaśamāskandasi muhuḥ kramādūrudvandvaṃ kalayasi ca lāvaṇyalalitam 
MSS bhujāśliṣṭo harṣādanubhavasi hastāhatikalām idaṃ vīṇādaṇḍaṃ prakaṭaya phalaṃ kasya tapasaḥ 
MSS adhunā dadhimanthanānubandhaṃ kuruṣe kiṃ guruvibhramālasāṅgi 
MSS kalaśastani lālasīti kuñje muralīkomalakākalī murāreḥ 
MSS adhunā madhukarapatinā gilito'pyapakāradaṃpatī yena 
MSS trātaḥ sa pālayettvāṃ vikārarahito vināyako lakṣmyāḥ 
MSS adhṛtaparipatannicolabandhaṃ muṣitanakāramavakradṛṣṭipātaṃ 
MSS prakaṭahasitamunnatāsyabimbaṃ purasudṛśaḥsmaraceṣṭitaṃ smarāmi 
MSS adhṛta yadvirahoṣmaṇi sajjitaṃ manasijena tadūruyugaṃ tadā 
MSS spṛśati tatkadanaṃ kadalītarur yadi marujvaladūṣaradūṣitaḥ 
MSS adhogatiṃ ca samprāpya bisāḥ paṅkakalaṅkitāḥ 
MSS guṇino nirguṇairdāśaiḥ kṛṣṭāḥ svāṅkuradarśitāḥ 
MSS adhodṛṣṭinairkṛtikaḥ svārthasādhanatatparaḥ 
MSS śaṭho mithyāvinītaśca bakavratacaro dvijaḥ 
MSS adho'dhaḥ paśyataḥ kasya mahimā nopacīyate 
MSS uparyupari paśyantaḥ sarva eva daridrati 
MSS adhomukhī strīstanatulyatāptaye pratapya tīvraṃ sumahattaraṃ tapaḥ 
MSS yadā na tāmāpa tadā hṛdi sphuṭaṃ vidīryate pakvamiṣeṇa dāḍimaḥ 
MSS adhomukhaikadaṃṣṭreṇa viṣaśukrapravāhiṇā 
MSS anena duścikitsyena jagaddaṣṭaṃ bhagāhinā 
MSS adho'rdhe lakṣaṇaṃ yasya parārdhe naiva dṛśyate 
MSS adhamaḥ sa bhavet khaṅgaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ bhayāvahaḥ 
MSS adho'rdhe varṇa ekaḥ syād ūrdhvārdhe bhinnavarṇakaḥ 
MSS varṇasaṃkaravān khaḍgo nṛpāṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥ 
MSS adhovidhānāt kamalapravālayoḥ śiraḥsu dānādakhilakṣamābhujām 
MSS puredamūrdhvaṃ bhavatīti vedhasā padaṃ kimasyāṅkitamūrdhvarekhayā 
MSS adhyayanamitrasaṅga praveśayātrāvivāhadāneṣu 
MSS śubhakāryeṣvakhileṣvapi śastaḥ somādhvagaḥ pavanaḥ 
MSS adhyastāndhyamapūrvamarthadhiṣaṇairgrāhyaṃ pumarthāspadaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedataḥ śrutigataṃ nirdhūtasādhyārthakam 
MSS āmnāyāntavibhātaviśvavibhavaṃ sarvāviruddhaṃ paraṃ satyaṃ jñānamanarthasārthavidhuraṃ brahma prapadye sadom 
MSS adhyākrāntā vasatiramunāpyāśramaṃ sarvabhogye rakṣāyogādayamapi tapaḥ pratyahaṃ saṃcinoti 
MSS asyāpi dyāṃ spṛśati vaśinaścāraṇadvandvagītaḥ puṇyaḥ śabdo muniriti muhuḥ kevalaṃ rājapūrvaḥ 
MSS adhyāpayanti śāstrāṇi tṛṇīkurvanti paṇḍitān 
MSS vismārayanti jātiṃ svāṃ varāṭāḥ pañcaṣāḥ kare 
MSS adhyāpitasyośanasāpi nītiṃ prayuktarāgapraṇidhirdviṣaste 
MSS kasyārthadharmau vada pīḍayāmi sindhostaṭāvogha iva pravṛddhaḥ 
MSS adhyāpito'si kenaitāṃ maśaka kṣudratāmiha 
MSS yasyaiva karṇe lagasi pīḍāṃ tasya karoṣi yat 
MSS adhyāyodhanavedi mārgaṇakuśānāstīrya khaḍgasrucā hutvāreḥ palalaṃ caruṃ havirasṛk tanmastakasvastikaiḥ 
MSS saṃveṣṭyāhavanīyamānasadasi khyo'sau pratāpānalo 'sthāpi drāgudakāñjalīkṛtacatuḥpāthodhinā śrīmatā 
MSS adhyāsāmāsuruttuṅgahemapīṭhāni yānyamī 
MSS tairūhe kesarikrāntatrikūṭaśikharopamā 
MSS adhyāsite vayasyāyā bhavatā mahatā hṛdi 
MSS stanāvantarasaṃmāntau niṣkrāntau brūmahe bahiḥ 
MSS adhyāsīnāśvavārairupajanitabhaye heṣamāṇaisturaṅgair garjatsphūrjanmahaujotkaṭakaraṭighaṭākoṭibhirduṣpraveśe
MSS saṃgrāme kalpakalpe'pyarijanavisarairmārgaṇaśreṇibaddhe badhye'vadhye nṛpe'pi prabhavati yavasaṃ prāṇaviśrāṇanāya 
MSS adhyāsya śāntāṃ kukubhaṃ śrgālī narasya vāmā yadi rāraṭīti 
MSS tadarthalābhaṃ vitaratyavaśyam arthakṣayaṃ dakṣiṇato raṭantī 
MSS adhyāsya saurabheyaṃ mauktikaruciraṅgaṇeṣu vihitagatiḥ mānyaḥ sa eva hṛdi me gaurī vāmāṅgamāśritā yasya 
MSS adhyāhāraḥ smaraharaśiraścandraśeṣasya śeṣa syāherbhūyaḥ phaṇasamucitaḥ kāyayaṣṭīnikāyaḥ 
MSS dugdhāmbhodhermuniculukanatrāsanāśābhyupāyaḥ kāyavyūhaḥ kva jagati na jāgartyadaḥ kīrtipūraḥ 
MSS adhyeti nṛtyati lunāti minoti nauti krīṇāti hanti vapate cinute bibheti 
MSS muṣṇāti gāyati dhinoti bibharti bhinte lobhena sīvyati paṇāyati yācate ca 
MSS adhruveṇa śarīreṇa pratikṣaṇavināśinā 
MSS dhruvaṃ yo nārjayeddharmaṃ sa śocyo mūḍhacetanaḥ 
MSS adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo'rjanam 
MSS sa paścāttapyate mūḍho mṛto gatvātmano gatim 
MSS adhvaklāntatanurnavajvaravatī nṛtyaślathāṅgī tathā māsaikaprasavā dadāti surate ṣaṇmāsagarbhā sukham 
MSS vikhyātā virahasya saṃgamavidhau kruddhaprasanne ṛtu sthāne nūtanasaṃgame madhumade rāgāspadaṃ yoṣitaḥ 
MSS adhvani padagrahaparaṃ madayati hṛdayaṃ na vā na vā śravaṇam 
MSS kāvyamabhijñasabhāyāṃ mañjīraṃ kelivelāyām 
MSS adhvanīno'tithirjñeyaḥ śrotriyo vedapāragaḥ 
MSS mānyāvetau gṛhasthasya brahmalokamabhīpsataḥ 
MSS adhvanyadhvani taravaḥ pathi pathi pathikairupāsyate chāyā 
MSS viralaḥ sa ko'pi viṭapī yamadhvago gṛhagataḥ smarati 
MSS adhvanyadhvani bhūruhaḥ phalabṛto namrānupekṣyādarād dūrādunnatisaṃśrayavyasaninaḥ pānthasya mugdhātmanaḥ 
MSS yanmūlaṃ samupāgatasya madhuracchāyāphalaiḥ kā kathā śīrṇenāpi hi nopayogamagamat parṇena tāladrumaḥ 
MSS adhvanyasya vadhūrviyogavidhurā bhartuḥ smarantī yadi prāṇānujjhati kasya tanmahadaho saṃjāyate kilbiṣam 
MSS ityevaṃ pathikaḥ karoti hṛdaye yāvat tarormūrdhani prodghuṣṭaṃ parapuṣṭayā tava tavetyuccairvaco'nekaśaḥ 
MSS adhvanyāḥ kila mūlagartamadhunāpyāpūrayantyaśrubhir vyākrośantyadhunā sabāndhavakulāḥ sāyaṃ muhūrtaṃ dvijāḥ 
MSS itthaṃ yāvadimāni bibhrati śucaṃ bhūtānyapi tvatkṛte tāvattvaṃ na gato'si pādapa ciraṃ kīrtyātmanā vartase 
MSS adhvanyānāṃ śiśirasamaye caṇḍacāṇḍālakāṇḍa prāyāḥ kāyānahaha pavanāḥ kleśayanto viśanti 
MSS badhnantyete sapadi sudṛśāṃ durbhagānāmapīha prauḍhāśleṣāślathitadayitaṃ mūrdhni saubhāgyapaṭṭam 
MSS adhvanyān kati rundhate kati dṛdhān bhindanti toyākarān kedārān kati yajjayanti kati ca vyāpāṭayanti drumān 
MSS vāhinyaḥ kṣaṇaluptavārivibhavā vanyā avanyāmimā yaḥ sindhuḥ sakalāśrayaḥ sa tu punaḥ kutreti na jñāyate 
MSS adhvanyairmakarandaśīkarasurāmattakvaṇatkokile mārge mārganirodhinī parihṛtā śaṅke'śubhāśaṅkayā 
MSS pānthastrīvadhapātakādupagataṃ caṇḍālacihnaṃ madhor eṣā kiṅkiṇikeva ṣaṭpadamayī jhaṃkāriṇī saṃhatiḥ 
MSS adhvaśramāya caraṇau virahāya dārā abhyarthanāya vacanaṃ ca vapurjarāyai 
MSS etāni me vidadhatastava sarvadaiva dhātastrapā yadi na kiṃ na pariśramo'pi 
MSS adhvaśrāntamavijñātam atithiṃ kṣutpipāsitam 
MSS yastaṃ na pūjayed bhaktyā tamāhurbrahmaghātinam 
MSS adhvāgrajāgrannibhṛtāpadandhur bandhuryadi syāt pratibandhumarhaḥ 
MSS joṣaṃ janaḥ kāryavidastu vastu pracchyā nijecchā padavīṃ mudastu 
MSS adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā 
MSS asaṃbhogo jarā strīṇāṃ vākśalyaṃ manaso jarā 
MSS adhvā jarā manuṣyāṇām anadhvā vājināṃ jarā 
MSS amaithunaṃ jarā strīṇām aśvānāṃ maithunaṃ jarā 
MSS adhvānaṃ naikacakraḥ prabhavati bhuvanabhrāntidīrghaṃ vilaṅghya prātaḥ prāptuṃratho me punariti manasi nyastacintātibhāraḥ 
MSS saṃdhyākṛṣṭāvaśiṣṭasvakaraparikaraiḥ spaṣṭahemārapaṅkti vyākṛṣyāvasthito'stakṣitibhṛti nayatīvaiṣa dikcakramarkaḥ 
MSS adhvā na yadi nisaṅgapaṅkasaṃkulito bhavet 
MSS tataḥ kutaste dhaureya dhuryatā vyajyatāmiyam 
MSS advāreṇa viśantyeva buddhimanto riporgṛham 
MSS akṛtvā dharṣaṇāṃ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ yuddhaṃ pravartate 
MSS anakṣaraṃ rūpamiha kṣarantī pañcāśadarṇairamṛtāmbupūrṇaiḥ 
MSS vyākīrṇavidhyamaṇḍamadantarālā 
śabdātmikā māmavatāt samantāt 
MSS anakṣarajñena janena sakhyaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ duṣprabhusevanaṃ ca 
MSS āliṅganaṃ lambapayodharāṇāṃ pratyakṣaduḥkhaṃ trayameva bhūmau 
MSS anaṅkuritakūrcakaḥ sa tu sitopalāḍhyaṃ payaḥ sa eva dhṛtakūcakaḥ salavaṇāmbutakropamaḥ 
MSS sa eva sitakūrcakaḥ kvathitaguggulodvegakṛd bhavanti hariṇīdṛśāṃ priyatameṣu bhāvāstrayaḥ 
MSS anaṅgaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpair viśvaṃ vyajayateṣubhiḥ 
MSS ityasaṃbhāvyamathavā vicitrā vastuśaktayaḥ 
MSS anaṅgatāpapraśamāya tasya kadarthyamānā muhurāmṛṇālam 
MSS madhau madhau nākanadīnalinyo varaṃ vahantāṃ śiśire'nurāgam 
MSS anaṅga palitaṃ mūrdhni paśyaitad vijayadhvajam 
MSS idānīṃ jitamasmābhis tavākiṃcitkarāḥ śarāḥ 
MSS anaṅgabāṇākulitasya śaṃbhoḥ śiro bhavānīcaraṇe'tinamram 
MSS vilokya kāciccaraṇe carantī pipīlikā cumbati candrabimbam 
MSS anaṅgamaṅgalagṛhāpāṅgabhaṅgitaraṅgitaiḥ 
MSS āliṅgitaḥ sa tanvaṅgyā kārtārthyaṃ labhate kadā 
MSS anaṅgamaṅgalabhuvas tadapāṅgasya bhaṅgayaḥ 
MSS janayanti muhuryūnām antaḥsaṃtāpasaṃtatim 
MSS anaṅgamaṅgalārambhakumbhāviva payodharau 
MSS kasya nārtiharau tasyāḥ karapallavasaṃvṛtau 
MSS anaṅgaraṅgapīṭho'syāḥ śṛṅgārasvarṇaviṣṭaraḥ 
MSS lāvaṇyasārasaṃghātaḥ sā ghanā jaghanasthalī 
MSS anaṅgaraṅgapratimaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhaṅgībhiraṅgīkṛtamānatāṅgyāḥ 
MSS kurvanti yūnāṃ sahasā yathaitāḥ svāntāni śāntāparacintanāni 
MSS anaṅgarasacāturīcapalacārucelāñcalaś calanmakarakuṇḍalasphuritakāntigaṇḍasthalaḥ 
MSS vrajollasitanāgarīnikararāsalāsyotsukaḥ sa me sapadi mānase sphuratu ko'pi gopālakaḥ 
MSS anaṅgalaṅghanālagnanānātaṅkā sadaṅganā 
MSS sadānagha sadānanda natāṅgāsaṅgasaṃgata 
MSS anaṅgaśastrāṇi natāṅgi tīkṣṇatāṃ nayatyayaskāra ivāmbudāgamaḥ 
MSS malīmasāṅgārarucāṃ payomucāṃ tathāhi madhye jvalitastaḍicchikhī 
MSS anaṅgīkṛtakāmānām anumānārhavarṣmaṇām 
MSS dhrtanirmalatīrthānāṃ bhūtilepo vibhūṣaṇam 
MSS anaṅgenābalāsaṅgāj jitā yena jagattrayī 
MSS sa citracaritaḥ kāmaḥ sarvakāmaprado'stu vaḥ 
MSS anaṅgo'yamanaṅgatvam adya nindiṣyati dhruvam 
MSS yadanena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇisparśotsavastava 
MSS anañjitāsitā dṛṣṭir bhrūranāvarjitā natā 
MSS arañjito'ruṇaścāyam adharastava sundari 
MSS anaṇuraṇanmaṇimekhala mavirataśiñjānamañjumañjīram 
MSS parisaraṇamaruṇacaraṇe raṇaraṇakamakāraṇaṃ kurute 
MSS anaticirojjhitasya jaladena cira sthitabahubudbudasya payaso'nukṛtim 
MSS viralavikīrṇavajraśakalā sakalām iha vidadhāti dhautakaladhautamahī 
MSS anatiśayaṃ svarṇacayaṃ nivahan nitarāṃ pramodaye svānte 
MSS kiṃtu tavaiṣā saṃpat kasyopakṛte pratibrūhi 
MSS anatiśithile puṃbhāvena pragalbhabalāḥ khalu prasabhamalayaḥ pāthojāsye niviśya niritvarāḥ 
MSS kimapi mukhataḥ kṛtvānītaṃ vitīrya sarojinī madhurasamuṣoyoge jāyāṃ navānnamacīkaran 
MSS anadhigatamanorathasya pūrvaṃ śataguṇiteva gatā mama triyāmā 
MSS yadi tu tava samāgame tathaiva prasarati subhrutataḥ kṛtī bhaveyam 
MSS anadhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddhamarhati 
MSS evamaśrutaṣāḍguṇyo na mantraṃ śrotumarhati 
MSS anadhītya svajaśāstraṃ yo'nyaśāstraṃ samīhate vaktum 
MSS so'heḥ padāni gaṇayati niśi tamasi jale ciragatasya 
MSS anadhītyārthaśāstraṇi bahavaḥ paśubuddhayaḥ 
MSS prāgalbhyādvaktumicchanti mantreṣvabhyantarīkṛtāḥ

MSS anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃcana 
MSS mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃcana 
MSS anantakopādicatuṣṭayodaye tribhedamithyātvamalodaye tathā 
MSS durantamithyātvaviṣaṃ śarīriṇām anantasaṃsārakaraṃ prarohati 
MSS anantakhyātisaṃpannaḥ śuddhasattvaḥ sadhībalaḥ 
MSS dhatte bahumukhaṃ bhogaṃ śrutidṛṣṭisthirāśayaḥ 
MSS anantatattvaṃ parigṛhya dhātrā vinirmito'syāḥ kila madhyabhāgaḥ 
MSS aṇuḥ paraṃ yogidṛśānulakṣyaḥ saccitkalāsthairyabalāvanaddhaḥ

MSS budho yadi samīpastho na kujanyaḥ puro yadi 
MSS anantapāraṃ kila śabdaśāstraṃ svalpaṃ tathāyurbahavaśca vighnāḥ 
MSS yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsanīyaṃ haṃsairyathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt 
MSS anantaratnaprabhavasya yasya himaṃ na saubhāgyavilopi jātam 
MSS eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatīndoḥ kiraṇeṣvivāṅkaḥ

MSS yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsanīyaṃ haṃso yathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt

MSS śastre śāstre tricaturāś caturā yadi mādṛśāḥ
