MSS anyathā tu kimetena rūpeṇāpi   
MSS anayanapathe priye na vyathā yathā dṛśya eva duṣprāpe 
MSS mlānaiva kevalaṃ niśi tapanaśilā vāsare jvalati 
MSS anayaśca nayaścāpi daivāt saṃpadyate naraiḥ

MSS tvadvallabhā varākyo vahanti varṣāsu vārīṇi

MSS mamlau sātha viṣādena padminīva himāmbhasā

MSS avakāśo na paryāptas tava bāhulatāntare 
MSS anayo vinayastasya vidhiryasyānuvartate 
MSS nayaḥ samyakprayukto'pi bhāgyahīnasya durnayaḥ 
MSS anarghyaṃ saundaryaṃ jagadupari mādhuryalaharī parītaṃ saurabhyaṃ diśi diśi rasaikavyasanitā 
MSS iti prītyāsmābhistvayi khalu rasāle vyavasitaṃ ka evaṃ jānīte yadasi kaṭukīṭairupahataḥ 
MSS anarghyamapi māṇikyaṃ hemāśrayamapekṣate 
MSS anāśrayā na śobhante paṇḍitā vanitā latāḥ 
MSS anarghyalāvaṇyanidhānabhūmir na kasya lobhaṃ laṭabhā tanoti 
MSS avaimi puṣpāyudhayāmiko'syām aviśvasan na kṣaṇameti nidrām 
MSS anarghyāṇyapi ratnāni labhyante vibhavaiḥ sukham 
MSS durlabho ratnakoṭyāpi kṣaṇo'pi hi gatāyuṣaḥ 
MSS anarthakaṃ vipravāsaṃ gṛhebhyaḥ pāpaiḥ saṃdhiṃ paradārābhimarśam 
MSS dambhaṃ stainyaṃ paiśunaṃ madyapānaṃ na sevate yaḥ sa sukhī sadaiva 
MSS anarthamakarāgārād asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt 
MSS uḍḍīyate nirudvegaṃ sarvatyāgena putraka 
MSS anarthamarthataḥ paśyann arthaṃ caivāpyanarthataḥ 
MSS indriyaiḥ prasṛto bālaḥ suduḥkhaṃ manyate sukham 
MSS anarthāṃ ścārtharūpeṇa arthāṃścānartharūpataḥ 
MSS arthāyaiva hi keṣāṃcid dhananāśo bhavatyuta 
MSS anarthā hyartharūpāśca arthāścānartharūpiṇaḥ 
MSS bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya rocate 
MSS anarthitarpaṇaṃ vittaṃ cittamadhyānadarpaṇam 
MSS atīrthasarpaṇaṃ dehaṃ paryante śocyatāṃ vrajet 
MSS anarthitvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ bhayāt parijanasya ca 
MSS maryādāyāmamaryādāḥ striyastiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu 
MSS anarthe caiva niratam arthe caiva parāṅmukham 
MSS na taṃ bhartāramicchanti ṣaṇḍhaṃ patimiva striyaḥ 
MSS anartho'pyartharūpeṇa tathārtho'nartharūpabhāk 
MSS utpadyate vināśāya tasmāduktaṃ parīkṣayet 
MSS analaṃkṛto'pi mādhava harasi mano me sadā prasabham 
MSS kiṃ punaralaṃkṛtastvaṃ saṃprati nakharakṣataistasyāḥ 
MSS analaḥ śītanāśāya viṣanāśāya gāruḍam 
MSS viveko duḥkhanāśāya sarvanāśāya durmatiḥ 
MSS analaḥ salilājjātaḥ kārttikeyo'pi vahnitaḥ 
MSS gūḍhaṃ hi mahatāṃ janma paricchettuṃ ka īśvaraḥ 
MSS analasajavāpuṣpotpīḍacchavi prathamaṃ tataḥ samadayavanīgaṇḍacchāyaṃ punarmadhupiṅgalam 
MSS tadanu ca navasvarṇādarśaprabhaṃ śaśinastatas taruṇatagarākāraṃ bimbaṃ vibhāti nabhastale 
MSS analastambhanavidyāṃ subhaga bhavān niyatameva jānāti 
MSS manmathaśarāgnitapte hṛdi me kathamanyathā vasasi 
MSS analpaṃ jalpantaḥ kati bata gatā no yamapuraṃ purastādasmākaṃ vidhṛtanayanā vyāttavadanāḥ 
MSS atītā yadyevaṃ na hi nijahitaṃ cetasi vayaṃ vahāmo hā mohād viṣayaviṣajātādavasitāḥ 
MSS analpaṃ saṃtāpaṃ śamayati manojanmajanitaṃ tathā śītaṃ sphītaṃ himavati niśīthe glapayati 
MSS tadevaṃ ko'pyūṣmā ramaṇaparirambhotsavamilat purandhrīnīrandhrastanakalaśajanmā vijayate 
MSS analpacintābharamohaniścalā vilokyamānaiva karoti sādhvasam 
MSS svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari 
MSS analpatvāt pradhānatvād vaṃśasyevetare svarāḥ 
MSS vijigīṣornṛpatayaḥ prayānti parivāratām 
MSS anavadyamavadyaṃ syād vāruṇīleśamātrataḥ 
MSS tadvacchiṣyo viruddhārthād viguroreva naśyati 
MSS anavaratakanakavitaraṇa jalalavabhṛtakarataraṅgitārthitateḥ 
MSS bhaṇitiriva matirmatiriva ceṣṭā ceṣṭeva kīrtirativimalā 
MSS anavaratadhanurjyāsphālanakrūrapūrvaṃ ravikiraṇasahiṣṇu svedaleśairabhinnam 
MSS apacitamapi gātraṃ vyāyatatvādalakṣyaṃ giricara iva nāgaḥ prāṇasāraṃ bibharti 
MSS anavaratanayanavigalita jalalavaghaṭitākṣasūtravalayena 
MSS mṛtyuṃjayamiva japati tvadgotraṃ virahiṇī bālā 
MSS anavaratanayanavigalita jalalavaparimuṣitapattralekhāntam 
MSS karatalaniṣaṇṇamabale vadanamidaṃ kaṃ na tāpayati 
MSS anavarataparopakaraṇa vyagrībhavadamalacetasāṃ mahatām 
MSS āpātakāṭavāni sphuranti vacanāni bheṣajānīva 
MSS anavaratarasena rāgabhājā karajaparikṣatilabdhasaṃstavena 
MSS sapadi taruṇapallavena vadhvā vigatadayaṃ khalu khaṇḍitena mamle 
MSS anavasare ca yadukttaṃ subhāṣitaṃ tacca bhavati hāsyāya 
MSS rahasi prauḍhavadhūnāṃ ratisamaye vedapāṭha iva 
MSS anavasthitacittasya na jane na vane sukham 
MSS jane dahati saṃsargo vane saṅgavivarjanam 
MSS anavasthitacittānāṃ prasādo'pi bhayaṃkaraḥ 
MSS sarpī hanti kila snehād apatyāni na vairataḥ 
MSS anavahitaḥ kimaśaktto vibudhairabhyarthitaḥ kimatirasikaḥ 
MSS sarvaṃkaṣo'pi kālas tirayati sūktāni na kavīnām 
MSS anavāpyaṃ ca śokena śarīraṃ copatapyate 
MSS amitrāśca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ 
MSS anavekṣitamaryādaṃ nāstikaṃ vipralumpakam 
MSS arakṣitāramattāraṃ nṛpaṃ vidyādadhogatim 
MSS anavyaye vyayaṃ yāti vyaye yāti suvistṛtim 
MSS apūrvastava kośo'yaṃ vidyākośeṣu bhārati 
MSS anasi sīdati saikatavartmani pracurabhārabharakṣapitaukṣake 
MSS gurubharoddharaṇoddhurakaṃdharaṃ smarati sārathireṣa dhuraṃdharam 
MSS anasūyaḥ kṛtaprajñaḥ śobhanānyācaran sadā 
MSS akṛcchrāt sukhamāpnoti sarvatra ca virājate 
MSS anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā 
MSS kāmakrodhaparityāgaḥ śiṣṭācāranidarśanam 
MSS anasūyārjavaṃ śaucaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā 
MSS damaḥ satyamanāyāso na bhavanti durātmanām 
MSS anastamitasārasya tejasastadvijṛmbhitam 
MSS yena pāṣāṇakhaṇḍasya mūlyamalpaṃ vasuṃdharā 
MSS anākalitamānuṣyāḥ kṣamāsaṃsparśavarjitāḥ 
MSS pratibuddhairna sevyante pūrvadevavirodhinaḥ 
MSS anākāśe candraḥ sarasijadaladvandvasahito gṛhītaḥ paścārdhe kuṭilakuṭilaiḥ so'pi timiraiḥ 
MSS sudhāṃ muñcatyuccairaniśamatha saṃmohajananīṃ kimutpātālīyaṃ vadata jagataḥ kartumuditā 
MSS anākūtaireva priyasahacarīṇāṃ śiśutayā vacobhiḥ pāñcālīmithunamadhunā saṃgamayitum 
MSS upādatte no vā viramati na vā kevalamiyaṃ kapolau kalyāṇī pulakamukulairdanturayati 
MSS anākṛṣṭasya viṣayair vidyānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ 
MSS tasya dharmaraterāsīd vṛddhatvaṃ jarasā vinā 
MSS anāgataṃ bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā nītiśāstraviśāradaḥ 
MSS avasanmūṣakastatra kṛtvā śatamukhaṃ bilam 
MSS anāgataṃ yaḥ kurute sa śobhate sa śocate yo na karotyanāgatam 
MSS vane vasanneva jarāmupāgato bilasya vācā na kadāpi hi śrutā 
MSS anāgataṃ hi budhyeta yacca kāryaṃ puraḥ sthitam 
MSS na tu buddhikṣayāt kiṃcid atikrāmet prayojanam 
MSS anāgatavartīṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā yastu prahṛṣyati 
MSS sa tiraskāramāpnoti bhagnabhāṇḍo dvijo yathā 
MSS anāgatavatīṃ cintāṃ yo naraḥ kartumicchati 
MSS sa bhūmau pāṇḍuraḥ śete somaśarmapitā yathā 
MSS anāgatavidhātā ca pratyutpannamatiśca yaḥ 
MSS dvaveva sukhamedhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati 
MSS anāgatavidhātāram apramattamakopanam 
MSS sthirārambhamadīnaṃ ca naraṃ śrīrupatiṣṭhati 
MSS anāgatavidhānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ viṣaye nṛpaiḥ 
MSS āgamaścāpi kartavyas tathā doṣo na jāyate 
MSS anāgatavidhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ śubhamicchatā 
MSS āpadaṃ śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa vipaścitā 
MSS anāgatopadhaṃ hiṃsraṃ durbuddhimabahuśrutam 
MSS tyakttopāttaṃ madyapānadyūtastrīmṛgayāpriyam 
MSS kārye mahati yuñjāno hīyate'rthapatiḥ śriyā 
MSS anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhair anāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam 
MSS akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamiva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhokttāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ 
MSS anātapatro'pyayamatra lakṣyate sitātapatrairiva sarvato vṛtaḥ 
MSS acāmaro'pyeṣa sadaiva vījyate vilāsabālavyajanena ko'pyayam 
MSS anāturotkaṇṭhitayoḥ prasidhyatā samāgamenāpi ratirna māṃ prati 
MSS parasparaprāptinirāśayorvaraṃ śarīranāśo'pi samānurāgayoḥ 
MSS anātmavān nayadveṣī vardhayannarisaṃpadaḥ 
MSS prāpyāpi mahadaiśvaryaṃ saha tena vinaśyati 
MSS anāthānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ bālavṛddhatapasvinām 
MSS anyāyaparibhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pārthivo gatiḥ 
MSS anāthānāṃ nātho gatiragatikānāṃ vyasanināṃ vinetā bhītānāmabhayamadhṛtīnāṃ bharavaśaḥ 
MSS suhṛdbandhuḥ svāmī śaraṇamupakārī varaguruḥ pitā mātā bhrātā jagati puruṣo yaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ 
MSS anāthān rogiṇo yaśca putravat paripālayet 
MSS guruṇā samanujñātaḥ sa bhiṣakcchabdamaśnute 
MSS anādaraparo vidvān īhamānaḥ sthirāṃ śriyam 
MSS agneḥ śeṣamṛṇāccheṣaṃ śatroḥ śeṣaṃ na śeṣayet 
MSS anādarahatāṃ sevāṃ dāmpatyaṃ premavarjitam 
MSS maitrīṃ ca hetusāpekṣāṃ ce tanā nādhikurvate 
MSS anādarālokavivṛddhaśokaḥ pituḥ priyāvākyavaśaṃgatasya 
MSS auttānapādirjagatāṃ śaraṇyam ārādhya viṣṇuṃ padamagryamāyāt 
MSS anādāyī vyayaṃ kuryād asahāyī raṇapriyaḥ 
MSS āturaḥ sarvabhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghraṃvinaśyati 
MSS anādidhāvisvaparaṃparāyā hetusrajaḥ srotasi veśvare vā 
MSS āyattadhīreṣa janastadāryāḥ kimīdṛśaḥ paryanuyogayogyaḥ 
MSS anādiṣṭopi bhūpasya dṛṣṭvā hānikaraṃ ca yaḥ 
MSS yatate tasya nāśāya sa bhṛtyo'rho mahībhujām 
MSS anādṛtyaucityaṃ hriyamavigaṇayyātimahatīṃ yadetasyāpyarthe dhanalavadurāśātaralitāḥ 
MSS alīkāhaṃkārajvarakuṭilitabhrūṇi dhanināṃ mukhāni prekṣyante dhigidamatiduṣpūramudaram 
MSS anādeyaṃ nādadīta parikṣīṇo'pi pārthivaḥ 
MSS na cādeyaṃ samṛddho'pi sūkṣmamapyarthamutsṛjet 
MSS anādeyasya cādānād ādeyasya ca varjanāt 
MSS daurbalyaṃ khyāpyate rājñaḥ sa pretyeha ca naśyati 
MSS anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇām 
MSS vināśayati saṃbhūtā ayonija ivānalaḥ 
MSS anāptapuṇyopacayairdurāpā phalasya nirdhūtarajāḥ savitrī 
MSS tulyā bhavaddarśanasaṃpadeṣā vṛṣṭerdivo vītabalāhakāyāḥ 
MSS anāmnāyamalā vedā brāhmaṇasyāvrataṃ malam 
MSS malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ puruṣasyānṛtaṃ malam 
MSS anāyakā vinaśyanti naśyanti bahunāyakāḥ 
MSS strīnāyakā vinaśyanti naśyanti śiśunāyakāḥ 
MSS anāyake na vastavyaṃ na vased bahunāyake 
MSS strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ na vased bālanāyake 
MSS anāyavyayakartā ca anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ 
MSS āturaḥ sarvabhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghraṃ vinaśyati 
MSS anāyāsakṛśaṃ madhyam aśaṅkatarale dṛśau 
MSS abhūṣaṇamanohāri vapurvayasi subhruvaḥ 
MSS anāyi deśaḥ katamastvayādya vasantamuktasya daśāṃ vanasya 
MSS tvadāptasaṃketatayā kṛtārthā śravyāpi nānena janena saṃjñā 
MSS anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā vibhajya samyagviniyogasatkriyāḥ 
MSS phalantyupāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr upetya saṃgharṣamivārthasaṃpadaḥ 
MSS anārataṃ pratidiśaṃ pratideśaṃ jale sthale 
MSS jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudā iva vāriṇi 
MSS anāratapariskhalannayanavāridhārāśata pravṛddhapathanimnagāsalilaruddhayānodyamā 
MSS tvadīyaripukāminī bahuvideśayānaiṣiṇī vinindati valaddṛśā gururuṣāśrupaṃ prāvṛṣam 
MSS anārabdhākṣepaṃ paramakṛtavāṣpavyatikaraṃ nigūḍhāntastāpaṃ hṛdayavinipītaṃ vyavasitam 
MSS kṛśāṅgyā yatpāpe vrajati mayi nairāśyapiśunaṃ ślathairaṅgairuktaṃ hṛdayamidamunmūlayati tat 
MSS anārabhyā bhavantyarthāḥ kecin nityaṃ tathāgatāḥ 
MSS kṛtaḥ puruṣakāro'pi bhavedyeṣu nirarthakaḥ 
MSS anārambhastu kāryāṇāṃ prathamaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam 
MSS ārabdhasyāntagamanaṃ dvitīyaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam 
MSS anārādhya kālīmanāsvādya gauḍī mṛte mantratantrādvinā śabdacauryāt 
MSS prabandhaṃ pragalbhaṃ prakartuṃ pravaktuṃ viriñciprapañce madanyaḥ kaviḥ kaḥ 
MSS anārogyamanāyuṣyam asvargyaṃ cātibhojanam 
MSS apuṇyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet 
MSS anāryatā niṣṭhuratā krūratā niṣkriyātmatā 
MSS puruṣaṃ vyañjayantīha loke kaluṣayonijam 
MSS anāryaprajñānāmiha janavadhūnāṃ hi manaso mahāśalyaṃ karṇe tava kanakajambūkisalayaḥ 
MSS bhraman bhikṣāhetoradhinagari buddho'si na mayā 
tvayaitāvadveṣaḥ pathika na vidheyaḥ punarapi 
MSS anāryamapyācaritaṃ kumāryā bhavān mama kṣāmyatu saumya tāvat 
MSS haṃso'pi devāṃśatayāsi vandyaḥ śrīvatsalakṣmeva hi matsyamūrtiḥ 
MSS anāryavṛttamaprājñam asūyakamadhārmikam 
MSS anarthāḥ kṣipramāyānti vāgduṣṭaṃ krodhanaṃ tathā 
MSS anāryeṇa kṛtaghnena saṃgatirme na yujyate 
MSS vināśamapi kāṅkṣanti jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā 
MSS anālokya vyayaṃ karttā anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ 
MSS āturaḥ sarvakṣetreṣu naraḥ śīghraṃ vinaśyati 
MSS anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanādṛtya suhṛdas tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale saṃprati kṛtaḥ 
MSS samākṛṣṭā hyete pralayadahanodbhāsuraśikhāḥ svahastenāṅgārāstadalamadhunāraṇyaruditaiḥ 
MSS anāvartī kālo vrajati sa vṛthā tanna gaṇitaṃ daśāstāstāḥ soḍhā vyasanaśatasaṃpātavidhurāḥ 
MSS kiyadvā vakṣyāmaḥ kimiva bata nātmanyupakṛtaṃ vayaṃ yāvattāvat punarapi tadeva vyavasitam 
MSS anāvarjitacittāpi dhruvaṃ sarvān pradhāvati 
MSS phalaṃ na labhate kiṃcit tṛṣṇā jīrṇeva kāminī 
MSS anāvilaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte viṣayāṇāmanutsukaḥ 
MSS utsuko labdharokeṇa tatra śokena śīryate 
MSS anāvṛtanavadvārapañjare vihagānilaḥ 
MSS yattiṣṭhati tadāścaryaṃ viyoge tasya kā kathā 
MSS anāvṛtāḥ svavarṇeṣu sarvasādhāraṇāḥ purā 
MSS nāryo babhūvurnirvairo yataḥ sarvo'bhavajjanaḥ 
MSS anāvṛṣṭihate deśe sasye ca pralayaṃ gate 
MSS dhanyāstāta na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam 
MSS anāśritā dānapuṇyaṃ vedapuṇyamanāśritāḥ 
MSS rāgadveṣavinirmuktā vicarantīha mokṣiṇaḥ 
MSS anāśrite dṛptagurau avajñāṃ kalayen nṛpaḥ 
MSS saṃvartena maruttastu nirastamakarodgurum 
MSS anāsthā vastūnāmabhimataguṇānāmupahṛtau ghano garvastanvyā ruṣi ca vihitāḍambaravidhiḥ 
MSS prahāraḥ pādābhyāṃ yamanamapi kāñcyā caraṇayoḥ priyāyā vibbokaṃ tadidamiti dhanyo'nubhavati 
MSS anāsvāditasaṃbhogāḥ patantu tava śatravaḥ 
MSS bālavaidhavyadagdhānāṃ kulastrīṇāṃ stanā iva 
MSS anāsvādyamavikreyam anādeyamanīpsitam 
MSS dattaṃ nirupakāraṃ yad vandhyadānena tena kim 
MSS anāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahsraguḥ 
MSS surāpo vṛṣalībhartā braḥmahā gurutalpagaḥ 
MSS asatpratigrahe yukttaḥ stenaḥ kutsitayājakaḥ 
MSS adoṣastyaktumanyonyaṃ karmasaṃkaraniścayāt 
MSS anāhūtaḥ praviśati apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate 
MSS viśvasityapramatteṣu mūḍhacetā narādhamaḥ 
MSSA anāhūtaḥ samāyātaḥ anāpṛṣṭastu bhāṣate 
MSSA paranindātmanaḥ stutiś catvāri laghulakṣaṇam 
MSS anāhūtapraviṣṭasya dṛṣṭasya kruddhacakṣuṣā 
MSS svayamevopaviṣṭasya varaṃ mṛtyurna bhojanam 
MSS anahūtāḥ svayaṃ yānti rasāsvādavilolupāḥ 
MSS nivāritā na gacchanti makṣikā iva bhikṣukāḥ 
MSS anāhūto viśedyastu apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate 
MSS ātmānaṃ manyate prītaṃ bhūpālasya sa durmatiḥ 
MSS anāhvāne praveśaśca apṛṣṭe paribhāṣaṇam 
MSS ātmastutiḥ pare nindā catvāri laghulakṣaṇam 
MSS anicchato'pi duḥkhāni yathehāyānti dehinaḥ 
MSS sukhānyapi tathā manye cintādainyena ko guṇaḥ 
MSS aniḥsarantīmapi gehagarbhāt kīrtiṃ pareṣāmasatīṃ vadanti 
MSS svairaṃ bhramantīmapi ca trilokyāṃ tvatkīrtimāhuḥ kavayaḥ satīṃ tu 
MSS anicchanto'pi vinayaṃ vidyābhyāsena bālakāḥ 
MSS bheṣajeneva nairujyaṃ prāpaṇīyāḥ prayatnataḥ 
MSS anicchannapi cittena videśastho'pi mānavaḥ 
MSS svakarmotpātavātena nīyate yatra tatphalam 
MSS anijyayā vivāhaiśca vedasyotsādanena ca 
MSS kulānyakulatāṃ yānti dharmasyātikrameṇa ca 
MSS anityaṃ nisrāṇaṃ jananamaraṇavyādhikalitaṃ jaganmithyātvārthairahamahamikāliṅgitamidam 
MSS vicintyaivaṃ santo vimalamanaso dharmamatayas tapaḥ kartuṃ vṛttāstadapasṛtaye jainamanagham 
MSS anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ 
MSS aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyedeṣu na paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS anityatāsamākhyānaṃ viṣayādiviḍambanam 
MSS paścāttāpasya kathanaṃ kālasya caritaṃ tathā 
MSS anityate jagannindye vandanīyāsi saṃprati 
MSS yā karoṣi prasaṅgena duḥkhānāmapyanityatām 
MSS anityatve kṛtamatir mlānamālyena śocati 
MSS nityatve kṛtabuddhistu bhinnabhāṇḍe'nuśocati 
MSS anityamiti jānanto na bhavanti bhavanti ca 
MSS atha yenaiva kurvanti naiva jātu bhavanti te 
MSS anityasya śarīrasya sarvadoṣamayasya ca 
MSS durgandhasya ca rakṣārthaṃ nāhaṃ pāpaṃ karomi vai 
MSS anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ 
MSS nityaṃ saṃnihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ 
MSS anitye priyasaṃvāse saṃsāre cakravadgatau 
MSS pathi saṃgatamevaitad bhrātā mātā pitā sakhā 
MSS anityo vijayo yasmād dṛśyate yudhyamānayoḥ 
MSS parājayaśca saṃgrāme tasmādyuddhaṃ vivarjayet 
MSS anidro duḥsvapnaḥ prapatanamanadri drumataṭaṃ jarāhīnaḥ kampastimirarahitastrāsasamayaḥ 
MSS anāghātaṃ duḥkhaṃ vigatanigaḍo bandhanavidhiḥ sajīvaṃ jantūnāṃ maraṇamavanīśāśrayarasaḥ 
MSS anidhāya mukhe patraṃ pūgaṃ khādati yo naraḥ 
MSS saptajanmadaridratvam ante viṣṇusthitiśca na 
MSS anindā parakṛtyeṣu svadharmaparipālanam 
MSS kṛpaṇeṣu dayālutvaṃ sarvatra madhurā giraḥ 
MSS prāṇairapyupakāritvaṃ mitrāyāvyabhicāriṇe 
MSS gṛhāgate pariṣvaṅgaḥ śaktyā dānaṃ sahiṣṇutā 
MSS bandhubhirbaddhasaṃyogaḥ sujane caturaśratā 
MSS taccittānuvidhāyitvam iti vṛttaṃ mahātmanām 
MSS anindyamapi nindanti stuvantyastutyamuccakaiḥ 
MSS svāpateyakṛte martyāḥ kiṃ kiṃ nāma na kurvate 
MSS anibandhanakacabandhanam anidānaṃ dānamuttarīyasya 
MSS ākasmikamandasmitam apahastayatīva bālyametasyāḥ 
MSS anibhālita eva kevalaṃ khanigarbhe nidhireṣa jīryatu 
MSS na tu sīdatu mūlyahānito vaṇijālokanagocarīkṛtaḥ 
MSS animiṣamavirāmā rāgiṇāṃ sarvarātraṃ navanidhuvanalīlāḥ kautukenātivīkṣya 
MSS idamudavasitānāmasphuṭālokasaṃpan nayanamiva sanidraṃ ghūrṇate daipamarciḥ 
MSS aniyataruditasmitaṃ virājat katipayakomaladantakuḍmalāgram 
MSS vadanakamalakaṃ śiśoḥ smarāmi skhaladasamañjasamugdhajalpitaṃ te 
MSS aniyuktā hi sācivye yadvadanti manīṣiṇaḥ 
MSS anurāgadravasyaitāḥ praṇayasyātibhūmayaḥ 
MSS anirākṛtatāpasaṃpadaṃ phalahīnāṃ sumanobhirujjhitām 
MSS khalatāṃ khalanāmivāsatīṃ pratipadyeta kathaṃ budho janaḥ 
MSS anirīkṣaṇameva dṛṣṭirārdrā parihāsālapanāni maunameva 
MSS avadhīraṇameva cābhiyogo vinigūḍho'pi hi lakṣyate'nurāgaḥ 
MSS anirghātaṃ dhārādharamaśamanīyaṃ nidhirapām akāṭhinyaṃ cintāmaṇimajaḍabhūtaṃ suratarum 
MSS abhittvopādāya prabhurapaśuvṛttiṃ ca surabhiṃ parārthaikasvārthānakṛta puruṣānādipuruṣaḥ 
MSS anirjayena dviṣatāṃ yasyāmarṣaḥ praśāmyati 
MSS puruṣoktiḥ kathaṃ tasmin brūhi tvaṃ hi tapodhana 
MSS kṛtaṃ puruṣaśabdena jātimātrāvalambinā 
MSS yo'ṅgīkṛtaguṇaiḥ ślādhyaḥ savismayamudāhṛtaḥ 
MSS grasamānamivaujāṃsi sadasā gauraveritam 
MSS nāma yasyābhinanadanti dviṣo'pi sa pumānpumān 
MSS anirdayopabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ katham 
MSS kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam 
MSS anirloḍitakāryasya vāgjālaṃ vāgmino vṛthā 
MSS nimittādaparāddheṣor dhānuṣkasyeva valgitam 
MSS anirvācyamanirbhinnam aparicchinnamavyayam 
MSS brahmeva sujanaprema duḥkhamūlanikṛntanam 
MSS anirvṛtaṃ tathā mandaṃ paralokaparāṅmukham 
MSS narakāya na sadgatyaṃ kuputrālambijanma vai 
MSS anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ cañcurme lohasaṃnibhā 
MSS ahorātrāṇi dīrghāṇi samudraḥ kiṃ na śuṣyati 
MSS anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ duḥkhanāśe sukhasya ca 
MSS mahān bhavatyanirviṇṇaḥ sukhaṃ cātyantamaśnute 
MSS anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham 
MSS anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ 
MSS anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ 
MSS karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yacca karoti saḥ 
MSS anila nikhilaviśvaṃ prāṇiti tvatprayuktaṃ sapadi ca vinimīlatyākulaṃ tvadviyogāt 
MSS vapurasi parameśasyācitaṃ nocitaṃ te surabhimasurabhiṃ vā yatsamaṃ svīkaroṣi 
MSS aniśaṃ nayanābhirāmayā ramayā saṃmadino mukhasya te 
MSS niśi niḥsaradindiraṃ kathaṃ tulayāmaḥ kalayāpi paṅkajam 
MSS aniśaṃ mataṅgajānāṃ bṛṃhitamākarṇyate yathā vipine 
MSS manye tathā na jīvati gajendrapalakavalanaḥ siṃhaḥ 
MSS aniśamapi makaraketur manaso rujamāvahannabhimato me 
MSS yadi madirāyatanayanāṃ tāmadhikṛtya praharatīti 
MSS aniścitairadhyavasāyabhīrubhir yatheṣṭasaṃlāparatiprayojanaiḥ 
MSS phale visaṃvādamupāgatā giraḥ prayānti loke parihāsavastutām 
MSS aniṣṭaḥ kanyakāyā yo varo rūpānvito'pi yaḥ 
MSS yadi syāttasya no deyā kanyā śreyo'bhivāñchatā 
MSS aniṣṭadaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ bhūkampaḥ saṃdhyayordvayoḥ 
MSS digdāhaḥ pītavarṇatvād rājñāṃ cāniṣṭadaḥ paraḥ 
MSS aniṣṭayogāt priyaviprayogataḥ parāpamānāddhanahīnajīvitāt 
MSS anekajanmavyasanaprabandhato bibheti no yastapaso bibheti saḥ 
MSS aniṣṭasamprayogācca viprayogātpriyasya ca 
MSS mānuṣā mānasairduḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥ 
MSS aniṣṭādiṣṭalābhe'pi na gatirjāyate śubhā 
MSS yatrāste viṣasaṃsargo'mṛtaṃ tadapi mṛtyave 
MSS aniṣpannāmapi kriyāṃ nayopetāṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ 
MSS phaladāṃ hi prakurvanti mahāsenāpatiryathā 
MSS anīrṣyāḥ śrotāro mama vacasi cedvacmi tadahaṃ svapakṣādbhetavyaṃ bahu na tu viprapakṣāt prabhavataḥ 
MSS tamasyākrāntaśe kiyadapi hi tejovayavinaḥ svaśaktyā bhāsante divasakṛti satyeva na punaḥ 
MSS anīrṣyurguptadāraḥ syāc cokṣaḥ syādaghṛṇī nṛpaḥ 
MSS striyaṃ seveta nātyarthaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ muñjīta nāhitam 
MSS anīrṣyurguptadāraḥ syāt saṃvibhāgī priyaṃvadaḥ 
MSS ślakṣṇo madhuravākstrīṇāṃ na cāsāṃ vaśago bhavet 
MSS anīśāya śarīrasya hṛdayaṃ svavaśaṃ mayi 
MSS stanakampakriyālakṣyair nyastaṃ niḥśvasitairiva 
MSS anīśvaro'yaṃ puruṣo bhavābhave sūtraprotā dārumayīva yoṣā 
MSS dhātrā tu diṣṭasya vaśe kilāyaṃ tasmādvada tvaṃ śravaṇe dhrto'ham 
MSS anukartumapahnotum ativartitumīkṣitum 
MSS aśakye tejasāṃ patyau mitratānumatikṣamā 
MSS anukurutaḥ khalasujanāv agrimapāścātyabhāgayoḥ sūcyāḥ 
MSS vidadhāti randhrameko guṇavānanyastvapidadhāti 
MSS anukūlakalatro yas tasya svarga ihaiva hi 
MSS pratikūlakalatrasya narako nātra saṃśayaḥ 
MSS anukūlamarthyamavirodhi hitaṃ śravaṇīyamāgamarahasyayutam 
MSS vacanaṃ madīyamapakarṇayati kva manobhavaḥ kva guṇasaṃgrahaṇam 
MSS anukūlavarapuraṃdhriṣu puruṣāṇāṃ baddhamūlarāgāṇām 
MSS nayati mano duḥśīlaḥ kusumāstro hīnapātreṣu 
MSS anukūlavidhāyidaivato vijayī syān nanu kīdṛśo nṛpaḥ 
MSS virahiṇyapi jānakī vane nivasantī mudamādadhau kutaḥ 
MSS anukūlāṃ vimalāṅgīṃ kulajāṃ kuśalāṃ suśīlasaṃpannām 
MSS pañcalakārāṃ bhāryāṃ puruṣaḥ puṇyodayāllabhate 
MSS anukūlā sadā tuṣṭā dakṣā sādhvī vicakṣaṇā 
MSS ebhireva guṇairyuktā śrīriva strī na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS anukūle vidhau deyaṃ yataḥ pūrayitā hariḥ 
MSS pratikūle vidhau deyaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ hariṣyati 
MSS anukūle sati dhātari bhavatyaniṣṭādapīṣṭamavilambam 
MSS pītvā viṣamapi śaṃbhur mṛtyuṃjayatāmavāpa tatkālam 
MSS anukṛtagaṇḍaśailamadamaṇḍitagaṇḍataṭa bhramadalimaṇḍalīniviḍaguṅgumaghoṣajuṣaḥ 
MSS dalayati helayaiva harirugrakarānkariṇa strijagati teja eva guru no vikṛtākṛtitā

MSS iyaṃ niyatamarthiṣu pratidinaṃ vitīrṇā ramā jahāti na tavāntikaṃ dvitayametadatyadbhutam 
MSS anugataparitoṣitānujīvī madhuravacāścaritānuraktalokaḥ 
MSS sunipuṇaparamāptasaktatantro bhavati ciraṃ nṛpatiḥ pradīptaraśmiḥ 
MSS anugantuṃ satāṃ vartma kṛtsnaṃ yadi na śakyate 
MSS svalpamapyanugantavyaṃ mārgastho nāvasīdati 
MSS anugamya śmaśānāntaṃ nivartantīha bāndhavāḥ 
MSS agnau prakṣipya puruṣaṃ jñātayaḥ suhṛdastathā 
MSS anugṛhāṇa śiśūnabhilaṅghitā śabaravārivihāravanasthalī 
MSS visṛja kātaratāmidamagrato harini kāruṇikasya tapovanam 
MSS anugrahavidhau devyā mātuśca mahdantaram 
MSS mātā gāḍhaṃ nibadhnāti bandhaṃ devī nikṛntati 
MSS anugrahādeva divaukasāṃ naro nirasya mānuṣyakameti divyatām 
MSS ayovikāre svaritatvamiṣyate kuto'yasāṃ siddharasaspṛśāmapi 
MSS anucarati śaśāṅkaṃ rāhudoṣe'pi tārā patati na vanavṛkṣe yāti bhūmiṃ latā ca

MSS anucitakarmārambhaḥ svajanavirodho balīyasā spardhā 
MSS pramadājanaviśvāso mṛtyordvārāṇi catvāri 
MSS anucitaphalābhilāṣī nityaṃ vidhinā nivāryate puruṣaḥ 
MSS drākṣāvipākasamaye mukhapāko bhavati kākānām 
MSS anucitamucitaṃ vā karma ko'yaṃ vibhāgo bhagavati paramāstāṃ bhaktiyogo draḍhīyān

MSS chinno na cāsya hasto yenāyaṃ durlipiṃ likhati 
MSS anucite yadi karmaṇi yujyate śaṭhadhiyā prabhuṇā saguṇo janaḥ 
MSS bhavati nāsya guṇāpacayastataḥ padagatasya kirīṭamaṇeriva 
MSS anuccanīcacalatām aṅgānāṃ calapādatām 
MSS kaṭikūrparaśīrṣāṃśakarṇānāṃ samarūpatām 
MSS ramyāṃ pratīkaviśrāntim urasaśca samunnatim

MSS anucchiṣṭo devairaparidalito rāhudaśanaiḥ kalaṅkenāspṛṣṭo na khalu paribhūto dinakṛtā

MSS anujjhitasuhṛdbhāvaḥ suhṛdāṃ durhṛdāmapi 
MSS sama ityeva bhāvyo'pi nama ityabhibhāṣyate

MSS anutthāne dhruvo nāśaḥ prāptasyānāgatasya ca

MSS anuyāti na bhartāraṃ yadi daivāt kathaṃcana

MSS anuvanamanuśailaṃ tāmanālokya sītāṃ pratidinamatidīnaṃ vīkṣya rāmaṃ virāmam 
MSS giriraśanimayo'yaṃ yastadā na dvidhābhūt kṣitirapi na vidīrṇā sāpi sarvaṃsahaiva 
MSS anuvādayitā vādyaṃ nṛtyasi yattvayi sureśvaraḥ sākṣāt 
MSS pakṣaśca te'javandyas tadasi kalāpin paraṃ dhanyaḥ 
MSS anuvelaṃ nihanyante yasya sindhorivodyamāḥ 
MSS taṃ pramathya śriyaṃ ko'pi vipakṣo bhūbhṛduddharet 
MSS anuśayavatyevoktā proṣyatpatikā na bhedato bahubhiḥ 
MSS paradeśādāgacchat patikāpi yathā pramuditaiva 
MSS anuśāsaddhi dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa saṃsthayā 
MSS nyāyena ca caturthena caturantāṃ mahīṃ jayet 
MSS anuśīlitakuñjavāṭikāyāṃ jaghanālaṃkṛtapītaśāṭikāyām 
MSS muralīkalakūjite ratāyāṃ mama ceto'stu kadambadevatāyām 
MSS anuśocanamastavicāramanā vigatasya mṛtasya ca yaḥ kurute 
MSS sa gate salile tanute varaṇaṃ bhujagasya gatasya gatiṃ kṣipati 
MSS anuṣṭhānena rahitāṃ pāṭhamātreṇa kevalam 
MSS rañjayatyeva yā lokaṃ kiṃ tayā śukavidyayā 
MSS anuṣṭhitaṃ tu yad devair ṛṣibhiryadanuṣṭhitam 
MSS nānuṣṭheyaṃ manuṣyaistu taduktaṃ karma ācaret 
MSS anuṣṭhiteṣu kāryeṣu yo guhyaṃ na prakāśayet 
MSS sa tatra labhate siddhiṃ jalamadhye kapiryathā 
MSS anusarati karikapolaṃ bhramaraḥ śravaṇena tāḍyamāno'pi 
MSS gaṇayati na tiraskāraṃ dānāndhavilocano nīcaḥ 
MSS anusara sarastīraṃ vairaṃ kimatra sahātmanā katipayapayaḥpāṇam mānin samācara cātaka 
MSS pralayapavanairastaṃ nītaḥ purātanavārido yadayamadayaṃ kīlājālaṃ vimuñcati nūtanaḥ 
MSS anūḍhā mandire yasya rajaḥ prāpnoti kanyakā 
MSS patanti pitaras tasya svargasthā api tairguṇaiḥ 
MSS anūnavegādayamadvitīyaś cchāyāturaṅgādiva lajjamānaḥ 
MSS khuroddhutairvīra turaṅgamaste rajobhirahṇanāṃ patimāvṛṇoti 
MSSA anrjutvamasadbhāvaṃ kārpaṇyaṃ calacittatā 
MSSA puṃsāṃ mitreṣu ye doṣās te veśyāsu guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 
MSS anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣe rājagāmi ca paiśunam 
MSS guroścālīkanirbandhaḥ samāni brahmahatyayā 
MSS anṛtaṃ cāṭuvādaśca dhanayogo mahānayam 
MSS satyaṃ vaiduṣyamityeṣa yogo dāridryakārakaḥ 
MSS anṛtaṃ satyamityāhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam 
MSS iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣairiha 
MSS anṛtaṃ sāhasaṃ māyā mūrkhatvamatilubdhatā 
MSS aśaucatvaṃ nirdayatvaṃ strīṇāṃ doṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ 
MSS anṛtapaṭutā kraurye cittaṃ satāmavamānitā matiravinaye dharme śāṭhyaṃ guruṣvapi vañcanam 
MSS lalitamadhurā vākpratyakṣe parokṣavibhāṣiṇī kaliyugamahārājasyaitāḥ sphuranti vibhūtayaḥ 
MSS anrtamanṛtametadyastudhāsūtirindur niyatamayamanāryo nirgataḥ kālakūṭāt 
MSS hṛdayadahanadakṣā dāruṇā cānyatheyaṃ vada sakhi madhuratve mohaśaktiḥ kuto'sya 
MSS anṛte dharmabhagne ca na śuśrūṣati cāpriye 
MSS na priyaṃ na hitaṃ vācyaṃ sadbhireveti ninditāḥ 
MSS anekagaticitritaṃ vividhajātibhedākulaṃ sametya tanumadgaṇaḥ pracuracitraceṣṭodyataḥ 
MSS purārjitavicitrakarmaphalabhugvicitrāṃ tanuṃ pragṛhya naṭavat sadā bhramati janmaraṅgāṅgaṇe 
MSS anekacittamantraśca dveṣyo bhavati mantriṇām 
MSS anavasthitacittatvāt karye taiḥ samupekṣyate 
MSS anekajanmasaṃbhūtaṃ pāpaṃ puṃsāṃ praṇaśyati 
MSS snānamātreṇa gaṅgāyāṃ sadyaḥ puṇyasya bhājanam 
MSS anekajīvaghātotthaṃ mlecchocchiṣṭaṃ malāvilam 
MSS malāktapātranikṣiptaṃ kiṃ śaucaṃ lihato madhu 
MSS anekadoṣaduṣṭasya kāyasyaiko mahān guṇaḥ 
MSS yo yathā vartayatyenaṃ taṃ tathaivānuvartate 
MSS anekadoṣaduṣṭasya madhuno'pāstadoṣatām 
MSS yo brūte tadrasāsaktaḥ so'satyāmbudhirastadhīḥ 
MSS anekadheti praguṇena cetasā vivicya mithyātvamalaṃ sadūṣaṇam 
MSS vimucya jainendramataṃ sukhāvahaṃ bhajanti bhavyā bhavaduḥkhabhīravaḥ 
MSS anekaparyāyaguṇairupetaṃ vilokyate yena samastatattvam 
MSS tadindriyānindriyabhedabhinnaṃ jñānaṃ jinendrairgaditaṃ hitāya 
MSS anekabhavasaṃcitā iha hi karmaṇā nirmitāḥ priyāpriyaviyogasaṃgamavipattisaṃpattayaḥ 
MSS bhavanti sakalāsvimā gatiṣu sarvadā dehināṃ jarāmaraṇavīcike jananasāgare majjatām 
MSS anekamalasaṃbhave kṛmikulaiḥ sadā saṃkule vicitrabahuvedane budhavinindite duḥsahe 
MSS bhramannayamanārataṃ vyasanasaṃkaṭe dehavān purārjitavaśo bhave bhavati bhāminīgarbhake 
MSS anekamukhapāpātmā chadmasaṃdarśitāśramaḥ 
MSS karburaprakṛtiḥ kaścit kāpeyakalahocitaḥ 
MSSA anekayuddhavijayī saṃdhānaṃyasya gacchati 
MSSA tatpratāpena tasyāśu vaśaṃ gacchanti vidviṣaḥ 
MSS anekarājyāntaritam atikṣiptaṃ na yudhyate 
MSS antargatāmitraśalyam antaḥśalyaṃ hi na kṣamam 
MSS anekavarṇapadatāṃ vāgvidyudiva bibhratī 
MSS abhrānteṣu sadā sārasaṅgiṣu syāt sphuradguṇā 
MSS anekavidvajjanaratnapūrṇaṃ ve dodakanyāyataraṅgaramyam 
MSS alaṅghanīyaṃ gurutīrthamekaṃ sabhāsamudraṃ śirasā namāmi 
MSS anekaśāstraṃ bahu veditavyam alpaśca kālo bahavaśca vighnāḥ 
MSS yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsitavyaṃ haṃso yathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt 
MSS anekasaṃśayocchedi parokṣārthasya darśakam 
MSS sarvasya locanaṃ śāstraṃ yasya nāstyandha eva saḥ 
MSS anekasuṣiraṃ kāntaṃ vādi strīmukhapaṅkajam 
MSS paśya kānte vanasyānte netraśrutimanoramam 
MSS anekasuṣiraṃ vādyaṃ kāntaṃ ca ṛṣisaṃjñitam 
MSS cakriṇā ca sadārādhyaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS aneke phaṇinaḥ santi bhekahbakṣaṇatatparāḥ 
MSS eka eva hi śeṣo'yaṃ dharaṇīdharaṇakṣamaḥ 
MSS anekairnāyakaguṇaiḥ sahitaḥ sakhi me patiḥ 
MSS sa eva yadi jāraḥ syāt saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet 
MSS anena kalyāṇi mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam 
MSS prasādamākāṅkṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate 
MSS anena kasyāpi kulāṅkureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukhaṃ mamaivam 
MSS kāṃ nirvṛtiṃ cetasi tasya kuryād yasyāyamaṅgāt kṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ 
MSS anena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ māṃsasya parivarjanam 
MSS yatpāṭitaṃ tṛṇenāpi svamaṅgaṃ paridūyate 
MSS anena kumbhadvayasaṃniveśa saṃlakṣyamāṇena kucadvayena unmajjatā yauvanavāraṇena vāpīva tanvaṅgi taraṅgitāsi 
MSS anena tanumadyayā mukharanūpurārāviṇā navāmburuhakomalena caraṇena saṃbhāvitaḥ 
MSS aśoka yadi sadya eva kusumairna saṃpatsyase vṛthā vahasi dohadaṃ lalitakāmisādhāraṇam 
MSS anena tava putrasya prasuptasya vanāntare 
MSS śikhāmāruhya hastena khaḍgena nihataṃ śiraḥ 
MSS anena tvaṃ svarūpeṇa puṣpabāṇaiśca pañcabhiḥ 
MSS mohayan puruṣān strīśca kuru sṛṣṭiṃ sanātanīm 
MSS anena dharmaḥ saviśeṣamadya me trivargasāraḥ pratibhāti bhāvini 
MSS tvayā manonirviṣayārthakāmayā yadeka eva pratigṛhya sevyate 
MSS anena puruṣo dehān upādatte vimuñcati 
MSS harṣaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cānena vindati 
MSS anena bhavati śreṣṭho mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ 
MSS kartārameno gacchecca nindyo yatra hi nindyate 
MSS anena martyadehena yallokadvayaśarmadam 
MSS vicintya tadanuṣṭheyaṃ heyaṃ karma tato'nyathā 
MSS anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccin manaso ruciste 
MSS siprātaraṅgānilakampitāsu vihartumudyānaparaṃparāsu 
MSS anena yogarājena dhūpitāmbarabhūṣaṇaḥ 
MSS dhūpitāṅgastribhuvanaṃ manujaḥ kurute vaśam 
MSS anena yogena vivṛddhatejā nijāṃ parasmai padavīmayacchan 
MSS samācarācāramupāttaśastro japopavāsābhiṣavairmunīnām 
MSS anena rambhoru bhavanmukhena tuṣārabhānostulayā jitasya 
MSS ūnasya nūnaṃ paripūraṇāya tārāḥ sphuranti pratimānakhaṇḍāḥ 
MSS anena vītarāgeṇa buddhenevādhareṇa te 
MSS dūti nirvyājamākhyātā sarvavastuṣu śūnyatā 
MSS anena sarvārthikṛtārthitā kṛtā hṛtārthinau kāmagavīsuradrumau 
MSS mithaḥpayaḥsecanapallavāśanaiḥ pradāya dānavyasanaṃ samāpnutam 
MSS anena sārdhaṃ tava yauvanena koṭiṃ parāmacchiduro'dhyarohat 
MSS premāpi tanvi tvayi vāsavasya guṇo'pi cāpe sumanaḥśarasya 
MSS anena sārdhaṃ viharāmburāśes tīreṣu tālīvanamarmareṣu 
MSS dvīpāntarānītalavaṅgapuṣpair apākṛtasvedalavā marudbhiḥ 
MSS anena sidhyati hyetanmamāpyeṣa parākramaḥ 
MSS evaṃ jñātvā caredyastu saphalāstasya buddhayaḥ 
MSS anenaiva prakāreṇa trayo grīvāśritāḥ śubhāḥ 
MSS lalāṭe yugalāvartau candrārkau śubhakārakau 
MSS anaiśvarye tṛṣā bhāryā pathi kṣetre tridhā kṛṣiḥ 
MSS lambakaḥ sākṣiṇaścaiva pañcānarthā asaṃkṛtāḥ 
MSS anaucityādṛte nānyad rasabhaṅgasya kāraṇam 
MSS prasiddhaucityabandhastu rasasyopaniṣat parā 
MSS anaucityena kanyāsu purastrīṣu ca yā ratiḥ 
MSS sa kāmo hi kṣitīndrāṇām ariṣaḍvargapūrvajaḥ 
MSS antaḥkaṭurapi laghurapi sadvṛttaṃ yaḥ pumān na saṃtyajati 
MSS sa bhavati sadyo vandyaḥ sarṣapa iva sarvalokasya 
MSS antaḥkaṭu sadā prema mānuṣaṃ parilakṣyate 
MSS hatāśān na karotyasmān daivapremaiva kevalam 
MSS antaḥkapālavivare jihvāmākuñcya cārpayet 
MSS bhrūmadhyadṛṣṭiramṛtaṃ pibet khecaramudrayā 
MSS antaḥkaraṇatattvasya dampatyoḥ snehasaṃśrayāt 
MSS ānandagranthireko'yam apatyamiti kathyate 
MSS antaḥkaraṇavikāraṃ guruparijanasaṃkaṭe'pi kulaṭānām 
MSS jānanti tadabhiyuktā bhrūbhaṅgāpāṅgamadhuradṛṣṭena 
MSS antaḥkaraṇaśūnyo'pi tṛṇapūlakapūruṣaḥ satkṛtaḥ kṣetrapatinā samartho mṛgavārane 
MSS antaḥ kiṃcit kiṃcin muktānāmahaha vibhramaṃ vahasi 
MSS dūrāddarśayasi punaḥ kṣārodgāraṃ jaḍādhīśaḥ 
MSS antaḥ kuṭilatāṃ bibhrac chaṅkhaḥ sa khalu niṣṭhuraḥ 
MSS huṃkaroti yadā dhmātas tadaiva bahu gaṇyatām 
MSS antaḥkūjadudārakaṇṭhamasakṛnmuñceti lolekṣaṇaṃ prāyaḥ smerakapolamūlamamṛtaprasyandi bimbādharam 
MSS ādhūtāṅgulipallavāgramalamityānartitabhrūlataṃ pītaṃ yena mukhaṃ tvadīyamabale so'haṃ hi dhanyo yuvā 
MSSA antaḥ kecana kecanāpi hi dale kecit tathā pallave mūle kecana kecana tvaci phale puṣpe ca ke'pi drumāḥ 
MSSA saurabhyaṃ nitarāṃ bibhartyavikalaḥ śrīkhaṇḍaṣaṇḍīkṛtaḥ sarvāṅge surabhirna ko'pi dadṛśe muktvā bhavantaṃ kvacit 
MSS antaḥkopakaṣāyite'pi hṛdaye sādhorasacceṣṭitair bhadrāṇyeva bahiḥ kriyāsu vacanānyāvirbhavantyarthataḥ 
MSS madhye'tyantakarālavāḍavaśikhāśoṣe'pi vārāṃnidheḥ kallolāḥ prakaṭībhavanti satataṃ muktāphalodgāriṇaḥ 
MSS antaḥkrūrāḥ saumyamukhā agādhahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS antarviṣā bahiḥsaumyā bhakṣyā viṣakṛtā iva 
MSS antaḥ krodhojjihānajvalanabhavaśikhākārajihvāvalīḍha prauḍhabrahmāṇḍabhāṇḍaḥ pṛthubhuvanaguhāgarbhagambhīranādaḥ

MSS antaḥkhedamivodvahan yadaniśaṃ ratnākaro ghūrṇate yacca dhyānamivāsthito na kanakakṣoṇīdharaḥ syandate

MSS antaḥpuracaraiḥ sārdhaṃ yo na mantraṃ samācaret 
MSS na kalatrairnarendrasya sa bhaved rājavallabhaḥ 
MSS antaḥpuradhanādhyakṣair vairidūtairnirākṛtaiḥ 
MSS saṃsargaṃ na vrajed rājam vinā pārthivaśāsanāt 
MSS antaḥpurāṇāṃ vihitavyavasthaḥ pade pade'haṃ skhalitāni rakṣan 
MSS jarāturaḥ saṃprati daṇḍanītyā sarvaṃ nṛpasyānukaromi vṛttam 
MSS antaḥpurīyasi raṇeṣu sutīyasi tvaṃ pauraṃ janaṃ tava sadā ramaṇīyate śrīḥ 
MSS dṛṣṭaḥ priyābhiramṛtadyutidarśamindra saṃcāramatra bhuvi saṃcarasi kṣitīśa 
MSS antaḥpure pitṛtulyaṃ mātṛtulyaṃ mahānase 
MSS goṣu cātmasamaṃ dadyāt svayameva kṛṣiṃ vrajet 
MSS antaḥprakāśamicchantaḥ sadasacca vivecitum 
MSS snehaṃ sūktipradīpe'smin vardhayantu subuddhayaḥ 
MSS antaḥprataptamarusaikatadahyamāna mūlasya campakataroḥ kva vikāsacintā 
MSS prāyo bhavatyanucitasthitideśabhājāṃ śreyaḥ svajīvaparipālanamātrameva 
MSS antaḥ praviśya yuvacihnamuro'balānāṃ yena krameṇa bata loḍayate manīṣin 
MSS āśritya taṃ hi niyamaṃ tata unnayete etau kucau sapadi hanti vidīrṇamadhyāt 
MSS antaḥśarīrapariśoṣamudagrayantaḥ kīṭakṣatasrutibhirasramivodvamantaḥ 
MSS chāyāviyogamalinā vyasane nimagnā vṛkṣāḥ śmaśānamupagantumiva pravṛttāḥ 
MSS antaḥsaṃtoṣacittānāṃ saṃpadasti pade pade 
MSS antarmalinacittānāṃ sukhaṃ svapne'pi durlabham 
MSS antaḥsaṃtoṣavāṣpaiḥ sthagayati na dṛśastābhirākarṇayiṣyann aṅgenānastiromā racayati pulakaśreṇimānandakandām 
MSS na kṣoṇībhaṅgabhīruḥ kalayati ca śiraḥkampanaṃ tanna vidmaḥ śṛṇvannetasya kīrtīḥ kathamuragapatiḥ prītimāviṣkaroti 
MSS antaḥsamutthavirahānalatīvratāpa saṃtāpitāṅga karipuṅgava muñca śokam 
MSS dhātrā svahastalikhitāni lalāṭapaṭṭe ko vākṣarāṇi parimārjayituṃ samarthaḥ 
MSS antaḥ sametyāpi bahiḥ prayāti spṛṣṭā vidhatte tvavagūhanāni 
MSS dattvādharaṃ roditi śuṣkameva saivaṃ vilāsaistapasāpyalabhyā 
MSS antaḥsāravihīnānāṃ sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati 
MSS malaye'pi sthito veṇur veṇureva na candanaḥ 
MSS antaḥsāravihīnānām upadeśo na jāyate 
MSS malayācalasaṃsargān na veṇuścandanāyate 
MSS antaḥsārairakuṭilais susnigdhaiḥ suparīkṣitaiḥ 
MSS mantribhirdhāryate rājyaṃ sustambhairiva mandiram 
MSS antaḥsāro'pi niryāti nūnamarthitayā saha 
MSS anyathā tadavasthasya mahimā kena dehinām 
MSS antaḥsthasuratārambhā bhilāṣamapi gopayat 
MSS anyonyaṃ mithunaṃ vetti netre dṛṣṭvaiva cañcale 
MSS antaḥsthenāviruddhena suvṛttenāticāruṇā 
MSS antarbhinnena saṃprāptaṃ mauktikenāpi bandhanam 
MSS antaḥsvīkṛtajāhnavījalamatisvacchandaratnāṃkura śreṇīśoṇabhujaṅganāyakaphaṇācakrollasatpallavam 
MSS bhūyādabhyudayāya mokṣanagaraprasthānabhājāmitaḥ pratyūhapraśamaikapūrṇakalaśaprāyaṃ śiro dhūrjaṭeḥ 
MSS antakaḥ paryavasthātā janminaḥ saṃtatāpadaḥ 
MSS iti tyājye bhave bhavyo muktāvruttiṣṭhate janaḥ 
MSS antakaḥ śamano mṛtyuḥ pātālaṃ vaḍavāmukham 
MSS kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ 
MSS antakāya dadatā tvayā priyā kāyakāncanalatāpratigraham 
MSS dīyate bata madīyajīvanaṃ dakṣiṇānila kuto na dakṣiṇā 
MSS antakāle ca māmeva smaranmuktvā kalevaram 
MSS yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ 
MSS antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyantīti purāśrutiḥ 
MSS rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā 
MSS antako'pi hi jantūnām antakālamapekṣate 
MSS na kālaniyamaḥ kaścid uttamarṇasya vidyate 
MSS antaraṃ kiyadākhyānti santo raghukirātayoḥ 
MSS antaraṃ tāvadākhyānti santo raghukirātayoḥ 
MSS antaraṅgamanaṅgasya śṛṅgārakuladaivatam 
MSS aṅgīkaroti tanvaṅgī sā vilāsamayaṃ vayaḥ 
MSS antaraṅgā hi ye rājñaḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ 
MSS bhṛtyā bhavanti prāyeṇa tebhyo rakṣedimāḥ prajāḥ 
MSS antarāyatimiropaśāntaye śāntapāvanamacintyavaibhavam 
MSS taṃ naraṃ vapuṣi kuñjaraṃ mukhe manmahe kimapi tundilaṃ mahaḥ 
MSS antargatamalo duṣṭas tīrthasnānaśatairapi 
MSS na śudhyati yathā bhāṇḍaṃ surāyā dāhitaṃ ca sat 
MSS antargatā madanavahniśikhāvalī yā sā bāghyate kimiha candanapaṅkalepaiḥ 
MSS yatkumbhakārapacanopari paṅkalepas tāpāya kevalamasau na ca tāpaśāntyai 
MSS antargatairguṇaiḥ kiṃ dvitrā api yatra sākṣiṇo viralāḥ

MSS annādiviṣṭhāpiśitādibhiryaḥ pūrṇānano'bhīṣṭaphalaprado'sau 
MSS mantrādisiddhyai vaṇigādilābhe śasto vivāhādividhau ca kākaḥ 
MSS annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi annena abhiśaṃsati 
MSS stenaḥ pramukto rājani yācannanṛtasaṃkare 
MSS annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi patyau bhāryāpacāriṇī 
MSS gurau śiṣyaśca yājyaśca steno rājani kilbiṣam 
MSS annādbhavanti bhūtāni parjanyādannasaṃbhavaḥ 
MSS yajñād bhavati parjanyo yajñaḥ karmasamudbhavaḥ 
MSS annādraktaṃ ca śuklaṃ cāpy ato jīvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ 
MSS indriyāṇi ca buddhiśca tṛpyantyannena nityaśaḥ 
MSS annābhāve mṛtyuḥ śālibhirannāni śālayo vṛṣṭyā 
MSS vṛṣṭistapaseti vadann amṛtyave tattapaścaratu 
MSS annāśane syāt paramāṇumātraḥ praśakyate śodhayituṃ tapobhiḥ 
MSS māṃsāśane parvatarājamātro no śakyate śodhayituṃ mahattvāt 
MSS annena dhāryate sarvaṃ jagadetaccarācaram 
MSS annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nāsti saṃśayaḥ 
MSS anne pāne ca tāmbūle phale puṣpe vibhūṣaṇe 
MSS vastre vilepane dhūpe śayyāyāmāsaneṣu ca 
MSS anyaṃ kānanamāśu gaccha tarasā vanyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva re dhanyaṃ dhāma vibhāti te na hi tathā puṇyaṃ jaghanyaṃ kuru 
MSS etasminkariśāva mā vraja vane jalpāmi tathyaṃ vaco jānāsyeva karīndradarpadalano nidrāti pañcānanaḥ 
MSS anyaṃ manuṣyaṃ hṛdayena kṛtvā anyaṃ tato dṛṣṭibhirāhvayanti 
MSS anyatra muñcanti madaprasekam anyaṃ śarīreṇa ca kāmayante 
MSS anyaḥ kaḥ kṣāravārdhe tvamiva niyamito vānarairvā narairvā vipreṇaikena ko'nyaḥ karakuharapuṭīpātramātre nipītaḥ 
MSS jalpannitthaṃ pṛthūrmighvanibhiravataratphenakūṭāṭṭahāsaiḥ spardhāṃ dhatte payodheradhikamadhipuraṃ nirmito yattaṭākaḥ 
MSS anyaḥ karoti vyāpāraṃ lipto bhavati lekhakaḥ 
MSS bhagaliṅgaprasaṅgena chinnā bhavati nāsikā 
MSS anyaḥ ko'pi sa kumbhasaṃbhavamunerāstāṃ śikhī jāṭharo yaṃ saṃcintya dukūlavahnisadṛśaḥ saṃlakṣyate vāḍavaḥ 
MSS vandyaṃ tajjaṭharaṃ sa mīnamakaragrāhāvalistoyadhiḥ paścātpārśvamapūritāntaraviyadyatra svanan bhrāmyati 
MSS anya ityanupajātayantraṇaṃ drāgudañcitavatī vilocanam 
MSS māmavetya cakitā vṛtānanā dantadaṣṭarasanā manāgabhūt 
MSS anyakarmavimūḍho ya ātmakarmaviśāradaḥ 
MSS yathā paśya na jānāti stanapānetaracchiśuḥ 
MSS anyakālaparihāryamajasraṃ taddvayena vidadhe dvayameva 
MSS dhṛṣṭatā rahasi bhartṛṣu tābhir nirdayatvamitarairabalāsu 
MSS anyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puṇyakṣetre vinaśyati 
MSS puṇyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ vajralepo bhaviṣyati 
MSS anyato naya muhūrtamānanaṃ candra eṣa sarale kalāmayaḥ 
MSS mā kadācana kapolayormalaṃ saṃkramayya samatāṃ sa neṣyati 
MSS anyato yadi nijopacikīrṣā mānahāniriti bhītiranītiḥ 
MSS śrīdharo'pi hi bale śriyamicchan mānamātanuta vāmanameva 
MSS anyatkṛtyaṃ manujaś cintayati divāniśaṃ viśuddhadhiyā 
MSS vedhā vidadhātyanyat svāmīva na śakyate dhartum 
MSS anyatra deśe ghaṭitā jaganti grasiṣyate viśvasṛjeti matvā 
MSS saṃkocayitvā kimu pādamūla dvayāntarāle nihitāsti yoniḥ 
MSS anyatra bhīṣmād gāṅgeyād anyatra ca hanūmataḥ 
MSS hariṇīkhuramātreṇa carmaṇā mohitaṃ jagat 
MSS anyatra yāpitaniśaṃ parilohitāṅgam anyāṅganāgatamivāgatamuṣṇaraśmim 
MSS prātarnirīkṣya kupiteva hi padminīyam utphullahallakasulohitalocanābhūt 
MSS anyatra yūyaṃ kusumāvacāyaṃ kurudhvamatrāsmi karomi sakhyaḥ 
MSS nāhaṃ hi dūraṃ bhramituṃ samarthā prasīdatāyaṃ racito'ñjalirvaḥ 
MSS anyatra vrajatīti kā khalu kathā nāpyasya tādṛk suhṛd yo māṃ necchati nāgataśca hahahā ko'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ 
MSS ityalpetarakalpanākavalitasvāntā niśāntāntare bālā vṛttavivartanavyatikarā nāpnoti nidrāṃ niśi 
MSS anyathā cintitā hyarthā naraistāta manasvibhiḥ 
MSS anyathaiva hi gacchanti daivāditi matirmama 
MSS anyathā paridṛṣṭāni munibhirvedadarśibhiḥ 
MSS anyathā parivartante vegā iva nabhasvataḥ 
MSS anyathāliṅgyate kāntā bhāvena duhitānyathā 
MSS manaso bhidyate vṛttir abhinneṣvapi vastuṣu 
MSS anyathā varttamānānām arthī bhūto'yamanyathā 
MSS asmābhiryadanuṣṭheyaṃ gandharvaistadanuṣṭhitam 
MSS anyathā vedaśāstrāṇi jñānapāṇḍityamanyathā 
MSS anyathā tatpadaṃ śāntaṃ lokāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā 
MSS anyathā śāstragarbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīro'rthamīhate 
MSS svāmīva prāktanaṃ karma vidadhāti tadanyathā 
MSS anyathaiva vicintyante puruṣeṇa manorathāḥ 
MSS daivenāhitasadbhāvāḥ karmaṇāṃ gatayo'nyathā 
MSS anyathaivasatī putraṃ cintayedanyathā patim 
MSS yathā yathā svabhāvasya mahābhāga udāhṛtam 
MSS anyathaiva hi manyante puruṣāstāni tāni ca 
MSS anyathaiva prabhustāni karoti vikaroti ca 
MSS anyathaiva hi sauhārdaṃ bhavetsvacchāntarātmanaḥ 
MSS pravartate'nyathā vāṇī śāṭhyopahatacetasaḥ 
MSS anyadasmi bhavatīṃ na yācitā vāramekamadharaṃ dhayāmi te 
MSS ityasisvadadupāṃśukākuvāk sopamardahaṭhavṛttireva tam 
MSS anyadābhāṣitaṃ pūrvaṃ dattamanyattato'lpakam 
MSS yatsadoṣamayogyaṃ vā kūṭadānena tena kim 
MSS anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjeva yoṣitaḥ 
MSS parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyaṃ surateṣviva 
MSS anyadīyamavicintya pātaka nirghṛṇo harati jīvitopamam 
MSS dravymatra kitavo vicetanas tena gacchati kadarthanāṃ ciram 
MSS anyaduḥkhena yo duḥkhī yo'nyaharṣeṇa harṣataḥ 
MSS sa eva jagatāmīśo nararūpadharo hariḥ 
MSS anyaducchṛṅkhalaṃ sattvam anyacchāstraniyantritam 
MSS sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hi tejastimirayoḥ kutaḥ 
MSS anyaduptaṃ jātamanyad ityetannopapadyate 
MSS upyate yaddhi yadbījaṃ tattadeva prarohati 
MSS anyadoṣamiva sa svakaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayet kathamadhṛṣṭatājaḍaḥ 
MSS ucyate sa khalu kāryavattayā dhigvabhinnabudhasetumarthitām 
MSS anyadgopucchakaṃ jñeyaṃ śuddhakāṣṭhavinirmitam 
MSS mukhe ca lohakaṇṭhena vedhyaṃ tryaṅgulasaṃmitam 
MSS anyapūrvāṃ striyaṃ sādhvīṃ kāmayeta na garvataḥ 
MSS sādhvīricchan mahādevaḥ ṣaṇḍo'bhūddārukāvane 
MSS anyapratāpamāsādya yo dṛḍhatvaṃ na gacchati 
MSS jātuṣābharaṇasyeva rūpeṇāpi hi tasya kim 
MSS anyamāśrayate lakṣmīs tvanyamanyaṃ ca medinī 
MSS ananyagāminī puṃsāṃ kīrtirekā pativratā 
MSS anyayānyavanitāgatacittaṃ cittanāthamabhiśaṅkitavatyā 
MSS pītabhūrisurayāpi na mede nirvṛtirhi manaso madahetuḥ 
MSS anyayā yauvane martyo buddhyā bhavati mohitaḥ 
MSS madhye'nyayā jarāyāṃtu so'nyāṃ rocayate matim 
MSS anyavarṇaṃ śiro yasya pucchaṃ vā yasya vājinaḥ 
MSS pucchena śirasā vāpi nānāvarṇaḥ sa ninditaḥ 
MSS anyavarṇaparāvṛttyā bandhacihnanigūhanaiḥ 
MSS anākhyātaḥ satāṃ madhye kaviścoro vibhāvyate 
MSS anyastrīspṛhayālavo jagati ke padbhyāmagamyā ca kā ko dhāturdaśane samastamanujaiḥ kā prārthyate'harniśam 
MSS dṛṣṭvaikāṃ yavaneśvaro nijapure padmānanāṃ kāminīṃ mitraṃ prāha kimādareṇa sahasā yārānadīdaṃśamā 
MSS anyasmāllabdhoṣmā kśudraḥ prāyeṇa duḥsaho bhavati 
MSS ravirapi na dahati tādṛg yādṛghyuttaptavālukānikaraḥ 
MSS anyasminnapi kāle dayitāvirahaḥ karoti saṃtāpam 
MSS kiṃ punaraviralajaladhara gurutararasiteṣu divaseṣu 
MSS anyasmin preṣyamāṇe tu purastādyaḥ samutpatet 
MSS ahaṃ kiṃ karavāṇīti sa rājavasatiṃ vaset 
MSS anyasya lagati karṇe jīvitamanyasya harati bāṇa iva 
MSS hṛdayaṃ dunoti piśunaḥ kaṇṭaka iva pādalagno'pi 
MSS anyasyai saṃpratīyaṃ kuru madanaripo svāṅgadānaprasādaṃ nāhaṃ soḍhuṃ samarthā śirasi suranadīṃ nāpi saṃdhyāṃ praṇantum 
MSS ityuktvā kopaviddhāṃ vighaṭayitumumāmātmadehaṃ pravṛttāṃ rundhānaḥ pātu śambhoḥ kucakalasahaṭhasparśakṛṣṭo bhujo vaḥ 
MSS anyāṅganābhiradhikaṃ sa karoti keliṃ tvaṃ tena mā kuru viṣādamadabhrarūpe 
MSS pepīyate madhukaraḥ kva na taṃ marandaṃ no jātu vismarati paṅkajinīṃ tathāpi 
MSS anyā jagaddhitamayī manasaḥ pravṛttir anyaiva kāpi racanā vacanāvalīnām 
MSS lokottarā ca kṛṭirākṛtirārtahṛdyā vidyāvatāṃ sakalameva girāṃ davīyaḥ 
MSS anyādānākulāntaḥkaraṇavaśavipadbādhitapretaraṅkaṃ grāsabhraśyatkarālaślathapiśitaśavāgragrahe muktanādam 
MSS sarvaiḥ krāmadbhirulkānanakavalarasavyāttavaktraprabhābhir vyaktaistaiḥ saṃvaladbhiḥ kṣaṇamaparamiva vyomni vṛttaṃ śmaśānam 
MSS anyānapi tarūn ropya phalapuṣpopayoginaḥ 
MSS ratnadhenusahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ 
MSS anyā nirarthikā cintā balatejaḥpraṇāśinī 
MSS nāśayet sarvasaukhyaṃ tu rūpahāniṃ nidarśayet 
MSS anyāni śāstrāṇi vinodamātraṃ prāpteṣu vā teṣu na taiśca kiṃcit 
MSS cikitsitajyotiṣamantravādāḥ pade pade pratyayamāvahanti 
MSS anyāni śāstrāṇi vinodamātraṃ prāpteṣu kāleṣu na taiśca kiṃcit 
MSS cikitsitajyotiṣamantravādāḥ pade pade pratyayamāvahanti 
MSS anyānparivadan sādhur yathā hi paritapyate 
MSS tathā parivadannanyāṃs tuṣṭo bhavati durjanaḥ 
MSS anyānyopamitaṃ yugaṃ nirupamaṃ te'yugmamaṅgeṣu yat so'yaṃ sikthakamāsyakāntimadhunastanvaṅgi candrastava 
MSS tvadvācāṃ svaramātrikāṃ madakalaḥ puṃskokilo ghoṣayaty abhyāsasya kimastyagocaramiti pratyāśayā mohitaḥ 
MSS anyā prakāmasurataśramakhinnadehā rātriprajāgaravipāṭalanetrapadmā 
MSS śayyāntadeśalulitākulakeśapāśā nidrāṃ prayāti mṛdusūryakarābhitaptā 
MSS anyā priyeṇa paribhuktamavekṣya gātraṃ harṣānvitā viracitādharacāruśobhā 
MSS kūrpāsakaṃ paridadhāti nakhakṣatāṅgī vyālambinīlalalitālakakuñcitākṣī 
MSS anyābhyo vanyābhyo mālati dhanyāsi vallarībhyastvam 
MSS yat kila tavaiva savidhe krīḍati madhupaḥ sadaiva mudito'yam 
MSS anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥ 
MSS asaṃtuṣṭāḥ pramuhyanti saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ 
MSS anyāyaḥ prauḍhavādena nīyate nyāyatāṃ yayā 
MSS nyāyaścānyāyatāṃ lobhāt kiṃ tayā kṣudravidyayā 
MSS anyāyakarabhogaiśca yo hi jīvati nityaśaḥ 
MSS virāgādeva lokānāṃ bhraṃśate sa hi pārthivaḥ 
MSS anyāyadraviṇādāneṣv udyamaḥ kriyate vṛthā 
MSS lubdhānāṃ satyasaṃkocāt saṃkucantyeva saṃpadaḥ 
MSS anyāyavittena kṛto'pi dharmaḥ savyāja ityāhuraśeṣalokāḥ 
MSS nyāyārjitārthena sa eva dharmo nirvyāja ityāryajanā vadanti 
MSS anyāyasamupāttena dānadharmo dhanena yaḥ 
MSS kriyate na sa kartāraṃ trāyate mahato bhayāt 
MSS anyā yā vasanottamaṃ tadadhunā saṃgṛhya mānyaṃ punar yanmāṃ darśayasi priyaṃ priyatamaṃ toṣāya roṣāya no 
MSS sarvasaiva sataśca rītiriyatī pūrvaṃ śrutā vṛddhataḥ prāyaḥ prāpya nijaprakarṣamakhilaṃ mitraṃ mudādarśayat 
MSS anyāyopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ daśavarṣāṇi tiṣṭhati 
MSS prāpte caikādaśe varṣe samūlaṃ ca vinaśyati 
MSS anyāyopārjitaṃ dravyam arthadūṣaṇamucyate 
MSS apātradānaṃ pātrārtha haraṇaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam 
MSS anyārthamaṅgīkṛtavāripāṇau viśaṅkamānāstava dānanīram 
MSS parasparaṃ dīnamukhā na ke vā devāḥ sumeruṃ śuśucuḥ svabhūmim 
MSS anyā vihāya patigṛha mavicintitakulakalaṅkajanagarhāḥ 
MSS rāgoparaktahṛdayā yānti digantaṃ manuṣyā āsajya 
MSS anyāściraṃ suratakelipariśrameṇa khedaṃ gatāḥ praśithilīkṛtagātrayaṣṭyaḥ 
MSS saṃhṛṣyamāṇavipulorupayodharārtā abhyañjanaṃ vidadhati pramadāḥ suśobhāḥ 
MSS anyāsāṃ na kimasti veśmani vadhūḥ kaivaṃ niśi prāvṛṣi praiti prāntataḍāgamamba gṛhiṇi svasthāsi me'vasthayā 
MSS bhagno'yaṃ valayo ghaṭo vighaṭitaḥ kṣaṇṇā tanuḥ kaṇṭakair ākrāntaḥ sa tathā bhujaṅgahatakaḥ kaṣṭaṃ na yaddaṣṭavān 
MSS anyā sādhigatā tvayā kva yuvatī yasyāḥ sa mānagraho yāte locanagocaraṃ priyatame saṃpratyapakrāmati 
MSS asmākaṃ punarugrapūruṣaśatāśleṣapragalbhātmanām etādṛśyanabhijñapūruṣapariṣvaṅge kutaḥ sādhvasam 
MSS anyā sā sarasī marāla munibhiryattīrasopānikā vinyastān balitaṇḍulān kavalayan dṛṣṭo'si hṛdyairmukhaiḥ 
MSS eṣā pakkaṇavāpikā kamalinīkhaṇḍe'tra guptātmabhir vyādhaistvadvidhamugdhabandhanavidhau kiṃ nāma nāsūtryate 
MSS anyāsu tāvadupamardasahāsu bhṛṅga lolaṃ vinodaya manaḥ sumanolatāsu 
MSS mughdāmajātarajasaṃ kalikāmakāle vyarthaṃ kadarthayasi kiṃ navamallikāyāḥ 
MSS anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā saṃbhārāḥ khalu te'nya eva vidhinā yaireṣa sṛṣṭo yuvā 
MSS śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca 
MSS anyāstā malayādrikānanabhuvaḥ svacchasravannirjjharās tṛṣṇā yāsu nivartate tanubhṛtāmālokamātrādapi 
MSS rūkṣadhvāṅkṣaparigraho marurayaṃ sphārībhavadbhrāntayaḥ tā etā mṛgatṛṣṇikā hariṇa he nedaṃ payo gamyatām 
MSS anyūnaṃ guṇamamṛtasya dhārayantī saṃphullasphuritasaroruhāvataṃsā 
MSS preyobhiḥ saha sarasī niṣevyamāṇā raktatvaṃ vyadhita vadhūdṛśaṃ surā ca 
MSS anyūnonnatayo'timātrapṛthavaḥ pṛthvīdharaśrībhṛtas tanvantaḥ kanakāvalībhirupamāṃ saudāmanīdāmabhiḥ 
MSS varṣantaḥ śamamānayannupalasacchṛṅgāralekhāyudhāḥ kāle kāliyakāyakālavapuṣaḥ pāṃsūn gajāmbhomucaḥ 
MSS anye ca bahavo rāgā jātā deśaviśeṣataḥ 
MSS mārūprabhṛtayo loke te ca tad deśikāḥ smṛtāḥ 
MSS anye cet prākṛtā lokā bahupāpāni kurvate 
MSS pradhānapuruṣeṇāpi kāryaṃ tatpṛṣṭhato nu kim 
MSS anye te jaladāyino jaladharāstṛṣṇāṃ vinighnanti ye bhrātaścātaka kiṃ vṛthātiraṭitaiḥ khinno'si viśrāmyatām 
MSS meghaḥ śārada eṣa kāśadhavalaḥ pānīyariktodaro garjatyeva hi kevalaṃ bhṛśataraṃ no bindumapyujjhati 
MSS anye te vihagāḥ payoda parito dhāvanti tṛṣṇāturā vāpīkūpataḍāgasāgarajale majjanti dattādarāḥ 
MSS māmadyāpi na vetsi cātakaśiśuṃ yacchuṣkakaṇṭho'pi san nānyaṃ vāñchati nopasarpati na ca prastauti na dhyāyati 
MSS anye te sumanolihaḥ prahasadapyambhojamujjhanti ye vātāndolanakelicañcaladalaprāntairapi trāsitāḥ 
MSS anyaḥ ko'pi sa eṣa ṣaṭpadabhaṭaḥ saṃsahya karṇāhatīr yenānekapagaṇḍagaṇḍalamiladdānāmbuni krīḍitam 
MSS anyenāpi svamāṃsena chidyamānena dūyate 
MSS tathāpi paramāṃsāni svādūnīti samaśnute 
MSS anye'pi santi guṇinaḥ kati no jagatyāṃ hāra tvameva guṇināmuparisthito'si 
MSS eṇīdṛśāmurasi nityamavasthito'si sadvṛttatā ca śucitā ca na khaṇḍitā te 
MSS anye'pi santi bata tāmarasāvataṃsā haṃsāvalīvalayino jalasaṃniveśāḥ 
MSS ko'pyāgraho gururayaṃ bata cātakasya pauraṃdarīṃ yadabhivāñchati vāridhārām 
MSS anyeyaṃ rūpasaṃpattir anyā vaidagdhyadhoraṇī 
MSS naiṣā nalinapatrākṣī sṛṣṭiḥ sādhāraṇī vidheḥ 
MSS anyeṣāṃ yo na pāpāni cintayatyātmano yathā 
MSS tasya pāpāgamastāta hetvabhāvānna vidyate 
MSS karmaṇā manasā vācā parapīḍāṃ karoti yaḥ 
MSS tadbījaṃ janma phalati prabhūtaṃ tasya cāśubham 
MSS anyeṣāmapi naśyanti suhṛdaśca dhanāni ca 
MSS paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇāṃ rājannāpadamātmanaḥ 
MSS anyeṣvarthakṛtā maitrī yāvadarthaviḍambanam 
MSS puṃbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsviva ṣaṭpadaiḥ 
MSS anye hi duḥkhamṛtavaḥ prathayantyahobhiḥ sūryāṃśuluptatimirairabhisārikāṇām 
MSS hemanta eṣa himaruddhasahasradhāmā kāmaṃ karoti divaseṣvapi śarma tāsām 
MSS anyaiḥ sākaṃ virodhena vayaṃ pañcottaraṃ śatam 
MSS parasparavirodhena vayaṃ pañca ca te śatam 
MSS anyocchiṣṭeṣu pātreṣu bhuktvaiteṣu mahībhujaḥ 
MSS kasmānna lajjāmavahañ śaucacintāṃ na vā dadhuḥ 
MSS anyo dhanaṃ pretagatasya bhuṅkte vayāṃsi cāgniśca śarīradhātūn 
MSS dvābhyāmayaṃ saha gacchatyamutra puṇyena pāpena ca veṣṭyamānaḥ 
MSS anyonyaṃ kṛtavairāṇāṃ putrapautraṃ nigacchati 
MSS putrapautre vinaṣṭe tu paralokaṃ nigacchati 
MSS anyonyaṃ daśanacchadeṣu daśatoranyonyamāliṅgator anyonyaṃ nakharaiḥ kharairvilikhatoranyonyamācumbatoḥ 
MSS autsukyena navaṃ navaṃ nidhuvanaprāgalbhyamabhyasyatoḥ śrānte pañcaśare'pi na praṇayinoḥ prāpto'pakarṣaṃ rasaḥ 
MSS anyonyaṃ matimāsthāya yatra sampratibhāṣyate 
MSS na caikamatye śreyosti mantraḥ so'dhama ucyate 
MSS anyonyakṛtavairāṇāṃ saṃvāsānmṛdutāṃ gatam 
MSS nava tiṣṭhati tadvaraṃ puṣkarasthamivodakam 
MSS anyonyagūḍhaceṣṭita sadbhāvasnehapāśabaddhasya 
MSS vicchedakaro mṛtyur dhīrāṇāṃ vā paricchedaḥ 
MSS anyonyagopyaṃ viduṣāṃ tu lakṣaṃ yadasya tulyāḥ prabhavo bhavanti 
MSS parasparāliṅganatatparāṇāṃ na kānta saukhyaṃ yuvatījanānām 
MSS anyonyagrathitāruṇāṅgulinamatpāṇidvayasyopari nyasyocchavāsavikampitādharadalaṃ nirvedaśūnyaṃ mukham 
MSS āmīlannayanāntavāntasalilaṃ ślādhyasya nindyasya vā kasyedaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ pratidinaṃ dīnaṃ tvayā smaryate 
MSS anyonyadarśanakṛtaḥ samānarūpānurāgakulavayasām 
MSS keṣāṃcideva manye samāgamo bhavati puṇyavatām 
MSS anyonyaprakaṭānurāgarabhasādudbhūtaromāñcayor utkaṇṭhāparikhedaduḥsahatayā kṣāmībhavadgātrayoḥ 
MSS naktaṃ daivavaśāt kṣaṇaṃ gurujanātsvāyattatāṃ prāptayor yāto durlabhasaṃgamotsavavidhiryūnorjanākhyeyatām 
MSS anyonyabhedo bhrātṝṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ vā balāntaka 
MSS bhavatyānandakṛddeva dviṣatāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ 
MSS anyonyamutpīḍayadutpalākṣyāḥ stanadvayaṃ pāṇḍu tathā pravṛddham 
MSS madhye yathā śyāmamukhasya tasya mṛṇālasūtrāntaramapyalabhyam 
MSS anyonyarāgavaśayoryuvayorvilāsa svacchandatācchidapayātu tadālivargaḥ 
MSS atyājayan sicayamājimakārayanvā dantairnakhaiśca madano madanaḥ kathaṃ syāt 
MSS anyonyalakṣaṇairyuktāṃ nārīṃ saṃkīrṇakāṃ viduḥ 
MSS yā nijaireva saṃyuktā cihnaistāṃ kevalāṃ jaguḥ 
MSS anyonyalāvaṇyavilokanāntaṃ netradvayaṃ syātsatataṃ kilāsyāḥ 
MSS ityeva nāsā vihitā vidhātrā madhye tayordarśanavighnakartrī 
MSS anyonyavārighaṭitau dhanavāripātād bhītau bhṛśaṃ mṛgavadhūrmṛgayūthapaśca 
MSS vittastayā ghaṭanayā kṛtasaukhyamohau naivāmbuvāhajalaśīkarapātapīḍām 
MSS anyonyaviparītāni matāni manasaḥ sadā 
MSS avidyāyāṃ punaḥ satye jñānasyoccatarasya hi 
MSS aṅgāni nikhilāni syuḥ pūrayanti parasparam

MSS anyonyasaṃgamavaśādadhunā vibhātāṃ tasyāpi te'pi manasī vikasadvilāse

MSS kasyāpi ko'pīti niveditaṃ ca dhātreyikāyāścaturaṃ vacaśca

MSS unmūrdhānaḥ saṃnipatyāparāntaiḥ prāyudhyanta spaṣṭadantadhvanībhāḥ 
MSS anyopabhogakaluṣā mānavatī premagarvitā muditā 
MSS saundaryagarvitā ca premaparādhīnamānasānūḍhā

MSS śākhoṭakasya punarasya mahāśayoyam ambhoda eva śaraṇaṃ yadi nirguṇasya 
MSS anyo hi nāśnāti kṛtaṃ hi karma sa eva kartā sukhaduḥkhabhāgī 
MSS yattena kiṃciddhi kṛtaṃ hi karma tadaśnute nāsti kṛtasya nāśaḥ 
MSS anvagrāhi mayā preyān niśi svopanayāditi 
MSS na vipralabhate tāvad ālīriyamalīkavāk 
MSS anvayāgatavidyānām anvayāgatasaṃpadām 
MSS viduṣāṃ ca prabhūṇāṃ ca hṛdayaṃ nāvalipyate 
MSS anvarthavedī śūraśca kṣamāvānna ca karkaśaḥ 
MSS kalyāṇamedhāstejasvī sa bhadraḥ parikīrtitaḥ 
MSS anviṣyadbhirayaṃ cirāt kathamapi prārthyeta yadyarthibhir nātha tvaṃ punararthinaḥ pratidinaṃ yatnāt samanviṣyasi 
MSS prāptau cintitamātrakaṃ dadadasau cintātiriktapradaṃ tvāmālokya vidīryate yadi na tadgrāvaiva cintāmaṇiḥ 
MSS anvīkṣaṇaṃ ca vidyānāṃ sadvarṇāśramarakṣaṇam 
MSS grahaṇaṃ śastraśāstrāṇāṃ yuddhamārgopaśikṣaṇam 
MSS anvetaṃ vāyavo yānti pṛṣṭhe bhānurvayāṃsi ca 
MSS anuplavante meghāśca yasya tasya raṇe jayaḥ 
MSS anveṣayati madāndha dviradamadāmbusiktamavanitalam 
MSS pariṇatagarbhabharārtā siṃhavadhūḥ śallakīvipine 
MSS apaḥ piban prapāpālīm anurakto vilokayan 
MSS agastyaṃ cintayāmāsa caturaḥ sāpi sāgarān 
MSS apakartāhamasmīti hṛdi te mā sma bhūdbhayam 
MSS vimukheṣu na me khaḍgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati 
MSS apakāradaśāyāmapy upakurvanti sādhavaḥ 
MSS chindantamapi vṛkṣaḥ svac chāyayā kiṃ na rakṣati 
MSS apakāramasaṃprāpya tuṣyet sādhurasādhutaḥ 
MSS naiṣo'lābho bhujaṅgena veṣṭito yo na daśyate 
MSS apakāriṇi kopaścet kope kopaḥ kathaṃ na jāyeta 
MSS dharmārthakāmamokṣa prāṇayaśohāriṇi krūre 
MSS apakāriṇi cet kopaḥ kope kāpaḥ kathaṃ na te 
MSS dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ prasahya paripanthini 
MSS apakāriṇi visrambhaṃ yaḥ karoti narādhamaḥ 
MSS anātho durbalo yadvan na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati 
MSS apakāriṣu mā pāpaṃ cintaya tvaṃ kadācana 
MSS svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ 
MSS apakuryāt samarthaṃ vā nopakuryādyadāpadi 
MSS ucchindyādeva tanmitraṃ viśvasyāṅkamupasthitam 
MSS apakurvannapi prāyaḥ prāpnoti mahataḥ phalam 
MSS aurvaṃ dahantamevāgniṃ saṃtarpayati sāgaraḥ 
MSS apakṛtya balasthasya dūrastho'smīti nāśvaset 
MSS śyenānucaritairhyete nipatanti pramādyataḥ 
MSS apakṛtvā buddhimato dūrastho'smīti nāśvaset 
MSS dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ 
MSS apakrānte bālye taruṇimani cāgantumanasi prayāte mugdhatve caturimaṇi cāśleṣarasike 
MSS na kenāpi spṛṣṭaṃ yadiha vayasā marma paramaṃ yadetat pañceṣorjayati vapurindīvaradṛśaḥ 
MSS apakvaṃ bhaṅgamāyāti atijīrṇaṃ tu karkaśam 
MSS jñātighṛṣṭaṃ tu sodvegaṃ kalaho bāndhavaiḥ saha 
MSS apakvamapi cūtasya phalaṃ dravati vegataḥ 
MSS guḍaśuṇṭīpralepena vidhṛtaṃ śaśvadātape 
MSS apakve tu ghaṭe nīraṃ cālanyāṃ sūkṣmapiṣṭakam 
MSS strīṇāṃ ca hṛdaye vārtā na tiṣṭhati kadāpi hi 
MSS apagatamadarāgā yoṣidekā prabhāte kṛtanibiḍakucāgrā patyurāliṅganena 
MSS priyatamaparibhuktaṃ vīkṣamānā svadehaṃ vrajati śayanavāsād vāsamanyaddhasantī 
MSS apagatarajovikārā ghanapaṭalākrāntatārakālokā 
MSS lambapayodharabhārā prāvṛḍiyaṃ vṛddhavaniteva 
MSS apaṅkiladhiyaḥ śuddhāḥ sādhumānasavṛttayaḥ 
MSS vamanti śrutijīvātuṃ dhvaniṃ navarasāspadam 
MSS apacikramiṣuḥ pūrvaṃ senāṃ svāṃ parisāntvayan 
MSS vilaṅghayitvā satreṇa tataḥ svayamupakramet

MSS tava rāyavasantasamo na haro na harirnna harirnna harirnna hariḥ

MSS śriyo hi kurvanti tathaiva nāryo bhujaṅgakanyāparisarpaṇāni 
MSS apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpyanātmavān 
MSS mantramūlaṃ yato rājyam ato mantraṃ surakṣitam

MSS kusumacāpamatejayadaṃśubhir himakaro makarorjitaketanam

MSS apatyadarśanasyārthe prāṇānapi ca yā tyajet 
MSS tyajanti tāmapi krūrā mātaraṃ dārahetave 
MSS apatyāni prāyo daśa daśa varāhī janayati kṣamābhāre dhuryaḥ sa punariha nāsīnna bhavitā 
MSS padaṃ kṛtvā yaḥ svaṃ phaṇipatiphaṇācakravalaye nimajjantīmantarjaladhi vasudhāmuttulayati 
MSS apatye yat tādṛgduritamabhavat tena mahatā viṣaktastīvreṇa vraṇitahṛdayena vyathayatā 
MSS paṭurdhārāvāhī nava iva cireṇāpi hi na me nikṛntanmarmāṇi krakaca iva manyurviramati 
MSS apathena pravavṛte na jātūpacito'pi saḥ 
MSS vṛddhau nadīmukhenaiva prasthānaṃ lavaṇāmbhasaḥ 
MSS apathenaiva yo yogād adhaḥ sārāyate svayam 
MSS nīcopasarpaṇavaśāt sa pated vaṃśavānapi

MSS apathyamāyatau lobhād āmanantyanujīvinaḥ 
MSS priyaṃ śrṇoti yastebhyas tamṛcchanti na saṃpadaḥ 
MSS apathyasya ca bhuktasya dantasya calitasya ca

MSS apado dūragāmo ca sākṣaro na ca paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS amukhaḥ sphuṭavaktā ca yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS apadhvasto hyavamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam 
MSS jīvitaṃ yadavakṣiptaṃ yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā

MSS apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ 
MSS svārthamabhyuddharet prājñaḥ kāryadhvaṃso hi mūrkhatā 
MSS apamānaḥ pativihito guruparikaratīvratā gṛhe dauḥsthyam 
MSS śīlakṣataye yāsāṃ tāsāmatirāgato'nyanararaktiḥ 
MSS apamānāt tapovṛddhiḥ saṃmānācca tapaḥkṣayaḥ 
MSS arcitaḥ pūjito vipro dugdhā gauriva gacchati 
MSS apamānāt tu saṃbhūtaṃ mānena praśamaṃ nayet 
MSS sāmapūrva upāyo vā praṇāmo vābhimānaje 
MSS apamānito'pi kulajo na vadati puruṣaṃ svabhāvadākṣiṇyāt

MSS apameghodayaṃ varṣam adṛṣṭakusumaṃ phalam 
MSS atarkitopapannaṃ vo darśanaṃ pratibhāti me

MSS kalayannapi savyatho'vatasthe 'śakunena skhalitaḥ kiletaro'pi

MSS sukarastaruvat sahiṣṇunā ripurunmūlayituṃ mahānapi

MSS vīṇāha paruṣaṃ yanmāṃ kalakaṇṭhī ca niṣṭhuram

MSS sādhayed bhedadaṇḍābhyāṃ yathāyogena cāparān 
MSS aparādhaṃ na śṛṇumo na cāsatyaṃ tvayoditam
