MSS aparādhaḥ sa daivasya na punarmantriṇāmayam 
MSS kāryaṃ sughaṭitaṃ yatnād daivayogād vinaśyati 
MSS aparādhasahasrabhājanaṃ patitaṃ bhīmabhavārṇavodare 
MSS agatiṃ śaraṇāgataṃ hare kṛpayā kevalamātmasātkuru 
MSS aparādhānurūpaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ pāpeṣu pātayet 
MSS udvejayeddhanairṛddhān daridrān vadhabandhanaiḥ 
MSS aparādhini mayi daṇḍaṃ saṃharasi kimudyataṃ kuṭilakeśi 
MSS vardhayasi vilasitaṃ tvaṃ dāsajanāyātra kupyasi ca 
MSS aparādhī nāmāhaṃ prasīda rambhoru virama saṃrambhāt 
MSS sevyo janaśca kupitaḥ kathaṃ nu dāso niraparādhaḥ 
MSS aparādhīnāśokaḥ sahate caraṇāhatiṃ sarojadṛśām 
MSS vilasitabakulo vanitā mukhavāsī madyapāta iva 
MSS aparādhe'pi niḥśaṅko niyogī cirasevakaḥ 
MSS sa svāminamavajñāya carecca niravagrahaḥ 
MSS aparādho na me'stīti naitad viśvāsakāraṇam 
MSS vidyate hi nṛśaṃsebhyo bhayaṃ guṇavatāmapi 
MSS aparādho mayā kānte kṛto yadi tvayā mataḥ 
MSS nipātya giriśṛṅgoccau kucau kiṃ na nipīḍyate 
MSS aparāhṇaśītalatareṇa śanair anilena lolitalatāṅgulaye 
MSS nilayāya śākhina ivāhvayate dadurākulāḥ khagakulāni giraḥ 
MSSA aparityaktamātmānam icchatā paṇyayoṣitām 
MSSA nityaupayogikaṃ dravyam ātmasāraṃ pradarśayet 
MSS aparīkṣitaparavañcanam añcati lobhādapekṣitaprekṣī 
MSS vyādhūtapakṣamavaśo vihanyate pakṣivat kṣitipaḥ 
MSS aparīkṣitalakṣaṇapramāṇair aparāmṛṣṭapadārthasārthatattvaiḥ 
MSS avaśīkṛtajaitrayuktijālair alametairanadhītatarkavidyaiḥ 
MSS aparīkṣya na kartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ suparīkṣitam 
MSS paścādbhavati saṃtāpo brāhmaṇī nakulaṃ yathā 
MSS aparokṣadhano gamyaḥ śrīmānapi nānyatheti nirdiṣṭam 
MSS kandarpaśāstrakāraiḥ kutaḥ kathā luptavibhavasya 
MSS aparṇeyaṃ bhūbhṛdvanamaṭati valkāmbaradharā jaṭālo digvāsāḥ śikhariṇi śivo'yaṃ nivasati 
MSS iti bhrāntyānyo'nyaṃ kṣaṇamilitayoḥ kṣoṇitilaka dviṣaddampatyoste śiva śiva bhavanti praṇatayaḥ 
MSS aparṇaiva latā sevyā vidvadbhiriti me matiḥ 
MSS yayā vṛtaḥ purāṇo'pi sthāṇuḥ sūte'mṛtaṃ phalam 
MSS aparyantasya kālasya kiyānaṃśaḥ śaracchatam 
MSS tanmātraparamāyuryaḥ sa kathaṃ svaptumarhati 
MSS aparyāptabhujāyāmaḥ sakhedo'syāḥ sakhījanaḥ 
MSS śroṇyāṃ kathaṃcit kurute raśanādāmabandhanam 
MSS apavarjitaviplave śucau hṛdayagrāhiṇi maṅgalāspade 
MSS vimalā tava vistare girāṃ matirādarśa ivābhidṛśyate 
MSS apavādādabhītasya samasya guṇadoṣayoḥ 
MSS asadvṛtteraho vṛttaṃ durvibhāvaṃ vidheriva 
MSS apavādo bhaved yena yena vipratyayo bhavet 
MSS narake gamyate yena tad budhaḥ kathamācaret 
MSS apaśaṅkamaṅkaparivartanocitāś calitāḥ puraḥ patimupaitumātmajāḥ 
MSS anuroditīva karuṇena patriṇāṃ virutena vatsalatayaiṣa nimnagāḥ 
MSS apaśāstradhano rājā saṃcayaṃ nādhigacchati 
MSS asthāne cāsya tadvittaṃ sarvameva vinaśyati 
MSS apaśūlaṃ tamāsādya lavaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇānujaḥ 
MSS rurodha saṃmukhīno hi jayo randhraprahāriṇām 
MSS apaśokamanāḥ kuṭumbinīm anugṛhṇīṣva nivāpadattibhiḥ 
MSS svajanāśru kilātisaṃtataṃ dahati pretamiti pracakṣate 
MSS apaścāttāpakṛt samyag anubandhiphalapradaḥ 
MSS adīrghakālo'bhīṣṭaśca praśasto mantra ucyate 
MSS apaśyadbhiriveśānaṃ raṇānnivavṛte gaṇaiḥ 
MSS muhyatyeva hi kṛcchreṣu saṃbhramajvalitaṃ manaḥ 
MSS apaśyadbhirmahāsvādān bhāvān svādvavivekibhiḥ 
MSS kiṃ jñeyamaśanādanyat kṣmāpairandhairivokṣabhiḥ 
MSS apasaraṇameva yuktaṃ maunaṃ vā tatra rājahaṃsasya 
MSS kaṭu raṭati nikaṭavartī vācāṭaṣṭiṭṭibho yatra 
MSS apasarati na cakṣuṣo mṛgākṣī rajaniriyaṃ ca na yāti naiti nidrā 
MSS praharati madano'pi duḥkhitānāṃ bata bahuśo'bhimukhībhavantyapāyāḥ 
MSS apasara pṛthivi samudrāḥ saṃvṛṇutāmbūni bhūdharā namata 
MSS vāmanaharilaghutunde jagatāṃ kalahaḥ sa vaḥ pāyāt 
MSS apasara madhukara dūraṃ parimalabahule'pi ketakīkusume 
MSS iha nahi madhulavalābho bhavati paraṃ dhūlidhūsaraṃ vadanam 
MSS apasara sakhe dūrādasmāt kaṭākṣaviṣānalāt prakṛtiviṣamād yoṣitsarpād vilāsaphaṇābhṛtaḥ 
MSS itaraphaṇinā daṣṭaḥ śakyaścikitsitumauṣadhaiś caṭulavanitābhogigrastaṃ tyajanti hi mantriṇaḥ 
MSS apasāraya ghanasāraṃ kuru hāraṃ dūra eva kiṃ kamalaiḥ 
MSS alamalamāli mṛṇālair iti vadati divāniśaṃ bālā 
MSS apasārasamāyuktaṃ nayajñairdurgamucyate 
MSS apasāraparityaktaṃ durgavyājena bandhanam 
MSS apastaranti pāṣāṇā hyanughnanti hi rākṣasān 
MSS kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ 
MSS apahatya tamastīvraṃ yathā bhātyudare raviḥ 
MSS tathāpahatya pāpmānaṃ bhāti gaṅgājalokṣitaḥ 
MSS apaharati mano me ko'pyayaṃ kṛṣṇacauraḥ praṇataduritacauraḥ pūtanāprāṇacauraḥ 
MSS valayavasanacauro bālagopījanānāṃ nayanahṛdayacauraḥ paśyatāṃ sajjanānām 
MSS apaharati mahattvaṃ prārthanā kiṃ na jāne janayati gurulajjāmityahaṃ kiṃ na vedmi 
MSS tadapi vada vadānyaṃ taṃ sadā pratyahaṃ māṃ jaṭharapiṭharavartī vahnirarthīkaroti 
MSS apaharasi sadā manāṃsi puṃsām atimahatā guṇasaṃparigraheṇa 
MSS na ca bhavasi tathāpyanekacitto hṛtamathavā vivṛṇoti kaḥ parasvam 
MSS apahastitabāndhave tvayā vihitaṃ sāhasamasya tṛṣṇayā 
MSS tadihānaparādhini priye sakhi ko'yaṃ karuṇojjhitakramaḥ 
MSS apahāya śanaiḥ paṭīravāṭīr iha lāṭījanamānaluṇṭhanāya 
MSS samudeti manojarājadhāṭī paripāṭīpaṭureṣa gandhavāhaḥ 
MSS apahṛtya parasyārthaṃ tena dharmaṃ karoti yaḥ 
MSS sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthastasya tatphalam 
MSS apahnuvānasya janāya yannijām adhīratāmasya kṛtaṃ manobhuvā 
MSS abodhi tajjāgaraduḥkhasākṣiṇī niśā ca śayyā ca śaśāṅkakomalā 
MSS apāṃ nidhiṃ vāribhirarcayanti dīpena sūryaṃ pratibodhayanti 
MSS tābhyāṃ tayoḥ kiṃ paripūrṇatā syād bhaktyā hi tuṣyanti mahānubhāvāḥ 
MSS apāṃ pravāho gāṅgo'pi samudraṃ prāpya tadrasaḥ 
MSS bhavatyavaśyaṃ tad vidvān nāśrayedaśubhātmakam 
MSS apāṃ mūle līnaṃ kṣaṇaparicitaṃ candanarase muṇālīhārādau kṛtalaghupadaṃ candramasi ca 
MSS muhūrtaṃ viśrāntaṃ sarasakadalīkānanatale priyākaṇṭhāśleṣe nivasati paraṃ śaityamadhunā 
MSS apāṃ vihāre tava hāravibhramaṃ karotu nīre pṛṣadutkarastaran 
MSS kaṭhorapīnoccakucadvayītaṭa truṭattaraḥ sāravasāravormijaḥ 
MSS apākuru kapolataḥ sakhi bhujaṅgavallīrasaṃ parityaja kucasthalāt truṭitabandhanaṃ kañcukam 
MSS pidhehi daśanacchade daśanajakṣataṃ lākṣayā vadetthamabalāgaṇe gurujane kathaṃ yāsyasi 
MSS apākṛtyāśeṣāṇyapi ca ghanajālāni paritas tamodhūmastomodbhavamalinimānaṃ ca tadanu 
MSS śaraccandraḥ śilpī ratipatimude'sau nijakaraiḥ sudhāsaṃdohārdrairbhuvanabhavanaṃ pāṇḍurayati 
MSS apāṅgatarale dṛśau madhuravakravarṇā giro vilāsabharamantharā gatiratīva kāntaṃ mukham 
MSS iti sphuritamaṅgake mṛgadṛśaḥ svato līlayā tadatra na madodayaḥ kṛtapado'pi saṃlakṣyate 
MSS apāṅgapātairapadeśapūrvair eṇīdṛśāmekaśilānagaryāt 
MSS vīthīṣu vīthīṣu vināparādhaṃ pade pade śṛṅkhalitā yuvānaḥ 
MSS apāṅgasaṃsargi taraṅgitaṃ dṛśor bhruvorarālāntavilāsi vellitam 
MSS visāri romāñcanakañcukaṃ tanos tanoti yo'sau subhage tavāgataḥ 
MSS apāṅgastava tanvaṅgi vicitro'yaṃ bhujaṅgamaḥ 
MSS dṛṣṭamātraḥ sumanasām api mūrchāvidhāyakaḥ 
MSS apāṅgāt pucchamūlaṃ tu tiryagaśvaṃ pramāṇayet 
MSS khurāntāt kakudaṃ yāvad ūrdhvamānena buddhimān 
MSS apātraṃ pātratā yāti yatra pātraṃ na vidyate 
MSS asmin deśe drumo nāsti eraṇḍo'pi drumāyate 
MSS apātravarṣaṇaṃ jātu na kuryāt sadvigarhitam 
MSS apātravarṣaṇāt kiṃ syād anyat kośakṣayādṛte 
MSS apātre pātratābuddhiḥ pātre buddhirapātratā 
MSS ṛṇānubandharūpeṇa dāturutpadyate matiḥ 
MSS apātre ramate nārī girau varṣati vāsavaḥ 
MSS khalamāśrayate lakṣmīḥ prājñaḥ prāyeṇa nirdhanaḥ 
MSS apānaprāṇayoraikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ 
MSS yuvā bhavati vṛddho'pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt 
MSS apānena punaḥ kaścit preritaḥ kālarūpiṇā 
MSS niḥśvāsocchvāsakṛdvāti japan haṃsetyaharniśam 
MSS apāpaghanasaṃvṛteraviśadasmitātyunnamat samastanarasādaragrahaṇataḥ kṛtārthapriyā 
MSS ratirmanasi jāyate yadi kadāpi śauryāśrayā tadaiva sakalaṃ januḥ saphalamevamāhātmabhūḥ 
MSS apāpāstatkulīnāśca mānayanti svakān hitān 
MSS eṣa prāyo narendrāṇāṃ śaṅkanīyastu śobhanaḥ 
MSS apāmudvṛttānāṃ nijamupadiśantyā sthitipadaṃ dadhatyā śālīnāmavanatimudāre sati phale 
MSS mayūrāṇāmugraṃ viṣamiva harantyā madamaho kṛtaḥ kṛtsnasyāyaṃ vinaya iva lokasya śaradā 
MSS apāyakalitā manurjagati sāpadaḥ sampado vinaśvaramidaṃ sukhaṃ viṣayajaṃ śriyaścañcalāḥ 
MSS bhavanti jarasārasāstaralalocanā yoṣitas tadapyayamaho janastapasi no pare rajyati 
MSS apāyasaṃdarśanajāṃ vipattim upāyasaṃdarśanajāṃ ca siddhim 
MSS medhāvino nītividhiprayuktāṃ puraḥ sphurantīmiva darśayanti 
MSS apāyi muninā purā punaramāyi maryādayā atāri kapinā purā punaradāhi laṅkāriṇā 
MSS amanthi muravairiṇā punarabandhi laṅkāriṇā kva nāma vasudhāpate tava yaśo'mbudhiḥ kvāmbudhiḥ 
MSS apāraḥ pāthodhiḥ pulinapadavī yojanaśataṃ nirālambo mārgo viyati kila śūnyā daśa diśaḥ 
MSS itīvāyaṃ kīraḥ katipayapadānyeva gagane muhurbhrāmyan bhrāmyan patati guṇavṛkṣe punarapi 
MSS apārapulinasthalībhuvi himālaye mālaye nikāmavikaṭonnate duradhirohaṇe rohaṇe 
MSS mahatyamarabhūdhare gahanakandare mandare bhramanti na patantyaho pariṇatā bhavatkīrtayaḥ 
MSS apārasaṃsārasamudramadhye saṃmajjato me śaraṇaṃ kimasti 
MSS guro dayālo kṛpayā vadaitad viśveśapādāmbujadīrghanaukā 
MSS apāre kāvyasaṃsāre kavireva prajāpatiḥ 
MSS yathā vai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate 
MSS apāre pāthodhau kimiti satimigrāhagahane nilīya śrīnāthaḥ svapiti bhujage śaṅkita iva 
MSS kimetāvadbhirvā bhavatu kila sarvātiśayitaḥ śriyā saṃśliṣṭāṅko vyapagatabhayaṃ ko nivasatu 
MSS apārairvyāpārairahariha nayanto'śanadaśā svatha snātāḥ saṃdhyāṃ vidadhati na jātu svasamaye 
MSS tyajantaḥ svāṃ vṛttiṃ dvijakulabhavā grāmagaṇakī bhavanto hantāmī kathamapi ca jīvanti bahavaḥ 
MSS apārthakamanāyuṣyaṃ goviṣāṇasya bhakṣaṇam 
MSS dantāśca parighṛṣyante rasaścāpi na labhyate 
MSS apārthetarayuktānāṃ vyāsasaṃgrahaśālinām 
MSS api gopālagītānāṃ niveśo nigamādiṣu 
MSS apāstapātheyasudhopayogais tvaccumbinaiva svamanorathena 
MSS kṣudhaṃ ca nirvāpayatā tṛṣaṃ ca svādīyasādhvā gamitaḥ sukhaṃ taiḥ 
MSS apāstapāthoruhi śāyitaṃ kare karoti līlākamalaṃ kimānanam 
MSS tanoṣi hāraṃ kiyadasruṇaḥ sravair adoṣanirvāsitabhūṣaṇe hṛdi 
MSS apāstastārābhirvidhana iva kāmī yuvatibhir madhucchatracchāyāṃ spṛśati śaśalakṣmā pariṇataḥ 
MSS ayaṃ prācīkarṇābharaṇaracanāśokakusuma cchaṭālakṣmīcauraḥ kalayati raviḥ pūrvamacalam 
MSS apāsya lakṣmīharaṇotthavairitām acintayitvā ca tadadrimanthanam 
MSS dadau nivāsaṃ haraye mahodadhir vimatsarā dhīradhiyāṃ hi vṛttayaḥ 
MSS api kalpānilasyaiva taraṅgasya mahodadheḥ 
MSS śakyate prasaro roddhuṃ nānuraktasya cetasaḥ 
MSS api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāccennṛpatisevakaḥ 
MSS tathāpi na parābhūtiṃ janādāpnoti mānavaḥ 
MSS api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāccennṛpatisevakaḥ 
MSS yadāpnoti phalaṃ lokāt tasyāṃśamapi no guṇī 
MSS api kāpuruṣo mārge dvitīyaḥ kṣemakārakaḥ 
MSS karkaṭena dvitīyena jīvitaṃ parirakṣitam 
MSS api kālasya yaḥ kālaḥ so'pi kālamapekṣate 
MSS kartuṃ jaganti hantuṃ vā kālastena jagatprabhuḥ 
MSS api kīrtyarthamāyānti nāśaṃ sadyo'timāninaḥ 
MSS na cecchantyayaśomiśram apyevānantyamāyuṣaḥ 
MSS api kuñjarakarṇāgrād api pippalapallavāt 
MSS api vidyudvilasitād vilolaṃ lalanāmanaḥ 
MSS api kriyārthaṃ sulabhaṃ samitkuśaṃ jalānyapi snānavidhikṣamāṇi te 
MSS api svaśaktyā tapasi pravartase śarīramādyaṃ khalu dharmasādhanam 
MSS api ghorāparādhasya dharmamāśritya tiṣṭhataḥ 
MSS sa hi pracchādyate doṣaḥ śailo meghairivāsitaiḥ 
MSS api cāpyaphalaṃ karma paśyāmaḥ kurvato janān 
MSS nānyathā hyabhijānanti vṛttiṃ loke kathaṃcana 
MSS api cintāmaṇiścintāpariśramamapekṣate 
MSS idaṃ tvacintitaṃ manye kṛtamāścaryamāryayā 
MSS api cet sudurācāro bhajate māmananyabhāk 
MSS sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ 
MSS api cedasi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ 
MSS sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ saṃtariṣyasi 
MSS api janakasutāyāstacca taccānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiha śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti 
MSS nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇor abhinavaśatapatraśrīmadāsyaṃ priyāyāḥ 
MSS api jalakaṇān payodher dūrādāhṛtya jāyate jaladaḥ 
MSS nikaṭād ghaṭānapi śataṃ samīharan vārihāryeva 
MSS api tadvapuṣi prasarpator gamite kāntijharairagādhatām 
MSS smarayauvanayoḥ khalu dvayoḥ plavakumbhau bhavataḥ kucāvubhau 
MSS api taruvanānyūṣmāyante tapatyapi yāminī dahati sarasīvāto'pyeṣa jvalanti jalānyapi 
MSS iti samadhikaṃ grīṣme bhīṣme na puṇyavatāṃ bhayaṃ malayajarasairdigdhaṃ labdhvā vadhūstanamaṇḍalam 
MSS api turagasamīpādutpatantaṃ mayūraṃ na sa rucirakalāpaṃ bāṇalakṣyīcakāra 
MSS sapadi gatamanaskaścitramālyānukīrṇe rativigalitabandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ 
MSS api tejo nidhirhanta patito yadi jāyate 
MSS surataṃ kimivāsmākam iti kokairviyujyate 
MSS api tvayā kairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhābandhuni bandhubhāvaḥ 
MSS janāpavādaḥ paritaḥ prayātaḥ samāgamo hanta na jātu jātaḥ 
MSS api dalanmukule bakule yayā padamadhāyi kadāpi na tṛṣṇayā 
MSS ahaha sā sahasā vidhure vidhau madhukarī badarīmanuvartate 
MSS api dinamaṇireṣa kleśitaḥ śītasaṃghair atha niśi nijabhāryāṃ gāḍhamāliṅgya dorbhyām 
MSS svapiti punarudetuṃ sālasāṅgastu tasmāt kimu na bhavatu dīrghā yāminī kāminīyam 
MSS api dorbhyāṃ paribaddhā baddhāpi guṇairanekadhā nipuṇaiḥ 
MSS nirgacchati kṣaṇādiva jaladhijalotpattipicchilā lakṣmīḥ 
MSS api nadatha nikāmaṃ dardurāḥ kiṃ suvarṇa dyutibharamupanītā nūtanairvāripūraiḥ 
MSS ayamaciravināśī śocanīyastu bhāvī sa ciramavaṭasīmni prācya eva krayo vaḥ 
MSS api nāma sa dṛśyeta puruṣātiśayo bhuvi 
MSS garvocchūnamukhā yena dhanino nāvalokitāḥ 
MSS api nityānandamayaṃ sahaḥ śriyaṃ vahati saṃtataṃ hṛdaye 
MSS kaḥ sādhāraṇapuruṣaḥ prabhavatvenāmanādarttum 
MSS api nipuṇataramadhītaṃ durvinayārūḍhacetasaḥ puṃsaḥ 
MSS maṇiriva phaṇiphaṇavartī prabhavati śokāya lokānām 
MSS api nirmuktabhogena svāntaḥsthaviṣayekṣayā 
MSS asadbhāvāya jāyeta jihmagena sahāsikā 
MSS api pañcaśataṃ daṇḍyān daṇḍayet pṛthivīpatiḥ 
MSS abhāve pañca kāyasthān ekaṃ vā svarṇakārakam 
MSS api pañcaśataṃ śūrā mṛdnanti mahatīṃ camūm 
MSS athavā pañca ṣaṭ sapta vijayante'nivartinaḥ 
MSS api putraiḥ kalatrairvā prāṇān rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS vidyamānairyatastaiḥ syāt sarvaṃ bhūyo'pi dehinām 
MSS api pauruṣamādeyaṃ śāstraṃ cedyuktibodhakam 
MSS anyattvārṣamapi tyājyaṃ bhāvyaṃ nyāyyaikasevinā 
MSS api pragalbhalalanākaṭākṣacapalāḥ śriyaḥ 
MSS sanmantripraṇidhānena ciraṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūbhujām 
MSS api prājyaṃ rājyaṃ tṛṇamiva parityajya sahasā viloladvānīraṃ tava janani tīraṃ śritavatām 
MSS sudhātaḥ svādīyaḥ salilamidamātṛpti pibatāṃ janānāmānandaḥ parihasati nirvāṇapadavīm 
MSS api prāṇasamāniṣṭān pālitāṃllālitānapi 
MSS bhṛtyān yuddhe samutpanne paśyecchuṣkamivendhanam 
MSS api bandhutayā nārī bahuputrā guṇairyutā 
MSS śocyā bhavatisā nārī patihīnā tapasvinī 
MSS api brahmaparānandādidamapyadhikaṃ dhruvam 
MSS jahāra nāradādīnāṃ cittāni kathamanyathā 
MSS api brahmavadhaṃ kṛtvā prāyaścittena śudhyati 
MSS tadarthena vicīrṇena na kathaṃcitsuhṛddruhaḥ 
MSS api bhujalatotkṣepādasyāḥ kṛtaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ priyasahacarīkrīḍālāpe śrutā api sūktayaḥ 
MSS navapariṇayavrīḍāvatyā mukhonnatiyatnato 'pyalasavalitā tiryagdṛṣṭiḥ karoti mahotsavam 
MSS api bhogiṣu maṇidhāriṇa eva nihaṃsi natu yaddviṣo'pi parān 
MSS tattava garuḍa sthāne dānavasaṃhārivāhasya 
MSS api bhrātā suto'rghyo vā śvaśuro mātulo'pi vā 
MSS nādaṇḍyo nāma rājño'sti dharmādvicalitaḥ svakāt 
MSS api mandatvamāpanno naṣṭo vāpīṣṭadarśanāt 
MSS prāyeṇa prāṇināṃ bhūyo duḥkhavego'dhiko bhavet 
MSS api maraṇamupaiti sā mṛgāṅke vilasati kaiva kathā rasāntarasya 
MSS ayi kathamadhunā dadhāti śāntiṃ viṣamaśarajvaratīvradehadāhaḥ 
MSS api mānuṣyakaṃ labdhvā bhavanti jñānino na ye 
MSS paśutaiva varā teṣāṃ pratyavāyāpravartanāt 
MSS api mārdavabhāvena gātraṃ saṃlīya buddhimān 
MSS ariṃ nāśayate nityaṃ yathā vallī mahādrumam 
MSS api mudamupayānto vāgvilāsaiḥ svakīyaiḥ parabhaṇitiṣu toṣaṃ yānti santaḥ kiyantaḥ 
MSS nijaghanamakarandasyandapūrṇālavālaḥ kalaśasalilasekaṃ nehate kiṃ rasālaḥ 
MSS api mṛgapatinā karīndrakumbha sthaladalanodgatapauruṣeṇa yasya 
MSS bhayacakitadṛśā pranaṣṭamuccaiḥ sa hi śarabhīkularājacakravartī 
MSS api mṛdvyā girā labhyaḥ sadā jāgartyatandritaḥ 
MSS nāsti dharmasamo bhṛtyaḥ kiṃciduktastu dhāvati 
MSS api merūpamaṃ prājñam api śūramapi sthiram 
MSS tṛṇīkaroti tṛṣṇaikā nimeṣeṇa narottamam 
MSS api yatsukaraṃ karma tadapyekena duṣkaram 
MSS biśeṣato'sahāyena kimu rājyaṃ mahodayam 
MSS api rājyādapi svargād apīndorapi mādhavāt 
MSS api kāntākucasparśāt saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham 
MSS api lapitumahaṃ na hanta śaktas tava purataḥ paritāpamāyatākṣyāḥ 
MSS śiva śiva rasanā yato na yatnād api yatate nijadāhaśaṅkayeva 
MSS api lalitasuguṇaveṇiḥ sālaṃkārāpi yā suvarṇāpi 
MSS raghutilaka vihīnā ced vāṇī ramaṇīva naiva kalyāṇī 
MSS api vajreṇa saṃgharṣam api padbhyāṃ parābhavam 
MSS sahante guṇalobhena ta eva maṇayo yadi 
MSS api vaṭataroḥ spardhāṃ bījena sarṣapa sāṃprataṃ pariṇamasi yo muṣṭiḥ śākaṃ sati sthalasauṣṭhave 
MSS jaṭharakuharakrīḍadviśvo yadekadalodare pralayaśiśuko devaḥ śiśye pureti ha śuśrumaḥ 
MSS api varṣaśataṃ sthitvā sadā kṛtrimarāgiṇī 
MSS veśyā śukīva niḥśvāsā niḥsaṅgebhyaḥ palāyate 
MSS api vidhiḥ kusumāni tavāśugān smara vidhāya na nirvṛtimāptavān 
MSS adita pañca hi te sa niyamya tāṃs tadapi tairbata jarjaritaṃ jagat 
MSS api vīryotkaṭaḥ śatrur yato bhedena sidhyati 
MSS tasmād bhedaḥ prayoktavyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ vijigīṣuṇā 
MSS api vetti ṣaḍakṣarāṇi ced upadeṣṭuṃ śitikaṇṭhamicchati 
MSS vasanāśanamātramasti ced dhanadādapyatiricyate khalaḥ 
MSS api śāradacandrikā yadīyāṃ tulanāṃ gacchati duṣkaraistapobhiḥ 
MSS na taṭuñjhati mānasaṃ madīyaṃ hasitaṃ khañjanamañjulocanāyāḥ 
MSS api śāstreṣu kuśalā lokācāravivarjitāḥ 
MSS sarve te hāsyatāṃ yānti yathā te mūrkhapaṇḍitāḥ 
MSS api śiśirataropacārayogyaṃ dvitayamidaṃ yugapanna sahyameva 
MSS jaraṭhitaravidīdhitiśca kālo dayitajanena samaṃ ca viprayogaḥ 
MSS api śroṇibharasvairāṃ dhartuṃ tāmaśakanna saḥ 
MSS tadaṅgasaṅgajastambho gajastambhorudorapi 
MSS api saṃtāpaśamanāḥ śuddhāḥ surabhiśītalāḥ 
MSS bhujaṅgasaṅgājjāyante bhīṣaṇāścandanadrumāḥ 
MSS api saṃpūrṇatāyuktaiḥ kartavyāḥ suhṛdo budhaiḥ 
MSS nadīśaḥ paripūrṇo'pi candrodayamapekṣate 
MSS api saṃbhṛtasya satataṃ riktatvaṃ bibhrato visarjanataḥ 
MSS udarasyodārasya ca kevalamākārato bhedaḥ 
MSS api satpathaniṣṭhānām āśāḥ pūrayatāmapi 
MSS agastyavṛttirmeghānāṃ hanta mālinyakāraṇam 
MSS api sa divasaḥ kiṃ syādyatra priyāmukhapaṅkaje madhu madhukarīvāsmaddṛṣṭirvikāsini pāsyati 
MSS tadanu ca mṛdusnigdhālāpakramāhitanarmaṇaḥ suratasacivairaṅgaiḥ saṅgo mamāpi bhaviṣyati 
MSS api sarvavido na rājate vacanaṃ śrotari bodhavarjite 
MSS api bhartari naṣṭalocane viphalaḥ kiṃ na kalatravibhramaḥ 
MSS api sahavasatāmasatāṃ jalaruhajalavadbhavatyasaṃśleṣaḥ 
MSS dūre'pi satāṃ vasatāṃ prītiḥ kumudenduvad bhavati 
MSS api sāgaraparyantā vicetavyā vasundharā 
MSS deśo hyaratnimātro'pi nāsti daivajñavarjitaḥ 
MSS api subhagaṃ tava vadanaṃ paśyati subhage yadā yadā candraḥ 
MSS glāyati hanta pidhatte sapadi mukhaṃ svaṃ payodāntaḥ 
MSS api sthānuvadāsīta śuṣyan parigataḥ kṣudhā 
MSS na tvevānātmasaṃpannād vṛttimīheta paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS api syāt pitṛhā vairī so'pi dānavilobhitaḥ 
MSS gatvā viśvāsabhāvaṃ sa śatrorātmānamarpayet 
MSS api svamasvapnamasūṣupannamī parasya dārānanavaitumeva mām 
MSS svayaṃ duradhvārṇavanāvikāḥ kathaṃ spṛśantu vijñāya hṛdāpi tādṛśīm 
MSS api svalpataraṃ kāryaṃ yadbhavet pṛthivīpateḥ 
MSS tanna vācyaṃ sabhāmadhye provācedaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ 
MSS api svalpamasatyaṃ yaḥ puro vadati bhūbhujām 
MSS devānāṃ ca vināśaḥ syād dhruvaṃ tasya gurorapi 
MSS api svaiḥ sarvasvaiḥ punarapadhanaiḥ kairapi dhanaiḥ paritrāṇaiḥ prāṇairyadapi ca vidheyaṃ parahitam 
MSS tadadyaitacchabdāt parabhṛta bhavatyeva bhavatas tataḥ śabdālasyaṃ kathamapi nirasyaṃ kṣaṇamapi 
MSS apīḍayan balaṃ śatrūñ jigīṣurabhiṣeṇayet 
MSS sukhasādhyaṃ dviṣāṃ sainyaṃ dīrghaprayāṇapīḍitam 
MSS apītakṣībakādambam asaṃmṛṣṭāmalāmbaram 
MSS aprasāditaśuddhāmbu jagadāsīnmanoharam 
MSS aputratvaṃ bhavacchreyo na tu syādviguṇaḥ sutaḥ 
MSS jīvannapyavinīto'sau mṛta eva na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca 
MSS tasmāt putramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavet paścāddhi tāpasaḥ 
MSS aputrasya gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ diśaḥ śūnyāstvabāndhavāḥ 
MSS mūrkhasya hṛdayaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyā daridratā 
MSS aputrasya gṛhaṃ śocyaṃ śocyaṃ rājyamarājakam 
MSS nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyā śocyaṃ maithunamaprajam 
MSS apunardehiśabdārtham apratyupakṛtikṣamam 
MSS arthinaṃ kurute kaścit punarāvṛttivarjitam 
MSS apuṣyata ghanāvalī bhuvanajīvanairyatkarair avardhyata sudhārucirbahubudhālisaṃtarpaṇaḥ 
MSS tamandhatamasacchidaṃ ravimavekṣya jājvalyase tvameva ravikāntatāmayasi hanta kiṃ kurmahe 
MSS apūjitaivāstu girīndrakanyā kiṃ pakṣapātena manobhavasya 
MSS yadyasti dūtī sarasoktidakṣā dāsaḥ patiḥ pādatale vadhūnām 
MSS apūjito'tithiryasya gṛhādyāti viniḥśvasan 
MSS gacchanti pitarastasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ 
MSS apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā 
MSS trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam 
MSS apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāmapyamānanā 
MSS tava daivakṛto daṇḍaḥ sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ 
MSS apūrṇe naiva martavyaṃ saṃpūrṇe naiva jīvati 
MSS tasmāddhairyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ hantavyā paravāhinī 
MSS apūrvaṃ cauryamabhyastaṃ tvayā cañcalalocane 
MSS divāpi jāgratāṃ puṃsāṃ ceto harasi dūrataḥ 
MSS apūrvaṃ yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalāṃ jagad grāvaprakhyaṃ nijarasabharāt sārayati ca 
MSS kramāt prakhyopākhyāprasarasubhagaṃ bhāsayati tat sarasvatyāstattvaṃ kavisahṛdayākhyaṃ vijayate 
MSS apūrvaḥ ko'pi kopāgniḥ sajjanasya khalasya ca 
MSS ekasya śāmyati snehād vardhate'nyasya vāritaḥ 
MSS apūrvaḥ ko'pi kośo'yaṃ vidyate tava bhārati 
MSS vyayato vṛddhimāyāti kṣayamāyāti saṃcayāt 
MSS apūrvaḥ ko'pi tanvaṅgyā mama mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ 
MSS yogaṃ cintayato yena rāga eva vivardhate 
MSS apūrvakarmacaṇḍālam api mugdhe vimuñca mām 
MSS śritāsi candanabhrāntyā durvipākaṃ viṣadrumam 
MSS apūrvadeśādhigame yuvarājābhiṣecane 
MSS putrajanmani vā mokṣo bandhanasya vidhīyate 
MSS apūrvamadhurāmodapramoditadiśastataḥ 
MSS āyayurbhṛṅgamukharāḥ śiraḥ śekharaśālinaḥ 
MSS apūrvayeva tatkālasamāgamasakāmayā 
MSS dṛṣṭena rājan vapuṣā kaṭākṣairvijayaśriyā 
MSS apūrvā rasanāvyālī khalānanabileśayā 
MSS karṇamūle daśatyanyaṃ haratyanyasya jīvitam 
MSS apūrvāhlādadāyinya uccaistarapadāśrayāḥ 
MSS atimohāpahāriṇyaḥ sūktayo hi mahīyasām 
MSS apūrviṇā na kartavyaṃ karma loke vigarhitam 
MSS kṛtapūrviṇastu tyajato mahān dharma iti śrutiḥ 
MSS apūrveyaṃ dhanurvidyā bhavatā śikṣitā kutaḥ 
MSS mārgaṇaughaḥ samāyāti guṇo jāti digantaram 
MSS apūrvo dṛśyate vahniḥ kāminyāḥ stanamaṇḍale 
MSS dūrato dahate gātraṃ gātralagnaḥ suśītalaḥ 
MSS apūrvo bhāti bhāratyāḥ kāvyāmṛtaphale rasaḥ 
MSS carvaṇe sarvasāmānye svāduvit kevalaṃ kaviḥ 
MSS apūrvo'yaṃ kānte jvalati mukhadīpastava ciraṃ tamo draṣṭ ṇāṃ yo janayatitarāṃ yāti sutano 
MSS adhastādyatreyaṃ bata surabhidhūmālakatatir yadīyā vārtaiva jvalayati pataṃgāniva janān 
MSS apūrvo'yaṃ dhanurvedo manmathasya mahātmanaḥ 
MSS śarīramakṣataṃ kṛtvā bhinattyantargataṃ manaḥ 
MSS apūrvo'yaṃ panthāḥ śiva tava vibhutvasya katamo jagadbandho yatte padayugamakāmaṃ praṇamatām 
MSS prayāti pradhvaṃsaṃ na khalu duritaṃ kevalamidaṃ ciropāttaṃ sadyaḥ sukṛtamapi sarvaṃ vigalati 
MSS apūrvo'yaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ kamalalocane 
MSS śo'ntaraṃ yo vijānāti sa vidvannātra saṃśayaḥ 
MSS apṛcchaṃ putradārādīṃs tairukto'haṃ raghattama 
MSS pāpaṃ tavaiva tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ tu phalabhāginaḥ 
MSS apṛṣṭastasya na brūyād yaśca necchet parābhavam 
MSS eṣa eva satāṃ dharmo viparīto'satāṃ mataḥ 
MSS apṛṣṭastu naraḥ kiṃcid yo brūte rājasaṃsadi 
MSS na kevalamasaṃmānaṃ labhate ca viḍambanām 
MSS apṛṣṭena na vaktavyaḥ sacivena vipaścitā

MSS apṛṣṭenāpi vaktavyaṃ sacivenātra kiṃcana

MSS na kevalamasaṃmānaṃ labhate ca viḍambanam

MSS apūrṇaḥ kurute śabdaṃ na pūrṇaḥ kurute ghaṭaḥ 
MSS apekṣante na ca snehaṃ na pātraṃ na daśāntaram 
MSS sadā lokahitāsaktā ratnadīpā ivottamāḥ 
MSS apetāḥ śatrubhyo vayamiti viṣādo'yamaphalaḥ pratīkārastveṣāmaniśamanusaṃdhātumucitaḥ

MSS apradātā samṛddho'sau daridraśca mahāmanāḥ 
MSS aśrutaśca samunnaddhas tamāhurmūḍhacetasam 
MSS apradīpā yathā rātrir anādityaṃ yathā nabhaḥ 
MSS tathāsāṃvatsaro rājā bhramatyandha ivādhvani 
MSS apradhānaḥ pradhānaḥ syāt pārthivaṃ yadi sevate 
MSS pradhāno'pyapradhānaḥ syād yadi sevāvivarjitaḥ 
MSS aprabhūtamatanīyasi tanvī kāñcidhāmni pihitaikataroru 
MSS kṣaumamākulakarā vicakarṣa krāntapallavamabhīṣṭatamena 
MSS apramattaśca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ 
MSS kṛtajño dharmaśīlaśca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram 
MSS apramatte'pi puruṣe hitakāryāvalambini 
MSS daivamunmārgarasikam anyathaiva pramadyate 
MSS apramādaśca kartavyas tvayā rājñaḥ samāśraye 
MSS tvadīyasya śarīrasya vayaṃ bhāgyopajīvinaḥ 
MSS aprasannamaparāddhari patyau kopadīptamurarīkṛtadhairyam 
MSS kṣālitaṃ nu śamitaṃ nu vadhūnāṃ drāvitaṃ nu hṛdayaṃ madhuvāraiḥ 
MSS aprasādo'nadhiṣṭhānaṃ deyāṃśaharaṇaṃ ca yat 
MSS kālayāpo'pratīkāras tad vairāgyasya kāraṇam 
MSS aprastāvastutibhiraniśaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ karoti svaṃ dāridryaṃ vadati vasanaṃ darśayatyeva jīrṇam 
MSS chāyābhūtaścalati na puraḥ pārśvayornaiva paścān niḥsvaḥ khedaṃ diśati dhanināṃ vyādhivadduścikitsyaḥ 
MSS aprākṛtaḥ sa kathamastu na vismayāya yasminnuvāsa karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca 
MSS lakṣmīśca sāttvikaguṇajvalitaṃ ca tejo dharmaśca mānavinayau ca parākramaśca 
MSS aprākṛtasya cāritātiśayasya bhāvair atyadbhutairmama hṛtasya tathāpyanāsthā 
MSS ko'pyeṣa vīraśiśukākṛtiraprameya sāmarthyasārasamudāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ 
MSS aprākṛtasyāhavadurmadasya nivāryamasyāstrabalena vīryam 
MSS alpīyaso'pyāmayatulyavṛtter mahāpakārāya riporvivṛddhiḥ 
MSS aprājñena ca kātareṇa ca guṇaḥ syād bhaktiyuktena kaḥ prajñāvikramaśālino'pi hi bhavet kiṃ bhaktihīnāt phalam 
MSS prajñāvikramabhaktayaḥ samuditā yeṣāṃ guṇā bhūtaye te bhṛtyā nṛpateḥ kalatramitare saṃpatsu cāpatsu ca 
MSS aprāptakālaṃ vacanaṃ bṛhaspatirapi bruvan 
MSS labhate buddhyavajñānam avamānaṃ ca bhārata 
MSS aprāptakālavacanaṃ bṛhaspatirapi bruvan 
MSS prāpnuyād buddhiśaithilyam apamānaṃ ca śāśvatam 
MSS aprāptakālo yo mūrkho haset svecchānusārataḥ 
MSS prāpnuyād buddhyavajñānaṃ sabhāyāṃ caiva śāśvatam 
MSS aprāptakelisukhayoratimānaruddha saṃdhānayo rahasi jātaruṣorakasmāt 
MSS yūnormitho'bhilaṣatoḥ prathamānunītiṃ bhāvāḥ prasādapiśunāḥ kṣapayanti nidrām 
MSS aprāptapuṣpodgamavibhramaiva ruddhā bhujaṅgena tathā yatheyam 
MSS na śakyate spraṣṭumapīhamānair āmodinī candanaśākhikeva 
MSS aprāptaprathamāvakartanaruṣā vyānamramūkībhavad vakreṣvanyaśiraḥsu yasya dahane chinnaṃ śiro juhvataḥ 
MSS uccārya svayameva mantramakaronnāsyāhamityātmanas tyāgaṃ paṅktimukhaḥ sa vikramasuhṛdvīraḥ kathaṃ varṇyate 
MSS aprāptayauvanā nārī na kāmāya na śāntaye 
MSS saṃprāpte ṣoḍaśe varṣe gardabhī cāpsarāyate 
MSS aprāptavallabhasamāgamanādhikāyāḥ sakhyāḥ puro'tra nijacittavinodabuddhyā 
MSS ālāpaveṣagatihāsyavikatthanādyaiḥ prāṇeśvarānukṛtimākalayanti līlām 
MSS aprāpye'pi yathā kāme dharme cintā na kiṃ tathā 
MSS alābhe'pi dvayorekā bhayadā śivadāparā 
MSS aprāpyeṣurudāsitāsiraśanerārāt kutaḥ śaṅkutaś cakravyutkramakṛt parokṣaparaśuḥ śūlena śūnyā yayā 
MSS mṛtyurdaityapateḥ kṛtaḥ sa sadṛśaḥ pādāṅgulīparvataḥ pārvatyā pratipālyatāṃ tribhuvanaṃ niḥśalyakalyaṃ tayā 
MSS aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ cātilaṅghanam 
MSS sarvatra cānavasthānam etannāśanamātmanaḥ 
MSS aprārthanamasaṃsparśam asaṃdarśanameva ca 
MSS puruṣasyeha niyamo bhavedrāgaprahāṇaye 
MSS aprārthitaṃ yathā duḥkhaṃ tathā sukhamapi svayam 
MSS prāṇinaṃ pratipadyeta sarvaṃ niyatiyantritam 
MSS apriyaṃ na hi bhāṣeta na virudhyeta kenacit 
MSS kāryasiddhiṃ samīheta kāryabhraṃśo hi mūrkhatā 
MSS apriyaṃ puruṣa cāpi paradrohaṃ parastriyam 
MSS adharmamanṛtaṃ caiva dūrāt prājño vivarjayet 
MSS apriyaṃ yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyaṃ caret 
MSS acireṇa priyaḥ sa syād yo'priyaḥ priyamācaret 
MSS apriyamuktāḥ puruṣāḥ prayatante dviguṇamapriyaṃ vaktum 
MSS tasmādavācyamapriyam apriyamaśrotukāmena 
MSS apriyavacanadaridraiḥ priyavacanāḍhyaiḥ svadāraparituṣṭaiḥ 
MSS paraparivādanivṛttaiḥ kvacit kvacin maṇḍitā vasudhā 
MSS apriyavacanāṅgārair dagdho'pi na vipriyaṃ vadatyāryaḥ 
MSS kiṃ dahyamānamagaru svabhāvasurabhiṃ parityajati 
MSS apriyasyāpi vacasaḥ pariṇāmāvirodhinaḥ 
MSS vaktā śrotā ca yatrāsti ramante tatra saṃpadaḥ 
MSS apriyāṇyapi kurvantaḥ svārthāyodyata ceṣṭitāḥ 
MSS paṇḍitā nopalabhyante vāyasairiva kokilāḥ 
MSS apriyāṇyapi kurvāṇo niṣṭhurāṇyapi ca bruvan 
MSS cetaḥ prahlādayatyeva sarvāvasthāsu vallabhaḥ 
MSS apriyāṇyapi kurvāṇo yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva saḥ 
MSS dagdhamandirasāre'pi kasya vahnāvanādaraḥ 
MSS apriyāṇyapi pathyāni ye vadanti nṛṇāmiha 
MSS ta eva suhṛdaḥ proktā anye syurnāmadhārakāḥ 
MSS apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati 
MSS ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati 
MSS apriyaiḥ saha saṃvāsaḥ priyaiścāpi vinābhavaḥ 
MSS asadbhiḥ saṃprayogaśca tadduḥkhaṃ cirajīvinām 
MSS apriyairapi niṣpiṣṭaiḥ kiṃ syāt kleśāsahiṣṇubhiḥ 
MSS ye tadunmūlane śaktā jigīṣā teṣu śobhate 
MSS apriyo'pi hi pathyaḥ syād iti vṛddhānuśāsanam 
MSS vṛddhānuśāsane tiṣṭhan priyatāmupagacchati 
MSS aprītāṃ rogiṇīṃ nārīm antarvatnīṃ dhṛtavratām 
MSS rajasvalāmakāmāṃ ca na kāmeta balāt pumān 
MSS apsu plavante pāṣāṇā mānuṣā ghnanti rākṣasān 
MSS kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ 
MSS apsvātmānaṃ na vīkṣeta nāvagāhet payorayam 
MSS saṃdigdhanāvaṃ nārohen na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret 
MSSA aphalaṃ śrāddham apātre dhanam aphalaṃ yat na dattamarthibhyaḥ 
MSSA yauvanamaphalaṃ yaminaś śrutamaphalaṃ durvinītasya 
MSS aphalasyāpi vṛkṣasya chāyā bhavati śītalā 
MSS nirguṇo'pi varaṃ bandhur yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ 
MSS aphalāni durantāni samavyayaphalāni ca 
MSS aśakyāni ca kāryāṇi nārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ 
MSS abandhuṣvapi bandhutvaṃ snehāt samupajāyate 
MSS bandhuṣvapi ca bandhutvam alokajñeṣu hīyate 
MSS abalaḥ pronnataṃ śatruṃ yo yāti madamohitaḥ 
MSS yuddhārthaṃ sa nivarteta śīrṇadanto yathā gajaḥ 
MSS abalasvakulāśino jhaṣān nijanīḍadrumapīḍinaḥ khagān 
MSS anavadyatṛṇārdino mṛgān mṛgayāghāya na bhūbhujāṃ ghnatām 
MSS abalāṃ balinā nītāṃ daśāmimāṃ makaraketunā rakṣa 
MSS āpatpatitoddhṛtaye bhavati hi śubhajanmanāṃ janma 
MSS abalā api vīreśān yatsāhāyyamupāśritāḥ 
MSS parābhavanti dṛkkoṇapātenaiva sa manmathaḥ 
MSS abalāḍhyavigrahaśrīr amartyanatirakṣamālayopetaḥ 
MSS pañcakramoditamukhaḥ pāyāt parameśvaro muhuranādiḥ 
MSS abalābuddhihīnāyā doṣaṃ kṣantuṃ sadārhasi 
MSS mūḍhasya satataṃ doṣaṃ kṣamāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ 
MSS abalā yatra prabalā śiśuravanīśo nirakṣaro mantrī 
MSS nahi nahi tatra dhanāśā jīvita āśāpi durlabhā bhavati 
MSS abalāvanapara eko bhuvanatritaye'pi cettadā bharttā 
MSS kathamanyathā sudhākara candanamukhyāpriyatvaṃ syāt 
MSS abalā viṣaheta kathaṃ dṛḍhaśaktimamuṣya ratirasaprasaram 
MSS madanatulitānurāgo na vidadhyādyadi balādhānam 
MSS abalāsu vilāsino'nvabhūvan nayanaireva navopagūhanāni 
MSS marudāgamavārtayāpi śūnye samaye jāgrati saṃpravṛddha eva 
MSS abaleti parīvādo vṛthā hi hariṇīdṛśām 
MSS yāsāṃ netranipātena naṭavad ghūrṇyate jagat 
MSS abale salile vyavasyatā te mukhabhāvo gamito na paṅkajena 
MSS kathamādimavarṇatāntyajasya dvijarājena kṛtorunigrahasya 
MSS abalo'si na jitakāśī pratibhaṭarāśīn parāpata kṣitipa 
MSS jātāmbhaḥkaṇapātaḥ kva vinaśyatyanalasaṃghātaḥ 
MSS abālarucire bhruvau na ca marālamandā gatir dṛgañcalamacañcalaṃ hṛdayabhūdabhūto dayā 
MSS sudhā na khalu vākpathātithirathāpi yūnāṃ mano manojaśarajarjjarannayati mohamasyāstanuḥ 
MSS abudhā ajaṃgamā api kayāpi gatyā paraṃ padamavāptāḥ 
MSS mantriṇa iti kīrtyante nayabalaguṭikā iva janena 
MSS abudhaiḥ kṛtamānasaṃvidas tava pārthaiḥ kuta eva yogyatā 
MSS sahasi plavagairupāsitaṃ na hi guñjāphalameti soṣmatām 
MSS abudhairarthalābhāya paṇyastrībhiriva svayam 
MSS ātmā saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya paropakaraṇīkṛtaḥ 
MSS abuddhimāśritānāṃ ca kṣantavyamaparādhinām 
MSS na hi sarvatra pāṇḍityaṃ sulabhaṃ puruṣeṇa vai 
MSS atha ced buddhijaṃ kṛtvā brūyuste tadabuddhijam 
MSS pāpān svalpe'pi tān hanyād aparādhe tathānṛjūn 
MSS abuddhvā cittamaprāpya viśrambhaṃ prabhaviṣṇuṣu 
MSS na svecchaṃ vyavahartavyam ātmano bhūtimicchatā 
MSS abodhi no hrīnibhṛtaṃ madiṅgitaṃ pratītya vā nādṛtavatyasāviti 
MSS lunāti yūnaḥ sma dhiyaṃ kiyadgatā nivṛtya bālādaradarśaneṣuṇā 
MSS abjaṃ tvajjamathābjabhūstata idaṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍāt punar viśvaṃ sthāvarajaṃgamaṃ taditarat tvanmūlamitthaṃ payaḥ 
MSS dhik tvāṃ caura iva prayāsi nibhṛtaṃ nirgatya jālāntarair badhyante vivaśāstvadekaśaraṇāstvāmāśritā jantavaḥ 
MSS abdāyanartuṣvatha māsapakṣa dināni kārye'pyavadhau vidadhyāt 
MSS hīnāvadhiryena bhavatyasatyaḥ sarvo'pi loke śakuno gṛhītaḥ 
MSS abdebhakumbhe nirbinne vidyutkhaḍgalatāhate 
MSS svacchamuktāphalasthūlā nipetustoyabindavaḥ

MSS manye deva tayā krameṇa janito yuṣmatpratāpānalo yenārātivadhūvilocanajalaiḥ sikto'pi saṃvardhate 
MSS abdhinā saha mitratve dāridryaṃ yadi jāyate 
MSS lāñchanaṃ sāgarasyaiva maitrīkarturna lāñchanam 
MSS abdhirna tṛpyati yathā saritāṃ sahasrair no cendhanairiva śikhī bahudhopanītaiḥ

MSS abdhī ratnamadho dhatte dhatte vā śirasā tṛṇam

MSS tasya dehavimuktasya kṣaya eva na vidyate

MSS samayasulabhāṃ kīrtiṃ bhavyāmasūta sutāmasāv api ramayituṃ rāgāndheva bhramatyakhilaṃ jagat 
MSS abhayasya hi yo dātā sa pūjyaḥ satataṃ nṛpaḥ 
MSS satraṃ hi vardhate tasya sadaivābhayadakṣiṇam 
MSS abhayasyaiva yo dātā tasyaiva sumahatphalam 
MSS na hi prāṇasamaṃ dānaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate 
MSS abhavadabhinavaprarohabhājāṃ chaviparipāṭiṣu yaḥ purāṅgakānām 
MSS ahaha virahavaikṛte sa tasyāḥ kraśimani saṃprati dūrvayā vivādaḥ

MSS yathā viṣaṃ raudraviṣo'ti pannagaḥ saśarkaraṃ cāru payaḥ pibannapi

MSS abhāve paṭṭasūtrasya hāriṇī snāyuriṣyate

MSS abhinavavadhūroṣasvādaḥ karīṣatanūnapād asaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ 
MSS galitavibhavasyājñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā raver virahivanitāvaktraupamyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ 
MSS abhinavaviṣavallīpādapadmasya viṣṇor madanamathanamaulermālatīpuṣpamālā 
MSS jayati jayapatākā kāpyasau mokṣalakṣmyāḥ kṣapitakalikalaṅkā jāhnavī naḥ punātu 
MSS abhinavasevakavinayaiḥ prāghuṇakoktairvilāsinīruditaiḥ 
MSS dhūrtajanavacananikarair iha kaścidavañcito nāsti 
MSS abhinaṣati vainateyaṃ cāmarasahitaḥ sasatyabhāmo yaḥ 
MSS nārāyaṇaḥ sa sākṣād vibudhasamarcyaḥ sadā jayatu 
MSS abhinnavelau gambhīrāv amburāśirbhavānapi 
MSS asāvañjanasaṃkāśas tvaṃ tu cāmīkaradyutiḥ 
MSS abhinneṣvapi kāryeṣu bhidyate manasaḥ kriyā 
MSS anyathaiva stanaṃ putraś cintayatyanyathā patiḥ 
MSS abhipatati ghanaṃ śṛṇoti garjāḥ sahati śilāḥ sahate taḍittaraṅgān 
MSS vidhuvati garutaṃ rutaṃ vidhatte jalapṛṣate kiyate'pi cātako'yam 
MSS abhiprāyaṃ yo viditvā tu bhartuḥ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi karotyatandrīḥ 
MSS vaktā hitānāmanurakta āryaḥ śaktijña ātmeva hi so'nukampyaḥ 
MSS vākyaṃ tu yo nādriyate'nuśiṣṭaḥ pratyāha yaścāpi niyujyamānaḥ 
MSS prajñābhimānī pratikūlavādī tyājyaḥ sa tādṛktvarayaiva bhṛtyaḥ 
MSS abhiprāyānusāreṇa prakaṭīkurute priyam 
MSS aho mahāprabhāvānāṃ bhūpatīnāṃ vasuṃdharā 
MSS abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ pūjito yaḥ surairapi 
MSS sarvavighnacchide tasmai gaṇādhipataye namaḥ 
MSS abhibhavati manaḥ kadambavāyau madamadhure ca śikhaṇḍināṃ nināde 
MSS jana iva na dhṛteścacāla jiṣṇur na hi mahatāṃ sukaraḥ samādhibhaṅgaḥ 
MSS abhibhūto'pi notsāhaṃ jahyājjātu svasiddhaye 
MSS naṣṭāṅgo'pi grasatyeva saiṃhikeyo muhurdviṣau 
MSS abhibhūto'pyavajñāto yo rājñāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhati 
MSS sa tu rājñāṃ śriyaṃ bhuṅkte nābhimānī kadācana 
MSS abhibhūya vibhūtimārtavīṃ madhugandhātiśayena vīrudhām 
MSS nṛpateramarasragāpa sā dayitorustanakoṭisusthitam 
MSS abhibhūya satāmavasthitiṃ jaḍajeṣu pratipādya ca śriyam 
MSS jagatīparitāpakṛt kathaṃ jaladhau nāvapatedasau raviḥ 
MSS abhimataphaladātā tvaṃ ca kalpadrumaśca prakaṭamiha viśeṣaṃ kaṃcanodāharāmaḥ 
MSS kathamiha madhuroktipremasaṃmānamiśraṃ tulayati suraśākhī deva dānaṃ tvadīyam 
MSS abhimataphalasiddhisiddhamantrā vali balijitparameṣṭhinorupāsye 
MSS bhagavati madanārināri vande nikhilanagādhipabhartṛdārike tvām 
MSS abhimatamabhitaḥ kṛtāṅgabhaṅgā kucayugamunnativittamunnamayya 
MSS tanurabhilaṣitaṃ klamacchalena vyavṛṇuta vellitabāhuvallarīkā 
MSS abhimatamahāmānagranthiprabhedapaṭīyasī gurutaraguṇagrāmāmbhojasphuṭojjvalacandrikā 
MSS vipulavilasallajjāvallīvidārakuṭhārikā jaṭharapiṭharī duḥpūreyaṃ karoti viḍambanām 
MSS abhimatavastūpahṛtā vapi gurugarvādanādarastanvyāḥ 
MSS skhalite'pi priyasya saṃ yamatāḍanamityeva bibbokaḥ 
MSS abhimatasiddhiraśeṣā bhavati hi puruṣasya puruṣakāreṇa 
MSS daivamiti yadapi kathayasi puruṣaguṇaḥ so'pyadṛṣṭākhyaḥ 
MSS abhimantrya śucividhānād ājyāḍhyaṃ hastikarṇajaṃ cūrṇam 
MSS yo'śnāti sa hi naraḥ syād yatheṣṭaceṣṭo'pi dīrghāyuḥ 
MSS abhimānadhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ciraṃ jīvanti te narāḥ 
MSS abhimānavihīnānāṃ kiṃ dhanena kimāyuṣā 
MSS abhimānadhanasya gatvarair asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaścicīṣataḥ 
MSS acirāṃśuvilāsacañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalamānuṣaṅgikam 
MSS abhimānavatāṃ puṃsām ātmasāramajānatām 
MSS andhānāmiva dṛśyante patanāntāḥ pravṛttayaḥ 
MSS abhimānavatāṃ brahman yuktāyuktavivekinām 
MSS yujyate'vaśyabhogyānāṃ duḥkhānāmaprakāśanam 
MSS abhimānavato manasvinaḥ priyamuccaiḥ padamārurukṣataḥ 
MSS vinipātanivartanakṣamaṃ matamālambanamātmapauruṣam 
MSS abhimānitabhūtena sānubandharasena tu 
MSS yataḥ sarvendriyaprītiḥ sa kāmaḥ procyate budhaiḥ 
MSS abhimāninamudbhrāntam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ śaṭham 
MSS krodhanaṃ caiva nṛpatiṃ vyasane ghnanti vairiṇaḥ 
MSS abhimukhagate yasminneva priye bahuśo vadaty avanatamukhaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthitaṃ mṛganetrayā 
MSS atha kila balāllīlālolaṃ sa eṣa tathekṣitaḥ kathamapi yathā dṛṣṭyā manye kṛtaṃ śrutilaṅghanam 
MSSA abhimukhamadhuratarebhyaḥ parāṅmukhākrośanāt kuśīlebhyaḥ 
MSSA abhyantarakaluṣebhyo bhetavyaṃ mitraśatrubhyaḥ 
MSS abhimukhanihatasya satas tiṣṭhatu tāvajjayo'tha vā svargaḥ 
MSS ubhayabalasādhuvādaḥ śravaṇamukho'styeva cātyartham 
MSS abhimukhapatayālubhirlalāṭa śramasalilairavidhautapatralekhaḥ 
MSS kathayati puruṣāyitaṃ vadhūnāṃ mṛditahimadyutidurmanāḥ kapolaḥ 
MSS abhimukhapatitairguṇaprakarṣād avajitamuddhatimujjvalāṃ dadhānaiḥ 
MSS tarukisalayajālamagrahastaiḥ prasabhamanīyata bhaṅgamaṅganānām 
MSS abhimukhamupayāti māṃ sma kiṃcit tvamabhidadhāḥ paṭale madhuvratānām 
MSS madhusurabhimukhābjagandhalabdher adhikamadhi tvadanena mā nipāti 
MSS abhimukhāgatamārgaṇadhoraṇi dhvanitapallavitāmbaragahvare 
MSS vitaraṇe ca raṇe ca samudyate bhavati ko'pi paraṃ viralaḥ paraḥ 
MSS abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam 
MSS vinayavāritavṛttiratastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ 
MSS abhimuni sahasā hṛte parasyā ghanamarutā jaghanāṃśukaikadeśe 
MSS cakitamavasanoru satrapāyāḥ pratiyuvatīrapi vismayaṃ nināya 
MSS abhiyāti naḥ satṛṣa eṣa cakṣuṣo harirityakhidyata nitambinījanaḥ 
MSS na viveda yaḥ satatamenamīkṣate na vitṛṣṇatāṃ vrajati khalvasāvapi 
MSS abhiyuktaṃ balavatā durlabhaṃ hīnasādhanam 
MSS hṛtasvaṃ kāminaṃ coram āviśanti prajāgarāḥ 
MSS abhiyukto balavatā tiṣṭhan durge prayatnavān 
MSS tadbalīyastarāhvānaṃ kurvītātmavimuktaye 
MSS abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāṃcid gatimātmanaḥ 
MSS yudhyamānastadā prājño mriyate ripuṇā saha 
MSS abhiyoktā balī yasmād alabdhvā na nivartate 
MSS upahārādṛte tasmāt saṃdhiranyo na vidyate 
MSS abhirāme'bhiniveśaṃ vidadhānā vividhalābhanirapekṣā 
MSS upahasyase sumadhye vidagdhavārāṅganāvāraiḥ 
MSS abhilakṣyaṃ sthiraṃ puṇyaṃ khyātaṃ sadbhirniṣevitam 
MSS seveta siddhimanvicchañ ślāghyaṃ vindhyamiveśvaram 
MSS abhilaṣata upāyaṃ vikramaṃ kīrtilakṣmyor asugamamarisainyairaṅkamabhyāgatasya 
MSS janaka iva śiśutve supriyasyaikasūnor avinayamapi sehe pāṇḍavasya smarāriḥ 
MSS abhilaṣati na khalu puruṣaḥ śriyamapi kīrtyā vinākṛtāṃ kuśalaḥ 
MSS kṣaṇikāya vastune kas tyajatīha cirasthiraṃ śreyaḥ 
MSS abhilaṣati padmayonau niḥsvavadhūnāṃ sutān sraṣṭum 
MSS svaṃ svaṃ viśaṅkamānā vepante krakacavarttino lokāḥ 
MSS abhilaṣatoranubhāvān tilottamāyāḥ kilottamānubhayoḥ 
MSS sundopasundayorapi nāśo bhedādudāhriyate 
MSS abhilaṣanti tavādharamādhurīṃ tadiha kiṃ hariṇākṣi mudhā budhāḥ 
MSS surasudhāmadharīkurute yatas tvadadharo'dharatāmagamat tataḥ 
MSS abhilaṣasi yadīndo vaktralakṣmīṃ mṛgākṣyāḥ punarapi sakṛdabdhau majja saṃkṣālayāṅkam 
MSS suvimalamatha bimbaṃ pārijātaprasūnaiḥ surabhaya vada no cet tvaṃ kva tasyā mukhaṃ kva 
MSS abhilaṣitādhikavarade praṇipatitajanārtihāriṇi śaraṇye 
MSS caraṇau namāmyahaṃ te vidyādharadevate gauri 
MSS abhivarṣati yo'nupālayan vidhibījāni vivekavāriṇā 
MSS sa sadā phalaśālinīṃ kriyāṃ śaradaṃ loka ivādhitiṣṭhati 
MSS abhivādanaśīlasya nityaṃ vṛddhopasevinaḥ 
MSS catvāri tasya vardhanta āyuḥ prajñā yaśo balam 
MSS abhivādayeta vṛddham āsanaṃ cāsya darśayet 
MSS kṛtāñjalirupāsīta gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato'nviyāt 
MSS abhivādya yathā vṛddhān santo gacchanti nirvṛtim 
MSS evaṃ sajjanamākruśya mūrkho bhavati nirvṛtaḥ 
MSS abhivīkṣya sāmikṛtamaṇḍanaṃ yatīḥ kararuddhanīvigaladaṃśukāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS dadhire'dhibhitti paṭahapratisvanaiḥ sphuṭamaṭṭahāsamiva saudhapaṅktayaḥ 
MSS abhiśaptaḥ puṇyakārye pravṛtto'pi na siddhibhāk 
MSS bhartrānugamanodyuktā reṇukā janamārikā 
MSS abhiśastavat prapaśyanti daridraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam 
MSS dāridryaṃ pātikaṃ loke kastacchaṃsitumarhati 
MSS abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣuṃ bhuvanāni yaḥ smaramivākhyata lodhrarajaścayaḥ 
MSS kṣubhitasainyaparāgavipāṇḍura dyutirayaṃ tirayannudabhūddiśaḥ 
MSS abhiṣekārdraśirasā rājā rājyāvalokinā 
MSS sahāyavaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ tatra rājyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam 
MSS yadapyalpataraṃ karma tadapyekena duṣkaram 
MSS puruṣeṇāsahāyena kimu rājyaṃ mahodayam 
MSS abhisaraṇaparā sadā varākī samaramahādhvasu raktapaṅkileṣu 
MSS hṛdi dharaṇibhujāmiyaṃ nṛpaśrīr nihitapadaiva kalaṅkamātanoti 
MSS abhisaraṇamayuktamaṅganānām iti tava sundari mā sma bhūdvitarkaḥ 
MSS nanu patimagamat svayaṃ nadīnāṃ saridapi śaṃbhujaṭāmuhūrtamālā 
MSS abhisaraṇarasaḥ kṛśāṅgayaṣṭer ayamaparatra na vīkṣitaḥ śruto vā 
MSS ahimapi yadiyaṃ nirāsa nāṅghrer nibiḍatanūpuramātmanīnabuddhyā 
MSS abhisāre sarojākṣi yadi gantuṃ samīhase 
MSS samācchādya mukhaṃ yāhi prayatnena priyaṃ prati 
MSS abhihanti hanta kathameṣa mādhavaṃ sukumārakāyamanavagrahaḥ smaraḥ 
MSS acireṇa vaikṛtavivartadāruṇaḥ kalabhaṃ kaṭhora iva kūṭapākalaḥ 
MSS abhihitāpyabhiyogaparāṅmukhī prakaṭamaṅgavilāsamakurvatī 
MSS upari te puruṣāyitumakṣamā navavadhūriva śatrupatākinī 
MSS abhīkṣṇamuccairdhvanatā payomucā ghanāndhakārīkṛtaśarvarīṣvapi 
MSS taḍitprabhādarśitamārgabhūmayaḥ prayānti rāgādabhisārikāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS abhīkṣṇamuṣṇairapi tasya soṣmaṇaḥ surendrabandīśvasitānilairyathā 
MSS sacandanāmbhaḥkaṇakomalaistathā vapurjalārdrāpavanairna nirvavau 
MSS abhīpsāṃ svātmano rakṣā'virataṃ susthiraṃ tathā 
MSS yatnamātiṣṭha dhairyeṇa tataḥ siddhirbhaved dhruvam 
MSS abhīṣṭaphalasaṃsiddhis tuṣṭiḥ kāmyā susaṃpadaḥ 
MSS dvitribhirbahubhi sārdhaṃ bhojanena prajāyate 
MSS abhīṣṭamāsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛtāśaṃ kamanī cakāśe 
MSS yoṣinmanojanmasukhodayeṣu samuddhṛtāśaṅkamanīcakāśe 
MSS abhuktāyāṃ yasyāṃ kṣaṇamapi na yātaṃ nṛpaśatair bhuvas tasyā lābhe ka iva bahumānaḥ kṣitibhujām 
MSS tadaṃśasyāpyaṃśe tadavayavaleśe'pi patayo viṣāde kartavye vidadhati jaḍāḥ pratyuta mudam 
MSS abhuktvāmalakaṃ pathyaṃ bhuktvā tu badarīphalam 
MSS kapitthaṃ sarvadā pathyaṃ kadalī na kadācana 
MSS abhuñjatāṃścādadatāṃ dhanaṃ caurā haranti hi 
MSS saraghāṇāṃ yathā sarvaṃ mākṣikaṃ vanacāriṇaḥ 
MSS abhūtapūrvaṃ mama bhāvi kiṃ vā sarvaṃ sahe me sahajaṃ ca duḥkham 
MSS kiṃ tu tvadagre śaraṇāgatānāṃ parābhavo nātha na te'nurūpam 
MSS abhūtamāsajya viruddhamīhitaṃ balādalabhyaṃ tava lipsate nṛpaḥ 
MSS vijānato'pi hyanayasya raudratāṃ bhavatyapāye parimohinī matiḥ 
MSS abhūt prācī piṅgā rasapatiriva prāśya kanakaṃ gatacchāyaścandro budhajana iva grāmyasadasi 
MSS kṣaṇāt kṣīṇāstārā nṛpataya ivānudyamaparā na dīpā rājante draviṇarahitānāmiva guṇāḥ 
MSS abhūdambhorāśeḥ saha vasatirāsīt kamalayā guṇānāmādhāro nayanaphalaminduḥ prathayati 
MSS kathaṃ siṃhīsūnustamapi tudati prauḍhadaśanair guṇānāmāsvādaṃ piśunarasanā kiṃ rasayati 
MSS abhūvannadbhutoṣmāṇaḥ śītavyāpte jagattraye 
MSS kucotsaṅgāḥ kṛśāṅgīṇāṃ sthānaṃ manmathatejasaḥ 
MSS abhedenaiva yudhyeran rakṣeyuśca parasparam 
MSS phalgu sainyasya yat kiṃcin madhye vyūhasya tadbhavet 
MSS abhedenopāste kumudamudare vā sthitavato vipakṣādambhojādupagatavato vā madhulihaḥ 
MSS aparyāptaḥ ko'pi svaparaparicaryāparicaya prabandhaḥ sādhūnāmayamanabhisaṃdhānamadhuraḥ 
MSS abhedyo'nuddhataḥ stabdhaḥ sūnṛtaḥ priyadarśanaḥ 
MSS bahuśrutaḥ kālavedī jitagrantho'rthakarmavit 
MSS abhogasubhagā bhūtir adainyadhavalaṃ kulam 
MSS adarpaviśadā vidyā bhavatyunnatacetasām 
MSS abhoginau maṇḍalinau tatkṣaṇānmuktakañcukau 
MSS varamāśīviṣau spṛṣṭau na tu patnyāḥ payodharau 
MSS abhyaktaṃ rahasi gataṃ vicittamanyena mantrayantaṃ vā 
MSS ucitapraṇayamapi nṛpaṃ sahasāryā nopasarpanti 
MSS abhyaktamiva snātaḥ śuciraśucimiva prabuddha iva suptam 
MSS baddhamiva strairagatir janamiha sukhasaṅginamavaimi 
MSS abhyaghāni municāpalāt tvayā yanmṛgaḥ kṣitipateḥ parigrahaḥ 
MSS akṣamiṣṭa tadayaṃ pramādyatāṃ saṃvṛṇoti khalu doṣamajñatā 
MSSA abhyantaragatā bāhyā bāhyāścābhyataraṃ gatāḥ 
MSSA yairnarā nidhanaṃ yānti yathā rājā kacadrumaḥ 
MSS abhyarthaye kimapi jīvitajanmatastvām utkaṇṭhatodgati niḥsara tāvadeva 
MSS kānte dṛgantapathalambini jīvatīti yāvanna karṇapathameti janāpavādaḥ 
MSS abhyarthya sapraṇati mandiramabhyupetā devī svayaṃ bhagavatī pṛthageva tāsām 
MSS āsannavallabhasamāgamasūcanāni saṃjīvanāni vacanānyapi vācitāni 
MSS abhyastāḥ sphuṭameva śāstragatayaḥ samyakkavitvodadheḥ pāraṃ cādhigataṃ satāṃ pariṣadi prāptaḥ pratiṣṭhodayaḥ 
MSS nirviṇṇasya mamādhunā nanu paraḥ panthā na dainyaṃ vinā netuṃ vāñchati vāsanā suradhunītīre'nurūpaṃ vayaḥ 
MSS abhyaste'pi nitambabhāraphalake khedālaseyaṃ gatiḥ kiṃcit saṃvalitārdhapakṣmaviralālokā dṛśo'ntargatāḥ 
MSS tanmanye nibhṛtaṃ tvayādya hṛdaye kaściddhṛto vallabho niśvāsāḥ kathamanyathā dviguṇatāmete tavaivaṃ gatāḥ 
MSS abhyaste'pi hi nāma vastuni cirādajñānasaṃbhāvanaṃ śaucāśaucāvivāditā viśakalasmṛtyakṣarāvartanam 
MSS vāraṃ vāramṛṇopaghātakathanaṃ ko'pyeṣa ḍambhātmanāṃ prāyo dagdhadurīśavañcanavidhau jāgartyapūrvaḥ kramaḥ 
MSS abhyasya pavanavijayaṃ vyākhyāya ca śaivasaṃhitāḥ sakalāḥ 
MSS maraṇasamaye gurūṇāṃ pardavadasavo viniṣkrāntāḥ 
MSS abhyasya vedamavadhāya ca pūrvatantram ālakṣya śiṣṭacaritāni pṛthagvidhāni 
MSS adhyāpanādibhiravāpya dhanaṃ ca bhūri karmāṇi mātaralasāḥ kathamācareyuḥ 
MSS abhyasya smaradaṃśakauśalamupādhyāyīrupāsyāvayoḥ krīḍāmnāyarahasyavastuni mitho'pyāsījjigīṣā sakhi 
MSS utkampotpulakāṅgasaṃbhṛtaghanasvedāvilastanmayā sadyo niṣpratibhaḥ sa manmathakathāvaitaṇḍikaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ 
MSS abhyasyādau śrutimatha gṛhaṃ prāpya labdhvā mahārthān iṣṭvā yajñairjanitatanayaḥ pravrajedāyuṣo'nte 
MSS ityācaṣṭe ya iha sa manuryājñavalkyo'pi vā me tāvat kālaṃ pratibhavati cedāyuṣastatpramāṇam 
MSS abhyāyāntaṃ jhaṭiti gilituṃ vāyumapyāyatāsye bhīmākāre prakṛtikuṭile baddhanirvyājavaire 
MSS prāyeṇetthaṃ kṛtaparicaye pāpini krūrasarpe bhadraśrībhiḥ paricitikathā kīdṛśī mādṛśānām 
MSS abhyāvahati kalyāṇaṃ vividhā vāksubhāṣitā 
MSS saiva durbhāṣitā rājann anarthāyopapadyate 
MSS abhyāsaḥ karmaṇāṃ samyag utpādayati kauśalam 
MSS vidhinā tāvadabhyastaṃ yāvat sṛṣṭā mṛgekṣaṇā 
MSS abhyāsakāraṇā vidyā lakṣmīḥ puṇyānusāriṇī 
MSS dānānusāriṇī kīrtir buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī 
MSS abhyāsarahitā vidyā nirudyogā nṛpaśriyaḥ 
MSS veṣayoṣāśca rāgiṇyo hāsyāyatanamaṅgane 
MSS abhyāsaśchandasāṃ daṇḍo jvaradaṇḍaśca laṅghanam 
MSS yamadaṇḍo viṣṇubhaktiḥ śatrudaṇḍaḥ śubhā gatiḥ 
MSS abhyāsasthitacūtaṣaṇḍagahanasthānādito gehinī grāmaṃ kaṃcidavṛkṣakaṃ virahiṇī tūrṇaṃ vadhūrnīyatām 
MSS atrāyāntyacireṇa kokilakulavyāhārajhaṃkāriṇaḥ panthastrījanajīvitaikaharaṇaprauḍhāḥ puro vāsarāḥ 
MSS abhyāsāttu sthirasvānta ūrdhvaretāśca jāyate 
MSS parānandamayo yogī jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ 
MSS abhyāsāddhāryate vidyā kulaṃ śīlena dhāryate 
MSS guṇena jñāyate tvāryaḥ kopo netreṇa gamyate

MSS guṇairmitrāṇi dhāryante akṣṇā krodhaśca dhāryate 
MSS abhyāsānusarī vidyā buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī 
MSS udyogānusarī lakṣmīḥ phalaṃ bhāgyānusāri ca 
MSS abhyāsena sthiraṃ cittam abhyāsenānilacyutiḥ 
MSS abhyāsena parānando hyabhyāsenātmadarśanam 
MSS abhyāsenānyasaṃcāro hyabhyāsenānyarūpatā 
MSS abhyāsena samutkrāntir abhyāsenāṇimādayaḥ 
MSS abhyāso ratihetor bhavati narāṇāṃ na vastusadguṇataḥ 
MSS satyapi māṃsopacaye rāgāya kucau sphijau na punaḥ 
MSS abhyāso hi karmaṇāṃ kauśalamāvahati 
MSS na hi sakṛnnipātamātreṇoda bindurapi grāvaṇi nimnatāmādadhāti 
MSS abhyukṣito'si salilairna balāhakānāṃ cāṣāgrapakṣasadṛśaṃ bhṛśamantarāle 
MSS mithyaitadānanamidaṃ bhavatastathā hi hemantapadmamiva niṣprabhatāmupaiti 
MSS abhyutthānamupāgate gṛhapatau tadbhāṣaṇe namratā tatpādārpitadṛṣṭirāsanavidhistasyopacaryā svayam 
MSS supte tatra śayīta tatprathamato jahyācca śayyāmiti prācyaiḥ putri niveditaḥ kulavadhūsiddhāntadharmāgamaḥ 
MSS abhyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ krīḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ 
MSS ekatra janmani kṛtaṃ tadanena yūnā janmatraye yadakarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

MSS abhyunnatastanayugā taralāyatākṣī dvāri sthitā tadupayānamahotsavāya 
MSS sā pūrṇakumbhanavanīrajatoraṇasrak saṃbhāramaṅgalamayatnakṛtaṃ vidhatte 
MSS abhyunnatāṅguṣṭhanakhaprabhābhir nikṣepaṇādrāgamivodgirantau

MSS abhyunnatānāmaṇurapyudāraṃ paścāt prakopaṃ janayedarīṇām 
MSS taṃ cāpramattaḥ prasamīkṣya yāyān na nāśayed dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭahetoḥ 
MSS abhyunnatā purastād avagāḍhā jaghanagauravāt paścāt 
MSS dvāre'sya pāṇḍusikate padapaṅktirdṛśyate'bhinavā 
MSS abhyunnate'pi jalade jagadekasāra sādhāraṇapraṇayahāriṇi hā yadete 
MSS ullāsalāsyalalitaṃ taravo na yānti he dāvapāvaka sa tāvaka eva doṣaḥ

MSS tvadyaśorāja haṃsasya pañjaraṃ bhuvanatrayam

MSS yeṣāmupetya sotkampā rājāno'pi karapradāḥ 
MSS amīṣāṃ mohādvā dharaṇidharacūḍāñcalabhuvām abhāgyādvā kaiścinmarakatamaṇiścenna gaṇitaḥ

MSS amīṣāmāmodapraṇayasubhagaṃ saṃgatamabhūt prasūnairunnidraiḥ saha bahubhireva prativanam

MSS amīṣāmārūḍhaprasavavivarāṇāṃ madhulihāṃ dhvaniḥ pānthastrīṇāṃ prasarati viyogajvara iva

MSS amīṣāmuṣṇāṃśoḥ kiraṇanikarāṇāṃ paricayāt sarastīkṣṇaṃ mābhūstava kila nisargaḥ śiśirimā 
MSS durātmāno hyete katipayapayobindurasikān nirasyantaḥ pānthāṃstvayi kimapi śoṣaṃ vidadhati 
MSS amī samuddhūtasarojareṇunā hṛtā hṛtāsārakaṇena vāyunā 
MSS upāgame duścaritā ivāpadāṃ gatiṃ na niścetumalaṃ śilīmukhāḥ 
MSS amī hi vastrāntaniruddhavaktrāḥ prayānti me dūrataraṃ vayasyāḥ 
MSS paro'pi bandhuḥ sukhasaṃsthitasya mitraṃ na kaścid viṣamasthitasya 
MSS amī hi vṛkṣāḥ phalapuṣpaśobhitāḥ kaṭhoraniṣpandalatopaveṣṭitāḥ 
MSS nṛpājñayā rakṣijanena pālitā narāḥ sadārā iva yānti nirvṛtim 
MSS amī helonmeṣavyasaniṣu palāśeṣu paritaḥ pibanti svacchandaṃ madhu madhuliho mādyati janaḥ 
MSS ayaṃ ca pratyagraṃ daśati sahakāraṃ parabhṛto yadīdaṃ marmāntarvidalati ka eṣa vyatikaraḥ 
MSS amuṃ kālakṣepaṃ tyaja jalada gambhīramadhuraiḥ kimebhirnirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam 
MSS aye paśyāvasthāmakaruṇasamīravyatikara sphuraddāvajvālāvalijaṭilamūrterviṭapinaḥ 
MSS amuṃ puraḥ paśyasi devadāruṃ putrīkṛto'sau vṛṣabhadhvajena 
MSS yo hemakumbhastananiḥsṛtānāṃ skandasya mātuḥ payasāṃ rasajñaḥ 
MSS amuṃ sahāsaprahitekṣaṇāni vyājārdhasaṃdarśitamekhalāni 
MSS nālaṃ vikartuṃ janitendraśaṅkaṃ surāṅganāvibhramaceṣṭitāni 
MSS amuktāṃ bhūṣayantu svāṃ tanuṃ saṃsārasindhugaiḥ 
MSS maṇikarṇī tāmraparṇī muktimuktāphalairjanāḥ 
MSS amudrakumudatviṣaḥ sphuritaphenalakṣmīspṛśo marālakulavibhramāḥ śapharaphālalīlābhṛtaḥ 
MSS jayanti girijāpatestaralamaulimandākinī taraṅgacayacumbinastuhinadīdhiteraṃśavaḥ 
MSS amudro'pi varaṃ kūpaḥ samudreṇāpi tena kim 
MSS susvādu salilaṃ yatra pīyate pathikaiḥ pathi 
MSS amunā marukūpena ke ke nāma na vañcitāḥ 
MSS rudatpathikanetrāmbupicchilaprāntabhūminā 
MSS amunā yamunājalakelikṛtā sahasā tarasā parirabhya bhṛtā 
MSS hariṇā hariṇī mṛganetravatī navayauvanayauvanabhāravatī 
MSS amunaiva kaṣāyitastanī subhagena priyagātrabhasmanā 
MSS navapallavasaṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanuṃ vibhāvasau 
MSS amunaiva pathāgatāgataṃ kṛtavānadya manoharo hariḥ 
MSS sakhi durjanabhītayā mayā hatayā hanta ciraṃ na vīkṣitaḥ 
MSS amuṣminnārāme tarubhirabhirāme viṭapinaḥ sphuṭaṃ nṛtyadbhṛṅgī vividhanavasaṃgītakalanāt 
MSS parānandaiḥ pūrṇāḥ ka iva tava varṇāvalipada kramaśrotā vettā dvijavara śuka śrāmyasi kutaḥ 
MSS amuṣminnudyānadrumakuharanīrandhrabharite tamaḥkhaṇḍe piṇḍīkṛtabahalakālāyasaghane 
MSS yatāmadyāsmākaṃ kathamapi puronyastacaraṇaṃ nimeṣe'pyunmeṣe nahi nahi viśeṣo nayanayoḥ 
MSS amuṣminnudyāne vihagakhala eṣa pratikalaṃ vilolaḥ kākolaḥ kvaṇati khalu yāvat kaṭutaram 
MSS sakhe tāvat kīra draḍhaya hṛdi vācaṃ ca sakalāṃ na maunena nyūno bhavati guṇabhājāṃ guṇagaṇaḥ 
MSS amuṣmin pañceṣostribhuvanajigīṣoḥ sahacare mukhaṃ rātreratrestanubhuvi rahaścumbati sati 
MSS jvalantīrṣyāroṣodayamayatayevoṣadhilatāḥ patadbhṛṅgībhaṅgyā dadhati kumudinyaḥ kaluṣatām 
MSS amuṣmin saṃnaddhe jalamuci samabhyasya katicit kakārān paryantadviguṇamatarephaprasavinaḥ 
MSS sa mādyandātyūhaścalavipulakaṇṭhaḥ prasarati kramodañcattāraḥ kramavaśanamanmandamadhuraḥ 
MSS amuṣmin saṃsāre parikalitasāretaratayā tadā vidyotkarṣaḥ pariṇatimupaiti śrutividām 
MSS yadā mandākinyā madhuravamarālīkalakala praṇālīvācāle parisarataṭe yānti divasāḥ 
MSS amuṣmiṃllāvāṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛthujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ 
MSS yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ prathamapiśunā nābhikuhare śikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ 
MSS amuṣmai caurāya pratinihatamṛtyupratibhiye prabhuḥ prītaḥ prādāduparitanapādadvayakṛte 
MSS suvarṇānāṃ koṭīrdaśa daśanakoṭikṣatagirīn gajendrānapyaṣṭau madamuditakūjanmadhulihaḥ 
MSS amuṣya dorbhyāmaridurgaluṇṭhane dhruvaṃ gṛhītārgaladīrghapīnatā 
MSS uraḥśriyā tatra ca gopurasphurat kapāṭadurdharṣatiraḥprasāritā 
MSS amuṣya dhīrasya jayāya sāhasī tadā khalu jyāṃ viśikhaiḥ sanāthayan 
MSS nimajjayāmāsa yaśāṃsi saṃśaye smarastrilokīvijayārjitānyapi 
MSS amuṣya muṣitā lakṣmīś cakṣuṣeti na nūtanam 
MSS na vedmi kathayatyasyāḥ karṇe lagnaṃ kimutpalam 
MSS amuṣya vidyā rasanāgranartakī trayīva nītāṅgaguṇena vistaram 
MSS agāhatāṣṭādaśatāṃ jigīṣayā navadvayadvīpapṛthagjayaśriyām 
MSS amuṣyāṃ saṃkrāntau tava taruṇi tāruṇyataraṇe smaro dātā devastrivalitaṭinītīranikaṭe 
MSS amū te vakṣojau sakhi sughaṭitau hāṭakaghaṭau mahādānaṃ kasmai vada bhavatu sāraṅganayane 
MSS amuṣyā lāvaṇyaṃ mṛdulamṛdulānapyavayavān manolaulyaṃ dhātuḥ karakaṭhinatāṃ me vimṛśati 
MSS padaṃ citte dhatte matiriti purā paṅkajabhuvā dhruvaṃ kalyāṇīyaṃ kalitasukṛtaireva racitā 
MSS amuṣyorvībharttuḥ prasṛmaracamūsindhurabhavair avaimi prārabdhe vamathubhiravaśyāyasamaye 
MSS na kampantāmantaḥ pratinṛpabhaṭā mlāyatu na tad vadhūvaktrāmbhojaṃ bhavatu na sa teṣāṃ kudivasaḥ 
MSS amūni gacchanti yugāni na kṣaṇaḥ kiyat sahiṣye na hi mṛtyurasti me 
MSS sa māṃ na kāntaḥ sphuṭamantarujjhitā na taṃ manastacca na kāyavāyavaḥ 
MSS amūrkho yo manuṣyāṇāṃ manyusaṃtaptacetasām 
MSS parasparopakāreṇa puṃsāṃ bhavati vigrahaḥ 
MSS amūrhi bhittvā jaladāntarāṇi paṅkāntarāṇīva mṛṇālasūcyaḥ 
MSS patanti candravyasanādvimuktā divo'śrudhārā iva vāridhārāḥ 
MSS amūlyasya mama svarṇatulākoṭidvayaṃ kiyat 
MSS iti kopādivātāmraṃ pādayugmaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ 
MSS amṛtaṃ kirati himāṃśur viṣameva phaṇī samudgirati 
MSS guṇameva vakti sādhur doṣamasādhuḥ prakāśayati 
MSS amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuśca dvayaṃ dehe pratiṣṭhitam 
MSS mṛtyumāpadyate mohāt satyenāpadyate'mṛtam 
MSS amṛtaṃ tadadharabimbe vacaneṣvamṛtaṃ vilokane'pyamṛtam 
MSS amṛtabhṛtau kucakumbhau satyaṃ sā sṛṣṭiraparaiva 
MSS amṛtaṃ durlabhaṃ n ṇāṃ devānāmudakaṃ tathā 
MSS pit ṇāṃ durlabhaḥ putras takraṃ śakrasya durlabham 
MSS amṛtaṃ nāma yat santo mantrajihveṣu juhvati 
MSS śobhaiva mandarakṣubdhakṣubhitāmbhodhivarṇanā 
MSS amṛtaṃ bhujyate vidye bhavatīmāśritaiḥ param 
MSS anye tu bata dūyante saṃsaranta itastataḥ 
MSS amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ kṣīrabhojanam 
MSS amṛtaṃ guṇavadbhāryā amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣitam 
MSS amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ priyadarśanam 
MSS amṛtaṃ rājasaṃmānam amṛtaṃ kṣīrabhojanam 
MSS amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣaṇam 
MSS amṛtaṃ svapriyā bhāryā hyamṛtaṃ svāmigauravam 
MSS amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ svāmigauram 
MSS bhāryāmṛtaṃ guṇavatī dhāroṣṇamamṛtaṃ payaḥ 
MSS amṛtaṃ sadguṇā bhāryā amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣitam 
MSS amṛtaṃ rājasaṃmānam amṛtaṃ mānabhojanam 
MSS amṛtajaladheḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ payāṃsi payodharaḥ kirati karakāstārākārā yadi sphaṭikāvanau 
MSS tadiha tulanāmānīyante kṣaṇaṃ kaṭhināḥ punaḥ satatamamṛtasyandodgārā giraḥ pratibhāvatām 
MSS amṛtadravamādhurīdhurīṇāṃ giramākarṇya kuraṅgalocanāyāḥ 
MSS muhurabhyasanaṃ kaṣāyakaṇṭhī kalakaṇṭhī kurute kuhūrutena 
MSS amṛtadravairvidadhadabjadṛśām apamārgamoṣadhipatiḥ sma karaiḥ 
MSS parito visarpi paritāpi bhṛśaṃ vapuṣo'vatārayati mānaviṣam 
MSS amṛtanidhānaṃ ruciraṃ saṃtāpanivartate sadā niratam 
MSS candramukhaṃ tava sundari susmitabhāsā vikāsate paritaḥ 
MSS amṛtamadhuraiḥ kāñcīnādaiḥ kṛtābhayaḍiṇḍime trivalilaharīlāvaṇyāmbhaḥkaṇotkarakarbure 
MSS viṣamanayanajvālājālāvalīḍhaparākramo luṭhati madanastanvaṅgīnāṃ nitambaśilātale 
MSS amṛtamamṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhūnyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ cūtasyāpi prasannarasaṃ phalam 
MSS sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyatsvādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt 
MSS amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraṃ candraṃ ratiṃ ca ratiṃ tathā prathitamatayaḥ kāmaṃ brūyurmadhūni madhūnyapi 
MSS yadi na subhagāsparśāmodaṃ vinā pramude tataḥ sakalamakalaṃ teṣāṃ vyūhaṃ bravīmi punaḥ priye 
MSS amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandrastathāmbujamambujaṃ ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyapi 
MSS iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṃkaraṃ tadiyamabalā dhatte lakṣmīṃ kathaṃ sakalātmikām 
MSS amṛtamayamanaṅgakṣmāruhasyālavālaṃ mṛtadivasakapālaṃ kālakāpālikasya 
MSS jayati makaraketoḥ śāṇacakraṃ śarāṇām amarapurapurandhrīdarpaṇaḥ śvetabhānuḥ 
MSS amṛtarasavisaravitaraṇa maraṇottāritasure sati payodhau 
MSS kasya sphuranti hṛdaye grīṣmataḍākā bhuvi varākāḥ 
MSS amṛtarasasārabhūtaḥ sakalakalo makaraketusarvasvam 
MSS akhilajananayanasukhakṛt kathamindurvāsare'bhyuditaḥ 
MSS amṛtavacanalīlāvibhramairannapānaṃ racaya catura kīra bhrāntacitteṣu teṣu

MSS amṛtasiktamivāṅgamidaṃ yadi bhavati tanvi tavādbhutavīkṣitaiḥ 
MSS adharamindukarādapi śubhrayanty aruṇayantyaruṇādapi kiṃ dṛśam 
MSS amṛtasyandikiraṇaś candramā nāmato mataḥ 
MSS anya evāyamarthātmā viṣaniṣyandidīdhitiḥ 
MSS amṛtasyandinaṃ kaścit kṛṣṇameghaṃ dvijaḥ smaran 
MSS udanyayā na veśantam udanvantaṃ ca vīkṣate 
MSS amṛtasya pravāhaiḥ kiṃ kāyakṣālanasaṃbhavaiḥ 
MSS cirānmitrapariṣvaṅgo yo'sau mūlyavivarjitaḥ 
MSS amṛtasyeva kuṇḍāni sukhānāmiva rāśayaḥ 
MSS rateriva nidhānāni yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ 
MSS amṛtasyeva tṛpyeta apamānasya yogavit 
MSS viṣavacca jugupseta saṃmānasya sadā dvijaḥ 
MSS amṛtasyeva saṃtṛpyed avamānasya vai dvijaḥ 
MSS sukhaṃ hyavamataḥ śete yo'vamantā sa naśyati 
MSS amṛtāṃśoḥ kiraṇebhyo 'jāyata vṛddhirmahodadherudare 
MSS kathayanti hāramaṇayo hṛdi tāpamuṣaḥ spṛśanto'pi 
MSS amṛtātmani padmānāṃ dveṣṭari snigdhatārake 
MSS mukhendau tava satyasmin apareṇa kimindunā 
MSS amṛtādamṛtaṃ na tāvakād aparaṃ yat tripurārirādarāt

MSS amṛtādhmātajīmūtasnigdhasaṃhananasya te

MSS amṛtāyatāmiti vadet pīte bhukte kṣute ca śataṃ jīva

MSS amṛtā vigataprāṇā sāntaḥ śalyākṛtavraṇā 
MSS abaddhā niścalevāste kūṭasaṃsthe mṛge mṛgī

MSS kavirgaruḍavanmānya indravajrādivṛttakṛt 
MSS amṛtonmathitaiḥ suvarṇacūrṇair mṛdamutpādya nidhāya nābhicakre 
MSS akaronnavaromarājiyaṣṭyā kucakumbhau kusumeṣukumbhakāraḥ 
MSS amedhyapūrṇe kṛmijālasaṃkule svabhāvadurgandhini śaucavarjite 
MSS kalevare mūtrapurīṣabhājane ramanti mūḍhā viramanti paṇḍitāḥ 
MSS ameyo mitalokastvam anarthī prārthanāvahaḥ 
MSS ajito jiṣṇuratyantam avyakto vyaktakāraṇam 
MSS amoghakrodhaharṣasya svayaṃ kṛtyānvavekṣiṇaḥ 
MSS ātmapratyayakośasya vasudheyaṃ vasuṃdharā 
MSS amoghā vāsare vidyud amoghaṃ niśi garjitam 
MSS amoghā munīnāṃ vāṇī amoghaṃ devadarśanam

MSS devatānāṃ pit ṇāṃ ca bhāgo yena pradīyate

MSS vāraṇāmiva vidhātumabhīkṣṇaṃ kakṣyayā ca valayaiśca śiśiñje 
MSS ambaraṃ stimitamambudhārayā vyakta eṣa paritaḥ payodharaḥ 
MSS prāvṛṣā kimapi lajjamānayā mīlite ravividhūvilocane

MSS ambaramapanaya mugdhe vrajatu vikāśaṃ digambaratā

MSS yasya vadhūstanayaṃ gṛhamabjā pātu sa vo haralocanavahniḥ 
MSS ambarameṣa ramaṇyai yāminyai vāsaraḥ preyān

MSS puṣpadhāmani kadambakadambe kā gatiḥ pathika kālavilambe 
MSS amba śrāmyasi tiṣṭha gorasamahaṃ mathnāmi manthānakaṃ prālambya sthitamīśvaraṃ sarabhasaṃ dīnānano vāsukiḥ 
MSS sāsūyaṃ kamalālayā suragaṇaḥ sānandamudyadbhayaṃ rāhuḥ praikṣata yaṃ sa vo'stu śivado gopālabālo hariḥ

MSS ambā tuṣyati na mayā na snuṣayā sāpi nāmbayā na mayā 
MSS ahamapi na tayā na tayā vada rājan kasya doṣo'yam

MSS sā vāṇi vinayaḥ sa eva sahajaḥ puṇyānubhāvaḥ sa ca ślāghāyāḥ sadanaṃ sukhasya vasatistenaiva putrī pitā 
MSS ambā yena sarasvatī sutavatī tasyārpayantī rasān nānācāṭumukhī sa durlaḍitavān khelābhirucchṛṅkhalaḥ

MSS asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ yuvatyā kathitamabhimataṃ vyāhṛtivyājapūrvam 
MSS ambujamambuni jātaṃ nahi dṛṣṭaṃ jātamambujādambu 
MSS adhunā tadviparītaṃ caraṇasarojādvinirgatā gaṅgā 
MSS ambujamambuni magnaṃ trāsādākāśamāśritaścandraḥ 
MSS samprati kaḥ paripanthī yaṃ prati kopāruṇaṃ vadanam 
MSS ambudaḥ kṛtapado nabhastale toyapūraparipūritodadhiḥ 
MSS goṣpadasya bharaṇe'pmaśaktimān ityasatyamabhidhīyate katham 
MSS ambudherudagamadvidhubhaṅgyā nūnamaurvaśikhibhāsmanapiṇḍaḥ 
MSS yatkilāsya ghaṭate nahi tṛptiḥ khaṇḍitājanadṛgambusaridbhiḥ 
MSS ambeyaṃ neyamambā nahi kharakapiśaṃ śmaśru tasyā mukhārdhe tāto'yaṃ naiṣa tātaḥ stanamurasi piturdṛṣṭavānnāhamatra 
MSS keyaṃ ko'yaṃ kimetadyuvatiratha pumān vastu kiṃ syāt tṛtīyaṃ śaṃbhoḥ saṃvīkṣya rūpādapasarati guhaḥ śaṅkitaḥ pātu yuṣmān 
MSS ambhaḥ kardamatāmupaiti sahasā paṅkadravaḥ pāṃśutāṃ pāṃśurvāraṇakarṇatālapavanair dikprāntanīhāratām 
MSS nimnatvaṃ girayaḥ samaṃ viṣamatāṃ śūnyaṃ janasthānakaṃ niryāte tvayi rājyapāla bhavati tyaktasvabhāvaṃ jagat 
MSS ambhaḥ kumbhāmbhoruha cāmarabhṛṅgārahemarūpyāṇi 
MSS phalatāmbūlavarāmbara madirāmīnājyabhojyāni 
MSS ambhaḥsaṃbhṛtimantharāmbudaravaiḥ śālūragarjābhara prārabdhapriyaviprayuktayuvatījīvagrahe bhīṣaṇāḥ 
MSS vidyuddanturitāndhakārapaṭalā gāmbhīryabaddhārava sthairyonmūlanaśaktayaḥ kathamamī niryānti varṣāniśāḥ 
MSS ambhasaḥ parimāṇena unnataṃ kamalaṃ bhavet 
MSS svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ 
MSS ambhasaḥ prasṛtīraṣṭau ravāvanudite pibet 
MSS vātapittakaphān hatvā jīvedvarṣaśataṃ sukhī 
MSS ambhasā bhidyate setus tathā mantro'pyarakṣitaḥ 
MSS paiśunyād bhidyate sneho vāgbhirbhidyeta kātaraḥ 
MSS ambhasā śamamāyāti muṣṭimeyaśikhaḥ śikhī 
MSS pravṛddho'dhaḥsthitaiḥ paścāt saṃtaptaireva dṛśyate 
MSS ambhasi taraṇisutāyāḥ stambhitataraṇiḥ sa devakīsūnuḥ 
MSS ātaravirahitagopyāḥ kātaramukhamīkṣate smeraḥ 
MSS ambhastattvaṃ bhūmitattvaṃ ca vāyos tattvaṃ tejastattvamākāśatattvam
