MSS iti manasi viṣādaṃ mallike mā kuru tvaṃ bata vada madhupānāṃ mānase ko vivekaḥ 
MSS ayamapi kharayoṣitkarṇakāṣāyamīṣad visṛmaratimirorṇājarjaropāntamarciḥ 
MSS madakalakalaviṅkīkākunāndīkarebhyaḥ kṣitiruhaśikharebhyo bhānumānuccinoti 
MSS ayamapi puruhūtapreyasīmūrdhni pūrṇaḥ kalaśa iva sudhāṃśuḥ sādhurullālasīti 
MSS madanavijayayātrākālavijñāpānāya sphurati jaladhimadhye tāmrapātrīva bhānuḥ 
MSS ayamabhinavameghaśyāmalottuṅgasānur madamukharamayūrīmuktasaṃsaktakekaḥ 
MSS śakuniśabalanīḍānokahasnigdhavarṣmā vitarati bṛhadaśmā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ 
MSS ayamamṛtanidhānaṃ nāyako'pyoṣadhīnām amṛtamayaśarīraḥ kāntiyukto'pi candraḥ 
MSS bhavati vigataraśmirmaṇḍalaṃ prāpya bhānoḥ parasadananiviṣṭaḥ ko laghutvaṃ na yāti 
MSS ayamamṛtanidhānaṃ nāyako'pyoṣadhīnāṃ śatabhiṣaganuyātaḥ śaṃbhumūrdhāvataṃsaḥ 
MSS virahayati na cainaṃ rājayakṣmā śaśāṅkaṃ hatavidhiparipākaḥ kena vā laṅghanīyaḥ 
MSS ayamayamasāvākarṇyārāt pratidvipaḍiṇḍimaṃ madakaluṣite netre mārjannudastakarārgalaḥ 
MSS agaṇitasṛṇiḥ krodhastabdhāyataśrutipallavaḥ praviśati nṛpasyāntaḥkakṣāṃ javādarimudgaraḥ 
MSS ayamayogivadhūvadhapātakair mramimavāpya divaḥ khalu pātyate 
MSS śitiniśādṛṣadi sphuṭadutpatat kaṇagaṇādhikatārakitāmbaraḥ 
MSS ayamaravivarebhyaścātakairniṣpatadbhir haribhiracirabhāsāṃ tejasā cānuliptaiḥ 
MSS gatamupari ghanānāṃ vārigarbhodarāṇāṃ piśunayati rathastaṃ śīkaraklinnanemiḥ 
MSS ayamalaghuvisārisphārijihvākalāpo jvalati yadi na madhye vāḍavo havyavāhaḥ 
MSS muhurupacitasāro vāribhirnimnagānāṃ tribhuvanamapi kiṃ na plāvayatyamburāśiḥ 
MSS ayamavasaraḥ saraste salilairupakartumarthināmaniśam 
MSS idamapi ca sulabhamambho bhavati purā jaladharābhyudaye 
MSS ayamavasara upakṛtaye prakṛticalā yāvadasti saṃpadiyam 
MSS vipadi sadābhyudayinyāṃ punarupakartuṃ kuto'vasaraḥ 
MSS ayamavicāritacārutayā saṃsāro bhāti ramaṇīyaḥ 
MSS atra punaḥ paramārthadṛśāṃ na kimapi sāramaṇīyaḥ 
MSS ayamasau gaganāṅgaṇadīpakas taralakālabhujaṃgaśikhāmaṇiḥ 
MSS kṣaṇaviḍambitavāḍavavigrahaḥ patati vārinidhau vidhuro raviḥ 
MSS ayamasau bhagavānuta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitamavāṅmuninā śaśimaulinā 
MSS samadhirūḍhamajena nu jiṣṇunā sviditi vegavaśānmumuhe gaṇaiḥ 
MSS ayamaho rajanīcarakesarī giridarīśayanāt sahasotthitaḥ 
MSS timiravāraṇakumbhavidāraṇoc chvalitaraktabharairiva lohitaḥ 
MSS ayamātmā svayaṃ sākṣād guṇaratnamahārṇavaḥ 
MSS sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk sārvaḥ parameṣṭhī nirañjanaḥ 
MSS ayamāndolitaprauḍhacandanadrumapallavaḥ 
MSS utpādayati sarvasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ 
MSS ayamālohitacchāyo madena mukhacandramāḥ 
MSS saṃnaddhodayarāgasya candrasya pratigarjati 
MSS ayamiha mugdho madhupaḥ parihṛtasahakāramañjarīpuñjaḥ 
MSS asaralamarasamasāraṃ śākhoṭakaviṭapamanusarati 
MSS ayamudayati kokīśokaśalyairmayūkhaiḥ śatamakhapuranārīnetragaṇḍūṣapeyaḥ 
MSS udayagirimṛgendrodgārabhinnāṅkaraṅku śravaṇarudhiradhārāpāṭalaḥ pārvaṇenduḥ 
MSS ayamudayati candraścandrikādhautaviśvaḥ pariṇatavimalimni vyomni karpūragauraḥ 
MSS ṛjurajataśalākāspardhibhiryasya pādair jagadamalamṛṇālīpañjarasthaṃ vibhāti 
MSS ayamudayati candro vāridherambugarbhād amṛtakaṇakarālairaṃśubhirdīpyamānaḥ 
MSS bhujagaśayanavakṣoharmyadeśe lalantyā vadanamiva yadṛcchottānitaṃ viśvamātuḥ 
MSS ayamudayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnām udayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpam 
MSS virahavidhurakokadvandvabandhurvibhindan kupitakapikapolakroḍatāmrastamāṃsi 
MSS ayamudayamahīdhradhāturāgair aruṇakarāruṇitāmbarābhirāmaḥ 
MSS vitarasi na dṛśau kṛśāṅgi tārām iva divi vanditumindurabhyupaiti 
MSS ayamudayamahībhṛnmūrdhni pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā divasapatirahauṣīdindupādān havīṃṣi 
MSS aruṇakiraṇavahnau kanyakā pauruhūtī haridapi kimakārṣīt tārakālājahomam 
MSS ayamudito himaraśmir vanitāvadanasya kīdṛśaḥ sadṛśaḥ 
MSS nīlādikopalambhaḥ sphurati pratyakṣataḥ kasya 
MSS ayamupagatakṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇasārākṣipātair yamakṛvikasi
tanavanīlāmbhojavaktraścakāsti 
MSS jalayuvatikucānuprāsitottuṅgakumbha sthalamadakalagarjannīranāgastaṭākaḥ 
MSS ayamuṣasi vinidradrāviḍītuṅgapīna stanaparisarasāndrasvedabindūpamardī 
MSS srutamalayajavṛkṣakṣīrasaurabhyasabhyo vahati sakhi bhujaṅgībhuktaśeṣaḥ samīraḥ 
MSS ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me 
MSS nava vāridharodayādahobhir bhavitavyaṃ ca nirātapatvaramyaiḥ 
MSS ayameko'hameketi jñānaṃ tatsaṃgame na me 
MSS rāga evādhikastatra haridrācūrṇayoriva 
MSS ayameva paro dharmo hyayameva paraṃ tapaḥ 
MSS patiśuśrūṣaṇaṃ yatra tat strīṇāṃ svargahetukam 
MSS ayaśaḥ prāpyate yena yena cādhogatirbhavet 
MSS svārthācca bhraśyate yena tat karma na samācaret 
MSS ayaśasyam anāyuṣyaṃ paradārābhimarśanam 
MSS arthakṣayakaraṃ ghoraṃ pāpasya ca punarbhavam 
MSS ayaśobhidurāloke kopadhāmaraṇādṛte 
MSS ayaśobhidurā loke kopadhā maraṇādṛte 
MSS ayaścaṇakacarvaṇaṃ phaṇiphaṇāmaṇeḥ karṣaṇaṃ kareṇa giritolanaṃ jalanidheḥ padā laṅghanam 
MSS prasuptaharibodhanaṃ niśitakhaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ kadācidakhilaṃ bhavenna ca śaṭhāddhanasyārjanam 
MSS ayastu kākatuṇḍena carma ārāmukhena hi 
MSS mṛtpiṇḍaṃ ca ghaṭaṃ caiva vidhyet sūcīmukhena hi 
MSS ayācataḥ sīdataśca sarvopāyairnimantraya 
MSS ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmo'yācate yat pradīyate 
MSS ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaśca na yacchati 
MSS sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhiruccṛṅkhalo nṛṇām 
MSS ayācitāraṃ nahi devadevam adriḥ sutāṃ grāhayituṃ śaśāka 
MSS abhyarthanābhaṅgabhayena sādhur mādhyasthamiṣṭe'pyavalambate'rthe 
MSS ayācito mayā labdho matpreṣitaḥ punargataḥ 
MSS yatrāgatastatra gatas tatra kā parivedanā 
MSS ayācyaṃ caiva yācante'bhojyān vyāhārayanti ca 
MSS utkocairvañcanābhiśca kāryāṇi ghnanti cāsyati 
MSS ayājyayājanaiścaiva nāstikyena ca karmaṇām 
MSS kulānyāśu vinaśyanti yāni hīnāni mantrataḥ 
MSS ayi kaṭhora yaśaḥ kila te priyaṃ kimayaśo nanu ghoramataḥparam 
MSS kimabhavadvipine hariṇīdṛśaḥ kathaya nātha kathaṃ bata manyase 
MSS ayi kānta paśya meghaṃ nahi nahi pāpaṃ tavātipuṇyāyāḥ 
MSS nahi nahi paśya payodharam apasāraya kañcukīmurasaḥ 
MSS ayi kiṃ guṇavati mālati jīvati bhavatīṃ vinā madhupāḥ 
MSS atha yadi jīvati jīvatu jīvanamapi jīvanābhāsaḥ 
MSS ayi kuraṅgi tapovanavibhramād upagatāsi kirātapurīmimām 
MSS iha na paśyasi dāraya māraya grasa pibeti śukānapi jalpataḥ 
MSS ayi kuraṅgi turaṅgamavikrame tyaja vanaṃ javanaṃ gamanaṃ kuru 
MSS iha vane vicaranti hi nāyakāḥ surabhilohitalohitasāyakāḥ 
MSS ayi kulanicūlamūloc chedanaduḥśīlavīcivācāle 
MSS bakavighasapaṅkasārā na cirāt kāveri bhavitāsi 
MSS ayi kṣudro mābhūn matimahimagarvo manasi vaḥ karī yāto bandhaṃ yadiha vinayastatra vijayī 
MSS ayaṃ krodhādhmātastyajati vinayaṃ cen madavaśāt tataḥ skandhāvāraṃ na kimakhilamevākulayati 
MSS ayi khalu badhirādhirāja kīraṃ tudasi śalākanipātanena mohāt 
MSS aniśamapi sudhānidhānavāṇīṃ racayatu maunamukho'stu vā samaste 
MSS ayi khalu viṣamaḥ purākṛtānāṃ bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ 
MSS haraśirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhrapādāḥ 
MSS ayi cakitamugdhacātaka marubhuvi dhāvasi mudhā kimudgrīvam 
MSS grīṣme davāgnivalitas tāpiccho'yaṃ na vidyutvān 
MSS ayi cakorakuṭumbini kātare tiraya pakṣapuṭena kuṭumbakam 
MSS bahu gataṃ kiyadapyavaśiṣyate vyapagataṃ timirairuditaḥ śaśī 
MSS ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindumanilaścet 
MSS dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ 
MSS ayi citta vittaleśe sahajapremṇā kiyannu lubdhamasi 
MSS na tathāpi tadviyogaḥ kevalamāste śivenāpi 
MSS ayi cetovihaga tvaṃ viṣayāraṇye bhramannasi śrāntaḥ 
MSS viśrāmakāmanā cec chivakalparuhe ciraṃ tiṣṭha 
MSS ayi jalada yadi na dāsyasi katicit tvaṃ cātakāya jalakaṇikāḥ 
MSS tadayamacireṇa bhavitā salilāñjalidānayogyaste 
MSS ayi tyaktāsi kastūri pāmaraiḥ paṅkaśaṅkayā 
MSS alaṃ khedena bhūpālāḥ kiṃ na santi mahītale 
MSS ayi dayite tava vadanaṃ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ manobhavo garjan 
MSS smitamavalambya tamisrāsv api hatakān hanta no hanti 
MSS ayi daladaravinda syandamānaṃ marandaṃ tava kimapi lihanto mañju guñjantu bhṛṅgāḥ 
MSS diśi diśi nirapekṣastāvakīnaṃ vivṛṇvan parimalamayamanyo bāndhavo gandhavāhaḥ 
MSS ayi dīnadayārdranātha he mathurānātha kadāvalokyase 
MSS hṛdayaṃ tvadalokakātaraṃ dayita bhrāmyati kiṃ karomyaham 
MSS ayi durjanagarjitena kiṃ sarale namramukhī viṣīdasi tvam 
MSS paripanthini devakīsute parivādo'pi tapobhirunnataiḥ 
MSS ayi duṣkṛtakena kena vatse halikadvāri lavaṅgi puṣpitāsi 
MSS stabakāstava pāṃsubhiḥ parītāḥ paritaḥ prāṅgaṇasīmni yal luṭhanti 
MSS ayi dūti sakhī tvameva me madano hanti śitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ 
MSS dayitaṃ tamupānayāśu tat suśako jīvitanirgamo'nyathā 
MSS ayi nandatanūja kiṃkaraṃ patitaṃ māṃ viṣame bhavāmbudhau 
MSS kṛpayā tava pādapaṅkaja sthitadhūlīsadṛśaṃ vibhāvaya 
MSS ayi pataṅgi lavaṅgalatāvane piba madhūni vidhūya madhuvratān 
MSS iha vane ca vanecarasaṃkule na ca satāmasātāṃ ca nirūpaṇam 
MSS ayi parāri parunmalayānilā vavuramī jagureva ca kokilāḥ 
MSS kalamalotkalitaṃ tu na me manaḥ sakhi babhūva vṛthaiva yathaiṣamaḥ 
MSS ayi pibata cakorāḥ kṛtsnamunnāmikaṇṭha kramasaralitacañcaccañcavaścandrikāmbhaḥ 
MSS virahavidhuritānāṃ jīvitatrāṇahetor bhavati hariṇalakṣmā ye na tejodaridraḥ 
MSS ayi bata guru garvaṃ mā sma kastūri yāsīr akhilaparimalānāṃ maulinā saurabheṇa 
MSS girigahanaguhāyāṃ līnamatyantadīnaṃ svajanakamamunaiva prāṇahīnaṃ karoṣi 
MSS ayi makarandasyandini padmini manye tavaiva subhagatvam 
MSS puṣpavatīmapi bhavatīṃ tyajati na vṛddhaḥ śucirhaṃsaḥ 
MSS ayi madana na dagdhastvaṃ kimīśena kopāt kimuta rativiyoge nānvabhūrmūrkha duḥkham 
MSS aviditaparapīḍo yena māmutpalākṣī rahitamahitapātraiḥ patrivarṣairdunoṣi 
MSS ayi manmathacūtamañjari śravaṇāyatalocane priye 
MSS apahṛtya manaḥ kva yāsi me kimarājakamatra vartate 
MSS ayi mamaiṣa cakoraśiśurmuner vrajati sindhupibasya na śiṣyatām 
MSS aśitumabdhimadhītavato'sya ca śaśikarāḥ pibataḥ kati śīkarāḥ 
MSS ayi malayaja mahimāyaṃ kasya girāmastu viṣayaste 
MSS udgirato yadgaralaṃ phaṇinaḥ puṣṇāsi parimalodgāraiḥ 
MSS ayi mālati saurabhasāravinir jitasaṃvikasatkamalānilaye 
MSS madhupānavidhau madhupasya punar bhuvane bhavatīmahamākalaye 
MSS ayi mṛgākṣi tavādharapallave dayitadantapadaṃ na bhavatyadaḥ 
MSS bhuvanamohanamantrapadāṅkitaṃ kimuta yantramidaṃ smarayoginaḥ 
MSS ayi roṣamurīkaroṣi no cet kimapi tvāṃ prati vāridhe vadāmaḥ 
MSS jaladena tavārthinā vimuktāny api toyāni mahān na hā jahāsi 
MSS ayi laṅghitamaryāda smara smara harānalam 
MSS dagdhaṃ dagdhumayuktaṃ te janaṃ virahakātaram 
MSS ayi varoru hatasmaradīpike yadi gatāsi madīkṣaṇagocarāt 
MSS asamasāyakasāyakakīlitā vada gamiṣyasi me hṛdayāt katham 
MSS ayi vijahīhi dṛḍhopagūhanaṃ tyaja navasaṃgamabhīru vallabham 
MSS aruṇakarodgama eṣa vartate varatanu saṃpravadanti kukkuṭāḥ 
MSS ayi vidhuṃ paripṛccha guroḥ kutaḥ sphuṭamaśikṣyata dāhavadānyatā 
MSS glapitaśaṃbhugalād garalāt tvayā kimudadhau jaḍa vā vaḍavānalāt 
MSS ayi śākunika kṛto'ñjalir itare na katīha jīvanopāyāḥ 
MSS hatvā śukān kimetad vipinamasārasvataṃ kuruṣe 
MSS ayi saṃprati dehi darśanaṃ smara paryutsuka eṣa mādhavaḥ 
MSS dayitāsvanavasthitaṃ nṛṇāṃ na khalu prema calaṃ suhṛjjane 
MSS ayi saṃprasīda pārvati śivo'pi tava pādayornipatito'ham 
MSS śiva iti kathaṃ hi jalpasi sarudhiragajacarmasaṃvītaḥ 
MSS āyi sakhi kuru kṣipraṃ rambhādalaiḥ śiśirānilaṃ sahacari tanau satkarpūraṃ drutaṃ parilepaya 
MSS sarasabisinīpatraistalpaṃ priye parikalpaya sphuṭamiti vibho tasyā gehe bhavanti kiloktayaḥ 
MSS ayi sakhi niśā kiṃ vā ghasraḥ śaśī kimu bhāskaraḥ sphurati purataḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ vā mamāsti sa vallabhaḥ 
MSS pratipalamiti prāṇādhīśa priyā virahāturā kathayati muhurmandaṃ mandaṃ sakhīṃ savidhasthitām 
MSS ayi sakhi paridoṣo jāyate cumbane kiṃ kimu kucaparirambhe kiṃ rate brūhi tathyam 
MSS itinigadati nāthe dīpamālokayantī hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā 
MSS ayi sakhi mama prāṇādhīśo gato viṣayāntaraṃ kusumaviśikhastasmāduccairdunoti tanuṃ śaraiḥ 
MSS laghu kuru tathā yatnaṃ yena smarādhinivāraṇe paṭutaramatestasyāśu syādihāgamanaṃ tataḥ 
MSS ayi sakhi śastaḥ sakhivat patiriti kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi 
MSS śasto'tisakhivadupapatir ityāli kathaṃ tvayāpi nābodhi 
MSS ayi sarasija sāyaṃ saṃnidhānaṃ tvadīyaṃ bhramara upagato'yaṃ cūtamālāṃ vihāya 
MSS anupamamadhulobhād dūrataḥ sāṃprataṃ tad idamanucitametan mudraṇaṃ yanmukhasya 
MSS ayi sarale tāvadimā upadeśagiro viśanti karṇāntaḥ 
MSS yāvannāntarbhūtaṃ taccetasi māmakaṃ cetaḥ 
MSS ayi sutanuśarīre talpamāruhya tūrṇaṃ viracaya mama kaṇṭhe bandhanaṃ bāhuvallyā 
MSS itinigadati nāthe dīpamālokayantī hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā 
MSS ayi sundari tava vadanaṃ nityaṃ pūrṇaṃ sudhānidhirmatvā 
MSS hanta patatyupariṣṭān madhye'mbudhi nityamevāsau 
MSS ayi sundari saṃprati paśya puraś caramācalamastakameti raviḥ 
MSS samupaiti tamaḥpaṭalījaṭilā rajanī kuru kāmakalāḥ sakalāḥ 
MSS ayi svayūthyairaśanikṣatopamaṃ mamādya vṛttāntamimaṃ batoditā 
MSS mukhāni lolākṣi diśāmasaṃśayaṃ daśāpi śūnyāni vilokayiṣyasi 
MSS ayi hastagataiḥ prāṇair amībhiḥ kandukairiva 
MSS aparyantarasaṃ mugdhe kiyat krīḍitumicchasi 
MSS ayi hāralate saṃhara harahuṃkṛtidagdhadehasaṃkṣobham 
MSS sadbhāvajānuraktir nahi ramyā paṇyanārīṇām 
MSS ayi hṛdaya dayāṃ mayi kuru kuraṅganayanāṃ vinā badhāna dhṛtim 
MSS ṭasaditi jhaṭiti sphuṭa vā sphuṭamidamuktaṃ gatirnānyā 
MSS ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣante yatra kutrāpi śerate 
MSS nagnā vikṣipya gātrāṇi sajjarā iva madyapāḥ 
MSS ayuktaṃ yuktaṃ vā yadabhihitamajñena vibhunā stuyādetannityaṃ jaḍamapi guruṃ tasya vinuyāt 
MSS vivatsurnaiḥspṛhyaṃ kathamapi sabhāyāmabhinayet svakāryaṃ saṃtuṣṭe kṣitibhṛti rahasyeva kathayet 
MSS ayuktaṃ svāmino yuktaṃ yuktaṃ nīcasya dūṣaṇam 
MSS amṛtaṃ rāhave mṛtyur viṣaṃ śaṃkarabhūṣaṇam 
MSS ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naikṛtiko'lasaḥ 
MSS viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate 
MSS ayuktacāraṃ durdarśam asvādhīnaṃ narādhipam 
MSS varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkamiva dvipāḥ 
MSS ayuktarūpaṃ kimataḥparaṃ bhavet trinetravakṣaḥ sulabhaṃ tavāpi yat 
MSS stanadvaye'smin haricandanāspade padaṃ citābhasmarajaḥ kariṣyati 
MSS ayutaṃ niyutaṃ vāpi pradiśantu prākṛtāya bhogāya 
MSS krīṇanti na bilvadalaiḥ kaivalyaṃ paccaṣairmūḍhāḥ 
MSS ayudhyamānasyotpādya brāhmaṇasyāsṛgaṅgataḥ 
MSS duḥkhaṃ sumahadāpnoti pretyāprājñatayā naraḥ 
MSS aye kīraśreṇīparivṛḍha vṛthā vāsaraśataṃ tarorasya skandhe gamayati phalāśārabhasataḥ 
MSS yadā puṣpārambhe mukhamalinimā kiṃśukataros tadaivābhijñātaṃ phaliparicayo durlabha itaḥ 
MSS aye keyaṃ dhanyā dhavalagṛhavātāyanagatā tulākoṭikvāṇairviṣamaviśikhaṃ jāgarayati 
MSS purā yā prāṇeśe gatavati kṛtā puṣpadhanuṣā śarāsārai rātriṃdivamakṛpamujjāgarakṛśā 
MSS aye keyaṃ līlādhavalagṛhavātāyanatale tulākoṭikvāṇaiḥ kusumadhanuṣaṃ jāgarayati 
MSS aho netradvandvaṃ vilasati vilaṅghya śrutipathaṃ kathaṃ na trailokyaṃ jayati madanaḥ smeravadanaḥ 
MSS aye kelīgṛhastambha kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ tvayā 
MSS paryaṅke vallabhaṃ tyaktvā tvāmāliṅgati māninī 
MSS aye ko jānīte nijapuruṣasaṅgo hi na tathā yathā cetaḥ strīṇāṃ parapuruṣasaṅgo ramayate 
MSS api svairaṃ bhuktā divasamakhilaṃ vāsarakṛtā karasparśādindormukulayati netrāṇi nalinī 
MSS aye ko'yaṃ vṛddho gṛhaparivṛḍhaḥ kiṃ tava pitā na me bhartā kiṃtu vyapagatadṛganyacca badhiraḥ 
MSS huhuṃ śrānto'dyāhaṃ śiśayiṣurihaivāpavarake kva yāminyāṃ yāmi svapimi nanu nirdaṃśamaśake 
MSS aye jaladhinandinīnayananīrajālambana jvalajjvalanajitvarajvarabharatvarābhaṅguram 
MSS prabhātajalajonnamadgarimagarvasarvaṃkaṣair jagattritayarocanaiḥ śiśirayāśu māṃ locanaiḥ 
MSS aye tāla vrīḍāṃ vraja gurutayā bhāti na bhavān phale na cchāyā no kaṭhinaparivāro hi bhavataḥ 
MSS iyaṃ dhanyā dhanyā saralakadalī sundaradalā parātmānaṃ manye sukhayati phalenāmṛtavatā 
MSS aye diṣṭyā naṣṭo mama gṛhapiśācīparicayaḥ parāvṛttaṃ mohāt sphurati ca manāg brahmaṇi manaḥ 
MSS vikāro'pyakṣāṇāṃ galita iva nirbhāti viṣayāt tathāpi kṣetrajñaḥ spṛhayati vanāya prati muhuḥ 
MSS aye dūrabhrāntaṃ viṣayaviṣamāraṇyavipathe paribhrāntaṃ ceto mama vidhuritaṃ svairamadhunā 
MSS nirāvarte nitye sthiraniravadhānabhramamaye vivekaprabhraśyadvikṛtiparamānandajaladhau 
MSS aye nīlagrīva kva kathaya sakhe te'dya munayaḥ paraṃ toṣaṃ yeṣāṃ tava varavilāso vitanute 
MSS amī dūrāt krūrāḥ kvaṇitamidamākarṇya sahasā tvarante hantuṃ tvāmahaha śabarāḥ puṅkhitaśarāḥ 
MSS aye nṛpatimaṇḍalīmukuṭaratna yuṣmadbhujā mahoṣmatatisaṃjuṣā bata bhavatpratāpārciṣā 
MSS dviṣāmatibhṛśaṃ yaśaḥ prakaṭapārado dhmāpanād udusphuṭata tārakāḥ kapaṭato vihāyastaṭe 
MSS aye pāthovāha sthagaya kakubho'nyāstata itas tyajaitāṃ sīmānaṃ vasati munirasyāṃ kalaśabhūḥ 
MSS udañcatkope'smin sa jaladhirapi sthāsyati na te yataḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ salilamiha śauryaṃ prathayasi 
MSS aye madhupa mā kṛthā bata vṛthā manodīnatāṃ tuṣārasamaye latāśataniṣevaṇavyākulaḥ 
MSS iyaṃ purata eva te sarasapuṣpamāsodaye rasālanavamañjarī madhujharī jarījṛmbhate 
MSS aye mamodāsitameva jihvayā dvaye'pi tasminnanatiprayojane 
MSS garau giraḥ pallavanārthalāghave mitaṃ ca sāraṃ ca vaco hi vāgmitā 
MSS aye mātardṛṣṭvā mukhamamṛtabhānubhramavaśāt kacacchadmā rāhurvasati kimu tṛṣṇātaralitaḥ 
MSS kimevaṃ kandarpāntakataruṇi sindūrasaraṇic chalādbhoktuṃ bhūyo bahiriva rasajñāṃ kalayati 
MSS aye mātastātaḥ kva gata iti yadvairiśiśunā darīgehe līnā nibhṛtamiha pṛṣṭā svajananī 
MSS kareṇāsyaṃ tasya drutamatha niruddhyāśrubhṛtayā viniḥśvasya sphāraṃ śiva śiva dṛśaivottarayati 
MSS aye muktāratna prasara bahiruddyotaya gṛhān api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svānapi guṇān 
MSS kimatraivātmānaṃ jarayasi mudhā śuktikuhare mahāgambhīro'yaṃ jaladhiriha kastvāṃ gaṇayati 
MSS aye yadi samīhase parapurāvarodhaṃ prabho tadākalaya madvacaḥ kimapi darpanārāyaṇa 
MSS pratīpanṛpanāgarīnayananīrakallolinī samuttaraṇacāturīṃ turagarājimadhyāpaya 
MSS aye lājā uccaiḥ pathi vacanamākarṇya gṛhiṇī śiśoḥ karṇau yatnāt supihitavatī dīnavadanā 
MSS mayi kṣīṇopāye yadakṛta dṛśāvaśrubahule tadantaḥśalyaṃ me tvamasi punaruddhartumucitaḥ 
MSS aye vāpīhaṃsā nijavasatisaṃkocapiśunaṃ kurudhvaṃ mā ceto viyati calato vīkṣya vihagān 
MSS amī te sāraṅgā bhuvanamahanīyavratabhṛtāṃ nirīhāṇāṃyeṣāṃ tṛṇamiva bhavantyambunidhayaḥ 
MSS aye vārāṃ rāśe katipayapayobinduvibhavair amībhirmā garvaṃ vaha niravalepā hi kṛtinaḥ 
MSS na kiṃ lopāmudrāsahacarakarakroḍakuhare bhavān dṛṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ pracalajalajantuvyatikaraḥ 
MSS aye vārāṃ rāśe kuliśakarakopapratibhayād ayaṃ pakṣapremṇā giripatisutastvāmupagataḥ 
MSS tvadantarvāstavyo yadi punarayaṃ vāḍavaśikhī pradīptaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ glapayati tataḥ ko'sya śaraṇam 
MSS aye sudhākairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhādhāmani bandhubhāvaḥ 
MSS janāpavādaḥ paritaḥ prayātaḥ samāgamo hanta na jātu jātaḥ 
MSS aye'stamayate śaśī nahi kṛśībhavatyāgraho vinaśyati tamo haṭhaṃ kimaṇumapyapāste manaḥ 
MSS sakhi prakaṭito'ruṇo na karuṇodayaste manāk prayāti khalu yāminī na vimanīkṛthā nāyakam 
MSS aye svargaḥ svargaḥ katidivasamārgaḥ pravasatāṃ purastuṅgau syātāṃ yadi na kucakumbhau mṛgadṛśaḥ 
MSS ayācaṃ pātheyaṃ sulabhamubhayaṃ mūlaphalayoḥ payaḥ sthāne sthāne pathi pathi ca viśrāmataravaḥ 
MSS aye helāvelātulitakulaśaile jalanidhau kuto vārāmoghaṃ bata jalada moghaṃ vitarasi 
MSS samantāduttālajvaladanalakīlākavalana klamopetānetānupacara payobhirviṭapinaḥ 
MSS ayogajāmanvabhavaṃ na vedanāṃ hitāya me'bhūdiyamunmadiṣṇutā 
MSS udeti doṣādapi doṣalāghavaṃ kṛśatvamajñānavaśādivainasaḥ 
MSS ayogyavastubharaṇāt bhajedyogyo'pi duṣṭatām 
MSS rakṣaṇāyendradattāsiṃ vahan vyādho'bhavanmuniḥ 
MSS ayodhyāmaṭavībhūtāṃ pitrā bhrātrā ca varjitām 
MSS pipāsārto'nudhāvāmi kṣīṇatoyāṃ nadīmiva 
MSS ayyayi sāhasakāriṇi kiṃ tava caṅkramaṇena 
MSS ṭasaditi bhaṅgamavāpsyasi kucayugabhārabhareṇa 
MSSA arakte na sukhaṃ vetti nārakto duḥkhamaśnute 
MSSA duḥkhānāṃ ca sukhānāṃ ca rakta evāspadaṃ sadā 
MSS arakṣitaṃ tiṣṭhati daivarakṣitaṃ surakṣitaṃ daivahataṃ vinaśyati 
MSS jīvatyanātho'pi vane visarjitaḥ kṛtaprayatno'pi gṛhe na jīvati 
MSS arakṣitaṃ bhavet satyaṃ daivaṃ tameva rakṣati 
MSS daivena nāśitaṃ yattu tasya rakṣā na dṛśyate 
MSS arakṣitā gṛhe ruddhāḥ puruṣairāptakāribhiḥ 
MSS ātmānamātmanā yāstu rakṣeyustāḥ surakṣitāḥ 
MSS arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ baliṣaḍbhāgahāriṇam 
MSS tamāhuḥ sarvalokasya samagramalahārakam 
MSS arakṣyamānāḥ kurvanti yatkiṃcit kilviṣaṃ prajāḥ 
MSS tasmāttu nṛpaterardhaṃ yasmād gṛhṇātyasau karān 
MSS araṇyaṃ rakṣitaṃ siṃhāt tasmāt siṃhaḥ surakṣitaḥ 
MSS ityanyonyasyopakāre mitratvaṃ tannibandhanam 
MSS araṇyaṃ sāraṅgairgirikuharagarbhāśca haribhir diśo diṅmātaṅgaiḥ salilamuṣitaṃ paṅkajavanaiḥ 
MSS priyācakṣurmadhyastanavadanasaundaryavijitaiḥ satāṃ māne mlāne maraṇamathavā dūragamanam 
MSS araṇyabījāñjalidānalālitās tathā ca tasyāṃ hariṇā viśaśvasuḥ 
MSS yathā tadīyairnayanaiḥ kutūhalāt puraḥ sakhīnāmamimīta locane 
MSS araṇyaruditaṃ kṛtaṃ śavaśarīramudvartitaṃ sthale'bjamavaropitaṃ suciramūṣare varṣitam 
MSS śvapucchamavanāmitaṃ badhirakarṇajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtāndhamukhamaṇḍanā yadabudho janaḥ sevitaḥ 
MSS araṇyahariṇagrāmam ācakrāma hutāśanaḥ 
MSS indoḥ kroḍamṛgaṃ dhartum iva dhūmo nabho yayau 
MSS araṇyānī kveyaṃ dhṛtakanakasūtraḥ kva ca mṛgaḥ kva muktāhāro'yaṃ kva ca sa patagaḥ kveyamabalā 
MSS kva tatkanyāratnaṃ lalitamahibhartuḥ kva ca vayaṃ svamākūtaṃ dhātā kimapi nibhṛtaṃ pallavayati 
MSS araṇye puṣpitā vṛkṣā dūrasthāne ca bāndhavāḥ 
MSS samṛddhenāpi kiṃ tena yaḥ kāle nopatiṣṭhati 
MSS aratiriyamupaiti māṃ na nidrā gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān 
MSS vigalati rajanī na saṃgamāśā vrajati tanustanutāṃ na cānurāgaḥ 
MSS aratnālokasaṃhāryam avāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ 
MSS dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ yauvanaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ 
MSS arayo'pi hi mitratvaṃ yānti daṇḍavato dhruvam 
MSS daṇḍaprāyo hi nṛpatir bhunaktyākramya medinīm 
MSS arayo'pi hi saṃdheyāḥ sati kāryārthagaurave 
MSS ahimūṣakavad devā hyarthasya padavīṃ gataiḥ 
MSS aralūvṛkṣapatrāṇāṃ lepo gomukharogahṛt 
MSS gonāsasaṃbhavaḥ kṣāro hanti puṣpaṃ cirodbhavam 
MSS aravindamidaṃ vīkṣya khelatkhañjanamañjulam 
MSS smarāmi vadanaṃ tasyāś cāru cañcalalocanam 
MSS aravindavṛndamakarandatundilo marudeti mandamiha mandarācalāt 
MSS suratāntatāntasudatīmatallikā kabarīparīmalajharī parīvṛtaḥ 
MSS aravindeṣu kundeṣu ramitaṃ kālayogataḥ 
MSS aye mākanda jānīhi tavaivāyaṃ madhuvrataḥ 
MSS araśmi bimbaṃ sūryasya vahniṃ caivāṃśumālinam 
MSS dṛṣṭvaikādaśamāsāttu naro norddhvaṃ tu jīvati 
MSS arasāpi hi vāg bhāti proktāvasara eva hi 
MSS sarvacittapramodāya gālidānaṃ karagrahe 
MSS arasikajanabhāṣaṇato rasikajanaiḥ saha varaṃ kalahaḥ 
MSS lambakucāliṅganato likucakucāpādatāḍanaṃ śreyaḥ 
MSS arājake jīvaloke durbalā balavattaraiḥ 
MSS bādhyante na ca vitteṣu prabhutvamiha kasyacit 
MSS arājake tu loke'smiṃs tasmād rājā vidhīyatām 
MSS rājā rājye ciraṃ rakṣāṃ kṛtvā svargamavāpnuyāt 
MSS arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu dharmo na hyavatiṣṭhate 
MSS parasparaṃ ca bādhante sarvathā dhigarājakam 
MSS arājake hi loke'smin sarvato vidrute bhayāt 
MSS rakṣārthamasya sarvasya rājānamasṛjat prabhuḥ 
MSS arātibhiryudhi sahayudhvano hatāñ jighūkṣavaḥ śrutaraṇatūryaniḥsvanāḥ 
MSS akurvata prathamasamāgamocitaṃ cirojjhitaṃ suragaṇikāḥ prasādhanam 
MSS arātivikramālokavikasvaravilocanaḥ 
MSS kṛpāṇodagradordaṇḍaḥ sa sahasrāyudhīyati 
MSS arālakeśyā alake vidhātrā vidhīyamāne calatūlikāgrāt 
MSS cyutasya bindorasitasya mārga rekheva reje navaromarājī 
MSS arāvapyucitaṃ kāryam ātithyaṃ gṛhamāgate 
MSS chettumapyāgate chāyāṃ nopasaṃharate drumaḥ 
MSS ariṃ mitramudāsīnaṃ madhyasthaṃ sthaviraṃ gurum 
MSS yo na budhyati mandātmā sa ca sarvatra naśyati 
MSS ariṇā saha saṃvāsād viṣeṇa saha bhojanāt 
MSS pāpmanā saha sauhārdān maraṇaṃ pratipadyate 
MSS arito'bhyāgato doṣaḥ śatrusaṃvāsakāritaḥ 
MSS sarpasaṃvāsadharmitvān nityodvegena dūṣitaḥ 
MSS jāyate plakṣabījāśāt kapotādiva śālmaleḥ 
MSS udvegajanano nityaṃ paścādapi bhayāvahaḥ 
MSS aripakṣāśrite mitre marmavedipriyaṃvade 
MSS viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ yadi sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ 
MSS aribhirjitairaśaktair vijñāpyaṃ sevakaiḥ prabhornītiḥ 
MSS viṣayairjito'smi śaṃbho tava yacchlāghyaṃ tadāracaya 
MSS arivadhadehaśarīraḥ sahasā rathisūtaturagapādātaḥ 
MSS bhāti sadānatyāgaḥ sthiratāyāmavanitalatilakaḥ 
MSS ariśca mitraṃ bhavati mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati 
MSS anityacittaḥ puruṣas tasmin ko nāma viśvaset 
MSS ariṣaṅvarga evāyam asyāstāta padāni ṣaṭ 
MSS teṣāmekamapi cchindan khañjaya bhramarīṃ śriyam 
MSS ariṣṭāni mahārāja śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tāni te 
MSS yeṣāmālokanān mṛtyuḥ nijaṃ jānāti yogavit 
MSS aruṃtudaṃ paruṣaṃ rūkṣavācaṃ vākkaṇṭakairvitudantaṃ manuṣyān 
MSS vidyādalakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ mukhe nibaddhāṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam 
MSS arucirniśayā vinā śaśī śaśinā sāpi vinā mahattamaḥ 
MSS ubheyena vinā manobhava sphuritaṃ naiva cakāsti kāminoḥ 
MSS aruṇakiraṇajālairantarikṣe gatarkṣe calati śiśiravāte mandamandaṃ prabhāte 
MSS yuvatijanakadambe nāthamuktauṣṭhabimbe caramagirinitambe candrabimbaṃ lalambe 
MSS aruṇakiraṇe vahnau lājānuḍūni juhoti yā pariṇayati tāṃ saṃdhyāmetāmavaimi maṇirdivaḥ 
MSS iyamiva sa evāgnibhrāntiṃ karoti purāyataḥ karamapi na kastasyaivotkaḥ sakautukamīkṣitum 
MSS aruṇajalajarājīmugdhahastāgrapādā bahulamadhupamālākajjalendīvarākṣī 
MSS anupatati virāvaiḥ patriṇāṃ vyāharantī rajanimacirajātā pūrvasaṃdhyā suteva 
MSS aruṇadalanalinyā snigdhapādāravindā kaṭhinatanudharaṇyāṃ yātyakasmāt skhalantī 
MSS avani tava suteyaṃpādavinyāsadeśe tyaja nija kaṭhinatvaṃ jānakī yātyaraṇyam 
MSS aruṇanayanaṃ sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ darasphuritādharaṃ sutanu śaśinaḥ kliṣṭāṃ kāntiṃ karotu tavānanam 
MSS kṛtamanunayaiḥ kopo'yaṃ te manasvini vardhatām iti gaditayāśliṣṭo devyā śivāya śivo'stu vaḥ 
MSS aruṇamapi vidrumadruṃ mṛdulataraṃ cāpi kisalayaṃ bāle 
MSS adharīkaroti nitarāṃ tavādharo madhurimātiśayāt 
MSS aruṇarāganiṣedhibhiraṃśukaiḥ śravaṇalabdhapadaiśca yavāṅkuraiḥ 
MSS parabhṛtāvirutaiśca vilāsinaḥ smarabalairabalaikarasāḥ kṛtāḥ 
MSS aruṇitākhilaśailavanā muhur vidadhatī pathikān paritāpinaḥ 
MSS vikacakiṃśukasaṃhatiruccakair udavahaddavahavyavahaśriyam 
MSS aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham 
MSS mukhamānataṃ ca sakhite jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ 
MSS aruṇodayavelāyāṃ daśāhena phalaṃ labhet 
MSS govisarjanavelāyāṃ sadyaḥ phalada iṣyate 
MSS arundhatīkāmapuraṃdhrilakṣmī jambhadviṣaddāranavāmbikānām 
MSS caturdaśīyaṃ tadihocitaiva gulphadvayāptā yadadṛśyasiddhiḥ 
MSS aruṣyan kruśyamānasya sukṛtaṃ nāma vindati 
MSS duṣkṛtaṃ cātmano marṣī ruṣyatyevāpamārṣṭi vai 
MSS arūpo'pi surūpo'pi āḍhyo'pi dravyavarjitaḥ 
MSS duḥśīlaḥ śīlayukto vā strīṇāṃ bhartādhidevatā 
MSS are cetomatsya bhramaṇamadhunā yauvanajale tyaja tvaṃ svacchandaṃ yuvatijaladhau paśyasi na kim 
MSS tanūjālījālaṃ stanayugalatumbīphalayutaṃ manobhūḥ kaivartaḥ kṣipati ratitantu pratimuhuḥ 
MSS are daiva tvadāyattaṃ kāmaṃ vittādi gacchatu 
MSS mamāyattaṃ punarvṛttaṃ hartuṃ kasyeha yogyatā 
MSS are yamabhaṭāḥ śaṭhāḥ kapaṭavigrahe tūdbhaṭā nivedayata vo yamaṃ na ca tavādhikāro mayi 
MSS ahaṃ ca śivasundarīcaraṇayugmapaṅkeruha skhalanmadhusudhārasaṃ samapibaṃ na jānītha re 
MSS are rāmāhastābharaṇa bhasalaśreṇiśaraṇa smarakrīḍāvrīḍāśamana virahiprāṇadamana 
MSS sarohaṃsottaṃsa pracaladala nīlotpala sakhe sakhedo'haṃ mohaṃ ślathaya kathaya kvenduvadana 
MSS are vada harernāma kṣemadhāma kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 
MSS bahiḥ sarati niḥśvāse viśvāsaḥ kaḥ pravartate 
MSS araiḥ saṃdhāryate nābhir nābhau cārāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ 
MSS svāmisevakayorevaṃ vṛtticakraṃ pravartate 
MSS arodi madhupairbhṛśaṃ kamalamālayā mīlitaṃ vyakampi jalavīcibhirvidalitaṃ mukhaṃ kairavaiḥ 
MSS vilokya rajanau hrade virahikokaśokaṃ ghanaṃ paravyasanakātarāḥ kimiva kurvate sādhavaḥ 
MSS arkakarpāsayormūlaṃ jalapītaṃ jayedviṣam 
MSS paṭolamūlanasyena kāladaṣṭo'pi jīvati 
MSS arkacchāyaṃ tirayati sudhāliptavidyunmatallī cakraprakhyaṃ mahati suṣamāmaṇḍale dūramagnam 
MSS raktādarśapratiphalamiva śrīsadaṅgaṃ vahantī dṛṣṭā kācit taralanayanā devateva smarasya 
MSS arkāḥ kiṃ phalasaṃcayena bhavatāṃ kiṃ vaḥ prasūnairnavaiḥ kiṃ vā bhūrilatācayena mahatā gotreṇa kiṃ bhūyasā 
MSS yeṣāmekatamo babhūva sa punarnaivāsti kaścit kule chāyāyāmupaviśya yasya pathikāstṛptiṃ phalaiḥ kurvate 
MSS arkāḥ kecana kecidakṣataravaḥ keciddalakṣmāruhāḥ nimbāḥ kecana kecidatra vipine krūrāḥ karīradrumāḥ 
MSS mākando makarandatundilamiladbhṛṅgāliśṛṅgāritaḥ ko'pyatrāsti na mitra yatra tanute karṇāmṛtaṃ kokilaḥ 
MSS arkābhimukhyasalilasthitisādhanāni raktāmbujasya phalitānyadhunā tapāṃsi 
MSS yadbhīru tasya paribhūtikaraṃ padaṃ tvaṃ lākṣārasāntaritarāgamidaṃ karoṣi 
MSS arghāyāmbudhirindumaṇḍalamapi śrīcandanaṃ taṇḍulās tārā bilvadalaṃ nabhaḥsuradhunī dhūpaḥ pradīpo raviḥ 
MSS kheṭāḥ pañcaphalāni kiṃ ca kakubhastāmbūlamārātrikaṃ meruḥ śrījagatīpate tava yaśoyogeśvarasyārcane 
MSS arghyaṃ dattvātha devāya bhāskarāya samāhitaḥ 
MSS tato'laṃkṛtagātraḥ san vṛttamālokya mantravat 
MSS arghyamarghyamiti vādinaṃ nṛpaṃ so'navekṣya bharatāgrajo yataḥ 
MSS kṣatrakopadahanārciṣaṃ tataḥ saṃdadhe dṛśamudagratārakām 
MSS arcakasya tapoyogād arcanasyātiśāyanāt 
MSS ābhirūpyācca mūrtīnāṃ devaḥ sāṃnidhyamṛcchati 
MSS arcāmaḥ satataṃ gaṇādhipamathāpyākhūn nihanmaḥ śataṃ dhyāyāmo hṛdi bhairavaṃ tadapi tu protsārayāmaḥ śunaḥ 
MSS bhūteśaṃ praṇumastathāpi śataśo bhūtān nigṛhṇīmahe nahyekasya guṇaḥ parasya mahato doṣānapi prorṇute 
MSS arcāmīti dhiyā yadeva kusumaṃ kṣiptvā jano mucyate vidhyāmīti dhiyā tadeva vikiran bhasmīkṛto manmathaḥ 
MSS ityābhyantaravṛttimātrarasiko bāhyānapekṣaśca yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi nāmnāyate 
MSS arcirmālākarālāddivamabhilihato dāvavahneradūrād uḍḍīyoḍḍīya kiṃcicchalabhakavalanānandamandapracārāḥ 
MSS agre'gre saṃraṭantaḥ pracurataramasīpātadurlakṣadhūmrā dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prativiṭapamamī niṣṭhurāḥ svasthalīṣu 
MSS arciṣmanti vidārya vaktrakuharāṇyāsṛkkaṇo vāsukes tarjanyā viṣakarburān gaṇayataḥ saṃspṛśya dantāṅkurān 
MSS ekaṃ trīṇi navāṣṭa sapta ṣaḍiti vyastāstasaṃkhyākramā vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśavakalāḥ kurvantu vo maṅgalam 
MSS arcye viṣṇau śilādhīrguruṣu naramatirvaiṣṇave jātibuddhir viṣṇorvā vaiṣṇavānāṃ kalimalamathane pādatīrthe'mbubuddhiḥ 
MSS śrīviṣṇornāmni mantre sakalakaluṣahe śabdasāmānyabuddhir viṣṇau sarveśvareśe taditarasamadhīryasya vā nārakī saḥ 
MSS arjayejjñānamarthāṃśca pumānamaravat sadā 
MSS keśeṣviva gṛhītaḥ san mṛtyunā dharmamācaret 
MSS arjitaṃ svena vīryeṇa nānyamāśritya kaṃcana 
MSS phalaśākamapi śreyo bhoktuṃ hyakṛpaṇaṃ gṛhe 
MSS parasya nu gṛhe bhoktuḥ paribhūtasya nityaśaḥ 
MSS sumṛṣṭamapi na śreyo vikalpo'yamataḥ satām 
MSS arjunaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃyuktaḥ karṇaṃ yatrānudhāvati 
MSS tannetraṃ tu kurukṣetram iti mugdhe mṛśāmahe 
MSS arjunaḥ phalgunaḥ pārthaḥ kirīṭī śvetavāhanaḥ 
MSS bībhatsurvijayī kṛṣṇaḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ 
MSS arjunasya ime bāṇā neme bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ 
MSS sīdanti mama gātrāṇi māghamā segavā iva 
MSS arjunasya pratijñe dve na dainyaṃ na palāyanam 
MSS āyū rakṣati marmāṇi āyurannaṃ prayacchati 
MSS arjunānte varārohe bhīmānte ca varānane 
MSS pāṇḍavaiḥ saha yoddhavyaṃ rakṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ 
MSS arjunīyati yadarjane jano varjanīyajanatarjanādibhiḥ 
MSS maṅkṣu naśyati cirāya saṃcitā vañcitā jagati ke na saṃpadā 
MSS arthaṃ dhigastu bahuvairikaraṃ narāṇāṃ rājyaṃ dhigastu bhayadaṃ bahu cintanīyam 
MSS svargaṃ dhigastu punarāgamanapravṛttiṃ dhig dhik śarīramapi rogasamāśrayaṃ ca 
MSS arthaṃ mahāntamāsādya vidyāmaiśvaryameva vā 
MSS vicaratyasamunnaddho yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate 
MSS arthaṃ sapratibandhaṃ prabhuradhigantuṃ sahāyavāneva 
MSS dṛśyaṃ tamasi na paśyati dīpena vinā sacakṣurapi 
MSS arthaḥ kāmo dharmo mokṣaḥ sarve bhavanti puruṣasya 
MSS tāvadyāvat pīḍāṃ jāṭharavahnirna vidadhāti 
MSS arthaḥ sukhaṃ kīrtirapīha mā bhūd anartha evāstu tathāpi dhīrāḥ 
MSS nijapratijñāmanurudhyamānā mahodyamāḥ karmasamārabhante 
MSS artha eva hi keṣāṃcid anartho bhavitā nṛṇām 
MSS arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥ 
MSS arthagrahaṇe na tathā dunoti kaṭukūjitairyathā piśunaḥ 
MSS rudhirādānādadhikaṃ dunoti karṇe kvaṇan maśakaḥ 
MSS arthajñāt saṃśayacchettā tataḥ śreyān svakarmakṛt 
MSS muktasaṅgastato bhūyān adogdhā dharmamātmanaḥ 
MSS arthatyāgo hi kāryaḥ syād arthaṃ śreyāṃsamicchatā 
MSS bījaupamyena kaunteya mā te bhūdatra saṃśayaḥ 
MSS arthadharmau parityajya yaḥ kāmamanuvartate 
MSS evamāpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā 
MSS arthanāśaṃ manastāpaṃ gṛhe duścaritāni ca 
MSS vañcanaṃ cāpamānaṃ ca matimān na prakāśayet 
MSS arthapatau bhūmipatau bāle vṛddhe tapo'dhike viduṣi 
MSS yoṣiti mūrkhe guruṣu ca viduṣā naivottaraṃ deyam 
MSS arthapraśnakṛtau loke sulabhau tau gṛhe gṛhe 
MSS dātā cottaradaścaiva durlabhau puruṣau bhuvi

MSS uttīrṇastu tato dhanārthamaparāṃ bhūyo viśatyāpadaṃ prāṇānāṃ ca dhanasya cādhamadhiyāmanyonyahetuḥ paṇaḥ 
MSS arthapriyatayātmānam apriyāya dadāti yā 
MSS kāmātmanyapi niḥsnehāṃ ko'nurakteti manyate 
MSS arthamanarthaṃ bhāvaya nityaṃ nāsti tataḥ sukhaleśaḥ satyam 
MSS putrādapi dhanabhājāṃ bhītiḥ sarvatraiṣā vihitā rītiḥ 
MSS arthayuktasya karaṇam anarthasya ca varjanam 
MSS nyāyataśca karādānaṃ svayaṃ ca pratimokṣaṇam 
MSS arthayuktimavijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim 
MSS mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasyāpi calitā matiḥ 
MSS arthayedeva mitrāṇi sati vāsati vā dhane 
MSS nānarthayan vijānāti mitrāṇāṃ sāraphalgutām 
MSS artharakṣāparo bhṛtyaḥ kṛtyākṛtyavivekavit 
MSS sāndhivigrahikaḥ kāryo rājñā nayaviśāradaḥ 
MSS arthavantaḥ praśasyante nindyante tadvinākṛtāḥ 
MSS āgemeṣvapi cedevam adbhutaṃ kiṃ śarīriṣu 
MSS arthavānarthamarthibhyo na dadātyatra ko guṇaḥ 
MSS ekaiva gatirarthasya dānamanyā vipattayaḥ 
MSS arthavāneva loke'smin pūjyate mitrabāndhavaiḥ 
MSS arthahīnastu puruṣo jīvannapi mṛtopamaḥ 
MSS arthavān duṣkulīno'pi loke pūjyatamo naraḥ 
MSS śaśinastulyavaṃśo'pi nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate 
MSS arthaścet sarvathā rakṣya iti kaiścidudāhṛtam 
MSS tatkathaṃ na hariścandro'rakṣat kuśikanandane 
MSS dharmastu rakṣitaḥ sarvair api dehavyayena ca 
MSS śibiprabhṛtibhūpālair dadhīcipramukhairdvijaiḥ 
MSS arthasaṃpadvimohāya bahuśokāya caiva hi 
MSS tasmādarthamanarthakyaṃ śreyo'rthī dūratastyajet 
MSS arthasaṃpādanārthaṃ ca pīḍyamānasya śatrubhiḥ 
MSS sādhuṣu vyapadeśārthaṃ dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS arthasiddhiṃ parāmicchan dharmamevāditaścaret 
MSS nahi dharmādapaityarthaḥ svargalokādivāmṛtam 
MSS arthasya niścayo dṛṣṭo vicāreṇa hitoktitaḥ 
MSS na snānena na dānena prāṇāyāmaśatena vā 
MSS arthasya puruṣo dāsaḥ sa ca jātu na kasyacit 
MSS yadarjanaparā loke sarve'pi bhuvanatraye

MSS iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho'smyarthena kauravaiḥ

MSS śauce dharme'nnapaktyāṃ ca pāriṇāhyasya cekṣaṇe 
MSS arthasya sadotthānaṃ niyamaparīpālanaṃ kriyājñānam 
MSS sthānatyāgaḥ paṭutā 'nudvegaḥ strīṣvaviśvāsaḥ 
MSS arthasya sādhane siddha utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye 
MSS nāśopabhoga āyāsas trāsaścintā bhramo nṛṇām 
MSS arthasyānarthapūrṇasya ko'vasīdatu saṃgrahe 
MSS tatsaṃtuṣṭairnnacediṣṭair duṣṭaiḥ syānnayanotsavaḥ 
MSS arthasyopārjanaṃ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamasya gṛhāgamaḥ 
MSS tasyāgatasya bandhubhyo viniyogaḥ sukhāvahaḥ 
MSS arthasyopārjanaṃ kṛtvā naivābhāgyaḥ samaśnute 
MSS araṇyaṃ mahadāsādya mūḍhaḥ somilako yathā 
MSS arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathā 
MSS nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāt 
MSS arthahīno'pi madhuraḥ śabdo lokapriyaṃkaraḥ 
MSS vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgādīny atrodāharaṇāni naḥ 
MSS arthāṃśca durlabhāṃlloke kleśāṃśca sulabhāṃstathā 
MSS duḥkhaṃ caiva kuṭumbārthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate 
MSS arthāṃstyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāmajān

MSS arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatām 
MSS asamṛddhāstvapi sadā mohayantyavicakṣaṇān

MSS arthāḥ sādhāraṇā eva viyujyante svabhāvataḥ 
MSS mamatāṃ tyajatāṃ teṣu mahadutpadyate yaśaḥ

MSS sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi gacchantamanugacchati

MSS avyayebhyo'pi ye cārthān niṣkarṣanti sahasraśaḥ 
MSS arthā hasantyucitadānavihīnacittaṃ bhūmirnaraṃ ca mama bhūmiriti bruvāṇam

MSS arthinastvaritadānena tṛptirbhavati yādṛśī 
MSS bahudānaṃ vilambena na tādṛk tṛptikārakam 
MSS arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt 
MSS tadavasthā punardeva nānyasya mukhamīkṣate 
MSS arthināṃ mitravargasya vidviṣāṃ ca parāṅmukhaḥ 
MSS yo na yāti pitā tena putrī mātā ca vīrasūḥ 
MSS arthināmupapannānāṃ pūrvaṃ cāpyupakāriṇām 
MSS āśāṃ saṃśrutya yo hanti sa loke puruṣādhamaḥ 
MSS arthini kavayati kavayati paṭhati ca paṭhati stavonmukhe stauti 
MSS paścādyāmītyukte maunī dṛṣṭiṃ nimīlayati 
MSS arthine na tṛṇavaddhanamātraṃ kiṃ tu jīvanamapi pratipādyam 
MSS evamāha kuśavajjaladāpī dravyadānavidhiruktividagdhaḥ 
MSS arthino jaṭharajvālādagdhā vāk kaṃcidañcati 
MSS tāṃ cāśamayato vittaṃ kinnimittaṃ na vidmahe 
MSS arthipratyarthilakṣairapy aparāṅmukhacetasam 
MSS tvāṃ parāṅmukhatāṃ ninyuḥ kevalaṃ parayoṣitaḥ 
MSS arthibhuktāvaśiṣṭaṃ yat tadaśnīyān mahāśayaḥ 
MSS śveto'rthirahitaṃ bhuktvā nijamāṃsāśano'bhavat 
MSS arthibhyaḥ kanakasya dīpakapiśā viśrāṇitā rāśayo vāde vādiviṣāṇināṃ pratihatāḥ śāstroktigarvā giraḥ 
MSS utkhātapratiropitairnṛpatibhiḥ śārairiva krīḍitaṃ kartavyaṃ kṛtamarthitā yadi vidhestatrāpi sajjā vayam 
MSS arthibhyaśca dviṣadbhyaśca vaimukhyaṃ yasya nāstyasau 
MSS mahodāraḥ sadā śāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ ko'pi durlabhaḥ 
MSS arthibhraṃśabahūbhavatphalabharavyājena kubjāyitaḥ satyasminnatidānabhāji kathamapyāstāṃ sa kalpadrumaḥ 
MSS āste nirvyayaratnasaṃpadudayodagraḥ kathaṃ yācaka śreṇīvarjanaduryaśonibiḍitavrīḍastu ratnācalaḥ 
MSS arthī karoti dainyaṃ labdhārtho garvamaparitoṣaṃ ca 
MSS naṣṭadhanaśca saśokaḥ sukhamāste niḥspṛhaḥ puruṣaḥ 
MSS arthī yenārthakṛtyena saṃvrajatyavicārayan 
MSS tamarthamarthaśāstrajñāḥ prāhurarthyāśca lakṣmaṇa 
MSS arthī lāghavamucchrito nipatanaṃ kāmāturo lāñchanaṃ lubdho'kīrtimasaṃgaraḥ paribhavaṃ duṣṭo'nyadoṣe ratim 
MSS niḥsvo vañcanamunmanā vikalatāṃ śokākulaḥ saṃśayaṃ durvāgapriyatāṃ durodaravaśaḥ prāpnoti kaṣṭaṃ muhuḥ 
MSS arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena tena rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena 
MSS mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhādhikamatsareṇa 
MSS arthena parihīṇaṃ tu naramaspṛśyatāṃ gatam 
MSS tyajanti bāndhavāḥ sarve mṛtaṃ sattvamivāsavaḥ 
MSS arthena rakṣitamidaṃ rājyaṃ punararthamarpayati 
MSS arthaikaparo nṛpatiḥ pariharati punaḥ kṣaṇādubhayam 
MSS arthena hi vihīnasya puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ 
MSS vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā 
MSS arthena hīnaḥ puruṣas tyajyate mitrabāndhavaiḥ 
MSS tyaktalokakriyāhāraḥ parāsuriva niṣprabhaḥ 
MSS arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ 
MSS ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret 
MSS arthenopārjyate dharmo dharmeṇārtha upārjyate 
MSS anyonyāśrayaṇaṃ hyetad ubhayotpattisādhanam 
MSS arthendriyārthābhidhyānaṃ sarvārthāpahnavo nṛṇām 
MSS bhraṃśito jñānavijñānād yenāviśati mukhyatām 
MSS arthe pratyupalabdhe ca paradoṣe ca kīrtite 
MSS ātmānaṃ sādhu kartavyaṃ śīlavṛttamabhīpsitam 
MSS arthebhyo hi vivṛttebhyaḥ saṃbhṛtebhyastatastataḥ 
MSS kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ 
MSS artheṣu kāmamupalabhya manoratho me strīṇāṃ dhaneṣvanucitaṃ praṇayaṃ karoti 
MSS māne ca kāryakaraṇe ca vilambamāno dhig bhoḥ kulaṃ ca puruṣasya daridratāṃ ca 
MSS artheṣvalabhyeṣvakṛtaprayatnaṃ kṛtādaraṃ nityamupāyavatsu 
MSS jitendriyaṃ nānutapanti rogās tatkālayuktaṃ yadi nāsti daivam 
MSS arthe hyavidyamāne'pi saṃsṛtirna nivartate 
MSS dhyāyato viṣayānasya svapne'narthāgamo yathā 
MSS arthairanekairjananīmamuṣyāś cittaṃ ca dattvā cirakālacintyam 
MSS saṃtoṣayeyaṃ sahasaiva bhadre na cet kathaṃ syād iha naḥ praveśaḥ 
MSS arthairarthā nibaghyante gajairiva mahāgajāḥ 
MSS na hyanarthavatā śakyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ kartumīhayā 
MSS arthairvihīnaḥ puruṣo jīvannapi mṛtopamaḥ 
MSS dharmārthavidyārjanato matiryasya nivartate 
MSS artho girāmapihitaḥ pihitaśca kaścit saubhāgyameti marahaṭṭavadhūkucābhaḥ 
MSS nāndhrīpayodhara ivātitarāṃ prakāśo no gurjarīstana ivātitarāṃ nigūḍhaḥ 
MSS arthotkaṇṭhāvakuṇṭhapramuṣitavinayairluṭhyatāṃ nākiśuṇṭhaiḥ pratno ratnoccayaḥ kiṃ tvativiṣamadaśāṃ tāmanudhyāya khidye 
MSS sindho manthādrimanthāt taralatarabṛhadbhaṅgasaṃghātaghāta prabhraśyanmūlavelāgirigaṇapatanoddāmadhāmandhamīkā 
MSS artho narāṇāṃ patiraṅganānāṃ varṣā nadīnāmṛturāṭ tarūṇām 
MSS svadharmacārī nṛpatiḥ prajānāṃ gataṃ gataṃ yauvanamānayanti 
MSS artho na saṃbhṛtaḥ kaścin na vidyā kācidarjitā 
MSS na tapaḥ saṃcitaṃ kiṃcid gataṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ 
MSS artho nāma janānāṃ jīvitamakhilakriyākalāpaśca 
MSS tamapi harantyatidhūrtāḥ chagalagalā gāyanā loke 
MSS arthopacayavijñānam asti yasya sa paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS saraḥ salilasaṃpūrṇam āśrayanti vihaṅgamāḥ 
MSS arthopārjanadakṣaśca kṣāntiśīlaḥ sadā bhavet 
MSS na tatra parakāryāṇi vidvānāpi viśeṣayet 
MSS artho'pyarthena cet sādhyaḥ kā vārtā dharmakāmayoḥ 
MSS arthaḥ sarvajaganmūlam anartho'rthaviparyayaḥ 
MSS artho vinaivārthanayopasīdan nālpo'pi dhīrairavadhīraṇīyaḥ 
MSS mānyena manye vidhinā vitīrṇaḥ sa prītidāyo bahu mantumarhaḥ 
MSS arthoṣmā pitṛlālanaṃ viṭaghaṭāmelaḥ priyaṃmanyatā tāruṇyaṃ nagare sthitistaralatā dhīḥ kāmaśāstraṃ prati 
MSS saṃgītaṃ rajanī vidhurmadhumadaḥ spardhā sapatnaistathā veśyānāmanuraktavittaharaṇe kurvanti sāhāyakam 
MSS artho'sti cenna padaśuddhirathāsti sāpi no rītirasti yadi sā ghaṭanā kutastyā 
MSS sāpyasti cenna navavakragatistadetad vyarthaṃ vinā rasamaho gahanaṃ kavitvam 
MSS artho hi kanyā parakīya eva tāmadya saṃpreṣya parigrahītuḥ 
MSS jāto mamāyaṃ viśadaḥ prakāmaṃ pratyarpitanyāsa ivāntarātmā 
MSS artho hi naṣṭakāryārthair ayatnenādhigamyate 
MSS utsāho balavānārya nāstyutsāhāt paraṃ balam 
MSS arthaucityavatā sūktir alaṃkāreṇa śobhate 
MSS pīnastanasthiteneva hāreṇa hariṇekṣaṇā 
MSS ardhaṃ kalaṅkarahitā karuṇaiva śaṃbhor ardhaṃ guṇāstaditare sakalāḥ sametāḥ 
MSS ityamba saṃprati kila sphuritaṃ rahasyaṃ saṃpaśyato mama bhavanmayamaiśamardham 
MSS ardhaṃ jitaṃ tripuramamba tava smitaṃ ced ardhāntareṇa ca tathā bhavitavyameva 
MSS taccintaye janani kāraṇasūkṣmarūpa sthūlātmakatripuraśāntikṛte smitaṃ te 
MSS ardhaṃ dantacchadasya sphurati japavaśādardhamapyutprakopād ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptumanyastameva 
MSS ekaṃ dhyānānnimīlatyaparamavikasadvīkṣate netramitthaṃ tulyānicchāvidhitsā tanuravatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvidhāne 
MSS ardhaṃ dānavavairiṇā girijayāpyardhaṃ śivasyāhṛtaṃ devetthaṃ jagatītale puraharābhāve samunmīlati 
MSS gaṅgā sāgaramambaraṃ śaśikalā nāgādhipaḥ kṣmātalaṃ sarvajñatvamadhīśvaratvamagamat tvāṃ māṃ tu bhikṣāṭanam 
MSS ardhaṃ nītvā niśāyāḥ sarabhasasuratāyāsasaṃśleṣayogaiḥ prodbhūtāsahyatṛṣṇo madhumadanirato harmyapṛṣṭhe vivikte 
MSS saṃbhogaklāntakāntāśithilabhujalatāvarjitaṃ karkarīto jyotsnābhinnācchadhāraṃ na pibati salilaṃ śāradaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ 
MSS ardhaṃ premanibaddhamardhamaparaṃ lajjāśritaṃ mānasaṃ evaṃ netrasaroruhaṃ priyamukhe cānyad gavākṣe'rpitam 
MSS paryaṅke padamekameva dharaṇau pṛṣṭhe ca kṛtvāparaṃ sthātuṃ gantumapi prabhātasamaye śaknoti naivābalā 
MSS ardhaṃ bhāryā manuṣyasya bhāryā śreṣṭhatamaḥ sakhā 
MSS bhāryā mūlaṃ trivargasya bhāryā mitraṃ mariṣyataḥ 
MSS ardhaṃ sajjanasaṃparkād avidyāyā vinaśyati 
MSS caturbhāgastu śāstrārthaiś caturbhāgaṃ svayatnataḥ 
MSS ardhaṃ striyastribhuvane sacarācare'sminn ardhaṃ pumāṃsa iti darśayituṃ bhavatyā 
MSS strīpuṃsalakṣaṇamidaṃ vapurādṛtaṃ yat tenāsi devi viditā trijagaccharīrā 
MSS ardhacandraṃ ca cakraṃ ca śakaṭaṃ makaraṃ tathā 
MSS kamalaṃ śreṇikāṃ gulmaṃ vyūhānevaṃ prakalpayet 
MSS ardhacandravadākāraṃ strīnāmārthaṃ ca tryakṣaram 
MSS nakārādi rikārāntaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS ardhacandrasamāyuktaṃ puṃnāma caturakṣaram 
MSS kakārādi lakārāntam iha jānāti paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS ardhacandrākṛtiryasmin khaṅge svābhāvikī bhavet 
MSS api doṣasahasrāṇi hanti candrastamo yathā 
MSS ardhapañcamahastaṃ tu śreṣṭhaṃ cāpaṃ prakīrtitam 
MSS tadvijñeyaṃ dhanurdivyaṃ śaṃkareṇa dhṛtaṃ purā 
MSS ardhapītamadirā maṇipārī śobhatāṃ kathamatīva taruṇyāḥ 
MSS cumbitairadhikapāṭalabhāsā pūritādharamayūkhabhareṇa 
MSS ardhapītastanaṃ mātur āmardākliṣṭakesaram 
MSS prakrīḍituṃ siṃhaśiśuṃ balātkāreṇa karṣati 
MSS ardhapuruṣe ca matsyaḥ pārāvatasaṃnibhaśca pāṣāṇaḥ 
MSS mṛdbhavati tatra nīlā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ ca bahutoyam 
MSS ardhaprothasthitā rekhā dṛśyante yasya vājinaḥ 
MSS tasya mṛtyuḥ samuddiṣṭo daśamaṃ prāpya vatsaram 
MSS ardhapluṣṭaṃ bahubhyaḥ śavapiśitamupāhṛtya hṛṣṭaścitābhyo jātagrāsātirekaḥ sphuṭataradhamanīnaddhaśuṣkārdrakāyaḥ 
MSS pretaḥ saṃtarjya dṛṣṭyā kuṭilaparuṣayā majjaniṣkarṣaśuṣkair āhantyāhāralubdhānmuhurabhipatato jambukānasthikhaṇḍaiḥ 
MSS ardhamīlitavilolatārake sā dṛśau nidhuvanaklamālasā 
MSS yanmuhūrtamavahanna tatpunas tṛptirāsta dayitasya paśyataḥ 
MSS tatklamastamadidīkṣata kṣaṇaṃ tālavṛntacalanāya nāyakam 
MSS tadvidhā hi bhavadaivataṃ priyā vedhaso'pi vidadhāti cāpalam 
MSS ardharātre dinasyārdhe tvardhacandre'rdhabhāskare 
MSS rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā kṛṣṇapakṣe sitāṣṭamī 
MSS ardhasiddheṣu kāryeṣu ātmaguhyaṃ prakāśayet 
MSS sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti bakaḥ karkaṭakādyathā 
MSS ardhasmitena vinimantrya daśārdhabāṇam ardhaṃ vidhūya vasanāñcalamardhamārge 
MSS ardhena netraviśikhena nivṛtya sārdham ardhārdhameva taruṇī taruṇaṃ cakāra 
MSS ardhahastena hīnastu bhavenmadhyasturaṅgamaḥ 
MSS tato hastena hīnaśca hīna eva smṛto hayaḥ 
MSS ardhāṅganāpuṃvapuṣaḥ purārer mūrttiḥ śriyaṃ nauriva vastanotu 
MSS premātibhārādaparaṃ yadardhaṃ mamajja śṛṅgārarasāmburāśau 
MSS ardhāṅgāhitapaurvakīrtivanitādīvyatsitāṃśuprabhaṃ kailāsīkṛtadikkarīndraśirasi nyastasvapādāmbujam 
MSS viśvavyāpyavināśi śaṃkarapadaṃ yāyāttvadīyaṃ yaśo na syādasya yadi kṣitīśa bhavato dānādikebhyo janiḥ 
MSS ardhāṅgulaparīṇāhajihvāgrāyāsabhīravaḥ 
MSS sarvāṅgakleśajananam abudhāḥ karma kurvate 
MSS ardhācitā satvaramutthitāyāḥ pade pade durnimite galantī 
MSS kasyāścidāsīd raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭhamūlārpitasūtraśeṣā 
MSS ardhādhītāśca yairvedās tathā śūdrānnabhojanāḥ 
MSS te dvijāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti nirviṣā iva pannagāḥ 
MSS ardhāsane samadhiropya suradvipasya śakro'pi yadyudhi śacīṃ kavacīkaroti 
MSS dhīrasya tasya sahate daśakandharasya kaḥ sāhasaikarasikaḥ karavāladhārām 
MSS ardhena jaladaśyāmam ardhenātapapiṅgalam 
MSS ardhanārīśvarākāraṃ na ko manyeta vāsaram 
MSS ardhokte bhayamāgato'si kimidaṃ kaṇṭhaśca kiṃ gadgadaś cāṭorasya na ca kṣaṇo'yamanupakṣipteyamāstāṃ kathā 
MSS brūhi prastutamastu saṃprati mahat karṇe sakhīnāṃ mukhais tṛptirnirbharamebhirakṣarapadaiḥ prāgeva me saṃbhṛtā 
MSS ardhodgatena kadalī mṛdutāmratalena garbhakoṣeṇa 
MSS pibati nidāghajvaritā ghanadhārāṃ karapuṭenaiva 
MSS ardhonmīlitalocanasya pibataḥ paryāptamekaṃ stanaṃ sadyaḥ prasnutadugdhadigdhamaparaṃ hastena saṃmārjataḥ 
MSS mātrā cāṅgulilālitasya vadane smerāyamāne muhur viṣṇoḥ kṣīrakaṇorudhāmadhavalā dantadyutiḥ pātu vaḥ 
MSS arpayati pratidivasaṃ priyasya pathi locane bālā 
MSS nikṣipati kamalamālāḥ komalamiva kartumadhvānam 
MSS arpayantyarthine prāṇān na praṇāmamarātaye 
MSS na nāstītyuttaraṃ jātu suhṛde sumanojanāḥ 
MSS arpitaṃ rasitavatyapi nāma grāhamanyayuvaterdayitena 
MSS ujjhati sma madamapyapibantī vīkṣya madyamitarā tu mamāda 
MSS arpitāḥ prathamatastvayi gāvo gopaśāvaka iti praṇayena 
MSS dīyate punaridaṃ dhanahīnair vetanaṃ garuḍaketana cetaḥ 
MSS arvāgabhyetya garvādiva saridavarā seyamityuddidhīrṣāḥ kālindīṃ kopavegākalitahalahaṭhotkṣepiṇaḥ kṣemahetuḥ 
MSS tālāṅkasyāśu dālārasavivaśahṛdaḥ sraṃsadaṃsottarīyaṃ tiryagvyastāḍghri bhūyaḥ suvalanamatha laghūtthānamādhāvanaṃ tat 
MSS arvācīnavacaḥ prapañcasukhināṃ duḥśikṣitānāṃ puro gambhīraṃ kavipuṅgavasya kimaho sarvasvamuddhāṭyate 
MSS vyarthaṃ kardamagandhagauravahṛtagrāmīṇagoṣṭhīmukhe ko'yaṃ nāma sacetano'sti ya iha prastauti kastūrikām 
MSS arvāñcatpañcaśākhaḥ sphuraduparijaṭāmaṇḍalaḥ saṃśritānāṃ nityāparṇo'pi tāpatritayamapanayan sthāṇuravyādapūrvaḥ 
MSS yaḥ pronmīlatkapardaiḥ śirasi viracitābālabandhe dyusindhoḥ pāthobhirlabdhasekaḥ phalati phalaśataṃ vāñchitaṃ bhaktibhājām 
MSS alaṃkaroti yaḥ ślokaṃ śuka eva na madhyamaḥ 
MSS alaṃ karoti yaḥ ślokaṃ śuka eva namadhyamaḥ 
MSS alaṃkaroti hi jarā rājāmātyabhiṣagyatīn 
MSS viḍambayati paṇyastrīmallagāyanasevakān 
MSS alaṃkartuṃ karṇau bhṛśamanubhavantyā navarujaṃ sasītkāraṃ tiryagvalitavadanāyā mṛgadṛśaḥ 
MSS karābjavyāpārānatisukṛtasārān rasayato januḥ sarvaślāghyaṃ jayati lalitottaṃsa bhavataḥ 
MSS alaṃkāraḥ śaṅkākaranarakapālaṃ parijano viśīrṇāṅgo bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣa eko bahuvayāḥ 
MSS avastheyaṃ sthāṇorapi bhavati sarvāmaraguror vidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayaṃ ke punaramī 
MSS alaṃkārapriyo viṣṇur jaladhārāpriyaḥ śivaḥ 
MSS namaskārapriyo bhānur brāhmaṇo bhojanapriyaḥ 
MSS alaṃkārabhṛto rītimantaḥ siddhā rasonnatau 
MSS lakṣaṇairlakṣitātmānaḥ kṛtino nanu kecana 
MSS alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā 
MSS duṣkaraṃ tacca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ 
MSS yādṛśī vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsāmaviśeṣataḥ 
MSS kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ 
MSS kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat 
MSS alaṃkṛtaḥ kāñcanakoṭimūlyair mahārharatnairgajavājivāhaiḥ 
MSS nimeṣamātraṃ labhate na jīvaṃ kālena kāle śikhayā gṛhītaḥ 
MSS alaṃkriyante śikhinaḥ kekayā madaraktayā 
MSS vācā vipaścito'tyarthaṃ mādhuryaguṇayuktayā 
MSS alaṃkriyā śaktisamanvitānāṃ tapodhanānāṃ balaśaktiragryā 
MSS vyāpādadāvānalavāridhārā pratyeha ca kṣāntiranarthaśāntiḥ 
MSS alaṃ tridivavārtayā kimiti sārvabhaumaśriyā vidūrataravartinī bhavatu mokṣalakṣmīrapi 
MSS kalindagirinandinītaṭanikuñjapuñjodare mano harati kevalaṃ navatamālanīlaṃ mahaḥ 
MSS alaṃ nalaṃ roddhumamī kilābhavan guṇā vivekapramukhā na cāpalam 
MSS smaraḥ sa ratyāmaniruddhameva yat sṛjatyayaṃ sarganisarga īdṛśaḥ 
MSS alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ 
MSS kṛmirhi kośakārastu badhyate svaparigrahāt 
MSS alaṃ vā bahu yo brūte hitavākyāvamāninaḥ 
MSS sa tasmāllabhate doṣaṃ kapeḥ sūcīmukho yathā 
MSS alaṃ vā bahuvādena yatra yatrānurajyase 
MSS tatra tatraiva te duḥkhadāvapāvakapaṅktayaḥ 
MSS alaṃ vilaṅghya priyavijña yācñāṃ kṛtvāpi vāmyaṃ vividhaṃ vidheye 
MSS yaśaḥpathādāśravatāpadotthāt khalu skhalitvāstakhaloktikhelāt 
MSS alaṃ vilambya tvarituṃ hi velā kārye kila sthairyasahe vicāraḥ 
MSS gurūpadeśaṃ pratibheva tīkṣṇā pratīkṣate jātu na kālamartiḥ 
MSS alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ 
MSS mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate 
MSS alaṃ sthitvā śmaśāne'smin gṛdhragomāyusaṃkule 
MSS kaṅkālabahule ghore sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkare 
MSS na punarjīvitaḥ kaścit kāladharmamupāgataḥ 
MSS priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśī 
MSS alaṃ himānīparidīrṇagātraḥ samāpitaḥ phālgunasaṃgamena 
MSS atyantamākāṅkṣitakṛṣṇavartmā bhīṣmo mahātmājani māghatulyaḥ 
MSS alakatamaḥ paripītaṃ susmitasuṣamāpuraskṛtaṃ madhuram 
MSS ko na sudhānidhisahajaṃ sumukhi mukhaṃ hanta saṃmanutām 
MSS alakāśca khalāścaiva mūrdhni bhīrujanairdhṛtāḥ 
MSS uparyupari satkāre'pyāviṣkurvanti vakratām 
MSS alakeṣu cūrṇabhāsaḥ svedalavābhān kapolaphalakeṣu 
MSS navaghanakautukinīnāṃ vārikaṇān paśyati kṛtārthaḥ 
MSS alaktako yathā rakto naraḥ kāmī tathaiva ca 
MSS hṛtasārastathā so'pi pādamūle nipātyate 
MSS alaktako yathā rakto niṣpīḍya puruṣas tathā 
MSS abalābhirbalād raktaḥ pādamūle nipātyate 
MSS alakṣitakucābhogaṃ bhramantī nṛtyabhūmiṣu 
MSS smareṇāpi sarojākṣī na lakṣyīkriyate śaraiḥ 
MSS alakṣitagatāgataiḥ kulavadhūkaṭākṣairiva kṣaṇānunayaśītalaiḥ praṇayakelikopairiva 
MSS suvṛttamasṛṇonnatairmṛgadṛśāmurojairiva tvadīyaturagairidaṃ dharaṇicakramākramyate 
MSS alakṣmīrāviśatyenaṃ śayānamalasaṃ naram 
MSS niḥsaṃśayaṃ phalaṃ labdhvā dakṣo bhūtimupāśnute 
MSS alaghutā jaṭharasya kucau gatā caraṇacañcalatā nayane gatā 
MSS sakhi vilokaya me tanuceṣṭitaṃ vinimayapragataṃ navayauvanam 
MSS alaghūpalapaṅktiśālinīḥ parito ruddhanirantarāmbarāḥ 
MSS adhirūḍhanitambabhūmayo na vimuñcanti cirāya mekhalāḥ 
MSS alaṅghyaṃ tattadudvīkṣya yadyaduccairmahībhṛtām 
MSS priyatāṃ jyāyasīṃ mā gān mahatāṃ kena tuṅgatā 
MSS alaṅghyaṃ sarveṣāmiha khalu phalaṃ karmajanitaṃ vipat karmapraiṣyā vyathayati na jātāsi hṛdayam 
MSS yadajñāḥ kurvanti prasabhamupahāsaṃ dhanamadād idaṃ tvantargāḍhaṃ paramaparitāpaṃ janayati 
MSS alabdhaṃ caiva lipseta labdhaṃ rakṣet prayatnataḥ 
MSS rakṣitaṃ vardhayeccaiva vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet 
MSS alabdhadugdhādiraso rasāvahaṃ tadudbhavo nimbarasaṃ kṛmiryathā 
MSS adṛṣṭajainendravacorasāyanas tathā kutattvaṃ manute rasāyanam 
MSS alabdhamiccheddaṇḍena labdhaṃ rakṣedavekṣayā 
MSS rakṣitaṃ vardhayed vṛddhyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet 
MSS alabdhamīheddharmeṇa labdhaṃ yatnena pālayet 
MSS pālitaṃ vardhayennītyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet 
MSS alabdhalipsā nyāyena labdhasya ca vivardhanam 
MSS parivṛddhasya vidhivat pātre saṃpratipādanam 
MSS alabdhavetano lubdho mānī cāpyavamānitaḥ 
MSS kruddhaśca kopito'kasmāt tathā bhītaśca bhīṣitaḥ 
MSS yathābhilaṣitaiḥ kāmair bhindyādetāṃścaturvidhān 
MSS parapakṣe svapakṣe ca yathāvat praśamaṃ nayet 
MSS alabdhāntaḥ praveśasya tāramākrandato bahiḥ 
MSS prabho karuṇayā karṇe kriyantāṃ kṛpaṇoktayaḥ 
MSS alabdhe rāgiṇo lokā aho labdhe virāgiṇaḥ 
MSS hemante tāpamīhante hanta grīṣme himaṃ punaḥ 
MSS alabdhvāpi dhanaṃ rājñaḥ saṃśritā yānti saṃpadam 
MSS mahāhradasamīpasthaṃ paśya nīlaṃ vanaspatim 
MSS alabdhvā yadi vā labdhvā nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ 
MSS ānantaryaṃ cārabhate na prāṇānāṃ dhanāyate 
MSS alabhanta nabhaḥkṣetre tārāstaralakāntayaḥ 
MSS tviṣaṃ tuṣārabījānāṃ nūtanāṅkuraśālinām 
MSS alabhyaṃ lapsyamānena tattvaṃ jijñāsunā ciram 
MSS jigīṣuṇā hriyaṃ tyaktvā kāryaṃ kolāhalo mahān 
MSS alabhyaṃ labdhukāmasya janasya gatirīdṛśī 
MSS alabdheṣu manastāpaḥ saṃcitārtho vinaśyati 
MSS alabhyalābhāya ca labdhavṛddhaye yathārhatīrthapratipādanāya ca 
MSS yaśasvinaṃ vedavidaṃ vipaścitaṃ bahuśrutaṃ brāhmaṇameva vāsaya

MSS iti yadi śatakṛtvas tattvamālocayāmas tadapi na hariṇākṣīṃ vismaratyantarātmā 
MSS alamathavā bahuvādair viracaya lokānurāganirbandham 
MSS tatraikatra samagraṃ tannihitaṃ yanna jātu saṃnihitam 
MSS alamandha bhujāyaṣṭibhrāntyā bhrātarjaḍasya te 
MSS daṃśāya daṃdaśūko'yaṃ daṃśamudrāṃ na muñcati 
MSS alamanyathā gṛhītvā na khalu manasvini mayā prayuktamidam 
MSS prāyaḥ samānavidyāḥ parasparayaśaḥpurobhāgāḥ 
MSS alamanyairupālambhaiḥ kīrtitaiśca vyatikramaiḥ 
MSS peśalaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kartavyaṃ hitamātmanaḥ 
MSS alamapriyāṇyuditvā rucirārthāḥ kimiha na sthitā vācaḥ 
MSS amṛtamiti vacasi satyapi viṣamiti hi kimucyate vāri

MSS alamalamaghṛṇasya tasya nāmnā punarapi saiva kathā gataḥ sa kālaḥ 
MSS kathaya kathaya vā tathāpi dūti prativacanaṃ dviṣato'pi mānanīyam 
MSS alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamayi vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam

MSS iti gurujaghanājñācoditā romarājiḥ stanayugamasitākṣyā vaktumārohatīva 
MSS alamalamanugamya prasthitaṃ prāṇanāthaṃ prathamavirahaśoke na pratīkāra eṣaḥ

MSS alamātmīyaṃ viditaṃ viditaṃ dhanikasya yācako'vahitaḥ 
MSS candraṃ bravīti caṭakaṃ caṭakaṃ candraṃ ca lobhalolamanā 
MSS alamādivarāheṇa vaṭudāsaṃ paraṃ stumaḥ 
MSS jagaduddharatā yena na vakrīkṛtamānanam 
MSS alamudakena tṛṇairvā manasvinā prāṇadhāraṇā kāryā 
MSS nāsaṃskṛtaśca puruṣaḥ prākṛtasattvaḥ praṇayitavyaḥ 
MSS alalitagatiruccaiḥ sthūlavakrāṅgulīkaṃ vahati caraṇa yugmaṃ kandharāṃ hrasvapīnām 
MSS kapilakacakalāpā krūraceṣṭātipīnā dviradamadavigandhiḥ svāṅkake'naṅkake ca

MSS alasaṃ vapuṣi ślathaṃ dukūle capalaṃ cetasi dhūsaraṃ kapole

MSS abhidadhurabhito muniṃ vadhūbhyaḥ samuditasādhvasaviklavaṃ ca cetaḥ 
MSS avacitakusumā vihāya vallīr yuvatiṣu komalamālyamālinīṣu 
MSS padamupadadhire kulānyalīnāṃ naparicayo malinātmanāṃ pradhānam 
MSS avacitabalipuṣpā vedisaṃmārgadakṣā niyamavidhijalānāṃ barhiṣāṃ copanetrī 
MSS giriśamupacacāra pratyahaṃ sā sukeśī niyamitaparikhedā tacchiraścandrapādaiḥ 
MSS avajitamadhunā tavāhamakṣṇo ruciratayetyavanamya lajjayeva 
MSS śravaṇakuvalayaṃ vilāsavatyā bhramararutairupakarṇamācacakṣe 
MSS avajñayā dīyate yat tathaivāśraddhayāpi ca 
MSS tadāhuradhamaṃ dānaṃ munayaḥ satyavādinaḥ 
MSS avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cillīlayāpi vā 
MSS avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ 
MSS avajñayā yadahasaduccakairbalaḥ samullasaddaśanamayūkhamaṇḍalaḥ 
MSS ruṣāruṇīkṛtamapi tena tatkṣaṇaṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ punaranayannijāṃ rucim 
MSS avajñāto'pi duṣṭena guṇo doṣo na manyate 
MSS nahi campakasaugandhyaṃ pūtirbhṛṅgāvahelayā 
MSS avajñānasahasraistu doṣāḥ kaṣṭatarā dhane 
MSS dhane sukhakalā yā ca sāpi duḥkhairvidhīyate 
MSS avajñāsphuṭitaṃ prema samīkartuṃ ka īśvaraḥ 
MSS saṃdhiṃ na yāti sphuṭitaṃ lākṣālepena mauktikam 
MSS avatārā hyasaṃkheyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ 
MSS yathā vidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ 
MSS avati nikhilalokaṃ yaḥ pitevādṛtātmā dahati duritarāśiṃ pāvako vendhanaukam 
MSS vitarati śivasaukhyaṃ hanti saṃsāraśatruṃ vidadhatu śubhabuddhyā taṃ budhā dharmamatra 
MSS avatu vaḥ savitusturagāvalī sphurati madhyagatāruṇanāyakā 
MSS samabhilambhitatuṅgapayodharā marakataikalateva nabhaḥśriyaḥ 
MSS avadyajambālagaveṣaṇāya kṛtodyamānāṃ khalasairibhāṇām 
MSS kavīndravāṅnirjaranirjhariṇyāṃ saṃjāyate vyarthamanorathatvam 
MSS avadyamukte pathi yaḥ pravartate pravartayatyanyajanaṃ ca niḥspṛhaḥ 
MSS sa sevitavyaḥ svahitaiṣiṇā guruḥ svayaṃ taraṃstārayituṃ kṣamaḥ param 
MSS avadhānena maunena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ 
MSS viśvāsayitvā dveṣṭāram avalumped yathā vṛkaḥ 
MSS avadhāraya dharmeṣu pradhānamavadhānataḥ 
MSS nirbharānandakandāya govindāya mano'rpaya 
MSS avadhārya kāryagurutāmabhavan na bhayāya sāndratamasaṃtamasam 
MSS sutanoḥ stanau ca dayitopagame tanuromarājipathavepathave 
MSS avadhidināvadhijīvāḥ prasīda jīvantu pathikajanajāyāḥ 
MSS durlaṅghyavartmaśailau stanau pidhehi prapāpāli 
MSS avadhidivasaḥ prāptaścāyaṃ tanorvirahasya vā ravirayamupaityastaṃ sakhyo mamāpi ca jīvitam 
MSS tadalamaphalairāśābandhaiḥ prasīda namo'stu te hṛdaya sahasā pākotpīḍaṃ viḍambaya dāḍimam 
MSS avadhidivasaḥ so'yaṃ nātrāgataḥ kimiyat kṣaṇaṃ vitara nayane paśyaitanme puraḥ sakhi sāhasam 
MSS iyamiyamahaṃ rūḍhajvālākarālitarodasīṃ malayajarasābhyaktairaṅgaiḥ patāmyabhi kaumudīm 
MSS avadhīraṇāṃ kṛtavatī bhavatī mayi yatkukarmamahimā sa hi me 
MSS yadi cātako na labhate'mbu ghanād vacanīyatā bhavati kāmbumucaḥ 
MSS avadhīraya dhanavikalaṃ kuru gauravamakṛśasaṃpadaḥ puṃsaḥ 
MSS asmādṛśaṃ hi mugdhe dhanasiddhyai rūpanirmāṇam 
MSS avadhūtapraṇipātāḥ paścāt saṃtapyamānamanaso'pi 
MSS nibhṛtairvyapatrapante dayitānunayairmanasvinyaḥ 
MSS avadhūyāribhirnītā hariṇaistulyavṛttitām 
MSS anyonyasyāpi jihrīmaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sahavāsinām 
MSS avadhehi kṣaṇamehi bhrātarbhāvajña bhāvaya giraṃ naḥ 
MSS carame cakāsti cetasi mūkasvapnopamo bhāvaḥ 
MSS avadhau divasāvasānakāle bhavanadvāri vilocane dadhānā 
MSS avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva 
MSS avadhyaṃ vāthavāgamyam akṛtyaṃ nāsti kiṃcana 
MSS loke buddhimatāmatra tasmāttāṃ yojayāmyaham 
MSS avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo striyo bālāśca jñātayaḥ 
MSS yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ 
MSS avadhyairindupādānām asādhyaiścandanāmbhasām 
MSS dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi kāmāturaṃ manaḥ 
MSS avadhyo brāhmaṇo bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca rogabhāk 
MSS yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuktāni ye ca syuḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ 
MSS avadhyo brāhmaṇo bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca rogabhāk 
MSS vihitā vyaṅgitā teṣām aparādhe garīyasi 
MSS avanatavadanenduricchatīva vyavadhimadhīratayā yadasthitāsmai 
MSS aharata sutarāmato'sya cetaḥ sphuṭamabhibhūṣayati striyastrapaiva 
MSS avanataśirasaḥ prayāma śīghraṃ pathi vṛṣabhā iva varṣatāḍitākṣāḥ 
MSS mama hi sadasi gauravapriyasya kulajanadarśanakātaraṃ hi cakṣuḥ 
MSS avanamya vakṣasi nimagnakuca dvitayena gāḍhamupagūḍhavatā 
MSS dayitena tatkṣaṇacaladraśanā kalakiṃkiṇīravamudāsi vadhūḥ 
MSS avanau śanaiḥ śanaistvaṃ nidadhāsi padadvayaṃ svasya 
MSS lakṣyaṃ paśyasi na vadasi bhajasi jalaṃ baka tato'si sitaḥ 
MSS avantiḥ kāvyamānarca bharcormaukhariśekharaḥ  
MSS śiṣyo bāṇaśca saṃkrāntakāntavedyavacāḥ kaviḥ 
MSS avantinātho'yamudagrabāhur viśālavakṣāstanuvṛttamadhyaḥ 
MSS āropya cakrabhramamuṣṇatejās tvaṣṭreva yatnollikhito vibhāti 
MSS avanti ye janakasamā munīśvarāś caturvidhaṃ gaṇamanavadyavṛttayaḥ 
MSS svadehavaddalitamadāṣṭakārayo bhavantu te mama guravo bhavāntakāḥ 
MSS avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād dharmataḥ kāmato'rthataḥ 
MSS gate hi divase tasmiṃs tadūnaṃ tasya jīvitam 
MSS avandhyakopasya vihanturāpadāṃ bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayameva dehinaḥ 
MSS amarṣaśūnyena janasya jantunā na jātahārdena na vidviṣādaraḥ 
MSS avamānahataṃ yacca dattamaśraddhayā dhanam 
MSS ūṣare niṣphalaṃ bījaṃ kṣiptamakṣiptameva tat 
MSS avamānāraṇimathitaṃ durvāgindhanavivardhitajvālam 
MSS satpuruṣāḥ kopāgniṃ jñānāmbughaṭaiḥ praśamayanti 
MSS avamānena mahatāṃ praharṣakrodhavismayaiḥ 
MSS tapāṃsi kṣayamāyānti yaśāṃsīva sudurnayaiḥ 
MSS avamuktamapakrāntamukhyaṃ tanna kṣamaṃ yudhi 
MSS pitṛpaitāmahaṃ maulaṃ tat kruddhaṃ sāntvitaṃ kṣamam 
MSS avayaḥ kevalakavayaḥ kīrāḥ syuḥ kevalaṃ dhīrāḥ 
MSS vīrāḥ paṇḍitakavayas tānavamantā tu kevalaṃ gavayaḥ 
MSS avayaveṣu parasparabiṃbiteṣv atulanirmalakāntiṣu tattanoḥ 
MSS ayamayaṃ pravibhāga iti sphuṭaṃ jagati niścinute caturo'pi kaḥ 
MSS avalambitaviṣṇupadaḥ karṣitajanacakṣuratulagatiḥ 
MSS patramayo'pi padārthaḥ pataṅgatāmeti guṇayogāt 
MSS avalipteṣu mūrkheṣu raudrasāhasikeṣu ca 
MSS tathaivāpetadharmeṣu na maitrīmācared budhaḥ 
MSS avalepamanaṅgasya vardhayanti balāhakāḥ 
MSS karśayanti tu dharmasya mārutoddhūtaśīkarāḥ 
MSS avalokanamapi sukhayati kuvalayadalacārucapalanayanāyāḥ 
MSS kiṃ punaralakacaladdyuti sarabhasamāliṅganaṃ tanvyāḥ 
MSS avalokitamanumodita māliṅgitamaṅganābhiranurāgaiḥ 
MSS adhivṛndāvanakuñjaṃ marakatapuñjaṃ namasyāmaḥ 
MSS avalokya nartitaśikhaṇḍimaṇḍalair navanīradairniculitaṃ nabhastalam 
MSS divase'pi vañjulanikuñjamitvarī viśati sma vallabhavataṃsitaṃ rasāt 
MSS avalokya stanau vadhvā guñjāphalavibhūṣitau 
MSS niḥśvasya roditi kliṣṭā kuto vyādhakaṭumbinī 
MSS avaśendriyacittānāṃ hastisnānamiva kriyā 
MSS durbhagābharaṇaprāyo jñānaṃ bhāraḥ kriyāṃ vinā 
MSS avaśyaṃ kopāgnistava sutanu nirvāsyati cirāt svaśobhāmārūḍhaṃ mukhamapi ca te hāsyati śucam 
MSS bhavadgoṣṭhīśūnyā mama tu divasā yānti ya ime na teṣāmāvṛttiḥ punarapi mano dūyata iti 
MSS avaśyaṃ nidhanaṃ sarvair gantavyamiha mānavaiḥ 
MSS avaśyabhāvinyarthe vai saṃtāpo neha vidyate 
MSS avaśyaṃ piturācāraṃ putraḥ samanuvartate 
MSS nahi ketakavṛkṣasya bhavatyāmalakīphalam 
MSS avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathābalam 
MSS avaśyaṃ bhāvinaṃ nāśaṃ bhāvitvād vidhyupasthitam 
MSS ayameva hi te kālaḥ pūrvamāsīdanāgataḥ 
MSS avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanti mahātamapi 
MSS nagnatvaṃ nīlakaṇṭhasya mahāhiśayanaṃ hareḥ 
MSS avaśyaṃbhāvibhāvānāṃ pratīkāro bhaved yada 
MSS tadā duḥkhairna bādhyante nalarāmayudhiṣṭhirāḥ 
MSS avaśyaṃ yātāraścirataramuṣitvāpi viṣayā viyoge ko bhedastyajati na jano yat svamamūn 
MSS vrajantaḥ svātantryādatulaparitāpāya manasaḥ svayaṃ tyaktā hyete śamasukhamanantaṃ vidadhati 
MSS avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ 
MSS ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpamivārtavam 
MSS avaśyakāraṇaiḥ prāṇān dhārayatyeva cātakaḥ 
MSS prārthanābhaṅgabhīto'pi śakrādapi na yācate 
MSS avaśyagatvaraiḥ prāṇair mṛtyukāle mahātmanām 
MSS paropakāraścet kaścit sidhyet tadamṛtaṃ mṛtam 
MSS avaśyaniṣpattimahāphalāḍhyām adīrghasūtrāṃ pariṇāmakalyām 
MSS kāmaṃ vyayāyāsakarīmupeyān na tveva jātu kṣayadoṣayuktām 
MSS avaśyabhavyeṣvanavagrahagrahā yayā diśā dhāvati vedhasaḥ spṛhā 
MSS tṛṇena vātyeva tayānugamyate janasya cittena bhṛśāvaśātmanā 
MSS avaśyamāyānti vaśaṃ vipaścitām upāyasaṃdaṃśabalena saṃpadaḥ 
MSS bhavatyudāraṃ vidhivat prayojite phalaṃ hi rājñāṃ kvacidarthasiddhaye 
MSS avaśyamindriyaistāta vartitavyaṃ svagocare 
MSS caṇḍarāgastu yastatra taṃ budhaḥ parivarjayet 
MSS avaśyameva bhoktavyaṃ karmaṇāṃ tvakṣayaṃ phalam 
MSS nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma kalpakoṭiśatairapi 
MSS avaśyameva bhoktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham 
MSS kṛtakarmakṣayo nāsti kalpakoṭiśatairapi 
MSS avaśyāyakaṇaiḥ prāṇān saṃdhārayati tittiriḥ 
MSS yācñābhaṅgabhayād bhīto na daivamapi yācate 
MSS avasarapaṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ subhāṣitatvaṃ prayāti yat kiṃcit 
MSS cāṣaḥ prayāṇasamaye kharaninado maṅgalo bhavati 
MSS avasarapaṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ subhāṣitatvaṃ prayātyasūktamapi 
MSS kṣudhi kadaśanamapi nitarāṃ bhoktuḥ saṃpadyate svādu 
MSS avasarapaṭhitā vāṇī guṇagaṇarahitāpi śobhate puṃsām 
MSS ratisamaye ramaṇīnāṃ bhūṣaṇahānistu bhūṣaṇaṃ bhavati 
MSS avasaramadhigamya taṃ harantyo hṛdayamayatnakṛtojjvalasvarūpāḥ 
MSS avaniṣu padamaṅganāstadānīṃ nyadadhata vibhramasaṃpado'ṅganāsu 
MSS avasitaṃ hasitaṃ prasitaṃ mudā vilasitaṃ hrasitaṃ smarabhāsitam 
MSS na samadāḥ pramadā hatasaṃmadāḥ purahitaṃ vihitaṃ na samīhitam 
MSS avaskandapradānasya sarve kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ 
MSS vyasane vartamānasya śatrocchidrānvitasya ca 
MSS avaskandabhayād rājā prajāgarakṛtaśramam 
MSS divāsuptaṃ sadā hanyān nidrāvyākulasainikam 
MSS avasthā pūjyate rājan na śarīraṃ śarīriṇām 
MSS tadā vanacaro rāma idānīṃ nṛpatāṃ gataḥ 
MSS avākiran vayovṛddhās taṃ lājaiḥ paurayoṣitaḥ 
MSS pṛṣatairmandaroddhūtaiḥ kṣīrormaya ivācyutam 
MSS avākṣirāstamasyandhe kilbiṣī narakaṃ patet 
MSS yaḥ praśnaṃ vitathaṃ brūyāt pṛṣṭaḥ san dharmaniścaye 
MSS avācyavādāṃśca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ 
MSS nindantastava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim 
MSS avāpa sāpatrapatāṃ sa bhūpatir jitendriyāṇāṃ dhuri kīrtitasthitiḥ 
MSS asaṃvare śambaravairivikrame krameṇa tatra sphuṭatāmupeyuṣi 
MSS avāpustāpamatyarthaṃ śapharyaḥ palvalodake 
MSS putrakṣetrādisaktena mamatvena yathā gṛhī 
MSS avāptaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ pariṇatarucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅko naivāyaṃ vilasati śaśāṅkasya vapuṣi 
MSS amuṣyeyaṃ manye vigaladamṛtasyandaśiśire ratiśrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍhamurasi 
MSS avāptairdrāghimṇā paricayamudanvattaṭabhuvām asau bhāti śyāmadyutibhirudakairmekhalabhuvaḥ 
MSS agastyasyākārṣīd vacanamiti kopādudadhinā gṛhītaḥ keśeṣu prasabhamiva vindhyakṣitidharaḥ 
MSS avāpyate vā kimiyadbhavatyā cittaikapadyāmapi vidyate yaḥ 
MSS yatrāndhakāraḥ kila cetaso'pi jihmetarairbrahma tadapyavāpyam 
MSS avāpyān kāmayasvārthān nānavāpyān kadācana 
MSS pratyutpannānanubhavan mā śucastvamanāgatān 
MSS avāmabhāgena yadā valitvā śvā pṛṣṭhakaṇḍūtimapākaroti 
MSS tadahni tatraiva kṛtāntagehe rogābhibhūto niyataṃ prayāti 
MSS avālukāślakṣṇamṛdā pūrite gartaśodhanam 
MSS kodaṇḍārdhamite khāte jalasikte vapettarum 
MSS kadalīkṣīriṇau ropyau mūle dattvā tu gomayam 
MSS avāhitā vinaśyanti sarvakarmakṣamā api 
MSS kṛśā vyādhiparītāṅgā jāyante'tyantavāhanāt 
MSS avikāriṇamapi sajjanam aniśamanāryaḥ prabādhate'tyartham 
MSS kamalinyā kimiha kṛtaṃ himasya yattāṃ sadā dahati 
MSS avikṛtakṛtabhaumaravā susthānasthā suceṣṭitā vāme 
MSS yātrāsu dṛṣṭamātrā durgā durgāṇi tārayati 
MSS avikriyāṃ caiva samāśritāḥ samaṃ haranti jālaṃ mama pakṣiṇo hyamī 
MSS vivādameṣyanti parasparaṃ yadā samāgamiṣyanti ca madvaśaṃ tadā 
MSS avikreyaṃ lavaṇaṃ pakvamannaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ madhu tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca 
MSS tilā māṃsaṃ mūlaphalāni śākaṃ raktaṃ vāsaḥ sarvagandhā guḍaśca 
MSS avigrahasyāpyatulena hetunā sametabhinnadvayamūrti tiṣṭhataḥ 
MSS tavaiva nānyasya jagatsu dṛśyate viruddhaveṣābharaṇasya kāntatā 
MSS avicārayato yuktikathanaṃ tuṣakhaṇḍanam 
MSS nīceṣūpakṛtaṃ rājan bālukāsviva mūtritam 
MSS avicāreṇa yat karma kṛtaṃ tanmarmakṛntanam 
MSS prasahya sītāharaṇād atītā rāvaṇaśriyaḥ 
MSS avijitya ya ātmānam amātyān vijigīṣate 
MSS amitrān vājitāmātyaḥ so'vaśaḥ parihīyate 
MSS avijñātaprabandhasya vaco vācaspaterapi 
MSS vrajatyaphalatāmeva nayadruha ivehitam 
MSS avijñātaprayuktena dharṣitā mama vāsasā 
MSS saṃvṛtā śaradabhreṇa candralekheva śobhate 
MSS avijñātaviśeṣasya sarvatejo'pahāriṇaḥ 
MSS svāmino nirvivekasya tamasaśca kimantaram 
MSS avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya ca niścayaḥ 
MSS ārambhaḥ karmaṇāṃ śaśvad ārabdhasyāntadarśanam 
MSS avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya viniścayaḥ 
MSS arthadvaidhasya saṃdehac chedanaṃ śeṣadarśanam 
MSS avijñātāvasaktena dūṣitā mama vāsasā 
MSS chāditā śaradabhreṇa candralekheva dṛśyate 
MSS avijñāte pare tattve śāstrādhītistu niṣphalā 
MSS vijñāte'pi pare tattve śāstrādhītistu niṣphalā 
MSS avijñāto dhṛtaḥ khaṅgaḥ śubhasaṃpattināśakaḥ 
MSS vijñātaḥ sakalaiśvaryadāyako bhavati prabhoḥ 
MSS tasmāt teṣāṃ guṇān vakṣye yathoktaṃ munipuṃgavaiḥ 
MSS avijñānād rājño bhavati matihīnaḥ parijanas tatastatprādhānyād bhavati na samīpe budhajanaḥ 
MSS budhaistyakte rājye bhavati hi na nītirguṇavatī pranaṣṭāyāṃ nītau sanṛpamavaśaṃ naśyati kulam 
MSS avijñāya phalaṃ yo hi karma tvevānudhāvati 
MSS sa śocet phalavelāyāṃ yathā kiṃśukasecakaḥ 
MSS avijñāyānyasāmarthyaṃ svasāmarthyaṃ pradarśayet 
MSS upahāsamavāpnoti tathaivāyamihācalaḥ 
MSS avitathamanorathapatha prathaneṣu praguṇagarimagītaśrīḥ 
MSS suratarusadṛśaḥ sa bhavān abhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya 
MSS avitṛptatayā tathāpi me hṛdayaṃ nirṇayameva dhāvati 
MSS avasāyayituṃ kṣamāḥ sukhaṃ na vidheyeṣu viśeṣasaṃpadaḥ 
MSS avidagdhaḥ patiḥ strīṇāṃ prauḍhāṇāṃ nāyako guṇī 
MSS guṇināṃ tyāgināṃ stoko vibhavaśceti duḥkhakṛt 
MSS avidagdhaḥ śramakaṭhino durlabhayoṣidyuvā jaḍo vipraḥ 
MSS apamṛtyurupakrāntaḥ kāmivyājena me rātrau 
MSS aviditaguṇāntarāṇāṃ no doṣaḥ prāptadeśavāsānām 
MSS svādhīnakuṅkumā api yadvidadhati bahumatiṃ nīle 
MSS aviditaguṇāpi satkavi bhaṇitiḥ karṇeṣu vamati madhudhārām 
MSS anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā 
MSS aviditaparamānando vadati jano viṣayameva ramaṇīyam 
MSS tilatailameva miṣṭaṃ yena na dṛṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ kvāpi 
MSS aviditaparavedano manobhūr dhruvamayamevamanaṅga eva nityam 
MSS yadi punarabhaviṣyadasya cāṅgaṃ na khalu tadā vyathayiṣyadanyadeham 
MSS aviditaśaṣasaviśeṣā vāṇī niḥsarati vaktrato yeṣām 
MSS gudavadanavivarabhedo radanairanumīyate teṣām 
MSS aviditasukhaduḥkhaṃ nirguṇaṃ vastu kiṃcij jaḍamatiriha kaścin mokṣa ityācacakṣe 
MSS mama tu matamanaṅgasmeratāruṇyaghūrṇan madakalamadirākṣīnīvimokṣo hi mokṣaḥ 
MSS aviditvātmanaḥ śaktiṃ parasya na samutsukaḥ 
MSS gacchannabhimukho vahnau nāśaṃ yāti pataṅgavat 
MSS avidyaṃ jīvanaṃ śūnyaṃ dikśūnyā cedabāndhavā 
MSS putrahīnaṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyā daridratā 
MSS avidyaḥ puruṣaḥ śocyaḥ śocyaṃ mithunamaprajam 
MSS nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyāḥ śocyaṃ rāṣṭramarājakam 
MSS avidyākāmakarmādipāśabandhaṃ vimocitum 
MSS kaḥ śaknuyād vinātmānaṃ kalpakoṭiśatairapi 
MSS avidyānāśinī vidyā bhāvanā bhavanāśinī 
MSS dāridryanāśanaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ durgatināśanam 
MSS avidyābījavidhvaṃsād ayamārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā 
MSS kālau bhūtabhaviṣyantau vartamānamavīviśat

MSS praṇītaścāpraṇītaśca yathāgnirdaivataṃ mahat 
MSS avidvāṃsamalaṃ loke vidvāṃsamapi vā punaḥ 
MSS pramadā hyutpathaṃ netuṃ kāmakrodhavaśānugam 
MSS avidvānapi bhūpālo vidyāvṛddhopasevayā 
MSS parāṃ śriyamavāpnotijalāsannataruryathā 
MSS avidheye jane puṃsāṃ kopaḥ kimupajāyate 
MSS vidheye'pi ca kaḥ kopas tanniveśitajīvite 
MSS avidheyo bhṛtyajanaḥ śaṭhāni mitrāṇyadāyakaḥ svāmī 
MSS vinayarahitā ca bhāryā mastakaśūlāni catvāri 
MSS avinayabhuvāmajñānānāṃ śamāya bhavannapi prakṛtikuṭilādvidyābhyāsaḥ khalatvavivṛddhaye 
MSS phaṇibhayabhṛtāmastūcchedakṣamastamasāmasau viṣadharaphaṇāratnāloko bhayaṃ tu bhṛśāyate 
MSS avinayaratamādarādṛte vaśamavaśaṃ hi nayanti vidviṣaḥ 
MSS śrutavinayanidhiṃ samāśritas tanurapi naiti parābhavaṃ kvacit 
MSS avināśi tu tadviddhi yena sarvamidaṃ tatam 
MSS vināśamavyayasyāsya na kaścit kartumarhati 
MSS avināśinamagrāmyam akarot sātavāhanaḥ 
MSS viśuddhajātibhiḥ kośaṃ ratnairiva subhāṣitaiḥ 
MSS avinītaḥ suto jātaḥ kathaṃ na dahanātmakaḥ 
MSS vinītastu suto jātaḥ kathaṃ na puruṣottamaḥ 
MSS avinītasya yā vidyā sā ciraṃ naiva tiṣṭhati 
MSS markaṭasya gale baddhā maṇīnāṃ mālikā yathā 
MSS avinīto bhṛtyajano nṛpatiradātā śaṭhāni mitrāṇi 
MSS avinayavatī ca bhāryā mastakaśūlāni catvāri 
MSS avibhāviteṣuviṣayaḥ prathamaṃ madano'pi nūnamabhavat tamasā 
MSS udite diśaḥ prakaṭayatyamunā yadadharmadhāmni dhanurācakṛṣe 
MSS avibhāvyatārakamadṛṣṭahima dyutibimbamastamitabhānu nabhaḥ

MSS bhavavītaye nahi tathā sa vidhiḥ kva śarāsanaṃ kva ca vimuktipathaḥ
