MSS iti pratyeti mugdho'pi vallavaḥ kimu rājakam 
MSS avyāhṛtaṃ vyāhṛtācchreya āhuḥ satyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ taddvitīyam 
MSS priyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tattṛtīyaṃ dharmyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ taccaturtham 
MSS avyutpannasvabhāvānāṃ nārīṇamiva sāṃpratam 
MSS sītkārācāryakaṃ kartum ayaṃ prāpto himāgamaḥ 
MSS avyutpanne śrotari vaktṛtvamanarthakaṃ puṃsām 
MSS netravihīne bhartari lāvaṇyamanarthakaṃ strīṇām 
MSS avratasyāpi te dharmaḥ kārya evāntarāntarā 
MSS medhībhūto'pi hi bhrāmyan ghāsagrāsaṃ karoti gauḥ 
MSS aśaktaḥ satataṃ sādhuḥ kurūpā ca pativratā 
MSS vyādhito devabhaktaśca nirdhanā brahmacāriṇaḥ 
MSS aśaktastaskaraḥ sādhuḥ kurūpā cet pativratā 
MSS rogī ca devatābhakto vṛddhā veśyā tapasvinī 
MSS aśaktastu bhavet sādhur brahmacārī va nirdhanaḥ 
MSS vyādhito devabhaktaśca vṛddhā nārī pativratā 
MSS aśaktāḥ śaktimātmīyāṃ ślāghante ye ca durjanāḥ 
MSS te bhavantyupahāsāya mahatāmeva saṃnidhau 
MSS aśakte raudratātaikṣṇyaṃ tīvrapāpeṣu dhīratā 
MSS chadmadhīrvāci pāruṣyaṃ nīcānāṃ śauryamīdṛśam 
MSS aśaktairbalinaḥ śatroḥ kartavyaṃ prapalāyanam 
MSS saṃśritavyo'thavā durgo nānyā teṣāṃ gatirbhavet 
MSS aśakto yaḥ kṣāntiṃ satatamapakāriṇyapi jane vidhatte so'vaśyaṃ bhujaga iva daṃṣṭrāvirahitaḥ 
MSS prabhuḥ satyāṃ śaktau kṣamata iha yasmāt sucaritaḥ sa tejasvī lokadvitayavijigīṣurvijayate 
MSS aśaknuvan soḍhumadhīralocanaḥ sahasraraśmeriva yasya darśanam 
MSS praviśya hemādriguhāgṛhāntaraṃ nināya bibhyad divasāni kauśikaḥ 
MSS aśakyaṃ nārabhet prājñaḥ akāryaṃ naiva kārayet 
MSS asatyaṃ naiva vaktavyam ālasyaṃ naiva kārayet 
MSS aśakyaṃ nārabhet prājño akāryaṃ naiva kārayet 
MSS yathādeśagataṃ dharmaṃ yathākālaṃ ca jīvayet 
MSS aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai 
MSS antaḥsvabhāvairgītaistair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam 
MSS aśakyārambhavṛttīnāṃ kutaḥ kleśādṛte phalam 
MSS ākāśamāsvādayataḥ kutastu kavalagrahaḥ 
MSS aśaṅkitamatiḥ svastho na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati 
MSS na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ 
MSS aśaṅkitebhyaḥ śaṅketa śaṅkitebhyaśca sarvaśaḥ 
MSS aśaṅkyādbhayamutpannam api mūlaṃ nikṛntati 
MSS aśaṅkyamapi śaṅketa nityaṃ śaṅketa śaṅkitāt 
MSS bhayaṃ hi śaṅkitājjātaṃ samūlamapi kṛntati 
MSS aśaṭhamalolamajihmaṃ tyāginamanurāgiṇaṃ viśeṣajñam 
MSS yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā tatra 
MSS aśaṭhahṛdayaḥ kṛtajñaḥ sānukrośaḥ sthitaḥ satāṃ mārge 
MSS aparāpavādakarmā śucikarmarataḥ sa khalvāryaḥ 
MSS aśanaṃ me vasanaṃ me jāyā me bandhuvargo me 
MSS iti me me kurvāṇaṃ kālavṛko hanti puruṣājam 
MSS aśanaṃ vasanaṃ vāso yasya kāśyāmamārgataḥ 
MSS kīkaṭena samā kāśī gaṅgāpyaṅgāravāhinī 
MSS aśanamātrakṛtajñatayā guror na piśuno'pi śuno labhate tulām 
MSS api bahūpakṛte sakhitā khale na khalu khelati khe latikā yathā 
MSS aśanādindriyāṇīva syuḥ kāryāṇyakhilānyapi 
MSS etasmāt kāraṇād vittaṃ sarvasādhanamucyate 
MSS aśanairaśanairbālye yauvane ghasmarāt smarāt 
MSS kalyavaikalyataḥ śeṣe sphuṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ vayo nṛṇām 
MSS aśaraṇaśaraṇapramodabhūtair vanatarubhiḥ kriyamāṇacārukarma 
MSS hṛdayamiva durātmanāmaguptaṃ navamiva rājyamanirjitopabhogyam 
MSS aśarmadahanajvalatkaṭukaṭākṣarūkṣekṣaṇa kṣaṇakṣapitaśātrave jayati sindhurādhīśvare 
MSS vayaṃ na bahu manmahe nijabhujānamadgāṇḍiva cyutāstraśikhitāṇḍavajvalitakhāṇḍavaṃ pāṇḍavam 
MSS aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā naraḥ saṃjāyate kharaḥ 
MSS kṛmiḥ strīvadhakarttā ca bālahantā ca jāyate 
MSS aśastrapūtamavyājaṃ puruṣāṅgopakalpitam 
MSS vikrīyate mahāmāṃsaṃ gṛhyatāṃ gṛhyatāmidam 
MSS aśāntahutabhukśikhākavalitaṃ jaganmandiraṃ sukhaṃ viṣamavātabhugnasanavaccalaṃ kāmajam 
MSS jalasthaśaśicañcalā bhuvi vilokya lokasthitiṃ vimuñcata janāḥ sadā viṣayamūrchanāṃ tattvataḥ 
MSS aśāntāntastṛṣṇā dhanalavaṇavārivyatikarair gatacchāyaḥ kāyaściravirasarūkṣāśanatayā 
MSS anidrā mando'gnirnṛpasalilacaurānalabhayāt kadaryāṇāṃ kaṣṭaṃ sphuṭamadhanakaṣṭādapi param 
MSS aśāśvatamidaṃ sarvaṃ cintyamānaṃ hi bhārata 
MSS kadalīsaṃnibho lokaḥ samo hyasya na vidyate 
MSS aśāsaṃstaskarān yastu baliṃ gṛhṇāti pārthivaḥ 
MSS tasya prakṣubhyate rāṣṭraṃ svargācca parihīyate 
MSS aśāstracakṣunṛpatir andha ityabhidhīyate 
MSS varamandho na cakṣuṣmān madādākṣiptasatpathaḥ 
MSS aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryamahitaṃ vacaḥ 
MSS arthaśāstrānabhijñānāṃ vipulāṃ śriyamicchatām 
MSS aśikṣitānāṃ kāvyeṣu śāstrābhyāso nirarthakaḥ 
MSS kimastyanupanītasya vājapeyādibhirmakhaiḥ 
MSS aśithilaparispandaḥ kunde tathaiva madhuvrato nayanasuhṛdo vṛkṣāścaite na kuḍmalaśālinaḥ 
MSS dalati kalikā cautī nāsmiṃstathā mṛgacakṣuṣām atha ca hṛdaye mānagranthiḥ svayaṃ śithilāyate 
MSS aśithilamaparāvasajya kaṇṭhe dṛḍhaparirabdhabṛhadbahiḥ stanena 
MSS hṛṣitatanuruhā bhujena bhartur mṛdumamṛdu vyatividdhamekabāhum 
MSS aśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryo lalāṭe brahmaghātinaḥ 
MSS asambhāṣyaśca kartavyas tan manoranuśāsanam 
MSS rājā stenena gantavyo muktakeśena dhāvatā 
MSS ācakṣāṇena tat steyam evaṃkarmāsmi śādhi mām 
MSS aśiṣyaṃ śāsti yo rājan yaśca śūnyamupāsate 
MSS kadaryaṃ bhajate yaśca tamāhurmūḍhacetasam 
MSS aśītāstaraṇo māghe phālgune paśupakṣiṇau 
MSS caitre jalacarāḥ sarve vaiśākhe naravānarau 
MSS aśītenāmbhasā snānaṃ payaḥpānaṃ varāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS etadvo mānuṣāḥ pathyaṃ snigdhamuṣṇaṃ ca bhojanam 
MSS aśīmahi vayaṃ bhikṣām āśāvāso vasīmahi 
MSS śayīmahi mahīpṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kimīśvaraiḥ 
MSS aśīlā bhinnamaryādā nityasaṃkīrṇamaithunāḥ 
MSS alpāyuṣo bhavantīha tathā nirayagāminaḥ 
MSS aśucitānilayaṃ pralayaṃ śriyām ayaśasāṃ vibhavaṃ prabhavaṃ rujām 
MSS sukṛtanirdalanaṃ calanaṃ dhṛteḥ pariharet paravallabhayā ratam 
MSS aśucirvacanād yasyaśucirbhavati pūruṣaḥ 
MSS śuciścaivāśuciḥ sadyaḥ kathaṃ rājā na daivatam 
MSS aśucīkṣaṇe'śrupāte kalahe śvāsakāsayoḥ 
MSS rathyāprasarpaṇe'bhyaṅge kṣute narmaṇyupaspṛśet 
MSS aśuddhaprakṛtau rājñi janatā nānurajyate 
MSS yathā gṛdhrasamāsannaḥ kalahaṃsaḥ samācaret 
MSS aśuddhā tu bhaven nārī yāvacchalyaṃ na muñcati 
MSS niḥsṛte tu tataḥ śalye rajasā śudhyate tataḥ 
MSS aśuddhīnāṃ tu sarvāsām ālayāḥ kutsitāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS sadā śaucaṃ na kurvanti bhuñjate'nnaṃ tathāvidhāḥ 
MSS aśubhapuṣi kalāvapyapramattāḥ svadharmād anudinamupakārānācarante budhānām 
MSS bahujanaparipuṣṭā baddhadīkṣāsta ete tanusukhamapi hitvā tanvate rājasevām 
MSS aśubhodaye janānāṃ naśyati buddhirna vidyate rakṣā 
MSS suhṛdo'pi santi ripavo viṣamaviṣaṃ jāyate'pyamṛtam 
MSS aśṛṇvannapi boddhavyo mantribhiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 
MSS yathā svadoṣanāśāya vidureṇāmbikāsutaḥ 
MSS aśeṣacakṣuḥśravaṇaṃ pratikūlo bhavannapi 
MSS vinatānandaheturyaḥ sa pumānāptanandanaḥ 
MSS aśeṣadoṣāpagamaprakāśa mitrāgamotsāhamahotsavārham 
MSS vikāsaśobhāṃ janayatyajasraṃ dhanaṃ janānāṃ dinamambujānām 
MSS aśeṣalaṅkāpatisainyahantā śrīrāmasevācaraṇaikakartā 
MSS anekaduḥkhāhatalokagoptā tvasau hanūmāṃstava saukhyakartā 
MSS aśeṣavighnapratiṣedhadakṣa mantrākṣatānāmiva diṅmukheṣu 
MSS vikṣepalīlā karaśīkarāṇāṃ karotu vaḥ prītimibhānanasya 
MSS aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgam ākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram 
MSS muktākalāpīkṛtasinduvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī 
MSS aśoke śokārtaḥ kimasi bakule'pyākulamanā nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakārairna ramase 
MSS kusumbhe viśrambhaṃ yadiha bhajase kaṇṭakaśatair asaṃdigdhaṃ dagdhabhramara bhavitāsi kṣatavapuḥ 
MSS aśocyaḥ śocate śocyaṃ kiṃ vā śocyo na śocyate 
MSS kaśca kasyeha śocyo'sti dehe'smin budbudopame 
MSS aśocyānanvaśocastvaṃ prajñāvādāṃśca bhāṣase 
MSS gatāsūnagatāsūṃśca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ 
MSS aśocyānīha bhūtāni yo mūḍhastāni śocati 
MSS tadduḥkhāllabhate duḥkhaṃ dvāvanarthau niṣevate 
MSS aśocyo nirdhanaḥ prājño'śocyaḥ paṇḍitabāndhavaḥ 
MSS aśocyā vidhavā nārī putrapautrapratiṣṭhitā 
MSS aśnāti yaḥ saṃskurute nihanti dadāti gṛhṇātyanumanyate ca 
MSS ete ṣaḍapyatra vinindanīyā bhramanti saṃsāravane nirantam 
MSS aśnāti yo māṃsamasau vidhatte vadhānumodaṃ trasadehabhājām 
MSS gṛhṇāti repāṃsi tatastapasvī tebhyo durantaṃ bhavameti jantuḥ 
MSS aśnābhyācchādayāmīti prāpaśyan pāpapūruṣaḥ 
MSS nāmarṣaṃ kurute yastu puruṣaḥ so'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS aśnīta pibata khādata jāgrata saṃviśata tiṣṭhata vā 
MSS sakṛdapi cintayatāhnaḥ sāvadhiko dehabandha iti 
MSS aśmanā sādhayellohaṃ lohenāśmānameva ca 
MSS bilbāniva kare bilvair mlecchān mlecchaiḥ prasādhayet 
MSS aśmātakasya vāme badarī vā dṛśyate'hinilayo vā 
MSS ṣaḍbhirudagvāsya karaiḥ sārdhe puruṣatraye toyam 
MSS aśmānamapyupāyena lohaṃ vā jarayen naraḥ 
MSS na tu kaścid upāyo'sti brahmasvaṃ yena jīryate 
MSS aśmāpyahṛdayo yasya guṇasāraṃ parīkṣate 
MSS ucitaiva suvarṇasya tasyāgnipatane ruciḥ 
MSS aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat 
MSS asadityucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha 
MSS aśraddhādarśanaṃ bhāntir duḥkhaṃ ca trividhaṃ tataḥ 
MSS daurmanasyamayogyeṣu viṣayeṣu ca yogatā 
MSS aśraddheyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi yad bhavet 
MSS yathā vānarasaṃgītaṃ tathaiva plavate śilā 
MSS aśrāntaṃ dṛḍhayantraṇena kucayoratyaktakāṭhinyayor ābaddhasphuṭamaṇḍalonnatimilaccolaṃ vimucyorasaḥ 
MSS nīvīvicchuritaṃ vidhāya tamamuṃ vāmastanālambinīṃ veṇīṃ pāṇinakhāñcalaiḥ śithilayatyākramya pīṭhaṃ padā 
MSS aśrāntaviśrāṇitayajñayūpa stambhāvalīrdrāgavalambamānaḥ 
MSS yasya svabhāvād bhuvi saṃcacāra kālakramādekapado'pi dharmaḥ 
MSS aśrāntaśrutipāṭhapūtarasanāvirbhūtabhūristavā jihmabrahmamukhaughavighnitanavasvargakriyākelinā 
MSS pūrvaṃ gādhisutena sāmighaṭitā muktā nu mandākinī yatprāsādadukūlavalliranilāndolairakheladdivi 
MSS aśrāntirbandhutāṃ dhatte kaṣṭaṃ naṣṭasya naśvaraḥ 
MSS skandhena paṅgunā paṅgur nahi vartmani nīyate 
MSS aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇavītanidrair aśnan puro haritakaṃ mudamādadhānaḥ 
MSS grīvāgralolakalakiṅkiṇikānināda miśraṃ dadhaddaśanacarcuraśabdamaśvaḥ 
MSS aśrucchalena sudṛśo hutapāvakadhūmakaluṣākṣyāḥ 
MSS aprāpya mānamaṅge vigalati lāvaṇyavāripūra iva 
MSS aśrutamiva khalajalpitam adṛṣṭamiva gurumukhendumālinyam 
MSS agaṇitanijāpamānaṃ bhāmini bhavadarthamacyutaḥ sahate 
MSS aśrutaśca samunnaddho daridraśca mahāmanāḥ 
MSS arthāścākarmaṇā prepsur mūḍha ityucyate budhaiḥ 
MSS aśrubhiḥ pādyamākalpya praṇīya hṛdayāsanam 
MSS upete dayite kāntā pariṣvaṅgamupānayat 
MSS aśvaṃ naiva gajaṃ naiva vyāghraṃ naiva ca naiva ca 
MSS ajāputraṃ baliṃ dadyād devo durbalaghātakaḥ 
MSS aśvaṃ snātaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kāmamohitam 
MSS śūdramakṣarasaṃyuktaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet 
MSS aśvaḥ śastraṃ śāstraṃ vīṇā vāṇī naraśca nārī ca 
MSS puruṣaviśeṣaṃ prāptā bhavantyayogyāśca yogyāśca 
MSS aśvaḥ supto gajo matto gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ 
MSS antaḥpuragato rājā dūrataḥ parivarjayet 
MSS aśvagandhāpalaṃ triṃśac cūrṇayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ 
MSS vṛddhadārukacūrṇena samabhāgaṃ ca kārayet 
MSS aśvatthacalapatrāgralīnatoyakaṇopame 
MSS sthirāśā jīvite yasya tatsamo nāstyacetanaḥ 
MSS aśvatthamekaṃ picumandamekaṃ nyagrodhamekaṃ daśa ciñciṇīkāḥ 
MSS kapitthabilvāmalakatrayaṃ ca pañcāmravāpī narakaṃ na paśyet 
MSS aśvatthasya mahattvaṃ ko nanu vaktuṃ naraḥ prabhavet 
MSS savitari yatrālakṣmīr mande lakṣmīramandāste 
MSS aśvatthāmā balirvyāso hanūmāṃśca vibhīṣaṇaḥ 
MSS kṛpaḥ paraśurāmaśca saptaite cirajīvinaḥ 
MSS aśvatthāmā hata iti yudhi giramanṛtāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro'vādīt 
MSS punaranutāpamavāpat pāpaṃ kṛtvānutapyeta 
MSS aśvapṛṣṭhaṃ gajaskandho nārīṇāṃ ca payodharaḥ 
MSS dantadhāvanaśastraṃ ca yathā sthūlaṃ tathā sukham 
MSS aśvapraśaṃsā vikhyātā dhanurvedastataḥparam 
MSS gāndharvaśāstramaparaṃ vṛkṣāyurveda eva ca 
MSS aśvaplutaṃ vāsavagarjitaṃ ca strīṇāṃ ca cittaṃ puruṣasya bhāgyam 
MSS avarṣaṇaṃ cāpyativarṣaṇaṃ ca devo na jānāti kṛto manuṣyaḥ 
MSS aśvamadhye kṛtaravā śivā yuddhaprapañcakṛt 
MSS śivā saptasvarā grāhyā bahuśabdāśca niṣphalāḥ 
MSS aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam 
MSS atyaricyata satyaṃ ca iti vedavido viduḥ 
MSS aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam 
MSS aśvamedhasahasrāddhi satyameva viśiṣyate 
MSS aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam 
MSS tulayitvā tu paśyāmi satyamevātiricyate 
MSS aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam 
MSS nābhijānāmi yadyasya satyasyārdhamavāpnuyāt 
MSS aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ satyaṃ tulāntare 
MSS dhṛtvā saṃloḍyate rājan satye bhavati gauravam 
MSS aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yaḥ samācaret 
MSS nāsau padamavāpnoti madbhaktair yadavāpyate 
MSS aśvayānaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaścaiva prasūtikāḥ 
MSS tathā cāntaḥpure dāsīṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet 
MSS aśvaśālāṃ samāsādya yadāntarmadhumakṣikāḥ 
MSS madhujālaṃ prabadhnanti mriyante'śvāstadā dhruvam 
MSS aśvasya lakṣaṇaṃ vego mado mātaṅgalakṣaṇam 
MSS cāturyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāryā udyogaḥ puruṣalakṣaṇam 
MSS aśvānāṃ ca patākānāṃ bālānāṃ paṇyayoṣitām 
MSS vidūṣakapaṭānāṃ ca cāpalyamatimaṇḍanam 
MSS aśvā nāgāḥ syandanānāṃ ca saṅghā mantrāḥ siddhā daivataṃ cānukūlam 
MSS etānyāhuḥ sādhanāni sma rājñāṃ yebhyaśceyaṃ buddhirutkṛṣyate me 
MSS aśvā yasya jayastasya yasyāśvāstasya medinī 
MSS aśvā yasya yaśas tasya yasyāśvās tasya kāñcanam 
MSS aśvārūḍhaṃ payaḥpānaṃ gajārūḍhaṃ tu maithunam 
MSS śibikīmardanaṃ caiva pādacārī tu bhojanam 
MSS aśvārūḍhaṃ yatiṃ dṛṣṭvā khaṭvārūḍhāṃ rajasvalām 
MSS sakeśāṃ vidhavāṃ dṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret 
MSS aśvāścatuṣkoṭimitā lakṣāṇyekādaśaiva ca 
MSS saptatriṃśatsahasrāṇi tathā śatacatuṣṭayam 
MSS saptatiścaiva saṃkhyātāḥ procyante pattayastataḥ 
MSS ṣaṭkoṭyo'śītilakṣāṇi pañcādhikamitāni ca 
MSS dviṣaṣṭi ca sahasrāṇi tathā śatacatuṣṭayam 
MSS pañcāśaditi saṃkhyātā mahākṣauhinikā budhaiḥ 
MSS aśvinīmaitrarevatyo mṛgo mūlaṃ punarvasuḥ 
MSS puṣyo jyeṣṭhā tathā hastaḥ prasthāne śreṣṭha ucyate 
MSS aśvinī sūyate vatsaṃ kāmadhenusturaṃgamam 
MSS tathaiva sāgaro vahniṃ yathā rājā tathā prajā 
MSS aśvīye yamavāhanasya nakulasyāśīviṣāṇāṃ kule mārjārasya ca mūṣakeṣu ghaṭate yā prītirātyantikī 
MSS kṣīṇe'rthe vidhureṣu bandhuṣu dṛḍhe lokāpavāde śanair jñeyā kāmijaneṣu saiva gaṇikāvargasya naisargikī 
MSS aśve javo vṛṣe dhauryaṃ maṇau kāntiḥ kṣamā nṛpe 
MSS hāvabhāvau ca veśyāyāṃ gāyake madhurasvaraḥ 
MSS dātṛtvaṃ dhanike śauryaṃ sainike bahudugdhatā 
MSS goṣu damastapasviṣu vidvatsu vāvadūkatā 
MSS sabhyeṣvapakṣapātastu tathā sākṣiṣu satyavāk 
MSS ananyabhaktirbhṛtyeṣu suhitoktiśca mantriṣu 
MSS maunaṃ mūrkheṣu ca strīṣu pātivratyaṃ subhūṣaṇam 
MSS mahādurbhūṣaṇaṃ caitad viparītamamīṣu ca 
MSS aśvairyānaṃ yānaṃ strībhir līlaiva procyate līlā 
MSS māṃsāṃ bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ cānyad ayānamalīlābhuktam 
MSS aṣṭakulācalasaptasamudrā brahmapuraṃdaradinakararudrāḥ 
MSS na tvaṃ nāhaṃ nāyaṃ lokas tadapi kimarthaṃ kriyate śokaḥ 
MSS aṣṭadhā devatāyonis tiryagyoniśca pañcadhā 
MSS ekadhā mānuṣī yonir ime bhūtāścaturdaśa 
MSS aṣṭapādaścatuṣkarṇo dvimukhī dvimukhastathā 
MSS rājadvāre paṭhed ghoro na ca devo na rākṣasaḥ 
MSS aṣṭamaṃ brahmarandhraṃ syāt paraṃ nirvāṇasūcakam 
taddhyātvā sūcikāgrābhaṃ dhūmākāraṃ vimucyate 
MSS tacca jālaṃdharaṃ jñeyaṃ mokṣadaṃ līnacetasām 
aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā varjanīyā caturdaśī 
MSS pūrṇimārdhadinaṃ yāvan niṣiddhā sarvakarmasu 
MSS aṣṭamī hantyupādhyāyaṃ śiṣyaṃ hanti caturdaśī 
MSS āmāvāsyo'bhayaṃ hanti pratipat pāṭhanāśinī 
MSS aṣṭame dvādaśe vāpi śākaṃ yaḥ pacate gṛhe 
MSS kumitrāṇyanapāśritya kiṃ vai sukhataraṃ tataḥ 
MSS aṣṭāṅgayogapariśīlanakīlanena duḥsādhasiddhisavidhaṃ vidadhad vidūre 
MSS āsādayannabhimatāmadhunā viveka khyātiṃ samādhidhanamaulimaṇirvimuktaḥ 
MSS aṣṭāṅgulasya kathito vāyormāno vicakṣaṇaiḥ 
MSS caturaṅgulamānaṃ ca tejastattvaṃ nigadyate 
MSS aṣṭādaśa tathā madhye hīne caiva caturdaśa 
MSS saptāṅgulaḥ khuraḥ prokta uttamāśvasya paṇḍitaiḥ 
MSS aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu vyāsasya vacanadvayam 
MSS paropakāraḥ puṇyāya pāpāya parapīḍanam 
MSS aṣṭādaśāpi smṛtayo vadanti yasyāparādhaḥ khalu tasya daṇḍaḥ 
MSS svasyāparādhaḥ khalu nābhimūle śiraḥ kuto muṇḍayate mṛgākṣi 
MSS aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ saṃbhavatyaṃśato nṛpaḥ 
MSS tasmādabhibhavatyeṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā 
MSS aṣṭābhiḥ kila daṇḍanītinipuṇaiḥ satprāḍvivākaiḥ samaṃ madhyesaudhamanuttamāsanagataḥ kāryāṇi kurvan nṛṇām 
MSS viṣṇurbhūpavapurvidhāya kimasau dikpālayuk pālayaty evaṃ bhrāntimato manāṅ na kurute kāskānayaṃ mādhavaḥ 
MSS aṣṭāvaṅgāni yogasya yamo niyama āsanam 
MSS prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhāraṇā dhyānatanmayaḥ 
MSS aṣṭāvimāni harṣasya navanītāni bhārata 
MSS vartamānāni dṛśyante tānyeva susukhānyapi 
MSS samāgamaśca sakhibhir mahāṃścaiva dhanāgamaḥ 
MSS putreṇa ca pariṣvaṅgaḥ saṃnipātaśca maithune 
MSS samaye ca priyālāpaḥ svayūtheṣu ca saṃnatiḥ 
MSS abhipretasya lābhaśca pūjā ca janasaṃsadi 
MSS aṣṭottaraśataṃ ślokaṃ cāṇakyena yathoditam 
MSS yasya vijñānamātreṇa n ṇāṃ prajñā pravardhate 
MSS aṣṭau guṇāḥ puruṣaṃ dīpayanti prajñā ca kaulyaṃ ca damaḥ śrutaṃ ca 
MSS parākramaścābahubhāṣitā ca dānaṃ yathāśakti kṛtajñatā ca 
MSS aṣṭau tānyavrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ payaḥ 
MSS havirbhrāhmaṇakāmyā ca gurorvacanamauṣadham 
MSS aṣṭau nṛpemāni manuṣyaloke svargasya lokasya nidarśanāni 
MSS catvāryeṣāmanvavetāni sadbhiś catvāryeṣāmanvavayanti santaḥ 
MSS yajño dānamadhyayanaṃ tapaśca catvāryetānyanvavetāni sadbhiḥ 
MSS damaḥ satyamārjavamānṛśaṃsyaṃ catvāryetānyanvavayanti santaḥ 
MSS aṣṭau pūrvanimittāni narasya vinaśiṣyataḥ 
MSS brāhmaṇān prathamaṃ dveṣṭi brāhmaṇaiśca virudhyate 
MSS brāhmaṇasvāni cādatte brāhmaṇāṃśca jighāṃsati 
MSS ramate nindayā caiṣāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nābhinandati 
MSS naitān smarati kṛtyeṣu yācitaś cābhyasūyati 
MSS etān doṣān naraḥ prājño buddhyā buddhvā vivarjayet 
MSS aṣṭau māsān yathādityas toyaṃ harati raśmibhiḥ 
MSS tathā haret karaṃ rāṣṭrān nityamarkavrataṃ hi tat 
MSS aṣṭau yadā tu dṛśyante samantād devayonayaḥ 
MSS upasargaṃ tamityāhur daivamunmattavad budhāḥ 
MSS aṣṭau yasya diśo dalāni vipulaḥ kośaḥ suvarṇācalaḥ kāntaṃ kesarajālamarkakiraṇā bhṛṅgāḥ payodāvalī 
MSS nālaṃ śeṣamahoragaḥ pravitataṃ vārāṃnidherlīlayā tadvaḥ pātu samuddharan kuvalayaṃ kroḍākṛtiḥ keśavaḥ 
MSS aṣṭau hāṭakakoṭayastrinavatirmuktāphalānāṃ tulāḥ pañcāśanmadhugandhamattamadhupāḥ krodhoddhatāḥ sindhurāḥ 
MSS aśvānāmayutaṃ prapañcacaturaṃ vārāṅganānāṃ śataṃ dattaṃ pāṇḍyanṛpeṇa yautakamidaṃ vaitālikāyārpyatām 
MSS asaṃkalpājjayet kāmaṃ krodhaṃ kāmavivarjanāt 
MSS arthānarthekṣayā lobhaṃ bhayaṃ tattvāvamarśanāt 
MSS asaṃkalpitameveha yadakasmāt pravartate 
MSS nivartyārambhamārabdhaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat 
MSS asaṃkhyapuṣpo'pi manobhavasya pañcaiva bāṇārthamayaṃ dadāti 
MSS evaṃ kadaryatvamivāvadhārya sarvasvamagrāhi madhorvadhūbhiḥ 
MSS asaṃkhyāḥ paradoṣajñā guṇajñā api kecana 
MSS svayameva svadoṣajñā vidyante yadi pañcaṣāḥ 
MSS asaṃgatenonnatimāgatena calena vakreṇa malīmasena 
MSS sā durjaneneva samastametaṃ prabādhate bhrūyugalena lokam 
MSS asaṃgṛhītasya punar mantrasya śṛṇu yatphalam 
MSS ahīnaṃ dharmakāmābhyām arthaṃ prāpnoti kevalam 
MSS asaṃcayādapūrvasya kṣayāt pūrvārjitasya ca 
MSS karmaṇo bandhamāpnoti śārīraṃ na punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS asaṃtuṣṭasya viprasya tejo vidyā tapo yaśaḥ 
MSS sravantīndriyalaulyena jñānaṃ caivāvakīryate 
MSS asaṃtuṣṭā dvijā naṣṭāḥ saṃtuṣṭāśca mahībhṛtaḥ 
MSS salajjā gaṇikā naṣṭā nirlajjāśca kulāṅganā 
MSS asaṃtuṣṭāścyutāḥ sthānān mānāt pratyavaropitāḥ 
MSS svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpyupahatāḥ paraiḥ 
MSS asaṃtuṣṭo'sakṛllokān āpnotyapi sureśvaraḥ 
MSS akiṃcano'pi saṃtuṣṭaḥ śete sarvāṅgavijvaraḥ 
MSS asaṃtoṣaḥ paraṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham 
MSS sukhārthī puruṣas tasmāt saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataḥ bhavet 
MSS asaṃtoṣaḥ paraṃ pāpam ityāha bhagavān hariḥ 
MSS lobhaḥ pāpasya bījo'yaṃ moho mūlaṃ ca tasya vai 
MSS asatyaṃ tasya hi skandho mahāśākhā suvistarā 
MSS asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ 
MSS asantoṣasya nāstyantas tuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham 
MSS asaṃtoṣo'sukhāyaiva lobhādindriyavibhramaḥ 
MSS tato'sya naśyati prajñā vidyevābhyāsavarjitā 
MSS asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtāmapāpāṃs tulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśrabhāvāt 
MSS śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvāt tasmāt pāpaiḥ saha saṃdhiṃ na kuryāt 
MSS asaṃdadhāno mānāndhaḥ samenāpi hato bhṛśam 
MSS āmakumbhamivābhittvā nāvatiṣṭheta śaktimān 
MSS asaṃdigdhamanā bhūtvā vadedikṣuraso yathā 
MSS vikṣubdho vacasā yo hi vākyaśalyena hanyate 
MSS asaṃpattau paro lābho guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā 
MSS āpadvimokṣaṇaṃ caiva mitrasyaitat phalatrayam 
MSS asaṃpannaḥ kathaṃ bandhur asahiṣṇuḥ kathaṃ prabhuḥ 
MSS anātmavit kathaṃ vidvān asaṃtuṣṭaḥ kathaṃ sukhī 
MSS asaṃpādayataḥ kaṃcidarthaṃ jātikriyāguṇaiḥ 
MSS yadṛcchāśabdavatpuṃsaḥ saṃjñāyai janma kevalam 
MSS asaṃprāptarajā gaurī prāpte rajasi rohiṇī 
MSS avyañjanā bhavet kanyā kucahīnā ca nagnikā 
MSS asaṃbhavaṃ hemamṛgasya janma tathāpi rāmo lulubhe mṛgāya 
MSS prāyaḥ samāpannavipattikāle dhiyo'pi puṃsāṃ malinā bhavanti 
MSS asaṃbhavaguṇastutyā jāyate svātmanastrapā 
MSS karṇikāraṃ sugandhīti vadan ko nopahasyate 
MSS asaṃbhāvyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi dṛśyate 
MSS śilā tarati pānīyaṃ gītaṃ gāyati vānaraḥ 
MSS asaṃbhāṣyaṃ na bhāṣeta bhāṣase yadi tattathā 
MSS pareṣāṃ hi samudvege nātmanaśca śubhaṃ phalam 
MSS asaṃbhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅgayaṣṭer anāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya 
MSS kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede 
MSS asaṃbhedyaḥ śucirdakṣaḥ kṛtānnasya parīkṣakaḥ 
MSS sūdānāṃ ca viśeṣajñaḥ sūdādhyakṣo vidhīyate 
MSS asaṃbhogena sāmānyaṃ kṛpaṇasya dhanaṃ paraiḥ 
MSS asyedamiti saṃbandho hānau duḥkhena gamyate 
MSS asaṃbhramo vilajjatvam avajñā prativādini 
MSS hāso rājñaḥ stavaśceti pañcaite jayahetavaḥ 
MSS asaṃmataḥ kastava muktimārgaṃ punarbhavakleśabhayāt prapannaḥ 
MSS baddhaściraṃ tiṣṭhatu sundarīṇām ārecitabhrūcaturaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ 
MSS asaṃmāne tapovṛddhiḥ saṃmmānācca tapaḥkṣayaḥ 
MSS pūjayā puṇyahāniḥ syān nindayā sadgatirbhavet 
MSS asaṃmukhālokanamābhimukhyaṃ niṣedha evānumatiprakāraḥ 
MSS pratyuttaraṃ mudraṇameva vācāṃ navāṅganānāṃ nava eva panthāḥ 
MSS asaṃvibhāgī duṣṭātmā kṛtaghno nirapatrapaḥ 
MSS tādṛṅnarādhamo loke varjanīyo narādhipa 
MSS asaṃvṛtasya kāryāṇi prāptānyapi viśeṣataḥ 
MSS niḥsaṃśayaṃ vipadyante bhinnaplava ivodadhau 
MSS asaṃvṛtākāratayā bhinnamantrasya bhūpateḥ 
MSS sakṛcchidraghaṭasyeva na tiṣṭhatyudayodakam 
MSS asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ 
MSS satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ 
MSS asaṃśayaṃ nyastamupāntaraktatāṃ yadeva roddhuṃ rāmaṇībhirañjanam 
MSS hṛte'pi tasmin salilena śuklatāṃ nirāsa rāgo nayaneṣu na śriyam 
MSS asaṃśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam 
MSS abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate 
MSS asaṃśayaṃ vijānīhi kāle sarvaṃ phaliṣyati 
MSS dhṛtiṃ dhāraya visrabdhaṃ bhavet sarvaṃ samañjasam 
MSS asakalakalikākulīkṛtāli skhalanavikīrṇavikāsikeśarāṇām 
MSS marudavaniruhāṃ rajo vadhūbhyaḥ samupaharan vicakāra korakāṇi 
MSS asakalanayanāvalokanena smitaparihāsamanoharairvacobhiḥ 
MSS kamalamukhi murārirevamevaṃ kathaya kiyanti dināni vañcanīyaḥ 
MSS asakalanayanekṣitāni lajjā gatamalasaṃ paripāṇḍutā viṣādaḥ 
MSS iti vividhamiyāya tāsu bhūṣāṃ prabhavati maṇḍayituṃ vadhūranaṅgaḥ 
MSS asakṛdasakṛnnaṣṭāṃ naṣṭāṃ mṛgo mṛgatṛṣṇikāṃ śramaparigato'pyutpakṣmākṣaḥ paraiti punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS gaṇayati na tanmāyātoyaṃ hataḥ salilāśayā bhavati hi matistṛṣṇāndhānāṃ vivekaparāṅmukhī 
MSS asakṛn na ne'ti sāvadhi niṣedhabodhiśrutirmayā kalitā 
MSS gamayati paramanavarataṃ yā tamakhaṇḍārtharūpamānandam 
MSS asakṛdekarathena tarasvinā harihayāgrasareṇa dhanurbhṛtā 
MSS dinakarābhimukhā raṇareṇavo rurudhire rudhireṇa suradviṣām 
MSS asakṛd yudhi vijitādapi bhīto bārhadrathājjale durgam 
MSS kṛtvā harirnyavātsīd vijito'pyāśaṅkanīyo'riḥ 
MSS asakṛn na vadedāśāṃ prārthayed devatāṃ sakṛt 
MSS nālāyanī pañca patīn prāpoccārya punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS asaktamārādhayato yathāyathaṃ vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā 
MSS guṇānurāgādiva sakhyamīyivān na bādhate'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam 
MSS asaṅgasaṃgadoṣeṇa satyāśca mativibhramaḥ 
MSS ekarātraprasaṅgena kāṣṭhaghaṇṭāviḍambanā 
MSS asajjanaḥ sajjanasaṅgisaṅgāt karoti duḥsādhyamapīha sādhyam 
MSS puṣpāśrayācchaṃbhuśiro'dhirūḍhā pipīlikā cumbati candrabimbam 
MSS asajjanāyāśu varaṃ na dadyāt prītito nṛpaḥ 
MSS varaṃ bhasmāsurāyeśaḥ dattvā nīliphalaṃ gataḥ 
MSS asajjanāścen madhurairvacobhiḥ śakyanta eva pratikartumāryaiḥ 
MSS tatketakīreṇubhiramburāśer bandhakriyāyāmapi kaḥ prayāsaḥ 
MSS asajjanena saṃparkād anayaṃ yānti sādhavaḥ 
MSS madhuraṃ śītalaṃ toyaṃ pāvakaṃ prāpya tapyate 
MSS asataḥ śrīmadāndhasya dāridryaṃ paramāñjanam 
MSS ātmaupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ paramīkṣate 
MSS asatāṃ ca parikṣepaḥ satāṃ ca parigūhanam 
MSS abhūtānāṃ ca hiṃsānām adharmāṇāṃ ca varjanam 
MSS asatāṃ dharmabuddhiścet satāṃ saṃtāpakāraṇam 
MSS upoṣitasya vyāghrasya pāraṇaṃ paśumāraṇam 
MSS asatāṃ pragrahaḥ kāmaḥ kopaścāvagrahaḥ satām 
MSS vyasanaṃ doṣabāhulyād atyantamubhayaṃ matam 
MSS asatāṃ bata sattāpi na nyāyānugatā yadā 
MSS tatastebhyorthapūrttyāśā sudhālipseva bhoginaḥ 
MSS asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa satī yāti matirbhramam 
MSS ekarātripravāsena kāṣṭhaṃ muñje pralambitam 
MSS asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa sādhavo yānti vikriyām 
MSS duryodhanaprasaṅgena bhīṣmo goharaṇe gataḥ 
MSS asatāṃ saṅgamutsṛjya satsu saṅgaṃ samācaret 
MSS asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa māṇḍavyaḥ śūlamāptavān 
MSS asatāṃ sahajo bhāvaś channaḥ kenāpi hetunā 
MSS saṃskāra iva bījānāṃ phalena saha jāyate 
MSS asatāmupabhogāya durjanānāṃ vibhūtayaḥ 
MSS picumandaḥ phalāḍhyo'pi kākairevopabhujyate 
MSS asatā saha saṅgena ko na yātyadhamāṃ gatim 
MSS payo'pi śauṇḍanīhaste madyamityabhidhīyate 
MSS asatīcaritaṃ tadvad vasantādeścavarṇanam 
MSS grīṣmādervarṇanaṃ tadvad varṣāderapi varṇanam 
MSS asatī bhavati salajjā kṣāraṃ nīraṃ ca śītalaṃ bhavati 
MSS dambhī bhavati vivekī priyavaktā bhavati dhūrtajanaḥ 
MSS asato'pi bhavati guṇavān sadbhyo'pi paraṃ bhavantyasadvṛttāḥ 
MSS paṅkādudeti kamalaṃ krimayaḥ kamalādapi bhavanti 
MSS asato vā sato vāpi svayaṃ svān varṇayan guṇān 
MSS hāsyatāṃ yāti śakro'pi kiṃ punaḥ prākṛto janaḥ 
MSS asatkāryarato'dhīra ārambhī viṣayī ca yaḥ 
MSS sa rājaso manuṣyeṣu mṛto janmādhigacchati 
MSS asatpratigrahītā ca narake yātyadhomukhe 
MSS eko miṣṭānnabhug yaḥ sa yāti pūyavahaṃ naraḥ 
MSS asatpralāpaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyamanṛtaṃ tathā 
MSS catvāri vācā rājendra na jalpen nānucintayet 
MSS asatyaḥ sarvaloke'smin satataṃ satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ 
MSS bhartāraṃ nānumanyaṃte vinipātagataṃ striyaḥ 
MSS asatyatā niṣṭhuratākṛtajñatā bhayaṃ pramādo'lasatā viṣāditā 
MSS vṛthābhimāno'pi ca dīrghasūtratā tathāṅganākṣādi vināśanaṃ śriyaḥ 
MSS asatyamapratyayamūlakāraṇaṃ kuvāsanāsadmasamṛddhivāraṇam 
MSS vipannidānaṃ paravañcanorjitaṃ kṛtāparādhaṃ kṛtibhirvivarjitam 
MSS asatyametad viditaṃ samastam akāryakārīti mṛṣā prapañcaḥ 
MSS kucāpalāpakramameva kartum ācchādanaṃ te hṛdayasya śaśvat 
MSS asatyaśīlā vikṛtā durgrāhyahṛdayāḥ sadā 
MSS yuvatyaḥ pāpasaṃkalpāḥ kṣaṇamātrād virāgiṇaḥ 
MSS asatyasaṃdhasya sataś calasyāsthiracetasaḥ 
MSS naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam 
MSS asatyasya vaṇigmūlaṃ śākhāstasya varāṅganāḥ 
MSS kāyasthāḥ patrapuṣpāṇi phalāni dyūtakāriṇaḥ 
MSS asatyāḥ satyasaṃkāśāḥ satyāścāsatyarūpiṇaḥ 
MSS dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmād yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam 
MSS asatyā ca hatā vāṇī tathā paiśunyavādinī 
MSS saṃdigdho'pi hato mantro vyagracitto hato japaḥ 
MSS asatyātmaguṇe śastraṃ hastābhyāṃ vinivāryate 
MSS eṣāpi na gatiḥ kṣemyā na cānyā vidyate kvacit 
MSS asatyenaiva jīvanti veśyāḥ satyavivarjitāḥ 
MSS etāḥ satyena naśyanti madyeneva kulāṅganāḥ 
MSS asatsaṃparkadoṣeṇa adhastād yānti sādhavaḥ 
MSS mārgastimiradoṣeṇa samo'pi viṣamāyate 
MSS asatsaṅgād guṇajño'pi viṣayāsaktamānasaḥ 
MSS akasmāt pralayaṃ yāti gītarakto yathā mṛgaḥ 
MSS asadṛśajaneṣu yācñā mahatāṃ nahi lāghavāya suhṛdarthe 
MSS harirapi pāṇḍusutebhyaḥ svayamarthī dhārtarāṣṭreṣu 
MSS asaddharmastvayaṃ strīṇām asmākaṃ bhavati prabho 
MSS pāpīyaso narān yadvai lajjāṃ tyaktvā bhajāmahe 
MSS asadbhiḥ sevito rājā svayaṃ sannapi dūṣyate 
MSS kiṃ sevyo bhogisaṃvīto gandhavānapi candanaḥ 
MSS asadbhirasatāmeva bhujyante dhanasaṃpadaḥ 
MSS phalaṃ kimpākavṛkṣasya dhvāṅkṣā bhakṣanti netare 
MSS asadvṛtto nāyaṃ na ca sakhi guṇaireṣa rahitaḥ priyo muktāhārastava caraṇamūle nipatitaḥ 
MSS gṛhāṇainaṃ mugdhe vrajatu tava kaṇṭhapraṇayitām upāyo nāstyanyo hṛdayaparitāpopaśamane 
MSS asanto'bhyarthitāḥ sadbhiḥ kiṃcitkāryaṃ kadācana 
MSS manyante santamātmānam asantamapi vitaśrum 
MSS asanto ye nivartante vedebhya iva nāstikāḥ 
MSS narakaṃ bhajamānāste pratipadyanti kilbiṣam 
MSS asanthitapadā suvihvalāṅgī madaskhalitaceṣṭitairmanojñā 
MSS kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam 
MSS asabhyaḥ piśunaścaiva kṛtaghno dīrghavairiṇaḥ 
MSS catvāraḥ karmacaṇḍālāḥ jāticaṇḍālapañcamāḥ 
MSS asamagravilokitena kiṃ te dayitaṃ paśya varoru nirviśaṅkam 
MSS nahi jātu kuśāgrapītamambhaḥ sucireṇāpi karotyapetatṛṣṇam 
MSS asamañjasamasamañjasa masañjasametadāpatitam 
MSS vallavakumārabuddhyā hari hari harirīkṣataḥ kutukāt 
MSS asamarthaṃ parityajya samarthāḥ paribhuñjate 
MSS nṛpāṇāṃ nāsti dāyādyaṃ vīrabhogyā vasundharā 
MSS asamaye matirunmiṣati dhruvaṃ karagataiva gatā yadiyaṃ kuhūḥ 
MSS punarupaiti nirudhya nivāsyate sakhi mukhaṃ na vidhoḥ punarīkṣyate 
MSS asamarthāḥ prakurvanti munayo'pyarthasaṃcayam 
MSS kiṃ na kurvanti bhūpālā yeṣāṃ kośavaśāḥ prajāḥ 
MSS asamartho bhavet sādhur nirdhano brahmacāryapi 
MSS vyādhimān devapūjī ca kurūpā ca pativratā 
MSS asamasamarasampallampaṭānāṃ bhaṭānām avadhiravadhi yuddhe yena hampīravīraḥ 
MSS sa kila sakaladṛptakṣatranakṣatralakṣmī haraṇakiraṇamālī kasya na syān namasyaḥ 
MSS asamasāhasasuvyavasāyinaḥ sakalalokacamatkṛtikāriṇaḥ 
MSS yadi bhavanti na vāñchitasiddhayo hatavidherayaśo na manasvinaḥ 
MSS asamāne samānatvaṃ bhavitā kalahe mama 
MSS iti matvā dhruvaṃ mānī mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate 
MSS asamāpitakṛtyasaṃpadāṃ hatavegaṃ vinayena tāvatā 
MSS prabhavantyabhimānaśālināṃ madamuttambhayituṃ vibhūtayaḥ 
MSS asamāptajigīṣasya strīcintā kā manasvinaḥ 
MSS anākramya jagat kṛtsnaṃ no saṃdhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ 
MSS asamaiḥ samīyamānaḥ samaiśca parihīyamāṇasatkāraḥ 
MSS adhuri viniyujyamānas tribhirarthapatiṃ tyajati bhṛtyaḥ 
MSS asamyagupayuktaṃ hi jñānaṃ sukuśalairapi 
MSS upalabhyāpyaviditaṃ viditaṃ cāpyanuṣṭhitam 
MSS asahāyaḥ pumānekaḥ kāryāntaṃ nādhigacchati 
MSS tuṣeṇāpi vinirmuktas taṇḍulo na prarohati 
MSS asahāyaḥ samartho'pi tejasvī kiṃ kariṣyati 
MSS rāmaḥ sugrīvasāhāyyāt laṅkāṃ nirdagdhavān purā 
MSS asahāyaḥ samartho'pi tejasvyapi karoti kim 
MSS nivāte patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyati 
MSS asahāyaḥ samartho'pi na kāryaṃ kartumarhati 
MSS tuṣeṇāpi parityaktā na prarohanti taṇḍulāḥ 
MSS asahāyaḥ sahāyārthī māmanudhyātavān dhruvam 
MSS pīḍyamānaḥ śaraistīkṣṇair droṇadrauṇikṛpādibhiḥ 
MSS asahāyasya kāryāṇi siddhiṃ nāyānti kānicit 
MSS tasmāt samastakāryeṣu sahāyo bhūpatergatiḥ 
MSS asahāyo'samartho vā tejasvī kiṃ kariṣyati 
MSS atṛṇe patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyate 
MSS asahāścaiva vijñeyāḥ prabhāvanto videhajāḥ 
MSS aṅgadeśodbhavāstīkṣṇāḥ suhastāḥ sudṛḍhāstathā 
MSS asahyavātoddhatareṇumaṇḍalā pracaṇḍasūryātapatāpitā mahī 
MSS na śakyate draṣṭumapi pravāsibhiḥ priyāviyogānaladagdhamānasaiḥ 
MSS asahyānyapi soḍhāni gaditānyapriyāṇyapi 
MSS sthitaḥ paragṛhadvāri tṛṣṇe nivṛttimāpnuhi 
MSS asādhanā vittahīnā buddhimantaḥ suhṛnmatāḥ 
MSS sādhayantyāśu kāryāṇi kākakūrmamṛgākhuvat 
MSS asādhuḥ sādhurvā bhavati khalu jātyaiva puruṣo na saṅgād daurjanyaṃ na hi sujanatā kasyacidapi 
MSS prarūḍhe saṃsarge maṇibhujagayorjanmajanite maṇirnāherdoṣān spṛśati na tu sarpo maṇiguṇān 
MSS asādhu parigantavyaṃ na ca sādhu ca saṃvalam 
MSS saṃvalaṃ kuru yatnena maraṇaṃ dhruvaniścayam 
MSS asādhyaṃ nārabhet prājñaḥ akāryaṃ naiva kārayet 
MSS anṛtaṃ naiva jalpeta abhakṣyaṃ naiva bhakṣayet 
MSS asādhyaṃ śatrumālokya dāyādaṃ tasya bhedayet 
MSS rājyakāmaṃ samarthaṃ ca yathā rāmo vibhīṣaṇam 
MSS asādhyaṃ sādhumantrāṇāṃ tīvraṃ vāgviṣamutsṛjat 
MSS dvijihvaṃ vadanaṃ dhatte duṣṭo durjanapannagaḥ 
MSS asādhyamanyathā doṣaṃ paricchidya śarīriṇām 
MSS yathā vaidyastathā rājā śastrapāṇirviṣahyati 
MSS asādhyāyāḥ sukhaṃ siddhiḥ siddhāyāścānurañjanam 
MSS raktāyāśca ratiḥ samyak kāmaśāstraprayojanam 
MSS asāmānyollekhaṃ virasahatahevākinamalaṃ vidhiṃ vande nindāmyuta bata na jāne kimucitam 
MSS anarghaṃ nirmāṇaṃ lalitatanu yasyeha bhavatī na yaḥ kṛtvāpi tvāṃ pariharati sargavyasanitām 
MSS asāraṃ saṃsāraṃ parimuṣitaratnaṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokaṃ maraṇaśaraṇaṃ bāndhavajanam 
MSS adarpaṃ kandarpaṃ jananayananirmāṇamaphalaṃ jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ kathamasi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ 
MSS asāraḥ saṃsāraḥ sarasakadalīsārasadṛśo lasadvidyullekhācakitacapalaṃ jīvitamidam 
MSS yadetat tāruṇyaṃ nagagatanadīvegasadṛśam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ puṃsāṃ tadapi viṣayān dhāvati manaḥ 
MSS asāraḥ sarvataḥ sāro vācā sārasamuccayaḥ 
MSS vācā sā calitā yena sukṛtaṃ tena hāritam 
MSS asārabhūte saṃsāre sāraṃ sāraṅgalocanā 
MSS tadarthaṃ dhanamicchanti tattyāge ca dhanena kim 
MSS asārabhūte saṃsāre sārabhūtā nitambinī 
MSS iti saṃcintya vai śaṃbhur ardhāṅge kāminīṃ dadhau 
MSS asārāḥ santyete virativirasā vātha viṣayā jugupsantāṃ yad vā nanu sakaladoṣāspadamiti 
MSS tathāpyantastattvapraṇihitadhiyāmapyatibalas tadīyo'nākhyeyaḥ sphurati hṛdaye ko'pi mahimā 
MSS asāre khalu saṃsāre sāraṃ śvaśuramandiram 
MSS kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete śivaḥ śete himālaye 
MSS asāre khalu saṃsāre sāraṃ śvaśuramandiram 
MSS haro himālaye śete viṣṇuḥ śete mahodadhau 
MSS asāre khalu saṃsāre sārametaccatuṣṭayam 
MSS kāśyāṃ vāsaḥ satāṃ saṅgo gaṅgāmbhaḥ śaṃbhusevanam 
MSS asāre khalu saṃsāre sukhabhrāntiḥ śarīriṇām 
MSS lālāpānamivāṅguṣṭhe bālānāṃ stanyavibhramaḥ 
MSS asāre bata saṃsāre karmatantraḥ śarīriṇām 
MSS jāyante priyasaṃyogā viyoge hṛdayacchidaḥ 
MSS asāre saṃsāre viṣamaviṣapāke nṛpasukhe kṛtāntenācānte prakṛticapale jīvitabale 
MSS dhruvāpāye kāye viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇāhatahṛdaḥ kṣaraprāṇaiḥ prāṇānahaha parimuṣṇanti kudhiyaḥ 
MSS asāre saṃsāre sumatiśaraṇe kāvyakaraṇe yatheṣṭaṃ ceṣṭante kati na kavayaḥ svasvarucayaḥ 
MSS paraṃ dugdhasnigdhaṃ madhuraracanaṃ yastu vacanaṃ prasūte brūte vā bhavati viralaḥ ko'pi saralaḥ 
MSS asāro nirguṇo vakraś citrarūpatayānvitaḥ 
MSS avāpa na cirād bhraṃśaṃ śakracāpaḥ khalo yathā 
MSS asāvadhāne pāṇḍityaṃ krayakrītaṃ ca maithunam 
MSS bhojanaṃ ca parādhīnaṃ tisraḥ puṃsāṃ viḍambanāḥ 
MSS asāvanāsthāparayāvadhīritaḥ saroruhiṇyā śirasā namannapi 
MSS upaiti śuṣyan kalamaḥ sahāmbhasā manobhuvā tapta ivābhipāṇḍutām 
MSS asāvanupanīto'pi vedānadhijage guroḥ 
MSS svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sphaṭiko na saṃskāramapekṣate 
MSS asāvantaścañcadvikacanavalīlābjayugala stalasphūrjatkamburvilasadalisaṃghāta upari 
MSS vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhi te 
MSS asāvahaṃ lohamayī sa yasyāḥ krūraḥ sakhi prastara eṣa kāntaḥ 
MSS ākarṣakadrāvakacumbakeṣu naiko'pyasau bhrāmaka ityavaihi 
MSS asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ 
MSS rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ 
MSS asāvudvelalāvaṇyaratnākarasamudbhavaḥ 
MSS jagadvijayamāṅgalyaśaṅkhaḥ kusumadhanvanaḥ 
MSS asāvekadvitriprabhṛtiparipāṭyā prakaṭayan kalāḥ svairaṃ svairaṃ navakamalakandāṅkurarucaḥ 
MSS purandhrīṇāṃ preyovirahadahanoddīpitadṛśāṃ kaṭākṣebhyo bibhyannibhṛtamiva candro'bhyudayate 
MSS asiḥ śarā varma dhanuśca noccakair vivicya kiṃ prārthitamīśvareṇa te 
MSS athāsti śaktiḥ kṛtameva yācñayā na dūṣitaḥ śaktimatāṃ svayaṃgrahaḥ 
MSS asijīvī maṣījīvī devalo grāmayājakaḥ 
MSS dhāvakaḥ pācakaścaiva ṣaḍ viprāḥ śūdrajātayaḥ 
MSS asitakhuracatuṣkaḥ śyāmalagranthipādaḥ sravati karasamīpe mūtradhārāṃ savegām 
MSS daśanacalakhalīnaḥ kukkuṭaskandhabandhaḥ kiṭivarakaṭhinorurdūragaḥ syāt turuṅgaḥ 
MSS asitagirisamaṃ syāt kajjalaṃ sindhupātre surataruvaraśākhā lekhanī patramurvī 
MSS likhati yadi gṛhītvā śāradā sarvakālaṃ tadapi tava guṇānāmīśa pāraṃ na yāti 
MSS asitanayanalakṣmīṃ lakṣayitvotpaleṣu kvaṇitakanakakāñcīṃ mattahaṃsasvaneṣu 
MSS adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ pathikajana idānīṃ roditi bhrāntacittaḥ 
MSS asitabhujagabhīṣaṇāsipatro ruharuhikāhitacittatūrṇacāraḥ 
MSS pulakitatanurutkapolakāntiḥ pratibhaṭavikramadarśane'yamāsīt 
MSS asitabhujagaśiśuveṣṭitam abhinavamābhāti ketakīkusumam 
MSS āyasavalayālaṃkṛta viṣāṇamiva dantinaḥ patitam 
MSS asitamekasurāśitamapyamūn na punareṣa vidhurviśadaṃ viṣam 
MSS api nipīya surairjanitakṣayaṃ svayamudeti punarnavamārṇavam 
MSS asitavasanasragsaṃvītā ghanāgurusāravan mṛgamadamaṣīsnātā jātāṃ tvameva tamasvinī 
MSS abhisara sukhaṃ dantoddyotaṃ na tanvi vikāsayeḥ śvasitamathavā muñceścañcaddvirephaghanodgamam 
MSS asitātmā susaṃnaddhaḥ samāviṣkṛtacāpalaḥ 
MSS bhujaṃgakuṭilas tasyā bhrūvikṣepaḥ khalāyate 
MSS asiddhasādhanaṃ sadbhiḥ śāsanaṃ daṇḍa ucyate 
MSS taṃ yuktyaiva nayed daṇḍaṃ yuktadaṇḍaḥ praśasyate 
MSS asidhārāṃ viṣaṃ vahniṃ samatve yaḥ prapaśyati 
MSS mālāsudhātuṣārāṇāṃ sa yogī kathyate budhaiḥ 
MSS asidhārākramakrītā varamekāpi kākiṇī 
MSS na parabhrūvinirdiṣṭā sāgarāntāpi medinī 
MSS asidhārāpathe nātha śatruśoṇitapicchile 
MSS ājagāma kathaṃ lakṣmīr nirjagāma kathaṃ yaśaḥ 
MSS asidhenuriyaṃ vibhāti te jitasarvakṣitipālamaṇḍalā 
MSS pralaye jagatīmivāśituṃ sphuratī kālakarālajihvakā 
MSS asindūreṇa sīmanto mā bhūnno yoṣitāmiti 
MSS ataḥ pariharantyājāv asiṃ dūreṇa te'rayaḥ 
MSS asimātrasahāyasya prabhūtāriparābhave 
MSS anyatucchajanasyeva na smayo'sya mahādhṛteḥ 
MSS asīvyad dehe sve paśupatirumāṅkaṃ samaghano vigupto gopībhirduhitaramayāt sā kamalabhūḥ 
MSS yadādeśādetaj jagadapi mṛgīdṛkparavaśaṃ sa vaśyaḥ kasya syādahaha viṣamo manmathabharaḥ 
MSS asukhamatha sukhaṃ vā karmaṇāṃ paktivelāsv ahaha niyatamete bhuñjate dehabhājaḥ 
MSS tadiha purata eva prāha mauhurtikaścet kathaya phalamamīṣāmantataḥ kiṃ tataḥ syāt 
MSS asukhaiśca vinālāpo guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā 
MSS vipadvimokṣaṇaṃ caiva mitratāyāḥ phalatrayam 
MSS asubhiraśubhaṃ tyaktvā dehaṃ nijaṃ kila yogavid viśati viśadaṃ jñānālokāt parasya kalevaram 
MSS nayanavivaraiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sākṣādaho tava naipuṇaṃ viśasi hṛdayaṃ draṣṭuṃ spaṣṭaṃ bahiśca viceṣṭase 
MSS asubhṛtāṃ vadhamācarati kṣamād vadati vākyamasahyamasūnṛtam 
MSS parakalatradhanānyapi vāñchati na kurute kimu madyamadākulaḥ 
MSS asuraracitaprayatnād vijñātā diviravañcanā yena 
MSS saṃrakṣitā matimatā ratnavatī vasumatī tena 
MSS asurasamaradakṣairvajrasaṃdhṛṣṭacāpair anupamabalavīryaiḥ svaiḥ kulaistulyavīryaḥ 
MSS raghuriva sa narendro yajñaviśrāntakośo bhava jagati guṇānāṃ bhājanaṃ bhrājitānām 
MSS asurasuranareśāṃ yo na bhogeṣu tṛptaḥ kathamiha manujānāṃ tasya bhogeṣu tṛptiḥ 
MSS jalanidhijalapāne yo na jāto vitṛṣṇas tṛṇaśikharagatāmbhambhaḥpānataḥ kiṃ sa tṛpyet 
MSS asurahitamapyādityotthaṃ vipattimupāgataṃ ditisutaguruḥ prāṇairyoktuṃ na kiṃ kacavat tamaḥ 
MSS paṭhati luṭhatīṃ kaṇṭhe vidyāmayaṃ mṛtajīvanīṃ yadi na vahate saṃdhyāmaunavratavyayabhīrutām 
MSS asuro hitamupadiṣṭaḥ prahlādo nāradena garbhasthaḥ 
MSS tattvaviduṣāṃ varo'bhūd dhitopadeśaṃ sadā śṛṇuyāt 
MSS asulabhā sakalendumukhī ca sā kimapi cedamanaṅgaviceṣṭitam 
MSS abhimukhīṣviva vāñchitasiddhiṣu vrajati nirvṛtimekapade manaḥ 
MSS asuhṛtsasuhṛccāpi saśatrur mitravānapi 
MSS saprajñaḥ prajñayā hīno daivena labhate sukham 
MSS asūcibhedyāmāsādya bālāṃ prauḍhābhilāpiṇīm 
MSS hā kaṣṭaṃ muṣito'smīti prabhāte vakti kāmukaḥ 
MSS asūcīsaṃcāre tamasi nabhasi prauḍhajalada dhvaniprājñaṃmanye patati pṛṣatānāṃ nicaye 
MSS idaṃ saudāminyāḥ kanakakamanīyaṃ vilasitaṃ mudaṃ ca mlāniṃ ca prathayati pathi svairasudṛśām 
MSS asūta sadyaḥ kusumānyaśokaḥ skandhāt prabhṛtyeva sapallavāni 
MSS pādena nāpaikṣata sundarīṇāṃ saṃparkamāśiñjitanūpureṇa 
MSS asūta sā nāgavadhūpabhogyaṃ mainākamambhonidhibaddhasakhyam 
MSS kruddhe'pi pakṣacchidi vṛtraśatrāv avedanājñaṃ kuliśakṣatānām 
MSS asūyako dandaśūko niṣṭhuro vairakṛnnaraḥ 
MSS sa kṛcchraṃ mahadāpnoti nacirāt pāpamācaran 
MSS asūyayā hatenaiva pūrvopāyodyamairapi 
MSS kart ṇāṃ gṛhyate saṃpat suhṛdbhirmantribhistathā 
MSS asūyāviṣṭe manasi yadi saṃpat pravartate 
MSS tuṣāgniṃ vāyusamyogam iva jānīhi suvrata 
MSS asūyaikapadaṃ mṛtyur ativādaḥ śriyo vadhaḥ 
MSS aśuśrūṣā tvarā ślāghā vidyāyāḥ śatravastrayaḥ 
MSS asekato'tyantaniṣekataśca śākhāviśoṣaṃ phalino nirūpya 
MSS saptāhamātraṃ śṛtameva sarpir viḍaṅgadugdhāmbu niṣecanīyam 
MSS asevake cānuraktir dānaṃ sapriyabhāṣaṇam 
MSS anuraktasya cihnāni doṣe'pi guṇasaṃgrahaḥ 
MSS aseviteśvaradvāram adṛṣṭavirahavyatham 
MSS anuktaklībavacanaṃ dhanyaṃ kasyāpi jīvitam 
MSS asoḍhā tatkālollasadasahabhāvasya tapasaḥ kathānāṃ viśrambheṣvatha ca rasikaḥ śailaduhituḥ 
MSS pramodaṃ vo diśyāt kapaṭabaṭuveṣāpanayane tvarāśathilyābhyāṃ yugapadabhiyuktaḥ smaraharaḥ 
MSS asau gataḥ saugata eva yasmāt kuryān nirālambanatāṃ mamaiva 
MSS sakhi priyaste kṣaṇikaḥ kimanyan nirātmakaḥ śūnyatamaḥ sa vandyaḥ 
MSS asau gireḥ śītalakandarasthaḥ pārāvato manmathacāṭudakṣaḥ 
MSS dharmālasāṅgīṃ madhurāṇi kūjan saṃvījate pakṣapuṭena kāntām 
MSS asaujanyañcetobhavasamucitaṃ bhāvayati tad vṛthā saṃsāre'sminnahaha samayaṃ kiṃ gamayasi 
MSS cirād bhūyo bhūyaḥ kalayasi sakhedo bhavasukhaṃ tato manye tyāgāt prabhavati parā nirvṛtiriti 
MSS asau nāstīvenduḥ kvacidapi raviḥ proṣita iva grahoḍūnāṃ cakraṃ nabhasi likhitaproñchitamiva 
MSS aharvā rātrirvā dvayamapi praluptapravicayaṃ ghanairbaddhavyūhaiḥ kimidamatighoraṃ vyavasitam 
MSS asau bibhrattāmratviṣamudayaśailasya śirasi skhalan prāleyāṃśuryadi bhavati matto haladharaḥ 
MSS tadānīmetat tu pratinavatamāladyutiharaṃ tamo'pi vyālolaṃ vigalati tadīyaṃ nivasanam 
MSS asaubhāgyaṃ dhatte paramasukhabhogāspadamayaṃ vicitraṃ tadgehaṃ bhavati pṛthukārtasvaramayam 
MSS niviṣṭaḥ palyaṅke kalayati sa kāntārataraṇaṃ prasādaṃ kopaṃ vā janani bhavatī yatra tanute 
MSS asau maruccumbitacārukesaraḥ prasannatārādhipamaṇḍalāgraṇīḥ 
MSS viyuktarāmāturadṛṣṭivīkṣito vasantakālo hanumānivāgataḥ 
MSS asau mahākālaniketanasya vasannadūre kila candramauleḥ 
MSS tamisrapakṣe'pi saha priyābhir jotsnāvato nirviśati pradoṣān 
MSS asau mahendradvipadānagandhis trimārgagāvīcivimardaśītaḥ 
MSS ākāśavāyurdinayauvanotthān ācāmati svedalavān mukhe te 
MSS asau mahendrādrisamānasāraḥ patirmahendrasya mahodadheśca 
MSS yasya kṣaratsainyagajacchalena yātrāsu yātīva puro mahendraḥ 
MSS asau rasaucityaguṇojjvalo'pi gumpho na kāvyavyapadeśayogyaḥ 
MSS dhatte khalasyāpi na durviṣahya dveṣagrahotsāraṇamantratāṃ yaḥ 
MSS asau vidyāśālī śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanād ihāyātaḥ saṃpratyavikalaśaraccandravadanaḥ 
MSS yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva 
MSS asau samarasāhasaṃ vitanute'grimaśreyase mukundamamumātmani sthirayituṃ na kiṃ vāñchati 
MSS ataḥ parataraṃ kutaḥ prataraṇāya vārāṃnidher nidānamiha saṃsṛteḥ sukhasṛteśca kiṃ kāraṇam 
MSS asau samālokitakānanāntare vikīrṇavispaṣṭamarīcikesaraḥ 
MSS vinirgataḥ siṃha ivodayācalād gṛhītaniṣpandamṛgo niśākaraḥ 
MSS asau hi dattvā timirāvakāśam astaṃ vrajatyunnatakoṭirinduḥ 
MSS jalāvagāḍhasya vanadvipasya tīkṣṇaṃ viṣāṇāgramivāvaśiṣṭam 
MSS asau hi rāmā rativigrahapriyā rahaḥpragalbhā ramaṇaṃ rahogatam 
MSS ratena śatrau ramayet parena vā no cedudeṣyatyaruṇaḥ puro ripuḥ 
MSS asau hi saṃketasamutsukābhir vilāsinībhirmadanāturābhiḥ 
MSS saroṣadṛṣṭaḥ sphuritādharābhir drutaṃ ravirbhīta ivāstameti 
MSS astaṃgatabhāraviravi kālavaśāt kālidāsavidhuvidhuram 
MSS nirvāṇabāṇadīpaṃ jagadidamadyoti ratnena 
MSS astaṃ gatavati savitari pāyasapiṇḍaṃ sudhākaraṃ prācī 
MSS vyaracayadambarakuśabhuvi carati kalaṅkastadantare kākaḥ 
MSS astaṃ gatavati savitari bhartari madhupaṃ niveśya kośānte 
MSS kamalinyo'pi ramante kimatra citraṃ mṛgākṣīṇām 
MSS astaṃgate divānāthe nalinī madhupacchalāt 
MSS gilanti svavināśāya guṭikāṃ kālakūṭajām

MSS astaṃgate bhāsvati nāndhakārān śanaiścaro hanti vidhau budhaśca 
MSS piturguṇairna pratibhāti putro guṇānvito yaḥ sa guṇena bhāti 
MSS astaṃgato'yamaravindavanaikabandhur bhāsvānna laṅghayati ko'pi vidhipraṇītam 
MSS he cakra dhairyamavalambya vimuñca śokaṃ dhīrāstaranti vipadaṃ na tu dīnacittāḥ 
MSS astaṃ bhāsvati lokalocanakalāloke gate bhartari strīlokocitamācaranti sukṛtaṃ vahnau vilīya tviṣaḥ

MSS astaṃ muktirupaitu yatra na tanūsādhyā harerbhaktayas tannaḥ saṃsṛtiredhatāṃ niravadhiryasyāḥ prasādodayāt

MSS astaṃ yatāpi kila mastakavartināsāv astācalo'himarucā rucimapyalambhi

MSS tatte kālaṃ katipalamayaṃ bhāti khadyotapota dyotaṃ dyotaṃ punarapi punardyotatāṃ ko vilambaḥ 
MSS astaṃ śaśī yāti śaśāṅkavadane mānaṃ vimuñcādhunā kiṃ mānena mudhā natabhru gaganād bhraśyantyamūstārakāḥ 
MSS itthaṃ tvāmanuśikṣayan kṣititalādunnamya pādaṃ śanaiḥ kṣīṇāṃ vīkṣya niśāṃ nisargasubhagaṃ gāyatyasau kukkuṭaḥ

MSS carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhi pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ 
MSS jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanamāturam 
MSS rajasvalamanityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsamimaṃ tyajet 
MSS nadīkūlaṃ yathā vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vā śakuniryathā 
MSS tathā tyajannimaṃ dehaṃ kṛcchrād grāhād vimucyate 
MSS asthīni majjā śuklaṃ ca pituraṃśāstrayo matāḥ 
MSS raktaṃ romāṇi palalam aṃśā māturamī matā

MSS bhūṣāveṣopakaraṇagaṇaprāpaṇavyāpṛtānāṃ nṛttārambhapraṇayini śive pāntu vāco gaṇānām 
MSS asnātāśī malaṃ bhuṅkte ajapī pūyabhakṣaṇam 
MSS ahutāśī viṣaṃ bhuṅkte adātā viṣamaśnute 
MSS aspṛśyasaṃgatimiha pravidhāya soḍhā daṇḍāhatīḥ paṭaha bandhamapi prapadya 
MSS doṣaṃ prakāśayasi yatpratirathyameva lokasya tadvimukhatāṃ prakaṭīkaroṣi 
MSS aspṛśyo'stu malīmaso'stvaniyatāhāro'stvato'pyudbhaṭair doṣairastu paraḥśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ kākastataḥ kā kṣatiḥ 
MSS bhuṅkte bhojyamupasthitaṃ samupahūyaiva svayaṃ bāndhavān yaḥ sīdan kṣudhayā vicintaya tato dhanyaśca puṇyaśca kaḥ 
MSS aspṛṣṭe rāhubhītyāhani niśi ca same kalmaṣacchāyayone hāsatrāsād vidūre samupacitavibhāvaibhave hṛdyagandhe 
MSS pāthodācchādahīne dharaṇitalagatādurlabhe sarvalokā hlādaṃ cāpyādadhāne sumukhi tava mukhaupamyaleśaḥ sudhāṃśau

MSS satkārārthaṃ tava yadi girīnādiśed guptapakṣā na śrānto'pi praṇayamucitaṃ naiva bandhorvihanyāḥ 
MSS asmatprayāṇasamaye kuru maṅgalāni kiṃ rodiṣi priyatame vada kāraṇaṃ me

MSS asmadīśvaraviśvāsapramāṇena prabhoḥ kṛpā 
MSS vidhātuṃ prabhavet kāryaṃ sāhāyyaṃ ca tathaiva naḥ 
MSS asmadripūṇāmanilāśanānāṃ datto nivāsaḥ khalu candanena 
MSS itīva roṣād vyajanasya vāyur vyaśoṣayaccandanamaṅgasaṃstham

MSS taṃ saṃśrutya pragalitamahāḥ śītaraśmistadaiva prāptaḥ sevāghaṭanavidhaye mālatīdāmabhaṅgyā

MSS matvaivaṃ kila rājarāja nṛpate tvajjaitrayātrotsave matsī roditi makṣikā ca hasati dhyāyanti vairistriyaḥ 
MSS asmākaṃ paramandirasya caritaṃ yadyapyavācyaṃ bhavet svāmī tvaṃ kathayāmi tena bhavataḥ kiṃcit priyādūṣaṇam 
MSS śrīmad rāma nṛpa tvayā raṇamukhe pāṇigrahaḥ sādaraṃ yasyāḥ sāsilatā parasya hṛdaye dṛṣṭā luṭhantī mayā 
MSS asmākaṃ bata maṇḍale prathamataḥ patyā karaḥ pātyate kāñcīkuntalamadhyadeśaviṣayān saṃtyajya bhūriśriyaḥ

MSS asmān vicitravapuṣaścirapṛṣṭhalagnān ko vā vimuñcati sakhe yadi vā vimuñca

MSS sukhasyāntaḥ sadā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyāntaḥ sadā sukham 
MSS ahāpayan nṛpaḥ kālaṃ bhṛtyānāmanuvartinām 
MSS karmaṇāmānurūpyeṇa vṛttiṃ samanukalpayet 
MSS ahāryaḥ sarvamadhyasthaḥ kāñcanadyutimudvahan 
MSS satpradakṣiṇayogyatvam upayāti mahonnataḥ 
MSS ahāryeṇa kadāpyanyair asaṃhāryeṇa kenacit 
MSS titikṣākavacenaiva sarvaṃ jayati saṃvṛtaḥ 
MSS ahiṃ nṛpaṃ ca śārdūlaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca bālakaṃ tathā 
MSS paraśvānaṃ ca mūrkhaṃ ca sapta suptān na bodhayet 
MSS ahiṃsayaiva bhūtānāṃ kāryaṃ śreyo'muśāsanam 
MSS vāk caiva madhurā ślakṣṇā prayojyā dharmamicchatā 
MSS ahiṃsā dhāma dharmasya duḥkhasyāyatanaṃ spṛhā 
MSS saṅgatyāgaḥ padaṃ mukter yogābhyāsaḥ padaṃ śucaḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramā gatiḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā paramā prītis tvahiṃsā paramaṃ padam 
MSS ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paro damaḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā paramo yajñas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ balam 
MSS ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitram ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham 
MSS ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyam ahiṃsā paramaṃ śrutam 
MSS ahiṃsā paramo dharmo hyahiṃsaiva paraṃ tapaḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ityāhurmunayaḥ sadā 
MSS ahiṃsāpūrvako dharmo yasmāt sarvahite rataḥ 
MSS yūkāmatkuṇadaṃśādīṃs tasmāt tānapi rakṣayet 
MSS ahiṃsā prathamaṃ puṣpaṃ dvitīyendriyanigraham 
MSS tṛtīyaṃ tu dayā puṣpaṃ turīyaṃ dānapuṣpakam 
MSS ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ tyāgo maithunavarjanam 
MSS pañcasveteṣu vākyeṣu sarve dharmāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryaparigrahaḥ 
MSS iṣṭāniṣṭaparā cintā yama eṣa prakīrtitaḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ 
MSS etaṃ sāmāsikaṃ dharmaṃ cāturvarṇye'bravīnmanuḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ 
MSS dānaṃ damo dayā kṣāntiḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam 
MSS ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtānukampanam 
MSS śamo dānaṃ yathāśakti gārhasthyo dharma uttamaḥ 
MSS ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam 
MSS kṣamā caivāpramādaśca yasyaite sa sukhī bhavet 
MSS ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā 
MSS etat tapo vidurdhīrā na śarīrasya śoṣaṇam 
MSS ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣamā 
MSS varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate 
MSS ahiṃsāsūnṛtāsteyabrahmākiṃcanatāratam 
MSS supātraṃ munibhiḥ proktaṃ rājadveṣavivarjitam 
MSS ahiṃsrasya tapo'kṣayyam ahiṃsro yajate sadā 
MSS ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā 
MSS ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyājjalpanti ye narāḥ 
MSS avekṣya mantrabāhyāste kartavyāḥ kṛtyadūṣaṇāḥ 
MSS ahitahitavicāraśūnyabuddheḥ śrutisamayairbahubhirbahiṣkṛtasya 
MSS udarabharaṇamātrakevalecchoḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ 
MSS ahitāt pratiṣedhaśca hite cānupravartanam 
MSS vyasane cāparityāgas trividhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam 
MSS ahitādanapatrapastrasann atimātrojjhitabhīranāstikaḥ 
MSS vinayopahitastvayā kutaḥ sadṛśo'nyo guṇavānavismayaḥ 
MSS ahituṇḍikadṛṣṭīnām aśeṣā bhoginaḥ padam 
MSS na saṃvartāgnisārathye sthātā yanmukhamārutaḥ 
MSS ahite pratiṣedhaśca hite cānupravartanam 
MSS vyasane cāparityāgas trividhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam 
MSS ahite hitabuddhiralpadhīr avamanyeta matāni mantriṇām 
MSS capalaḥ sahasaiva saṃpatann arikhaṅgābhihataḥ prabudhyate 
MSS ahite hitamicchanti nisargāt sarasāstu ye 
MSS pīḍito'pīkṣudaṇḍo hi rasameva dadātyaram 
MSS ahibhavanavidhānānyāyudhīkṛtya śailān amarajayini sainye rakṣasāmāttakakṣye 
MSS kathamiva raṇabhūmau vartate vānarāṇām upavanataruvallīpallavonmāthi yūtham 
MSS ahibhūṣaṇo'pyabhayadaḥ sukalitahālāhalo'pi yo nityaḥ 
MSS digvasano'pyakhileśas taṃ śaśadharaśekharaṃ vande 
MSS ahiraṇyamadāsīkaṃ gṛhaṃ gorasavarjitam 
MSS pratikūlakalatraṃ ca narakasyāparo vidhiḥ 
MSS ahirahiriti saṃbhramapadam itarajanaḥ kimapi kātaro bhavatu 
MSS vihagapaterāhāraḥ sa tu saralamṛṇāladalaruciraḥ 
MSS ahirājaḥ puruṣe'smin dhūmrā dhātrī kulatthavarṇo'śmā 
MSS māhendrī vahati śirā bhavati saphenaṃ sadā toyam 
MSS ahiripupatikāntātātasaṃbaddhakāntā haratanayanihantṛprāṇadātṛdhvajasya 
MSS sakhisutasutakāntātātasampūjyakāntā pitṛśirasi patantī jāhnavī naḥ punātu 
MSS ahiriva janayogaṃ sarvadā varjayed yaḥ kuṇamiva vasu nārīṃ tyaktakāmo virāgī 
MSS viṣamiva viṣayārthān manyamāno durantāñ jayati paramahaṃso muktibhāvaṃ sameti 
MSS ahirbiḍālo jāmātā eḍakā ca saputriṇī 
MSS ātmabhāgyaṃ na paśyanti bhāgineyastu pañcamaḥ 
MSS ahīnakālaṃ rājārthaṃ svārthaṃ priyahitaiḥ saha 
MSS parārthaṃ deśakāle ca brūyād dharmārthasaṃhitam 
MSS ahīnabhujagādhīśavapurvalayakaṅkaṇam 
MSS śailādinandicaritaṃ kṣatakandarpadarpakam 
MSS vṛṣapuṃgavalakṣmāṇaṃ śikhipāvakalocanam 
MSS sasarvamaṅgalaṃ naumi pārvatīsakhamīśvaram 
MSS ahīndrān pātālād viṣamiva nimajjyoddharati yaḥ ya āruhya svargaṃ kavalayati sendrān suragaṇān 
MSS mahīṃ bhrāntvā bhrāntvā raghunalanṛpā yena vijitāḥ sa mṛtyuḥ kālaṃ na kṣamata iti mā kārṣṭa manasi 
MSS ahṛtahṛdayāḥ santaḥ satyaṃ bravīmi niśamyatāṃ vipinamadhunā gatvā vāso mṛgaiḥ saha kalpyatām 
MSS sujanacaritadhvaṃsinyasmin khalodayaśālini prabhavati kalau nāyaṃ kālo gṛheṣu bhavādṛśām 
MSS ahetuḥ pakṣapāto yas tasya nāsti pratikriyā 
MSS sa hi snehātmakastantur antarbhūtāni sīvyati 
MSS ahetu bhrūkuṭiṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ 
MSS vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyān rājā dharmeṇa pālayet 
MSS aheriva guṇādbhīto miṣṭānnādyā viṣādiva 
MSS rākṣasībhya iva strībhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati 
MSS aho anaucitīyaṃ te hṛdi śuddhe'pyaśuddhavat 
MSS aṅkaḥ khalairivākalpi nakhaistīkṣṇamukhairmama 
MSS aho ahaṃ namo mahyaṃ yadahaṃ vīkṣito'nayā 
MSS bālayā trastasāraṅgacapalāyatanetrayā 
MSS aho ahīnāmapi lehanaṃ syād duḥkhāni nūnaṃ nṛpasevanāni 
MSS eko'hinā daṣṭamupaiti mṛtyuṃ kṣmāpena daṣṭastu sagotramitraḥ 
MSS aho ahobhirna kalervidūyate sudhāsudhārāmadhuraṃ pade pade 
MSS dine dine candanacandraśītalaṃ yaśo yaśo dātanayasya gīyate 
MSS aho ahobhirmahimā himāgame 'pyabhiprapede prati tāṃ smarārditām 
MSS tapartupūrtāvapi medasāṃ bharā vibhāvarībhirvibharāṃbabhūvire 
MSS aho aiśvaryamattānāṃ mattānāmiva māninām 
MSS asaṃbaddhā giro rūkṣāḥ kaḥ sahetānuśāsitā 
MSS aho kathamasīmedaṃ himanāma vijṛmbhate 
MSS caratyeva sahasrāṃśau dhavalaṃ timirāntaram 
MSS aho kanakamāhātmyaṃ vaktuṃ kenāpi śakyate 
MSS nāmasāmyādaho citraṃ dhattūro'pi madapradaḥ 
MSS aho kālasya sūkṣmo'yaṃ ko'pyalakṣyakramaḥ kramaḥ 
MSS yatpākapariṇāmena sarvaṃ yātyanyarūpatām 
MSS aho kimapi te śuddhaṃ yaśaḥkusumamudgatam 
MSS yasyāyamamṛtasyandī bālendurbāhyapallavaḥ 
MSS aho kuṭilabuddhīnāṃ durgrāhyamasatāṃ manaḥ 
MSS anyadvacasi kaṇṭhe'nyad anyadoṣṭhapuṭe sthitam 
MSS aho kenedṛśī buddhir dāruṇā tava nirmitā 
MSS triguṇā śrūyate buddhir na tu dārumayī kvacit 
MSS aho khalabhujaṃgasya vicitro'yaṃ vadhakramaḥ 
MSS anyasya daśati śrotram anyaḥ prāṇairviyujyate 
MSS aho khalabhujaṃgasya viparīto vadhakramaḥ 
MSS karṇe lagati cānyasya prāṇairanyo viyujyate 
MSS aho guṇāḥ saumyatā ca vidvattā janma satkule 
MSS dāridryāmbudhimagnasya sarvametanna śobhate 
MSS aho guṇānāṃ prāptyarthaṃ yatante bahudhā naraḥ 
MSS muktā yadarthaṃ bhagnāsyā itareṣāṃ ca kā kathā 
MSS aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana 
MSS rājā cenna bhavelloke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī 
MSS aho'tinirmohi janasya citraṃ paraṃ caritraṃ gadituṃ na yogyam 
MSS mukhe hi cānyaddhṛdi bhāvamanyat devo na jānāti kuto manuṣyaḥ 
MSS aho'tibalavaddaivaṃ vinā tena mahātmanā 
MSS yadasāmarthyayukte'pi nīcavarge jayapradam 
MSS aho tṛṣṇāveśyā sakalajanatāmohanakarī vidagdhā mugdhānāṃ harati vivaśānāṃ śamadhanam 
MSS vipaddīkṣādakṣāsahataralatāraiḥ praṇayinī kaṭākṣaiḥ kūṭākṣaiḥ kapaṭakuṭilaiḥ kāmakitavaḥ 
MSS aho dānamaho vīryam aho dhairyamakhaṇḍitam 
MSS udāravīradhīrāṇāṃ hariścandro nidarśanam 
MSS aho divyaṃ cakṣurvahasi tava sāpi praṇayinī parākṣṇāmagrāhyaṃ yuvatiṣu vapuḥ saṃkramayati 
MSS samānābhijñānaṃ kathamitarathā paśyati puro bhavānekastasyāḥ pratikṛtimayīreva ramaṇīḥ 
MSS aho duḥkhamahoduḥkhamaho duḥkhaṃ daridratā 
MSS tatrāpi putrabhāryāṇāṃ bāhulyamatiduḥkhadam 
MSS aho durantā jagato vimūḍhatā vilokyatāṃ saṃsṛtiduḥkhadāyinī 
MSS susādhyamapyannavidhānatastapo yato jano duḥkhakaro'vamanyate 
MSS aho durantā saṃsāre bhogatṛṣṇā yayā hṛtāḥ 
MSS anaucityādakīrteśca devā api na bibhyati 
MSS aho durjasaṃsargān mānahāniḥ pade pade 
MSS pāvako lohasaṅgena mudgarairabhihanyate 
MSS aho durjanasarpasya sarpasya mahadantaram 
MSS karṇamanyasya daśati anyaḥ prāṇairviyujyate 
MSS aho dainyamaho kaṣṭaṃ pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraiḥ 
MSS yannopakuryādasvārthair martyaḥ svajñātivigrahaiḥ 
MSS aho dhanamadāndhastu paśyannapi na paśyati 
MSS yadi paśyatyātmahitaṃ sa paśyati na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS aho dhanānāṃ mahatī vidagdhatā sukhoṣitānāṃ kṛpaṇasya veśmani 
MSS vrajanti na tyāgadaśāṃ na bhogyatāṃ parāṃ ca kāṃcit prathayanti nirvṛtim 
MSS aho dhanuṣi naipuṇyaṃ manmathasya mahātmanaḥ 
MSS śarīramakṣataṃ kṛtvā bhinattyantargataṃ manaḥ 
MSS aho dhātrā puraḥ sṛṣṭaṃ sāhasaṃ tadanu striyaḥ 
MSS naitāsāṃ duṣkaraṃ kiṃcin nisargādiha vidyate 
MSS aho dhārṣṭyamasādhūnāṃ nindatāmanaghāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS muṣṇatāmiva caurāṇāṃ tiṣṭha caureti jalpatām 
MSS aho nakṣatrarājasya sābhimānaṃ viceṣṭitam 
MSS parikṣīṇasya vakratvaṃ saṃpūrṇasya suvṛttatā 
MSS aho nu kaṣṭaṃ satataṃ pravāsam tato'tikaṣṭaḥ paragehavāsaḥ 
MSS kaṣṭādhikā nīcajanasya sevā tato'tikaṣṭā dhanahīnatā ca 
MSS aho nu citraṃ padmotthair baddhāstantubhiradrayaḥ 
MSS avidyamānā yāvidyā tayā sarve vaśīkṛtāḥ 
MSS aho pūrṇaṃ saraḥ spaṣṭam asi nātra vicāraṇā 
MSS luṭhantastvayi yat sarve snānti jātu kathaṃcana 
MSS aho prakṛtisādṛśyaṃ śleṣmaṇo durjanasya ca 
MSS madhuraiḥ kopamāyāti kaṭukair upaśāmyati 
MSS aho pracchāditākāryanaipuṇyaṃ paramaṃ khale 
MSS yattuṣāgnirivānarcir dahannapi na lakṣyate 
MSS aho prabhāvo vāgdevyā yanmātaṃgadivākaraḥ 
MSS śrīharṣasyābhavat sabhyaḥ samo bāṇamayūrayoḥ 
MSS aho pramādī bhagavān prajāpatiḥ kṛśātimadhyā ghaṭitā mṛgekṣaṇā 
MSS yadi pramādādanilena bhajyate kathaṃ punaḥ śakṣyati kartumīdṛśam 
MSS aho bata khalaḥ puṇyair mūrkho'pyaśrutapaṇḍitaḥ 
MSS svaguṇodīraṇe śeṣaḥ paranindāsu vākpatiḥ 
MSS aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītamidaṃ jagat 
MSS yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhustena tuṣyati 
MSS aho bata vicitrāṇi caritāni mahātmanām 
MSS lakṣmīṃ tṛṇāya manyante tadbhāreṇa namanti ca 
MSS aho bata sabhā sabhyair iyaṃ maunādadhaḥ kṛtā 
MSS santo vadanti yatsatyaṃ sabhāṃ na praviśanti vā 
MSS aho bata saritpateridamanāryarūpaṃ paraṃ yadujjvalarucīn maṇīn suciracarcitāsthāguṇān 
MSS jaḍairanupayogibhiḥ parata etya labdhāspadaiḥ kṣapatyaniśamūrjitairjhagiti tanmayatvaṃ gataḥ 
MSS aho bāṇasya saṃdhānaṃ śaradi smarabhūpateḥ 
MSS api so'yaṃ tviṣāmīśaḥ kanyārāśimupāgataḥ 
MSS aho brahmaṇyadevasya dṛṣṭā brahmaṇyatā mayā 
MSS yaddaridratamo lakṣmīm āśliṣṭo bibhratorasi 
MSS aho bhavati sādṛśyaṃ mṛdaṅgasya ca khalasya ca 
MSS yāvanmukhagatau tau hi tāvanmadhurabhāṣiṇau 
MSS aho bhāryā aho putraḥ aho ātmā aho sukham 
MSS aho mātā aho bhrātā paśya māyāvimohitam 
MSS aho bhuvaḥ saptasamudravatyā dvīpeṣu varṣeṣvadhipuṇyametat 
MSS gāyanti yatratyajanā murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇyavatāravanti 
MSS aho madāvalepo'yam asārāṇāṃ durātmanām 
MSS kauravāṇāṃ mahīpatvam asmākaṃ kila kālajam 
MSS aho mahaccitramidaṃ kālagatyā duratyayā 
MSS ārurukṣatyupānadvai śiro mukuṭasevitam 
MSS aho mahattvaṃ mahatāmapūrvaṃ vipattikāle'pi paropakāraḥ 
MSS yathāsyamadhye patito'pi rāhoḥ kalānidhiḥ puṇyacayaṃ dadāti 
MSS aho mahīyasāṃ puṃsām uparyupari pauruṣam 
MSS rāmeṇājagavaṃ śaṃbhor bhagnamambhojanālavat 
MSS aho māyājālaṃ hṛdayahariṇo yatra patitaḥ samutthātuṃ bhūyaḥ prabhavati na kiṃcit kathamapi 
MSS na cet tasya cchettā paramaguruvākyopanamito nijātmajñānākhurvividhadṛḍhasadyuktidaśanaiḥ 
MSS aho māyābalaṃ viṣṇoḥ snehabaddhamidaṃ jagat 
MSS kva deho bhautiko'nātmā kva cātmā prakṛteḥ paraḥ 
MSS kasya ke patiputrādyā moha eva hi kāraṇam 
MSS aho me saubhāgyaṃ mama ca bhavabhūteśca bhaṇitaṃ ghaṭāyāmāropya pratiphalati tasyāṃ laghimani 
MSS girāṃ devī sadyaḥ śrutikalitakalhārakalikā madhūlīmādhuryaṃ kṣipati paripūrtyai bhagavatī 
MSS aho mohaḥ puṃsāmiha jagati jātiḥ kila śubhā jarāmṛtyuvyādhīnapi jayati yā niṣprabhatayā 
MSS parasmājjātānāṃ vyasanaśatamete'pi dadhati svayaṃ sutvā tebhyo vidiśati sutān sā viśasitum 
MSS aho moho varākasya kākasya yadasau puraḥ 
MSS sarīsarti narīnarti yadayaṃ śikhihaṃsayoḥ 
MSS aho yeṣāṃ varaṃ janma sarvaprāṇyupajīvanam 
MSS sujanasyeva yeṣāṃ vai vimukhā yānti nārthinaḥ 
MSS aho raghuśiromaṇerabhinavapratāpāvali pracaṇḍakiraṇaprathāprasarasādhvasādāśvayam 
MSS surādhipatirambudān kamalamindirā sevate himāṃśurapi candramāḥ satatamambhudhau majjati 
MSS ahorātramaye loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaran 
MSS mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā 
MSS ahorātrāṇi gacchanti sarveṣāṃ prāṇināmiha 
MSS āyūṃṣi kṣapayantyāśu grīṣme jalamivāṃśavaḥ 
MSS ahorātre vibhajate sūryo mānuṣadaivike 
MSS rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇāmahaḥ 
MSS aho rūpamaho rūpam aho mukhamaho mukham 
MSS aho madhyamaho madhyam asyāḥ sāraṅgacakṣuṣaḥ 
MSS aho vidhātastvamatīva bāliśo yastvātmasṛṣṭyapratirūpamīhase 
MSS pare'nujīvatyaparasya yā mṛtir viparyayaścettvamasi dhruvaḥ paraḥ 
MSS na hi kramaścediha mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāmastu tadātmakarmabhiḥ 
MSS yaḥ snehapāśo nijasargavṛddhaye svayaṃ kṛtaste tamimaṃ vivṛścasi 
MSS aho vidhātrā hatakena nārthāt kṛto viyogo'pi viyogināṃ naḥ 
MSS rathāṅganāmnāmiva yena sīmā na vidyate nāpi sapakṣavattvam 
MSS aho viśālaṃ bhūpāla bhuvanatritayodaram 
MSS māti mātumaśakyo'pi yaśorāśiryadatra te 
MSS aho viṣādapyadhikāḥ striyo raktavimānitāḥ 
MSS aho asevyāḥ sādhūnāṃ rājāno'tattvadarśinaḥ 
MSS aho vaicitryametasya saṃsārasya kimucyate 
MSS guṇo'pi kleśahetuḥ syād viśrāntaḥ kaṇṭhakandale 
MSS aho saṃsāravairasyaṃ vairasyakāraṇaṃ striyaḥ 
MSS dolālolā ca kamalā rogābhogagehaṃ deham 
MSS aho saṃsṛtiveśyeyaṃ rāgādyuddīpanodyatā 
MSS rasamutpādya sarveṣām ante vairasyakāriṇī 
MSS aho satsaṃgatirloke kiṃ pāpaṃ na vināśayet 
MSS na dadāti sukhaṃ kiṃ vā narāṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām 
MSS aho samudragambhīradhīracittamanasvinaḥ 
MSS kṛtvāpyananyasāmānyam ullekhaṃ nodgiranti ye 
MSS aho sāhajikaṃ prema dūrādapi virājate

MSS ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam 
MSS ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ na satyād vidyate param 
MSS ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ mataḥ 
MSS tasmād rājānṛśaṃsyena pālayet kṛpaṇaṃ janam 
MSS ānṛśaṃsyamanukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ 
MSS rāghavaṃ śobhayantyete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam 
MSS ānetuṃ na gatā kimu priyasakhī bhīto bhujaṅgāt kimu kruddho vā pratiṣedhavāci kimasau prāṇeśvaro vartate 
MSS itthaṃ karṇasuvarṇaketakarajaḥpātopaghātacchalād akṣṇoḥ kāpi navoḍhanīrajamukhī bāṣpodakaṃ muñcati 
MSS āntaramapi bahiriva hi vyañjayituṃ rasamaśeṣataḥ satatam 
MSS asatī satkavisūktiḥ kācaghaṭīti trayaṃ veda 
MSS āntare caiva bāhye ca rājā yaścaiva sarvadā 
MSS ādiṣṭo naiva kampeta sa rājavasatiṃ vaset 
MSS āntarebhyaḥ parān rakṣet parebhyaḥ punarāntarān 
MSS parān parebhyaḥ svān svebhyaḥ sarvān rakṣeta sarvadā 
MSS āndolanairmadvapuṣā lagantīṃ smarāmi veṇīṃ puruṣāyitāyāḥ 
MSS samācarantyāḥ suratopadeśaṃ tasyāḥ kaśāvallimiva priyāyāḥ 
MSS āndolayan girinikuñjakarañjarājīr nājīgaṇaḥ kalabha kaṃcana pauruṣeṇa 
MSS īṣatsamunmiṣitalocanakoṇa eva kaṇṭhīrave kimiti jīvitamujjahāsi 
MSS āndolayantī vapurāyatākṣī hindolikāyāṃ kanakāṅgayaṣṭiḥ 
MSS atarki lokairgaganāntarasthā svardevatevākhilarūparamyā 
MSS āndolayasyavirataṃ gaganārkamaṅke tārāgaṇaṃ ca śaśinaṃ ca tathetarāṇi 
MSS tejāṃsi bhāsurataḍitprabhṛtīni sādho citraṃ tathāpi na jahāsi yadāndhyamantaḥ 
MSS āndolalolakeśīṃ calakāñcīkiṅkiṇīgaṇakvaṇitām 
MSS smarasi puruṣāyitāṃ tāṃ smaracāmaracihnayaṣṭimiva 
MSS āndhratvamāndhrabhāṣā ca prābhākarapariśramaḥ 
MSS tatrāpi yājuṣī śākhā nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam 
MSS āndhrī prītinibandhanaikanipuṇā lāṭī vidagdhapriyā karṇāṭī suratopacāracaturā nārī śuciścolikā 
MSS ābhīrī puruṣāyitapriyaratā lajjānvitā gūrjarī kāśmīrī ratilālasā nidhuvane dhṛṣṭā mahārāṣṭrakī 
MSS ānvīkṣikīṃ trayīṃ vārtāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca pārthivaḥ 
MSS tadvidyaistatkriyopetaiś cintayed vinayānvitaḥ 
MSS ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiśca śāśvatī 
MSS vidyāścatasra evaitā lokasaṃsthitihetavaḥ  
MSS ānvīkṣikyātmavijñānaṃ dharmādharmau trayīsthitau 
MSS arthānarthau tu vārtāyāṃ daṇḍanītyāṃ nayetarau 
MSS ānvīkṣikītrayīvārtāḥ satīrvidyāḥ pracakṣate 
MSS satyo'pi hi na satyastā daṇḍanītestu viplave 
MSS daṇḍanītiryadā samyaṅ netāramadhitiṣṭhati 
MSS tadā vidyāvidaḥ śeṣā vidyāḥ samyagupāsate  
MSS ānvīkṣikyātmavidyā syād īkṣaṇāt sukhaduḥkhayoḥ 
MSS īkṣamāṇas tayā tattvaṃ harṣaśokau vyudasyati 
MSS ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiśca śāśvatī 
MSS vidyāścatasra evaitā abhyased nṛpatiḥ sadā 
MSS ānvīkṣikyāṃ tarkaśāstraṃ vedāntādyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam 
MSS trayyāṃ dharmo hyadharmaśca kāmo'kāmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ 
MSS ānvīkṣikyātmavijñānād harṣaśokau vyudasyati 
MSS ubhau lokāvavāpnoti trayyāṃ tiṣṭhan yathāvidhi 
MSS āpah pavitraṃ prathamaṃ pṛthivyām apāṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ ca mantrāḥ 
MSS teṣāṃ ca sāmargyajuṣāṃ pavitraṃ maharṣayo vyākaraṇaṃ nirāhuḥ 
MSS āpajjalanimagnānāṃ hriyatāṃ vyasanormibhiḥ 
MSS vṛddhavākyairvinā nūnaṃ naivottāraṃ kathaṃcana 
MSS āpatkāle tu saṃprāpte yan mitraṃ mitrameva tat 
MSS vṛddhikāle tu saṃprāpte durjano'pi suhṛd bhavet 
MSS āpatkāle nṛṇāṃ nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ naiva labhyate 
MSS āpatkālopayuktāsu kalāsu syāt kṛtaśramaḥ 
MSS nṛtyavṛttirvirāṭasya kirīṭī bhavane'bhavat 
MSS āpat tulā sahāyānām ātmanaḥ pauruṣasya ca 
MSS anāpadi suhṛt sarvaḥ svayaṃ ca puruṣāyate 
MSS āpattau patitānāṃ yeṣāṃ vṛddhā na santi śāstāraḥ 
MSS te śocyā bandhūnāṃ jīvanto'pīha mṛtatulyāḥ 
MSS āpatsamuddharaṇadhīradhiyaḥ pareṣāṃ jātā mahatyapi kule na bhavanti sarve 
MSS vindhyāṭavīṣu viralāḥ khalu pādapāste ye dantidantamusalollikhanaṃ sahante 
MSS āpatsu kiṃ viṣādena saṃpattau vismayena kim 
MSS bhavitavyaṃ bhavatyeva karmaṇāmeṣa niścayaḥ 
MSS āpatsu ca na muhyanti narāḥ paṇditabuddhayaḥ 
MSS manodehasamutthābhyāṃ duḥkhābhyāmarpitaṃ jagat 
MSS āpatsu mitraṃ jānīyād raṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim 
MSS bhāryāṃ ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim 
MSS āpatsvamūḍho dhṛtimān yah samyak pratipadyate 
MSS karmaṇyavaśyakāryāṇi tamāhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ 
MSS āpatsveva hi mahatāṃ śaktirabhivyajyate na saṃpatsu 
MSS aguros tathā na gandhaḥ prāgasti yathāgnipatitasya 
MSS āpadaṃ pratariṣyāmo yūyaṃ yuktyā vadiṣyatha 
MSS bhavanto mama mitrāṇi bhavatsu nāsti bhṛtyatā 
MSS āpadaṃ prāpnuyāt svāmī yasya bhṛtyasya paśyataḥ 
MSS prāṇeṣu vidyamāneṣu sa bhṛtyo narakaṃ vrajet 
MSS āpadaḥ kṣaṇamāyānti saṃpadaḥ kṣaṇameva ca 
MSS kṣaṇaṃ janmātha maraṇaṃ mune kimiva na kṣaṇam 
MSS āpadaḥ santi mahatāṃ mahatāmeva saṃpadaḥ 
MSS itareṣāṃ manuṣyāṇaṃ nāpado na ca saṃpadaḥ 
MSS āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣec śrīmatāṃ kuta āpadaḥ 
MSS kadāciccalate lakṣmīḥ saṃcitaṃ ca vinaśyati 
MSS āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanairapi 
MSS ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārairapi dhanairapi 
MSS āpadāṃ kathitaḥ panthā indriyāṇāmasaṃyamaḥ 
MSS tajjayaḥ saṃpadāṃ mārgo yeneṣṭaṃ tena gamyatām 
MSS āpadāmatha kāle tu kurvīta na vicālayet 
MSS aśaknuvaṃśca yuddhāya niṣpatet saha mantribhiḥ 
MSS āpadāmapahartāraṃ dātāraṃ sarvasaṃpadām 
MSS lokābhirāmaṃ śrīrāmaṃ bhūyo bhūyo namāmyaham 
MSS āpadāmāgamaṃ dṛṣṭvā na viṣaṇṇo bhaved vaśī 
MSS saṃpadaṃ ca suvistīrṇāṃ prāpya no'dhṛtimān bhavet 
MSS āpadāmāpatantīnāṃ hito'pyāyāti hetutām 
MSS mātṛjaṅghā hi vatsasya stambhībhavati bandhane 
MSS āpadāsthitapanthānām indriyāṇāmasaṃyamāt 
MSS tyajyate saṃpadāṃ mārgo yo neṣṭastena paśyata 
MSS āpadi mitraparīkṣā śūraparīkṣā raṇāṅgaṇe bhavati 
MSS vinaye vaṃśaparīkṣā striyaḥ parīkṣā tu nirdhane puṃsi 
MSS āpadi yenopakṛtaṃ yena ca hasitaṃ daśāsu viṣamāsu 
MSS upakṛtya tayorubhayoḥ punarapi jātaṃ naraṃ manye 
MSS āpado mahatāmeva mahatāmeva saṃpadaḥ 
MSS kṣīyate vardhate candraḥ kadācin naiva tārakāḥ 
MSS āpadgataṃ hasasi kiṃ draviṇāndha mūḍha lakṣmīḥ sthirā na bhavatīti kimatra citram 
MSS kiṃ tvaṃ na paśyasi na ghaṭīrjalayantracakre riktā bhavanti bharitāḥ punareva riktāḥ

MSS āpadgrāhagṛhītānāṃ vṛddhāḥ santi na paṇḍitāḥ 
MSS yeṣāṃ mokṣayitāro vai teṣāṃ śāntirna vidyate

MSS āpadyunmārgagamane kāryakālātyayeṣu ca

MSS āhaveṣu mitho'nyonyaṃ jighāṃsanto mahīkṣitaḥ 
MSS yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yāntyaparāṅmukhāḥ 
MSS āha smaiṣā nalādanyaṃ na juṣe manaseti yat 
MSS yauvanānumitenāsyās tanmṛṣābhūn manobhuvā 
MSS āhāraṃ prati yat kathāpi śamitā yan maunamudrā mukhe yac cakṣurvinimīlanaṃ tanulatā yat tānave vartate 
MSS ekānte yadavasthitiryadapi ca dhyānaikatānaṃ manas tan manye subhaga tvadarthamanayā tapyeta tīvraṃ tapaḥ 
MSS āhāraḥ phalamūlamātmarucitaṃ śayyā mahī valkalaṃ saṃvītāya paricchadaḥ kuśasamitpuṣpāṇi putrā mṛgāḥ 
MSS vastrānnāśrayadānabhogavibhavā niryantraṇāḥ śākhino mitrāṇītyadhikaṃ gṛheṣu gṛhiṇāṃ kiṃ nāma duḥkhādṛte 
MSS āhāradoṣāya ca kākadīti syādākuṭāni dhvanitaṃ raṇāya 
MSS kekedhvaniṣṭhā kuvatī kikī ca trayaṃ tvidaṃ syāt puradūṣaṇāya

MSS āhāranirhāravihārayogāḥ susaṃvṛtā dharmavidā tu kāryāḥ

MSS bhujyante yat sa bhogaśca tanmataḥ sādhusattamaiḥ

MSS tasyāpi tasmād duritānuṣaṅgam ityāha yas taṃ prati vacmi kiṃcit

MSS āhārārthaṃ karma kuryādanindyaṃ kuryāt taṃ ca prāṇasaṃdhāraṇārtham 
MSS prāṇā dhāryās tattvavijñānahetos tattvaṃ jñeyaṃ yena bhūyo na janma 
MSS āhāre ca bhaved rogī naṣṭo garbhaśca maithune 
MSS nidrāyāṃ hriyate lakṣmīś cintāyāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvam

MSS āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sukhī bhavet
