MSS itastataś caṅkramaṇo rajobhiḥ krīḍanmanomattamataṅgajo'yam 
MSS yaḥ sarvadā pippalabhogatuṣṭas tacchāntaye tvaṃ harimāśrayasva 
MSS itastato bhaṣan bhūri na patet piśunaḥ śunaḥ 
MSS avadātatayā kiṃ ca na bhedo haṃsataḥ sataḥ 
MSS itastato vātavidhūticañcalair nīrandhritāśāgaganairdhvajāṃśukaiḥ 
MSS lakṣaiḥ kvaṇatkāñcanakiṅkiṇīkulair amajji dhūlījaladhau nabhogate 
MSS itastato vānti viśiṣya yasyāṃ vātāḥ śakṛdveśmavihāravisrāḥ 
MSS sā varṇyate rauravarājadhānī kena pratolī manasāpyagamyā 
MSS itastato'smin vilasanti meroḥ samānavapre maṇisānurāgāḥ 
MSS striyaśca patyau surasundarībhiḥ samā navapremaṇi sānurāgāḥ 
MSS itastāvan netre valaya malayādre nidhirapām apārastvatpādapraṇayaparatantro nivasati 
MSS athātmānaṃ kiṃ na smarasi kulaśailaṃ kimayaśaḥ patākā sarpaughaiḥ pratiśikhariśākhāsu vahasi 
MSS itas trasadvidrutabhūbhṛdujjhitā priyātha dṛṣṭā vanamānavījanaiḥ 
MSS śaśaṃsa pṛṣṭādbhutamātmadeśajaṃ śaśitviṣaḥ śītalaśīlatāṃ kila 
MSS iti kṛtavacanāyāḥ kaścidabhyetya bibhyad galitanayanavāreryāti pādāvanāmam 
MSS karuṇamapi samarthaṃ mānināṃ mānabhede ruditamuditamastraṃ yoṣitāṃ vigraheṣu 
MSS iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ 
MSS samārurukṣurdivamāyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopānaparaṃparāmiva 
MSS iti gadantamanantaramaṅganā bhujayugonnamanoccatarastanī 
MSS praṇayinaṃ rabhasādudaraśriyā valibhayālibhayādiva sasvaje 
MSS iti gaditavatī ruṣā jaghāna sphuritamanoramapakṣmakeśareṇa 
MSS śravaṇaniyamitena kāntamanyā samamasitāmburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca 
MSS iti gantumicchumabhidhāya puraḥ kṣaṇadṛṣṭipātavikasadvadanām 
MSS svakarāvalambanavimuktagalat kalakāñci kāṃcidaruṇat taruṇaḥ 
MSS iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idamuktaṃ mayānagha 
MSS etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaśca bhārata 
MSS iti jagati na rakṣituṃ samarthaḥ kvacidapi kaścidapi prasahya nārīm 
MSS avati tu satataṃ viśuddha ekaḥ kulayuvatīṃ nijasattvapāśabandhaḥ 
MSS evaṃ cerṣyā nāma duḥkhaikahetur moghaḥ puṃsāṃ dveṣadāyī pareṣām 
MSS yo'yaṃ mā bhūd rakṣaṇāyāṅganānām atyautsukyaṃ pratyutāsāṃ tanoti 
MSS iti tattvadhiyaḥ paricintya budhāḥ sakalasya janasya vinaśvaratām 
MSS na manāgapi cetasi saṃdadhate śucamaṅgayaśaḥsukhanāśakarām 
MSS iti deva bhavatyudārasattvo dṛḍhabhaktaśca vilāsinījano'pi 
MSS avarodhasamo mahīpatīnāṃ kimutānyaḥ kulajaḥ purandhrilokaḥ 
MSS iti deva sadaiva hāsyabhāvaṃ paribhāve ca janasya nindyatāṃ ca 
MSS vipadāspadatāṃ ca yānti mūḍhā iha santas tu bhavanti pūjanīyāḥ 
MSS iti dvikṛtvaḥ śucimṛṣṭabhojināṃ dināni teṣāṃ katicin mudā yayuḥ 
MSS dviraṣṭasaṃvatsaravārasundarī parīṣṭibhis tuṣṭimupeyuṣāṃ niśi 
MSS iti dharmatarormūlam aśuddhaṃ yasya mānasam 
MSS śuddhaṃ yasya ca tadrūpaṃ phalaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS iti nikhilamudāramarthasārtha praṇihitamekamiheva khaḍgaśāstre 
MSS giriśamatamidaṃ niṣevya cakre kṣitipatimantrisamūhacakravartī 
MSS iti netrādivikārair vaśamupanītaṃ pralīnadhairyāṅgam 
MSS māragrahābhibhūtaṃ parimṛṣṭaprāṅnirākṛtismaraṇam 
MSS prādurbhūtariraṃsaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jaghanadeśagatadṛṣṭim 
MSS pakvāmramiva vimokṣyasi pūrvavadācūṣya niḥśeṣam 
MSS iti pathi viniveśitātmano ripurapi gacchati sādhu mitratām 
MSS tadavanipatimatsarādṛte vinayaguṇena jagad vaśaṃ nayet 
MSS iti parigaṇitārthaḥ śāstramārgānusārī niyamayati yatātmā yaḥ prajā daṇḍanītyā 
MSS apunarapagamāya prāptamārgapracārā sarita iva samudraṃ saṃpadastaṃ viśanti 
MSS iti pariṇayamitthaṃ yānamekatra yāne daracakitakaṭākṣaprekṣaṇaṃ cānayos tatat 
MSS divi diviṣadadhīśāḥ kautukenāvalokya praṇidadhuriva gantuṃ nākamānandasāndrāḥ 
MSS iti pūrvakarmaniyataṃ bhavitavyaṃ jagati yasya jantoryat 
MSS tadayatnena sa purataḥ patitaṃ prāpnotyasādhyamapi 
MSS iti prakupitoragapramukhabhaṅgurāṃ sarvadā nidhāya nijacetasi prabaladuḥkhadāṃ saṃsṛtim 
MSS vimuñcata parigrahagrahamanārjavaṃ sajjanā yadīcchata sukhāmṛtaṃ rasitumastasarvāśubham 
MSS iti pravīre subhage ca satyato vivekinīnāmapi deva yoṣitām 
MSS calaṃ mano dhāvati yatra kutracid viśuddhasattvā viralāḥ punaḥ striyaḥ 
MSS iti priye pṛcchati mānavihvalā kathaṃcidantardhṛtabāṣpagadgadam 
MSS na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yad vadhūḥ kiyan na tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam 
MSS iti bahubhirupāyaiḥ kuṭṭanī kāmukānāṃ kṛtasukṛtavihīnā vañcanāṃ sā kṛtaghnā  
MSS vanabhuvi mṛgabandhaṃ hanta paśyanti nityaṃ tadapi hariṇaśāvāḥ kūṭapāśaṃ viśanti 
MSS iti madamadanābhyāṃ rāgiṇaḥ spaṣṭarāgān anavaratarataśrīsaṅginas tānavekṣya 
MSS abhajata parivṛttiṃ sātha paryastahastā rajaniravanatendurlajjayādhomukhīva 
MSS iti muṣitadhiyaḥ śriyā prayāntyā rabhasavaśādavicintya dagdhabhūpāḥ 
MSS balabharabahumānataḥ pataṅga vratamupayānti parapratāpadīpe 
MSS iti yasmādubhau lokau dhārayatyātmavān nṛpaḥ 
MSS prajānāṃ ca tataḥ samyag daṇḍaṃ daṇḍīva dhārayet 
MSS iti ratisamayopadeśayuktyā ratagurudarśitayā puraṃdhrilokaḥ 
MSS nijaparaparabhāgavṛttimaujjhīt smaraparamādvayabhūmikānilīnaḥ 
MSS iti rājaguṇānetān yathoktān yo'nutiṣṭhati 
MSS anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi pretya svarge mahīyate 
MSS iti rājyakalatramitraputrān gṛhadhāmaṃ ca tṛṇāya manyamānaḥ 
MSS gurusattvarajastamaḥ kalaṅkāṃ prakṛtiṃ hātumagād vanaṃ narendraḥ 
MSS iti vacanaṃ bhūmipateḥ śrutvā mantrī vihasya sāsūyaḥ 
MSS tamuvāca kasya rājan veśyācarite'sti viśvāsaḥ 
MSS iti vadati sakhījane nimīlad dviguṇitasāndratarākṣipakṣmamālā 
MSS apatadalibhayena bharturaṅkaṃ bhavati hi viklavatā guṇo'ṅganānām 
MSS iti vadati sakhījane'nurāgād dayitatamāmaparaś ciraṃ pratīkṣya 
MSS tadanugamavaśādanāyatāni nyadhita mimāna ivāvanīṃ padāni 
MSS iti viracitabandhā paddhatiryā mayeyaṃ sakalaguṇigaṇānāṃ prītaye sāstu nityam 
MSS vipulavimaladīvyatsatkalānāṃ nidhānaṃ taruṇataraṇiruddhā vidviṣatkauśikānām 
MSS iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ dharādhipam 
MSS parivṛddharāgamanubandhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī 
MSS iti śāsati senānyāṃ gacchatas tānanekadhā 
MSS niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcit tasthe tatrāndhakāriṇā 
MSS iti saṃsāraduḥkhārkatāpatāpitacetasām 
MSS vimuktipādapacchāyām ṛte kutra sukham nṛṇām 
MSS iti saśarīrayā kṣaṇamiva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan saha viśarīrayā dayitayā virasān divasān 
MSS dinarajanīvihāraviparītamahaṃ caritai rathacaraṇāhvayasya caritāni viḍambitavān 
MSS iti striyo devi mahākulodgatāḥ viśuddhadhīraiś caritairupāsate 
MSS sadaiva bhartāramananyamānasāḥ patiḥ satīnāṃ paramaṃ hi daivatabh 
MSS iti sphuṭaṃ tadvacasastayādarāt suraspṛhāropaviḍambanādapi 
MSS karāṅkasuptaikakapolakarṇayā śrutaṃ ca tadbhāṣitamaśrutaṃ ca tat 
MSS iti smaraḥ śīghramatiś cakāra taṃ vadhūṃ ca romāñcabhareṇa karkaśau 
MSS skhaliṣyati snigdhatanuḥ priyādiyaṃ mradīyasī pīḍanabhīrudoryugāt 
MSS iti sma rājā nayavartmanā vrajan samudyamī maṇḍalaśuddhimācaret 
MSS virājate sādhu viśuddhamaṇḍalaḥ śaracchaśīva pratirañjayan prajāḥ 
MSS iti sma rājā vinayaṃ nayānvito niṣevamāṇo naradevasevitam 
MSS padaṃ samākrāmati bhāsvaraṃ śriyaḥ śiro mahāratnagirerivonnatam 
MSS itihāsapurāṇāni śṛṇuyāt tadanantaram 
MSS bhuktavān viharec caiva strībhirantaḥpure saha 
MSSA ītihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet 
MSSA bibhetyalpaśrutād vedo māmayaṃ pracariṣyati 
MSS itihāsottamādasmāj jāyante kavibuddhayaḥ 
MSS pañcabhya iva bhūtebhyo lokasaṃvidhayas trayaḥ 
MSS itīrayitvā viratāṃ sa tāṃ punar girānujagrāhatarāṃ narādhipaḥ 
MSS virutya viśrāntavatīṃ tapātyaye ghanāghanaś cātakamaṇḍalīmiva 
MSS itīṣṭamapyaniṣṭāya jāyate'vidhinā kṛtam 
MSS tasmān na vidhimutsṛjya prājñaḥ kurvīta kiṃcana 
MSS aprekṣāpūrvakārī ca nindyate'vadyakṛt kṣaṇāt 
MSS ito gaṅgābhaṅgā ghaṭitataṭabhaṅgā punarito davajvālā jvālājvalitatarumālā vanabhuvaḥ 
MSS saraṃhaḥ siṃho'gre dhvanati mama haṃho na hi gatir vinā daivaṃ daivaṃ hariṇaśiśurevaṃ pralapati 
MSS ito dāvajvālaḥ sthalabhuva ito jālajaṭilā ito vyādho dhāvatyayamanupadaṃ vakritadhanuḥ 
MSS ito'pyagre tiṣṭhatyayamajagaro vistṛtamukhaḥ kva yāyāt kiṃ kuryān mṛgaśiśurayaṃ daivavaśagaḥ 
MSS ito na kiṃcit parato na kiṃcid yato yato yāmi tato na kiṃcit 
MSS vicāryamāṇaṃ hi jagan na kiṃcit svātmāvabodhādadhikaṃ na kiṃcit 
MSS ito bhraṣṭas tato bhraṣṭaḥ paramekāntiveṣabhāk 
MSS na samsārasukhaṃ tasya naiva muktisukhaṃ bhavet 
MSS ito mṛtyurito vyādhir ito vipadito jarā 
MSS caturaṅgā tulyabalā hanti lokamanityatā 
MSS ito vidyutpuñjasphuritamasakṛd bhāvayatu mām itaḥ kekānekā haratu hṛdayaṃ nirdayamidam 
MSS itaḥ kāmo vāmaḥ praharatu muhuḥ puṅkhitaśaro gatāsi tvaṃ dūre capalanayane preyasi yataḥ 
MSS ito vidyudvallīvilasitamitaḥ ketakataru sphuradgandhaḥ prodyajjaladaninadasphūrjitamitaḥ 
MSS itaḥ kekikrīḍākalakalaravaḥ pakṣmaladṛśāṃ kathaṃ yāsyantyete virahadivasāḥ saṃbhṛtarasāḥ 
MSS ito vipinapaṅktayas tilakitā rasālāṅkurair marunmalayabhūritaḥ kalamitaḥ pikīnāṃ rutam 
MSS itaśca navacampakaiḥ surabhitāḥ samantād diśas tadadya mayi tāṃ vinā bhajatu ghasmaratvaṃ smaraḥ 
MSS ito hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyan na vidyate 
MSS yat tu durjana ityāha sajjanaṃ durjanaḥ svayam 
MSS itthaṃ kavikuṭumbasya vacāṃsi vicinoti yaḥ 
MSS aniddhavacanasyāpi tasya vaśyā sarasvatī 
MSS itthaṃ kelitatīrvihṛtya yamunākūle samaṃ rādhayā tadromāvalimauktikāvaliyuge veṇībhramaṃ bibhrati 
MSS tatrāhlādikucaprayāgaphalayorlipsāvatorhastayor vyāpārāḥ puruṣottamasya dadatu sphītaṃ mudāṃ saṃpadam 
MSS itthaṃ kriyāsu nivasantyapi yāsu tāsu puṃsāṃ śriyaḥ prabalasattvabahiṣkṛtāsu 
MSS evaṃ ca sāhasadhaneṣvatha buddhimatsu saṃtuṣya dānaniratāḥ kṣitipā bhavanti 
MSS ityaihikena ca purā vihitena cāpi svenaiva karmavibhavena śubhāśubhena 
MSS śaśvad bhavet tadanurūpavicitrabhogaḥ sarvo hi nāma sasurāsura eṣa sargaḥ 
MSS itthaṃ copārjito yatnād guṇo'pi vidhure vidhau 
MSS saṃpattaye na na paraṃ jāyate tu vipattaye 
MSS mūle hyavikṛte sadā sikte prajñānavāriṇā 
MSS nayālavālaḥ phalati prāyaḥ pauruṣapādapaḥ 
MSS itthaṃ talpatalādhirohaṇamiyaṃ parṇārpaṇaprakriyā śayyāyā vacanakramasya dayitasyaivaṃvidhārādhanā 
MSS evaṃ keligṛhopadehali balādānīyamānā muhuś cāṭūktiprakaraiś ciraṃ navavadhūrālībhiradhyāpyate 
MSSA itthaṃ tena nirīkṣitaṃ na ca mayāpyevaṃ samālokitas tenoktaṃ subhagena tatra na mayā dattaṃ vaco mandayā 
MSSA tatsatyaṃ kathayāli kiṃ sa subhagaḥ kupyen na mahyaṃ gata ityuktvā sudṛśā kayāpi valitagrīvaṃ dṛśau sphārite 
MSS itthaṃ duravadhāryaiva strīcittasya gatiḥ kila 
MSS anyāsaktiṃ ca kurvanti mriyante ca patiṃ vinā 
MSS itthaṃ dharmārjitā lakṣmīr āsaṃtatyanapāyinī 
MSS itarā tu jalāpātatuṣārakaṇanaśvarī 
MSS ato yateta dharmeṇa dhanamarjayituṃ pumān 
MSS rājā tu sutarāṃ yena mūlaṃ rājyatarordhanam 
MSS itthaṃ vṛḍhataravāmita manasāṃ puṃsāmasāṃprataṃ purataḥ 
MSS veśavilāsavatīnām aśarīraśaravyathākathanam 
MSS itthaṃ nārīrghaṭayitumalaṃ kāmibhiḥ kāmamāsan prāleyāṃśoḥ sapadi rucayaḥ śāntamānāntarāyāḥ 
MSS ācāryatvaṃ ratiṣu vilasanmanmamathaśrīvilāsā hrīpratyūhapraśamakuśalāḥ śīdhavaś cakrurāsām 
MSS itthaṃ paśupatipeśala pāśakalīlāprayuktavakrokteḥ 
MSS harṣavaśataralatārakam ānanamavyād bhavānyā vaḥ 
MSS itthaṃ prajñaiva nāmeha pradhānaṃ lokavartanam 
MSS jīvatyarthadaridro'pi dhīdaridro na jīvati 
MSS itthaṃ phalati śuddhena siktaṃ saṃkalpavāriṇā 
MSS puṇyabījamapi svalpaṃ puṃsāṃ kṛṣikṛtāmiva 
MSS tadeva dūṣitaṃ devi duṣṭasaṃkalpapāthasā 
MSS phalatyaniṣṭam     
MSS itthaṃ madhūtthaṃ rasamudgirantī tadoṣṭhabandūkadhanurvisṛṣṭā 
MSS karṇāt prasūnāśugapañcabāṇī vāṇīmiṣeṇāsya mano viveśa 
MSS itthaṃ yuktimupāyānāṃ kurvāṇasya catuṣṭayīm 
MSS vrajatīnduprabhāgauraṃ parairakṣayyatāṃ yaśaḥ 
MSS itthaṃ vihṛtya vanitābhirudasyamānaṃ pīnastanorujaghanasthalaśālinībhiḥ 
MSS utsarpitormicayalaṅghitatīradeśam autsukyanunnamiva vāri puraḥ pratasthe 
MSS itthaṃ sabhāpatirbhūtvā yaḥ kāvyāni parīkṣate 
MSS yaśas tasya jagadvyāpi sa sukhī tatra tatra ca 
MSS itthaṃ samutthavirahānalatīvratāpa saṃtāpitāṅga karipuṅgava muñca śokam 
MSS dhātrā svahastalikhitāni lalāṭapaṭṭe ko vākṣarāṇi parimārjayituṃ samarthaḥ 
MSS itthaṃ subuddhiralpena deva yatnena bodhyate 
MSS na kṛcchreṇāpi mahatā nirvicāramatiḥ punaḥ 
MSS itthaṃ svadurnayavipākavaśena divyāḥ śāpacyutā hyavataranti manuṣyaloke 
MSS bhuktvā phalaṃ taducitaṃ ca nijāṃ gatiṃ te pūrvārjitena sukṛtena punaḥ prayānti 
MSS itthamārādhyamāno'pi kliśnāti bhuvanatrayam 
MSS śāmyet pratyapakāreṇa nopakāreṇa durjanaḥ 
MSS ityaguhyaṃ nigūhante guhyaṃ prakaṭayanti ca 
MSS maurkhyābhimānenādātuṃ mūrkhāḥ pratyayamātmani 
MSS ityaṅgaiḥ saṃyutaḥ sarvair dehino bālakākṛtiḥ 
MSS māturāhārarasato dehe garbho'bhivardhate 
MSS ityajñānatamaśchannāḥ svadoṣonmārgagāminaḥ 
MSS apuraskṛtasacchāstradīpā bhraśyanti niścitam 
MSS ityanarthāya śabdaikaparo tātparyavij jaḍaḥ 
MSS ityanudvegaśīlā ye bhavyā dhairyāvalambanāḥ 
MSS dūrabhraṣṭāmapi nijāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃprāpnuvanti te 
MSS ityanyadupacāreṇa mitramanyat tu satyataḥ 
MSS tulye'pi snigdhatāyoge tailaṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ghṛtam 
MSS ityanyaraktacittā strībhujaṅgī hantyasaṃśayam 
MSS ityabuddhidhanādhānanidhānairvividhodayaiḥ 
MSS kūṭapaṇyairasāmānyais tāruṇyamativāhyate 
MSS ityarthalobhān mithyaiva vijñānakhyāpanecchavaḥ 
MSS mūrkhāḥ putramapi ghnanti na rajyet teṣu buddhimān 
MSS ityākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvāmutkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva 
MSS śroṣyatyasmāt paramavahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃcidūnaḥ 
MSS ityādiguṇasaṃpanne lokayātrāvidi sthire 
MSS nirvṛtaḥ pitarīvāste yatra lokaḥ sa pārthivaḥ 
MSS ityādi dūṣyān saṃdūṣya prajānāmabhivṛddhaye 
MSS vinayañ śriyamutkarṣaṃ rājā śalyaṃ samuddharet 
MSS ityuktavatyā yadalopi lajjā sānaucitī cetasi naś cakāstu 
MSS smaras tu sākṣī tadadoṣatāyām unmādya yas tattadavīvadat tām 
MSS ityudgate śaśini peśalakāntadūtī saṃlāpasaṃcalitalocanamānasābhiḥ 
MSS agrāhi maṇḍanavidhirviparītabhūṣā vinyāsahāsitasakhījanamaṅganābhiḥ 
MSS ityetat tapaso devā mahābhāgyaṃ pracakṣate 
MSS sarvasyāsya prapaśyantas tapasaḥ puṇyamudbhavam 
MSS ityetāḥ kuṭilatarāḥ krūrācārā gatatrapāś capalāḥ 
MSS yo nāma vetti rāmāḥ sa strībhirṇaiva vañcyate matimān 
MSS ityevaṃ bahuhṛdayā bahujihvā bahukarāś ca bahumāyāḥ 
MSS tattvena satyarahitāḥ ko jānāti sphuṭaṃ veśyāḥ 
MSS ityevaṃ yoṣito rājan bhedasya vyasanasya ca 
MSS parābhavasya ca padaṃ sevetāśaṅkito'tha tāḥ 
MSS idaṃ kavivarairnityam ākhyānamupajīvyate 
MSS udayaprepsubhirbhṛtyair abhijāta iveśvaraḥ 
MSS idaṃ kiṃ te nyastaṃ valayini kare vaktrakamalaṃ na yuktaḥ kopo'yaṃ praṇayini nirāgasyapi jane 
MSS bruvāṇe mayyevaṃ śvasanaviṣamotkampitakucaṃ mṛgākṣyās tatkālaṃ nayanajalamevottaramabhūt 
MSS idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapus tapaḥkṣamaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati 
MSS dhruvaṃ sa nīlotpalapatradhārayā samillatāṃ chettumṛṣirvyavasyati 
MSS idaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kāryam idamanyat kṛtākṛtam 
MSS evamīhāsukhāsaktaṃ kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśe 
MSS idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama nanu śvetamatha kiṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenātha bhavatu 
MSS purā yenaivaṃ me ciramanusṛtā cittapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ 
MSS idaṃ ca tvāṃ sarvaparaṃ bravīmi puṇyaṃ padaṃ tāta mahāviśiṣṭam 
MSS na jātu kāmān na bhayān na lobhād dharmaṃ tyajej jīvitasyāpi hetoḥ 
MSS idaṃ jñeyamidaṃ jñeyam iti yas tṛṣitaś caret 
MSS api kalpasahasreṣu naiva jñeyamavāpnuyāt 
MSS idaṃ tat kālindītaṭamiha hi kaṃsāsurabhido yaśaḥ śṛṇvad vaktraṃ skhalitakavalaṃ gokulamabhūt 
MSS bhramād veṇukvāṇapraṇayamasṛṇottāramadhura svarābhirgopībhirdiśi diśi samudgīrṇamaniśam 
MSS idaṃ tat snehasarvasvaṃ samamāḍhyadaridrayoḥ 
MSS acandanamanauśīraṃ hṛdayasyānulepanam 
MSS idaṃ tāvac citraṃ yadavanitale pārvaṇaśaśī kalaṅkādunmuktaḥ kimapi ca tadantarvilasati

MSS idaṃ tad duḥsādhākramaṇaparamāstraṃ smṛtibhuvā tava prītyā cakraṃ karakamalamūle vinihitam 
MSS idaṃ tvihotpātayugaṃ prthivyāṃ mahābhayaṃ śākunikā vadanti 
MSS yad vāyaso maithunasaṃniviṣṭo dṛśyeta yad vā dhavalaḥ kadācit

MSS samākāṅkṣe tāmrādharamanumanuṣva priyatame manojñaṃ te pātuṃ mukhakamalamāghrātumathavā

MSS idaṃ nāsīn na cotpannaṃ na cāsīn na bhaviṣyati 
MSS tat tad brahmaiva sadrūpam idamitthamavasthitam 
MSS idaṃ nṛpaprārthibhirujjhito'rthibhir maṇipraroheṇa vivṛdhya rohaṇaḥ 
MSS kiyaddinairambaramāvariṣyate mudhā munirvindhyamarundha bhūdharam

MSS malino'ntargato yatra kalaṅko bhramarāyate

MSS yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na sajjate tathā pumān sarvaguṇāśrayaḥ paraḥ

MSS mano yadeṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbhave prayāti no harṣaviṣādavaśyatām 
MSS idaṃ hi vaidagdhyarahasyamuttamaṃ paṭhen na sūktiṃ kavimāninaḥ puraḥ 
MSS na kevalaṃ tāṃ na vibhāvayatyasau svakāvyabandhena vināśayatyapi

MSS idānīṃ tu mayā jñātaṃ tyāgān nāsti paraṃ sukham

MSS vidyāvantamanakṣaro dhanapatiṃ nīcaś ca rūpojjvalaṃ vairūpyeṇa hataḥ prabuddhamabudhotkṛṣṭaṃ nikṛṣṭo janaḥ 
MSS induṃ nindati padmakhaṇḍakadalītalpaṃ na vā manyate karpūraṃ kirati prayāti na ratiṃ prāleyadhārāgṛhe

MSS induṃ nindatu nāma vātha nalinīṃ nindantu cakrāhvayā naivānena sudhākarasya suṣamāhānirna vā duryaśaḥ

MSS navīnanīradacchaṭāsamānakeśabhūṣitā na kasyacij janasya cittavṛttitāpakhaṇḍitā 
MSS iyaṃ kiyaccārukuceti paśyate payaḥpradāyā hṛdayaṃ samāvṛtam 
MSS dhruvaṃ manojñā vyataradyaduttaraṃ miṣeṇa bhṛṅgāradhṛteḥ karadvayī 
MSS iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayor asāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahulaś candanarasaḥ 
MSS ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ 
MSS iyaṃ gauruddāmā tava nibiḍabandhāpi hi kathaṃ na vaidarbhādanyat spṛśati sulabhatve'pi hi katham 
MSS avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi kathamagamyā kavivṛṣaiḥ kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ 
MSS iyaṃ gaurekā naḥ kvacidapi na saṃyojanavidhāv amuṣyāḥ paśyāmo rasabharamucaṃ kāṃcidaparām 
MSS gale baddhā dadhmo yadi na dhṛtiruddāmavidhṛtau bhayaṃ gocorebhyas tadiha ka upāyaḥ prabhavatu 
MSS iyaṃ ghaṭī mattagajendragāminī vicitrasiṃhāsanasaṃsthitā sadā 
MSS anekarāmājanalālitā paraṃ vidhervaśāt saiva satī prajārthinī 
MSS iyaṃ cidrūpāpi prakaṭajaḍarūpā bhagavatī yadīyāmbhobindurvitarati hi śaṃbhorapi padam 
MSS punānā dhunvānā nikhilamapi nānāvidhamaghaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pāyādanudinamapāyāt suradhunī 
MSS iyaṃ tāval līlā yadadhiruruhe vṛddhavṛṣabho yadunnehe ruṇḍaṃ yadiha citibhasmāpi lilipe 
MSS ayaṃ ko vyāpāro yadatilaki bhāle hutavaho yadagraivi vyālo yadakavali hālāhalamapi 
MSS iyaṃ te jananī prāptā tvadālokanatatparā 
MSS snehaprasnavanirbhinnam udvahantī stanadvayam 
MSS iyaṃ triyāmā śatayāmadhāriṇī sudhākarādagnirudeti sarvataḥ 
MSS tanoti tāpaṃ mṛducandanānilo vidhau viruddhe hi vipat pade pade 
MSS iyaṃ tvabhinnamaryādaiḥ svanuśiṣṭaiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ 
MSS sarvaṃsahairupāyajñair amūḍhaireva dhāryate 
MSS iyaṃ dhatte dhīre malayajasamīre na ca mudaṃ na padmānāṃ vṛnde lalitamakarande'pi ramate 
MSS na vā sā sānandā bhavati navakundāvalikule tadetasyā bādhāharamapi samādhānamiha kim 
MSS iyaṃ pallī bhillairanucitasamārambharasikaiḥ samantādākīrṇā viṣaviṣamabāṇapraṇayibhiḥ 
MSS tarorasya skandhe gamaya samayaṃ kīra nibhṛtaṃ na vāṇī kalyāṇī tadiha mukhamudraiva śaraṇam 
MSS iyaṃ prītirvallīhṛdayabhuvi daivāt samuditā tathā yatnād rakṣyā prakṛtimṛdulāpāyabahulā 
MSS yathā naināṃ sphītāṃ piśunajanadurvākyadahano dahatyantaḥ śoṣaṃ vrajati na punaḥ sauhṛdanidheḥ 
MSS iyaṃ bālā navodvāhā satyaṃ śrutvā vyathāṃ vrajet 
MSS kāmaṃ dhīrasvabhāveyaṃ strīsvabhāvas tu kātaraḥ 
MSS iyaṃ bālā māṃ pratyanavaratamindīvaradala prabhācauraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣipati kimabhipretamanayā 
MSS gato moho'smākaṃ smarasamarabāṇavyatikara jvarajvālā śāntā tadapi na varākī viramati 
MSS iyaṃ bālā vallī mṛdukisalayaṃ tāpavilayaṃ ghanacchāyaṃ śālaṃ navamativiśālaṃ parigatā 
MSS paraṃtvasyābhyantargaralalavabhasmīkṛtavanaṃ bhujaṃgaṃ prottuṅgaṃ kathamiva varākī kalayatu 
MSS iyaṃ bhujaginīśritā lasadanekapuṣpānvitā dvirephatatisevitā pramadakhañjanālaṃkṛtā 
MSS phaladvayabharānatā vilasitā navaiḥ pallavair vilocanapathaṃ gatā bhavati kāpi haimī latā 
MSS iyaṃ mayi proṣita eva saṃgatā himatviṣābhūt kṛtamaṇḍanā satī 
MSS itīrṣyayeva drutamacchinad ruṣā vicitratārābharaṇāni bhāskaraḥ 
MSS iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaś caturdigīśānavamatya māninī 
MSS arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇiṃ patimāptumicchati 
MSS iyaṃ mukhāmbhoruhasaṃnidhāne vilambidhammillataticchalena 
MSS samāgatāṃ sādarameva bālā dvirephamālāmuta vā dadhāti 
MSS iyaṃ yaśāṃsi dviṣataḥ sudhārucaḥ kimaṅkametad dviṣataḥ kimānanam 
MSS yaśobhirasyākhilalokadhāvibhir vibhīṣitā dhāvati tāmasī masī 
MSS iyaṃ raṅgapraveśena kalānāṃ copaśikṣayā 
MSS vañcanāpaṇḍitatvena svaranaipuṇyamāśritā 
MSS iyaṃ vilāsadrumadohadaśrīr iyaṃ sudhā yauvanadugdhasindhoḥ 
MSS lāvaṇyamāṇikyarucicchaṭeyam iyaṃ manaḥkārmaṇacūrṇamuṣṭiḥ 
MSS iyaṃ vyādhāyate bālā bhrūrasyāḥ kārmukāyate 
MSS kaṭākṣāś ca śarāyante mano me hariṇāyate 
MSS iyaṃ samdhyā dūrādahamupagato hanta malayāt tadekāṃ tvadgehe karuṇavati neṣyāmi rajanīm 
MSS samīreṇaivoktā navakusumitā cūtalatikā dhunānā murddhānaṃ nahi nahi nahītyeva kurute 
MSS iyaṃ sā kālindī kuvalayadalasnigdhamadhurā madāndhavyākūjattaruṇajalaraṃkupraṇayinī 
MSS purā yasyās tīre sarabhasasatṛṣṇaṃ murabhido gatāḥ prāyo gopīnidhuvanavinodena divasāḥ 
MSS iyaṃ sā lolākṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat 
MSS itas tīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kṛto veṣaś cāyaṃ kathamidamiti bhrāmyati manaḥ 
MSS iyaṃ sunayanā dāsīkṛtatāmarasaśriyā 
MSS ānanenākalaṅkena jayantīnduṃ kalaṅkitam 
MSS iyaṃ surataraṅgiṇī na punaratra nausaṃgamo bhavet taraṇimajjanaṃ pathika naiva pānthāgamaḥ 
MSS nidhāya hṛdaye sadā vipulacārukumbhadvayaṃ sakhe ghanaghanāgame ghanarasasya pāraṃ vraja 
MSS iyaṃ sustanī mastakanyastakumbhā kusumbhāruṇaṃ cāru vāso vasānā 
MSS samastasya lokasya cetaḥpravṛttiṃ gṛhītvā ghaṭe nyasya yātīva bhāti 
MSS iyaṃ sṛṣṭā cañcatkanakalatikā paṅkajabhuvā niṣiktā lāvaṇyāmṛtarasabhareṇānudivasam 
MSS akasmād romālīmadhupapaṭalīha sphurati yat tataḥ śaṅke puṣpodgamasamayamāyātamadhunā 
MSS iyaṃ svargādhināthasya lakṣmīḥ kiṃ yakṣakanyakā 
MSS athavā vipinasyaiva devatā kimu pārvati 
MSS iyaṃ hi nidrā nayanāvalambinī lalāṭadeśādupasarpatīva mām 
MSS adṛśyarūpā capalā jareva yā manuṣyasattvaṃ paribhūya vardhate 
MSS iyaṃ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṃ prāpya jagatīpate 
MSS ātmā vai śakyate trātuṃ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ 
MSS iyaṃ hi lokavyatirekavartinī svabhāvataḥ pārthivatā samuddhatā 
MSS balāt tadenāṃ vinayena yojayen nayasya siddhau vinayaḥ puraḥsaraḥ 
MSS iyatā vayasā na sādhitaṃ yat parataḥ kiṃ nu kariṣyatīti vedhāḥ 
MSS tilataṇḍulitāsya romarekhā cchalataḥ kajjalacūrṇamālilimpa 
MSS iyatīṃ subhagāvasthāṃ gato'si yasyāḥ kṛte smarātaṅkāt 
MSS mūrcchāṃ harāmi sā tava gatapuṇyā nayanasalilena 
MSS iyatī jagatī kiyatī bhavitā namitānanatāmiti yāti hayaḥ 
MSS viyadaṅgaṇariṅgaṇaraṅgavidhau parinartitumutkramatīva nabhaḥ 
MSS iyat pṛthvīmātraṃ tadanu ca nabhomaṇḍalamiya diyān pātālānto jalamapi pṛthivyāmiyaditi 
MSS iti jñātvā kūpe viditaviṣayo nāyamaparaḥ paraṃ mugdho bhekaḥ prabalatararāvaṃ prakurute 
MSS iyatyapyetasmin niravadhimahatyadhvani guṇās ta evāmī dvitrā jaraṭhajaraṭhā yānti gaṇanām 
MSS aho grāmyo lokaḥ sa na paramamībhiḥ kṛtadhṛtiḥ smayastabdho yāvat kalayati samagraṃ tṛṇamidam 
MSS iyatyāṃ saṃpattāvapi ca salilānāṃ tvamadhunā na tṛṣṇāmārtānāṃ harasi yadi kāsāra sahasā 
MSS nidāghe caṇḍāṃśau kirati parito'ṅgāranikarān kṛśībhūtaḥ keṣāmahaha parihartāsi khalu tām 
MSS iyatyāmapi sāmagryāṃ sukṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ tvayā 
MSS itīva kupito dantān antakaḥ pātayatyalam 
MSS iyatyetasmin vā niravadhicamatkṛtyatiśayo varāho vā rāhuḥ prabhavati camatkāraviṣayaḥ 
MSS mahīmeko magnāṃ yadayamavahad dantaśalalaiḥ śiraḥśeṣaḥ śatruṃ nigilati paraṃ saṃtyajati ca 
MSS iyamatra kayāpi diśā nītidṛśāṃ darśitā padavī 
MSS cāṇakyādyabhidhānāj jñeyanidhānādathānyadunneyam 
MSS iyamatra satāmalaukikī mahatī kāpi kaṭhoracittatā 
MSS upakṛtya bhavanti dūrataḥ parataḥ pratyupakārabhīravaḥ 
MSS iyamapratibodhaśāyinīṃ raśanā tvāṃ prathamā rahaḥsakhī 
MSS gativibhramasādanīravā na śucā nānumṛteva lakṣyate 
MSS iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṃkṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā bālevāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī 
MSS vahati ca varārohā ramyāṃ vivāhamahotsava śriyamudayinīmudgāḍhāṃ ca vyanakti manorujam 
MSS iyamasau taralāyatalocanā gurusamunnatapīnapayodharā 
MSS pṛthunitambabharālasagāminī priyatamā mama jīvitahāriṇī 
MSS iyamānandalatikā na grīvā hariṇīdṛśaḥ 
MSS yato'syāṃ viluṭhantyete muktāḥ śuddhaguṇāntarāḥ 
MSS iyamiyaṃ mayadānavanandinī tridaśanāthajitaḥ prasavasthalī 
MSS kimaparaṃ daśakaṃdharagehinī tvayi karoti karadvayayojanam 
MSS iyamiṣṭaguṇāya rocatāṃ rucirārthā bhavate'pi bhāratī 
MSS nanu vaktṛviśeṣaniḥspṛhā guṇagṛhyā vacane vipaścitaḥ 
MSS iyamudaradarī durantapūrā yadi na bhavedabhimānabhaṅgabhūmiḥ 
MSS kṣaṇamapi na sahe bhavādṛśānāṃ kuṭilakaṭākṣanirīkṣaṇaṃ nṛpāṇām 
MSS iyamudgatiṃ harantī netranikocaṃ ca vidadhatī purataḥ 
MSS na vijānīmaḥ kiṃ tava vadati sapatnīva dinanidrā 
MSS iyeṣa sā kartumavandhyarūpatāṃ samādhimāsthāya tapobhirātmanaḥ 
MSS avāpyate vā kathamanyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiś ca tādṛśaḥ 
MSS ilātalabharākrāntagrīvaṃ mā śeṣa vakraya 
MSS tvayi duḥkhini caikasmiñ jīvalokaḥ sadā sukhī 
MSS ilikā bhramarīdhyānaṃ dhyāyantī bhramarī bhavet 
MSS vītarāgapadaṃ dhyāyan vītarāgo bhaved dhruvam 
MSS iṣutrayeṇaiva jagattrayasya vinirjayāt puṣpamayāśugena 
MSS śeṣā dvibāṇī saphalīkṛteyaṃ priyādṛgambhojapade'bhiṣicya 
MSS iṣṭaṃ dadāti gṛhṇāti kāryamākhyāti pṛcchati 
MSS bhuṅkte bhojayate caiva ṣaḍvidhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam 
MSS iṣṭakacite samantāt puruṣanikhāte'vaṭe tarurjātaḥ 
MSS vāmana eva hi dhatte phalakusumaṃ sarvakālamiti 
MSS iṣṭāṃ bhāryāṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ putraṃ cāpi kanīyasam 
MSS riktapāṇirna paśyeta tathā naimittikaṃ prabhum 
MSS iṣṭāni cāpyapatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ 
MSS āpaddharmavimokṣāya bhāryā cāpi satāṃ matam 
MSS iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ 
MSS tairdattānapradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ 
MSS iṣṭāpūrtāni kalayet jagatkhyāto vased divi 
MSS akūpāroktavṛtto'gād indradyumno divaṃ punaḥ 
MSS iṣṭā bālakaceṣṭā yauvanadarpo'tha vṛddhavairāgyam 
MSS sāpi gatā so'pi gatas tadapi gataṃ svapnamāyeyam 
MSS iṣṭā makhā dvijavarāś ca mayi prasannāḥ prajñāpitā bhayarasaṃ samadā narendrāḥ 
MSS evaṃvidhasya ca na me'sti manaḥpraharṣaḥ kanyāpiturhi satataṃ bahu cintanīyam 
MSS iṣṭeṣu visṛjatyarthān kubera iva kāmadaḥ 
MSS namasyeyuś ca taṃ bhaktyā śiṣyā iva guruṃ sadā 
MSS iṣṭo vā bahusukṛtopalālito vā śliṣṭo vā vyasanaśatābhirakṣito vā 
MSS dauḥśīlyāj janayati naiva jātvasādhur visrambhaṃ bhujaga ivāṅkamadhyasuptaḥ 
MSS iṣṭvā saṃgrāmayajñena nānāpraharaṇāmbhasā 
MSS asminnavabhṛthe snātaḥ kathaṃ patnyā mayā vinā 
MSS iha kapaṭakutukataralita dṛśi viśvāsaṃ kuraṅga kiṃ kuruṣe 
MSS tava rabhasataraliteyaṃ vyādhavadhūrvāladhau valate 
MSS iha kiṃ kuraṅgaśāvaka kedāre kalamamañjarīṃ tyajasi 
MSS tṛṇabāṇas tṛṇadhanvā tṛṇaghaṭitaḥ kapaṭapuruṣo'yam 
MSS iha kiṃ pratisphurati me tavāgrato nayaśāstranīranidhipāradṛśvanaḥ 
MSS avalīḍhaviśvatamasaḥ puro raver nahi jātu dīpakaśikhā prakāśate 
MSS iha khalu viṣamaḥ purā kṛtānāṃ vilasati jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ 
MSS haraśirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhrapādaiḥ 
MSS iha gamiṣyati vaidyamatiḥ śramaṃ prathamameva purastu mahāsukham 
MSS priyatamasya mṛgākṣi samāgame navakaragrahaṇā gṛhiṇī yathā 
MSS iha gurujalabhārapūrṇagarbhāḥ pradaradarībhramabhūribhīmavegāḥ 
MSS taṭakaṭakaniyudhyamānaveṇī dviguṇamahāravabhairavās taṭinyaḥ 
MSS iha catvāri dānāni proktāni paramarṣibhiḥ 
MSS vicārya nānāśāstrāṇi śarmaṇe'tra paratra ca 
MSS bhītebhyaś cābhayaṃ deyaṃ vyādhitebhyas tathauṣadham 
MSS deyā vidyārthināṃ vidyā deyamannaṃ kṣudhāture 
MSS iha caiva striyo dhanyāḥ śīlasya parirakṣaṇāt 
MSS śīlabhaṅge ca nārīṇāṃ yamalokaḥ sudāruṇaḥ 
MSS śīlaṃ rakṣyaṃ sadā strībhir duṣṭasaṃgavivarjanāt 
MSS śīlena hi paraḥ svargaḥ strīṇāṃ vaiśya na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS iha jagati janasya kasya citte na vasati saukhyavidhānamukhyavārtā 
MSS khalu bhavati tadeva tasya sarvaṃ bhuvanapatis tu yadīśvaraḥ karoti 
MSS iha jagati ratīśaprakriyākauśalinyaḥ kati kati na niśīthe subhruvaḥ saṃcaranti 
MSS mama tu vidhihatāyā jāyamānasmitāyāḥ sahacari paripanthī hanta dantāṃśureva 
MSS iha tava deva nipatatā karakamalakuśodakena jāyante 
MSS tattaddūradaridra dvāri dvipadānavāribhiḥ saritaḥ 
MSS iha turagaśataiḥ prayāntu mūrkhā dhanarahitā vibudhāḥ prayāntu padbhyām 
MSS giriśikharagatāpi kākapaṅktiḥ pulinagatairna samatvameti haṃsaiḥ 
MSS iha duḥkhaṃ nṛpādibhyaḥ paratra narakāditaḥ 
MSS prāpnoti steyatas tena steyaṃ tyājyaṃ sadā budhaiḥ 
MSS iha duḥkhaṃ layaḥ prokto duḥkhaṃ hartuṃ layaḥ kṣamaḥ 
MSS duḥkhe śubhe layo duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ tasya kathyate 
MSS iha dharmārthakāmānām avāptiphalamiṣyate 
MSS tatrārthaḥ saha kāmena nirīkṣyo dharmacakṣuṣā 
MSS parityajya hi yo dharmam arthamarthāya paśyati 
MSS kāmaṃ vā kāmalābhāya na sa buddheṣu buddhimān 
MSS iha nagare pratirathyaṃ bhujaṃgasaṃbādharucirasaṃcāre 
MSS sundari mama matametan nakulapratipālanaṃ śreyaḥ 
MSS iha niculanikuñje madhyamadhye'sya rantur vijanamajani śayyā kasya bālapravālaiḥ 
MSS iti kathayati vṛnde yoṣitāṃ pāntu yuṣmān smitaśabalitarādhāmādhavālokitāni 
MSS iha niculanikuñje vaṃśasaṃbhārabhāji svapimi yadi muhūrtaṃ paśyasi kṣetrametat 
MSS iti pathikamakasmān mārga evopaviṣṭaṃ vadati taruṇakāntaṃ gopikā sāṅgabhaṅgam 
MSS iha nibhṛtanipātamūkapādaṃ valayitakārmukavallayaḥ kirātāḥ 
MSS bhavadalasavilokanānabhijñā mṛgagṛhiṇi praharanti gaccha dūram 
MSS iha nivasati meruḥ śekharo bhūdharāṇām iha hi nihitabhārāḥ sāgarāḥ sapta caiva 
MSS idamatulamanantaṃ bhūtalaṃ bhūribhūtod bhavadharaṇasamarthaṃ sthānamasmadvidhānām 
MSS iha niśi nibiḍanirantara kucakumbhadvitayadattahṛdayabharā 
MSS ramaṇaguṇakṛṣyamāṇā saṃtarati tamastaraṅgiṇīṃ kāpi 
MSS iha paricitā jātyandhānāmiyaṃ na tavonnatir guṇaparicaye cakṣuṣmanto tvayātiviḍambitāḥ 
MSS kṛpaṇavaṇijāmalpīkartuṃ guṇāṃs tava kevalaṃ marakata mṛṣā doṣodgāraḥ kariṣyati duryaśaḥ 
MSS iha parimalo yatra vyakto na tatra madhuśriyo madhu samadhikaṃ yasmiṃs tasmin na gandhasamṛddhayaḥ 
MSS iti maruvakaṃ nindan kundādapetakutūhalaḥ kamalamadhikaṃ smāraṃ smāraṃ viṣīdati ṣaṭpadaḥ 
MSS iha puro'nilakampitavigrahā milati kā na vanaspatinā latā 
MSS smarasi kiṃ sakhi kāntaratotsavaṃ na hi ghanāgamarītirudāhṛtā 
MSS iha bahalitamindordīdhitīnāṃ prabhābhir madavikalacakorīcañcumudrāṅkitābhiḥ 
MSS ratibharaparikhedasrastarārthaṃ vadhūnāṃ karakisalayalīlābhañjanavyañjikābhiḥ 
MSS iha bhuvi kalayati laghurapi mahatāṃ saṅgena kamapi mahimānam 
MSS laṅghayati candralīno nabhastalaṃ helayā hariṇaḥ 
MSS iha bhogaṃ yaśaḥ prītiṃ sabhāsu bahumānyatām 
MSS dadyāt paratra sugatiṃ vidyādhanamanuttamam 
MSS iha madhupavadhūnāṃ pītamallīmadhūnāṃ vilasati kamanīyaḥ kākalīsaṃpradāyaḥ 
MSS iha naṭati salīlaṃ mañjarī vañjulasya pratipadamupadiṣṭā dakṣiṇenānilena 
MSS iha mahiṣaviṣāṇavyastapāṣāṇapīṭha skhalanasulabharohidgarbhiṇībhrūṇahatyāḥ 
MSS kuharaviharamāṇaprauḍhabhallūkahikkā cayacakitakirātasrastaśastrā vanāntāḥ 
MSS iha muhurmuditaiḥ kalabhai ravaḥ pratidiśaṃ kriyate kalabhairavaḥ 
MSS sphurati cānuvanaṃ camarīcayaḥ kanakaratnabhuvāṃ ca marīcayaḥ 
MSS iha yat kriyate karma tat paratropabhujuyate 
MSS siktamūlasya vṛkṣasya phalaṃ śākhāsu dṛśyate 
MSS iha yat kriyate karma phalaṃ tatraiva bhujyate 
MSS karmabhūmiriyaṃ rājan phalabhūmiś ca sā smṛtā 
MSS iha yādavavaṃśakṛṣṇavartmā nugatiḥ sāṅgatayā mayānvabhāvi 
MSS adhunā tadavāpticetase me madhurākāmadhurāpi rocate kim 
MSS iha rūpamātrasāre citrakṛte kamalakahlāre 
MSS na raso nāpi ca gandho madhukara bandho mudhā bhramasi 
MSS iha re bahalā lāse bālā rāhumalīmasā 
MSS sālakā rasalīlā sā tuṅgālāli kalārata 
MSS ihaloke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate 
MSS adbhirdattā svardharmeṇa pretyabhāve'pi tasya sā 
MSS iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paro'pi svajanāyate 
MSS svajanastu daridrāṇāṃ jīvatāmeva naśyati 
MSS iha loke hi dhanināṃ paro'pi svajanāyate 
MSS svajano'pi daridrāṇāṃ tatkṣaṇād durjanāyate 
MSS iha loko hato n ṇāṃ dāridryeṇa yathā nṛpa 
MSS manuṣyāṇāṃ tathā janma māghasnānaṃ vinā hatam 
MSS iha vaṭavṛkṣe yakṣaḥ prativasati divāpi yatra bhayaśaṅkā 
MSS tasminnabhinavavadhvā nītā vītodayāḥ kṣaṇadāḥ 
MSS iha vatsān samacārayad iha naḥ svāmī jagau vaṃśīm 
MSS iti sāsraṃ gadato me yamunātīre dinaṃ yāyāt 
MSS iha vahati bahumahodadhi vibhūṣaṇā mānagarvamiyamurvī 
MSS devasya kamaṭhamūrter na pṛṣṭhamapi nikhilamāpnoti 
MSS iha vā tārayed durgād uta vā pretya tārayet 
MSS sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putra ityucyate budhaiḥ 
MSS iha vikasadaśokāstokapuṣpopakārair ayamatiśayaraktaḥ saktasusnigdhabhāvaḥ 
MSS tribhuvanajayasajjaḥ prājyasā mrājyabhājaḥ prathayati pṛthumaitrīṃ puṣpacāpasya caitraḥ 
MSS iha vicaranti kirātās tvādṛksvacchandatānihantāraḥ 
MSS tadamīṣāṃ gānādau mā dhāḥ śravaṇe kuraṅgaśāva tvam 
MSS iha vijayini vaṃśe kīrtidhārākalāpa snapitasakalalokaḥ śrīyaśovigraho'bhūt 
MSS jalaghaṭa iva yuddhottālabhūpāladarpa jvalanaśamanalīlākovidaḥ ko'pi vīraḥ 
MSS iha vidhiviṣamaḥ purākṛtānāṃ bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ 
MSS kva janakatanayā kva rāmarāmā kva ca daśakandharamandire nivāsaḥ 
MSS iha viracayan sādhvīṃ śiṣyaḥ kriyāṃ na nivāryate tyajati tu yadā mārgaṃ mohāt tadā gururaṅkuśaḥ 
MSS vinayarucayas tasmāt santaḥ sadaiva niraṅkuśāḥ parataramataḥ svātantryebhyo vayaṃ hi parāṅmukhāḥ 
MSS iha viśvambharāpīḍe candanaṃ kasya na priyam 
MSS anusvāraṃ vilipyāpi okārasya prayojanāt 
MSS iha vaikasya nāmutra amutraikasya no iha 
MSS iha cāmutra vaikasya nāmutraikasya no iha 
MSS iha vyādhavyūhaḥ paṭughaṭitayantrapraharaṇo mṛgendrāṇāṃ valgat prakharanakharāṇāṃ kulamiha 
MSS ihālaṅghyaḥ śailo bahalatarapaṅkā saridiha pradīpto'gnirmadhyevanamahaha kaṣṭaṃ karipateḥ 
MSS iha śayyāgatenāpi bandhumadhyasthitena vā 
MSS mayaivaikena soḍhavyā marmacchedādivedanā 
MSS iha śikharakarālakṣoṇibhidgaṇḍaśaila skhalanadalanagarjatphenilo budbudaughaḥ 
MSS pavanadhṛtaśirīṣaśreṇireṇupraṇālī surabhisaliladṛptā dvīpavatyo vahanti 
MSS iha śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ śiṣṭānāmapi sarvathā 
MSS vācāmeva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate 
MSS iha saṃtamase ghanāgame sukhitaṃ bhānavamaindavaṃ vapuḥ 
MSS taḍidujjvaladīpalekhayā harito'mūḥ parito vicinvati 
MSS iha samadaśakuntākrāntavānīravīrut prasavasurabhiśītasvacchatoyā vahanti 
MSS phalabharapariṇāmaśyāmajambūnikuñja skhalanamukharabhūrisrotaso nirjhariṇyaḥ 
MSS iha sarasi salīlaṃ cārupatre vidhunvan darataralitatiryakcañcukaṇḍūyitāṅgaḥ 
MSS anusarati sarāgaḥ preyasīmagrayātām anupadasamudañcatkaṇṭhanālo marālaḥ 
MSS iha sarasi saharṣaṃ mañjuguñjābhirāmaṃ madhukara kuru keliṃ sārdhamambhojinībhiḥ 
MSS anupamamakarandāmodadattapramodā tyajati bata na nidrāṃ mālatī yāvadeṣā 
MSS iha sarvasvaphalinaḥ kulaputramahādrumāḥ 
MSS niṣphalatvamalaṃ yānti veśyāvihagabhakṣitāḥ 
MSS iha sāmānyānugamaṃ samupadiśantaḥ sthaleṣvanekeṣu 
MSS liṅgaparāmarśaparā navīnanaiyāyikā yānti 
MSS iha sphuṭaṃ tiṣṭhati nātha kaṇṭakaḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ karṣa nakhāgralīlayā 
MSS iti cchalāt kācidalagnakaṇṭakaṃ padaṃ tadutsaṅgatale nyaveśayat 
MSS iha hi navavasante mañjarīpuñjareṇu cchuraṇadhavaladehā baddhahelaṃ saranti 
MSS taralamalisamūhā hārihuṃkārakaṇṭhā bahulaparimalālīsundaraṃ sinduvāram 
MSS iha hi madhuragītaṃ rūpametad raso'yaṃ sphurati parimalo'sau sparśa eṣa stanānām 
MSS iti hṛtaparamārthairidriyairbhrāmyamāṇaḥ svahitakaraṇadhūrtaiḥ pañcabhirvañcito'smi 
MSS ihāneke satyaṃ vṛṣamahiṣameṣāḥ suturagā gṛhāṇi kṣudrāṇāṃ katipayatṛṇaireva sukhinaḥ 
MSS gajānāmāsthānaṃ madasalilajambālitabhuvāṃ tadeko vindhyādrervipinamathavā bhūpasadanam 
MSS ihāneke santaḥ satatamupakāriṇyupakṛtiṃ kṛtajñāḥ kurvanto jagati nivasanto'pi sudhiyaḥ 
MSS kiyantas te santaḥ sukṛtaparipākapraṇayino vinā svārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati parakṛtyavyasanitā 
MSS ihāviśadyena pathātivakraḥ śāstraughaniṣyandasudhāpravāhaḥ 
MSS so'syāḥ śravaḥpatrayuge praṇālī rekheva dhāvatyabhikarṇakūpam 
MSS ihaikaś cūḍālo'bhyajani kalaśād yasya sakalaiḥ pipāsorambhobhiś culukamapi no bhartumaśakaḥ 
MSS svamāhātmyaślāghāgurugahanagarjābhiramitaḥ kuṣitvā kliśnāsi śrutikuharamabdhe kimiti naḥ 
MSS ihaiva narakavyādheś cikitsāṃ na karoti yaḥ 
MSS gatvā nirauṣadhasthānaṃ sa rogī kiṃ kariṣyati 
MSS ihaiva bhuvane jātaṃ sattvasaṃsthāpanaṃ kṣamam 
MSS gṛhyate kimapi svasthair anyat kimapi jihmagaiḥ 
MSS ihodyāne sampratyahaha pariśiṣṭāḥ kramavaśād amī valmīkās te bhujagakulalīlāvasatayaḥ 
MSS gatās te vistīrṇastabakabharasaurabhyalaharī parītavyomānaḥ prakṛtiguravaḥ ke'pi taravaḥ 
MSS ihopapattirmama kena karmaṇā kva vā prayātavyamito bhavediti 
MSS vicāraṇā yasya na vidyate smṛtau kathaṃ sa dharmapravaṇo bhaviṣyati 
MSS īkṣaṇadhyānasaṃsparśair matsyakūrmavihaṅgamāḥ 
MSS poṣayanti svakān putrān tadvat paṇḍitavṛttayaḥ 
MSS īkṣitopadiśatīva nartituṃ tatkṣaṇoditamudaṃ manobhuvam 
MSS kāntadantaparipīḍitādharā pāṇidhūnanamiyaṃ vitanvatī 
MSS īdṛśaṃ kārayen nyāsaṃ yena śreyo bhaviṣyati 
MSS anye'pi duṣṭamantreṇa na hiṃsanti kadācana 
MSS īdṛśaṃ nigadati priye dṛśaṃ saṃmadāt kiyadiyaṃ nyamīlayat 
MSS prātarālapati kokile kalaṃ jāgarādiva niśaḥ kumudvatī 
MSS īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhrātaraṃ yaḥ parityajet 
MSS ko nāma sa bhavet tasya yameṣa na parityajet 
MSS īdṛśasya bhavataḥ kathametal lāghavaṃ muhuratīva rateṣu 
MSS kṣiptamāyatamadarśayadurvyāṃ kāñcidāma jaghanasya mahattvam 
MSS īdṛśe vyavahārāgnau mantribhiḥ paripātitāḥ 
MSS sthāne khalu mahīpālā gacchanti kṛpaṇāṃ daśām 
MSS īdṛśaiḥ śvetakākīyai rājñaḥ śāsanadūṣakaiḥ 
MSS apāpānāṃ sahasrāṇi hanyante ca hatāni ca 
MSS īpsitaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ kasya saṃpadyate sukham 
MSS daivāyattaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tasmāt saṃtoṣamāśrayet 
MSS īrṣyayā rakṣato nārīr dhik kulasthitidāmbhikān 
MSS smarāndhatvāviśeṣe'pi tathā naramarakṣataḥ 
MSS īrṣyayaiva samudvignāḥ puruṣād duṣṭacetasaḥ 
MSS atisaktāḥ palāyante śrīdhṛtismṛtikīrtayaḥ 
MSS īrṣyā kalahamūlaṃ syāt kṣamā mūlaṃ hi saṃpadām 
MSS īrṣyādoṣād vipraśāpam avāpa janamejayaḥ 
MSS īrṣyā kulastrīṣu na nāyakasya niḥśaṅkakelirna parāṅganāsu 
MSS veśyāsu caitad dvitayaṃ prarūḍhaṃ sarvasvametās tadaho smarasya 
MSS īrṣyād hi kupyate veśyā prasaṅgāc ca virajyate 
MSS stabdhātigamanāc cāpi dānādapi vilupyate 
MSS īrṣyāprasphuritādharoṣṭharuciraṃ vaktraṃ na me darśitaṃ sādhikṣepapadā manāgapi giro na śrāvitā mugdhayā 
MSS maddoṣaiḥ sarasaiḥ pratāpitamanovṛttyāpi kopo'nayā kāñcyā gāḍhatarāvabaddhavasanagranthyā samāveditaḥ 
MSS īrṣyābhayakrodhasamanvitena lubdhena rugdainyanipīḍitena 
MSS vidveṣayuktena ca sevyamānam annaṃ na samyak paripākameti 
MSS īrṣyāmalaṃ khaleṣvāste viṣamāśīviṣeṣviva 
MSS īrṣyāroṣajvalito nijapatisaṅgaṃ vicintayaṃs tasyāḥ 
MSS cyutavasanajaghanabhāvana sāndrānandena nirvāmi 
MSS īrṣyā lobho madaḥ prītiḥ krodho bhītiś ca sāhasam 
MSS pravṛtticchidrahetūni kārye sapta budhā jaguḥ 
MSS īrṣyī ghṛṇī tvasaṃtuṣṭaḥ krodhano nityaśaṅkitaḥ 
MSS parabhāgyopajīvī ca ṣaḍete nityaduḥkhitāḥ 
MSS īśaḥ karasthīkṛtakāñcanādriḥ kuberamitraṃ rajatācalasthaḥ 
MSS tathāpi bhikṣāṭanamasya jātaṃ vidhau śiraḥsthe kuṭile kutaḥ śrīḥ 
MSS īśānotthaiḥ śakunaiś corā grāmaṃ praviśya na labhante 
MSS na ca rogārto jīvati svastho'pyasvāsthyamāpnoti 
MSS īśānotthaiḥ śakunair viśeṣataḥ śūramaṇḍalākrāntaiḥ 
MSS ripuveṣṭita iva dūraṃ tyaktvā sthānaṃ palāyeta 
MSS īśe padapraṇayabhāji muhūrtamātraṃ prāṇapriye'pi kuru mānini mā prasādam 
MSS jānātu matpatirasau padayornatānām asmādṛśāmapi manorathabhaṅgaduḥkham 
MSS īśo daṇḍasya varuṇo rājñāṃ daṇḍadharo hi saḥ 
MSS īśaḥ sarvasya jagato brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ 
MSS īśo duratyayaḥ kāla iti satyavatī śrutiḥ 
MSS vṛddhānāmapi yad buddhir bālavākyairvibhidyate 
MSS īśvaraḥ sa jagatpūjyaḥ sa vāgmī caturānanaḥ 
MSS yasyāsti draviṇaṃ loke sa eva puruṣottamaḥ 
MSS sa evāhṛdayo rāhur alasaḥ sa śanaiścaraḥ 
MSS vakraḥ kujanmā satataṃ vittaṃ yasya na vidyate 
MSS īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe'rjuna tiṣṭhati 
MSS bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā 
MSS īśvaragṛhamidamatra hi viṣaṃ ca vṛṣabhaś ca bhasma cādriyate 
MSS yas tu na viṣaṃ na vṛṣabho na bhasma tasyātra kā gaṇanā 
MSS īśvaraparigrahocita moho'syāṃ madhupa kiṃ mudhā patasi 
MSS kanakābhidhānasārā vītarasā kitavakalikeyam 
MSS īśvaramārādhayato vigalitamānasya labdhamaiśvaryam 
MSS sphuṭameva bhavati laghimā garimāpi kathaṃ na jānīmaḥ 
MSS īśvarasevā sulabha nyakkārā durlabhotkarṣā 
MSS ciraparicaryā viphalā nirmālyā niṣkramo'pi nirayāya 
MSS īśvarasya jagat kṛtsnaṃ sṛṣṭimākulayannimām 
MSS asti yo'strīkṛtastrīkas tasya vairaṃ smaranniva 
MSS īśvarāḥ piśunāñ śaśvad bibhratīti kimadbhutam 
MSS prāyo nidhaya evāhīn dvijihvān dadhatetarām 
MSS īśvarāṇāṃ vacaḥ satyaṃ tathaivācaritaṃ kvacit 
MSS teṣāṃ yat svavacoyuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret 
MSS īśvarāṇāmidaṃ tantraṃ prāyeṇautsukyamāvahet 
MSS yatas tiraścāṃ caritair nītimārgaḥ pradarśyate 
MSS īśvarāt samabhūd rudro jyotirmaya umāpatiḥ 
MSS rudrād viṣṇurabhūdādyas trailokyaparipālakaḥ 
MSS īśvarānugṛhīto hi kaścid bālo'pi śāmyati 
MSS vṛddho'pi na śamaṃ yāti kaścit kāpuruṣaḥ punaḥ 
MSS īśvarā bhūridānena yal labhante phalaṃ kila 
MSS daridras tacca kākiṇyā prāpnuyāditi na śrutiḥ 
MSS īśvareṇa samaṃ prītir na me lakṣmaṇa rocate 
MSS gatasya gauravaṃ nāsti āgatasya dhanakṣayaḥ 
MSS īśvaroktād dhanurvedād vyāsasyāpi subhāṣitāt 
MSS padānyākṛṣya racito granthaḥ saṃkṣepato mayā 
MSS īṣatkampapayodharaṃ gurukaṭīprauḍhaprahārādbhutaṃ svidyadbhālamanekahāsyasarasaṃ saṃkathyapādavyatham 
MSS vāraṃvāramuraḥprapātasubhagaṃ saṃdaśyamānādharaṃ kiṃciddattanitambadeśanakharaṃ dhanyo rataṃ sevate 
MSS īṣattuṣāraiḥ kṛtaśītaharmyaḥ suvāsitaṃ cāruśiraḥ sacampakaiḥ 
MSS kurvanti nāryo'pi vasantakāle stanaṃ sahāraṃ kusumairmanoharaiḥ 
MSS īṣatprakaṭito mandas tīkṣṇas tu pulakādibhiḥ 
MSS sa tu tīkṣṇataraḥ śvāsaśoṣitāvayavo'tra yaḥ 
MSS īṣadavaśiṣṭajaḍimā śiśire gatamātra eva ciramaṅgaiḥ 
MSS navayauvaneva tanvī niṣevyate nirbharaṃ vāpī 
MSS īṣadāyacchamāno'pi siṃho mattānapi dvipān 
MSS nihanti balavāṃs tasmāt saṃdheyaḥ śivamicchatā 
MSS īṣadvakritapakṣmapaṅktibhiranākūtasmitairvīkṣit aiḥ etaireva tavādya sundari karakroḍe jagad vartate 
MSS antaḥ pāṃsulahemaketakidaladroṇīdurāpaśriyo dormūlasya nivedanādiha punaḥ krūre kimākāṅkṣasi 
MSS īṣannāsānikocaḥ kharamukharasukhaprekṣaṇaṃ hāsaleśaḥ svābodhādaprasādadhvananamasadavadyoktihelāvahelā 
MSS maunavyāsaṅgavārtāntarapararuciraślokapāṭhāda yas te soḍhavyāḥ ke kiyantaḥ śiva śiva kavite kucchalā matsarāṇām 
MSS īṣanmīlitadṛṣṭi mugdhavilasatsītkāradhārāvaśād avyaktākulakelikākuvikasaddantāṃśudhautādharam 
MSS śāntastabdhapayodharaṃ bhṛśapariṣvaṅgāt kuraṅgīdṛśo harṣotkarṣavimuktaniḥsahatanordhanyo dhayatyānanam 
MSS īṣanmīlitalocanā ślathasamastāṅgā śramodvejitā niśvāsaprathamā viratnarasanā saṃtyaktakaṇṭhasvanā 
MSS prodyatkāmajalā kalāsu kuśalā nirlajjayā kāminī kāntā kālavaśāt priyasya vaśagā jātā ratānte kṣaṇam 
MSS īṣanmīlitalolalocanayugaṃ vyāvartitabhrūyugaṃ saṃdaṣṭādharavedanāpraṇayinaṃ mā meti mandākṣaram 
MSS tanvaṅgyāḥ suratāvasānasamaye dṛṣṭaṃ mayā yanmukhaṃ svedārdrīkṛtapāṇḍugaṇḍayugalaṃ tat kena vismaryate 
MSS īṣallabdhapraveśo'pi snehavicchedakārakaḥ 
MSS kṛtakṣobho narīnarti khalo manthānadaṇḍavat 
MSS īṣallomaśabhāvabhāñji kapiśaśyāmānubandhacchavī liptatvañci cakorakīraharitonmeṣīṇi māṣīlatāḥ 
MSS etās tarkaya bālavānaravadhūhastāṅgulīlabdhrima spardhāvanti phalāni bibhrati parīṇāmābhirāmaśriyaḥ 
MSS īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi nāsādayed dhanam 
MSS ugraṃ tapaḥ samārohen na hyanuptaṃ prarohati 
MSS dānena bhogī bhavati medhāvī vṛddhasevayā 
MSS ahiṃsayā ca dīrghāyur iti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ 
MSS īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasī 
MSS labhdanāśo yathā mṛtyur labhdaṃ bhavati vā na vā 
MSS uktaṃ ca vakṣyamānaṃ ca bhartsanaṃ tiryagīkṣaṇam 
MSS kvacid yathārthakathanaṃ vyākhyā tantrasya ṣaḍvidhāḥ 
MSS uktaṃ durvacanaṃ mayā na subhage hāsye'pi duḥkhapradaṃ tyaktvā tvāmapi bhāṣitairapi mayā nānyā ganā lālitā 
MSS tvāmekāmanavadyabhūṣaṇabharaiḥ saṃbhāvayāmi tvayā he niṣkāraṇakopane vada kṛtaḥ kopaḥ kimarthaṃ mayi 
MSS uktaṃ parasyāmiṣatām anuktaṃ yātyadṛśyatām 
MSS hṛdaye śalyatāṃ dhatte nidhane dhanināṃ dhanam 
MSS uktaṃ yat kṛpaṇaṃ vaco viracito bhūyān vasūnāṃ vyayaḥ soḍhāḥ kiṃ ca viyogavajratatayo dūtī muhuḥ preṣitā 
MSS baddho'yaṃ praṇayāñjalirvinihite bāṣpāmbudhaute dṛśau niṣpīyādharapallavaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ sarve sakhe vismṛtam 
MSS uktas uttas
te rudhireṇāhaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ te mastakaṃ mayā 
MSS ityetāñ śapathān kṛtvā sā vai gamyā punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS uktā gacchati lajjitā viramati premṇā manāgikṣate keśāṃlluñcati jṛmbhaṇaṃ racayati prastauti gāthāṃ muhuḥ 
MSS āli gatyaparāṃ virauti paruṣaṃ cumbatyasau bālakaṃ gātraṃ bhañjati jṛmbhate vihasati pratyuttaraṃ yācate

MSS netraṃ caturvidhaṃ proktaṃ tasya bhāvāḥ pṛthak pṛthak

MSS vakraṃ ca kāminībhoge āraktaṃ śatrudarśane

MSS ujjvalacampakamukulā śa kitayā yaḥ pradīpakaṃ spṛśati 
MSS kajjalakala kadāhaṃ muktvānyat tasya kiṃ ghaṭatām 
MSS ujjvalālokayā snigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate

MSS kṛṣṇaukābhiratā api hiraṇyakaśipupriyāḥ satatam

MSS maṇireva mahāśāṇagharṣaṇaṃ na tu mṛtkaṇaḥ 
MSS uttamaḥ ṣaṭpadaḥ prokto madhyamaḥ pañcabhis tathā 
MSS kaniṣṭhastu caturbhiḥ syād evaṃ syurdhruvakās tridhā 
MSS uttamakule'pi jātaḥ sevāṃ vidadhāti nīcalokasya 
MSS vadati ca vācaṃ nīcām udareśvarapīḍito martyaḥ 
MSS uttamataruṇaprakṛtiḥ pulakādikasūcitānyatanusaktiḥ 
MSS sphuṭasaṃnihitavibhāvo nivāryate kena śṛ gāraḥ 
MSS uttamapadārtharasikāḥ sulabhā loke bhavanti sarve'pi 
MSS dūṣitapadārtharasikas tvamiva matas tvaṃ punaḥ karaṭa 
MSS uttamabhujaṃgasaṃgama nispandanitambacāpalastasyāḥ 
MSS mandaragiririva vibudhair itastataḥ kṛṣyate kāyaḥ 
MSS uttamarṇadhanadānaśa kayā pāvakotthaśikhayā hṛdisthayā 
MSS deva dagdhavasanā sarasvatī nāsyato bahirupaiti lajjayā 
MSS uttamarṇamukhaṃ paśyann adhamarṇo hriyā naman 
MSS mṛtyujīvitayoryuddhasaṃbhramaṃ parilokate 
MSS uttamavanitaikagatiḥ karīva sarasīpayaḥ sakhīdhairyam 
MSS āskanditoruṇā tvaṃ hastenaiva spṛśan harasi 
MSS uttamaś cintitaṃ kuryāt proktakārī tu madhyamaḥ 
MSS adhamo'śraddhayā kuryād akartoccaritam pituḥ 
MSS uttamastoṣamāyāti tada gaṃ poṣyate yadi 
MSS vṛkṣaḥ prasīdati prāyaḥ pādābhya gena na svayam 
MSS uttamasya kṣaṇaṃ kopo madhyasya praharadvayam 
MSS adhamasya tvahorātraṃ pāpiṣṭho naiva mucyate 
MSS uttamasyāpi varṇasya nīco'pi gṛhamāgataḥ 
MSS pūjanīyo yathāyogyaṃ sarvadevamayo'tithiḥ 
MSS uttamasyāpi varṇasya nīco'pi gṛhamāgataḥ 
MSS bālo vā yadi vā vṛddhaḥ sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ 
MSS uttamāḥ svaguṇaiḥ khyātā madhyamāśca piturguṇaiḥ 
MSS adhamā mātulasyāpi śvaśurasyādhamādhamāḥ 
MSS uttamāḥ svārjitairdravyaiḥ piturvittena madhyamāḥ 
MSS adhamā mātṛvittena strīvittenādhamādhamāḥ 
MSS uttamā ātmanaḥ khyātāḥ pituḥ khyātāśca madhyamāḥ 
MSS adhamā mātulāt khyātāḥ śvaśurāc cādhamādhamaḥ 
MSS uttamā godbhavāj jyaiṣṭhyād brahmaṇaścaiva dhāraṇāt 
MSS sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ 
MSS uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ śrotavyaṃ vacanaṃ budhaiḥ 
MSS tatra cātmahitaṃ grāhyaṃ vastavākyaṃ yathā nṛpaḥ 
MSS uttamādhamamadhyāni buddhvā kāryāṇi pārthivaḥ 
MSS uttamādhamamadhyeṣu puruṣeṣu niyojayet 
MSS uttamādhamasaṃsaktau jānan sadṛśavṛttitām 
MSS nārīṇāṃ śucibāhyānām a ganākhyāṃ vyadhād vidhiḥ 
MSS uttamānāṃ svabhāvo'yaṃ paraduḥkhāsahiṣṇutā 
MSS svayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ manyate'nyasya vāryate 
MSS uttamānāmapi strīṇāṃ viśvāso naiva vidyate 
MSS rājapriyāḥ kairaviṇyo ramante madhupaiḥ saha 
MSS uttamānuttamāneva gacchan hīnāṃśca varjayan 
MSS brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhatāmeti pratyavāyena śūdratām 
MSS uttamāneva seveta prāpte kāle tu madhyamān 
MSS adhamāṃstu na seveta ya icchec śreya ātmanaḥ 
MSS uttamābhijanopetān na nīcaiḥ saha vardhayet 
MSS kṛśo'pi hi vivekajño yāti saṃśrayaṇīyatām 
MSS uttamāścātmanā khyātāḥ pitrā khyātāśca madhyamāḥ 
MSS adhamā mātulaiḥ khyātāḥ śvaśuraiścādhamādhamāḥ 
MSS uttamās tājikāḥ proktāḥ pārasīkāḥ samudrajāḥ 
MSS kokkāṇākhatalāṇāśca tathā saurāṣṭrajā hayāḥ 
MSS uttame tu kṣaṇaṃ kopo madhyame ghaṭikādvayam 
MSS adhame syādahorātraṃ cāṇḍāle maraṇāntikaḥ 
MSS uttamenottamaṃ sarvaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prayatnataḥ 
MSS adṛṣṭamīkṣya sarveṣāṃ vaktavyaṃ suvicakṣaṇaiḥ 
MSS uttame vighnavattāsti adhamo duḥkhabhājanam 
MSS tasmāt sarvatra yogyatvāc śreṣṭho vai madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS uttamaiḥ saha sa gena ko na yāti samunnatim 
MSS mūrdhnā tṛṇāni dhāryante grathitaiḥ kusumaiḥ saha 
MSS uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathām 
MSS alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati 
MSS uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyaṃ yat prājñaiḥ satyavādibhiḥ 
MSS bandhanastho'pi tiṣṭheta na tu rājye narādhamaiḥ 
MSS uttamaiḥ svīkṛto nīco nīca eva na cottamaḥ 
MSS bhairavādhiṣṭhitaḥ śvā tu kadācin naiva kesarī 
MSS uttamairananujñātaṃ kāryaṃ necchec ca taiḥ saha 
MSS devaiḥ sākaṃ sudhāpānād rāhoś chinnaṃ śiro yataḥ 
MSS uttamairuttamairnityaṃ saṃbandhānācaret saha 
MSS ninīṣuḥ kulamutkarṣam adhamānadhamāṃs tyajet 
MSS uttamo nātivaktā syād adhamo bahubhāṣakaḥ 
MSS na hi svarṇe dhvanis tādṛg yādṛk kāṃsye prajāyate 
MSS uttamo'pi kulajo'pi manuṣyaḥ sarvalokamahito'pi budho'pi 
MSS dāsatāṃ bhajati yāṃ bhajamānas tāṃ bhajanti gaṇikāṃ kimu santaḥ 
MSS uttamo'pyadhamasya syād yācñānamrakaraḥ kvacit 
MSS kaustubhādīni ratnāni yayāce harirambudhim 
MSS uttamo'prārthito datte madhyamaḥ prārthitaḥ punaḥ 
MSS yācakairyācyamāno'pi datte na tvadhamādhamaḥ 
MSS uttamo madhyamo nīco'dhamo bhrātṛguṇairnaraḥ 
MSS kanyāstrībhaginībhāgyo naro'dhamatamo mataḥ 
MSS uttamo rasavādaśca dhātuvādaśca madhyamaḥ 
MSS adhamo mantravādaśca mithyāvādo'dhamādhamaḥ 
MSS uttara gaya kura galocane locane kamalagarvamocane 
MSS astu sundari kalindanandinī vīciḍambaragabhīramambaram 
MSS uttarataśca madhūkād ahinilayaḥ paścimottare toyam 
MSS parihṛtya pañcahastān ardhāṣṭamapauruṣaṃ vācyam 
MSS uttaranti vinikīrya palvalaṃ gāḍhapa kamativāhitātapāḥ 
MSS daṃṣṭriṇo vanavarāhayūthapā daṣṭabha gurabisā kurā iva 
MSS uttarāduttaraṃ vākyam uttarādeva jāyate 
MSS suvṛṣṭiguṇasaṃpannād bījād bījamivāparam 
MSS uttarāpathakāntānāṃ kiṃ brūmo rāmaṇīyakam 
MSS yāsāṃ tuṣārasaṃbhede na mlāyati mukhāmbujam 
MSS uttarīyavinayāt trapamāṇā rundhatī kila tadīkṣaṇamārgam 
MSS āvariṣṭa vikaṭena vivoḍhur vakṣasaiva kucamaṇḍalamanyā 
MSS uttareṇa kimātmaiva pañcabāṇāgnisākṣikam 
MSS tava sakhyai mayā datto na sevyaḥ sevitā rahaḥ 
MSS uttareṇa sadā kāryaṃ prāṇasya na virodhakam 
MSS saṃgrāmeṇa vinā kāryaṃ na lakṣyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham 
MSS uttānaphalalubdhānāṃ varaṃ rājopajīvinaḥ 
MSS na tu tatsvāminastīvraparikleśaiḥ phalanti ye

MSS kledini strīvraṇe saktir akṛmeḥ kasya jāyate

MSS ūrumadhye tathottānau pāṇī padmāsanaṃ tvidam 
MSS uttārakamatisnigdhaṃ bhrūkṣepavaśavarti ca

MSS cenneha tadupayogas taṃ niyataṃ vittasaṃcayo rogaḥ

MSS uttiṣṭhati namati vaṇik pṛcchati kuśalaṃ dadāti ca sthānam

MSS utthāyotthāya boddhavyaṃ kimadya sukṛtaṃ kṛtam 
MSS āyuṣaḥ khaṇḍamādāya ravirastaṃ gamiṣyati 
MSS utthāyotthāya boddhavyaṃ kimadya sukṛtaṃ kṛtam 
MSS dattaṃ vā dāpitaṃ vāpi vāk satyā vāpi bhāṣitā 
MSS utthāyotthāya boddhavyaṃ mahadbhayamupasthitam 
MSS maraṇavyādhiśokānāṃ kimadya nipatiṣyati 
MSS utthāyotthāya līyante daridrāṇāṃ manorathāḥ 
MSS bālavaidhavyadagdhānāṃ kulastrīṇāṃ kucā iva 
MSS utthāyonnatavāsayaṣṭiśikhare vistāritākuñcitaṃ bibhratpādamudastakesarasaṭaḥ kiṃcid vinidrekṣaṇaḥ 
MSS dūrādañcitakandharaḥ śamavaśād vyādhūya pakṣadvayaṃ mānamlānikaraḥ kura gakadṛśāṃ kokūyate kukkuṭaḥ 
MSS utthitā eva pūjyante janāḥ kāryārthibhirnaraiḥ 
MSS śatruvat patitaṃ ko nu vandate mānavaṃ punaḥ 
MSSA utthitāgracaraṇā pṛthustanī puṣpajālamapacinvatī tarau 
MSSA madhyabhañjanabhayāpadeśato nistrapā dayitakaṇṭhamagrahīt 
MSS utthito niśi kalānidhirbhaved etadīyamukhatulyatāptaye 
MSS prāpito malinabhāvametayā lajjayā nabhasi yātyadṛśyatām 
MSS utpakṣmaṇornayanayoruparuddhavṛttiṃ bāṣpaṃ kuru sthiratayā viratānubandham 
MSS asminnalakṣitanatonnatabhūmibhāge mārge padāni khalu te viṣamībhavanti 
MSS utpatato'pyantarikṣaṃ gacchato'pi mahītalam 
MSS dhāvataḥ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ nādattamupatiṣṭhati 
MSS utpatanti yadākāśe nipatanti mahītale 
MSS pakṣiṇas tadapi prāptyā nādattamupatiṣṭhate 
MSS utpatantī bhramantī sā namantī nalinekṣanā 
MSS śampāśataṃ vitanvānā bhramarīva bhramaṃ vyadhāt 
MSS utpatantvantarikṣaṃ vā pātālaṃ praviśantu vā 
MSS carantu vā diśaḥ sarvā hyadattaṃ nopalabhyate 
MSS utpatet sarujād deśād vyādhidurbhikṣapīḍitāt 
MSS anyatra vastuṃ gacched vā vased vā nityamānitaḥ 
MSS utpattiḥ payasāṃ nidhervapurapi khyātaṃ sudhāmandiraṃ spardhante viśadā latābhasaralā hārāvalīmaṃśavaḥ 
MSS kāntā kairaviṇī tava priyasakhaḥ śṛ gārasāraḥ smaro haṃ ho candra kimatra tāpajananaṃ tāpāya yan me bhavān 
MSS utpattiparipūritāyāḥ kimasyāḥ pāvanāntaraiḥ 
MSS tīrthodakaṃ ca vahniśca nānyataḥ śuddhimarhataḥ 
MSS utpattireva viprasya mūrtirdharmasya śāśvatī 
MSS sa hi dharmārthamutpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate 
MSSA utpattirjamadagnitaḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ pinākī guruḥ śauryaṃ yattu na tad girāṃ pathi nanu vyaktaṃ hi tatkarmabhiḥ 
MSSA tyāgaḥ saptasamudramudritamahīnirvyājadānāvadhiḥ kṣattrabrahmataponidherbhagavataḥ kiṃ vā na lokottaram 
MSS utpattirdevayajanād brahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā 
MSS suprasannojjvalā mūrtir asyāṃ snehaṃ karoti me 
MSS utpattirmarutāṃ prabhoryugadine prakhyāpya viśvotsave pūṇyāhaśrutiṣu prasiddhiradhikā pūrṇaṃ vayaḥ pauruṣam 
MSS kākutsthena samaṃ sapatnakalaho daivajñatā tādṛśī kākastena guṇena kāñcanamaye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare 
MSS utpattirmalaye samudranilaye panthā vṛto rākṣasais tatratyānapi hanta candanatarūṃśchindanti sāṃyātrikāḥ 
MSS vartante savidhasthitāśca sukhinaḥ śākhoṭamukhyadrumās tanmanye kṛtinastu te tarukule ye nopayogakṣamāḥ 
MSS utpattyutpannaśiṣṭā vividhaguṇagaṇā yatra yānti praṭiṣṭhāṃ bādhena prāktanānāṃ na ca niyamavidhirnāpi saṃkhyārthadāne 
MSS ūhaḥ sarvatra yasya sphurati ca sakalaḥ satya evārthavādo mīmāṃsābhāvamañcatyabhinavamadhunā mūrtireṣā tvadīyā 
MSS utpatreva dṛśo'rciṣā kusumitevendoḥ karairbhogibhiḥ sāroheva jaṭāṭavī phalatu vaḥ śreyo bhavānīpateḥ 
MSS yatparyantavivartinaḥ surasaritpūrasya bhūrisphurat phenoṇḍūkavilāsamañcati vidherjīrṇā kapālāvalī 
MSS utpathā durnadāḥ kecid bahubha gabhramāvilāḥ 
MSS taṭasthānapi nighnanti tarasā bhinnasetavaḥ 
MSS utpathena kvacid yāti kvacin mārgeṇa gacchati 
MSS muhuruṣṇo muhuḥ śītaś capalaścapalāyate 
MSS utpadyante vipadyante madvidhāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ 
MSS parārthabaddhakakṣyāṇāṃ tādṛśāmudbhavaḥ kutaḥ 
MSS utpannaṃ sudhiyāṃ kule yadakhilaistyaktaṃ budhairna kṣaṇaṃ yan no vismṛtamekadāpi sujanairyadyanna yuktaṃ khalaiḥ 
MSS daurgatyasya tathāvidhasya mahatastasyāpi kenāpi no yad dānāmbusaritpravāhapatitasyākāri hastārpaṇam 
MSS utpannaparitāpasya buddhirbhavati yādṛśī 
MSS tādṛśī yadi pūrvaṃ syāt kasya na syānmahodayaḥ 
MSS utpannaputramātrasya puṃsaḥ svargo bhaved dhrṛvam 
MSS ṭiṭṭibhotpādanādeva mandapālo divaṃ yayau 
MSS utpannamiha loke vai janmaprabhṛti mānavam 
MSS vividhānyupavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca 
MSS tayorekatare mārge yadyenamabhisaṃnayet 
MSS na sukhaṃ prāpya saṃhṛṣyet na duḥkhaṃ prāpya saṃjvaret 
MSS utpannasya ruroḥ śṛ gaṃ vardhamānasya vardhate 
MSS prārthanā puruṣasyeva tasya mātrā na vidyate 
MSS utpannāḥ saritāṃ hradeṣu suciraṃ tatraiva puṣṭāstataḥ prāptāḥ prāvṛṣi sāgaraṃ jalacarāstāsāṃ mukhādeva ye 
MSS dvitraireva dinaistimiṃgilakulasyāsādya kūṭasthatāṃ mṛṣyantyadya na te rahasyapi kṛtāṃ nādeyatāsaṃkathām 
MSS utpannā bahavastaleṣu sarasāmambhoruhāṇāṃ cayā ye yāminyadhipānukāriramaṇīvaktropamānaṃ gatāḥ 
MSS nābhau bhaumariporajāyata mahāpadmaḥ sa ko'pyekako yastrailokyasamudbhavaprabhaviturjanmāvanitvaṃ gataḥ 
MSS utpannāmāpadaṃ yastu samādhatte sa buddhimān 
MSS vaṇijo bhāryayā jāraḥ pratyakṣe nihnuto yathā 
MSS utpanneṣu ca kāryeṣu matiryasya na hīyate 
MSS sa nistarati durgāṇi gopī jāradvayaṃ yathā 
MSS utpanno ghaṭa cakravartyasi punarvahniṃ praviśya tvayā prātaḥ snānapariśrameṇa payasāṃ pānena taptaṃ tapaḥ 
MSS ākramyonnatajānu yan mṛgadṛśāṃ tiṣṭhannitambasthale kaṇṭhālambitabāhuvallikucayoḥ sīmānamāskandasi 
MSS utpalasya ca padmasya matsyasya kumudasya ca 
MSS ekajātiprasūtānāṃ rūpaṃ gandhaḥ pṛthak pṛthak 
MSS utpalasya hi raktimā sādhoḥ paropakāritā 
MSS asādhoḥ karuṇābhāvaḥ svabhāvāstrividhā yathā 
MSS utpallava iva kiraṇaiḥ kusumita iva tārakābhirayaminduḥ 
MSS udayatyudayataṭānte surataruriva śītalacchāyaḥ 
MSS utpaśyāmi drutamapi sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te 
MSS śuklāpāngaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ kathamapi bhavān gantumāśu vyavasyet 
MSS utpātakaṃ tadiha deva vicāraṇīyaṃ nārāyaṇo yadi patedathavā subhadrā 
MSS kādambarīmadavighūrṇitalocanasya yuktaṃ hi lā galadhṛtaḥ patanaṃ pṛthivyām 
MSS utpātaketuriva manmathanāyakasya vajraprahāra iva kelilatāvanasya 
MSS saṃhārakāla iva pānthavadhūjanasya grīṣmasya bhāti divasaḥ sakhi dūritāśaḥ 
MSS utpātajaṃ chidramasau vivasvān vyādāya vaktrākṛti lokabhīṣyam 
MSS attuṃ janān dhūsararaśmirāśiḥ siṃho yathā kīrṇasaṭo'bhyudeti 
MSS utpātāya ca kāvye durupaśrutirabhinaye ca nāṭyānām 
MSS svasthānāmapi yadvad dhvastā dhārā dharitrīti 
MSS utpādakabrahmadātror garīyān brahmadaḥ pitā 
MSS brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ceha ca śāśvatam 
MSS utpādanamapatyasya jātasya paripālanam 
MSS pratyarthaṃ lokayātrāyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ strīnibandhanam 
MSS utpādayati lokasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ 
MSS nanu dākṣiṇyasaṃpannaḥ sarvasya bhavati priyaḥ 
MSS utpādayatyalamidaṃ manaso viṣādaṃ sīdatsaroruhanibhaṃ vadanaṃ tvadīyam 
MSS jñātvā nidānamahamatra samānaduḥkhā prāṇairapi priyatame bhavituṃ samīhe 
MSS utpādayanto suratasya vighnaṃ parasparālāpasukhaṃ harantī 
MSS saṃrāgiṇaḥ kāmijanasya gāḍham akṣṇorlalambe sahasaiva nidrā 
MSS utpāditā svayamiyaṃ yadi tat tanūjā tātena vā yadi tadā bhaginī khalu śrīḥ 
MSS yadyanyasaṃgamavatī ca tadā parastrī tattyāgabaddhamanasaḥ sudhiyo bhavanti 
MSS utpādya kṛtrimān doṣān dhanī sarvatra bādhyate 
MSS kṛtadoṣasahasro'pi nirdhanaḥ parameśvaraḥ 
MSS utpādya putrānanṛṇāṃśca kṛtvā vṛttiṃ ca tebhyo'nuvidhāya kāṃcit 
MSS sthāne kumārīḥ pratipādya sarvā araṇyasaṃstho munivad bubhūṣet 
MSS utpādya yat svayamapi prabalānurāga bhājas tathānusarato'pi divākarasya 
MSS chāyā prasarpati sudūramanena manye klṛptaṃ tayā sadṛśameva kulīnatāyāḥ 
MSS utpucchaḥ pramadocchvasad vapuradhovisraṃsipakṣadvayaḥ svairotphālagatikrameṇa parito bhrāntvā salīlaṃ muhuḥ 
MSS utkaṇṭhālasakūjitaḥ kalarutāṃ bhūyo riraṃsārasa nyagbhūtāṃ caṭakaḥ priyāmabhisaratyudvepamānaḥ kṣaṇam 
MSS utpucchānatadhūtapakṣatatayo jhātkāriṇo vibhramair udvācyāstatacañcavo layavaśādutkṣiptapādā muhuḥ 
MSS paśyanto nijakaṇṭhakāṇḍamalināṃ kādambinīmunnata grīvābhyarṇamilatkalāpaviṭapā nṛtyanti kekābhṛtaḥ 
MSS utpravālānyaraṇyāni vāpyaḥ saṃphullapa kajāḥ 
MSS candraḥ pūrṇaśca kāmena pānthadṛṣṭerviṣaṃ kṛtam 
MSS utplutya dūraṃ paridhūya pakṣā vadho nirīkṣya kṣaṇabaddhalakṣyaḥ 
MSS madhyejalaṃ buḍḍati dattajhampaḥ samatsyamutsarpati matsyara kaḥ 
MSS utplutya yaḥ śikhariṇaṃ madakumbhikumbham udbhidya sānuśatamāyatamullala ghe 
MSS pañcānano niyatayā jarayābhibhūtaḥ so'yaṃ karau lihati bṛṃhitalohitākṣaḥ 
MSS utplutyā gṛhakoṇataḥ pracalitāḥ stokāgraja ghaṃ tato vakrasvairapadakramairupagatāḥ kiṃcic calanto gale

MSS utplutyārādardhacandreṇa lūne vaktre'nyasya krodhadaṣṭoṣṭhadante 
MSS sainyaiḥ kaṇṭhacchedalīne kabandhād bhūyo bibhye valgataḥ sāsipāṇeḥ

MSS uditairapi te dūti mārutairapi dakṣiṇaiḥ

MSS kaṭhinaghṛtapūrapūrṇe śarāvaśirasi pradīpa iva

MSS vapurādarātiśayaśaṃsi punaḥ pratipattimūḍhamapi bāḍhamabhūt 
MSS udīcyāṃ sasyaniṣpattir yāmyāṃ niṣpattināśanam 
MSS gṛhānnirgacchatāṃ vame śubhaṃ kṣetre ca dakṣiṇam 
MSS udīrito'rthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti coditāḥ 
MSS anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pare gitajñāna phalā hi buddhayaḥ 
MSS udīrṇamanaso yodha vāhanāni ca bhārata 
MSS yasyāṃ bhavanti senāyāṃ dhruvaṃ tasyāṃ jayo bhavet 
MSS udīryamāṇe'pi ca sāntvavāde mānāpanodo nahi rādhikāyāḥ 
MSS māno'stu te yadyaparādhikaḥ syāṃ svapne'pi naivāsmyaparādhiko'ham 
MSS udumbaradrumānaṣṭau ropayet svayameva yaḥ 
MSS prerayed ropaṇāyāpi candraloke sa modate 
MSS udumbaraphalānīva brahmāṇḍānyatti yaḥ sadā 
MSS sarvagarvāpahaḥ kālas tasya ke maśakā vayam

MSS santo hasanti na bhajanti bhajanti cet tvāṃ bhrāntā bhavanti sahasā na punarbhajanti

MSS tatra pratyūhamādhātuṃ brahmāpi khalu kātaraḥ 
MSS unmattamāsādya haraḥ smaraśca dvāvapyasīmāṃ mudamudvahete

MSS striyo yacca prabhāṣante tasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ 
MSS unmattānāṃ bhuja gānāṃ madyapānāṃ ca dantinām

MSS durgasya la ghanopāyāś catvāraḥ kathitā ime 
MSS upajāpasahān vila ghayan sa vidhātā nṛpatīn mahoddhataḥ 
MSS sahate na jano'pyadhaḥkriyāṃ kimu lokādhikadhāma rājakam 
MSS upajāpahṛtasvāmisnehasīmni parāśrayam 
MSS maule vāñchati medinyāḥ patyuḥ pāto na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS upajīvati sma satataṃ dadhataḥ parimugdhatāṃ vaṇigivoḍupateḥ 
MSS ghanavīthivīthimavatīrṇavato nidhirambhasāmupacayāya kalāḥ 
MSS upajīvyā hatā kanyā svārthe pākakriyā hatā 
MSS śūdrabhikṣāhato yāgaḥ kṛpaṇasya hataṃ dhanaṃ 
MSS upatāpyamānamalaghūṣṇimabhiḥ śvasitaiḥ sitetarasarojadṛśaḥ 
MSS dravatāṃ na netumadharaṃ kṣamate navanāgavallidalarāgarasaḥ 
MSS upadiśati lokavṛttaṃ vitarati vittaṃ vinodayati cittam 
MSS uttambhayati mahattvaṃ vidyā hṛdyā surājaseveva 
MSS upadeśaṃ viduḥ śuddhaṃ santas tamupadeśinaḥ 
MSS śyāmāyate na yuṣmāsu yaḥ kāñcanamivāgniṣu 
MSS upadeśapradāt ṇāṃ narāṇāṃ hitamicchatām 
MSS parasminnihaloke ca vyasanaṃ nopapadyate 
MSS upadeśo na dātavyo yādṛśe tādṛśe nare 
MSS paśya vānaramūrkheṇa sugṛhī nirgṛhīkṛtā 
MSS upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ krodhāyaiva śamāya na 
MSS payaḥpānaṃ bhuja gānāṃ viṣāyaivāmṛtāya na 
MSS upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ prakopāya na śāntaye 
MSS payaḥpānaṃ bhuja gānāṃ kevalaṃ viṣavardhanaṃ 
MSS upadraṣṭānumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ 
MSS paramātmeti cāpyukto dehe'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ 
MSS upadhāśodhitāḥ samyag īhamānāḥ phalodayam 
MSS te'sya sarvaṃ parīkṣeran sānurāgāḥ kṛtākṛtam 
MSS upetya dhīyate yasmād upadheti tataḥ smṛtā 
MSS upāya upadhā jñeyā tayāmātyān parīkṣayet 
MSS upadhitrayaśuddhito'sya kiṃ kanakasyeva paraṃ parīkṣaṇam 
MSS upadhivasatipiṇḍān gṛhṇate no viruddhāṃs tanuvacanamanobhiḥ sarvathā ye munīndrāḥ 
MSS vratasamitisametā dhvastamohaprapañcā dadatu mama vimuktiṃ te hatakrodhayodhāḥ 
MSS upanatabhaye yo yo mārgo hitārthakaro bhavet sa sa nipuṇayā buddhyā sevyo mahān kṛpaṇo'pi vā 
MSS karikaranibhau jyāghātā kau mahāstraviśāradau valayaracitau strīvad bāhū kṛtau na kirīṭinā 
MSS upanatamatipuṇyacayaiḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ rakṣitaṃ ca yatnena 
MSS saṃpadi vipadi trāṇaṃ bhavati nidhānaṃ ca mitraṃ ca 
MSS upanadipuline mahāpalāśaḥ pavanasamucchaladekapattrapāṇiḥ 
MSS davadahanavinaṣṭajīvitānāṃ salilamivaiṣa dadāti pādapānām 
MSS upanayati kapole lolakarṇapravāla kṣaṇamukulaniveśāndolanavyāpṛtānām 
MSS parimalitaharidrān saṃprati dvāviḍīnāṃ navanakhapadatiktānātapaḥ svedabindūn 
MSS upanayanavivāhāvutsavaikapradhānau kalivibhavata eṣāṃ kālabhedānabhijñāḥ 
MSS vijahati na kadācid vedapāṭhaikayogye vayasi ca yavanānīvācanābhyāsamete 
MSS upanayati masiṃ pattraṃ cedaṃ likhāmi kimatra vā tvamiti vinayabhraṃśo yūyaṃ tviti praṇayakṣatiḥ 
MSS suhṛditi mṛṣā nāthetyūnaṃ nṛpeti taṭasthatā kathamiti tataḥ saṃdeṣṭavyo mayā yadunandanaḥ 
MSS upaniṣadaḥ paripītā gītāpi na hanta matipathaṃ nītā 
MSS tadapi na hā vidhuvadanā mānasasadanād bahiryāti 
MSS upanihitahalīṣāsārgaladvāramārāt paricakitapurandhrīsāritābhyarṇabhāṇḍam 
MSS pavanarayatiraścīrvāridhārāḥ pratīcchan viśati valitaśṛ gaḥ pāmarāgāramukṣā 
MSS upanītanītinaukaḥ saṃsāravikāravārivanyāsu 
MSS satpuruṣakarṇadhāras tārayati janān bahūnekaḥ 
MSS upanīya kalamakuḍavaṃ kathayati sabhayaścikitsake halikaḥ 
MSS śoṇaṃ somārdhanibhaṃ vadhūstane vyādhimupajātam 
MSS upanīya priyamasamaya vidaṃ ca me dagdhamānamapanīya 
MSS narmopakrama eva kṣaṇade dūtīva calitāsi 
MSS upanīya yannitambe bhujaṃgamuccairalambi vibudhaiḥ śrīḥ 
MSS ekaḥ sa mandaragiriḥ sakhi garimāṇaṃ samudvahatu 
MSS upanetumunnatimateva divaṃ kucayoryugena tarasā kalitām 
MSS rabhasotthitāmupagataḥ sahasā parirabhya kaścana vadhūmarudhat 
MSS upapattibhiramlānā nopadeśaiḥ kadarthitāḥ 
MSS svasaṃvedanasaṃvedyasārāḥ sahṛdayoktayaḥ 
MSS upapannaṃ nanu śivaṃ saptasvaṅgeṣuyasya me 
MSS daivīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca pratihartā tvamāpadām 
MSS upaparisaraṃ godāvaryāḥ parityajatādhvagāḥ saraṇimaparo mārgas tāvad bhavadbhirihekṣyatām 
MSS iha hi vihito raktāśokaḥ kayāpi hatāśayā caraṇanalinanyāsodañcannavāṅkurakañcukaḥ 
MSS upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam 
MSS yogaṃ ca rakṣasām śreṣṭha tāvubhau ca nayānayau 
MSS upaprākārāgraṃ prahiṇu nayane tarkaya manāg anākāśe ko'yaṃ galitahariṇaḥ śītakiraṇaḥ 
MSS sudhābaddhagrāsairupavanacakorairanusṛtāṃ kirañ jyotsnāmacchāṃ navalavalapākapraṇayinīm 
MSS upaplavo'sau kimu rājaputrī jyotsnādravo'sāvuta vajrapātaḥ 
MSS alaṃ tayā saiva hi jīvitaṃ me dhiṅ māmahaṃ vā caritārtha ekaḥ 
MSS upaplutaṃ pātumado madoddhatais tvameva viśvaṃbhara viśvamīśiṣe 
MSS ṛte raveḥ kṣālayituṃ kṣameta kaḥ kṣapātamaskāṇḍamalīmasaṃ nabhaḥ 
MSS upabarhamambujadṛśo nijaṃ bhujaṃ viracayya vaktramapi gaṇḍamaṇḍale 
MSS nijasakthi sakthini nidhāya sādaraṃ svapiti stanārpitakarāmbujo yuvā 
MSS upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā 
MSS evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho'pi nirarthakaḥ 
MSS upabhuktakhadiravīṭaka janitādhararāgabhaṅgabhayāt 
MSS pitari mṛte'pi na veśyā roditi hā tāta tāteti 
MSS upabhuktāśeṣavṛṣaṃ dhāvantaṃ mṛgaśireśabhogāya 
MSS kaḥ khecarakesariṇaṃ paśyatu bhāsvantamantakapratimam 
MSS upabhoktuṃ na jānāti kadāpi kṛpaṇo janaḥ 
MSS ākaṇṭhajalamagno'pi kukkuro leḍhi jihvayā 
MSS upabhogakātarāṇāṃ puruṣāṇāmarthasaṃcayaparāṇām 
MSS kanyāmaṇiriva sadane tiṣṭhatyarthaḥ parasyārthe 
MSS upabhogādṛte tasya nāśa eva na vidyate 
MSS prāktanaṃ bandhanaṃ karma ko'nyathā kartumarhati 
MSS upabhogāya ca dhanaṃ jīvitaṃ yena rakṣitam 
MSS na rakṣitā tu bhūryena kiṃ tasya dhanajīvitaiḥ 
MSS upabhogena puṇyānāṃ prāktanānāṃ tathāṃhasām 
MSS kartavyamiti nityānām akāmakaraṇāt tathā 
MSS upabhogairapi tyaktaṃ nātmānamavasādayet 
MSS caṇḍālatve'pi mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā tāta durlabham 
MSS upamā kālidāsasya bhāraverarthagauravam 
MSS daṇḍinaḥ padalālityaṃ māghe santi trayo guṇāḥ 
MSS upamānamabhūd vilāsināṃ karaṇaṃ yat tava kāntimattayā 
MSS tadidaṃ gatamīdṛśīm daśāṃ na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ 
MSS upayayau tanutāṃ madhukhaṇḍitā himakarodayapāṇḍumukhacchaviḥ 
MSS sadṛśamiṣṭasamāgamanirvṛtiṃ vanitayānitayā rajanīvadhūḥ 
MSS upari kabarībandhagrantheratha grathitāṅgulī nijabhujalate tiryaktanvyā vitatya vivṛttayā 
MSS vivṛtavilasadvāmāpāṅgastanārdhakapolayā kuvalayadalasraksaṃdigdhaśriyaḥ prahitā dṛśaḥ 
MSS upari karavāladhārā kārāḥ krūrā bhujaṅgamapuṅgavāt 
MSS antaḥ sākṣāddrākṣā dīkṣāguravo jayanti ke'pi janāḥ 
MSS uparigataṃ hi savarṇaṃ hṛtvā karato dadāsi rantuṃ me 
MSS dhanyaḥ sarojayugalaṃ tvaktvā stanayugamathāspṛśat kṛṣṇaḥ 
MSS upari ghanaṃ ghanapaṭalaṃ tiryaggirayo'pi nartitamayūrāḥ 
MSS kṣitirapi kandaladhavalā dṛṣṭiṃ pathikaḥ kva pātayatu 
MSS upari ghanaṃ ghanaraṭitaṃ dūre dayitā kimetadāpatitam 
MSS himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ śīrṣe sarpaḥ samāviṣṭaḥ 
MSS uparijatarujāni yājamānāṃ kuśalatayā parirambhalolupo'nyaḥ 
MSS prathitapṛthupayodharāṃ gṛhāṇa svayamiti mugdhavadhūmudāsa dorbhyām 
MSS upari tamālataroḥ sakhi pariṇataśaradindumaṇḍalaḥ ko'pi 
MSS tatra ca muralīkhuralī kulamaryādāmadho nayati 
MSS uparitalanipātiteṣṭako'yaṃ śirasi tanurvipulaśca madhyadeśe 
MSS asadṛśajanasaṃprayogabhīror hṛdayamiva sphuṭitaṃ mahāgṛhasya 
MSS upari pariplavate mama bāleyaṃ gṛhiṇi haṃsamāleva 
MSS sarasa iva nalinanālā tvamāśayaṃ prāpya vasasi punaḥ 
MSS upari pīnapayodharapātitā paṭakuṭīva manobhavabhūpateḥ 
MSS vijayinastripurārijigīṣayā tava virājati bhāmini kañcukī 
MSS upari mihiraḥ krūraḥ krūrās tale'calabhūmayo vahati pavanaḥ pāṃśūtkarṣī kṛśaḥ saraso rasaḥ 
MSS ahaha na jahatyete prāṇāṃstadaiva kimadhvagā yadi na bhavataḥ patracchatraṃ viśanti mahīruhaḥ 
MSS upari vidhṛtaśāriprauḍhadhanviprasārād iha payasi nadīnāṃ gāhituṃ naiva śaktāḥ 
MSS taṭanikaṭanirūḍhāḥ prasthitau yasya caṇḍāḥ saralitakaradaṇḍāḥ kumbhino'mbhaḥ pibanti 
MSS upariṣṭhā yadā nārī ramate kāmukaṃ naram 
MSS viparītaṃ rataṃ jñeyaṃ sarvakāmijanapriyam 
MSS uparisthā bhaktirantar nirmūlā tārayet katham 
MSS nahi bhārakṣamā dṛṣṭā vārāṃ sāndrāpi nīlikā 
MSS uparundhanti śvāsān munayo nāśnanti na pibanti 
MSS stūyante sujanaiḥ kiṃ kaṇṭhe kurvanti kanakapāśamime 
MSS uparyaṃśumataḥ siddhāś caranto yasya sānuṣu 
MSS chatrāṇyātapasaṃtrāsād avācīnāni bibhrati 
MSS uparyaṣṭau śatānyāhus tathā bhūyaśca saptatiḥ 
MSS gajānāṃ tu parīmāṇam etadeva vinirdiśet 
MSS uparyupari lokasya sarvo gantuṃ samīhate 
MSS yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tad vartate tathā 
MSS upalakṣya varṇasaṃkara mapagataguṇayogamujjhitasthairyam 
MSS pathikāḥ samudvijante kudeśamiva vīkṣya śakradhanuḥ 
MSS upalanikaṣaṃ suvarṇaṃ puruṣo vyavahāranikaṣa uddiṣṭaḥ 
MSS dhūrnikaṣo govṛṣabhaḥ strīṇāṃ tu na vidyate nikaṣaḥ 
MSS upalaśakalametad bhedakaṃ gomayānāṃ vaṭubhirupahṛtānāṃ barhiṣāṃ stūpametat 
MSS śaraṇamapi samidbhiḥ śuṣyamāṇābhirābhir vinamitapaṭalāntaṃ dṛśyate jīrṇakuḍyam 
MSS upavanatarunṛtyādhyāpane labdhavarṇo viracitajalakeliḥ padminīkāminībhiḥ 
MSS priyasuhṛdasameṣorāyayau yogiyoga sthitividalanadakṣo dakṣiṇo gandhavāhaḥ 
MSS upavananavamālikāprasūnaiḥ srajamapi yā parikhidyate sṛjantī 
MSS parijanavanitocitāni karmāṇy aparicitāni kathaṃ vidhāsyasi tvam 
MSS upavanapavanānupātadakṣair alibhiralābhi yadaṅganājanasya 
MSS parimalaviṣayas tadunnatānām anugamane khalu saṃpado'grataḥsthāḥ 
MSS upavanamiva vārimadhyamagnaṃ vimalatayā pratibiṃbitaṃ dadhānā 
MSS śaśikaranikareṇa pūriteva kvacidupaneyapayāḥ sukhāya vāpī 
MSS upavanasalilānāṃ bālapadmair bhramaraparabhṛtānāṃ kaṇṭhanādaiḥ 
MSS samadagativilāsaiḥ kāminīnāṃ kathayati paṭuvṛttaṃ madhumāsaḥ 
MSS upaviśati nṛpaniyuktaḥ kenacidanyena vā janenoktaḥ 
MSS nijaveśajātisamucitam āsanamālokya sevate sumatiḥ 
MSS upaviṣṭaḥ sabhāmadhye yo na vakti sphuṭaṃ vacaḥ 
MSS tasmād dūreṇa sa tyājyo na yo vā kīrtayed ṛtam 
MSS upavīṇayanti paramapsaraso nṛpamānasiṃha tava dānayaśaḥ 
MSS suraśākhimaulikusumaspṛhayā namanāya tasya yatamānatamāḥ 
MSS upaśamaphalād vidyābījāt phalaṃ dhanamicchatāṃ bhavati viphalaḥ prārambho yattadatra kimadbhutam 
MSS niyataviṣayāḥ sarve bhāvā na yānti hi vikriyāṃ janayitumalaṃ śālerbījaṃ na jātu yavāṅkuram 
MSS upaśamitameghanādaṃ prajvalitadaśānanaṃ ramitarāmam 
MSS rāmāyaṇamiva subhagaṃ dīpadinaṃ haratu vo duritam 
MSS upaśobhaiva sahāyāḥ siddhirvīrasya sāhase vasati 
MSS dalayati kulāni kariṇāṃ kila hariṇaparigrahaḥ siṃhaḥ 
MSS upasaṃdhyamāsta tanu sānumataḥ śikhareṣu tatkṣaṇamaśītarucaḥ 
MSS karajālamastasamaye'pi satām ucitaṃ khalūccatarameva padam 
MSS upasargāḥ kriyāyoge pāṇineriti saṃmatam 
MSS niṣkriyo'pi tavārātiḥ sopasargaḥ sadā katham 
MSS upasargāḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe'pyātmani yoginaḥ 
MSS ye tāṃste saṃpravakṣyāmi samāsena nibodha me 
MSS upasarge'nyacakre ca durbhikṣe ca bhayāvahe 
MSS asādhujanasaṃparke yaḥ palāyet sa jīvati 
MSS upasargairjitairebhir upasargās tataḥ punaḥ 
MSS yoginaḥ saṃpravartante sāttvarājasatāmasāḥ 
MSS upasthitaḥ prākṛtapuṇyapākāt puraḥsthito dakṣiṇapāṇinā svam 
MSS śiraḥ spṛśed dakṣiṇaceṣṭito vā yo maṇḍalo maṇḍalalābhado'sau 
MSS upasthitasya kāmasya prativādo na vidyate 
MSS api nirmuktadehasya kāmaraktasya kiṃ punaḥ 
MSS upasthitāyāṃ vipadi ghorāyāṃ svīyarakṣaṇe 
MSS dhīmadbhiḥ puruṣairyuktaṃ vastraṃ tyaktvā palāyanam 
MSS upasthite prāṇahare kṛtānte kimāśu kāryaṃ sudhiyā prayatnāt 
MSS vākkāyacittaiḥ sukhadaṃ yamaghnaṃ murāripādāmbujameva cintyam 
MSS upasthite viplava eva puṃsāṃ samastabhāvaḥ parimīyate'ntaḥ 
MSS avāti vāyau nahi tūlarāśer gireśca kaścit pratibhāti bhedaḥ 
MSS upasthite vivāhe ca dāne yajñe tathā vibho 
MSS samācarati yo vighnaṃ sa mṛtvā jāyate kṛmiḥ 
MSS upaharaṇaṃ vibhavānāṃ saṃharaṇaṃ sakaladuritajālasya 
MSS uddharaṇaṃ saṃsārāc caraṇaṃ vaḥ śreyase'stu viśvapateḥ 
MSS upahāsādikaṃ dūtyā nāyikāyāstataḥ param 
MSS atha saṃbhogaśṛṅgāre parasparavilokanam 
MSS upahitaṃ śiśirāpagamaśriyā mukulajālamaśobhata kiṃśuke 
MSS praṇayinīva nakhakṣatamaṇḍanaṃ pramadayā madayāpitalajjayā 
MSS upaṃśukrīḍito'mātyaḥ svayaṃ rājāyate yataḥ 
MSS avajñā kriyate tena sadā paricayād dhruvam 
MSS upākṛtāyā navayauvanena yāntyā galatsāñjanabāṣpapūram 
MSS bālyaśriyaḥ kiṃ padavī vireje romāvalī khañjanalocanāyāḥ 
MSS upādade tasya sahasraraśmis tvaṣṭrā navaṃ nirmitamātapatram 
MSS sa taddukūlād avidūramaulir babhau patadgaṅga ivottamāṅge 
MSS upādātā yāvanna bhavati bhavādṛgguṇavatām asatkalpāstāvat tribhuvanamahārhā api guṇāḥ 
MSS api prāgdaityārerhṛdayavasateḥ kaustubhamaṇiḥ sa kiṃ nāsīdabdhau śrutirapi kimasya kvacidabhūt 
MSS upādhibhiḥ satatasaṃgato'pi nahi svabhāvaṃ vijahāti bhāvaḥ 
MSS ājanma yo majjati dugdhasindhau tathāpi kākaḥ kila kṛṣṇa eva 
MSS upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca ye'bhidruhyanti manasā karmaṇā vā 
MSS teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ tasmānnānyaḥ pāpakṛdasti loke 
MSS upādhyāyaśca vaidyaśca pratibhūrbhuktanāyikā 
MSS sūtikā dūtikāścaiva siddhe kārye tṛṇopamāḥ 
MSS upādhyāyān daśācārya ācāryāṇāṃ śataṃ pitā 
MSS sahasraṃ tu pit n mātā gauraveṇātiricyate 
MSS upādhvaṃ tat pānthāḥ punarapi saro mārgatilakaṃ yadāsādya svacchaṃ vilasatha vinītaklamabharāḥ 
MSS itastu kṣārābdherjaraṭhamakarakṣuṇṇapayaso nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punaravatāraḥ kathamapi 
MSS upānahau ca yo dadyāt pātrabhūte dvijottame 
MSS so'pi lokānavāpnoti daivatairabhipūjitān 
MSS upānītaṃ dūrāt parimalamupāghrāya marutā samāyāsīdasmin madhuramadhulobhānmadhukaraḥ 
MSS paro dūre lābhaḥ kupitaphaṇinaś candanataroḥ punarjīvan yāyād yadi tadiha lābho'yamatulaḥ 
MSS upāntapronmīladviṭapijaṭilāṃ kautukavatī kadācid gantāsi priyasakhi na śiprātaṭabhuvam 
MSS yadasyāṃ muktāsragvihitasitabhogibhramatayā vayorūḍhaḥ kekī likhati nakhareṇa stanataṭam 
MSS upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hyapāyamapi cintayet 
MSS paśyato bakamūrkhasya nakulairbhakṣitāḥ sutāḥ 
MSS upāyaṃ yaṃ puraskṛtya sevate sevakaḥ prabhum 
MSS anantarajñas tatraiva yogyaṃ taṃ kila manyate 
MSS upāyakuśalaṃ vaidyaṃ bhṛtyasaṃdūṣaṇe ratam 
MSS śūramaiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate 
MSS upāyajñaśca yogajñas tattvajñaḥ pratibhānavān 
MSS svadharmanirato nityaṃ parastrīṣu parāṅmukhaḥ 
MSS vaktohavāṃścitrakathaḥ syādakuṇṭhitavāk sadā 
MSS upāyanīkṛtaṃ yat tu suhṛtsambandhibandhuṣu 
MSS vivāhādiṣu cācāradattaṃ hrīdattameva tat 
MSS upāyapūrvaṃ lipseta kālaṃ vīkṣya samutpatet 
MSS paścāttāpāya bhavati vikramaikarasajñatā 
MSS upāyamāsthitasyāpi naśyantyarthāḥ pramādyataḥ 
MSS hanti nopaśayastho'pi śayālurmṛgayurmṛgān 
MSS upāyānāṃ ca sarveṣām upāyaḥ paṇyasaṃbhavaḥ 
MSS dhanārthaṃ śasyate hyekas tadanyaḥ saṃśayātmakaḥ 
MSS upāyā yuktayo māyāḥ kālayāpanamucyate

MSS śṛgālena hato hastī gacchatā paṅkavartmanā 
MSS upāyairapyaśakyāste jāne jetuṃ nareśvarāḥ

MSS upāyairiva taiḥ kāle caturbhiḥ suprayojitaiḥ

MSS sādhyo'pi bhūtvā prathamaṃ tato'sāv asādhyatāṃ vyādhiriva prayāti

MSS upekṣeta pranaṣṭaṃ yat prāptaṃ yat tadupāharet 
MSS na bālaṃ na striyaṃ cātilālayet tāḍayen na ca 
MSS vidyābhyāse gṛhyakṛtye tāvubhau yojayet kramāt 
MSS upekṣeta samarthaḥ san dharmasya paripanthinaḥ 
MSS sa eva sarvanāśāya hetubhūto na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS upekṣyapakṣe bhūpānāṃ mānaḥ svārthasya siddhaye 
MSS sa tu prāṇānupekṣyāpi grāhyapakṣe manasvinām 
MSSA upekṣya loṣṭakṣeptāraṃ loṣṭaṃ daśati maṇḍalaḥ

MSS uṣasi parivartayantyā muktādāmopavītatāṃ nītam 
MSS puruṣāyitavaidagdhyaṃ vrīḍāvati kairna kalitaṃ te 
MSS uṣasi bhramarayuvānaḥ svapne dṛṣṭvā sarojasāmrājyam 
MSS gatakalpakundatalpāḥ sarasīsalilāni jighranti 
MSS uṣasi malayavāsī jālamārgapraviṣṭo vikacakamalareṇuṃ vyākiran mohacūrṇam 
MSS sapadi śamitadīpo vāyucoro vadhūnāṃ harati suratakhedasvedamuktāphalāni 
MSS uṣasyeva bhrāntaṃ hatajaṭharahetos tata itaḥ svayaṃ ca svaṃ bibhrad vicarati kuṭumbaṃ diśi diśi 
MSS batāsmābhiḥ kākairiva kavalamātraikamuditair na cāyurdurgatyoravadhiriha labdhaḥ kathamapi 
MSS uṣāpatimukhāmbhoje narīnarti sarasvatī 
MSS ṛturājakavereva gāyantī guṇagauravam 
MSS uṣṭrāṇāṃ ca vivāheṣu gītaṃ gāyanti gardabhāḥ 
MSS parasparaṃ praśaṃsanti aho rūpamaho aho dhvaniḥ 
MSS uṣṇaṃ jalaṃ kṣipet tatra mātrā nāstīha kasyacit 
MSS pakṣaikaṃ sthāpite bhāṇḍe koṣṇasthāne manīṣiṇā 
MSS kuṇapastu bhavedeva tarūṇāṃ puṣṭikārakaḥ 
MSS uṣṇakāle jalaṃ dadyāc śītakāle hutāśanam 
MSS prāvṛṭkāle gṛhaṃ deyaṃ sarvakāle ca bhojanam 
MSS uṣṇamannaṃ ghṛtaṃ madyaṃ taruṇī kṣīrabhojanam 
MSS vāpīkapavaṭacchāyā ṣaḍkaṃ tat balavardhanam 
MSS uṣṇāluḥ śiśire niṣīdati tarormūlālavāle śikhī nirbhidyopari karṇikāramukulānyālīyate ṣaṭpadaḥ 
MSS taptaṃ vāri vihāya tīranalinīṃ kāraṇḍavaḥ sevate krīḍāveśmani caiṣa pañjaraśukaḥ klānto jalaṃ yācate 
MSS uṣṇālu kvacidarkadhāmani manāṅ nidrālu śītānile hālānāṃ gṛhayālu cumbadasakṛllajjālu jāyāmukham 
MSS nityaṃ niṣpatayālu tiryagavanīśayyāśayālu kṣaṇaṃ gītebhyaḥ spṛhayālu dhāma dhavalaṃ dīne dayālu śraye 
MSS uṣṇīṣavān yathā vastrais tribhirbhavati saṃvṛtaḥ 
MSS saṃvṛto'yaṃ tathā dehī sattvarājasatāmasaiḥ 
MSS uṣmāyamāṇastanamaṇḍalībhir vārāṅganābhiḥ sphuṭavibhramābhiḥ 
MSS āliṅgitā rātriṣu śaiśirīṣu te śerate yaiḥ praṇato śaśāṅkaḥ 
MSS ūcivānucitamakṣaramenaṃ pāśapāṇirapi pāṇimudasya 
MSS kīrtireva bhavatāṃ priyadārā dānanīrajharamauktikahārā 
MSSA ūḍhā khaḍgalatā śyāmā tvayā mātaṅgadārikā 
MSSA ata eva bhavān manye dūraṃ parihṛtaḥ paraiḥ 
MSS ūḍhāpi dyutaraṅgiṇi trijagatīvandyena tenāpyaho maulau bālakuraṅgaketanakalālīlāvataṃsāṅkite 
MSS tārakṣārakaraṃ karālamakaraṃ saśvabhramabhraṃkaṣaṃ mugdhe jāḍyanidhiṃ mudhā jalanidhiṃ yātāsi citrāḥ striyaḥ 
MSS ūḍhāmunātivāhaya pṛṣṭhe lagnāpi kālamacalāpi 
MSS sarvaṃsahe kaṭhora tvacaḥ kimaṅkena kamaṭhasya 
MSS ūḍhā yena mahādhurāḥ suviṣame mārge sadaikākinā soḍho yena kadācideva na nije goṣṭhe'nyaśauṇḍadhvaniḥ 
MSS āsīd yastu gavāṃ gaṇasya tilakas tasyaida saṃpratyaho dhik kaṣṭaṃ dhavalasya jātajaraso goḥ paṇyamudghoṣyate 
MSS ūdhaśchindyāddhi yo dhenvāḥ kṣīrārthī na labhet payaḥ 
MSS evaṃ rāṣṭramayogena pīḍitaṃ na vivardhate 
MSS ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣāyām aprāptaḥ pañcaviṃśatim 
MSS yadyādhatte pumān garbhaḥ kukṣisthaḥ sa vipadyate 
MSS ūne dadyād gurūneva yāvat sarvalaghurbhavet 
MSS prastāro'yaṃ samākhyātaś chandovicitivedibhiḥ 
MSS ūnenāpi hi tucchena vairiṇāpi kathaṃcana 
MSS maitrī buddhimatā kāryā āpadyapi nivartate 
MSS ūrīkartuṃ tuhinakiraṇaprītidhārāmudārāṃ dūrīkartuṃ dinakarakarakleśabādhāmagādhām

MSS ūruḥ kuraṅgadṛśaś cañcalacelāñcalo bhāti 
MSS sapatākaḥ kanakamayo vijayastambhaḥ smarasyeva

MSS madhyaṃ kṣāmayatā stanau ghanayatā kāntyā mukhaṃ limpatā tanvaṅgyā navayauvanena kimapi pratyaṅgamunmīlitam 
MSS ūrudvayaṃ kadalakandalayoḥ savaṃśaṃ śroṇiḥ śilāphalakasodarasanniveśā

MSS ūrudvayaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ kadalasya kāṇḍau madhyaṃ ca vediratulaṃ stanayugmamasyāḥ 
MSS lāvaṇyavāriparipūritaśātakumbha kumbhau manojanṛpaterabhiṣecanāya

MSS yuktaṃ hriyā kuṇḍalanacchalena gopāyati svaṃ mukhapuṣkaraṃ saḥ 
MSS ūrumūlagatanetrayugasya preyaso rabhasavellitakeśī 
MSS cumbati sma ratikelividagdhā hāvahāri vadanaṃ dayitasya 
MSS ūrumūlacapalekṣaṇamaghnan yairvataṃsakumumaiḥ priyametāḥ 
MSS cakrire sapadi tāni yathārthaṃ manmathasya kusumāyudhanāma 
MSS ūrū rambhā dṛgapi kamalaṃ śevalaṃ keśapāśo vaktraṃ candro lapitamamṛtaṃ madhyadeśo mṛṇālam 
MSS nābhiḥ kūpo valirapi saritpallavaḥ kiṃ ca pāṇir yasyāḥ sā ced urasi na kathaṃ hanta tāpasya śāntiḥ 
MSS ūrū rambhe bāhū late vidhātrā kucau punaḥ kamale 
MSS yauvanamupavanamasyāṃ madanavilāsāya kiṃ racitam 
MSS ūrau śirastava niveśya dayāvitīrṇa saṃyānapallavasamīravinītakhedam 
MSS atraiva janmani vibhoḥ paramopadeśam ākarṇayeyamapi kiṃ maṇikarṇikāyām 
MSS ūrjitaṃ sajjanaṃ dṛṣṭvā dveṣṭi nīcaḥ punaḥ punaḥ 
MSS kavalīkurute svasthaṃ vidhuṃ divi vidhuṃtudaḥ 
MSS ūrṇāṃ naiva dadāti naiva viṣayo vāhasya dohasya vā tṛptirnāsti mahodarasya bahubhirghāsaiḥ palāśairapi 
MSS hā kaṣṭaṃ kathamasya pṛṣṭhaśikhare goṇī samāropyate ko gṛhṇāti kapardakairalamiti grāmyairgajo hasyate 
MSS ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti yaṃ tyaktvā yaṃ gṛhītvā patantyadhaḥ 
MSS tasya gauravamarthasya tāvataivānumīyatām 
MSS ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ 
MSS jaghanyaguṇavṛttasthā adho gacchanti tāmasāḥ 
MSS ūrdhvaṃ na kṣīravicchedāt payo dhenoravāpyate

MSS ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hyutkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati 
MSS pratyutthānābhivādābhyāṃ punas tān pratipadyate 
MSS ūrdhvaṃ yāti cāpamuṣṭir guṇamuṣṭiradho bhavet 
MSS sa mukto mārgaṇo lakṣyād dūraṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS ūrdhvaṃvrīhitrayaṃ mānam aṅgulasya nigadyate 
MSS hasto'pi hi samākhyātaś caturviśadbhiraṅgulaiḥ 
MSS ūrdhvaṃ śvasaṃstataḥ prāṇo yātyalabdhasthitis tanoḥ 
MSS taṃ yāntamanuyātyeva jīvaḥ kālapraṇoditaḥ 
MSS ūrdhvagaṃ kapilābhāsam aṅgaṃ yasmin pratīyate 
MSS nakulāṅgaṃ tu taṃ vidyāt sparśas tasyāhināśanaḥ 
MSS ūrdhvabāhur viraumyeṣa na ca kaścic śrṇoti me 
MSS dharmādarthaśca kāmaśca sa kimarthaṃ na sevyate 
MSS ūrdhvavedhī bhavej jyeṣṭho nābhivedī ca madhyamaḥ 
MSS yaḥ pādavedhī lakṣyasya sa kaniṣṭho mato mayā 
MSS ūrdhvaśaktinipātena adhaḥśakternikuñcanāt 
MSS madhyaśaktiprabodhena jāyate paramaṃ sukham 
MSS ūrdhvānanā bhāskarasaṃmukhīnāḥ śvāno ruvanto mahate bhayāya

MSS ūrdhvārohe ya ālambahetur bhūbhṛc chinatti tam 
MSS kuṭhārikas taruskandham ivādhogamanonmukhaḥ 
MSS ūrdhvārdhe lakṣaṇaṃ yasya nādho'rdhe lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet 
MSS taṃ khaḍgaṃ madhyamaṃ prāhuḥ pravīṇamatayo budhāḥ 
MSS ūrdhvīkṛtagrīvamaho mudhaiva kiṃ yācase cātakapota megham

MSS śvānaḥ svareṇa śravaṇāntaśātinā mitho rudantaḥ karuṇena niryayuḥ 
MSS ūṣaraṃ karmasasyānāṃ kṣetraṃ vārāṇasī purī 
MSS yatra saṃlabhyate mokṣaḥ samaṃ caṇḍālapaṇḍitaiḥ 
MSS ūṣareṣu ca kṣetreṣu yathā bījaṃ hi niṣphalam
