MSS payasā putrasaṃbhūtis tasyāḥ saṃjāyate dhruvam 
MSS ṛtena jīvedanṛtena jīven mitena jīvet pramitena jīvet 
MSS satyānṛtābhyāmathavāpi jīvet śvavṛttimekāṃ parivarjayet tu 
MSS ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate 
MSS sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me 
MSS ṛte yadarthaṃ praṇayād rakṣyate yacca rakṣati 
MSS pūrvopacitasaṃbandhaṃ tan mitraṃ nityamucyate 
MSS ṛte senāpraṇetāraṃ pṛtanā sumahatyapi 
MSS dīryate yuddhamāsādya pipīlikapuṭaṃ yathā 
MSS ṛtvikpurohitācāryāḥ śiṣyāḥ saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ 
MSS sarve pūjyāśca mānyāśca śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥ 
MSS ṛddhimān rākṣaso mūḍhaś citram nāsau yaduddhataḥ 
MSS ko vā heturanāryāṇāṃ dharmye vartmani vartitum 
MSS ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam 
MSS ṛṣabho'tra gīyata iti śrutvā svarapāragā vayaṃ prāptāḥ 
MSS ko veda goṣṭhametad gośāntau vihitabahumānam 
MSS ṛṣayaścaiva devāśca satyameva hi menire 
MSS satyavādī hi loke'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam 
MSS ṛṣayo'pyugratapaso daivenābhiprapīḍitāḥ 
MSS utsṛjya niyamāṃs tīvrān bhraśyante kāmamanyubhiḥ 
MSS ṛṣayo manavo devā manuputrā mahaujasaḥ 
MSS kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatayas tathā 
MSS ṛṣayo rākṣasīmāhur vācamunmattadṛptayoḥ 
MSS sā yoniḥ sarvavairāṇāṃ sā hi lokasya nirṛtiḥ 
MSS ṛṣirayamatithiśced viṣṭaraḥ pādyamarghyaṃ tadanu ca madhuparkaḥ kalpyatāṃ śrotriyāya 
MSS atha tu ripurakasmād dveṣṭi naḥ putrabhāṇḍaṃ tadiha nayavihīne kārmukasyādhikāraḥ 
MSS ṛṣisenā vinā vedam apriyā sahagāminī 
MSS devasenā vinā dāt n aviṣṇuḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 
MSS ṛṣīṃśca devāṃśca mahāsurāṃśca traividyavṛddhāṃśca vane munīṃśca 
MSS kānāpado nopanamanti loke parāvarajñāstu na saṃbhramanti 
MSS ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca mahātmanām 
MSS prabhavo nādhigantavyaḥ strīṇāṃ duścaritasya ca 
MSS ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyam idaṃ bharatasattama 
MSS tīrthābhigamanaṃ puṇyaṃ yajñairapi viśiṣyate 
MSS ṛṣerasyāśrame puṇye śāpasaṃtrastamānasaḥ 
MSS mudbodhato'pi prāyo'yaṃ mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate 
MSS ekaṃ kāñcanabhūdharaṃ suvalayaṃ vāsaḥ sudhāvāridhiṃ tāraṃ tārakarājamaṇḍalamidaṃ saṃprāpya satkuṇḍalam 
MSS dūrasthāpi ca tena tena sadṛśaṃ tvāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ cāparaṃ strī mānagrahileva yācatitarāṃ śrīrāma kīrtistava 
MSS ekaṃ cakṣurviveko hi dvitīyaṃ satsamāgamaḥ 
MSS tau na sto yasya sa kṣipraṃ mohakūpe pated dhruvam 
MSS ekaṃ citramatīva dṛṣṭamiha yannālokitaṃ na śrutaṃ kiṃ kasmai kathayāmi kasya manasi syād vā mama pratyayaḥ 
MSS ekasmin kanakasya dāmni sarasīmailindamattadvipa jyotsnācandracakoracakracamarīvālāś camatkurvate 
MSS ekaṃ jīvanamūlaṃ cañcalamapi tāpayantamapi satatam 
MSS antarvahati varākī sā tvāṃ nāseva niḥśvāsam 
MSS ekaṃ dantacchadasya sphurati japavaśādardhamanyat prakopād ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptumanyas tameva 
MSS ekaṃ dhyānānnimīlatyaparamaviṣahaṃ vīkṣituṃ cakṣuritthaṃ tulyānicchāpi vāmā tanuravatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvasāne 
MSS ekaṃ dṛṣṭvā śataṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā pañcaśatānyapi 
MSS atilobho na kartavyaś cakraṃ bhramati mastake 
MSSA ekaṃ dvijaṃ ca spṛhaṇīyavācaṃ mattadvirephaṃ ca madhuḥ pupoṣa 
MSSA sato guṇānapyasato'pi doṣān jātyā vihīno na vivektumīṣṭe 
MSS ekaṃ dhāma śamīṣu līnamaparaṃ sūryopalajyotiṣāṃ vyājādadriṣu gūḍhamanyadudadhau saṃguptamaurvāyate 
MSS tvattejastapanāṃśumāṃsalasamuttāpena durgaṃ bhayād vārkṣaṃ pārvatamaudakaṃ yadi yayustejāṃsi kiṃ pārthivāḥ 
MSS ekaṃ dhyānanimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare śṛṅgārabhāvālasam 
MSS anyad dūravikṛṣṭacāpamadanakrodhānaloddīpitaṃ śaṃbhorbhinnarasaṃ samādhisamaye netratrayaṃ pātu vaḥ 
MSS ekaṃ nāma jaḍātmakasya muṣitaṃ lāvaṇyamindos tayā netrābhyāmasitotpalasya ca ruciḥ prāyeṇa tanno mṛṣā 
MSS no jānāti hṛtāmasau padagatiṃ matto varākaḥ karī tanvaṅgyā vidato'pi yanmama hṛtaṃ cetas tadatyadbhutam 
MSS ekaṃ bhūmipatiḥ karoti sacivaṃ rājye pramāṇaṃ yadā taṃ mohāc śrayate madaḥ sa ca madālasyena nirvidyate 
MSS nirviṇṇasya padaṃ karoti hṛdaye tasya svatantraspṛhā svātantryaspṛhayā tataḥ sa nṛpateḥ prāṇānabhidruhyati 
MSS ekaṃ mahiṣaśiraḥsthitam aparaṃ sānandasuragaṇapraṇatam 
MSS giriduhituḥ padayugalaṃ śoṇitamaṇirāgarañjitaṃ jayati 
MSS ekaṃ mitraṃ bhajate māsenenduḥ svayaṃ kṣayaṃ gacchan 
MSS mitraśatāni bhajaṃstvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ vṛddhimupayāsi 
MSS ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā 
MSS ekaṃ śāstraṃ vedamadhyātmakaṃ vā eko devaḥ keśavo vā jino vā 
MSS ekaṃ liṅgaṃ pramadā hṛdayaṃ vidadhāti jarjaraṃ sahasā 
MSS teṣāṃ ṣaṭkaṃ yeṣāṃ antargūḍhaṃ na te kathaṃ paśavaḥ 
MSS ekaṃ vadati mano mama yāmi na yāmīti hṛdayamaparaṃ me 
MSS hṛdayadvayamucitaṃ tava sundari hṛtakāntacittāyāḥ 
MSS ekaṃ vastu dvidhā kartuṃ bahavaḥ santi dhanvinaḥ 
MSS dhanvī sa māra evaiko dvayoraikyaṃ karoti yaḥ 
MSS ekaṃ vastu yadasti viśvajanatānandapramodātmakaṃ satyaṃ tattvamasīti vākyamakhilaṃ tvayyeva viśrāmyati 
MSS tvāmākarṇya na kiṃcidanyadavanīśṛṅgāra bho manyate tvayyāpte janakādikīrtijanake kiṃ jñānamīmāṃsayā 
MSS ekaṃ vā kupitapriyāpraṇayinīṃ kṛtvā manonirvṛtiṃ tiṣṭhāmo nijacārupīvarakucakrīḍārasāsvādane 
MSS anyad vā surasindhusaikatataṭīdarbhāṣṭakasrastara sthāne brahmapadaṃ samāhitadhiyo dhyāyanta evāsmahe 
MSS ekaṃ viṣaraso hanti śastreṇaikaśca vadhyate 
MSS sarāṣṭraṃ saprajaṃ hanti rājānaṃ mantravisravaḥ 
MSS ekaṃ vai sevate nityam anyaṃ cetasi rocate 
MSS puruṣāṇāmalābhena nārī caiva pativratā 
MSS ekaṃ saṃdigdhayostāvad bhāvi tatreṣṭajanmani 
MSS hetumāhuḥ svamantrādīn asaṅgānanyathā viṭāḥ 
MSS ekaṃ sāgaratīranīranikarasphārāñjalikṣālitaiḥ puṣpairacyutapūjanaṃ nijakaravyāpārasaṃpāditaiḥ 
MSS no cen mañjulamālatīdalalasatkhaṭvārcite mandire kāntātuṅganitambabimbasuratakrīḍārasaiḥ sthīyate 
MSS ekaṃ sute mṛgāriṇī bahūn sūte vṛkī sutān 
MSS uttāraḥ pralayaṃ yānti nādyamānāḥ kathaṃcana 
MSS ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣuḥ kṣipto dhanuṣmatā 
MSS prājñena tu matiḥ kṣiptā hanyād garbhagatānapi 
MSS ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣurmukto dhanuṣmatā 
MSS buddhirbuddhimatotsṛṣṭā hanyād rāṣṭraṃ sarājakam 
MSS ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣurmukto dhanuṣmatā 
MSS sarāṣṭraṃ saprajaṃ hanti rājānaṃ mantriniścayaḥ 
MSS ekaṃ hi cakṣuramalaṃ sahajo viveko vidvadbhireva saha saṃvasatirdvitīyam 
MSS etad dvayaṃ bhuvi na yasya sa tattvato'ndhas tasyāpamārgacalane vada ko'parādhaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ karṇamahīpatiḥ pratidinaṃ lakṣādhikā yācakāḥ kasmai kiṃ vitariṣyatīti manasā cintāṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ 
MSS āste kiṃ pratiyācakaṃ surataruḥ pratyambujaṃ kiṃ raviś candraḥ kiṃ pratikairavaṃ pratilatāgulmaṃ kimambhodharaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ kāpuruṣo dīrṇo dārayen mahatīṃ camūm 
MSS taṃ dīrṇamanu dīryante yodhāḥ śūratamā api 
MSS ekaḥ ko'pi mahīdharo laghutaro dorbhyāṃ dhṛto līlayā tena tvaṃ divi bhūtale ca vidito govarddhanoddhārakaḥ 
MSS tvāṃ trailokyavahaṃ vahāmi kucayoragre sadā puṣpavat tat kiṃ keśava jalpitena bahunā puṇyairyaśo labhyate 
MSS ekaḥ kṣamāvataṃ doṣo dvitīyo nopalabhyate 
MSS yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ 
MSS so'sya doṣo na mantavyaḥ kṣamā hi paramaṃ balam 
MSS kṣamā guṇo hyaśaktānāṃ śaktānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kṣamā 
MSS ekaḥ khalo'pi yadi nāma bhavet sabhāyāṃ vyarthīkaroti viduṣāmakhilaṃ prayāsam 
MSS ekāpi pūrṇamudaraṃ madhuraiḥ padārthair āloḍya recayati hanta na makṣikā kim 
MSS ekaḥ pañcatvamāsādya jāyate punaraṣṭadhā 
MSS aho vāṇijyasaṃpattiḥ kāśīpuranivāsinām 
MSS ekaḥ pathā na gantavyaṃ na suptiṃ bāhyamandire 
MSS janavākyaṃ na kartavyaṃ strīṇāmālocanaṃ vinā 
MSS ekaḥ pāpāni kurute phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ 
MSS bhoktāro vipramucyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate 
MSS ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam 
MSS majjatyeko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate 
MSS ekaḥ putro varaṃ vidvān bahubhirnirguṇaistu kim 
MSS ekastārayate vaṃśam anye saṃtāpakārakāḥ 
MSS ekaḥ prajāyate jantur eka eva pralīyate 
MSS eko'nubhuṅkte sukṛtam eka eva ca duṣkṛtam 
MSS ekaḥ prayātyuparamaṃ draviṇaṃ tadīyaṃ hṛtvāparaḥ prasabhamudvahati pramodam 
MSS no vetti tat svanidhane parakośagāmi dhig vāsanāmasamamohakṛtāndhakārām 
MSS ekaḥ śataṃ yodhayati prākārastho dhanurdharaḥ 
MSS śataṃ daśasahasrāṇi tasmād durgaṃ vidhīyate 
MSS ekaḥ śatrurna dvitīyo'sti śatrur ajñānatulyaḥ puruṣasya rājan 
MSS yenāvṛtaḥ kurute saṃprayukto ghorāṇi karmāṇi sudāruṇāni 
MSS ekaḥ saṃgrāmariṅgatturagakhurarajorājibhirnaṣṭadṛṣṭir digyātrājaitramattadviradabharanamadbhūmibhagnas tathānyaḥ 
MSS vīrāḥ ke nāma tasmāt trijagati na yayuḥ kṣīṇatāṃ kāṇakubja nyāyādetena muktāvabhayamabhajatāṃ vāsavo vāsukiśca 
MSS ekaḥ saṃpannamaśnāti vaste vāsaśca śobhanam 
MSS yo'saṃvibhajya bhṛtyebhyaḥ ko nṛśaṃsataras tataḥ 
MSS ekaḥ saṃprati pākaśāsanapurīpīyūṣasattrī puraḥ pārakyaṃ tamasāmasau kumudinīcaitanyacintāmaṇiḥ 
MSS mānoccāṭanakārmaṇaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ devo nabho'mbhonidhau paśyodañcati pañcabāṇavaṇijo yātrāvahitraṃ śaśī 
MSS ekaḥ sa eva jīvati svahṛdayaśūnyo'pi sahṛdayo rāhuḥ 
MSS yaḥ sakalalaghimakāraṇam udaraṃ na bibharti duṣpūram 
MSS ekaḥ sa eva tejasvī saihikeyaḥ suradviṣām 
MSS śiromātrāvaśeṣeṇa jīyante yena śatravaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ sa eva paripālayatājjaganti gaurīgirīśacaritānukṛtiṃ dadhānaḥ 
MSS ābhāti yo daśanaśūnyamukhaikadeśa dehārdhahāritavadhūka ivaikadantaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ sakalajanānāṃ hṛdayeṣu kṛtāspado madaḥ śatruḥ 
MSS yenāviṣṭaśarīro na śṛṇoti na paśyati stabdhaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ sakhā priyo bhūya upakārī guṇānvitaḥ 
MSS hantavyaḥ strīnimittena kaṣṭamāpatitaṃ mama 
MSS ekaḥ sa vyasanī pumānacaramairniḥśvāsavātaiḥ samaṃ hā me sā dayiteti yasya vadataḥ prāṇāḥ samaṃ nirgatāḥ 
MSS anye tu vyasanaṃ kṣipanti paśavaḥ kāntāviyogodbhavaiś cintāglāniviṣādadainyajanitairbāṣpairanāhāriṇaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ sudhāṃśurna kathaṃcana syāt tṛptikṣamastvannayanadvayasya 
MSS tvallocanāsecanakastadastu nalāsyaśītadyutisadvitīyaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ stanastuṅgataraḥ parasya vārtāmiva praṣṭumagān mukhāgram 
MSS yasyāḥ priyārdhasthitimudvahantyāḥ sā pātu vaḥ parvatarājaputrī 
MSS ekaḥ sthito'ntaḥ prāpto'nyaḥ parasyādyaiva durgrahaḥ 
MSS kiṃ karomīti jananīṃ pṛcchantīṣvaparāsu ca 
MSS ekaḥ svādu na bhuñjīta ekaścārthān na cintayet 
MSS eko na gacchedadhvānaṃ naikaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt 
MSS eka eva khago mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ 
MSS pipāsito vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram 
MSS eka eva khago mānī sukhaṃ jīvati cātakaḥ 
MSS arthitvaṃ yāti śakrasya na nīcamupasarpati 
MSS eka eva cared dharmaṃ nāsti dharme sahāyatā 
MSS kevalaṃ vidhimāsādya sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati 
MSS eka eva dame doṣo dvitīyo nopapadyate 
MSS yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ 
MSS etasya tu mahāprājña doṣasya sumahān guṇaḥ 
MSS kṣamāyāṃ vipulā lokāḥ sulabhā hi sahiṣṇunā 
MSS eka eva na bhuñjīyād yadicchec śubhamātmanaḥ 
MSS dvitribhirbandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhojanaṃ kārayen naraḥ 
MSS eka eva padārthastu tridhā bhavati vīkṣitaḥ 
MSS kuṇapaṃ kaminī māṃsaṃ yogibhiḥ kāmibhiḥ śvabhiḥ 
MSS eka eva paro hyātmā sarveṣāmapi dehinām 
MSS nāneva gṛhyate mūḍhair yathā jyotiryathā nabhaḥ 
MSS eka eva mahān doṣo bhavatāṃ vimale kule 
MSS lumpanti pūrvajāṃ kīrtiṃ jātā jātā guṇādhikāḥ 
MSS eka eva laghuryatra āditālaḥ sa kathyate 
MSS vinode rāsakas tena śrot ṇāṃ ca sukhāvahaḥ 
MSS eka eva suhṛd dharmo nidhane'pyanuyāti yaḥ 
MSS śarīreṇa samaṃ nāśaṃ sarvamanyad hi gacchati 
MSS eka eva hitārthāya tejasvī pārthivo bhuvaḥ 
MSS yugānta iva bhāsvanto bahavo'tra vipattaye 
MSS eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ 
MSS ekadhā bahudhā caiva dṛśyate jalacandravat 
MSS eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānasaḥ 
MSS aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hyanyaḥ putra vidyate 
MSS eka evopahārastu saṃdhiretanmataṃ hi naḥ 
MSS upahārasya bhedāstu sarve'nye maitravarjitāḥ 
MSS ekakāryaniyoge'pi nānayos tulyaśīlatā 
MSS vivāhe ca citāyāṃ ca yathā hutabhujordvayoḥ 
MSS ekakṣitibhṛdutpannāḥ sacchidrāḥ kaṇṭakolbaṇāḥ 
MSS mithaḥ saṃgharṣaṇād vaṃśā dahyante sādhuśākhibhiḥ 
MSS ekagarbhoṣitāḥ snigdhā mūrdhnā satkṛtya dhāritāḥ 
MSS keśā api virajyante jarayā kimutāṅganāḥ 
MSS ekaguṇā bhavati tithiś caturguṇaṃ bhavati nakṣatram 
MSS catuḥṣaṣṭiguṇaṃ lagnam eṣa jyotiṣatantrasiddhāntaḥ 
MSS ekacakro ratho yantā vikalo viṣamā hayāḥ 
MSS ākrāmatyeva tejasvī tathāpyarko nabhastalam 
MSS ekacakṣurna kāko'yaṃ bilamicchanna pannagaḥ 
MSS kṣīyate vardhate caiva na samudro na candramāḥ 
MSS ekacitto labhet siddhiṃ dvidhācitto vinaśyati 
MSS skandhāvāraṃ hi gacchantam iṣukāro na paśyati 
MSS ekacchattraṃ kṣititalamidaṃ bhuñjate yan narendrāḥ svargāsthāne muditamanaso yad ramante munīndrāḥ 
MSS yan nirvāṇe nirupamasukhaṃ martyamukhyā labhante dānasyāyaṃ sphurati mahimā kevalasyāmalasya 
MSS ekacchāgaṃ dvirāveyaṃ trigavaṃ pañcamāhiṣam 
MSS ṣaḍaśvaṃ saptamātaṅgaṃ śakrasyāpi śriyaṃ haret 
MSS ekataḥ kratavaḥ sarve samagravaradakṣiṇāḥ 
MSS ekato bhayabhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇarakṣaṇam 
MSS ekataḥ praṇayapīḍanaṃ mudhā mānadhāraṇarasādaro'nyataḥ 
MSS rakṣatī dvayamidaṃ manasvinī nirvṛṇotu kathamatra janmani 
MSS ekataḥ sakalā vidyā cāturyaṃ punarekataḥ 
MSS cāturyeṇa vinākṛtya sakalā vikalā kalā 
MSS ekataḥ sarvapāpāni madyapānaṃ tathaikataḥ 
MSS ekataḥ sarvadānāni brahmacaryaṃ tathaikataḥ 
MSS ekataścaturo vedāḥ sāṅgopāṅgāḥ savistarāḥ 
MSS svādhīnāste naraśreṣṭha satyamekaṃ kilaikataḥ 
MSS ekataścaturo vedā brahmacaryaṃ tathaikataḥ 
MSS ekataḥ sarvapāpāni madyapānaṃ tathaikataḥ 
MSS ekataśca surasundarījanaḥ śrīḥ pratīcchati yuyutsumanyataḥ 
MSS pāpmanā saha palāyato'yaśaś caikataḥ kulakalaṅkakāraṇam 
MSS ekatāmiva gatasya vivekaḥ kasyacin na mahato'pyupalebhe 
MSS bhāsvatā nidadhire bhuvanānām ātmanīva patitena viśeṣāḥ 
MSS ekato divasān bālā gaṇayatyekato'ntakaḥ 
MSS na vidmaḥ prathamaṃ kasya yāsyāmo vayamantikam 
MSS ekato'paritoṣaśced anyamanyaṃ mahībhujam 
MSS nidāghapānthavacchāyām anyāmanyāmupāśrayet 
MSSA ekato'pi bhuvi bhūriśo'bhavan dīpakādahaha paśya dīpakāḥ 
MSSA andhakāranidhanāya bhānuman muktadivyaviśikhādiveṣavaḥ 
MSS ekato'bhyuditamindumaṇḍalaṃ smeramāsyamasitabhruvo'nyataḥ 
MSS cañcukorakapuṭīṃ cakorikā cālayatyubhayato'pi dhāvati 
MSS ekato mātṛvātsalyaṃ parato guṇakoṭayaḥ 
MSS anayoḥ samatāṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ brahmādayaḥ surāḥ 
MSS ekato vā kulaṃ kṛtsnam ātmā vā kulavardhana 
MSS na samaṃ sarvameveti budhānāmeṣa niścayaḥ 
MSS ekatovyādhidurbhikṣapramukhā vipado'khilāḥ 
MSS prajānāmekatastvekā lubdhatā vasudhāpateḥ 
MSS ekatra kaulavratabhaṅgaśaṅkā vidagdhatābhaṅgabhayaṃ paratra 
MSS ityākulānāṃ kulakāminīnāṃ gatāgataireva gatā triyāmā 
MSS ekatra nāsya ratirityavadhūyamānaḥ kopādiva śvasanakampavighūrṇitāyāḥ 
MSS raktacchadaṃ madhusugandhi saroruhiṇyā bhṛṅgaś cucumba kamalānanamādareṇa 
MSS ekatra prapaṭhanti sāma ca yajuścānyatra vedāntaraṃ hiṃsrāścāpi mṛgāyitāśca parato yāgotthadhūmaḥ śivaḥ 
MSS ātithyādividhiḥ paratra vidhivat pādyādināpādyate nānāśāstravivecanaṃ ca vaṭubhiḥ saṃtanyate saṅgataiḥ 
MSS ekatra prākṛtaiḥ sāmyam anyatra paratantratā 
MSS śukasya paritoṣāya na vanaṃ na ca pattanam 
MSS ekatra madhuno bindau bhakṣate'saṃkhyadehinaḥ 
MSS yo hi na syāt kṛpā tasya tasmān madhu na bhakṣayet 
MSS ekatra vāsādavasānabhājas tāmbūlalakṣmyā iva saṃsmarantī 
MSS vaktreṣu yadvairivilāsinīnāṃ hāsaprabhā tānavamāsasāda 
MSS ekatra sārthe vrajatāṃ bahūnāṃ tulye'pi jāte śakune phalāni 
MSS nānāprakārāṇi bhavanti yena taṃ haṃsacāraṃ pravicārayāmaḥ 
MSS ekatra sphaṭikataṭāṃśubhinnanīrā nīlāśmadyutibhidurāmbhaso'paratra 
MSS kālindījalajanitaśriyaḥ śrayante vaidagdhīmiha saritaḥ surāpagāyāḥ 
MSS ekatrādadate jalaṃ jaladharavyūhāḥ paratrāpyamī dīpyaddikkariṇaḥ paratra vaḍavāvaktrodgatā vahnayaḥ 
MSS etāvat satatavyaye'pi sutarāmāścaryamambhonidhes tā eva sthitayaḥ sa eva mahimā saivāsya gambhīratā 
MSS ekatrāpi hate jantau pāpaṃ bhavati dāruṇam 
MSS na sūkṣmānekajantūnāṃ ghātino madhupasya kim 
MSS ekatrāsanasaṅgatiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamād dūratas tāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśleṣo'pi saṃvighnitaḥ 
MSS ālāpo'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyāntike kāntaṃ pratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ 
MSS ekatrāsanasaṅgate priyatame paścādupetyādarād ekasyā nayane pidhāya mahataḥ krīḍānubandhacchalāt 
MSS tiryagvakritakandharaḥ sapulakasvedodgamānandinīm antarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto'parāṃ cumbati 
MSS ekatvaṃ na rasaiḥ kayoḥ samajani strīpuṃsayoḥ prāvṛṣi prāptau yadrasanirbharāviha dharākāśau cirādekatām 
MSS yoṣitsaṅgamagūḍhasarvataruṇaḥ kālo'yamālokyate channaḥ kvāpi divā yuvāpi niśayā kroḍīkṛtaḥ krīḍati 
MSS ekadantaṃ trinayanaṃ jvālānalasamaprabham 
MSS gaṇādhyakṣaṃ gajamukhaṃ praṇamāmi vināyakam 
MSS ekadantadyutisitaḥ śaṃbhoḥ sūnuḥ śriye'stu vaḥ 
MSS vidyākanda ivodbhinnanavāṅkuramanoharaḥ 
MSS ekadā na vigṛhṇīyād bahūn rājābhighātinaḥ 
MSS sadarpo'pyuragaḥ kīṭair bahubhirnāśyate dhruvam 
MSS ekadeśamupādhyāya ṛtvig yajñakṛducyate 
MSS ete mānyā yathāpūrvam ebhyo mātā garīyasī 
MSS ekadvikaraṇe hetū mahāpātakapañcake 
MSS na tṛṇe manyate kopakāmau yaḥ pañca kārayan 
MSS ekadvitrikalākrameṇa śaśinaṃ gṛhṇanvimuñcannayaṃ yac caṇḍadyutirātanoti bhagavānadyāpi cāndrāyaṇam 
MSS devaitad bhavadīyabhāsvarabhujastambhapratāpānala spardhāyai kramabhuktalāñchanapaśornaitat punaḥ setsyati 
MSS ekadviprabhṛtikrameṇa gaṇanāmeṣāmivāstaṃ yatāṃ kurvāṇā samakocayad daśaśatānyambhojasaṃvartikāḥ 
MSS bhūyo'pi kramaśaḥ prasārayati tāḥ saṃpratyamūnudyataḥ saṃkhyātuṃ sakutūhaleva nalinī bhānoḥ sahasraṃ karān 
MSS ekadveṣu rasālaśākhiṣu manāgunmīlitaṃ kuḍmalaiḥ karṇākarṇikayā mithaḥ kathamamī ghūrṇanti viśve'dhvagāḥ 
MSS dvitraiḥ kvāpi kila śrutāśrutamapi spaṣṭānyapuṣṭārutaṃ viṣvaṅmūrchati duḥsaho virahiṇīgeheṣu hāhāravaḥ 
MSS ekadvaiḥ kimabhāvi sūribhiratha dvitrāṇi mitrāṇi kiṃ vyāpannāni gatāśca kiṃ tricaturā ghorā mahāvyādhayaḥ 
MSS saptāṣṭairalamiṣṭametadapi naścetaḥ kṣaṇān pañcaṣān svātmanyeva ramasva tejasi gate kāle'thavā sarvataḥ 
MSS ekadvairdivasairbhaviṣyati manāg dorantaraṃ danturaṃ dvitraireva dinaiśca locanapathaṃ romāvalī yāsyati 
MSS kiṃ cābhūdiva vāsaraistricaturaiścāñcalyamasyā dṛśos tajjetuṃ jagatīmanaṅga kimatīvāyāsamālaṃbase 
MSS ekadvairmadhubindubhirmadhulihaḥ syādeva kukṣimbhariḥ kasmin vā kusume bhavanti sulabhā te'mī punaḥ pañcaṣāḥ 
MSS kālaḥ ko'pi sa tādṛśaḥ pariṇato yenaikatṛṣṇākulo yadyat puṣpamupāgamat kṛpaṇavat tenāsya mā kuñcitam 
MSS ekadhāturdvikhaṇḍaḥ syād yatrodgrāhastataḥ param 
MSS tṛtīyaṃ kiṃciduccaṃ syāt khaṇḍaṃ gamakaśobhanam 
MSS ekanibhā yatra mahī tṛṇataruvalmīkagulmaparihīnā 
MSS tasyāṃ yatra vikāro bhavati dharitryāṃ jalaṃ tatra 
MSS ekantu lokavedebhyaḥ sāramākṛṣya kathyate 
MSS prāṇātyaye'pi na tyājyo nyāyyo dharmaślathaḥ pathaḥ 
MSS ekapaṅktyupaviṣṭānāṃ viprāṇāṃ sahabhojane 
MSS yadyeko'pi tyajedannaṃ sarvairucchiṣṭabhojanam 
MSS ekapatnīsamāsaktair bhavadbhiḥ saṃhatairmithaḥ 
MSS sthātavyamaprasādena bhedamūlaṃ hi yoṣitaḥ 
MSS ekapuṃsā na gantavyaṃ kākasarpasya kāraṇāt 
MSS karkaṭasya prasādena brāhmaṇo jīvito yathā 
MSS ekapucchaś catuṣpādaḥ kakudmān lambakambalaḥ 
MSS gorapatyaṃ balīvardo ghāsamatti sukhena saḥ 
MSS ekapriyācaraṇapadmaparīṣṭijāta kleśasya me hṛdayamuttaralīcakāra 
MSS udbhinnanirbharamanobhavabhāvamugdha nānāṅganāvadanacandramasāṃ didṛkṣā 
MSS ekabhave ripupannagaduḥkhaṃ janmaśateṣu manobhavaduḥkham 
MSS cārudhiyeti vicintya mahāntaḥ kāmaripuṃ kṣaṇataḥ kṣapayanti 
MSSA ekabhuktaṃ sadārogyaṃ dvibhuktaṃ balavarddhanam 
MSSA tribhuktervyādhipīḍā syāc caturbhuktermṛtirdhruvam 
MSS ekamapi kṣaṇaṃ labdhvā samyaktvaṃ yo vimuñcati 
MSS saṃsārārṇavamuttīrya labhate so'pi nirvṛtim 
MSS ekamapi satāṃ sukṛtaṃ vikasati tailaṃ yathā jale nyastam 
MSS asatāmupakāraśataṃ saṃkucati suśītale ghṛtavat 
MSS ekamapyakṣaraṃ yastu guruḥ śiṣyaṃ prabodhayet 
MSS pṛthivyāṃ nāsti tad dravyaṃ yad datvā so'nṛṇī bhavet 
MSS ekamapyatra yo binduṃ bhakṣayen madhuno naraḥ 
MSS so'pi duḥkhavṛṣākīrṇe patate bhavasāgare 
MSS ekamasya paramekamudyamaṃ nistrapatvamaparasya vastunaḥ 
MSS nityamuṣṇamahasā nirasyate nityamandhatamasaṃ pradhāvati 
MSS ekamātro laghuḥ prokto dvimātraśca guruḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS plutas trimātrako jñeyo drutaḥ syādardhamātrakaḥ 
MSS ekamāśīviṣo hanti śastreṇaikaśca vadhyate 
MSS hanti vipraḥ sarāṣṭrāṇi purāṇyapi hi kopitaḥ 
MSS ekamutkaṇṭhayā vyāptam anyad dayitayā hṛtam 
MSS caitanyamaparaṃ dhatte kiyanti hṛdayāni me 
MSS ekameva guṇaṃ prāpya namratāmagamad dhanuḥ 
MSS tavāśeṣaguṇā rājñaḥ stabdhateti suvismayaḥ 
MSS ekameva tu śūdrasya prabhuḥ karma samādiśat 
MSS eteṣāmeva varṇānāṃ śuśrūṣāmanasūyayā 
MSS ekameva dahatyagnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam 
MSS kulaṃ dahati rājāgniḥ sapaśudravyasaṃcayam 
MSS ekameva puraskṛtya daśa jīvanti mānavāḥ 
MSS vinā tena na śobhante yathā saṃkhyāṅkabindavaḥ 
MSS ekameva baliṃ baddhvā jagāma harirunnatim 
MSS asyāstribalibandhena saiva madhyasya namratā 
MSS ekameva hi dāridryaṃ kliśnāti sakalaṃ jagat 
MSS tamahaṃ śābdikaṃ vande yaścakāra napuṃsakam 
MSS ekamevākṣi vāmākṣi rañjayāñjanalekhayā 
MSS jāyatāmaindave bimbe khañjanāmbujasaṃgamaḥ 
MSS ekamevādvitīyaṃ tad yad rājan nāvabudhyase 
MSS satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya nauriva 
MSS ekayā dve viniścitya trīṃścaturbhirvaśe kuru 
MSS pañca jitvā viditvā ṣaṭ sapta hitvā sukhī bhava 
MSS ekayāpi kalayā viśuddhayā yo'pi ko'pi bhajate girīśatām 
MSS bhūyasīrapi kalāḥ kalaṅkitāḥ prāpya kaścidapacīyate śanaiḥ 
MSS ekayaiva gurordṛṣṭyā dvābhyāṃ vāpi labheta yat 
MSS na tat tisṛbhiraṣṭābhiḥ sahasreṇāpi kasyacit 
MSS ekarada dvaimātura nistriguṇa caturbhujo'pi pañcakara 
MSS jaya ṣaṇmukhanuta sapta cchadagandhimadāṣṭatanutanaya 
MSS ekavarṇaṃ yathā dugdhaṃ bahuvarṇāsu dhenuṣu 
MSS tathā dharmasya vaicitrye tattvamekaṃ paraṃ punaḥ 
MSS ekavarṇamidaṃ pūrvaṃ viśvamāsīd yudhiṣṭhira 
MSS karmakriyāvibhedena cāturvarṇyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam 
MSS ekavarṇo bhaved yastu lakṣaṇaikena saṃyutaḥ 
MSS sa khaḍgarājo nṛpater vijñeyaḥ śubhakārakaḥ 
MSS ekavāpījalaṃ paśya ikṣau madhuratāṃ vrajet 
MSS nimbe kaṭukatāṃ yāti pātrāpātrāya bhojanam 
MSS ekavāpībhavaṃ toyaṃ pātrāpātraviśeṣataḥ 
MSS āmre madhuratāmeti nimbe kaṭukatāmapi 
MSS ekaviṃśatirādiṣṭāḥ narakāḥ śāstrapāragaiḥ 
MSS garbhavāsasamīpe te kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm 
MSS ekaviṃśativarṇāṅghrir bhavec śṛṅgārake rase 
MSS kāmado'bhīṣṭadaḥ pusāṃ tāle turagalīlake 
MSS ekaviṃśativāreṇa kukkuṭasyāsṛjokṣitam 
MSS tatkṣaṇād dāḍimībījaṃ vardhate phalati dhruvam 
MSS ekaviṃśatisaṃjaptaṃ jalaṃ mantreṇa pāyayet 
MSS yadā vāntis tadā mṛtyur na vāntirjīvati dhruvam 
MSS ekavidyāpradhāno'pi bahujñānī bhaven naraḥ 
MSS subhāṣitāni śikṣeta yāni śāstroddhṛtāni vai 
MSS ekavṛkṣasamārūḍhā nānāvarṇā vihaṃgamāḥ 
MSS prātardaśa diśo yānti kā tatra paridevanā 
MSS ekavṛkṣe yathā rātrau nānāpakṣisamāgamaḥ 
MSS prātardaśa diśo yānti tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥ 
MSS ekaveśāśrayāj jāter varṇasyāpi pragopanam 
MSS yathā hastipade'nyeṣāṃ līyante caraṇā api 
MSS ekaśaktiprahāreṇa mriyate'śvo naro'pi hi 
MSS sahen mahāprahārāṇāṃ śataṃ yuddheṣu vāraṇaḥ 
MSS ekaśīlavayovidyājātivyasanavṛttayaḥ 
MSS sāhacarye bhaven mitram ebhiryadi tu sārjavaiḥ 
MSS ekaścet pūrvapuruṣaḥ kule yaśca bahuśrutaḥ 
MSS aparaḥ pāpakṛnmūrkhaḥ kulaṃ kasyānuvartate 
MSS ekasārthaprayātānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tatra gāminām 
MSS yasya kālaḥ prayātyagre tatra kā paridevanā 
MSS ekasukṛtena duṣkṛta śatāni ye nāśayanti te sevyāḥ 
MSS na tvekadoṣajanito yeṣāṃ kopaḥ kṛtaśataghnaḥ 
MSS ekastapo dviradhyāyī tribhirgītaṃ catuḥ patham 
MSS sapta pañca kṛṣīṇāṃ ca saṅgrāmo bahubhirjanaiḥ 
MSS ekastridhā hṛdi sadā vasasi sma citraṃ yo vidviṣāṃ ca viduṣāṃ ca mṛgīdṛśāṃ ca 
MSS tāpaṃ ca saṃmadarasaṃ ca ratiṃ ca tanvan śauryoṣmaṇā ca vinayena ca līlayā ca 
MSSA ekastredhā nayasunipuṇairyogibhiḥ sevakairvā nirbādhaṃ yaḥ sapadi vidito bhāti sarvasvarūpaḥ 
MSSA so'yaṃ nandavrajamupagataḥ sākamābhīravṛndair vṛndāraṇye viharati parānandabhūtirmukundaḥ 
MSS ekastvaṃ gahane'smin kokila na kalaṃ kadācidapi kuryāḥ 
MSS sājātyaśaṅkayāmī na tvāṃ nighnanti nirdayāḥ kākāḥ 
MSS ekastvaṃ marubhūruhendra vitataiḥ śākhāśatairañcitaḥ puṣpyatpuṣpaphalānvitairamṛditair jīvyāḥ sahasraṃ samāḥ 
MSS aśrāntaṃ śramarugṇapānthajanatāsarvārthanirvāhaṇaṃ kastvāṃ sāttvikamantareṇa bhuvanaṃ nirmātu dharmāśayaḥ 
MSS ekastvamāvahasi janmani saṃkṣaye ca bhoktuṃ svayaṃ svakṛtakarmaphalānubandham 
MSS anyo na jātu sukhaduḥkhavidhau sahāyaḥ svājīvanāya militaṃ viṭapeṭakaṃ te 
MSS ekasthaṃ jīviteśe tvayi sakalajagatsāramālokayāmaḥ śyāme cakṣustavāsmin vapuṣi niviśate nālpapuṇyasya puṃsaḥ 
MSS kasyānyatrāmṛte'smin ratirativipulā dṛṣṭirevāmṛtaṃ te daityairityucyamāno munibhirapi hariḥ straiṇarūpo'vatād vaḥ 
MSS ekasmād vṛkṣād yajñapātrāṇi rājan sruk ca droṇī voḍhanī pīḍanī ca 
MSS etad rājan bruvato me nibodha ekasmāt puruṣāj jāyate'sacca sacca 
MSS ekasmiñ janirāvayoḥ samajani svacche sarovāriṇi bhrātaḥ kācidihaiva kānicidahānyatra vyatītāni nau 
MSS labdhaṃ tāmarasa tvayā mṛgadṛśāṃ līlāvataṃsāspadaṃ śaivālaṃ viluṭhāmi pāmaravadhūpādāhate pāthasi 
MSS ekasmiñ śayane parāṅgukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam 
MSS dampatyoḥ śanakairapāṅgavalanān miśrībhavaccakṣuṣor bhagno mānakaliḥ sahāsarabhasavyāvṛttakaṇṭhagrahaḥ 
MSS ekasmiñ śayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥkopaparāṅmukhaglapitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi 
MSS āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamas tūṣṇīṃ sthitas tatkṣaṇaṃ mā bhūt supta ivetyamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitaḥ 
MSS ekasmiñ śayane saroruhadṛśorvijñāya nidrāṃ tayor ekāṃ pallavitāvaguṇṭhanapaṭāmutkandharo dṛṣṭavān 
MSS anyasyāḥ savidhaṃ sametya nibhṛtavyālolahastāṅguli vyāpārairvasanāñcalaṃ capalayan svāpacyutiṃ kliptavān 
MSS ekasmin divase mayā vicaratā prāptaḥ kathaṃcin maṇir mūlyaṃ yasya na vidyate bhavati cet pṛthvī samastā tataḥ 
MSS so'yaṃ daivavaśādabhūdatitarāṃ kācopamaḥ sāmprataṃ kiṃ kurmaḥ kamupāsmahe kva sa suhṛd yasyaitadāvedyate 
MSS ekasminnapyatikrānte dine dharmavivarjite 
MSS dasyubhirmuṣitasyeva hṛdayaṃ dahyate ciram 
MSS ekasmin nayane bhṛśaṃ tapati yaḥ kāle sa dāhakramo yenātanyata yatprakāśasamaye naiśaṃ padaṃ durlabham 
MSS savyomāvayavasya yasya viditā loke prakāśasthitiḥ śrīsūryaḥ kṣaṇasevito'pi hi mahādevaḥ sa nastrāyatām 
MSS ekasminneva jāyete kule klībamahārathau 
MSS phalāphalavatī śākhe yathaikasmin vanaspatau 
MSS ekasmin malayācale bahuvidhaiḥ kiṃ tairakiṃcitkaraiḥ kākolūkakapotakokilakulaireko'pi pārśvasthitaḥ 
MSS kekī kūjati cet tadā vighaṭitavyālāvalībandhanaḥ sevyaḥ syādiha sarvalokamanasāmānandanaś candanaḥ 
MSS ekasmin yatra nidhanaṃ prāpite duṣṭakāriṇi 
MSS bahūnāṃ bhavati kṣemaṃ tasya puṇyaprado vadhaḥ 
MSS ekasmin vijite citte vijitaṃ sakalaṃ jagat 
MSS ajite tu punastasmin na putro'pi vinirjitaḥ 
MSS ekasmin vinipātite'pi śirasi krodhopaśāntiḥ kutaḥ kiṃtu svānunayāya mūrdhanidhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na yatrāriṇā 
MSS tvatto mūrdhabahutvataḥ phalamidaṃ samyaṅ mayā labhyate chinnaṃ chinnamavekṣya rākṣasapate svaṃ durnayaṃ jñāsyasi 
MSS ekasmai pūrṇamanyasmai kṛśaṃ tulyaguṇodaye 
MSS bhedād yadarpitaṃ rāgadveṣadānena tena kim 
MSS ekasya karma saṃvīkṣya karotyanyo'pi garhitam 
MSS gatānugatiko loko na lokaḥ pāramārthikaḥ 
MSS ekasya janmano'rthe mūḍhāḥ kurvanti yāni pāpāni 
MSS janayanti tāni duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ janmāntarasahasram 
MSS ekasya tasya manye dhanyāmabhyunnatiṃ jaladharasya 
MSS viśvaṃ saśailakānanam ānanamālokate yasya 
MSS ekasya duḥkhasya na yāvadantaṃ gacchāmyahaṃ pāramivārṇavasya 
MSS tāvad dvitīyaṃ samupasthitaṃ me chidreṣvanarthā bahulībhavanti 
MSS ekasya viśvapāpena tāpe'nante nimajjataḥ 
MSS kaḥ śrautasyātmano bhīro bhāraḥ syād duritena te 
MSS ekasya sṛṣṭiḥ parameśvarasya bhinnā caturdhā viniyogakāle 
MSS bhoge bhavānī samareṣu durgā kopeṣu kālī puruṣeṣu viṣṇuḥ 
MSS ekasya hi prasādena kṛtsno lokaḥ prasīdati 
MSS vyākulenākulaḥ sarvo bhavatīti viniścayaḥ 
MSS ekasyāpi na yaḥ śakto manasaḥ sannibarhaṇe 
MSS mahīṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ kathaṃ nu sa vijeṣyate 
MSS ekasyāpi manobhuvastadabalāpāṅgairjagannirjaye kāmaṃ nihnutasarvavismayarasavyaktiprakārā vayam 
MSS yastvenaṃ sabalaṃ ca jetumabhitastatkampamātraṃ bhruvor nārebhe sugatastu tadguṇakathā stambhāya naḥ kevalam 
MSS ekasyāpyatitherannaṃ yaḥ pradātuṃ na śaktimān 
MSS tasyānekaparikleśe gṛhe kiṃ vasataḥ phalam 
MSS ekasyāyamudeti mūrdhani gireranyasya caiva kramād astaṃ yāti kalānidhistadubhayorastaḥ praśasto'calaḥ 
MSS ko nāmodayinaṃ karoti na śiromāṇikyamastaṃ punar yātaṃ yaḥ kurute bhavāniva sa duṣprāpo'yamuccaiḥśirāḥ 
MSS ekasyārthāya yo hanyād ātmano vā parasya vā 
MSS bahūn vai prāṇino'thaikaṃ bhavet tasyeha pātakam 
MSS sukhamedhanti bahavo yasmiṃstu nihate sati 
MSS tasmin hate nāsti bhadre pātakaṃ nopapātakam 
MSS ekasyāstapanakaraiḥ karālitāyā bibhrāṇaḥ sapadi sitoṣṇavāraṇatvam 
MSS sevāyai vadanasarojanirjitaśrīr āgatya priyamiva candramāś cakāra 
MSS ekasyaiva na paryāptam asti yad brahmakośajam 
MSS āśayā varddhitasyāsti tasyālpamapi pūrtikṛt 
MSS ekāṃ kṛtvā tanumanupamāṃ candracūḍena sārdhaṃ yas tyakto'rdhaḥ satatavirahakleśabhāgī bhavānyā 
MSS tenāṅgānāṃ racitamucitaṃ saṃvibhaktena kartuṃ nūnaṃ dūnāṃ tanutanulatāṃ nirmame tāṃ viriñciḥ 
MSS ekākinā tapo dvābhyāṃ paṭhanaṃ gāyanaṃ tribhiḥ 
MSS caturbhirgamanaṃ kṣetraṃ pañcabhirbahubhī raṇaḥ 
MSS ekākinā na gantavyaṃ yadi kāryaśataṃ bhavet 
MSS ekakukkuṭamātreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ parirakṣitaḥ 
MSS ekākinā na gantavyaṃ yadi kāryaśatānyapi 
MSS karkaṭījantumātreṇa kālasarpo nipātitaḥ 
MSS ekākini vanavāsiny arājalakṣmaṇyanītiśāstrajñe 
MSS sattvocchrite mṛgapatau rājeti giraḥ pariṇamanti 
MSS ekākinīṃ rahaḥ kṣībāṃ labdhvā durlabhayoṣitam 
MSS aprauḍho'nupabhujyānyadine dūtyārthayeta yaḥ 
MSS vibhūtiṃ rabhasāvāptāṃ yaśca saṃtyajya tatkṣaṇam 
MSS nītyā kāmayate'nyedyuḥ śocyastābhyāṃ paro'sti kaḥ 
MSS ekākinī yadabalā taruṇī tathāham asmin gṛhe gṛhapatiśca gato videśam 
MSS kiṃ yācase tadiha vāsamiyaṃ varākī śvaśrūrmamāndhabadhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha 
MSS ekākinyā mama gṛhamidaṃ yāmiko māmako'ndhaḥ kā me nodetyahaha manasastaskareṇātra bhītiḥ 
MSS daivenaivaṃ yadi na sukhitaḥ syāḥ śrameṇa prasuptaḥ pāntha brūmaḥ kimiha sadṛśo naiṣa naiśo nivāsaḥ 
MSS ekākī gṛhasaṃtyaktaḥ pāṇipātro digambaraḥ 
MSS so'pi saṃbādhyate loke tṛṣṇayā paśya kautukam 
MSS ekākī cintayen nityaṃ vivikte hitamātmanaḥ 
MSS ekākī cintayāno hi paraṃ śreyo'dhigacchati 
MSS ekākī niḥspṛhaḥ śāntaḥ pāṇipātro digambaraḥ 
MSS kadā śaṃbho bhaviṣyāmi karmanirmūlanakṣamaḥ 
MSS ekākṣarapradātāraṃ yo guruṃ naiva manyate 
MSS śvānayoniśataṃ gatvā cāṇḍāleṣvabhijāyate 
MSS ekā gaṅgā prayāge malayaparisare candanaṃ mauktikālī kāntākaṇṭhe himāṃśurviyati sarasi śvetamabjaṃ tathāsyāḥ 
MSS kālindī kālasarpā marakatataralo lāñchanaṃ bhṛṅgamālety evaṃ te yatra kīrtiḥ pariṇamati yutā yatra śatrorakīrtyā 
MSS ekāgnikarma havanaṃ tretāyāṃ yacca hūyate 
MSS antarvedyāṃ ca yad dānam iṣṭaṃ tadabhidhīyate 
MSS ekāgraḥ syādavivṛto nityaṃ vivaradarśakaḥ 
MSS rājan rājyaṃ sapatneṣu nityodvignaḥ samācaret 
MSS ekāgratātha saṃkalpaḥ snāyuvad varddhanakṣamau 
MSS nityābhyāsaprayogābhyām adhikādhikamṛdhyataḥ 
MSS ekāṅghriṃ vinidhāya kāntacaraṇe tajjānudeśe paraṃ līlodañcitamadhyamā karayugeṇāvarjya tatkandharām 
MSS vakṣas tasya ghanonnatastanabhareṇāpīḍya gāḍhaṃ rasād āsyaṃ dhanyatamasya pūrṇapulakā candrānanā cumbati 
MSS ekātapatraṃ jagataḥ prabhutvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ kāntamidaṃ vapuśca 
MSS alpasya hetorbahu hātumicchan vicāramūḍhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam 
MSS ekādaśarudrāṇām ekā gaurītyanaucitīṃ matvā 
MSS rāghava nṛpa tava yaśasā daśāpi gaurīkṛtā haritaḥ 
MSS ekādaśasthe govinde sarve'pyekādaśe sthitāḥ 
MSS kiṃ kurvanti grahāḥ sarve śaniraṅgārako raviḥ 
MSS ekādaśākṣarāt pādād ekaikākṣaravardhitaiḥ 
MSS khaṇḍairdhruvāḥ ṣoḍaśa syuḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyakṣarāvadhi 
MSS ekānapāṅgairaparāṃs taraṅgair bhruvorvilāsairitaraṃ ca hāsaiḥ 
MSS vimohayantyanyamaho rahobhiḥ ko vā kalāṃ veda kalāvatīnām 
MSS ekāntamandiragataṃ madanopameyaṃ talpopaviṣṭamatulaṃ ratirūparamyā 
MSS bālā cakoranayanā nayanātithiṃ taṃ kṛtvā namadvadanapaṅkajamānanāma 
MSS ekāntaśāntamekaṃ manyante mānavā nivāsākhyam 
MSS ugrasya ca śītasya ca nāśakaraṃ kāryayugmasya 
MSS ekāntaśīlasya dṛḍhavratasya sarvendriyaprītinivartakasya 
MSS adhyātmayoge gatamānasasya mokṣo dhruvaṃ nityamahiṃsakasya 
MSS ekāntasundaravidhānajaḍaḥ kva vedhāḥ sarvāṅgakānticaturaṃ kva ca rūpamasyāḥ 
MSS manye maheśvarabhayānmakaradhvajena prāṇārthinā yuvatirūpamidaṃ gṛhītam 
MSS ekāntena hi sarveṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tāta rocitum 
MSS mitrāmitramatho madhyaṃ sarvabhūteṣu bhārata 
MSS ekānte vanato gṛhaṃ śaśimukho'pyanyādṛśo dṛśyate kṣipraṃ sādhaya yātu putri sudine bhuktvānyamāvāsakam 
MSS śvaśrvā saṃbhramitā kileti bahuśaḥ saṃprerayantyā vadhūḥ pānthaṃ vīkṣya babhañja sasmitamukhī saivārdhasiddhaudanam 
MSS ekānte vijane deśe pavitre nirupadrave 
MSS kambalājinavastrāṇām uparyāsanamabhyaset 
MSS ekānte vijane ramye pavitre nirupadrave 
MSS sukhāsane samādhiḥ syād vastrājinakuśottare 
MSS ekānte sukhamāsyatā paratare cetaḥ samādhīyatāṃ prāṇātmā susamīkṣyatāṃ jagadidaṃ tadvyāpitaṃ dṛśyatām 
MSS prākkarma pravilopyatāṃ citibalān nāpyuttare śliṣyatāṃ prārabdhaṃ tviha bhujyatāmatha parabrahmātmanāsthīyatām 
MSS ekāpavargasamaye jagato'pavargaḥ sarvāpavargasamaye punarastaśaṅkaḥ 
MSS īdṛgvidhaṃ kamapi pakṣamihāvalambya sthātuṃ sukhaṃ kṣamamanena pathā pravṛttaiḥ 
MSS ekāpi pañcaśāntā tārā vāñchāptaye śubhāsīnā 
MSS lābha ubhābhyāmadhikas tisro rājyāya yātrāyām 
MSS ekā prasūyate mātā dvitīyā vāk prasūyate 
MSS vāgjātamadhikaṃ procuḥ sodaryādapi bāndhavāt 
MSS ekā bhāryā trayaḥ putrā dvau halau daśa dhenavaḥ 
MSS kalpakālāvasāne'pi na te yāsyanti vikriyām 
MSS ekā bhāryā trayaḥ putrā dvau halau daśa dhenavaḥ 
MSS grāmevāsaḥ purāsatraiḥ svargādapi manoharaḥ 
MSS ekā bhāryā prakṛtimukharā cañcalā ca dvitīyā putrastveko bhuvanavijayī manmatho durnivāraḥ 
MSS śeṣaḥ śayyā śayanamudadhau vāhanaṃ pannagāriḥ smāraṃ smāraṃ svagṛhacaritaṃ dārubhūto murāriḥ 
MSS ekābhūt kusumāyudheṣudhiriva pravyaktapuṅkhāvalī jeturmaṅgalapālikeva pulakairanyā kapolasthalī 
MSS lolākṣīṃ kṣaṇamātrabhāvivirahakleśāsahāṃ paśyato drāgākarṇayataśca vīra bhavataḥ prauḍhāhavāḍambaram 
MSS ekā bhūrubhayoraikyam ubhayordalakāṇḍayoḥ 
MSS śāliśyāmākayorbhedaḥ phalena paricīyate 
MSS ekāmadhītya vidyāṃ bibheti bahuvidyapariṣadaṃ prāptaḥ 
MSS kvāsannaśastranikaraḥ kutraikaśaraḥ punaḥ puruṣaḥ 
MSS ekāmiṣaprabhavameva sahodarāṇām ujjṛmbhate jagati vairamiti prasiddham 
MSS pṛthvīnimittamabhavat kurupāṇḍavānāṃ tīvras tathā hi bhuvanakṣayakṛd virodhaḥ 
MSS ekāmiṣābhilāṣo hi bījaṃ vairamahātaroḥ 
MSS tilottamābhilāṣo hi yathā sundopasundayoḥ 
MSS ekāmbhodhīkṛtāyāṃ bhuvi jagadakhilaṃ nirjanīkṛtya khelan devaḥ kālīsahāyaḥ prasabhaviharaṇonmuktalīlāṭṭahāsaḥ 
MSS sadyo daṃṣṭrāṃśubhinne tamasi nijavapurbimbamālokya kastvaṃ kastvaṃ brūhīti kopādabhidadhadabhayaṃ bhairavaśceṣṭatāṃ vaḥ 
MSS ekārimitrayoścet parasparaṃ bhūpayorbhedaḥ 
MSS tadupari pariṇatanītiḥ sukhamabhiyogaṃ karotu gatabhītiḥ 
MSS ekāraukārayuktā hariharijaharāḥ pañca bāṇāḥ smarasya khyātā lakṣyāṇyamīṣāṃ hṛdayakucadṛśo mūrdhni guhye krameṇa 
MSS marmasveteṣu bhūyo nijanayanadhanuḥpreritaistaiḥ patadbhiḥ syandante sundarīṇāṃ jvaladanalanibhairbindavaḥ kāmavārām 
MSS ekārthāṃ samyaguddiśya yātrāṃ yatra hi gacchataḥ 
MSS ya saṃhataprayāṇastu sandhiḥ saṃyoga ucyate 
MSS ekārthābhiniveśitvam arilakṣaṇamucyate 
MSS dāruṇas tu smṛtaḥ śatrur vijigīṣuguṇānvitaḥ 
MSS ekāvalīkalitamauktikakaitavena kasyāścidunnatapayodharayugmasevām 
MSS cakrurmanāṃsi yamināmatinirmalāni kaṃdarpamuktaśarapātakṛtāntarāṇi 
MSS ekāvasthitirastu vaḥ puramurapradveṣiṇordevayoḥ prāleyāñjanaśailaśṛṅgasubhagacchāyāṅgayoḥ śreyase 
MSS tārkṣyatrāsavihastapannagaphaṭā yasyāṃ jaṭāpālayo bālendudyutikośasuptajalajo yasyāṃ ca nābhīhradaḥ 
MSS ekā vā dugdhikā tumbī śaṅkhapuṣpī jaṭā dhṛtā 
MSS kaṇṭhadantodbhavā bhūtavedanāharaṇakṣamā 
MSS ekāsanasthā jalavāyubhakṣā mumukṣavas tyaktaparigrahāśca 
MSS pṛcchanti te'pyambaracāricāraṃ daivajñamanye kimutārthacittāḥ 
MSS ekāhaṃ japahīnastu sandhyāhīno dinatrayam 
MSS dvādaśāhamanagnistu śūdra eva na saṃśayaḥ 
MSS ekāhaniṣpannamahāprabandhaḥ śrīsiddharājapratipannabandhuḥ 
MSS śrīpālanāmā kavicakravarttī praśastimetāmakarot praśastām 
MSS ekāhamapi kaunteya bhūyiṣṭhamudakaṃ kuru 
MSS kulaṃ tārayate tāta sapta sapta ca sapta ca 
MSS ekāhāreṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ ṣaṭkarmanirataḥ sadā 
MSS ṛtukālābhigāmī ca sa vipro dvija ucyate 
MSS ekikeva nijavṛndamadhyagāpy uccukūja sabhayaṃ sitacchadī 
MSS dantamūlamasakṛcca saṃśayād āmamarśa kariṇaḥ kareṇukā 
MSS ekīkṛtastvaci niṣikta ivāvapīḍya nirbhugnapīnakucakuḍmalayānayā me 
MSS karpūrahāraharicandanacandrakānta niṣyandaśaivalamṛṇālahimādivargaḥ 
MSS ekīkṛtya kimoṣadhīpatirasairākāśabhāṇḍodare phullatpaṅkajinījanāmbujamukhadhmātaiḥ samantān muhuḥ 
MSS kāṣṭhotthāruṇadīptivahnipaṭalairātāpya samyag bhṛśaṃ tārāpāradamāraṇaṃ vitanute vaidyo'navadyo raviḥ 
MSS ekībhāvaṃ gatayor jalapayasormitracetasoścaiva 
MSS vyatirekakṛtau śaktir haṃsānāṃ durjanānāṃ ca 
MSS ekībhūya sphuṭamiva kimapyācaradbhiḥ pralīnair ebhirbhūtaiḥ smara kati kṛtāḥ svānta te vipralambhāḥ 
MSS tasmādeṣāṃ tyaja paricayaṃ cintaya svavyavasthām ābhāṣaste kimu na viditaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍitaḥ syāt 
MSS eke kuṭīrakoṇe'pi na lakṣyante sthitāḥ kvacit 
MSS anyeṣāṃ vibhavasyaitad brahmāṇḍamapi saṃkaṭam 
MSS eke kecit yatikaragatāḥ pātrasaṃjñāṃ labhante gāyantyanye sarasamadhuraṃ vīṇayā saṃprayuktāḥ 
MSS eke teṣāṃ sahagativaśād dustaraṃ tārayanti kecit teṣāṃ jvalitahṛdayā raktamevāpibanti 
MSS eke tumbā vratikaragatāḥ pātratāmānayanti gāyantyanye sarasamadhuraṃ śuddhavaṃśe vilagnāḥ 
MSS eke tāvad grathitasaguṇā dustaraṃ tārayanti teṣāṃ madhye jvalitahṛdayā raktameke pibanti 
MSS eke'dya prātarapare paścādanye punaḥ pare 
MSS sarve niḥsīmni saṃsāre yānti kaḥ kena śocyate 
MSS ekena kenacidanarghamaṇiprabheṇa kāvyaṃ camatkṛtipadena vinā suvarṇam 
MSS nirdoṣaleśamapi rohati kasya citte lāvaṇyahīnamiva yauvanamaṅganānām 
MSS ekena kenāpi guṇena nīco'py uccaiḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate jagatsu 
MSS dṛṣṭāntamagre mṛdutāprasiddho doṣākaro'pyuccapadaṃ prapannaḥ 
MSS ekena culukenābdhir nipītaḥ kumbhayoninā 
MSS tasyodaye'taḥ kāluṣyaṃ tyajantyāpo bhayādiva 
MSS ekena cūrṇakuntalam apareṇa kareṇa cibukamunnamayan 
MSS paśyāmi bāṣpadhauta śruti nagaradvāri tadvadanam 
MSS ekena cet parihṛto'si maheśvareṇa kiṃ khedamāvahasi ketaka nirguṇo'sau 
MSS anye na kiṃ jagati santi paraṃ guṇajñā ye tvāṃ vahanti śirasā naradevadevāḥ 
MSS ekena tiṣṭhatādhastād anyenopari tiṣṭhatā 
MSS dātṛyācakayorbhedaḥ karābhyāmeva sūcitaḥ 
MSS ekena priyasākṣiṇā jitavatī vīṇāṃ vacobhirnijair gatyā mandira eva viśvagamanaṃ haṃsaṃ jigāyācirāt 
MSS vaktreṇādvayamodinendumajayat sarvapramodapradaṃ dṛṣṭyā lakṣyapadāgrayeva dalayatyambhoruhāṇāṃ madam 
MSS ekena rājahaṃsena yā śobhā saraso'bhavat 
MSS na sā bakasahasreṇa paritastīravāsinā 
MSS ekena romanālena jātaṃ paṅkeruhadvayam 
MSS jñātvādho dhanamasyāsti khananti niśi rāgiṇaḥ 
MSS ekena śuṣkavṛkṣeṇa dahyamānena vahninā 
MSS dahyate tadvanaṃ sarvaṃ kuputreṇa kulaṃ yathā 
MSS ekena saṃdhiḥ kalaho'pareṇa kāryo'bhito vā prasamīkṣya vṛddhim 
MSS evaṃ prayuñjīta jigīṣuretā nītīr vijānannahitātmasāram 
MSS ekena smitapāṭalādhararuco jalpantyanalpākṣaraṃ vīkṣante'nyamitaḥ sphuṭatkumudinīphullollasallocanāḥ 
MSS dūrodāracaritracitravibhavaṃ dhyāyanti cānyaṃ dhiyā kenetthaṃ paramārthato'rthavadiva premāsti vāmabhruvām 
MSS ekenāṃśena dharmārthaḥ kartavyo bhūtimicchatā 
MSS ekenāṃśena kāmārtha ekamaṃśaṃ vivardhayet 
MSS ekenākṣṇā paritataruṣā vīkṣate vyomasaṃsthaṃ bhānorbimbaṃ sajalalulitenāpareṇātmakāntam 
MSS ahnaśchede dayitavirahā śaṅkinī cakravākī dvau saṃkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā 
MSS ekenāpāti lattā pativapuṣi pareṇāpi pītaḥ pitā te bhrātānyenāpi śaptastribhuvanatalato'nyena nirvāsitāsi 
MSS sadyaḥ śrīvīrabhūpastṛṇamiva manute tvāṃ sarojālaye yan mātastajjātimātrapraṇayini mayi tanmā sma kopaṃ vidadhyāḥ 
MSS ekenāpāti lattā pativapuṣi pareṇāpi pīto'sti tāto bhrātā śaptaḥ pareṇa tribhuvanatalato'nyena niṣkāsitāsi 
MSS channaṃ gehaṃ pareṇā'kali ca tadapareṇāsti sāpatnyaśīlā tasmānnityaṃ dvijebhyo madhuripumahile tvaṃ viyuktāsi manye 
MSS ekenāpi guṇavatā jātiviśuddhena cārukṛtyena 
MSS svakulamalaṃkṛtamakhilaṃ mukuṭaṃ muktāphaleneva 
MSS ekenāpi guṇavatā vidyāyuktena sādhunā 
MSS kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇeva prakāśyate 
MSS ekenāpi guṇenarddho labhate spṛhaṇīyatām 
MSS kākalyaiva piko lokair modyate malino'pyasau 
MSS ekenāpi guṇenāho spṛhaṇīyo naro bhavet 
MSS kalābhṛttyena ruciraś candro doṣākaro'pi san 
MSS ekenāpi payodhinā jalamucaste pūritāḥ koṭiśo jāto nāsya kuśāgralīnatuhinaślakṣṇo'pi toyavyayaḥ 
MSS āho śuṣyati daivadṛṣṭivalanādambhobhirambhomucaḥ saṃbhūyāpi vidhātumasya rajasi staimityamapyakṣamāḥ 
MSS ekenāpi vinītena sutenoddhriyate kulam 
MSS gaṅgāvatāraṇāpāraprathaṃ paśya bhagīratham 
MSS ekenāpi sudhīreṇa sotsāhena raṇaṃ prati 
MSS sotsāhaṃ jāyate sainyaṃ bhagne bhaṅgamavāpnuyāt 
MSS ata eva hi vāñchanti bhūpā yodhān mahābalān 
MSS śūrān dhīrān kṛtotsāhān varjayanti ca kātarān 
MSS ekenāpi suputreṇa jāyamānena satkulam 
MSS śaśinā caiva gaganaṃ sarvadaivojjvalīkṛtam 
MSS ekenāpi suputreṇa vidyāyuktena sādhunā 
MSS āhlāditaṃ kulaṃ sarvaṃ yathā candreṇa śarvarī 
MSS ekenāpi suputreṇa vidyāyuktena sādhunā 
MSS kulamujjvalatāṃ yāti candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā 
MSS ekenāpi suputreṇa siṃhī svapiti nirbhayam 
MSS sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrair bhāraṃ vahati gardabhī 
MSS ekenāpi suvṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena sugandhinā 
MSS vāsitaṃ tadvanaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā 
MSS ekenāpi hi śūreṇa pādākrāntaṃ mahītalam 
MSS kriyate bhāskareṇeva sphārasphuritatejasā 
MSS ekenaiva cirāya kṛṣṇa bhavatā govardhano'yaṃ dhṛtaḥ śrānto'si kṣaṇamāssva sāṃpratamamī sarve vayaṃ dadhmahe 
MSS ityullāsitadoṣṇi gopanivahe kiṃcid bhujākuṇcana nyañcacchailabharārdite viramati smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ 
MSS ekenaiva hi kaścid guṇena jagati prasiddhimupayāti 
MSS ekena kareṇa gajaḥ karī na sūryaḥ sahasreṇa 
MSS ekenoddhṛtya khaṅgaṃ hṛdi patitamiṣuṃ pāṇinaikena bhañjan bhrūbhedālaṃkṛtāsyaḥ sarabhasanayanaḥ spaṣṭadaṣṭādharoṣṭhaḥ 
MSS bhītaiḥ kravyādavṛndairanupahatatanuḥ kuñjarendropadhānaḥ śete yodhapradhāno yadi maraṇamidaṃ labhyate kiṃ jayena 
MSS ekeyaṃ rasanā na śabdamabhajad bheje'nuvāraṃ parā netraṃ kiṃcidanūrusaṅgamabhavajjātorusaṅgaṃ param 
MSS rāgaḥ kaścana nirjagāma hṛdayāt tasthau tathaivāparo bāhye satpulako'ntare vipulako jāto'ṅkabhūsaṃbhramaḥ 
MSS eke vārinidhau praveśamapare lokāntarālokanaṃ kecit pāvakayogitāṃ nijagaduḥ kṣīṇe'hni caṇḍārciṣaḥ 
MSS mithyā caitadasākṣikaṃ priyasakhi pratyakṣatīvrātapaṃ manye'haṃ punaradhvanīnaramaṇīceto'dhiśete raviḥ 
MSS ekeṣāṃ vāci śukavad anyeṣāṃ hṛdi mūkavat 
MSS hṛdi vāci tathānyeṣāṃ valgu valganti sūktayaḥ 
MSS eke satpuruṣāḥ parārthaghaṭakāḥ svārthaṃ parityajya ye sāmānyāstu parārthamudyamabhṛtaḥ svārthāvirodhena ye 
MSS te'mī mānuṣarākṣasāḥ parahitaṃ svārthāya nighnanti ye ye tu ghnanti nirarthakaṃ parahitaṃ te ke na jāmīmahe 
MSS ekaikamakṣaviṣayaṃ bhajatāmamīṣāṃ saṃpadyate yadi kṛtāntagṛhātithitvam 
MSS pañcākṣagocararatasya kimasti vācyam akṣārthamityamaladhīradhiyas tyajanti 
MSS ekaikaśo'pi nighnanti viṣayā viṣasaṃnibhāḥ 
MSS kṣemī tu sa kathaṃ nu syād yaḥ samaṃ pañca sevate 
MSS ekaikaśo yuvajanaṃ vilaṅghamānākṣanikaramiva taralā 
MSS viśrāmyati subhaga tvām aṅgulirāsādya merumiva 
MSS ekaikaśo vinighnanti viṣayā viṣasaṃnibhāḥ 
MSS kiṃ punaḥ pañca militāḥ na kathaṃ nāśayanti hi 
MSS ekaikasya yadādāya puṣpasya madhu saṃcitam 
MSS kiṃcin madhukarīvargais tadapyaśnanti nirghṛṇāḥ 
MSS ekaikasya śarasyaiva catuṣpakṣāṇi yojayet 
MSS ṣaḍaṅgulapramāṇena pakṣacchedaṃ ca kārayet 
MSS ekaikasyopakārasya prāṇān dāsyāmi te kape 
MSS pratyahaṃ kriyamāṇasya śeṣasya ṛṇino vayam 
MSS ekaikātiśayālavaḥ paraguṇajñānaikavaijñānikāḥ santyete dhanikāḥ kalāsu sakalāsvācāryacaryācaṇāḥ 
MSS apyete sumanogirāṃ niśamanād bibhyatyaho ślāghayā dhūte mūrdhani kuṇḍale kaṣaṇataḥ kṣīṇe bhavetāmiti 
MSS ekaiko'saṃkhyajīvānāṃ ghātato madhunaḥ kaṇaḥ 
MSS niṣpadyate yatastena madhvaśnāti kathaṃ budhaḥ 
MSS ekaiva kavitā puṃsāṃ grāmāyāśvāya hastine 
MSS antato'nnāya vastrāya tāmbūlāya ca kalpate 
MSS ekaiva kācin mahatāmavasthā sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇyathavā ca kanthā 
MSS karāgralagnābhinavā ca bālā gaṅgātaraṅgeṣvathavākṣamālā 
MSS ekaiva daṇḍanītis tu vidyetyauśanasāḥ sthitāḥ 
MSS tasyāṃ hi sarvavidyānām ārambhāḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ 
MSS ekaiva saṃgame bālā viyoge tanmayaṃ jagat 
MSS kṛtopakāra evāyaṃ viyogaḥ kena nindyate 
MSS ekaiva sāmṛtamayī sutarāmanarghyā kāpyastyasau himakarasya kalā yayaiva 
MSS āropito guṇavidā parameśvareṇa cūḍāmaṇau na gaṇito'sya kalaṅkadoṣaḥ 
MSS ekaiva sārthakā cintā dharmasyārthe vicintyate 
MSS dvitīyā sārthakā cintā yogināṃ dharmanandinī 
MSS ekaiśvarye sthito'pi praṇatabahuphale yaḥ svayaṃ kṛttivāsāḥ kāntāsaṃmiśradeho'pyaviṣayamanasāṃ yaḥ parastād yatīnām 
MSS aṣṭābhiryasya kṛtsnaṃ jagadapi tanubhirbibhrato nābhimānaḥ sanmārgālokanāya vyapanayatu sa vas tāmasīṃ vṛttimīśaḥ 
MSS eko giriśaḥ svāmī gaṇatā tulyaiva vallabhatvaṃ ca 
MSS kiṃ kurmaḥ karmagatau śuṣyati bhṛṅgī vināyakaḥ pīnaḥ 
MSS eko gotre pumān proktaḥ prāktanaiḥ svakuṭumbabhṛt 
MSS eko'pyanekaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṣāṃ bharaṇakṣamaḥ 
MSS eko jayati sadvṛttaḥ kiṃ punardvau susaṃhatau 
MSS kiṃ citraṃ yadi tanvaṅgyāḥ stanābhyāṃ nirjitaṃ jagat 
MSS eko jīvo bahavo dehā ekaṃ tattvaṃ bahavo mohāḥ 
MSS ekā vidyā bahupāṣaṇḍā vibudhaiḥ kriyate kimiti vitaṇḍā 
MSS ekodarasamudbhūtā ekanakṣatrajātakāḥ 
MSS na bhavanti samāḥ śīle yathā badarakaṇṭakāḥ 
MSS ekodarāḥ pṛthaggrīvā anyānyaphalabhakṣiṇaḥ 
MSS asaṃhatā vinaśyanti bhāruṇḍā iva pakṣiṇaḥ 
MSS eko dāśarathiḥ kāmaṃ yātudhānāḥ sahasraśaḥ 
MSS te tu yāvanta evājau tāvāṃśca dadṛśe sa taiḥ 
MSS eko devaḥ keśavo vā śivo vā ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā 
MSS eko vāsaḥ pattane vā vane vā ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā 
MSS eko dharmaḥ paraṃ śreyaḥ kṣamaikā śāntiruttamā 
MSS vidyaikā paramā dṛṣṭir ahiṃsaikā sukhāvahā 
MSS eko na ropito yāvad utpanno'yaṃ vraṇo'paraḥ 
MSS satyaḥ pravādo yacchidreṣv anarthā yānti bhūritām 
MSS ekonā viṃśatiḥ strīṇāṃ snānārthaṃ sarayūṃ gatā 
MSS viṃśatiḥ punarāyātā eko vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ 
MSS ekonā viṃśatirnāryaḥ krīḍāṃ kartuṃ vane gatāḥ 
MSS viṃśatirgṛhamāyātāḥ śeṣo vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ 
MSS eko netā kṣatriyo vā dvijo vā caikā vidyānvīkṣikī vā trayī vā 
MSS ekā bhāryā vaṃśajā vā priyā vāpy ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā 
MSS eko'nte dvisamastrilocana iti khyātaścaturbhiḥ stuto vedaiḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaḍānanapitā saptarṣibhirvanditaḥ 
MSS aṣṭāṅgo navatulya āmaragaṇe vāso daśāśā dadhat svaścaikādaśa so'vatānna vijito yo dvādaśātmāṃśubhiḥ 
MSS eko'pi kṛṣṇasya kṛtaḥ praṇāmo daśāśvamedhāvabhṛthena tulyaḥ 
MSS daśāśvamedhī punareti janma kṛṣṇapraṇāmī na punarbhavāya 
MSS eko'pi ko'pi sevyo yaḥ kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇaṃ punarnavam 
MSS anudvignaṃ karotyeva sūryaścandramasaṃ yathā 
MSS eko'pi guṇavān putro nirguṇena śatena kim 
MSS ekaścandras tamo hanti na ca tārāḥ sahasraśaḥ 
MSS eko'pi guṇavān putro nirguṇaiḥ kiṃ śatairapi 
MSS ekaścandro jagannetraṃ nakṣatraiḥ kiṃ prayojanam 
MSS eko'pi guṇavān putro mā nirguṇaśataṃ bhavet 
MSS ekaścandras tamo hanti na ca tārāḥ sahasraśaḥ 
MSS eko'pi jīyate hanta kālidāso na kenacit 
MSS śṛṅgāre lalitodgāre kālidāsatrayī kimu 
MSS eko'pi traya iva bhāti kanduko'yaṃ kāntāyāḥ karatalarāgaraktaraktaḥ 
MSS bhūmau taccaraṇanakhāṃśugauragauraḥ svaḥsthaḥ san nayanamarīcinīlanīlaḥ 
MSS eko'pi yaḥ sakalakāryavidhau samarthaḥ sattvādhiko bhavatu kiṃ bahubhiḥ prasūtaiḥ 
MSS candraḥ prakāśayati diṅmukhamaṇḍalāni tārāgaṇaḥ samudito'pyasamartha eva 
MSS eko'pi yatra nagare prasiddhaḥ syād dhanurgharaḥ 
MSS tato yāntyarayo dūraṃ mṛgāḥ siṃhagṛhādiva 
MSS eko'pi vāraṇapatirdviṣatāmanīkaṃ yuktaṃ nihanti madasattvaguṇopapannaḥ 
MSS nāgeṣu hi kṣitibhṛtāṃ vijayo nibaddhas tasmād gajādhikabalo nṛpatiḥ sadā syāt 
MSS eko'pi siṃhaḥ sāhasraṃ yūthaṃ mathnāti dantinām 
MSS tasmāt siṃhamivodāram ātmānaṃ vīkṣya saṃpatet 
MSS eko'pyamātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ 
MSS rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam 
MSS eko baṭurdarbhakuśāgrapāṇir vane vanaiḥ siñcati bālacūtān 
MSS āmrāśca siktāḥ pitaraśca tṛptā ekā kriyā dvyarthakarī prasiddhā 
MSS eko bahūnāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ madhye nipatito budhaḥ 
MSS padmaḥ pāthastaraṅgāṇāṃ iva viplavate dhruvam 
MSS eko bāṇaḥ sphurati valitālokanaṃ kāminīnāṃ kāmasyānyo malayapavanaḥ kāmināṃ marmabhedī 
MSS vīṇāveṇukvaṇitamaparaścūtapuṣpaṃ turīyaḥ sarvotkaṇṭhaprathamasacivaḥ pañcamaḥ pañcamo'pi 
MSS eko bhavān mama samaṃ daśa vā namanti jyāghoṣapūritaviyanti śarāsanāni 
MSS tallokapālasahitaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena cāpaṃ gṛhāṇa sadṛśaṃ kṣaṇamastu yuddham 
MSS eko bhāvaḥ sadā śasto yatīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām 
MSS śrīlubdhānāṃ na lokānāṃ viśeṣeṇa mahībhujām 
MSS eko'bhūt pulināt tatastu nalināccānyo'pi nākorabhūt prācyāste traya eva divyakavayo dīvyantu devyā girā 
MSS arvāñco yadi gadyapadyaracanācāturyavāguddhatās tān sarvānatiśayya khelatitarāṃ śākallamallaḥ kaviḥ 
MSS eko'bhūnnalināt tataśca pulinād valmīkataścāparas te sarve kavayo bhavanti guravas tebhyo namaskurmahe 
MSS arvāñco yadi gadyapadyaracanaiś cetaś camatkurvate teṣāṃ mūrdhni dadāmi vāmacaraṇaṃ karṇāṭarājapriyā 
MSS eko bhekaḥ paramamuditaḥ prāpya goṣpādanīraṃ ko me ko me raṭati satataṃ sparddhayā vākyamuccaiḥ 
MSS gaṅgādīnāṃ sakalasaritāṃ prāpya toyaṃ samudraḥ kiṃcid garvaṃ na vahati mahān prāyaśo bhūri ratnaiḥ 
MSS eko me śāśvatātmā sukhamasukhabhujo jñānadṛṣṭisvabhāvo nānyat kiṃcinnijaṃ me tanudhanakaraṇabhrātṛbhāryāsukhādi 
MSS karmodbhūtaṃ samastaṃ capalamasukhadaṃ tatra moho mudhā me paryālocyeti jīva svahitamavitathaṃ muktimārgaṃ śraya tvam 
MSS eko'mbudhirjagati jīvati yena tāni tāvanti hanta salilāni samuccitāni 
MSS yebhyaḥ kathaṃcidapi kiṃcidamī payodāḥ pītvā cirāya dharaṇīmapi tarpayanti 
MSS eko raviratitejā atiśūraḥ kesarī vane vāsī 
MSS ativipulaṃ khaṃ śūnyaṃ hyatigambhīro'mbudhiḥ kṣāraḥ 
MSS eko rasaḥ karuṇa eva nimitta bhedād bhinnaḥ pṛthak pṛthagivāśrayate vivartān 
MSS āvartabudbudataraṅgamayān vikārān ambho yathā salilameva hi tat samastam 
MSS eko rāgiṣu rājate priyatamādehārdhahārī haro nīrāgeṣu jino vimuktalalanāsaṅgo na yasmāt paraḥ 
MSS durvārasmarabāṇapannagaviṣavyāsaṅgamugdho janaḥ śeṣaḥ kāmaviḍambito hi viṣayān bhoktuṃ na moktuṃ kṣamaḥ 
MSS eko'rthaṃ vimṛśedeko dharme prakurute manaḥ 
MSS ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tamāhur madhyamaṃ naram 
MSS eko lalāṭe dvau mūrdhni dvau dvau pārśvopapārśvayoḥ 
MSS dvau ca vakṣasi vijñeyau prayāṇe caika eva tu 
MSS eko lobho mahāgrāho lobhāt pāpaṃ pravartate 
MSS tataḥ pāpādadharmāptis tato duḥkhaṃ pravartate 
MSS eko vittavataḥ sūnuḥ pitṛhīnaḥ suyauvane 
MSS mugdhe bhūbhuji kāyasthaḥ kāmispardhī vaṇiksutaḥ 
MSS nityāturāmātyavaidyaprasiddhasya guroḥ sutaḥ 
MSS   pracchannakāmo jaṭādharaḥ 
MSS napuṃsakapravādasya praśamārthī phalāśanaḥ 
MSS matto dhūrtasahāyaśca rājasūnurniraṅkuśaḥ 
MSS grāmyo dhātṛdvijasutaḥ prāptalābhaśca gāyanaḥ 
MSS sadyaḥ sārthapatiḥ prāptaḥ śrīmān daivaparāyaṇaḥ 
MSS gatānugatiko mūrkhaḥ śāstronmādaśca paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS nityakṣībaśca veśyānāṃ jaṅgamāḥ kalpapādapāḥ 
MSS eko viśvasatāṃ harāmyapaghṛṇaḥ prāṇānahaṃ prāṇinām ityevaṃ paricintya mātmamanasi vyādhānutāpaṃ kṛthāḥ 
MSS bhūpānāṃ bhavaneṣu kiṃ ca vimalakṣetreṣu gūḍhāśayāḥ sādhūnāmarayo vasanti kati na tvattulyakakṣā narāḥ 
MSS eko vaiśyaśca dvau śūdrau brāhmaṇāstraya eva ca 
MSS vidyopajīvinaḥ pañca na gaccheyuḥ samaṃ svayam 
MSSA eko vaiśyo dvau ca śūdrau kṣatriyāḥ sapta pañca vā 
MSSA nava nāryo na gaccheyuḥ na gacched brāhmaṇatrayam 
MSS eko'hamasahāyo'haṃ kṛśo'hamaparicchadaḥ 
MSS svapne'pyevaṃvidhā cintā mṛgendrasya na jāyate 
MSS eko'hamasmīti ca manyase tvaṃ na hṛcchayaṃ vetsi muniṃ purāṇam 
MSS yo veditā karmaṇaḥ pāpakasya yasyāntike tvaṃ vṛjinaṃ karoṣi 
MSS eko'hamasmītyātmānaṃ yat tvaṃ kalyāṇa manyase 
MSS nityaṃ sthitas te hṛdyeṣa puṇyapāpekṣitā muniḥ 
MSS eko haraḥ priyādhara guṇavedī diviṣado'pare mūḍhāḥ 
MSS viṣamamṛtaṃ vā samamiti yaḥ paśyan garalameva papau 
MSS eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ 
MSS nīcenātmāpacāreṇa kulaṃ tena vinaśyati 
MSS eko hi khañjanavaro nalinīdalastho dṛṣṭaḥ karoti caturaṅgabalādhipatyam 
MSS kiṃ me kariṣyati bhavadvadanāravinde jānāmi no nayanakhañjanayugmametat 
MSS eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatītyetadayuktamuktam 
MSS rūpādikān sarvaguṇān nihanti kiṃ maurkhyamekaṃ na śarīrabhājām 
MSS eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatīndoḥ kiraṇeṣvivāṅkaḥ 
MSS kenāpi nūnaṃ kavinā ca dṛṣṭaṃ dāridryamekaṃ guṇarāśināśi 
MSS eko hyamātyo medhāvī śūro dānto vicakṣaṇaḥ 
MSS rājānaṃ rājaputraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam 
MSS eṇaḥ krīḍati śūkaraśca khanati dvīpī ca garvāyate kroṣṭā krandati valgate ca śaśako vegād rururdhāvati 
MSS niḥśaṅkaḥ karipotakastarulatāmunmoṭate līlayā haṃho siṃha vinā tvayādya vipine kīdṛgdaśā vartate 
MSS eṇaśreṇiḥ śaśakanikaraḥ śallakīnāṃ kadambaṃ kolavyūhaḥ spṛśati sukhitāṃ yatra tatrāpi kuñje 
MSS ko nāmāsmin bata hatavane pādapastādṛguccair yasya cchāyāmayamadhivasatyuṣṇarugṇo gajendraḥ 
MSS eṇākṣīspṛhayālutā na kathamapyāste vivekodayān nityaṃ pracyutiśaṅkayā kṣaṇamapi svarge na modāmahe 
MSS apyanyeṣu vināśivastuviṣayābhogeṣu tṛṣṇā na me svarṇadyāḥ puline paraṃ haripadadhyānaṃ samīhāmahe 
MSS eṇādyāḥ paśavaḥ kirātapariṣannaiṣā guṇagrāhiṇī saṃcāro'pi na nāgarasya viṣayocchinnaṃ munīnāṃ manaḥ 
MSS dhūmenaiva sugandhinā pratipadaṃ dikcakramāmodayan āmūlaṃ paridahyate'gurutaruḥ kasmai kimācakṣmahe 
MSS eṇīgaṇeṣu gurugarvanimīlitākṣaḥ kiṃ kṛṣṇasāra khalu khelasi kānane'smin 
MSS sīmāmimāṃ kalaya bhinnakarīndrakumbha muktāmayīṃ harivihāravasundharāyāḥ 
MSS eṇīdṛśaḥ pāṇipuṭe niruddhā veṇī vireje śayanotthitāyāḥ 
MSS sarojakośādiva niṣpatantī śreṇī ghanībhūya madhuvratānām 
MSS eṇīdṛśaḥ śravaṇasīmni yadānayanti tenaiva tasya mahimā navacampakasya 
MSS tvaṃ tatra no viharase yadi bhṛṅga tena naitasya kiṃcidapi tat tu tavaiva hāniḥ 
MSS eṇīdṛśo vijayate veṇī pṛṣṭhāvalambinī 
MSS kaśeva pañcabāṇasya yuvatarjanahetave 
MSS eṇī yāti vilokya bālaśalabhān śaṣpāṅkurāditsayā chatrīkuḍmalakāni rakṣati cirādaṇḍabhramād kukkuṭī 
MSS dhūtvā dhāvati kṛṣṇakīṭapaṭalaśreṇīṃ śikhaṇḍī śiro dūrādeva vanāntare viṣadharagrāsābhilāṣāturaḥ 
MSS eṇīśābavilocanābhiralasaśroṇībharaprauḍhi bhir veṇībhūtarasakramābhirabhitaḥ śreṇīkṛtābhirvṛtaḥ 
MSS pāṇī nāma vinodayan ratipatestūṇīśayaiḥ sāyakair vāṇīnāmapadaṃ paraṃ vrajajanakṣoṇīpatiḥ pātu naḥ 
MSS eṇo gajaḥ pataṅgaśca bhṛṅgo mīnas tu pañcamaḥ 
MSS śabdasparśarūpagandharasairete hatāḥ khalu 
MSS etacca tapaso mūlaṃ tapaso mūlameva ca 
MSS sarvadā kāmavijayaḥ saṃkalpavijayas tathā 
MSS etac caturguṇaṃ tailaṃ tasmāc cāpi caturguṇam 
MSS kāṃjikaṃ prakṣiped dhīmāṃs tatas tailaṃ vipācayet 
MSS etacchāntavicitracatvarapathaṃ viśrāntavaitālika ślāghāślokamaguñjimañjumurajaṃ vidhvastagītadhvani 
MSS vyāvṛttādhyayanaṃ nivṛttasukavikrīḍāsamasyaṃ namad vidvadvādapathaṃ kathaṃ puramidaṃ maunavrate vartate 
MSS etacchāstrārthatattvaṃ tu mayākhyātaṃ tavānagha 
MSS aviśvāso narendrāṇām aparaṃ guhyamucyate 
MSS etaj jaḍājaḍavivecanametadeva kṣityāditattvapariśodhanakauśalaṃ ca 
MSS jñānaṃ ca śaivamidamāgamakoṭilabhyaṃ māturyadaṅghriyugale nihito mayātmā 
MSS etatkarālakaravālanikṛttakaṇṭha nāloccaladbahulaphenilabudbudaughaiḥ 
MSS sārdhaṃ ḍamaḍḍamaruḍāṃkṛtihūtabhūta vargeṇa bhargagṛhiṇīṃ rudhirairdhinomi 
MSS etat kavīndramukhacandramasaḥ kadācit kāvyābhidhānamamṛtaṃ yadi nāgaliṣyat 
MSS saṃsāriṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhasahasrabhājāṃ cetovinodasadanaṃ kimihābhaviṣyat 
MSS etat kāntamidaṃ kāntam ityāvasathatṛṣṇayā 
MSS tasyā bhramati sarvāṅgaṃ manye mūḍha iva smaraḥ 
MSS etat kāmaphalaṃ loke yad dvayorekacittatā 
MSS anyacittakṛte kāme śavayoriva saṃgamaḥ 
MSS etat kāryamamarāḥ saṃśrutaṃ me dhṛtiḥ śamaḥ satyadharmānuvṛttiḥ 
MSS granthiṃ vinīya hṛdayasya sarvaṃ priyāpriye cātmavaśaṃ nayīta 
MSSA etat kiṃ nanu karṇabhūṣaṇamayaṃ hāraḥ sukāñcī navā baddhā kācidiyaṃ tvayādya tilakaḥ ślāghyaḥ priye kalpitaḥ 
MSSA pratyaṅgaṃ spṛśateti tatkṣaṇabhavadromāñcamālāñcitā tanvī mānamupekṣayaiva śanakairdhūrtena saṃmocitā 
MSS etat kiṃ praṇayinyapi praṇayinī yan māninī jāyate manye mānavidhau bhaviṣyati sukhaṃ kiṃcid viśiṣṭaṃ rasāt 
MSS vāñchā tasya sukhasya me'pi hṛdaye jāgarti nityaṃ paraṃ svapne'pyeṣa na me'parādhyati patiḥ kupyāmi tasmai katham 
MSS etat kiṃ śrutasadṛśaṃ tvadvratayogyaṃ kulānurūpaṃ vā 
MSS kṛtavānasi yat sumate paribhūtaguṇodayaṃ karma

MSS etat kṛtvā priyamanucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayyanukrośabuddhyā 
MSS iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr mā bhūdevaṃ kṣaṇamapi ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ

MSS etat tad durjayaṃ loke putradāramayaṃ viṣam 
MSS jāyante ca mriyante ca yat pītvā mohitāḥ prajāḥ

MSS etat tadvaktramatra kva tadadharamadhu kvāyatāste kaṭākṣāḥ kvālāpāḥ komalāste kva sa madanadhanurbhaṅguro bhrūvilāsaḥ

MSS etasmin vanamārgabhūparisare saundaryamudrāṅkitaḥ prodyadbhiḥ phalapatrapuṣpanivahaiś cūtaḥ sa ekaḥ param 
MSS yaṃ vīkṣya smitavaktramudgatamahāsaṃtoṣamullāsita sphārotkaṇṭhamakuṇṭhitakramamamī dhāvanti pānthavrajāḥ 
MSS etasmin vijane vane'tanutarucchannāvakāśe sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmīti tava dviṣāmadhipatiryāvad vidhatte matim

MSS etasmin vipine mayā balavatā nājñāpitāḥ ke mṛgāḥ kasmai vā na phalaṃ vikīrṇamucitaṃ roṣasya toṣasya ca

MSS varṇāvalimiva vahati pratimāsaṃ ghaṭyamānasya

MSS evaṃ nisargacapalā lalanā viveka vairāgyadāyibahuduścaritaprabandhāḥ 
MSS sādhvī tu kācidapi tāsu kulaṃ viśālaṃ yālaṃkarotyabhinavā khamivendulekhā 
MSS evaṃ nihatya saṃgrāme duṣṭaśatruṃ madoddhatam 
MSS jayatūryaninādena harṣayan subhaṭān svakān 
MSS evaṃ nojjhati mūḍho'rthān yāvadarthaiḥ sa nojjhitaḥ 
MSS evaṃ paśuśca mūrkaśca nirvivekamatī samau 
MSS evaṃ putrāśca pautrāśca jñātayo bāndhavās tathā 
MSS teṣu sneho na kartavyo viprayogo hi tairdhruvam 
MSS evaṃ prajñaiva paramaṃ balaṃ na tu parākramaḥ 
MSS yatprabhāveṇa nihataḥ śaśakenāpi kesarī 
MSS evaṃ prayatnaṃ kurvīta yānaśayyāsanāśane 
MSS sthāne prasādhane caiva sarvālaṅkārakeṣu ca 
MSS evaṃ phalati sarvasya vidhiḥ sattvānusārataḥ 
MSS tat susattvo bhavet sattvahīnaṃ na vṛṇvate śriyaḥ 
MSS evaṃ bahu kṣapayati svalpasyārthe dhanāndhadhīḥ 
MSS evaṃ bahūnapi ripūn samarapravṛttān dveṣākulānagaṇitasvaparasvarūpān 
MSS eko'pyananyasamapauruṣabhagnasāra darpajvarāñ jayati saṃyugamūrdhni dhīraḥ 
MSS evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānamātmanā 
MSS jahi śatruṃ mahābāho kāmarūpaṃ durāsadam 
MSS evaṃ bruvanti loke'tra dhanināṃ purataḥsthitāḥ 
MSS kulīnā api pāpānāṃ dṛśyante dhanalipsayā 
MSS daridrasya manuṣyasya kṣitau rājyaṃ prakurvataḥ 
MSS evaṃ bhavati loke'smin deva sarvasya sarvadā 
MSS prākkarmopārjitaṃ jantoḥ sarvameva śubhāśubham 
MSS evaṃ bhavanti veśyāḥ svārthaikaratā vyapetasadbhāvāḥ 
MSS abhilaṣitaviṣayasiddheḥ kā hānis tadapi yuṣmākam 
MSS evaṃ manaḥ karmavaśaṃ prayuṅkte avidyayātmanyupadhīyamāne 
MSS prītirna yāvanmayi vāsudeve na mucyate dehayogena tāvat 
MSS evaṃ mūḍhaprabhurvetti nigrahaṃ nāpyanugraham 
MSS evaṃ mūḍhasya mūḍhatvaṃ svārthāndhasyāticitratā 
MSS evaṃ mohaprabhavo rāgo na strīṣu kasya duḥkhāya 
MSS tāsveva vivekabhṛtāṃ bhavati virāgas tu mokṣāya 
MSS evaṃ yathāha bhavatī mama sarvadoṣāḥ kaḥ svāminā kuvalayākṣi sahānubandhaḥ 
MSS eṣo'ñjalirviracitaḥ kuru nigrahaṃ me dāse'parādhavati ko'vasaraḥ kṣamāyāḥ 
MSS evaṃ lepatrayaṃ kuryāt saptame saptame'hani 
MSS tato janmāvadhi kacāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syurbhramaraprabhāḥ 
MSS evaṃ lokaṃ paraṃ vidyān naśvaraṃ karmanirmitam 
MSS satulyātiśayadhvaṃsaṃ yathā maṇḍalavartinām 
MSS evaṃ vaśīkṛtasvātmā nityaṃ smitamukho bhavet 
MSS tyajed bhrakuṭisaṃkocaṃ pūrvābhāṣī jagatsuhṛt 
MSS evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituradhomukhī 
MSS līlākamalapatrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī 
MSS evaṃ vicāraś cintā ca sāraṃ rājye'dhikaṃ nu kim 
MSS evaṃvidhān gajāñ jātyān vanādānīya pārthivaḥ 
MSS vinaye śiṣyavat kuryāt putravat paripālayet 
MSS evaṃvidhe bhāvi na veti citte niveśya kāryaṃ bhaṣaṇaṃ vimuñcet 
MSS saṃbhakṣya piṇḍaṃ sthiratāṃ gatasya ceṣṭādikaṃ tasya nirūpaṇīyam 
MSS evaṃ vilokyāsya guṇānanekān samastapāpārinirāsadakṣān 
MSS viśuddhabodhā na kadācanāpi jñānasya pūjāṃ mahatīṃ tyajanti 
MSS evaṃ viṣaprayogeṇa śatrūṇāṃ kṣudradhātakam 
MSS kṣīṇena kriyate yat tu viṣadaṇḍaḥ sa ucyate 
MSS evaṃ viṣahya vidhurasya vidherniyogam āpatsu rakṣitacaritradhanā hi sādhvyaḥ 
MSS guptāḥ svasattvavibhavena mahattamena kalyāṇamādadhati patyurathātmanaśca 
MSS evaṃvṛttasya rājñas tu śiloñchenāpi jīvataḥ 
MSS vistīryate yaśo loke tailabindurivāmbhasi 
MSS evaṃ vedhatrayaṃ kuryāc śaṅkhadundubhiniḥsvanaiḥ 
MSS tataḥ praṇamya gurave dhanurbāṇān nivedayet 
MSS evaṃ śramavidhiṃ kuryād yāvat siddhiḥ prajāyate 
MSS śrame siddhe ca varṣāsu naiva grāhyaṃ dhanuḥ kare 
MSS evaṃ saṃcintya manasā pretya karmaphalodayam 
MSS manovākkarmabhirnityaṃ śubhaṃ karma samācaret 
MSS evaṃ santyeva deveha bhartṛbhaktāḥ kulāṅganāḥ 
MSS na punaḥ sarvathā sarvā durvṛttā eva yoṣitaḥ 
MSS evaṃ sarvaṃ vidhāyedam itikartavyamātmanaḥ 
MSS yuktaś caivāpramattaś ca parirakṣedimāḥ prajāḥ 
MSS evaṃ sarvajagad vilokya kalitaṃ durvāravīryātmanā nistriṃśena samastasattvasamitipradhvaṃsinā mṛtyunā 
MSS sadratnatrayaśātamārgaṇagaṇaṃ gṛhṇanti tacchittaye santaḥ śāntadhiyo jineśvaratapaḥ sāmrājyalakṣmīśritāḥ 
MSS evaṃ sarvajanānāṃ duḥkhakaraṃ jaṭharaśikhinamativiṣamam 
MSS saṃtoṣajalairamalaiḥ śamayanti yatīśvarā ye te 
MSS evaṃ sarvamidaṃ kṛtvā yan mayāsāditaṃ śubham 
MSS tena syāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhapraśāntikṛt 
MSS evaṃ sarvamidaṃ rājā saṃmantrya saha mantribhiḥ 
MSS vyāyamyāplutya madhyāhne bhoktumantaḥpuraṃ vrajet 
MSS evaṃ sarvātmanā kāryā rakṣā yogavidāniśam 
MSS dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ śarīraṃ sādhanaṃ yataḥ 
MSS evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī 
MSS kartavyā paṇḍitairjñātvā sarvabhūtamayaṃ harim 
MSS evaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ deham avyaktaprabhavāpyayam 
MSS ko vidvānātmasātkṛtvā hanti jantūnṛte'sataḥ 
MSS evaṃ siddho bhaved yogī vañcayitvā vidhānataḥ 
MSS kālaṃ kalitasaṃsāraṃ pauruṣeṇādbhutena hi 
MSS evaṃ sthāpaya subhru bāhulatikāmevaṃ kuru sthānakaṃ nātyuccairnama kuñcayāgracaraṇau māṃ paśya tāvat kṣaṇam 
MSS evaṃ nartayataḥ svavaktramurajenāmbhodharadhvāninā śaṃbhorvaḥ paripāntu nartitalayacchedāhatās tālikāḥ 
MSS evaṃ svadoṣaḥ prakaṭo'py ajñairdeva na budhyate 
MSS evaṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātvāsāṃ prajāpatinisargajam 
MSS paramaṃ yatnamātiṣṭhet puruṣo rakṣaṇaṃ prati 
MSS evaṃ hi kurute deva yoṣidīrṣyāniyantritā 
MSS śikṣayatyanyapuruṣā'saṃgamīrṣyaiva hi striyaḥ 
MSS tadīrṣyāmaprakāśyaiva rakṣyā nārī subuddhinā 
MSS rahasyaṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ vanitāsu yathā tathā 
MSS puruṣeṇecchatā kṣemam    
MSS evamajñātahṛdayā mūrkhāḥ kṛtvā viparyayam 
MSS ghnanti svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ca tādṛg dadati co'ttaram 
MSS evamanekavidhaṃ vidadhāti yo jananārṇavapātanimittam 
MSS ceṣṭitamaṅgajabāṇavibhinno neha sukhī na paratra sukhī saḥ 
MSS evamanyāyyayā buddhyā kṛtaṃ karmāśubhāvaham 
MSS tasmāt tan nyāyyayā kuryād bakenāheḥ kṛtaṃ yathā 
MSS evamanyonyasaṃcāraṃ ṣaḍguṇyaṃ yo'nupaśyati 
MSS sa buddhinigalair baddhair iṣṭaṃ krīḍati pārthivaiḥ 
MSS evamapāstamatiḥ kramato'tra puṣpadhanurdharavegavidhūtaḥ 
MSS kiṃ na jano labhate jananindyo duḥkhamasahyamanantamavācyam 
MSS evamabhyāhate loke kālenābhinipīḍite 
MSS sumahad dhairyamālambya mano mokṣe niveśayet 
MSS evamalpaśruto mantrī kalyāṇābhijano'pyuta 
MSS dharmārthakāmasaṃyuktaṃ nālaṃ mantraṃ parīkṣitum 
MSS evamācārato dṛṣṭvā dharmasya munayo gatim 
MSS sarvasya tapaso mūlam ācāraṃ jagṛhuḥ param 
MSS evamāptavacanāt sa pauruṣaṃ kākapakṣakadhare'pi rāghave 
MSS śraddadhe tridaśagopamātrake dāhaśaktimiva kṛṣṇavartmani 
MSS evamāli nigṛhītasādhvasaṃ śaṃkaro rahasi sevyatāmiti 
MSS sā sakhībhirupadiṣṭamākulā nāsmarat pramukhavartini priye 
MSS evamāśramaviruddhavṛttinā saṃyamaḥ kimiti janmatas tvayā 
MSS sattvasaṃśrayasukho'pi dūṣyate kṛṣṇasarpaśiśuneva candanaḥ 
MSS evamuttamajanmānas tiryañco'pyāpadi priye 
MSS prabhuṃ nojjhanti mitraṃ vā tārayanti tataḥ punaḥ 
MSS hīnajātyudbhavā ye tu teṣāṃ spṛśati nāśayam 
MSS kadācidapi sattvaṃ vā sneho vā cañcalātmanām 
MSS evamupacīyamānaṃ stokaṃ stokaṃ vicinvataḥ puṇyam 
MSS saṃpadyate viśālaṃ śrutimapyevaṃ tapo'pyevam 
MSS evameva kriyāyuktā sarvasaubhāgyadāyinī 
MSS yasyaiṣā ca bhaved bhāryā devendro'sau na mānuṣaḥ 
MSS evameva nahi jīvyate khalāt tatra kā nṛpativallabhe kathā 
MSS pūrvameva hi suduḥsaho'nalaḥ kiṃ punaḥ prabalavāyuneritaḥ 
MSS evameva manuṣyeṣu teṣu pūrvāpakāriṣu 
MSS viśvāso nopagantavyo nadī gatajalā yathā 
MSS evameva hi yo'śvatthaṃ ropayed vidhinā naraḥ 
MSS yatra kutrāpi vā sthāne gacchet sa bhavanaṃ hareḥ 
MSS eṣa eva manastāpaḥ paṅke magnasya dantinaḥ 
MSS patate yat samuddhartuṃ jñātayo nibhṛtasmitāḥ

MSS eṣa dharmastu suśroṇi piturmātuśca vaśyatā

MSS yā nārī kurute cānyat sā yāti narakaṃ dhruvam 
MSS eṣa bakaḥ sahasaiva vipannaḥ śāṭhyamaho kva nu tad gatamasya

MSS eṣa vandhyāsuto yāti khapuṣpakṛtaśekharaḥ

MSS eṣa sūryāṃśusaṃtapto mṛgaḥ kutarumāśritaḥ

MSS yena śakyaṃ mahāprājña prajānāṃ paripālanam

MSS eṣāṃ pallavamaṃśukāni kusumaṃ muktāḥ phalaṃ vidrumaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ dalamaṅkuro maratakaṃ haimaṃ ca śākhāśatam

MSS eṣā kā jaghanasthalī sulalitā pronmattakāmādhikā bhrūbhaṅgaṃ kuṭilaṃ tvanaṅgadhanuṣaḥ prakhyaṃ prabhācandravat

MSS eṣā kāntā vrajati lalitaṃ vepamānā gulmacchannaṃ vanamurunagaiḥ saṃpraviddham

MSS eṣā kā bhuktamuktā pracalitanayanā svedalagnāṅgavastrā pratyūṣe yāti bālā mṛga iva cakitā sarvataḥ śaṅkayantī

MSS eṣā kā stanapīnabhārakaṭhinā madhye daridrāvatī vibhrāntā hariṇī vilolanayanā saṃtrastayūthodgatā
