MSS eṣā kusumaniṣaṇṇā tṛṣitāpi satī bhavantamanuraktā 
MSS pratipālayati madhukarī na khalu madhu vinā tvayā pibati 
MSS eṣāgataiva nibirīsanitambabimba bhāreṇa pakṣmaladṛśaḥ kriyate tu vighnaḥ 
MSS yāntyā itīva dayitāntikameṇadṛṣṭer agre jagāma gadituṃ laghucittavṛttiḥ 
MSS eṣā jigīṣati pṛthustabakā latā tvāṃ paryāptapīnanibiḍastanabhārakhinnām 
MSS asyāḥ priye vicinumaḥ stabakāṃs tathānyāḥ kartuṃ yathā na hi kadāpi latāḥ smareyuḥ 
MSS eṣā te hara kā sugātri katamā mūrdhni sthitā kiṃ jaṭā haṃsaḥ kiṃ bhajate jaṭāṃ nahi śaśī candro jalaṃ sevate 
MSS mugdhe bhūtiriyaṃ kuto'tra salilaṃ bhūtis taraṅgāyate itthaṃ yo vinigūhate tripathagāṃ pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ 
MSS eṣā doṣā yathārthā priyatama bhavato hanta jātā viyoge strīhatyāpātakīti prathitimupagate lāñchanīti trilokyām 
MSS naivaṃ bhūyo'parādhaṃ bata dayita kadāpyācariṣyāmi satyaṃ tvattyaktāṃ māṃ sutigmairmanasijaśamanaḥ sāyakairhantumutkaḥ 
MSS eṣā dharmapatākinī taṭasudhāsevāvasannākinī śuṣyatpātakinī bhagīrathatapaḥsāphalyahevākinī 
MSS premārūḍhapinākinī girisutāsyākekarālokinī pāpāḍambaraḍākinī tribhuvanānandāya mandākinī 
MSS eṣā puṣkariṇī marāla malinaiś channā kuvīthījalair yasyāmajñatayā vidherakṛpayā ced vastumākāṅkṣase 
MSS viśrambho bakamaṇḍaleṣu vinayo bhekeṣu saṃbandhitā rātryandheṣu vidhīyatāṃ kṛpaṇatā koyaṣṭikaśreṇiṣu 
MSS eṣā pravāsaṃ kathamapyatītya yātā punaḥ saṃśayamanyathaiva 
MSS ko nāma pākābhimukhasya jantor dvārāṇi daivasya pidhātumīṣṭe 
MSS eṣā phullakadambanīpasurabhau kāle ghanodbhāsite kāntasyālayamāgatā samadanā hṛṣṭā jalārdrālakā 
MSS vidyudvāridagarjitaiḥ sacakitā tvaddarśanākāṅkṣiṇī pādau nūpuralagnakardamadharau prakṣālayantī sthitā 
MSS eṣā bhaviṣyati vinidrasaroruhākṣī kāmasya kāpi dayitā tanujānujā vā 
MSS yaḥ paśyati kṣaṇamimāṃ kathamanyathāsau kāmas tamastakaruṇas taruṇaṃ hinasti 
MSS eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrāt pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī 
MSS surāṅganā karṣati khaṇḍitāgrāt sūtraṃ mṛṇālādiva rājahaṃsī 
MSS eṣā raṅgapraveśena kalānāṃ caiva śikṣayā 
MSS svarāntareṇa dakṣā hi vyāhartuṃ tanna mucyatām 
MSS eṣā latā yadi vilāsavatī kathaṃ syād vidyullatā yadi kathaṃ bhavitā dharaṇyām 
MSS vastuṃ manojanṛpaternagarī garīyo vakṣojadurgaviṣamā kimakāri dhātrā 
MSS eṣā vrajantī lalitaṃ smayantī sakhījanaiḥ sārdhamatipragalbhā 
MSS surīva nityaṃ suratāsukhāptā vibhāti bhūmīdharapāṭhakastrī 
MSS eṣā sā vindhyamadhyasthalavipulaśilotsaṅgaraṅgattaraṅgā saṃbhogaśrāntatīrāśrayaśabaravadhūśarma dā narmadā ca 
MSS yasyāḥ sāndradrumālīlalitatalamilatsundarīsaṃniruddhaiḥ siddhaiḥ sevyanta ete mṛgamṛditadalatkandalāḥ kūlakacchāḥ 
MSS eṣāsi vayaso darpāt kulaputrānusāriṇī 
MSS keśeṣu kusumāḍhyeṣu sevitavyeṣu karṣitā 
MSS eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana 
MSS samasthamanurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca 
MSS eṣā hi me raṇagatasya dṛḍhā pratijñā drakṣyanti yanna ripavo jaghanaṃ hayānām 
MSS yuddheṣu bhāgyacapaleṣu na me pratijñā daivaṃ yadicchati jayaṃ ca parājayaṃ ca 
MSS eṣu sparśo varastrīṇāṃ svāntahārī munerapi 
MSS ato'pramattaḥ seveta viṣayāṃs tu yathocitān 
MSS eṣaiva kācana vinidrasaroruhākṣī kāmasya kāpi dayitā tanujānujā vā 
MSS yaḥ paśyati kṣaṇamimāṃ kathamanyathāsau kāmas tamastakaruṇaṃ taruṇaṃ nihanti 
MSS eṣaiva mahatī lajjā sadācārasya bhūpateḥ 
MSS yadakālabhavo mṛtyus tasya saṃspṛśati prajāḥ 
MSS eṣaiva yoṣitāṃ dhanyā śīlaṃ ca labhate sukham 
MSS divā pativratā bhūyo naktaṃ ca kulaṭā yataḥ 
MSS eṣo'gnihotrīti bibharti gāstā vikrīya dugdhaṃ salilaṃ juhoti 
MSS khyāto'sti lokeṣvṛtukālagāmī rajasvalāṃ yāti divāpi veśyām 
MSS eṣojjaṭasya bhavato gṛhiṇī tvaparṇā sthāṇuḥ svayaṃ tava ca sūnurasau viśākhaḥ 
MSS tvattaḥ phalaṃ ka iha vāñchati vāmadeva janmakṣayaḥ paramasau tava darśanena 
MSS eṣottuṅgataraṅgalaṅghitataṭotsaṅgā pataṅgātmajā pūrṇeyaṃ tarirambubhirna hi hareḥ śaṅkā kalaṅkādapi 
MSS kāṭhinyaṃ bhaja nādya sundari vayaṃ rādhe prasādena te jīvāmaḥ sphuṭamātarīkuru giridroṇīvinodotsavam 
MSS eṣo'mbudaniḥsvanatulyaravaḥ kṣībaḥ skhalamānavilambagatiḥ 
MSS śrutvā ghanagarjitamadritaṭe vṛkṣān prati moṭayati dviradaḥ 
MSS eṣo'hamadritanayāmukhapadmajanmā prāptaḥ surāsuramanorathadūravartī 
MSS svapne'niruddhaghaṭanādhigatābhirūpa lakṣmīphalāmasurarājasutāṃ vidhāya 
MSS eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ 
MSS teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet 
MSS eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko'pi gayāṃ vrajet 
MSS yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet 
MSS eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko'pi gayāṃ vrajet 
MSS yatrāsau prathito lokeṣv akṣayyakaraṇo vaṭaḥ 
MSS eṣyati mā punarayamiti gamane yadamaṅgalaṃ mayākāri 
MSS adhunā tadeva kāraṇam avasthitau dagdhagehapateḥ 
MSS eṣyanti yāvad gaṇanād digantān nṛpāḥ smarārtāḥ śaraṇe praveṣṭum 
MSS ime padābje vidhināpi sṛṣṭās tāvatya ekāṅgulayo'tra lekhāḥ 
MSS eṣyantyavaśyamadhunā hṛdayādhināthā mugdhā mudhā kuruta mā vividhaṃ vilāpam 
MSS itthaṃ śaśaṃsuriva garjitakaitavena pāthodharāḥ pathikapaṅkajalocanābhyaḥ 
MSS ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara 
MSS iti vitrastasāraṅganetrayā ko na vañcitaḥ 
MSS ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara 
MSS evamāśāgrahagrastaiḥ krīḍanti dhanino'rthibhiḥ 
MSS ehi tatra cinuvaḥ sukausumaṃ kau sumañjusumanastaruśriyām 
MSS ekikāmiti tatāna māninīm āninīya kapaṭād rahaḥ kṣaṇam 
MSS ehi viśvātmane vatse bhikṣā tvaṃ parikalpitā 
MSS arthino munayaḥ prāptaṃ gṛhamedhiphalaṃ mayā 
MSS ehi he ramaṇi paśya kautukaṃ dhūlidhūsaratanuṃ digambaram 
MSS sāpi tadvadanapaṅkajaṃ papau bhrātaruktamapi kiṃ na bughyate 
MSS ehyāgaccha samāviśāsanamidaṃ kasmāc cirād dṛśyase kā vārtteti sudurbalo'si kuśalaṃ prīto'smi te darśanāt 
MSS evaṃ ye samupāgatān praṇayinaḥ pratyālapantyādarāt teṣāṃ yuktamaśaṅkitena manasā harmyāṇi gantuṃ sadā 
MSS ehyāliṅga tvarayati mano durbalā vāsaraśrīr āśliṣṭāsi kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravāki 
MSS nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā daivādhīnaḥ sapadi bhavatīmasvatantras tyajāmi 
MSS ehyehi kva gatāsi maithili mṛgaḥ prāpto mayā kāñcanīm etasya tvacamuccarāmi kucayorvinyasya varṇāṃśukam 
MSS matsaubhāgyabubhutsayāpi vipineṣvekākinī mā sma bhūr vidviṣṭā mayi saṃcaranti sarale māyāvino rākṣasāḥ 
MSS ehyehi vatsa raghunandana rāmabhadra cumbāmi mūrdhani cirāya pariṣvaje tvām 
MSS āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamudvahāmi vande'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te 
MSS ehyehīti śikhaṇḍināṃ paṭutaraṃ kekābhirākranditaḥ proḍḍīyeva balākayā sarabhasaṃ sotkaṇṭhamāliṅgitaḥ 
MSS haṃsairujjhitapaṅkajairatitarāṃ sodvegamudvīkṣitaḥ kurvannañjanamecakā iva diśo meghaḥ samuttiṣṭhati 
MSS aikaguṇyamanīhāyām abhāvaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam 
MSS atha dvaiguṇyamīhāyāṃ phalaṃ bhavati vā na vā 
MSS aikamatyamupāgamya śāstradṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā 
MSS mantriṇo yatra niratās tamāhurmantramuttamam 
MSS bahvyo'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇāmarthanirṇaye 
MSS punaryatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS anyo'nyaṃ matimāsthāya yatra saṃpratibhāṣyate 
MSS na caikamatye śreyo'sti mantraḥ so'dhama ucyate 
MSS aiṇaṃ carma palāśaveśma purato dṛṣṭvaiva kṛṣṇājinaṃ bhikṣārthī kṣudhitas tapovanadhiyā kiṃ dhārmika bhrāmyasi 
MSS enāṃ bhillapurīmavaihi surabhīśṛṅgeṇa yatra sthitaiḥ pīyante vanavahnidagdhamahiṣīmāṃsopadaṃśaṃ surāḥ 
MSS aindavādarciṣaḥ kāmī śiśiraṃ havyavāhanam 
MSS abalāvirahakleśavihvalo gaṇayatyayam 
MSS aindavī vahati nāḍikā yadā svecchayā praviśati prabhañjanaḥ 
MSS potakī vrajati dakṣiṇā yadā syāt tadā sakalamīpsitaṃ phalam 
MSS aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa śarad dadhānārdranakhakṣatābham 
MSS prasādayantī sakalaṅkaminduṃ tāpaṃ raverapyadhikaṃ cakāra 
MSS aindriḥ kila nakhais tasyā vidadāra stanau dvijaḥ 
MSS priyopabhogacihneṣu paurobhāgyamivācaran 
MSS aindryāṃ digavalokita sūryābhimukho gṛhe gṛhiṇaḥ 
MSS rājabhayaṃ caurabhayaṃ vadhakalahaḥ paśubhayaṃ ca syāt 
MSS airāvaṇanti kariṇaḥ phaṇino'pyaśeṣāḥ śeṣanti hanta vihagā api haṃsitāraḥ 
MSS nīlotpalāni kumudanti ca sarvaśailāḥ kailāsituṃ vyavasitā bhavato yaśobhiḥ 
MSS airāvaṇānanamadāmbukaṇāvapāta saṃsaktatāmarasareṇupiśaṅgitāṅgaḥ 
MSS caṇḍānilāhatatuṣāraviśīrṇapakṣaḥ kṣīṇaḥ kṣitau madhukaro vivaśo'tra śete 
MSS airāvaṇe suravadhūparigīyamāna yuṣmadyaśaḥśravaṇaniścalakarṇatāle 
MSS nirvighnamāpibati bhṛṅgakulaṃ madāmbhaḥ kalyāṇamāvahati kasya na ceṣṭitaṃ te 
MSS aiśānyāṃ patanaṃ duṣṭaṃ vidiśo'nyāśca śobhanāḥ 
MSS harṣapuṣṭikarāścaiva siddhidāḥ śastrakarmaṇi 
MSS aiśānyāṃ saṃprāptir ghṛtapūrṇānāṃ bhavedanaḍuhaśca 
MSS evaṃ phalaṃ gṛhapater gṛhapṛṣṭhasamāśrite bhavati 
MSS aiśvaryaṃ nahuṣasya śaṃbhuviṣayaśraddhā daśāsyasya sā śauryaṃ śrīraghunāyakasya sahajaṃ gāmbhīryamambhonidheḥ 
MSS dātṛtvaṃ balikarṇayoriha jagatyekatra cet syāt tadā śrīvīrakṣitipālamaulinṛpateḥ sāmyaṃ kathaṃcid bhavet 
MSS aiśvaryatimiraṃ cakṣuḥ paśyaccāpi na paśyati 
MSS paścād vimalatāṃ yāti dāridryagulikāñjanaiḥ 
MSS aiśvaryadhanaratnānāṃ pratyamitre'pi tiṣṭhatām 
MSS dṛṣṭā hi punarāvṛttir jīvatāmiti naḥ śrutam 
MSS aiśvaryamattaḥ pāpiṣṭho madhupānamadādapi 
MSS aiśvaryamadamattānāṃ gatirūrdhvā na vidyate 
MSS aiśvaryamadapāpiṣṭhā madāḥ pānamadādayaḥ 
MSS eśvaryamadamatto hi nāpatitvā vibudhyate 
MSS aiśvaryamadamattāṃśca mattān madyamadena ca 
MSS apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ śūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate 
MSS aiśvaryamadamattānāṃ kṣudhitānāṃ ca kāminām 
MSS ahaṃkāravimūḍhānāṃ viveko naiva jāyate 
MSS aiśvaryamadhruvaṃ prāpya dhruvadharme matiṃ kuru 
MSS kṣaṇādeva vināśinyaḥ sampado'pyātmanā saha 
MSS aiśvaryamalpametya prāyeṇa hi durjano bhavati mānī 
MSS sumahatprāpyaiśvaryaṃ praśamaṃ pratipadyate sujanaḥ 
MSSA aiśvaryamavyāhatamāvahantu herambapādāmbujapāṃsavo naḥ 
MSSA ye nirvahanti śrutisundarīṇāṃ sīmantasindūraparāgalakṣmīm 
MSS aiśvaryamīrṣyā nairghṛṇyaṃ kṣībatvaṃ nirvivekatā 
MSS ekaikaṃ kiṃ na yat kuryāt pañcāṅgitve tu kā kathā 
MSS aiśvaryavanto'pi hi nirdhanās te vyarthaśramā jīvitamātrasārāḥ 
MSS kṛtā na lobhopahṛtātmabhiryaiḥ suhṛtsvayaṃgrāhavibhūṣaṇā śrīḥ 
MSS aiśvaryasya parā kāṣṭhā yatra nityaṃ vibhāvyate 
MSS dhanadaḥ sa na keṣāṃ syāt spṛhaṇīyaguṇodayaḥ 
MSS aiśvaryasya vibhūṣaṇaṃ sujanatā śauryasya vāksaṃyamo jñānasyopaśamaḥ śamasya vinayo vittasya pātre vyayaḥ 
MSS akrodhas tapasaḥ kṣamā prabhaviturdharmasya nirvyājatā sarveṣāmapi sarvakāraṇamidaṃ śīlaṃ paraṃ bhūṣaṇam 
MSS aiśvaryāt saha saṃbandhaṃ na kuryāc ca kadācana 
MSS gate ca gauravaṃ nāsti āgate ca dhanakṣayaḥ 
MSS aiśvaryādanapetamīśvaramayaṃ loko'rthataḥ sevate taṃ gacchantyanu ye vipattiṣu punas te tatpratiṣṭhāśayā 
MSS bharturye pralaye'pi pūrvasukṛtāsaṅgena niḥsaṅgayā bhaktyā kāryadhuraṃ vahanti kṛtinas te durlabhāstvādṛśāḥ 
MSS aiśvarye'pi kṣamā yasya dāridrye'pi hitaiṣitā 
MSS āpattāvapi dhīratvaṃ dadhato martyatā katham 
MSS aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe 
MSS rajjveva puruṣaṃ baddhvā kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati 
MSS aihalaukikapāratryaṃ karma puṃbhirniṣevyate 
MSS karmāṇyapi tu kalyāṇi labhate kāmamāsthitaḥ 
MSS aihalaukikamīhante māṃsaśoṇitavardhanam 
MSS pāralaukikakāryeṣu prasuptābhṛśanāstikāḥ 
MSS aihikāmuṣmikān kāmāṃl lobhamohātmakāṃśca yān 
MSS nirudhyās te sadā yogī prāptiḥ syāt sārvakāmikī 
MSS oṃkāraḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvaḥ vyāhṛtiḥ prakṛtiḥ striyaḥ 
MSS ubhayoḥ karasaṃyoge vastreṇācchādayen naraḥ 
MSS oṃkāraśabdo viprāṇāṃ yasya rāṣṭre pravartate 
MSS sa rājā hi bhaved yogī vyādhibhiśca na pīḍyate 
MSS oṃkārāḥ kusumāyudhopaniṣadāṃ mantrānuvādaḥ smara svādhyāyasya rateḥ punarbhavavidhau gandhābhirāmaśrutiḥ 
MSS cittākarṣaṇasādhyasiddhirasatīnetrasya karṇajvaraḥ pānthānāṃ sahakārakānanasudhāsekaḥ pikānāṃ dhvaniḥ 
MSS oṃkāre satpradīpe mṛgaya gṛhapatiṃ sūkṣmamekāntarasthaṃ saṃyamya dvāravāhaṃ pavanamavirataṃ nāyakaṃ cendriyāṇām 
MSS vāgjālaṃ kasya hetorvitarasi hi girāṃ dṛśyate naiva kiṃcid dehasthaṃ paśya nāthaṃ bhramasi kimapare śāstramohāndhakāre 
MSS oṃkāro madanadvijasya gaganakroḍaikadaṃṣṭrāṅkuras tārāmauktikaśuktirandhatamasastamberamasyāṅkuśaḥ 
MSS śṛṅgārārgalakuñcikā virahiṇīmānacchidā kartarī saṃdhyāvāravadhūnakhakṣatiriyaṃ cāndrī kalā rājate 
MSS oṃkāro yasya kandaḥ salilamupaniṣan nyāyajālaṃ mṛṇālaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ yasya kāṇḍaṃ prasarati parito yasya yāgaḥ parāgaḥ 
MSS bhṛṅgadhvānaḥ purāṇaṃ vijanasuradhunītīravāso'dhivāso yasyānando marandaḥ puraharacaraṇāmbhoruhaṃ tad bhajāmaḥ 
MSS oṃ namaḥ paramārthaikarūpāya paramātmane 
MSS svecchāvabhāsitāsatyabhedabhinnāya śaṃbhave 
MSS oṃ hrauṃ śikhāsthāne śaṃkarāya namaḥ 
MSS oṃ hrauṃ bāhvoḥ keśavāya namaḥ 
MSS oṃ hrauṃ nābhimadhye brahmaṇe namaḥ 
MSS oṃ hrauṃ jaṅghayorgaṇapataye namaḥ 
MSS oghavātāhṛtaṃ bījaṃ yasya kṣetre prarohati 
MSS kṣetrikasyaiva tad bījaṃ na bījī labhate phalam 
MSS ojasāpi khalu nūnamanūnaṃ nāsahāyamupayāti jayaśrīḥ 
MSS yad vibhuḥ śaśimayūkhasakhaḥ sann ādade vijayi cāpamanaṅgaḥ 
MSS ojobhājāṃ yad raṇe saṃsthitānām ādat tīvraṃ sārdhamaṅgena nūnam 
MSS jvālāvyājādudvamantī tadantas tejastāraṃ dīptajihvā vavāśe 
MSS omityetatparaṃ brahma śrutīnāṃ mukhamakṣaram 
MSS prasīdatu satāṃ svānteṣv ekaṃ tripuruṣīmayam 
MSS oṣāmāse matsarotpātavātā śliṣyaddantakṣmāruhāṃ gharṣaṇotthaiḥ 
MSS yaugāntairvā vahnibhirvāraṇānām uccairmūrdhavyomni nakṣatramālā 
MSS oṣṭhapallavavidaṃśarucīnāṃ hṛdyatāmupayayau ramaṇānām 
MSS phullalocanavinīlasarojair aṅganāsyacaṣakairmadhuvāraḥ 
MSS oṣṭhāgraṃ sphuratīkṣaṇe vicalataḥ kūpodare matsyavad dhammillaḥ kusumāñcito vigalitaḥ prāpnoti bandhaṃ punaḥ 
MSS pracchannau vrajataḥ stanau prakaṭatāṃ śroṇītaṭaṃ dṛśyate nīvī ca skhalati sthitāpi sudṛḍhaṃ kāmeṅgitaṃ yoṣitām 
MSS saubhāgyarūpaparihāsaguṇānurāga saṃkīrtanena dayitasya ca labdhasaukhyam 
MSS saṃbandhimitramukhadarśanadattadūra toṣaṃ parokṣamapi kāmaguṇeṅgitaṃ syāt 
MSS oṣṭhe bimbaphalāśayālamalakeṣūtpākajambūdhiyā karṇālaṃkṛtibhāji dāḍimaphalabhrāntyā ca śoṇe maṇau 
MSS niṣpattyā sakṛdutpalacchadadṛśāmāttaklamānāṃ marau rājan gūrjararājapañjaraśukaiḥ sadyastṛṣā mūrcchitam 
MSS aucityaṃ stutyānāṃ guṇarāgaś candanādilepānām 
MSS kanyā śokakarāṇāṃ buddhivihīno'nukampyānām 
MSS aucityapracyutācāro yuktyā svārthaṃ na sādhayet 
MSS vyājabālivadhenaiva rāmakīrtiḥ kalaṅkitā 
MSS aucityamekamekatra guṇānāṃ rāśirekataḥ 
MSS viṣāyate guṇagrāma aucityaparivarjitaḥ 
MSS aujjhi priyāṅgairghṛṇayaiva rūkṣā na vāridurgāt tu varāṭakasya 
MSS na kaṇṭakairāvaraṇāc ca kāntir dhūlībhṛtā kāñcanaketakasya 
MSS autsukyagarbhā bhramatīva dṛṣṭiḥ paryākulaṃ kvāpi manaḥ prayāti 
MSS viyujyamānasya guṇānvitena nirantarapremavatā janena 
MSS autsukyamātramavasādayati pratiṣṭhā kliśnāti labdhaparipālanavṛttireva 
MSS nātiśramāpanayanāya yathā śramāya rājyaṃ svahastadhṛtadaṇḍamivātapatram 
MSS autsukyahetuṃ vivṛṇoṣi na tvaṃ tattvāvabodhaikaraso na tarkaḥ 
MSS tathāpi rambhoru karomi lakṣyam ātmānameṣāṃ paridevitānām 
MSS autsukyāt parimilatāṃ trapayā saṃkocamañcatāṃ ca muhuḥ 
MSS navasaṃgamayoryūnor nayanānāmutsavo jayati 
MSS autsukyena kṛtatvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā tais tairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnītābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ 
MSS dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave saṅgame saṃrohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ 
MSS audāryaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ pāpajugupsā ca nirmalo bodhaḥ 
MSS liṅgāni dharmasiddheḥ prāyeṇa janapriyatvaṃ ca 
MSS audāryaṃ bhuvanatraye'pi viditaṃ saṃbhūtirambhonidher vāso nandanakānane parimalo gīrvāṇacetoharaḥ 
MSS evaṃ dātṛgurorguṇāḥ surataroḥ sarve'pi lokottarāḥ syādarthipravarārthitārpaṇavidhāveko viveko yadi 
MSS audāryaṃ sadhane nayo guṇijane lajjā kulastrījane satkāvyaṃ vadane mado dviradane puṃskokilaḥ kānane 
MSS rolambaḥ kamale nakhāṅkaracanā kāntākapolasthale tanvī talpatale bhavānapi vibho bhūmaṇḍale maṇḍanam 
MSS audāsīnyaṃ dayālūnām arthināṃ bhāgyahīnatā 
MSS nahi svamukhavairūpyaṃ darpaṇasyāparādhataḥ 
MSS audumbarāṇi puṣpāṇi śvetavarṇaṃ ca vāyasam 
MSS matsyapādaṃ jale paśyen na nārīhṛdayasthitam 
MSS aunnatyaṃ bhavataḥ sumeruśikharocchrāyopamāṃ gāhate vyāptis te girirājamūlamahimanyāyena nirṇīyate 
MSS ekasyāpi na kiṃtu cātakaśiśoḥ pūrttyai payo vartate vandhyāpīnapayodharopamatayā buddho'si pāthodhara 
MSS aurasaṃ maitrasaṃbaddhaṃ tathā vaṃśakramāgatam 
MSS rakṣitaṃ vyasanebhyaśca mitraṃ jñeyaṃ caturvidham 
MSS aurasānapi putrān hi tyajantyahitakāriṇaḥ 
MSS samarthān saṃpragṛhṇanti janānapi narādhipāḥ 
MSS aurasīṃ bhaginīṃ vāpi bhāryāṃ vāpyanujasya yaḥ 
MSS pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍo vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS aurvā ivātilubdhā bhavanti dhanalavaṇavāribahutṛṣṇāḥ 
MSS tṛṇalavamiva nijadehaṃ tyajanti leśaṃ na vittasya 
MSS auṣadhaṃ mūḍhavaidyānāṃ tyajantu jvarapīḍitāḥ 
MSS parasaṃsargasaṃsaktaṃ kalatramiva sādhavaḥ 
MSS auṣadhānāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ buddheścaiva mahātmanām 
MSS asādhyaṃ nāsti loke'tra kiṃcid brahmāṇḍamadhyagam 
MSS auṣadhāni ca mantrāṇi nakṣatraṃ śakunaṃ grahāḥ 
MSS bhāgyakāle prasannāḥ syur abhāgye niṣphalāś ca te 
MSS auṣadhānyagado vidyā daivī ca vividhā sthitiḥ 
MSS tapasaiva prasidhyanti tapas teṣāṃ hi sādhanam 
MSS auṣadhāyāpi yo martyo madhvasyati vicetanaḥ 
MSS kuyonau jāyate so'pi kiṃ punas tatra lolupaḥ 
MSS auṣasātapabhayādapalīnaṃ vāsaracchavivirāmapaṭīyaḥ 
MSS saṃnipatya śanakairatha nimnād andhakāramudavāpa samāni 
MSS auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām 
MSS dhārayanti mahātmāno rājānaḥ prāyaśo bhuvi 
MSS tasmāt sarvāsvavasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ 
MSS auṣmāyamāṇanavayauvanamugdhabhāvāḥ śṛṅgārasāgaramanojñataraṅgalekhāḥ 
MSS kandarpakelirasalabdhayaśaḥpatākāḥ paṇyāṅganāḥ puramimāmadhivāsayanti 
MSS kaṃcana vañcanacature prapañcaya tvaṃ murāntake mānam 
MSS bahuvallabhe hi puruṣe dākṣiṇyaṃ duḥkhamudvahati 
MSS kaṃcit kālaṃ naya giriguhāgahvare re mudhaiva krīḍan hālāhalarasalasaddarpa mā sarpa  sarpa 
MSS mādyannudyatsajalajaladavyākule meghakāle yena prāpto vanaviharaṇotkaṇṭhayā nīlakaṇṭhaḥ 
MSS kaṃcit kṣaṇaṃ nanu sahasva vimuñca vāso jāgartyayaṃ parijano dhigapatrapo'si 
MSS eṣo'ñjaliḥ śamaya dīpamiti priyāyā vāco ratādapi parāṃ mudamāvahanti 
MSS kaṃcideva samayaṃ samāgataṃ tvāṃ na vismarati śaśvadambujam 
MSS mānase vihara haṃsa mānase mā vimuñca punarasya sauhṛdam 
MSS kaṃjānanā kamjaparāgapuñja guñjanmilindāvalikuntalaśrīḥ 
MSS vidvaddvijākrāntamukhāntarālā jyotirvidāryā taṭinīva bhāti 
MSS kaṃ na spṛśanti puruṣaṃ vyasanāni kāle ko vā nirantarasukhī ya ihāsti loke 
MSS duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ ca pariṇāmavaśādupaiti nakṣatracakramiva khe parivartamānam 
MSS kaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ surāḥ svarge nivasāmo vayaṃ bhuvi 
MSS kiṃ vā kāvyarasaḥ svāduḥ kiṃ vā svādīyasī sudhā 
MSS kaṃ prati kathayitumīśe saṃprati ko vā pratītimāyātu 
MSS gopatitanayākuñje gopavadhūṭīviṭaṃ brahma 
MSS kaṃ yojayan manujo'rthaṃ labheta nipātayan naṣṭadṛśaṃ hi garte 
MSS evaṃ narāṇāṃ viṣayaspṛhā ca nipātayan niraye tvandhakūpe 
MSS kaṃ viśeṣamavalambya yoṣitaḥ preyase bhajasi varcase bhuvam 
MSS tyāgaheturapi tulya eva te sāpi sāpi malamocanasthalī 
MSS kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kā śītalavāhinī gaṅgā 
MSS ke dārapoṣaṇaratāḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam 
MSS kaṃsaṃ dhvaṃsayate muraṃ tirayate haṃsaṃ tathā hiṃsate bāṇaṃ kṣīṇayate bakaṃ laghayate pauṇḍraṃ tathā lumpate 
MSS bhaumaṃ kṣāmayate balād balabhido darpaṃ parākurvate kliṣṭaṃ śiṣṭagaṇaṃ praṇamramavate kṛṣṇāya tubhyaṃ namaḥ 
MSS kaṃsārātervada gamanaṃ kena syāt kasmin dṛṣṭiṃ saṃlabhate svalpecchuḥ 
MSS kaṃ sarveṣāṃ śubhakaramūcurdhīrāḥ kiṃ kuryās tvaṃ sujana saśokaṃ lokam 
MSS kaṃsāricaraṇodbhūtasindhukallolalālitam 
MSS manye haṃsa mano nīre kulyānāṃ ramate katham 
MSS kaṃso rāvaṇo rāmaśca rājā duryodhanas tathā 
MSS catvāro'pi mahāmūrkhāḥ pañcamaḥ śālivāhanaḥ 
MSS kaḥ kaṃ śakto rakṣituṃ mṛtyukāle rajjucchede ke ghaṭaṃ dhārayanti 
MSS evaṃ lokas tulyadharmo vanānāṃ kāle kāle chidyate ruhyate ca 
MSS kaḥ kaḥ kutra na ghurghurāyitaghurīghoro ghuret sūkaraḥ kaḥ kaḥ kaṃ kamalākaraṃ vikamalaṃ kartuṃ karī nodyataḥ 
MSS ke ke kāni vanānyaraṇyamahiṣā nonmūlayeyuryataḥ siṃhīsnehavilāsabaddhavasatiḥ pañcānano vartate 
MSS kaḥ kaṇṭakānāṃ prakaroti taikṣṇyaṃ vicitrabhāvaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ ca 
MSS mādhuryamikṣau kaṭutāṃ ca nimbe svabhāvataḥ sarvamidaṃ hi siddham 
MSS kaḥ karṇāripitā girīndratanayā kasya priyā kasya tuk ko jānāti pareṅgitaṃ viṣamaguḥ kutrodabhūt kāminām 
MSS bhāryā kasya videhajā tudati kā bhaume'hni nindyaśca kas tatpratyuttaramadhyamākṣarapadaṃ sarvārthasaṃpatkaram 
MSS kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kimāpyaṃ kasya kenacit 
MSS yadeko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati 
MSS tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ 
MSS unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kaściddhi kasyacit 
MSS kaḥ kāntāramagāt piturvacanataḥ saṃśliṣya kaṇṭhasthalīṃ kāmī kiṃ kurute ca gṛdhrahaṭhataśchinnaṃ prarūḍhaṃ ca kim 
MSS kā rakṣaḥ kulakālarātrirabhavac candrātapaṃ dveṣṭi ko rāmaścumbati rāvaṇasya vadanaṃ sītāviyogāturaḥ 
MSS kaḥ kālaḥ kāni mitrāṇi ko deśaḥ kau vyayāgamau 
MSS kaścāhaṃ kā ca me śaktir iti cintyaṃ muhurmuhuḥ 
MSS kaḥ kuryād bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ kaḥ samunmūlayed drumān 
MSS kiṃ pratīke bhaven mukhyaṃ kaḥ paratraiti puṇyatām 
MSS kaḥ kopaḥ kaḥ praṇayo naṭaviṭahatamastakāsu veśyāsu 
MSS rajakaśilātalasadṛśaṃ yāsāṃ jaghanaṃ ca vadanaṃ ca 
MSS kaḥ kau ke kaṃ kau kān hasati ca hasato hasanti hariṇākṣyā 
MSS adharaḥ pallavamaṅghrī haṃsau kundasya korakān dantāḥ 
MSS kaḥ khe gacchati kā ramyā kā japyā kiṃ vibhūṣaṇam 
MSS ko vandyaḥ kīdṛśī laṅkā vīramarkaṭakampitā 
MSS kaḥ khe carati kaḥ śabdaṃ coraṃ dṛṣṭvā karoti ca 
MSS kairavāṇāmariḥ ko vā kopānāmālayaśca kaḥ 
MSS kaḥ khe bhāti
hato niśācarapatiḥ kenāmbudhau majjati kaḥ
kīdṛk taruṇīvilāsagamanaṃ
ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ 
MSS patraṃ kiṃ nṛpateḥ
kimapsu lalitaṃ
ko rāmarāmāharo matpraśnottaramadhyamākṣarapadaṃ yat tat tavāśīrvacaḥ 
MSS kaḥ paretanagarīpuraṃdaraḥ ko bhavedatha tadīyakiṃkaraḥ 
MSS kṛṣṇanāma jagadekamaṅgalaṃ kaṇṭhapīṭhamurarīkaroti cet 
MSS kaḥ paśyati khuramahasaḥ saṃmukhamapi tejasāṃ sahasrasya 
MSS kalitaṃ śaśabhṛddhāmno yo maṇḍalakhaṇḍanaṃ sahate 
MSS kaḥ puṣpajātiṃ surabhiṃ vidhatte kaścandanaṃ vai śiśirīkaroti 
MSS kaḥ prārthayed bhānumiha prakāśe sādhus tathā svena paropakārī 
MSS kaḥ pūjyaḥ sadvṛttaḥ kamadhamamācakṣate calitavṛttam 
MSS kena jitaṃ jagadetat satyatitikṣāvatā puṃsā 
MSS kaḥ pūjyaḥ sujanatvameti katamaḥ
kva sthīyate paṇḍitaiḥ śrīmatyā śivayā ca kena bhuvane yuddhaṃ kṛtaṃ dāruṇam 
MSS kiṃ vāñchanti sadā janā
yuvajanā dhyāyanti kiṃ mānase matpraśnottaramadhyamākṣarapadaṃ bhūyāt tavāśīrvacaḥ 
MSSA kaḥ paurave vasumatīṃ śāsati śāsitari durvinītānām 
MSSA ayamācaratyavinayaṃ mugdhāsu tapasvikanyāsu 
MSS kaḥ prasūte pūrovātaṃ kaḥ prerayati vāridam 
MSS prāpte tu śrāvaṇe māsi bhavatyekārṇavaṃ jagat 
MSS kaḥ prājño vāñchati snehaṃ veśyāsu sikatāsu ca 
MSS vimucyate vā bhavatā vastudharmo'yamīdṛśaḥ 
MSS kaḥ prārthito'pi dāsyati tṛṇatuṣaparimāṇamātramapyadhikam 
MSS antarlalāṭasaṃpuṭa vikaṭākṣaramālikāṃ muktvā 
MSS kaḥ prārthyate madanavihvalayā yuvatyā bhāti kva puṇḍrakamupaiti kathaṃ batāyuḥ 
MSS kvānādaro bhavati
kena ca rājate'bjaṃ bāhyāsthi kiṃ phalamudāhara nālikeram 
MSS kaḥ śakraḥ katamaḥ sraṣṭā varākaḥ katamo yamaḥ 
MSS satyavratānāṃ bhūpānāṃ kartuṃ śāsanalaṅghanam 
MSS kaḥ śamaḥ kriyatāṃ prājñāḥ priyāprītau pariśramaḥ 
MSS bhasmībhūtasya bhūtasya punarāgamanaṃ kutaḥ 
MSS kaḥ śraddhāsyati bhūtārthaṃ sarvo māṃ tulayiṣyati 
MSS śaṅkanīyā hi loke'smin niṣpratāpā daridratā 
MSS kaḥ ślāghanīyajanmā māghaniśīthe'pi yasya saubhāgyam 
MSS prāleyāniladīrghaḥ kathayati kāñcīninādo'yam 
MSS kaḥ syādambudayācako
yuvatayaḥ kaṃ kāmayante patiṃ lajjā kena nivāryate
nikaṭake dāse kathaṃ yāvanī 
MSS bhāṣā darśayateti vastuṣu mahārāṣṭre kadā vā bhaved ādyāntākṣarayorhi loparacanācāturyataḥ pūryatām 
MSS kaḥ svabhāvagabhīrāṇāṃ lakṣayed bahirāpadam 
MSS bālāpatyena bhṛtyena yadi sā na prakāśyate 
MSS ka ātmā kaḥ paro vātra svīyaḥ pārakya eva vā 
MSS svaparābhiniveśena vinā jñānena dehinām 
MSS ka āliptaḥ priyaḥ ko'syāḥ kaṃ dhyāyati kamīkṣate 
MSS iti cintā na yasyāsīt sa pūjyaḥ paṇyayoṣitām 
MSS ka īpsitārthasthiraniścayaṃ manaḥ
MSS payaśca nimnābhimukhaṃ pratīpayet 
MSS ka ekastvaṃ puṣpāyudha mama samādhivyayavidhau suparvāṇaḥ sarve yadi kusumaśastrās tadapi kim 
MSS itīvainān nūnaṃ ya iha sumanostratvamanayat sa vaḥ śāstā śastraṃ diśatu daśadiṅmāravijayī 
MSS kakubhakarīrāveka tra saṃyutau kakubhabilvau vā 
MSS hastatraye'mbu paścān narairbhavatyekaviṃśatyā 
MSS kakubhasya phalaṃ puṣpaṃ lākṣā śrīvāsaguggulū 
MSS śvetāparājitāmūlaṃ viḍaṅgānvitasarṣapāḥ 
MSS kakubhāṃ mukhāni sahasojjvalayan dadhadākulatvamadhikaṃ rataye 
MSS adidīpadinduraparo dahanaḥ kusumeṣumatrinayanaprabhavaḥ 
MSS kakubhi kakubhi dhvāntakṣubdhaṃ vitatya vidhāya ca śrutipuṭabhido garjāḥ śreyaḥ kṛtaṃ paramambudaiḥ 
MSS kathamitarathā jātodvegaḥ samujjhitapalvalaḥ kanakakamalottaṃse haṃsaḥ sa nandati mānase 
MSS kakubhi kakubhi bhrāntvā bhrāntvā vilokya vilokitaṃ malayajasamo dṛṣṭo'smābhirna ko'pi mahīruhaḥ 
MSS upacitaraso dāhe cchede śilātalagharṣaṇe 'pyadhikamadhikaṃ yat saurabhyaṃ tanoti manoharam 
MSS kakṣe kiṃ mitapustakaṃ kimudakaṃ kiṃ
kāvyasārodakaṃ dīrghaṃ kiṃ yadi tāḍapatralikhitaṃ kiṃ cātra gauḍākṣaram 
MSS gandhaḥ kiṃ yadi rāmarāvaṇakathāsaṃgrāmagandho mahat kiṃ vāraṃ bahu jalpase śṛṇu sakhe nāmnā purāṇo jhaṣaḥ 
MSS kaṅkagṛdhrasṛgāleṣu daṃśeṣu maśakeṣu ca 
MSS pannageṣu ca jāyante narāḥ krodhaparāyaṇāḥ 
MSS kaṅkahaṃsaśaśādānāṃ matsyādakrauñcakekinām 
MSS gṛdhrāṇāṃ kukkuṭānāṃ ca pakṣā eteṣu śobhanāḥ 
MSS kaṅkelireṣa kimacetana eva satyaṃ namnaḥ svayaṃ na kusumāni dadāti yas te 
MSS dhūrto'thavā namati nāyamudastabāhu vyaktonnatastanataṭāntadidṛkṣayeva 
MSS kacakucacubukāgre pāṇiṣu vyāpṛteṣu prathamajaladhiputrīsaṃgame'naṅgadhāmni 
MSS grathitanibiḍanīvībandhanirmocanārthaṃ caturadhikakarāśaḥ pātu vaścakrapāṇiḥ 
MSS kacagrahamanugrahaṃ daśanakhaṇḍanaṃ maṇḍanaṃ dṛgañjanamavañcanaṃ mukharasārpaṇaṃ tarpaṇam 
MSS nakhārdanamatardanaṃ nibiḍapīḍanaṃ krīḍanaṃ karoti ratisaṅgame makaraketanaḥ kāminām 
MSS kacagrahasamullasatkamalakoṣapīḍājaḍa dvirephakalakūjitānukṛtasītkṛtālaṃkṛtāḥ 
MSS jayanti suratotsavavyatikare kuraṅgīdṛśāṃ pramodamadanirbharapraṇayacumbino vibhramāḥ 
MSS kacagrahottānitamardhakuḍmalaṃ trapācalattārakamandalocanam 
MSS balādgṛhītādharavedanākulaṃ kadā pibeyaṃ nanu tat priyāmukham 
MSS kacabhārāt kucabhāraḥ kucabhārād bhītimeti kacabhāraḥ 
MSS kacakucabhārāj jaghanaṃ ko'yaṃ candrānane camatkāraḥ 
MSS kacamūlabaddhapannaga niśvāsaviṣāgnidhūmahatamadhyam 
MSS aiśānamiva kapālaṃ sphuṭalakṣmā sphurati śaśibimbam 
MSS kacā yūkāvāsā mukhamajinabaddhāsthinicayam kucau māṃsagranthī jaṭharamapi viṣṭhādidhaṭikā 
MSS malotsarge yantraṃ jaghanamabalāyāḥ kramayugaṃ tadādhārasthūṇe tadiha kimu rāgāya mahatām 
MSSA kacairardhacchinnaiḥ karanihitaraktaiḥ kucataṭair nakhotkṛttairgaṇḍairupalahatiśīrṇaiśca niṭilaiḥ 
MSSA vidīrṇairākrandād vikalagaditaiḥ kaṇṭhavivarair manastakṣṇotyantaḥpuraparijanānāṃ sthitiriyam 
MSSB kaccit kāntārabhājāṃ bhavati paribhavaḥ ko'pi śauvāpado vā pratyūhena kratūnāṃ na khalu makhabhujo bhuñjate vā havīṃṣi 
MSSB kartuṃ vā kaccidantarvasati vasumatīdakṣiṇaḥ saptatantur yatsaṃprāpto'si kiṃ vā raghukulatapasāmīdṛśo'yaṃ vivartaḥ 
MSS kaccit paśavyaṃ nirujaṃ bhūryambutṛṇavīrudham 
MSS vṛhadvanaṃ tadadhunā yatrāsse tvaṃ suhṛdvṛtaḥ 
MSS kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekamicchasi paṇḍitam 
MSS paṇḍito hyarthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat 
MSS kaccit saumya priyasahacarī vidyudāliṅgati tvām āvirbhūtapraṇayasumukhāścātakā vā bhajante 
MSS paurastyo vā sukhayati marutsādhusaṃvāhanābhir viṣvagbibhratsurapatidhanurlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti 
MSS kaccit saumya vyavasitamidaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyādeśānna khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi 
MSS niḥśabdo'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satāmīpsitārthakriyaiva 
MSS kaccidarthena vā dharmam arthaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ 
MSS ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase 
MSS kaccidarthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jāyatāṃ vara 
MSS vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase

MSS vidyāpriyo nayaparo matimān vadānyaḥ mīvārabhūpatirudetu yaśo vitanvan 
MSS kajjalatilakakalaṅkita mukhacandre galitasalilakaṇakeśi 
MSS navavirahadahanatūlo jīvayitavyastvayā katamaḥ 
MSS kaja bhaja vikāsamabhitas tyaja saṃkocaṃ bhramatyayaṃ bhramaraḥ 
MSS yadyapi na bhavati kāryaṃ tathāpi tuṣṭas tanotyayaṃ kīrtim 
MSS kajjalahimakanakarucaḥ suparṇavṛṣahaṃsavāhanāḥ śaṃ vaḥ 
MSS jalanidhigirikamalasthā hariharakamalāsanā dadatu 
MSS kaṭakatvaṃ pṛthagghemnas taraṃgatvaṃ pṛthag jalāt 
MSS yathā na saṃbhavatyevaṃ na jagat pṛthagīśvarāt 
MSS kaṭakāni bhajanti cārubhir navamuktāphalabhūṣaṇairbhujaiḥ 
MSS niyataṃ dadhate ca citrakair aviyogaṃ pṛthugaṇḍaśailataḥ 
MSS kaṭakinaḥ kaṭukarasān karīrakhadirādiviṭapatarugulmān 
MSS upabhuñjānā karabhī daivādāpnoti madhuramadhujālam 
MSS kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣat kṣaṇamayi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ 
MSS saromāñcodañcatkucakalaśanirbhinnavasanaḥ parīrambhārambhaḥ ka iva bhavitāmbhoruhadṛśaḥ 
MSS kaṭākṣairākṣiptaḥ priyasakhi rahaḥ kelibhavane vane puṣpavyājāt kucayugamidaṃ cāpi valitam 
MSS ratāsaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā harinamithunaṃ cālpahasitaṃ tathāpi preyān me na kimapi jānāti kimiti 
MSS kaṭirmuṣṭigrāhyā dvipuruṣabhujagrāhyamudaraṃ stanau ghaṇṭālolau jaghanamiva gantuṃ vyavasitau 
MSS smitaṃ bherīnādo mukhamapi ca patyurbhayakaraṃ tathāpyeṣā raṇḍā paribhavati saṃtāpayati ca 
MSS kaṭirviṭaśatairghūṣṭā pānthapītojjhitaṃ mukham 
MSS stanau sahasramṛditau yasyāḥ kasyās tu sā nijā 
MSSA kaṭisthakaravaiśākhasthānakasthanarākṛtim 
MSSA dravyaiḥ pūrṇaṃ smarellokaṃ sthityutpattivyayātmakaiḥ 
MSS kaṭītaṭanikuñjeṣu saṃcaran vātakuñjaraḥ 
MSS eraṇḍatailasiṃhasya gandhamāghrāya dhāvati 
MSS kaṭu kvaṇanto maladāyakāḥ khalā studantyalaṃ bandhanaśṛṅkhalā iva 
MSS manastu sādhudhvanibhiḥ pade pade haranti santo maṇinūpurā iva 
MSS kaṭutiktakaṣāyarasaiḥ pavanaḥ pittaṃ kaṭūṣṇalavaṇāmlaiḥ 
MSS snigdhamadhurāmlalavaṇaiḥ śleṣmā kopaṃ prayāti taroḥ 
MSS kaṭutīkṣṇoṣṇalavaṇakṣārāmlādib hirulbaṇaiḥ 
MSS mātṛbhuktairupaspṛṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgotthitavedanaḥ 
MSS kaṭubhirapi kaṭhoracakravākot karavirahajvaraśāntiśītavīyaiḥ 
MSS timirahatamayaṃ mahobhirañjañ jayati jagannayanaughamuṣṇabhānuḥ 
MSS kaṭumadhurāṇyāmodaiḥ parṇairutkīrṇapatrabhaṅgāni 
MSS damanakavanāni saṃprati kāṇḍairekāntapāṇḍūni 
MSS kaṭu raṭasi kimevaṃ karṇayoḥ kuñjarārer aviditanijabuddhe kiṃ na vijñātamasti 
MSS śilatarakaradaṃṣṭrāṭaṅkanirbhinnakumbhaṃ maśaka galakarandhre hastiyūthaṃ mamajja 
MSS kaṭuviśikhaśikhiprapañca pañcā nana dhanadapriyamitra mitranetra 
MSS dhṛtasakalavikalpa kalpaśeṣa prakaṭamahānaṭa nāṭaya prasādam 
MSS kaṭūnāmiha sārthatvāt kāmaṃ bhavati saṃgrahaḥ 
MSS tathāpi vṛttirna tathā rasajñānumatikṣamā 
MSS kaṭau na kalamekhalā na kucamaṇḍale mālikā dṛśorapi na cāñjanaṃ na punarasti rāgo'dhare 
MSS priyeṇa sahacāriṇā madanataskarasyoccakais tatas tvamasi luṇṭhitā nidhuvane vane śobhane 
MSSA kaṭusvarastvaṃ pikabhūt tathāpi ślāghyo'si samyak pikaputrapālāt 
MSSA āhlādanāccandra ivāttalakṣmā kastūrikā gandhabhṛteva kṛṣṇā 
MSS kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇatīkṣṇarūkṣavid āhinaḥ 
MSS āhārā rājasasyeṣṭā duḥkhaśokāmayapradāḥ 
MSS kaṭvervārau yathā pakve madhuraḥ san raso'pi na 
MSS prāpyate hyātmani tathā nāpakvakaraṇe jñatā 
MSS kaṭhinaṃ vā madhuraṃ vā prastutavacanaṃ manohāri 
MSS vāme gardabhanādaś cittaprītyai prayāṇeṣu 
MSS kaṭhinaḥ kṛśamūlaśca durlabho dakṣiṇetaraḥ 
MSS kaścit kalyāṇagotro'pi manuṣyairnopajīvyate 
MSS kaṭhinakucau tava bāle taralasarojākṣi tāvakaṃ cakṣuḥ 
MSS kuṭilasukeśi kacās te mithyā bhaṇitaṃ kṛśāṅgi tava madhyam 
MSS kaṭhinataradāmaveṣṭana lekhāsaṃdehadāyino yasya 
MSS rājanti valivibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaro bhavataḥ 
MSS kaṭhinasyāpi hṛdayaṃ guṇavānārdrayed dṛśā 
MSS candrakāntopalaṃ candraḥ svāṃśubhirdrāvayatyasau 
MSS kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca krodhaṃ sukhapratighātakaṃ likhati divasaṃ yātaṃ yātaṃ yamaḥ kila mānini 
MSS vayasi taruṇe naitad yuktaṃ cale ca samāgame bhavati kalaho yāvat tāvad varaṃ subhage ratam 
MSS kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca bhrāntiṃ vyalīkakathāśrayāṃ piśunavacanairduḥkhaṃ netuṃ na yuktamimaṃ janam 
MSS kimidamatha vā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayādya viniścitaṃ yadabhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām 
MSS kaṭhināstīkṣṇavaktrāśca tīkṣṇodarkās tathaiva ca 
MSS gaṇakaiḥ kiṃ nu lekhanyas tā vā kiṃ te vinirmitāḥ 
MSS kaṭhine durgame vāso guptaśaktiprakāśanam 
MSS raṇe putraḥ yathā śocyaḥ kalahaṃ veśyayā saha 
MSS kaṭhoranakharāhatadviradakumbhapīṭhasthalī luṭhadrudhirarañjitollalitakesaraḥ kesarī 
MSS gabhīraravakātarāturatarāturavyāhṛtaiḥ patan hariṇakaiḥ samaṃ samarabhūmikāṃ lajjate 
MSS kaṭhorapārāvatakaṇṭhamecakaṃ vapurvūṣaskandhasubandhurāṃsakam 
MSS prasannarsihastimitaṃ ca vīkṣitaṃ dhvaniśca maṅgalyamṛdaṅgamāṃsalaḥ 
MSS kaṭhorāsthigranthivyatikararaṇatkāramukharaḥ kharasnāyucchedakṣaṇavihitavegavyupaśamaḥ 
MSS nirātaṅkaḥ paṅkeṣviva piśitapiṇḍeṣu vilasa nnasirgātraṃ gātraṃ sapadi lavaśas te vikiratu 
MSS kaṇa iva purāṃ vahnerbhasmāvadhūlanasaṅgato jayati bahalālokasphārāvadhūtaniśodayaḥ 
MSS smaraharajaṭābandhagranthirbhujaṅgaphaṇāmaṇi stridaśataṭinīpūrānītaḥ sphuranniva tārakaḥ 
MSS kaṇācāmatuṣāṅgārān yatnena parirakṣasi 
MSS mūṣakāpahṛtaṃ koṣe ratnarāśiṃ na paśyasi 
MSS kaṇṭakasya tu bhagnasya dantasya calitasya ca 
MSS amātyasya ca duṣṭasya mūlāduddharaṇaṃ sukham 
MSS kaṇṭakān kūpamagniṃ ca varjayanti yathā narāḥ 
MSS tathā nṛśaṃsakarmāṇaṃ varjayanti narā naram 
MSS kaṇṭakāvaraṇaṃ yādṛk phalitasya phalāptaye 
MSS tādṛg durjanasaṅgo'pi sādhusaṅgāya bādhanam 
MSS kaṇṭakitatanuśarīrā lajjāmukulāyamānanayaneyam 
MSS tava kumudinīva vāñchati nṛcandra bālā karasparśam 
MSS kaṇṭakenāpi ye spṛṣṭā yānti kāmapi vikriyām 
MSS te'pi śastranikṛntasya paśormāṃsāni bhuñjate 
MSS kaṇṭakenāpi viddhasya mahatī vedanā bhavet 
MSS cakrabhīṣaṇakhaḍgādyair māryamāṇasya kiṃ punaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭakairiva vidāritapādaḥ padminīparicitairaparādreḥ 
MSS āruroha sarasīruhabandhuḥ skandhamambudhitaṭīgamanāya 
MSSA kaṇṭako dārukhaṇḍaṃ ca vitanoti galavyathām 
MSSA vyañjanāntarnipatitas tālu vidhyati vṛścikaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭakyakaṇṭakānāṃ vyatyāse'mbhastribhiḥ karaiḥ paścāt 
MSS khātvā puruṣatritayaṃ tribhāgayuktaṃ dhanaṃ vā syāt 
MSS kaṇṭārikāyā anyoktiḥ saṇānyoktirudāhṛtā 
MSS dhattūrapādapānyoktir avadheyā tṛṇoktayaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhakoṇaviniviṣṭamīśa te kālakūṭamapi me mahāmṛtam 
MSS apyupāttamamṛtaṃ bhavadvapur bhedavṛtti yadi me na rocate 
MSS kaṇṭhagatairapyasubhiḥ kasyātmā nopasarpate jātu 
MSS mūrkhasya viṣādasya ca garvasya tathā kṛtaghnasya 
MSS kaṇṭhagrahaṃ na vātyeva bhartuḥ kruddhāpi yatnataḥ 
MSS kaṅkaṇaśreṇikevāsau doṣamevāvalambate 
MSS unmatteva pramatteva prahṛṣṭevātureva ca 
MSS na śakyopāsituṃ rāmā prauḍhaṃ yauvanamāśritā 
MSS sukhaduḥkhapradāyinyas tṛtīye yauvane sthitāḥ 
MSS jāyante gahanā rāmāḥ saṃsārasyeva rītayaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhagrahe śithilatāṃ gamite kathaṃcid yo manyate maraṇameva sukhābhyupāyam 
MSS gacchan sa eṣa na balād vidhṛto yuvābhyām ityujjhite bhujalate valayairivāsyāḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhacchāyamiṣeṇa kalparajanīmuttaṃsamandākinī rūpeṇa pralayābdhimūrdhvanayanavyājena kalpānalam 
MSS bhūṣāpannagakelipānakapaṭādekonapañcāśa taṃ vātānapyupasaṃharannavatu vaḥ kalpāntaśāntau śivaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhacchedaviśīryamāṇarudhiraprāgbhārabhagn adyuter yena smeramukhena homaśikhinaḥ saṃdhukṣaṇākāṅkṣiṇā 
MSS bhrūbhaṅgaḥ śitikaṇṭhakaṇṭhaphaṇine phūtkārahetoḥ kṛtaḥ śauṭīryavratatuṣṭadhūrjaṭirasau kiṃ varṇyate rāvaṇaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhacchede suvarṇaṃ cet kṣuraṃ yadvaddhitaṃ na hi 
MSS bandhurapyapakārī cet sarvaistyājyas tathaiva saḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhamākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayed dṛḍhamicchayā 
MSS jālaṃdharo bandha eṣa sudhāvyayanivāraṇaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhaśriyaṃ kuvalayastabakābhirāma dāmānukārivikaṭacchavikālakūṭām 
MSS bibhrat sukhāni diśatādupahārapīta dhūpotthadhūmamalināmiva dhūrjaṭirvaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhaśleṣaṃ samāsādya tasyāḥ prabhraṣṭayānayā 
MSS tulyāvasthā sakhīveyaṃ tanurāśvāsyate mama 
MSS kaṇṭhasaktamṛdubāhubandhanaṃ nyastapādatalamagrapādayoḥ 
MSS prārthayanta śayanotthitaṃ priyās taṃ niśātyayavisargacumbanam 
MSS kaṇṭhas tasyāḥ kuvalaydṛśaḥ kāñcanaḥ ko'pi kambur lāvaṇyāmbusmaranarapaterarghyamāviḥ karoti 
MSS tisro rekhāstribhuvanajayavyañjikās tatra tat kiṃ na syānmadhye trivaliracanā paunaruktyāya dhātuḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhasthā yā bhaved vidyā sā prakāśyā sadā budhaiḥ 
MSS yā gurau pustake vidyā tayā mūḍhaḥ pratāryate 
MSS kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya 
MSS anyonyaśobhājananād babhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhasya vidadhe kāntiṃ muktābharaṇatā yathā 
MSS tasyāḥ svabhāvaramyasya muktābharaṇatā tathā 
MSS kaṇṭhādūrdhvaṃ viniryāti prāṇā yāñcākṣaraiḥ saha 
MSS dadāmītyakṣarairdātuḥ punaḥ śrotrād viśanti te 
MSS kaṇṭhādraktaṃ pibati guṇināṃ madyamāṃsaṃ na bhuṅkte viṣṇudravyaṃ harati kurute dvādaśīṣūpavāsam 
MSS sāṃkhyaṃ śrutvāpaharati gavāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛttiṃ pāpo dambhaḥ kaliyugasakhaḥ kasya mitraṃ niyogī 
MSS kaṇṭhāntaḥ kvaṇitaṃ divākarakaraklāntyā rajoviplavais tannetrāñcalakuñcanaṃ śitakuśaprāntakṣataiḥ sītkṛtiḥ 
MSS śvāsormiprabhavo vanecarabhiyā tvadvairivāmabhruvām evaṃ deva marostaṭe'pi suratakrīḍānurūpaḥ kramaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhālaṃkāraghaṇṭāghaṇaghaṇaraṇitādhmātarodaḥkaṭāhaḥ kaṇṭhekālādhirohocitaghanasubhagaṃ bhāvukasnindhapṛṣṭhaḥ 
MSS sākṣād dharmo vapuṣmān dhavalakakudanirdhūtakailāsakūṭaḥ kūṭastho vaḥ kakudmān nibiḍataratamaḥstomatṛṇyāṃ vitṛṇyāt 
MSS kaṇṭhāliṅganamaṅgalaṃ ghanakucābhogopabhogotsavaṃ śroṇīsaṃgamasaubhagaṃ ca satataṃ matpreyasīnāṃ puraḥ 
MSS prāptuṃ ko'yamitīrṣyayeva yamunākūle balādyaḥ svayaṃ gopīnāmaharad dukūlanicayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa puṣṇātu naḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhāvasaktamṛdubāhulatās turaṅgād rājāvarodhanavadhūravatārayantaḥ 
MSS āliṅganānyadhikṛtāḥ sphuṭamāpureva gaṇḍasthalīḥ śucitayā na cucumburāsām 
MSS kaṇṭhāśleṣiṇamunnatastanabharaśroṇītaṭagrāhiṇaṃ saṃsaktoruyugaṃ gṛhītajaghanaprākāramapyantataḥ 
MSS drāgeva ślathabandhaminduvadanā gāḍhāvamardāsahaṃ vijñāyātyajadāśu kāñcanapaṭaṃ vrīḍākulāpi kṣaṇam 
MSS kaṇṭhe ka eṣa tava vallabha nūpuro'yaṃ tat pādabhūṣaṇamayaṃ valayas tadānīm 
MSS ityādivācyamavibhāvya vaco mṛgākṣyā jñāne'pi tadvihṛtamutsukatāṃ tanoti 
MSSA kaṇṭhe kṛttāvaśeṣaṃ kanakamayamadhaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma karṣan krāntvā dvārāṇi helācalacaraṇaraṇatkiṅkaṇīcakravālaḥ 
MSSA dattātaṅko'ṅganānāmanusṛtasaraṇiḥ saṃbhramādaśvapālaiḥ prabhraṣṭo'yaṃ plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpatermandiraṃ mandurāyāḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhe gadgadatā svedo mukhe vaivarṇyavepathū 
MSS mriyamāṇasya cihnāni yāni tānyeva yācataḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhe cintāmaṇirjñeyaś cintitārthapradaḥ sadā 
MSS āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhavaṃśe yaḥ sa sūryākhyaḥ śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhe jīvitamānane tava guṇāḥ pāṇau kapolastanau saṃtāpastvayi mānasaṃ nayanayoracchinnadhāraṃ payaḥ 
MSS sarvaṃ niṣkaruṇa tvadīyavirahe sālambanaṃ kiṃ punas tasyāḥ saṃprati jīvite bata sakhīvargo nirālambanaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhe madaḥ kodravajo hṛdi tāmbūlajo madaḥ 
MSS lakṣmīmadas tu sarvāṅge putradāramukheṣvapi 
MSS kaṇṭhe mauktikamālikāḥ stanataṭe kārpūramacchaṃ rajaḥ sāndraṃ candanamaṅgake valayitāḥ pāṇau mṛṇālīlatāḥ 
MSS tanvī naktamiyaṃ cakāsti śucinī cīnāṃśuke bibhratī śītāṃśoradhidevateva galitā vyomāgramārohataḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhe rajjuṃ baddhvā mṛtasya puṃsas tu rajjumādāya 
MSS tasyāḥ khaṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ gaṇḍasrajaṃ harati 
MSS kaṇṭhe vasantī caturā yadasyāḥ sarasvatī vādayate vipañcīm 
MSS tadeva vāgbhūya mukhe mṛgākṣyāḥ śrotuḥ śrutau yāti sudhārasatvam 
MSS kaṇṭhocito'pi huṃkṛti mātranirastaḥ padāntike patitaḥ 
MSS yasyāś candraśikhaḥ smara bhallanibho jayati sā caṇḍī 
MSS kaṇḍūyate dakṣiṇapāṇinā cet sa sārameyo vadanaṃ tadānīm 
MSS bhaktaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ saha bhūmipālair bhojyāni bhakṣyāṇi ciraṃ bhavanti 
MSS kaṇḍūladvipagaṇḍapiṇḍakaṣaṇākamp ena sampātibhir dharmasraṃsitabandhanaiḥ svakusumairarcanti godāvarīm 
MSS chāyāpaskiramāṇaviṣkiramukhavyākṛṣṭakīṭatvacaḥ kūjatklāntakapītakukkuṭakulāḥ kūle kulāyadrumāḥ 
MSS kaṇḍūyamānaḥ khalu dakṣiṇena hastena bhālaṃ bhaṣaṇo dadāti 
MSS prabhāvinamrīkṛtarājacakraṃ rājyābhiṣeke varapaṭṭabandham 
MSS katarat purahara paruṣaṃ hālāhalakavalayācanāvacasoḥ 
MSS ekaiva tava rasajñā tadubhayarasatāratamyajñā 
MSS kati kati na punaścaranti hanti pratiśikharaṃ pratikānanaṃ kuraṅgāḥ 
MSS tadapi janamanovinodahetur vilasati keṣvapi ko'pi nābhigandhaḥ 
MSS kati kati na madoddhatāścaranti pratiśikhari pratikānanaṃ kuraṅgāḥ 
MSS kvacidapi punaruttamā mṛgās te madayati yan mada eva medinīśān 
MSS kati kati na latāḥ kalitāḥ saṃcaratā cañcarīkarasikena 
MSS nalini bhavanmadhu madhuraṃ yat pītaṃ tat tadeva paripītam 
MSS kati kati na vasante vallayaḥ śākhino vā surabhitasumanobhirbhūṣitāṅgā babhūvuḥ 
MSS tadapi yuvajanānāṃ prītaye kevalo'bhūd abhinavakalikālībhāraśālī rasālaḥ 
MSS katiciduddhatanirbharamatsarāḥ katicidātmavacaḥstutiśālinaḥ 
MSS ahaha ke'pi nirakṣarakukṣayas tadiha saṃprati kaṃ prati me śramaḥ 
MSSA katicid divasāni kāṇḍaśeṣāḥ patitāśeṣapurāṇajīrṇaparṇāḥ 
MSSA taravastvaci garhitapravālāḥ samavāpyanta na nāmato vivektum 
MSS katicid divasāni tayā gamitā ni gṛhe tava saṅgamarocanayā 
MSS katicid vipine nalinīśayane vacanena pikīmadamocanayā 
MSS na vane'pi ratirbhavane'pi na yaṃ pratirūpavinirjjitarocanayā 
MSS karuṇāvaruṇālaya kiṃ kriyatām aruṇāyatapaṅkajalocanayā 
MSS kati te kabarībhāraḥ sumanaḥsaṅgāt priye'tinīlatvāt 
MSS bhavati ca kalāpavattvān nijairasevyaḥ kathaṃ na syāt 
MSS kati na santi janā jagatītale tadapi tadvirahākulitaṃ manaḥ 
MSS kati na santi niśākaratārakāḥ kamalinī malinī raviṇā vinā 
MSS kati na santi mahīṣu mahīruhaḥ surabhipuṣparasālaphalālayaḥ 
MSS surabhayanti na ke'pi ca bhūruhān iti yaśo'sti paraṃ tava candana 
MSS kati no viṣayā nibhālitāḥ kati vā bhūmibhujo na śīlitāḥ 
MSS dharaṇīdhara tāvakān guṇān avadhāryājagaṇaṃ guruṃ laghum 
MSS katipayadivasasthāyini madakāriṇi yauvane durātmānaḥ 
MSS vidadhati tathāparādhaṃ janmaiva yathā vṛthā bhavati 
MSS kattipayadivasasthāyī pūro dūronnato'pi bhavitā te 
MSS taṭini taṭadrumapātana pātakamekaṃ cirasthāyi 
MSS katipayadivasaiḥ kṣayaṃ prayāyāt kanakagiriḥ kṛtavāsarāvasānaḥ 
MSS iti mudamupayāti cakravākī vitaraṇaśālini vīrarudradeve 
MSS katipayanimeṣavartini janmajarāmaraṇavihvale jagati 
MSS kalpāntakoṭibandhuḥ sphurati kavīnāṃ yaśaḥprasaraḥ 
MSS katipayapurasvāmī kāyavyayairapi durgraho mitavitaritā mohenāho mayānusṛtaḥ purā 
MSS tribhuvanapatirbuddhyārādhyo'dhunā svapadapradaḥ punaradhigatas tat prācīno dunoti dinavyayaḥ 
MSS katipayasahakārapuṣparamyas tanutuhino'lpavinidrasinduvāraḥ 
MSS surabhimukhahimāgamāntaśaṃsī samupayayau śiśiraḥ smaraikabandhuḥ 
MSS kati pallavitā na puṣpitā vā taravaḥ santi samantato vasante 
MSS jagato vijaye tu puṣpaketoḥ sahakārī sahakāra eka eva 
MSS katiṣu na kṛtā sevā ke vā na vāgvibhavaiḥ stutās tṛṇamapi guṇaprītaḥ prādānna ko'pi vipaścitām 
MSS ayamiha paraṃ duḥkhajvālākalāpamakhaṇḍayat kanakapayasāṃ dhārādaṇḍairakāṇḍaghanāghanaḥ 
MSS kati santi nonnatibhṛtas taravas tadapi tvameva gurukīrtivaraḥ 
MSS nibiḍādaraṃ navamarandaharaḥ sahakāra kāraṇamiha bhramaraḥ 
MSS kati santi latā vipine kusuma stavakānamitāḥ khalu pallavitāḥ 
MSS praticampakacandananīpavanī navapaṅkajinīmadhusaṃvalitāḥ 
MSS suciraṃ kusumeṣu paribhramatā na ca mālati kāpi tathā militā 
MSS madhupena punarmadhupānavidhau hṛdaye na yathā bhavatī kalitā 
MSS kati santi lavaṅgalatā lalitā navakorakitā dharaṇīsutale 
MSS kati bandhuragandhabhṛtas taravo guravo nivasanti girau malaye 
MSS katyakṣīṇi karoṭayaḥ kati kati dvīpidvipānāṃ tvacaḥ kākolāḥ kati pannagāḥ kati sudhādhāmnaśca khaṇḍāḥ kati 
MSS kiṃ ca tvaṃ ca kati trilokajanani tvadvāripūrodare majjajjantukadambakaṃ samudayatyekaikamādāya yat 
MSS katyaśvāḥ kati dhenavaḥ kati gajāḥ katyadbhutāḥ pādapāḥ sundaryaḥ kati susruvaḥ kati mahāratnānyanardhyāṇyapi 
MSS jātaikā kila kanyakā jalanidherdātuṃ prasaktā yadā sarvaṃ tad vyayitaṃ tadā pariṇatau nāmaikamuccheṣitam 
MSS kathaṃcit kālidāsasya kālena bahunā mayā 
MSS avagāḍheva gambhīramasṛṇaudhā sarasvatī 
MSS kathaṃcidahni hṛdaye kuśalairviniveśitā 
MSS śikṣā gaurakhareṇeva rājñā vismāryate niśi 
MSS kathaṃcin naidāghe divasa iva kope vigalite prasattau prāptāyāṃ tadanu ca niśāyāmiva śanaiḥ 
MSS smitajyotsnārambhakṣapitavirahadhvāntanivaho mukhendurmāninyāḥ sphurati kṛtapuṇyasya surate 
MSS kathaṃ te tyaktasadvṛttāḥ sukhaṃ rātriṣu śerate 
MSS maraṇāntaritā yeṣāṃ narakeṣūpapattayaḥ 
MSS kathaṃ tvadupalambhāśāvihatāviha tādṛśī 
MSS avasthā nālamāroḍhum aṅganāmaṅganāśinī 
MSSA kathaṃ na ramate cittaṃ dharme'nekasukhaprade 
MSSA jīvānāṃ duḥkhabhīrūṇāṃ prāyo mithyādṛśo yataḥ 
MSS kathaṃ na lajjitastādṛk savitā tejasāṃ nidhiḥ 
MSS brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍikāṃ prāpya kurvan pādaprasārikām 
MSS kathaṃ nāma na sevyante yatnataḥ parameśvarāḥ 
MSS acireṇaiva ye tuṣṭāḥ pūrayanti manorathān 
MSS kathaṃ nu taṃ bandhurakomalāṅguliṃ karaṃ vihāyāsi nimagnamambhasi 
MSS acetanaṃ nāma guṇaṃ na lakṣayen mayaiva kasmādavadhīritā priyā 
MSS kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcidāpadi 
MSS bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇamātmānaḥ 
MSS kathaṃ nyāyyamanuṣṭhānaṃ mādṛśaḥ pratiṣedhatu 
MSS kathaṃ vābhyanujānātu sāhasaikarasāṃ kriyām 
MSS kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ ghanaiḥ pihitakare niśākare 
MSS acintayantyabhinavavarṣavidyutas tvamāgatā sutanu yathā prabhāvatī 
MSS kathaṃ caiṣā tanvī prakṛtisukumārāṅgalatikā pragalbhavyāpāraṃ ratikalahakhedaṃ viṣahate 
MSS nalinyāstigmo'pi prabhavati sukhāyaiva savitā prakṛṣṭe premṇyevaṃ kimiva na sahante yuvatayaḥ 
MSS kathaṃ priyāyā anukampitāyāḥ saṅgaṃ rahasyaṃ rucirāṃśca mantrān 
MSS suhṛtsu ca snehasitaḥ śiśūnāṃ kalākṣarāṇāmanuraktacittaḥ 
MSS putrān smaraṃstā duhit rhṛdasyā bhrāt n svas rvā pitarau ca dīnau 
MSS gṛhān manojñoruparicchadāṃśca vṛttīśca kulyāḥ paśubhṛtyavargān 
MSS kathaṃ bhāryāmṛte dharmam arthaṃ vā puruṣaḥ prabho 
MSS prāpnoti kāmamatha vā tasyāṃ tritayamāhitam 
MSS tathaiva bhartāramṛte bhāryā dharmādisādhane 
MSS na samarthā trivargo'yaṃ dāmpatyaṃ samupāśritaḥ 
MSS kathaṃ mamorasi kṛtapakṣaniḥsvanaḥ śilīmukho'pahitaditi 
jalpati priye 
MSS nivṛtya kiṃ kimiti bruvāṇayānayā sasādhvasaṃ kupitamamoci kāntayā 
MSS kathaṃ mugdhe kathaṃ vakre kāntāyās te vilocane 
MSS kathaṃ janānurāgāya kathaṃ janavipattaye 
MSS kathaṃ yateta manujau bhinnaiva prakṛtiryataḥ 
MSS ekasthānasamutpanna sudhākṣveḍabhidā smṛtā 
MSS kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet 
MSS rakṣaṇīyā viśeṣeṇa rājadārā mahābala 
MSS kathaṃ vilokeyamamuṃ yuvānaṃ kumudvatībandhumivojjihānam 
MSS bhartuḥ svasā bhādracaturthikeva kalaṅkayatyardhavilokane'pi 
MSS kathaṃ vīthīmasmānupadiśasi dharmapraṇayinīṃ prasīda svāṃ śiṣyāmatikhalamukhīṃ śādhi muralīm 
MSS harantī maryādāṃ śiva śiva pare puṃsi hṛdayaṃ nayantī dhṛṣṭeyaṃ yaduvara yathā nāhvayati naḥ 
MSS kathaṃ saṃbodhyate rājā sugrīvasya ca kā priyā 
MSS nirdhanāḥ kiṃ ca vāñchanti kiṃ kurvanti manīṣiṇaḥ 
MSS kathaṃ sa dantarahitaḥ sūryaḥ sūribhirucyate 
MSS yo mīnarāśiṃ muktaiva meṣaṃ bhoktuṃ samudyataḥ 
MSS kathanena vināpyāśāṃ pūrayanti hi sādhavaḥ 
MSS pratigehaṃ bhāsate hi vivasvān kathanaṃ vinā 
MSS kathamagaṇitapūrvaṃ drakṣyate taṃ narendraḥ kathamapuruṣavākyaṃ śroṣyate siddhavākyaḥ 
MSS kathamaviṣayavanghyaṃ dhārayiṣyatyamarṣaṃ praṇipatati niruddhaḥ satkṛto dharṣito vā 
MSS kathamadya kathaṃ ca śva iti jīvanacintayā 
MSS yā kṛthā hā vṛthā dainyam āyurantaṃ prayacchati 
MSS kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam 
MSS asahanasakhīśrotraprāptiṃ viśaṅkya sasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ punaḥ 
MSS kathamapi tava vṛndāraṇyamāhātmyavṛndaṃ na hi kathayitumuccairīśvaro'pyīśvaraḥ syāt 
MSS api ca tṛṇaphalānāṃ yasya lubdho rasāya prabhuramṛtabhujāmapyāśrayad vatsabhāvam 
MSS kathamapi na niṣiddho duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā drupadatanayapāṇis tena pitrā mamādya 
MSS tava bhujabaladarpādhyāyamānasya vāmaḥ śirasi caraṇa eṣa nyasyate vārayainam 
MSS kathamapi paricitamudrā bhujabhudrāsaṅgataṃ svapne 
MSS uṣasi nimīlatanayanā śayanāntaḥ kāntamāmṛṣati 
MSS kathamapi sakhi krīḍākopād vrajeti mayodite kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ 
MSS iti sarabhasadhvastapremṇi vyapetaghṛṇe spṛhāṃ punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ karoti karomi kim 
MSS kathamapi hi bhavanti kṣetrasadbījayogāj jagadupakṛtihetornātmavṛttyai phalanti

MSS kathamapyadhigatarandhrair adhyuṣitā yadi guhākhubhiḥ kṣudraiḥ 
MSS iyataiva kiṃ mṛgādhipa nijavikramanirvidaṃ vahasi 
MSS kathamarthaṃ niṣedhantu śrutayaḥ smṛtayo'pi vā 
MSS yāsāmekaṃ padamapi na calatyarthato vinā 
MSS kathamavanipa darpo yanniśātāsidhārā dalanagalitamūrdhnā vidviṣāṃ svīkṛtā śrīḥ 
MSS nanu tava nihatārerapyasau kiṃ na nītā tridivamapagatāṅgairvallabhā kīrtirebhiḥ

MSS iti viracitamallikāvikāsaḥ smayata iva sma madhuṃ nidāghakālaḥ

MSS yena na subhāṣitāmṛtam āhlādi nipītamā tṛpteḥ 
MSS kathamutpadyate dharmaḥ kathaṃ dharmaḥ pravardhate

MSS kathametat kucadvandvaṃ patitaṃ tava sundari 
MSS paśyādhaḥ khanane mūḍha patanti girayo'pi ca

MSS avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat 
MSS kadāpi nāśrayet prājño'karuṇaṃ miṣṭabhāṣiṇam 
MSS pracchannamasahiṣṇuṃ vā guḍamiśraṃ viṣaṃ yathā 
MSS kadāpi nogradaṇḍaḥ syāt kaṭubhāṣaṇatatparaḥ 
MSS bhāryā putro'pyudvijate kaṭuvākyāt pradaṇḍataḥ 
MSS paśavo'pi vaśaṃ yānti dānaiśca mṛdubhāṣaṇaiḥ 
MSSA kadāpi veśyā na guṇārthinī syād rūpārthinī naiva hitārthinī ca 
MSSA vidyārthinī nāpi na manyase ced vārtāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kayavannakasya 
MSS kadā puṇyakṣetre karakalitarudrākṣavalayo dadhat svānte śānte'khilaśivapadaṃ śrīśivapadam 
MSS maheśa śrīkaṇṭha smarahara hara tryambaka śiva prasīdetyākrośān nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā brahmeśānatridaśapatimukhyaiḥ suragaṇaiḥ stutaṃ viṣvaksenaṃ jitadanujasenaṃ hṛdi bhajan 
MSS aye viṣṇo jiṣṇo garuḍaratha viśvambhara hare prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā bhāgīrathyā bhavajaladhisaṃtārataraṇeḥ skhaladvīcīmālācapalatalavistāritamudaḥ 
MSS tamaḥsthāne kuñje kvacidapi niviśyāhṛtamanā bhaviṣyāmyekākī narakamathane dhyānarasikaḥ 
MSS kadā bhikṣābhaktaiḥ karakalitagaṅgāmbutaralaiḥ śarīraṃ me sthāsyatyuparatasamastendriyasukham 
MSS kadā brahmābhyāsasthiratanutayāraṇyavihagāḥ patiṣyanti sthāṇubhramahatadhiyaḥ skandhaśirasi 
MSS kadā mukhaṃ varatanu kāraṇādṛte tavāgataṃ kṣaṇamayi kopapātratām 
MSS aparvaṇi grahakaluṣendumaṇḍalā vibhāvarī kathaya kathaṃ bhaviṣyati 
MSS kadā vārāṇasyāmamarataṭinīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno'ñjalipuṭam 
MSS aye gaurīnātha tripurahara śambho trinayana prasīdeti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā vā sākete vimalasarayūtīrapuline carantaṃ śrīrāmaṃ janakatanayālakṣmaṇayutam 
MSS aye rāma svāmin janakatanayāvallabha vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā vṛndāraṇye navaghananibhaṃ nandatanayaṃ parītaṃ gopībhiḥ kṣaṇarucimanojñābhirabhitaḥ 
MSS gamiṣyāmas toṣaṃ nayanaviṣayīkṛtya kṛtino vayaṃ premodrekaskhalitagatayo vepathubhṛtaḥ 
MSS kadā vṛndāraṇye mihiraduhituḥ saṅgamahite muhurbhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ caritalaharīṃ gokulapateḥ 
MSS lapannuccairuccairnayanapayasāṃ veṇibhirahaṃ kariṣye sotkaṇṭho niviḍamavasekaṃ viṭapinām 
MSS kadā vṛndāraṇye vimalayamunātīrapuline carantaṃ govindaṃ haladharasudāmādisahitam 
MSS aye kṛṣṇa svāmin madhuramuralīvādana vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā śayāno maṇikarṇikāyāṃ karṇe japāmyakṣaramindumauleḥ 
MSS avāpya mudrāṃ gatamohamudrāṃ nālokayiṣyāmi punaḥ prapañcam 
MSS kadā śrīmatpaṅkeruhavanavikāśiprasṛmara prathāpuñjaṃ tejaḥ kimapi kalayannaupaniṣadam 
MSS graheśa śrībhāno mihira taraṇe sūrya savitaḥ prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā saṃsārajālāntar baddhaṃ triguṇarajjubhiḥ 
MSS ātmānaṃ mocayiṣyāmi śivabhaktiśalākayā 
MSS kadā samyag dhyāyannanupamacaritraṃ maṇigaṇa sphuradbhūṣācitraṃ puraripukalatraṃ kimapi tat 
MSS śive durge kātyāyani janani bhaktapraṇayini prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān 
MSS kadā hi mūrkho vacaneṣu bhītaḥ khalo na kutrāpi chaleṣvadakṣaḥ 
MSS andhena kācid yuvatī hi dṛṣṭā kasyātra kāmeṣu bhavecca lajjā 
MSS kadā hyahaṃ sameṣyāmi bharatena mahātmanā 
MSS śatrughnena ca vīreṇa tvayā ca raghunandana 
MSS kanakaṃ sugandhi tava tanvi vapur madhuro maṇiśca sakhi te'pyadharam 
MSS nigaḍaṃ sukhasya karaṇaṃ bhavatīṃ sṛjato vidherniravadhirmahimā 
MSS kanakakamalakāntaiḥ sadya evāmbudhautaiḥ śravaṇataṭaniṣaktaiḥ pāṭalopāntanetraiḥ 
MSS uṣasi vadanabimbairaṃsasaṃsaktakeśaiḥ śriya iva gṛhamadhye saṃsthitā yoṣito'dya 
MSS kanakakamalakāntairānanaiḥ pāṇḍugaṇḍair uparinihitahāraiścandanārdraiḥ stanāntaiḥ 
MSS madajanitavilāsairdūṣṭipātairmunīndrān stanabharanatanāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān 
MSS kanakakalaśaśreṇī yatra prabhākaracumbanair atikharakarāghātairmadhyandine śithilīkṛtā 
MSS dravati bhajate dārḍhyaṃ siktā samīraṇakampita dhvajapaṭasamānītasvargāpagājalabindubhiḥ 
MSS kanakakunḍalamaṇḍitabhāṣiṇe śakaripurviṣayān daśa vidviṣaḥ 
MSS magadhakekayakeralakośalān kariśataṃ ca madālasalocanam 
MSS kanakakramukāyitaṃ purastād atha paṅgeruhakorakāyamāṇam 
MSS kramaśaḥ kalaśāyamānamāste sudṛśo vakṣasi kasya bhāgadheyam 
MSS kanakacchatramambāyāḥ kurute kutukaṃ mahat 
MSS viśadeva dṛśorantar yannirgacchati mūdhaini 
MSS kanakadravakāntikāntayā militaṃ rāmamudīkṣya kāntayā 
MSS capalāyutavāridabhramān nanṛte cātakapotakairvane 
MSSA kanakadravagauramambaraṃ dadhatorudvitayena sundaram 
MSSA udayanmaṇinūpuraprabhā saraṇiśreṇijaṭālajānukam 
MSS kanakanikaṣabhāsā sītayāliṅgitāṅgo navakuvalayadāmaśyāmavarṇābhirāmaḥ

MSS priyavimānitamānavatīruṣāṃ nirasanairasanairavṛthārthatā 
MSS kanakabhūṣaṇasaṃgrahaṇocito yadi maṇis trapuṇi pratibadhyate 
MSS na sa virauti na cāpi na śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā 
MSS kanakamṛgamudasya svāṃ kuṭīṃ saṃpraviṣṭaḥ kvacidapi na vadhūṭīṃ nodadarśāṅganādau 
MSS tadapi sa raghuvīraḥ parṇaśālāgṛhāntar na viśati hṛdayāśātantunāśātibhīruḥ 
MSS kanakarasamasṛṇavartita hayagandhāmūlamiśraparyuṣitam 
MSS māhiṣamiha navanītaṃ gatabīje kanakaphalamadhye

MSS bhavati hayaliṅgasadṛśaṃ liṅgaṃ kaṭhināṅganādayitam 
MSS kanakasya tu pañcāṅgaṃ karpūraṃ ketakīrajaḥ 
MSS ātmaśukreṇa saṃyuktaṃ vaśyakṛd bhakṣitaṃ striyāḥ

MSS manasaḥ paramāṇutāṃ vadantaḥ kathamadyāpi na tārkikās trapante

MSS kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu samatvenānuvartate 
MSS samopabhogajīveṣu yathaiva tanayeṣu ca

MSSA kandamūlāni ye mūḍhāḥ sūryadeve jarnādane

MSS milanaṃ stabdhīkaraṇaṃ mūlena durālabhāyāśca 
MSS kapikulanakhamukhakhaṇḍita tarutalaphalabhojano varaṃ puruṣaḥ 
MSS na punardhanamadagarvita mukhabhaṅgakadarthitā vṛttiḥ 
MSS kapirapi ca kāpiśāyana madamatto vṛścikena saṃdaṣṭaḥ 
MSS api ca piśācagrastaḥ kiṃ brūmo vaikṛtaṃ tasya 
MSS kapilākṣīrapānena brāhmaṇīgamanena ca 
MSS vedākṣaravicāreṇa sa śūdro narakaṃ vrajet 
MSSA kapilānāṃ sahasrāṇi yo viprebhyaḥ prayacchati 
MSSA ekasya jīvitaṃ dadyān na ca tulyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 
MSS kapīnāṃ vasayāśvānāṃ vahnidāhasamudbhavā 
MSS vyathā vināśamabhyeti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā 
MSS kapermadhyaṃ śiśurbaddhvā yathonnatapadaṃ vrajet 
MSS tadvadrakṣakamāśritya padamunnatamāśrayet 
MSS kapolaṃ pakṣmabhyaḥ kalayati kapolāt kucataṭaṃ kucānmadhyaṃ madhyānnavamuditanābhīsarasijam 
MSS na jānīmaḥ kiṃ nu kva nu kiyadanena vyavasitaṃ yadasyāḥ pratyaṅgaṃ nayanajalabindurviharati 
MSS kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhir vinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām 
MSS yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti 
MSS kapolapatrān makarāt saketur bhrūbhyāṃ jigīṣurdhanuṣāṃ jaganti 
MSS ihāvalabhbyāsti ratiṃ manobhū rajyadvayasyo madhunādhareṇa 
MSS kapolapālīṃ tava tanvi manye lāvaṇyadhanye diśamuttarākhyām 
MSS vibhāti yasyāṃ lalitālakāyāṃ manoharā vai śravaṇasya lakṣmīḥ 
MSS kapolaphalakāvasyāḥ kaṣṭaṃ bhūtvā tathāvidhau 
MSS apaśyantāvivānyonyamīdṛkṣāṃ kṣamatāṃ gatau 
MSS kapolayorinduñjitoramuṣyāḥ prasarpatoreva mitho jayāya 
MSS svayaṃ svayaṃbhūḥ kṛtarodhamantar vyadhatta nāsāmiha sāmyadaṇḍam 
MSS kapolavyālolaśravaṇanavamākandakalikā marandavyāmiśrāstava varatanu svedapṛṣataḥ 
MSS rativyatyāsasya śramamapalapeyuryadi bhaved abhedopakrāntakvaṇitaraśanādāma jaghanam 
MSS kapolāduḍḍīnairbhayavaśavilolairmadhukarair madāmbhaḥsaṃlobhādupari patituṃ baddhapaṭalaiḥ 
MSS caladbarhacchatraśriyamiva dadhāno'tirucirām avighnaṃ herambo bhavadaghavighātaṃ ghaṭayatu 
MSSA kapolāvunmīlatpulakanikurambau mayi manāṅ mṛśatyantaḥsmerastabakitamukhāmbhoruharucaḥ 
MSSA kathaṃkāraṃ śakyāḥ parigaditumindīvaradṛśo daladdrākṣāniryadrasabharasapakṣā bhaṇitayaḥ 
MSS kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam 
MSS muhuḥ paśyañ śṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ 
MSS kapole patrālīṃ pulakini vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ svayaṃ śrīrādhāyāḥ karakalitavartirmadhuripuḥ 
MSS abhūd vaktrendau yan nihitanayanaḥ kampitabhujas tadetat sāmarthyaṃ tadabhinavarūpasya jayati 
MSS kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo'dhararasaḥ 
MSS muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnas taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam 
MSS kapole pāṇḍutvaṃ kimapi jaladhārāṃ nayanayos tanau kārśyaṃ dainyaṃ vacasi hṛdi dāvānalaśikhām 
MSS avajñāṃ prāṇeṣu prakṛtiṣu viparyāsamadhunā kimanyad vairāgyaṃ sakalaviṣayeṣvākalayate 
MSS kapole'mbhojākṣyāḥ priyadaśanacihnaṃ priyadṛśoḥ sarojākṣī vaktracyutabhujagavallīrasalavam 
MSS sapatnī dṛṣṭvārādurutaraviniśvāsataralo nnatorojadvandvaṃ rahasi śanakai roditi muhuḥ 
MSS kapolau lolākṣyā madhumukulalīlāvijayinā vurojau rejāte kanakakalaśābhogasubhagau 
MSS dṛśau vātotkhelattaralataranīlotpalarucau vaco no jānīmaḥ kimamṛtamayaṃ kiṃ viṣamayam 
MSSA kaphamūtramalaprāyaṃ nirjanturjagatītale 
MSSA yatnādyadutsṛjetsādhuḥ sotsargasamitirbhavet 
MSS kabandhaḥ parighābhāso dṛśyate bhāskarāntike 
MSS jagrāsa sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ 
MSS kamaṭhapṛṣṭhakaṭhoramidaṃ dhanur madhuramūrtirasau raghunandanaḥ 
MSS kathamadhijyamanena vidhīyatām ahaha tāta paṇas tava dāruṇaḥ 
MSS kamaṇḍalūpamo'mātyas tanutyāgī bahugrahaḥ 
MSS nṛpate kiṅkṣaṇo mūrkho daridraḥ kiṃvarāṭakaḥ 
MSS kamanīyatānivāsaḥ karṇas tasyā vicitramaṇibhūṣaḥ 
MSS savidhaprasūtaratnaṃ śaṅkhanidhiṃ dūrataramakarot 
MSSA kamanīyatārahārā candanaparihasitacārunīhārā 
MSSA paricitapāṇḍyavihārā kamalamukhīyaṃ karāñcadupahārā 
MSS kamanekatamādānaṃ suratanarajatucchalaṃ tadāsīnam 
MSS apyatimānaṃ khamate so'ganikānaṃ naraṃ jetum 
MSS kamalaṃ kavalīkṛtaṃ na vā salilaṃ vā na salīlamāhutam 
MSS kariṇā pariṇāmadāruṇo dadṛśe vindhyavane mṛgādhipaḥ 
MSS kamalaṃ tava padakamale vimale mama dehi cañcarīkatvam 
MSS nānyat kimapi ca kāṅkṣe paścād gānaṃ kimasti bhikṣāyāḥ 
MSS kamalaṃ bhavanaṃ rajo'ṅgarāgo madhu pānaṃ madhurāḥ priyāpralāpāḥ 
MSS śayanaṃ mṛdu kesaropadhānaṃ bhramarasyāmbhasi kā na rājalīlā 
MSSA kamaladṛśo'dhikapolaṃ daśanakṣatapaṅktirābhāti 
MSSA yūno vaśayitumicchor japamālevātanoḥ pravālamayī 
MSS kamalanayana yuṣmadviprayogāturā sā sarasi sarasijāntaḥ snātukāmā mamajja 
MSS drutataramanuyāyād yāvadūrdhvaṃ kṛśāṅgī hari hari hariṇākṣī paṅkamagnā babhūva 
MSS kamalanayanākarṇābhūṣe sphuranmaṇimañjule tribhuvanatale dṛṣṭvāmodaṃ prayāti na ko yuvā 
MSS śamabhaṭaśiraśchettuṃ sajjīkṛte bata vedhasā na kimu kumate rajjūtkṣipte vibodhasi cakrake 
MSS kamalapallavavārikaṇopamaṃ kimiva pāsi sadā nidhanaṃ dhanam 
MSS kalabhakarṇacalāñcalacañcalaṃ sthiratarāṇi yaśāṃsi na jīvitam 
MSS kamalabhūtanayā vadanāmbuje vasatu te kamalā karapallave 
MSS vapuṣi te ramatāṃ kamalāṅgajaḥ pratidinaṃ hṛdaye kamalāpatiḥ 
MSS kamalamadhunas tyaktvā pānaṃ vihāya navotpalaṃ prakṛtisubhagāṃ gandhoddāmāmapāsya ca mālatīm 
MSS śaṭhamadhukarāḥ kliśyantīme kaṭāmbuṣu dantināṃ sulabhamapahāyai'vaṃ lokaḥ kaṭeṣu hi rajyate 
MSS kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām 
MSS sā ca sukumārasubhagety utpātaparamparā keyam 
MSS kamalamiva cāru vadanaṃ mṛṇālamiva komalaṃ bhujāyugalam 
MSS alimāleva ca nīlā tavaiva madirekṣaṇe kabarī 
MSS kamalamukulamṛdvī phullarājīvagandhaḥ suratapayasi yasyāḥ saurabhaṃ divyamaṅge 
MSS cakitamṛgadṛśābhe prāntarakte ca netre stanayugalamanarghyaṃ śrīphalaśrīviḍambi 
MSS tilakusumasamānāṃ bibhratī nāsikāṃ ca dvijagurusurapūjāṃ śraddadhānā sadaiva 
MSS kuvalayadalakāntiḥ kāpi cāmpeyagaurī vikacakamalakośākārakāmātapatrā 
MSS vrajati mṛdu salīlaṃ rājahaṃsīva tanvī trivalivalitamaghyā haṃsavāṇī suveṣā 
MSS mṛdu śuci laghu bhuṅkte māninī gāḍhalajjā dhavalakusumavāsovallabhā padminī syāt 
MSS kamalamukhi sarvatomukha nivāraṇaṃ vidadhadeva bhūṣayati 
MSS rodhoruddhasvarasās taraṅgiṇīs taralanayanāśca 
MSS kamalavadanā pīnottuṅgaṃ ghaṭākṛti vibhratī stanayugamiyaṃ tanvī śyāmā viśāladṛgañcalā 
MSS viśadadaśanā madhyakṣāmā vṛtheti janāḥ śramaṃ vidadhati mudhā rāgāduccairanīdṛśavarṇane 
MSS kamalavanacitāmbuḥ pāṭalāmodaramyaḥ sukhasalilaniṣekaḥ sevyacandrāṃśuhāraḥ 
MSS vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe sukhena 
MSS kamalaśaradhirambhāsaikatānukramāḍhyaṃ kanakakalaśabhārākrāntasaudāminīkam 
MSS kisalayitamṛṇālaṃ hāragarbhapravālaṃ kuvalayitaśaśāṅkaṃ kauśalaṃ sā vidhātuḥ 
MSS kamalāḥ pākavinamrā mūlatalāghrātasurabhikahlārāḥ 
MSS pavanākampitaśirasaḥ prāyaḥ kurvanti parimalaślāghām 
MSSA kamalākucakanakācala jaladharamābhīrasundarīmadanam 
MSSA adhitataśeṣaphaṇāvali kamalavanībhṛṅgamacyutaṃ vande 
MSS kamalākṣi vilambyatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ kamanīye kacabhārabandhane 
MSS dṛḍhalagnamidaṃ dṛśoryugaṃ śanakairadya samuddharāmyaham 
MSS kamalācibukonnāyī kṛṣṇasya karaḥ karotu kalyāṇam 
MSS mukura iva nīlavṛnto bhāti nitāntaṃ tadānanaṃ yena 
MSS kamalāni pānamadhubhājanāni naḥ pidadhāti yaḥ sa vidhureṣa gocaraḥ 
MSS iti roṣaṇairiva madhuvratairdhutaṃ dadhatī mukhaṃ surabhicārumārutam 
MSS kamalābhyāṃ sudhāsindhuvadanekṣaṇayos tulām 
MSS kalayantu pare kiṃ tu kveme paṅkeruhe kva te 
MSS kamalāsanakamalekṣaṇa kamalārikirīṭakamalabhṛdvāhaiḥ 
MSS nutapadakamalā kamalā karadhṛtakamalā karotu me kuśalam 
MSS kamalini malinīkaroṣi cetaḥ kimiti bakairavahelitānabhijñaiḥ

MSS kamalini vimale jale janis te taducitamācaraṇaṃ na saṃtanoṣi 
MSS malinamalikulaṃ yatastvamantaḥ śaśikiraṇān vimalān bahiṣkaroṣi 
MSS kamalinīmalinī dayitaṃ vinā na sahate saha tena niṣevitām 
MSS tamadhunā madhunā nihitaṃ hṛdi smarati sā ratisāramaharniśam 
MSS kamalinīvanakelikalārasī guṇavaśīkṛtakairaviṇīguṇaḥ 
MSS alirasau tava saurabhalobhataḥ patati ketakikaṇṭakasaṃkaṭe 
MSS kamaleḥ samakeśaṃ te kamalerṣyākaraṃ mukham 
MSS kamalekhyaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kamalevonmadiṣṇuṣu

MSS kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete manye matkuṇaśaṅkayā 
MSS kamale kamale nityaṃ madhūni pibatas tava

MSS karaculukajalo mahodadhiś caraṇanibaddhamaho nijāṅgaṇam

MSS karajadaśanacihnaṃ naiśamaṅge'nyanārī janitamiti saroṣāmīrṣyayā śaṅkamānām

MSS kurvanti dyūtakārasya karṇanāsādichedanam 
MSS karkaśatarkavicāra vyagraḥ kiṃ vetti kāvyahṛdayāni 
MSS grāmya iva kṛṣivilagnaś cañcalanayanāvacorahasyāni 
MSS karkaśena tu cāpena yaḥ kṛṣṭau hīnamuṣṭinā 
MSS matsyapucchā gatis tasya sāyakasya prakīrtitā 
MSS karkoṭikārkayormūlaṃ cūrṇayitvā ca sarṣapān 
MSS sarpiṣā pāyayen mantrī sthāvarakṣveḍaśāntaye 
MSS karṇaṃ cakṣurajīgaṇattava pitus tātaḥ pitā te punaḥ śaktyādhārakumāramapyajagaṇattaṃ kātaratvena saḥ 
MSS devogānmahiṣīti paśyati jagattvevaṃ vivektuṃ punaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ prathayanti vastadapi ca prajñādhanāḥ sādhavaḥ 
MSS karṇaḥ sarvaśirogatastribhuvane karṇena kiṃ na śrūtaṃ viśrāmyanti mṛgīdṛśāmapi dṛśaḥ karṇe na citraṃ kvacit 
MSS āścaryaṃ punaretadeva yadayaṃ niśchidrasanmaṇḍalaḥ saptāmbhonidhimekhalāṃ vasumatīṃ dhatte jaganmaṇḍalaḥ 
MSS karṇakalpitarasālamañjarī piñjarīkṛtakapolamaṇḍalaḥ 
MSS niṣpatannayanavāridhārayā rādhayā madhuripurnirīkṣyate 
MSS karṇagateyamamoghā dṛṣṭis tava śaktirindradattā ca 
MSS sā nāsāditavijayā kvacidapi nāpārthapatiteyam 
MSSA karṇadvayāvanatakāñcanatālapatrā veṇyantalambimaṇimauktikahemagucchā 
MSSA kūrpāsakotkavacitastanabāhumūlā lāṭī nitambaparivṛttadaśāntanīvī 
MSS karṇalaṅghiguṇotkarṣā vadānyā dhanvino yathā 
MSS niṣphalān na vimuñcanti mārgaṇān samitau sthitā 
MSS karṇaviṣeṇa ca bhagnaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na karoti bāliśo lokaḥ 
MSS kṣapaṇakatāmapi dhatte pibati surāṃ narakapālena 
MSS karṇas tvacaṃ śibirmāṃsaṃ jīvaṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ 
MSS dadau dadhīcirasthīni nāstyadeyaṃ mahātmanām 
MSSA karṇasphuratkanakakuṇḍalakāntiramyam ādṛṣṭigocarakucadvayalobhanīyam 
MSSA kāleyabindukalikāyitakuṅkumāṅkaṃ karṇāṭayauvatamidaṃ kamanīyarūpam 
MSS karṇasya bhūṣaṇamidaṃ mamāyativirodhinaḥ 
MSS iti karṇotpalaṃ prāyas tava dṛṣṭyā vilaṅghyate 
MSS karṇākṣidantacchadabāhupāṇi pādādinaḥ svākhilatulyajetuḥ 
MSS udvegabhāgadvayatābhimānād ihaiva vedhā vyadhita dvitīyam 
MSS karṇāgranthitakiṃtanurnataśirā bibhrajjarājarjara sphiksaṃdhipraviveśitapravicalallāṅgūlanālaḥ kṣaṇam 
MSS ārād vīkṣya vipakṣamākramakṛtakrodhasphuratkandharaṃ śvā mallīkalikāvikāśidaśanaḥ kiṃcit kvaṇan gacchati 
MSS karṇāgre pīḍite yeṣāṃ sindūrābhasya darśanam 
MSS śoṇitasya bhavet kṣipraṃ te vāhyāścirajīvinaḥ 
MSS karṇāṭaṃ dehi karṇādhikavidhivihitatyāga lāṭaṃ lalāṭa prottuṅga drāviḍaṃ vā pracalabhujabalaprauḍhimāgāḍharāḍham 
MSS prasphūrjadgurjaraṃ vā dalitaripuvadhūgarbha vaidarbhakaṃ vā gājī rājīvadṛṣṭe kuśaśatamathavā śāhajallāludīna 
MSS karṇāṭīdaśanāṅkitaḥ śitamahārāṣṭrīkaṭākṣāhatataḥ prauḍhāndhrīstanapīḍitaḥ praṇayinībhrūbhaṅgavitrāsitaḥ 
MSS lāṭībāhuviveṣṭitaśca malayastrītarjanītarjitaḥ so'yaṃ saṃprati rājaśekharakavirvārāṇasīṃ vāñchati 
MSS karṇābhyarṇavidīrṇasṛkkavikaṭavyādānadīptāgnibhir daṃṣṭrākoṭiviśaṅkaṭairita ito dhāvadbhirākīryate 
MSS vidyutpuñjanikāśakeśanayanabhrūśmaśrujālairna bho lakṣyālakṣyaviśuṣkadīrghavapuṣāmulkāmu khānāṃ mukhaiḥ 
MSS karṇābhyarṇāriśṛṅgakṣatirudhirarasāsvādanābaddhagardha dhvāṅkṣacchāyāttabhītipratihatadhavalīvargasaṃ vardhanecchaḥ 
MSS śīlavyākruddhagopīlaguḍahatinamatpṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ kathaṃcit prātaḥ kedāranīraṃ kalamadalabhiyā kūṇitākṣo mahokṣaḥ 
MSS karṇāmṛtaṃ sūkrisaṃ vimucya doṣe prayatnaḥ sumahān khalānām 
MSS nirīkṣate kelivanaṃ praviśya kramelakaḥ kaṇṭakajālameva 
MSS karṇāruntudamantareṇa raṇitaṃ gāhasva kāka svayam mākandaṃ makarandasundaramidaṃ tvāṃ kokilaṃ manmahe 
MSS bhavyāni sthalasauṣṭhavena katicid vastūni kastūrikāṃ nepālakṣitipālabhālatilake paṅkaṃ na śaṅketa kaḥ 
MSS karṇāruntudameva kokilarutaṃ tasyāḥ śrute bhāṣite candre lokarucis tadānanaruceḥ prāgeva saṃdarśanāt 
MSS cakṣurmīlanameva tannayanayoragre mṛgīṇāṃ varaṃ haimo vallyapi tāvadeva lalitā yāvanna sā lakṣyate 
MSS karṇārpito lodhrakaṣāyarūkṣe gorocanākṣepanitāntagaure 
MSS tasyāḥ kapole parabhāgalābhād babandha cakṣūṃṣi yavaprarohaḥ 
MSSA karṇālaṅkaraṇaṃ kadā kṛtamiti sparśaḥ kapole kṛtaḥ kīdṛk kāntamaho nu kañcukamiti nyastaḥ karo vakṣasi 
MSSA rāgaḥ sāhajikaḥ kimeṣa vadane'pyasparśi bimbādharo mogdhyenaiva mṛgīdṛśi vyavasitaṃ nirvighnamāsīnmama 
MSS karṇāhativyatikaraṃ kariṇāmupekṣya dānaṃ vyavasyati madhruvrata eṣa tiktam 
MSS smartavyatāmupagateṣu saroruheṣu dhig jīvitavyasanamasya malīmasasya 
MSS karṇikādiṣviva svarṇam arṇavādiṣvivodakam 
MSS bhediṣvabhedi yat tasmai parasmai mahase namaḥ 
MSS karṇikāralatāḥ phullakusumākulaṣaṭpadāḥ 
MSS sakajjalaśikhā rejur dīpamālā ivojjvalāḥ 
MSS karṇikārasasauvīraguptāṃ trikaṭumādhavīm 
MSS yaṣṭīdhānyaguḍakṣīraṃ daṣṭo mattaśunā pibet 
MSS karṇinālīkanārācā nirharanti śarīrataḥ 
MSS vākśalyas tu na nirhartuṃ śakyo hṛdiśayo hi saḥ 
MSS karṇe kāntāgamanavacanaśrāviṇi svarṇabhūṣāṃ tasyādarśinyakṛta nayane śyāmikāmañjanena 
MSS sthāpyaḥ kutra priya iti parāmṛśya hārāvṛtāṅke hṛtparyaṅke pulakapaṭalītūlikāmāstṛṇoti 
MSS karṇeṃ cāmaracārukambukalikā kaṇṭhe maṇīnāṃ gaṇaḥ sindūraprakaraḥ śiraḥparisare pārśvāntike kiṅkiṇī 
MSS labdhaścen nṛpavāhanena kariṇā baddhena bhūṣāvidhis tat kiṃ bhūdharadhūlidhūsaratanurmānyo na vanyaḥ karī 
MSS karṇejapaḥ kuṭilamūrtirasavyapāṇir agresaras taditaras tava baddhamuṣṭiḥ 
MSS tanmārgaṇās tadapi lakṣamamī labhante dhānuṣka tat kimapi kauśalamadbhutaṃ te 
MSS karṇejapā api sadā kuṭilasvabhāvā duṣṭāśayā nirabhisaṃdhitavairibhūtāḥ 
MSS sohārdahṛṣṭahṛdayā mayi santu yeṣāṃ jihvāpaṭurvinimayeṣu guṇā guṇānām 
MSS karṇejapānāṃ vacanaprapañcān mahātmanaḥ kvāpi na dūṣayanti 
MSS bhujaṅgamānāṃ garalaprasaṅgān nāpeyatāṃ yānti mahāsarāṃsi 
MSS karṇe tat kathayanti dundubhiravai rāṣṭre yadudghoṣitaṃ tannamrāṅgatayā vadanti karuṇaṃ yasmāt trapāvān bhavet 
MSS ślāghante tadudīryate yadariṇāpyugraṃ na marmāntakṛd ye kecin nanu śāṭhyamaugdhyanidhayas te bhūbhṛtāṃ rañjakāḥ 
MSS karṇe tāṭaṅkalakṣmīmurasi makarikāpatramūrau dukūlaṃ savye'rdhe dakṣiṇe ca dvirasanabhasitavyālakṛttīrdadhānaḥ 
MSS kaṇṭhe niḥsīmaśīrṣasrajamatha vidadhadvīkṣitaḥ śailaputryā sabhrūvikṣepamantaḥsmitalalitamukho bhūtabhartāvatād vaḥ 
MSS karṇe tāladalaṃ tanau malayajaṃ karpūravāsoṃ'śuke cūle gumphitaketakīdalabharaḥ kaṇṭhe navaikāvalī 
MSS vāsaḥ śrīvanavāsasīmani vacaśrīḥ satkaveruktayo vaktre nāgarakhaṇḍamastu purataḥ premākulāḥ kuntalāḥ 
MSS karṇena ghātayitvā ghaṭotkacaṃ śakraśaktinirmokṣāt 
MSS jīvitamarakṣi pārthaiḥ svātmānaṃ sarvato rakṣet 
MSS karṇena nirjito'smīti cintāṃ cintāmaṇe tyaja 
MSS jitā devadrumāḥ pañca na duḥkhaṃ pañcabhiḥ saha 
MSS karṇe baddhā ravau śvetaturaṃgaripumūlikā 
MSS sarvajvaraharā śvetamandārasya ca mūlikā 
MSS karṇe yanna kṛtaṃ sakhījanavaco yannādṛtā bandhuvāk yat pāde nipatannapi priyatamaḥ karṇotpalenāhataḥ

MSS karṇe'vataṃsayitumarpayituṃ śikhāsu māṣṭuṃ ratiśramajalaṃ caṣake nidhātum

MSSA hasitāni sindhukanye hārāsstanaśailanirjhaṃravihārāḥ

MSS kartavyaṃ tveva karmeti manoreṣa viniścayaḥ

MSS kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ sarvaiḥ samūhahitavādinām

MSS atisaṃcayaśīlo'yaṃ dhanuṣā jambuko hataḥ

MSS kalayati mama cetastalpamaṅgārakalpaṃ jvalayati mama gātraṃ candanaṃ candrakaśca 
MSS tirayati mama netre mohajanmāndhakāro vikṛtabahuvikāraṃ manmatho māṃ dunoti 
MSS kalayatu haṃsavilāsagatiṃ sa bakaḥ sarasi varākaḥ 
MSS nīrakṣīravivekavidhau tasya kutaḥ paripākaḥ 
MSS kalaya valayaṃ dhammille'sminniveśaya mallikāṃ racaya sicayaṃ muktāhāraṃ vibhūṣaya satvaram 
MSS mṛgamadamaṣīpatrālepaṃ kuruṣva kapolayoḥ sahacari samāyātaḥ prātaḥ sa te hṛdayapriyaḥ 
MSS kalayasi vayasya kasmāt tvaṃ ruciraṃ bhāratīśāstram 
MSS atro'ktipratyuktau kalaya mitho bhūriśastrapātaraṇam 
MSS kalayā tuṣārakiraṇasya puraḥ parimandabhinnatimiraughajaṭam 
MSS kṣaṇamabhyapadyata janairna mṛṣā gaganaṃ gaṇādhipatimūrtiriti 
MSS kalayātra prakāśyaṃ cet kiṃcidvā divyajīvane 
MSS tasyāmapi prakāśā syād viśālā śāntirujjvalā 
MSSA kalaye kisalayamadharaṃ śaṅke paṅkeruhaṃ karadvandvam 
MSSA manye manasijavetraṃ gātraṃ netraikamohanaṃ tanvyāḥ 
MSSB kalaravakaṇṭhakarambita kalaravakalakaṇṭhakūjite surate 
MSSB tava manumīlitalocana mānanamavalokituṃ priye kalaye 
MSS kalaśe nijahetudaṇḍajaḥ kimu cakrabhramakāritāguṇaḥ 
MSS sa taduccakucau bhavan prabhā jharacakrabhramamātanoti yat 
MSS kalahaḥ kadāpi māstviti kalitaśarīraikyayoḥ śivayoḥ 
MSS ahamasmyahamasmīti prāptaḥ kalaho mama trāṇe 
MSS kalahakalabhavindhyaḥ kopagṛdhraśmaśānaṃ vyasanabhujagarandhraṃ dveṣadasyupradoṣaḥ 
MSS sukṛtavanadavāgnirmārdavāmbhodavāyur nayanalinatuṣāro'tyarthamarthānurāgaḥ 
MSS kalahakalayā yat saṃvṛtyai trapāvanatānanā pihitapulakodbhedaṃ subhrūścakarṣa na kañcukam 
MSS dayitamabhitastāmutkaṇṭhāṃ vivavruranantaraṃ jhaṭiti taṭiti truṭyanto'ntaḥ stanāṃśukasandhayaḥ 
MSS kalahapriyātidīrghā kharvā vā śyāmapītaharitā vā 
MSS lamboṣṭhī laghunāsā laghuśithilastanavibhāgā ca 
MSS kalahamātanute madirāvaśas tamiha yena nirasyati jīvitam 
MSS vṛṣamapāsyati saṃcinute malaṃ dhanamapaiti janaiḥ paribhūyate 
MSS kalahāntaritāpralapanam ataḥ paraṃ nāyakasya śikṣā ca 
MSS saṃbhogāviṣkaraṇaṃ kulaṭā saṃkīrṇamiti ca śṛṅgāraḥ 
MSS kalahāntāni harmyāṇi kuvākyāntaṃ ca sauhṛdam 
MSS kurājāntāni rāṣṭrāṇi kukarmāntaṃ yaśo nṛṇām 
MSS kalahāyante mūḍhāḥ kaḥ pratibhūḥ śvaḥ prabhāta iti 
MSS tasyāmeva rajanyāṃ kaḥ pratibhūḥ svasya sattāyām 
MSS kalāṃ tāmaindavīṃ vande yayā yādaṣpatiḥ pitā 
MSS āruhya haramūrdhānaṃ kṛtas trailokyamūrdhani 
MSS kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatays tathā 
MSS ete tvaṃśakalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam 
MSSA kalākalāpasampannā upakartuḥ parañmukhāḥ 
MSSA na bhavanti mahātmānaḥ sarasaḥ śikhino yathā 
MSS kalākāṣṭhāmuhūrtānāṃ kālasya vrajatāṃ javāt 
MSS na lakṣyate vibhāgena dīpasyevārciṣāṃ gatiḥ 
MSS kalāttamāyālavakāntamūrtiḥ kalakvaṇadveṇuninādaramyaḥ 
MSS śrito hṛdi vyākulayaṃstrilokīṃ śriye'stu gopījanavallabho vaḥ 
MSS kalādhāro vakraḥ sphuradadhararāgo navatanur galanmānāveśāstaruṇaramaṇīrnāgara iva 
MSS ghanaśroṇībimbe nayanamukule cādharadale kapole grīvāyāṃ kucakalaśayoścumbati śaśī 
MSS kalādhināthādhigamād dvitīye kimadvitīyeti tanoṣi garvam 
MSS ayi tvamasmadvacasi pratīyā ayaṃ tṛtīyāmupagantukāmaḥ 
MSS kalādhināthānayanāya sāyaṃ kumudvatīpreṣita eva bhṛṅgaḥ 
MSS kimindunāliṅgya sarāgamaṅke kṛtaḥ kalaṅkabhramamātanoti 
MSS kalānāṃ grahaṇādeva saubhāgyamupajāyate 
MSS deśakālau tvapekṣyāsāṃ prayogaḥ saṃbhavenna vā 
MSS kalānāthaḥ kāmaṃ bhajati bahudoṣāṅkitatanuṃ kumudvatyāstasminnapi bhavati kiṃ nāma na ruciḥ 
MSS na padminyā modaḥ kimudayatyuṣṇamahasi priye prāyo doṣān na gaṇayati cittaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ 
MSSA kalānidhikarasparśāt prasannollāsitārakā 
MSSA bimraṇāmbaramānīlaṃ kāminī yāminīyate 
MSS kalānidhirayaṃ raveḥ samupalabhya rūpaṃ svayaṃ dināntasamaye'spṛśat sapadi padminīṃ rāgavān 
MSS dhavānyakarasaṃgamānmukuliteti pūrvākṛtiṃ samīkṣya jahasuḥ priyā dhruvamabhūdataḥ pāṇḍuraḥ 
MSS kalāpināṃ cārutayopayānti vṛndāni lāpoḍhaghanāgamānām 
MSS vṛndānilāpoḍhaghanāgamānāṃ kalāpināṃ cārutayo'payānti 
MSS kalābhirucchritā veśyā rūpaśīlaguṇānvitā 
MSS labhate gaṇikāśabdaṃ sthānaṃ ca janasaṃsadi 
MSS kalāminduḥ karaṃ dātā dhārāṃ dhārādharo yadi 
MSS saṃkocayiṣyate tarhi jīviṣyati kathaṃ jagat 
MSS kalāratnaṃ gītaṃ gaganatalaratnaṃ dinamaṇiḥ sabhāratnaṃ vidvān śravaṇapuṭaratnaṃ harikathā 
MSS niśāratnaṃ candraḥ śayanatalaratnaṃ śaśimukhī mahīratnaṃ śrīmāñjayati raghunātho nṛpavaraḥ 
MSS kalāvataḥ saiva kalā yayādhaḥkriyate bhavaḥ 
MSS bahvībhiśca kalābhiḥ kiṃ yābhiraṅkaḥ pradarśyate 
MSS kalāvati kṣatatamasi prabhāvati sphuṭodaye jananayanābhinandini 
MSS dadurdūśaṃ śaśini ruṣābhisārikāḥ kvacid bhavatyatisubhago'pi durbhagaḥ 
MSS kalāvati calāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kuryās tvaṃ muhurmuhuḥ 
MSS lagno'pi na tathā bāṇo bādhate cālito yathā 
MSS kalāsīmā kāvyaṃ sakalaguṇasīmā vitaraṇaṃ bhaye sīmā mṛtyuḥ sakalasukhasīmā suvadanā 
MSS tapaḥsīmā muktiḥ sakalakṛtisīmāśritabhṛtiḥ priye sīmāhlādaḥ śravaṇasukhasīmā harikathā 
MSS kalā sevātha dharmārthau tṛṣṇādāridryapaddhatī 
MSS santoṣakṣāntikaruṇā vairāgyaṃ tadanu stutiḥ 
MSS kalāstāstāḥ samyagvahasi yadasi tvaṃ dvijapatir dyutis tādṛgnūtnā janirapi ca ratnākarakule 
MSS bahu brūmaḥ kiṃ vā puraharaśiromaṇḍanamasi tvadīyaṃ tat sarvaṃ śaśadhara kalaṅkād viphalitam 
MSS kalikaluṣasaṅkaṭākula kuṭumbasaṃvalanakhedavikalasya
MSS pratinidhiriva pravāsaḥ saṃsāravirāgasukhasamudrasya 
MSS kalikaluṣe manasi sve kathamiva jagadārjavaṃ labhate 
MSS cakṣurdoṣe jāgrati candradvitvaṃ kuto yātu 
MSS kalikālamiyaṃ yāvad agastyasya munarepi 
MSS mānasaṃ khaṇḍayatyatra śaśikhaṇḍānukāriṇī

MSS kalito ruciraṃ na karma cet kriyate'naṅgakṛteḥ kutaḥ phalam

MSS kalibhūpe samāyāte dharmo'dharmāyate bhuvi

MSS kalimāyāntamutprekṣya vilīyante surā api 
MSS tadāśritasya dharmādeḥ kā kathā jīvane punaḥ 
MSS kalilaṃ caikarātreṇa pañcarātreṇa budbudam 
MSS pakṣaikenāṇḍakaḥ so'tha māsapūrṇe śiro kuru 
MSS kalisāmrājyamāsādya na bhetavyaṃ bhavāntarāt

MSS kaluṣaṃ ca tavāhiteṣvakasmāt sitapaṅkeruhasodaraśri cakṣuḥ

MSS anārjavajanasyeva kṛtakavyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ

MSS kalau kale khale mitre putre durvyasanānvite

MSS kalpadrumāśca santaśca nārhanti samaśīrṣikām

MSS kalpadrumo na jānāti na dadāti bṛhaspatiḥ

MSS ko viśeṣas tadā tasya vanyairanyamahīruhaiḥ

MSS tathaiva pūjyate rājā caturasraḥ prakīrtitaḥ 
MSS kalyāṇāṅgarucānuraktamanasā tvaṃ yena saṃprārthyate yasyārthe sumukhi tvayā punarasutyāge'pi saṃnahyate 
MSS so'yaṃ sundari pañcabāṇaviśikhavyālīḍhadorantara svairotpīḍitapīvarastanataṭas tvaddorlatāpañjare 
MSS kalyāṇānāṃ tvamasi mahasāṃ bhājanaṃ viśvasūrte dhuryāṃ lakṣmīmatha mayi bhṛśaṃ dhehi deva prasīda 
MSS yad yat pāpaṃ pratijahi jagannātha namnasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan bhūyase maṅgalāya 
MSS kalyāṇānāṃ nidhānaṃ kalimalamathanaṃ pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ pātheyaṃ yan mumukṣoḥ sapadi parapadaprāptaye prasthitasya 
MSS viśrāmasthānamekaṃ kavivaravacasāṃ jīvanaṃ sajjanānāṃ bījaṃ dharmadrumasya prabhavatu bhavatāṃ bhūtaye rāmanāma 
MSS kalyāṇāni dadātu vo gaṇapatiryasmin nu tuṣṭe sati kṣodīyasyapi karmaṇi prabhavituṃ brahmāpi jihmāyate 
MSS jāte yaccaraṇapraṇāmasulabhe saubhāgyabhāgyodaye raṅkasyāṅkamanaṅkuśā niviśate devendralakṣmīrapi 
MSS kalyāṇāyabhavantu khaṇḍaparaśoḥ koṭīravāṭīruhāṃ vallīnāṃ valayāni velladuragaśreṇīni śoṇatviṣām 
MSS unmīlatkanakāravindakalikākiñjalkapuñjakṣarad dhūlīdhūsarasiddhasindhulaharīsindūritendūni vaḥ 
MSS kalyāṇi candanarasaiḥ pariṣicya gātraṃ dvitrāṇyahāni kathamapyativāhayethāḥ 
MSS aṅke nidhāya bhavatīṃ parirabhya dorbhyāṃ neṣyāmi sūryakiraṇānapi śītalatvam 
MSS kalyāṇi pāṇipatitāni vinā vicāram etāni moktumucitāni na mauktikāni 
MSS guñjeti saṃjanayate yadiha bhramante hastāravindanayanotpalayoḥ prabhaiva 
MSS kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me 
MSS eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatādapi 
MSS kalyāṇollāsasīmā kalayatu kuśalaṃ kālameghābhirāmā kācit sāketadhāmā bhavagahanagatiklāntihāripraṇāmā 
MSS saundaryahrīṇakāmā dhṛtajanakasutāsādarāpāṅgadhāmā dikṣu prakhyātabhūmā diviṣadabhinutā devatā rāmanāmā 
MSS kalyotthānaparā nityaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratā 
MSS susaṃmṛṣṭagṛhā caiva gośakṛtkṛtalepanā 
MSS kallolakṣiptapaṅkatripuraharaśiraḥsvaḥsravantīmṛṇālaṃ karpūrakṣodajālaṃ kusumaśaravadhūsīdhubhṛṅgāranālam 
MSS etad dugdhābdhibandhorgaganakamalinīpatrapānīyabindor antas toṣaṃ na keṣāṃ kisalayati jaganmaṇḍanaṃ khaṇḍamindoḥ 
MSSA kallolacapalā lakṣmīḥ saṃgamāḥ svapnasannibhāḥ 
MSSA vātyāvyatikarotkṣiptatūlatulyaṃ ca yauvanam 
MSS kallolavellitadṛṣatparuṣaprahārai ratnānyamūni makarālaya māvamaṃsthāḥ 
MSS kiṃ kaustubhena vihito bhavato na nāma yācñāprasāritakaraḥ puruṣottamo'pi 
MSS kallolasaṃcaladagādhajalairalolaiḥ kallolinīparivṛḍhaiḥ kimapeyatoyaiḥ 
MSS jīyāt sa jarjaratanurgirinirjharo'yaṃ yadvipruṣāpi tṛṣitā vitṛṣībhavanti 
MSS kallolaiḥ sthagayan mukhāni kakubhāmabhraṃlihairambhasā kṣāreṇāpi divāniśaṃ jalanidhe garjan na viśrāmyasi 
MSS etatte yadi ghoranakranilayaṃ svādu vyadhāsyād vidhiḥ kiṃ kartāsi tadā na vedmi taralaiḥ svaireva duśceṣṭitaiḥ 
MSS kallolairvikiratvasau girivarān velāvilāsotthitaiḥ śabdairvā badhirīkarotu kakubho dhattāṃ ca vistīrṇatām 
MSS pānthānāṃ ravitāpataptavapuṣāṃ tṛṣṇātirekacchidaḥ kiṃ sāmyaṃ pratanoḥ karotu saraso'pyabdhiḥ kṛtāḍambaraḥ 
MSS kavayaḥ kavayantu tailabhuktāḥ sarasā eva parantu dākṣiṇātyāḥ 
MSS api locanacañcalā hariṇyo madirākṣyā na samāḥ kaṭākṣapātaiḥ 
MSS kavayaḥ kālidāsādyāḥ kavayo vayamapyamī 
MSS parvate paramāṇau ca vastutvamubhayorapi 
MSS kavayaḥ kiṃ na paśyanti kiṃ na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ 
MSS pramadāḥ kiṃ na kurvanti kiṃ na jalpanti madyapāḥ 
MSS kavayaḥ kiṃ na paśyanti kiṃ na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ 
MSS madyapāḥ kiṃ na jalpanti kiṃ na kurvanti yoṣitaḥ 
MSS kavayaḥ parituṣyanti netare kavisūktibhiḥ 
MSS nahyakūpāravat kūpā vardhante vidhukāntibhiḥ 
MSS kavalayati na cetas tasya dāridryaduḥkhaṃ na ca piśunajanoktiḥ karṇakaṇḍūṃ karoti 
MSS varakavikṛtagoṣṭhībandhagandhopabhoge ya iha madhu vamantīṃ kāvyacintāṃ karoti 
MSS kavayati paṇḍitarāje kavayantyanye'pi vidvāṃsaḥ 
MSS nṛtyati pinākapāṇau nṛtyantyanye'pi bhūtavetālāḥ 
MSS kavayo vada kutra kīdṛśāḥ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ viditaṃ samantataḥ 
MSS adhunā tava vairiyoṣitāṃ hṛdi tāpaḥ prabalo vihāya kāḥ 
MSSA kavalayasi candradīdhitī rnaviralamaśnāsi nūnamaṅgārān 
MSSA adhikataramuṣṇamanayoḥ kimiha cakorāvadhārayasi 
MSS kavalitamiha nālaṃ kandalaṃ ceha dṛṣṭam iha hi kumudakośe pītamambhaḥ suśītam 
MSS iti viraṭati rātrau paryaṭantī taṭānte sahacaraparimuktā cakravākī varākī 
MSS kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni paṇḍito vetti tadrasam 
MSS kāminīkucakāṭhinyaṃ patirjānāti no pitā 
MSS kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni svādu jānāti paṇḍitaḥ 
MSS sundaryā api lāvaṇyaṃ patirjānāti no pitā 
MSS kaviḥ karoti padyāni lālayatyuttamo janaḥ 
MSS taruḥ prasūte puṣpāṇi marud vahati saurabham 
MSS kaviḥ pitā poṣayati pālako rasikaḥ patiḥ 
MSS kavitāyuvaternūnaṃ sodarās tu vivekinaḥ 
MSS kaviḥ sūyati kāvyāni hṛdā dadhati sajjanāḥ 
MSS sūte muktāḥ payorāśir vahanti taruṇīstanāḥ 
MSS kavitākalanena kiṃ nṛpāṇāṃ yadi kavayo na labhanti pūrṇakāmāḥ 
MSS nayanena kimeṇalocanānāṃ yadi vakraṃ na vilokitā yuvānaḥ 
MSS kavitākundavikāsana kṛtine vijitajanatānidāghāya 
MSS dalitoddāmāghāya praṇatiṃ kalayāmi māghāya 
MSS kavitā vanitā kasya na modāya sacetasaḥ 
MSS rasa eva sadā tasyā narīnartīva sarvataḥ 
MSS kavitvaṃ na śṛṇotyeva kṛpaṇaḥ kīrtivarjitaḥ 
MSS napuṃsakaḥ kiṃ kurute puraḥsthitamṛgīdṛśā 
MSS kavitvagānapriyavādasatyā nyasyā vidhātā vyadhitādhikaṇṭham 
MSS rekhātrayanyāsamiṣādamīṣāṃ vāsāya so'yaṃ vibabhāja sīmāḥ 
MSS kavitvaprodgumphaśravaṇakṛtajhampavyatikaraṃ ciraṃ yeṣāṃ svāntaṃ samajani nitāntaṃ rasavaśam 
MSS amīṣāṃ pīyūṣāpacitasurayoṣādharapuṭo llasanmādhurye vā samudayati kiṃ vā ratirapi 
MSS kavitvamārogyamatīva medhā strīṇāṃ priyatvaṃ kanakasya lābhaḥ 
MSS sarveṣu tathyaṃ svajaneṣu pūjā svargasthitānāṃ kila cihnametat 
MSSA kavitvaśaktirhi divo'vatīrṇā bhūmau sudhāsāra ivāryapuṇyāt

MSS kavitve vāditvaṃ kanakakusume saurabhaguṇo dhanitve dātṛtvaṃ viṣamataruphale svādurasatā

MSSA kavibhāvakṛtaṃ cihnam anyatrāpi na duṣyati 
MSSA mukhamiṣṭārthasaṃsiddhaṃ kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām

MSS vāṇī veśyeva lobhena paropakaraṇīkṛtā
